verses.text_en: Happy is the man who has not followed the counsel of the wicked, or taken the path of sinners, or joined the company of the insolent;
verses.text_he: אַ֥שְֽׁרֵי־הָאִ֗ישׁ אֲשֶׁ֤ר׀ לֹ֥א הָלַךְ֮ בַּעֲצַ֢ת רְשָׁ֫עִ֥ים וּבְדֶ֣רֶךְ חַ֭טָּאִים לֹ֥א עָמָ֑ד וּבְמוֹשַׁ֥ב לֵ֝צִ֗ים לֹ֣א יָשָֽׁב׃

verses.text_en: rather, the teaching of the LORD is his delight, and he studies that teaching day and night.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י אִ֥ם־בְּתוֹרַ֥ת יְהֹוָ֗ה חֶ֫פְצ֥וֹ וּֽבְתוֹרָת֥וֹ יֶהְגֶּ֗ה יוֹמָ֥ם וָלָֽיְלָה׃

verses.text_en: He is like a tree planted beside streams of water, which yields its fruit in season, whose foliage never fades, and whatever it produces thrives.
verses.text_he: וְֽהָיָ֗ה כְּעֵץ֮ שָׁת֢וּל עַֽל־פַּלְגֵ֫י־מָ֥יִם אֲשֶׁ֤ר פִּרְי֨וֹ׀ יִתֵּ֬ן בְּעִתּ֗וֹ וְעָלֵ֥הוּ לֹֽא־יִבּ֑וֹל וְכֹ֖ל אֲשֶׁר־יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה יַצְלִֽיחַ׃

verses.text_en: Not so the wicked; rather, they are like chaff that wind blows away.
verses.text_he: לֹא־כֵ֥ן הָרְשָׁעִ֑ים כִּ֥י אִם־כַּ֝מֹּ֗ץ אֲֽשֶׁר־תִּדְּפֶ֥נּוּ רֽוּחַ׃

verses.text_en: Therefore the wicked will not survive judgment, nor will sinners, in the assembly of the righteous.
verses.text_he: עַל־כֵּ֤ן׀ לֹא־יָקֻ֣מוּ רְ֭שָׁעִים בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט וְ֝חַטָּאִ֗ים בַּעֲדַ֥ת צַדִּיקִֽים׃

verses.text_en: For the LORD cherishes the way of the righteous, but the way of the wicked is doomed.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־יוֹדֵ֣עַ יְ֭הֹוָה דֶּ֣רֶךְ צַדִּיקִ֑ים וְדֶ֖רֶךְ רְשָׁעִ֣ים תֹּאבֵֽד׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Why do nations assemble, and peoples plot vain things;
verses.text_he: לָ֭מָּה רָגְשׁ֣וּ גוֹיִ֑ם וּ֝לְאֻמִּ֗ים יֶהְגּוּ־רִֽיק׃

verses.text_en: kings of the earth take their stand, and regents intrigue together against the LORD and against His anointed?
verses.text_he: יִ֥תְיַצְּב֨וּ׀ מַלְכֵי־אֶ֗רֶץ וְרוֹזְנִ֥ים נֽוֹסְדוּ־יָ֑חַד עַל־יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה וְעַל־מְשִׁיחֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: “Let us break the cords of their yoke, shake off their ropes from us!”
verses.text_he: נְֽ֭נַתְּקָה אֶת־מֽוֹסְרוֹתֵ֑ימוֹ וְנַשְׁלִ֖יכָה מִמֶּ֣נּוּ עֲבֹתֵֽימוֹ׃

verses.text_en: He who is enthroned in heaven laughs; the Lord mocks at them.
verses.text_he: יוֹשֵׁ֣ב בַּשָּׁמַ֣יִם יִשְׂחָ֑ק אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י יִלְעַג־לָֽמוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Then He speaks to them in anger, terrifying them in His rage,
verses.text_he: אָ֤ז יְדַבֵּ֣ר אֵלֵ֣ימוֹ בְאַפּ֑וֹ וּֽבַחֲרוֹנ֥וֹ יְבַהֲלֵֽמוֹ׃

verses.text_en: “But I have installed My king on Zion, My holy mountain!”
verses.text_he: וַ֭אֲנִי נָסַ֣כְתִּי מַלְכִּ֑י עַל־צִ֝יּ֗וֹן הַר־קׇדְשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: Let me tell of the decree: the LORD said to me, “You are My son, I have fathered you this day.
verses.text_he: אֲסַפְּרָ֗ה אֶֽ֫ל־חֹ֥ק יְֽהֹוָ֗ה אָמַ֘ר־אֵלַ֥י בְּנִ֥י אַ֑תָּה אֲ֝נִ֗י הַיּ֥וֹם יְלִדְתִּֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Ask it of Me, and I will make the nations your domain; your estate, the limits of the earth.
verses.text_he: שְׁאַ֤ל מִמֶּ֗נִּי וְאֶתְּנָ֣ה ג֭וֹיִם נַחֲלָתֶ֑ךָ וַ֝אֲחֻזָּתְךָ֗ אַפְסֵי־אָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: You can smash them with an iron mace, shatter them like potter’s ware.”
verses.text_he: תְּ֭רֹעֵם בְּשֵׁ֣בֶט בַּרְזֶ֑ל כִּכְלִ֖י יוֹצֵ֣ר תְּנַפְּצֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: So now, O kings, be prudent; accept discipline, you rulers of the earth!
verses.text_he: וְ֭עַתָּה מְלָכִ֣ים הַשְׂכִּ֑ילוּ הִ֝וָּסְר֗וּ שֹׁ֣פְטֵי אָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: Serve the LORD in awe; tremble with fright,
verses.text_he: עִבְד֣וּ אֶת־יְהֹוָ֣ה בְּיִרְאָ֑ה וְ֝גִ֗ילוּ בִּרְעָדָֽה׃

verses.text_en: pay homage in good faith, lest He be angered, and your way be doomed in the mere flash of His anger. Happy are all who take refuge in Him.
verses.text_he: נַשְּׁקוּ־בַ֡ר פֶּן־יֶאֱנַ֤ף׀ וְתֹ֬אבְדוּ דֶ֗רֶךְ כִּֽי־יִבְעַ֣ר כִּמְעַ֣ט אַפּ֑וֹ אַ֝שְׁרֵ֗י כׇּל־ח֥וֹסֵי בֽוֹ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A psalm of David when he fled from his son Absalom.
verses.text_he: מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִ֑ד בְּ֝בׇרְח֗וֹ מִפְּנֵ֤י׀ אַבְשָׁל֬וֹם בְּנֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, my foes are so many! Many are those who attack me;
verses.text_he: יְ֭הֹוָה מָה־רַבּ֣וּ צָרָ֑י רַ֝בִּ֗ים קָמִ֥ים עָלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: many say of me, “There is no deliverance for him through God.” .
verses.text_he: רַבִּים֮ אֹמְרִ֢ים לְנַ֫פְשִׁ֥י אֵ֤ין יְֽשׁוּעָ֓תָה לּ֬וֹ בֵאלֹהִ֬ים סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: But You, O LORD, are a shield about me, my glory, He who holds my head high.
verses.text_he: וְאַתָּ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה מָגֵ֣ן בַּעֲדִ֑י כְּ֝בוֹדִ֗י וּמֵרִ֥ים רֹאשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: I cry aloud to the LORD, and He answers me from His holy mountain. .
verses.text_he: ק֭וֹלִי אֶל־יְהֹוָ֣ה אֶקְרָ֑א וַיַּעֲנֵ֨נִי מֵהַ֖ר קׇדְשׁ֣וֹ סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: I lie down and sleep and wake again, for the LORD sustains me.
verses.text_he: אֲנִ֥י שָׁכַ֗בְתִּי וָאִ֫ישָׁ֥נָה הֱקִיצ֑וֹתִי כִּ֖י יְהֹוָ֣ה יִסְמְכֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: I have no fear of the myriad forces arrayed against me on every side.
verses.text_he: לֹֽא־אִ֭ירָא מֵרִבְב֥וֹת עָ֑ם אֲשֶׁ֥ר סָ֝בִ֗יב שָׁ֣תוּ עָלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Rise, O LORD! Deliver me, O my God! For You slap all my enemies in the face; You break the teeth of the wicked.
verses.text_he: ק֘וּמָ֤ה יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ הוֹשִׁ֘יעֵ֤נִי אֱלֹהַ֗י כִּֽי־הִכִּ֣יתָ אֶת־כׇּל־אֹיְבַ֣י לֶ֑חִי שִׁנֵּ֖י רְשָׁעִ֣ים שִׁבַּֽרְתָּ׃

verses.text_en: Deliverance is the LORD’s; Your blessing be upon Your people! .
verses.text_he: לַֽיהֹוָ֥ה הַיְשׁוּעָ֑ה עַֽל־עַמְּךָ֖ בִרְכָתֶ֣ךָ סֶּֽלָה׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; with instrumental music. A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ בִּנְגִינ֗וֹת מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: Answer me when I call, O God, my vindicator! You freed me from distress; have mercy on me and hear my prayer.
verses.text_he: בְּקׇרְאִ֡י עֲנֵ֤נִי׀ אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י צִדְקִ֗י בַּ֭צָּר הִרְחַ֣בְתָּ לִּ֑י חׇ֝נֵּ֗נִי וּשְׁמַ֥ע תְּפִלָּתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: You men, how long will my glory be mocked, will you love illusions, have recourse to frauds? .
verses.text_he: בְּנֵ֥י אִ֡ישׁ עַד־מֶ֬ה כְבוֹדִ֣י לִ֭כְלִמָּה תֶּאֱהָב֣וּן רִ֑יק תְּבַקְשׁ֖וּ כָזָ֣ב סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Know that the LORD singles out the faithful for Himself; the LORD hears when I call to Him.
verses.text_he: וּדְע֗וּ כִּֽי־הִפְלָ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה חָסִ֣יד ל֑וֹ יְהֹוָ֥ה יִ֝שְׁמַ֗ע בְּקׇרְאִ֥י אֵלָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: So tremble, and sin no more; ponder it on your bed, and sigh.
verses.text_he: רִגְז֗וּ וְֽאַל־תֶּ֫חֱטָ֥אוּ אִמְר֣וּ בִ֭לְבַבְכֶם עַֽל־מִשְׁכַּבְכֶ֗ם וְדֹ֣מּוּ סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Offer sacrifices in righteousness and trust in the LORD.
verses.text_he: זִבְח֥וּ זִבְחֵי־צֶ֑דֶק וּ֝בִטְח֗וּ אֶל־יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Many say, “O for good days!” Bestow Your favor on us, O LORD.
verses.text_he: רַבִּ֥ים אֹמְרִים֮ מִֽי־יַרְאֵ֢נ֫וּ ט֥וֹב נְֽסָה־עָ֭לֵינוּ א֨וֹר פָּנֶ֬יךָ יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: You put joy into my heart when their grain and wine show increase.
verses.text_he: נָתַ֣תָּה שִׂמְחָ֣ה בְלִבִּ֑י מֵעֵ֬ת דְּגָנָ֖ם וְתִירוֹשָׁ֣ם רָֽבּוּ׃

verses.text_en: Safe and sound, I lie down and sleep, for You alone, O LORD, keep me secure.
verses.text_he: בְּשָׁל֣וֹם יַחְדָּו֮ אֶשְׁכְּבָ֢ה וְאִ֫ישָׁ֥ן כִּֽי־אַתָּ֣ה יְהֹוָ֣ה לְבָדָ֑ד לָ֝בֶ֗טַח תּוֹשִׁיבֵֽנִי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; on . A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ אֶֽל־הַנְּחִיל֗וֹת מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: Give ear to my speech, O LORD; consider my utterance.
verses.text_he: אֲמָרַ֖י הַאֲזִ֥ינָה׀יְהֹוָ֗ה בִּ֣ינָה הֲגִיגִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Heed the sound of my cry, my king and God, for I pray to You.
verses.text_he: הַקְשִׁ֤יבָה׀ לְק֬וֹל שַׁוְעִ֗י מַלְכִּ֥י וֵאלֹהָ֑י כִּֽי־אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ אֶתְפַּלָּֽל׃

verses.text_en: Hear my voice, O LORD, at daybreak; at daybreak I plead before You, and wait.
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה בֹּ֭קֶר תִּשְׁמַ֣ע קוֹלִ֑י בֹּ֥קֶר אֶעֱרׇךְ־לְ֝ךָ֗ וַאֲצַפֶּֽה׃

verses.text_en: For You are not a God who desires wickedness; evil cannot abide with You;
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י׀ לֹ֤א אֵֽל־חָפֵ֘ץ־רֶ֥שַׁע׀אָ֑תָּה לֹ֖א יְגֻרְךָ֣ רָֽע׃

verses.text_en: wanton men cannot endure in Your sight. You detest all evildoers;
verses.text_he: לֹֽא־יִתְיַצְּב֣וּ ה֭וֹלְלִים לְנֶ֣גֶד עֵינֶ֑יךָ שָׂ֝נֵ֗אתָ כׇּל־פֹּ֥עֲלֵי אָֽוֶן׃

verses.text_en: You doom those who speak lies; murderous, deceitful men the LORD abhors.
verses.text_he: תְּאַבֵּד֮ דֹּבְרֵ֢י כָ֫זָ֥ב אִישׁ־דָּמִ֥ים וּמִרְמָ֗ה יְתָ֘עֵ֥ב׀יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: But I, through Your abundant love, enter Your house; I bow down in awe at Your holy temple.
verses.text_he: וַאֲנִ֗י בְּרֹ֣ב חַ֭סְדְּךָ אָב֣וֹא בֵיתֶ֑ךָ אֶשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֥ה אֶל־הֵֽיכַל־קׇ֝דְשְׁךָ֗ בְּיִרְאָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, lead me along Your righteous [path] because of my watchful foes; make Your way straight before me.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֤ה׀ נְחֵ֬נִי בְצִדְקָתֶ֗ךָ לְמַ֥עַן שׁוֹרְרָ֑י (הושר) [הַיְשַׁ֖ר] לְפָנַ֣י דַּרְכֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: For there is no sincerity on their lips; their heart is [filled with] malice; their throat is an open grave; their tongue slippery.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י אֵ֪ין בְּפִ֡יהוּ נְכוֹנָה֮ קִרְבָּ֢ם הַ֫וּ֥וֹת קֶֽבֶר־פָּת֥וּחַ גְּרֹנָ֑ם לְ֝שׁוֹנָ֗ם יַחֲלִיקֽוּן׃

verses.text_en: Condemn them, O God; let them fall by their own devices; cast them out for their many crimes, for they defy You.
verses.text_he: הַ֥אֲשִׁימֵ֨ם׀ אֱֽלֹהִ֗ים יִפְּלוּ֮ מִֽמֹּעֲצ֢וֹתֵ֫יהֶ֥ם בְּרֹ֣ב פִּ֭שְׁעֵיהֶם הַדִּיחֵ֑מוֹ כִּי־מָ֥רוּ בָֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: But let all who take refuge in You rejoice, ever jubilant as You shelter them; and let those who love Your name exult in You.
verses.text_he: וְיִשְׂמְח֨וּ כׇל־ח֪וֹסֵי בָ֡ךְ לְעוֹלָ֣ם יְ֭רַנֵּנוּ וְתָסֵ֣ךְ עָלֵ֑ימוֹ וְֽיַעְלְצ֥וּ בְ֝ךָ֗ אֹהֲבֵ֥י שְׁמֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: For You surely bless the righteous man, O LORD, encompassing him with favor like a shield.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־אַתָּה֮ תְּבָרֵ֢ךְ צַ֫דִּ֥יק יְהֹוָ֑ה כַּ֝צִּנָּ֗ה רָצ֥וֹן תַּעְטְרֶֽנּוּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; with instrumental music on the . A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ בִּ֭נְגִינוֹת עַֽל־הַשְּׁמִינִ֗ית מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, do not punish me in anger, do not chastise me in fury.
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה אַל־בְּאַפְּךָ֥ תוֹכִיחֵ֑נִי וְֽאַל־בַּחֲמָתְךָ֥ תְיַסְּרֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Have mercy on me, O LORD, for I languish; heal me, O LORD, for my bones shake with terror.
verses.text_he: חׇנֵּ֥נִי יְהֹוָה֮ כִּ֤י אֻמְלַ֫ל־אָ֥נִי רְפָאֵ֥נִי יְהֹוָ֑ה כִּ֖י נִבְהֲל֣וּ עֲצָמָֽי׃

verses.text_en: My whole being is stricken with terror, while You, LORD—O, how long!
verses.text_he: וְ֭נַפְשִׁי נִבְהֲלָ֣ה מְאֹ֑ד (ואת) [וְאַתָּ֥ה] יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה עַד־מָתָֽי׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, turn! Rescue me! Deliver me as befits Your faithfulness.
verses.text_he: שׁוּבָ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה חַלְּצָ֣ה נַפְשִׁ֑י ה֝וֹשִׁיעֵ֗נִי לְמַ֣עַן חַסְדֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: For there is no praise of You among the dead; in Sheol, who can acclaim You?
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י אֵ֣ין בַּמָּ֣וֶת זִכְרֶ֑ךָ בִּ֝שְׁא֗וֹל מִ֣י יֽוֹדֶה־לָּֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: I am weary with groaning; every night I drench my bed, I melt my couch in tears.
verses.text_he: יָגַ֤עְתִּי׀ בְּֽאַנְחָתִ֗י אַשְׂחֶ֣ה בְכׇל־לַ֭יְלָה מִטָּתִ֑י בְּ֝דִמְעָתִ֗י עַרְשִׂ֥י אַמְסֶֽה׃

verses.text_en: My eyes are wasted by vexation, worn out because of all my foes.
verses.text_he: עָשְׁשָׁ֣ה מִכַּ֣עַס עֵינִ֑י עָ֝תְקָ֗ה בְּכׇל־צוֹרְרָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Away from me, all you evildoers, for the LORD heeds the sound of my weeping.
verses.text_he: ס֣וּרוּ מִ֭מֶּנִּי כׇּל־פֹּ֣עֲלֵי אָ֑וֶן כִּֽי־שָׁמַ֥ע יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה ק֣וֹל בִּכְיִֽי׃

verses.text_en: The LORD heeds my plea, the LORD accepts my prayer.
verses.text_he: שָׁמַ֣ע יְ֭הֹוָה תְּחִנָּתִ֑י יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה תְּֽפִלָּתִ֥י יִקָּֽח׃

verses.text_en: All my enemies will be frustrated and stricken with terror; they will turn back in an instant, frustrated.
verses.text_he: יֵבֹ֤שׁוּ׀ וְיִבָּהֲל֣וּ מְ֭אֹד כׇּל־אֹיְבָ֑י יָ֝שֻׁ֗בוּ יֵבֹ֥שׁוּ רָֽגַע׃{פ}

verses.text_en: of David, which he sang to the LORD, concerning Cush, a Benjaminite.
verses.text_he: שִׁגָּי֗וֹן לְדָ֫וִ֥ד אֲשֶׁר־שָׁ֥ר לַֽיהֹוָ֑ה עַל־דִּבְרֵי־כ֝֗וּשׁ בֶּן־יְמִינִֽי׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, my God, in You I seek refuge; deliver me from all my pursuers and save me,
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱ֭לֹהַי בְּךָ֣ חָסִ֑יתִי הוֹשִׁיעֵ֥נִי מִכׇּל־רֹ֝דְפַ֗י וְהַצִּילֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: lest, like a lion, they tear me apart, rending in pieces, and no one save me.
verses.text_he: פֶּן־יִטְרֹ֣ף כְּאַרְיֵ֣ה נַפְשִׁ֑י פֹּ֝רֵ֗ק וְאֵ֣ין מַצִּֽיל׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, my God, if I have done such things, if my hands bear the guilt of wrongdoing,
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱ֭לֹהַי אִם־עָשִׂ֣יתִי זֹ֑את אִֽם־יֶשׁ־עָ֥וֶל בְּכַפָּֽי׃

verses.text_en: if I have dealt evil to my ally— I who rescued my foe without reward—
verses.text_he: אִם־גָּ֭מַלְתִּי שֽׁוֹלְמִ֥י רָ֑ע וָאֲחַלְּצָ֖ה צֽוֹרְרִ֣י רֵיקָֽם׃

verses.text_en: then let the enemy pursue and overtake me; let him trample my life to the ground, and lay my body in the dust. .
verses.text_he: יִ֥רַדֹּֽף־אוֹיֵ֨ב׀ נַפְשִׁ֡י וְיַשֵּׂ֗ג וְיִרְמֹ֣ס לָאָ֣רֶץ חַיָּ֑י וּכְבוֹדִ֓י׀ לֶעָפָ֖ר יַשְׁכֵּ֣ן סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Rise, O LORD, in Your anger; assert Yourself against the fury of my foes; bestir Yourself on my behalf; You have ordained judgment.
verses.text_he: ק֘וּמָ֤ה יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ בְּאַפֶּ֗ךָ הִ֭נָּשֵׂא בְּעַבְר֣וֹת צוֹרְרָ֑י וְע֥וּרָה אֵ֝לַ֗י מִשְׁפָּ֥ט צִוִּֽיתָ׃

verses.text_en: Let the assembly of peoples gather about You, with You enthroned above, on high.
verses.text_he: וַעֲדַ֣ת לְ֭אֻמִּים תְּסֽוֹבְבֶ֑ךָּ וְ֝עָלֶ֗יהָ לַמָּר֥וֹם שֽׁוּבָה׃

verses.text_en: The LORD judges the peoples; vindicate me, O LORD, for the righteousness and blamelessness that are mine.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָה֮ יָדִ֢ין עַ֫מִּ֥ים שׇׁפְטֵ֥נִי יְהֹוָ֑ה כְּצִדְקִ֖י וּכְתֻמִּ֣י עָלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Let the evil of the wicked come to an end, but establish the righteous; he who probes the mind and conscience is God the righteous.
verses.text_he: יִגְמׇר־נָ֬א רַ֨ע׀ רְשָׁעִים֮ וּתְכוֹנֵ֢ן צַ֫דִּ֥יק וּבֹחֵ֣ן לִ֭בּוֹת וּכְלָי֗וֹת אֱלֹהִ֥ים צַדִּֽיק׃

verses.text_en: I look to God to shield me; the deliverer of the upright.
verses.text_he: מָגִנִּ֥י עַל־אֱלֹהִ֑ים מ֝וֹשִׁ֗יעַ יִשְׁרֵי־לֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: God vindicates the righteous; God pronounces doom each day.
verses.text_he: אֱ֭לֹהִים שׁוֹפֵ֣ט צַדִּ֑יק וְ֝אֵ֗ל זֹעֵ֥ם בְּכׇל־יֽוֹם׃

verses.text_en: If one does not turn back, but whets his sword, bends his bow and aims it,
verses.text_he: אִם־לֹ֣א יָ֭שׁוּב חַרְבּ֣וֹ יִלְט֑וֹשׁ קַשְׁתּ֥וֹ דָ֝רַ֗ךְ וַֽיְכוֹנְנֶֽהָ׃

verses.text_en: then against himself he readies deadly weapons, and makes his arrows sharp.
verses.text_he: וְ֭לוֹ הֵכִ֣ין כְּלֵי־מָ֑וֶת חִ֝צָּ֗יו לְֽדֹלְקִ֥ים יִפְעָֽל׃

verses.text_en: See, he hatches evil, conceives mischief, and gives birth to fraud.
verses.text_he: הִנֵּ֥ה יְחַבֶּל־אָ֑וֶן וְהָרָ֥ה עָ֝מָ֗ל וְיָ֣לַד שָֽׁקֶר׃

verses.text_en: He has dug a pit and deepened it, and will fall into the trap he made.
verses.text_he: בּ֣וֹר כָּ֭רָה וַֽיַּחְפְּרֵ֑הוּ וַ֝יִּפֹּ֗ל בְּשַׁ֣חַת יִפְעָֽל׃

verses.text_en: His mischief will recoil upon his own head; his lawlessness will come down upon his skull.
verses.text_he: יָשׁ֣וּב עֲמָל֣וֹ בְרֹאשׁ֑וֹ וְעַ֥ל קׇ֝דְקֳד֗וֹ חֲמָס֥וֹ יֵרֵֽד׃

verses.text_en: I will praise the LORD for His righteousness, and sing a hymn to the name of the LORD Most High.
verses.text_he: אוֹדֶ֣ה יְהֹוָ֣ה כְּצִדְק֑וֹ וַ֝אֲזַמְּרָ֗ה שֵֽׁם־יְהֹוָ֥ה עֶלְיֽוֹן׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; on the . A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ עַֽל־הַגִּתִּ֗ית מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, our Lord, How majestic is Your name throughout the earth, You who have covered the heavens with Your splendor!
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֤ה אֲדֹנֵ֗ינוּ מָה־אַדִּ֣יר שִׁ֭מְךָ בְּכׇל־הָאָ֑רֶץ אֲשֶׁ֥ר תְּנָ֥ה ה֝וֹדְךָ֗ עַל־הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: From the mouths of infants and sucklings You have founded strength on account of Your foes, to put an end to enemy and avenger.
verses.text_he: מִפִּ֤י עוֹלְלִ֨ים׀ וְֽיֹנְקִים֮ יִסַּ֢דְתָּ֫ עֹ֥ז לְמַ֥עַן צוֹרְרֶ֑יךָ לְהַשְׁבִּ֥ית א֝וֹיֵ֗ב וּמִתְנַקֵּֽם׃

verses.text_en: When I behold Your heavens, the work of Your fingers, the moon and stars that You set in place,
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־אֶרְאֶ֣ה שָׁ֭מֶיךָ מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה אֶצְבְּעֹתֶ֑יךָ יָרֵ֥חַ וְ֝כוֹכָבִ֗ים אֲשֶׁ֣ר כּוֹנָֽנְתָּה׃

verses.text_en: what is man that You have been mindful of him, mortal man that You have taken note of him,
verses.text_he: מָה־אֱנ֥וֹשׁ כִּֽי־תִזְכְּרֶ֑נּוּ וּבֶן־אָ֝דָ֗ם כִּ֣י תִפְקְדֶֽנּוּ׃

verses.text_en: that You have made him little less than divine, and adorned him with glory and majesty;
verses.text_he: וַתְּחַסְּרֵ֣הוּ מְּ֭עַט מֵאֱלֹהִ֑ים וְכָב֖וֹד וְהָדָ֣ר תְּעַטְּרֵֽהוּ׃

verses.text_en: You have made him master over Your handiwork, laying the world at his feet,
verses.text_he: תַּ֭מְשִׁילֵהוּ בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣י יָדֶ֑יךָ כֹּ֝֗ל שַׁ֣תָּה תַֽחַת־רַגְלָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: sheep and oxen, all of them, and wild beasts, too;
verses.text_he: צֹנֶ֣ה וַאֲלָפִ֣ים כֻּלָּ֑ם וְ֝גַ֗ם בַּהֲמ֥וֹת שָׂדָֽי׃

verses.text_en: the birds of the heavens, the fish of the sea, whatever travels the paths of the seas.
verses.text_he: צִפּ֣וֹר שָׁ֭מַיִם וּדְגֵ֣י הַיָּ֑ם עֹ֝בֵ֗ר אׇרְח֥וֹת יַמִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, our Lord, how majestic is Your name throughout the earth!
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֥ה אֲדֹנֵ֑ינוּ מָה־אַדִּ֥יר שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ בְּכׇל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; . A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ עַל־מ֥וּת לַבֵּ֗ן מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: I will praise You, LORD, with all my heart; I will tell all Your wonders.
verses.text_he: אוֹדֶ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה בְּכׇל־לִבִּ֑י אֲ֝סַפְּרָ֗ה כׇּל־נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: I will rejoice and exult in You, singing a hymn to Your name, O Most High.
verses.text_he: אֶשְׂמְחָ֣ה וְאֶעֶלְצָ֣ה בָ֑ךְ אֲזַמְּרָ֖ה שִׁמְךָ֣ עֶלְיֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: When my enemies retreat, they stumble to their doom at Your presence.
verses.text_he: בְּשׁוּב־אוֹיְבַ֥י אָח֑וֹר יִכָּשְׁל֥וּ וְ֝יֹאבְד֗וּ מִפָּנֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: For You uphold my right and claim, enthroned as righteous judge.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־עָ֭שִׂיתָ מִשְׁפָּטִ֣י וְדִינִ֑י יָשַׁ֥בְתָּ לְ֝כִסֵּ֗א שׁוֹפֵ֥ט צֶֽדֶק׃

verses.text_en: You blast the nations; You destroy the wicked; You blot out their name forever.
verses.text_he: גָּעַ֣רְתָּ ג֭וֹיִם אִבַּ֣דְתָּ רָשָׁ֑ע שְׁמָ֥ם מָ֝חִ֗יתָ לְעוֹלָ֥ם וָעֶֽד׃

verses.text_en: The enemy is no more— ruins everlasting; You have torn down their cities; their very names are lost.
verses.text_he: הָֽאוֹיֵ֨ב׀ תַּ֥מּוּ חֳרָב֗וֹת לָ֫נֶ֥צַח וְעָרִ֥ים נָתַ֑שְׁתָּ אָבַ֖ד זִכְרָ֣ם הֵֽמָּה׃

verses.text_en: But the LORD abides forever; He has set up His throne for judgment;
verses.text_he: וַֽ֭יהֹוָה לְעוֹלָ֣ם יֵשֵׁ֑ב כּוֹנֵ֖ן לַמִּשְׁפָּ֣ט כִּסְאֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: it is He who judges the world with righteousness, rules the peoples with equity.
verses.text_he: וְה֗וּא יִשְׁפֹּֽט־תֵּבֵ֥ל בְּצֶ֑דֶק יָדִ֥ין לְ֝אֻמִּ֗ים בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is a haven for the oppressed, a haven in times of trouble.
verses.text_he: וִ֘יהִ֤י יְהֹוָ֣ה מִשְׂגָּ֣ב לַדָּ֑ךְ מִ֝שְׂגָּ֗ב לְעִתּ֥וֹת בַּצָּרָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Those who know Your name trust You, for You do not abandon those who turn to You, O LORD.
verses.text_he: וְיִבְטְח֣וּ בְ֭ךָ יוֹדְעֵ֣י שְׁמֶ֑ךָ כִּ֤י לֹֽא־עָזַ֖בְתָּ דֹרְשֶׁ֣יךָ יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Sing a hymn to the LORD, who reigns in Zion; declare His deeds among the peoples.
verses.text_he: זַמְּר֗וּ לַ֭יהֹוָה יֹשֵׁ֣ב צִיּ֑וֹן הַגִּ֥ידוּ בָ֝עַמִּ֗ים עֲלִֽילוֹתָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: For He does not ignore the cry of the afflicted; He who requites bloodshed is mindful of them.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־דֹרֵ֣שׁ דָּ֭מִים אוֹתָ֣ם זָכָ֑ר לֹֽא־שָׁ֝כַ֗ח צַעֲקַ֥ת (עניים) [עֲנָוִֽים]׃

verses.text_en: Have mercy on me, O LORD; see my affliction at the hands of my foes, You who lift me from the gates of death,
verses.text_he: חָֽנְנֵ֬נִי יְהֹוָ֗ה רְאֵ֣ה עׇ֭נְיִי מִשֹּׂנְאָ֑י מְ֝רוֹמְמִ֗י מִשַּׁ֥עֲרֵי מָֽוֶת׃

verses.text_en: so that in the gates of Fair Zion I might tell all Your praise, I might exult in Your deliverance.
verses.text_he: לְמַ֥עַן אֲסַפְּרָ֗ה כׇּֽל־תְּהִלָּ֫תֶ֥יךָ בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֥י בַת־צִיּ֑וֹן אָ֝גִ֗ילָה בִּישׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: The nations sink in the pit they have made; their own foot is caught in the net they have hidden.
verses.text_he: טָבְע֣וּ ג֭וֹיִם בְּשַׁ֣חַת עָשׂ֑וּ בְּרֶֽשֶׁת־ז֥וּ טָ֝מָ֗נוּ נִלְכְּדָ֥ה רַגְלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: The LORD has made Himself known: He works judgment; the wicked man is snared by his own devices. . .
verses.text_he: נ֤וֹדַ֨ע׀ יְהֹוָה֮ מִשְׁפָּ֢ט עָ֫שָׂ֥ה בְּפֹ֣עַל כַּ֭פָּיו נוֹקֵ֣שׁ רָשָׁ֑ע הִגָּי֥וֹן סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Let the wicked be in Sheol, all the nations who ignore God!
verses.text_he: יָשׁ֣וּבוּ רְשָׁעִ֣ים לִשְׁא֑וֹלָה כׇּל־גּ֝וֹיִ֗ם שְׁכֵחֵ֥י אֱלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Not always shall the needy be ignored, nor the hope of the afflicted forever lost.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י לֹ֣א לָ֭נֶצַח יִשָּׁכַ֣ח אֶבְי֑וֹן תִּקְוַ֥ת (ענוים) [עֲ֝נִיִּ֗ים] תֹּאבַ֥ד לָעַֽד׃

verses.text_en: Rise, O LORD! Let not men have power; let the nations be judged in Your presence.
verses.text_he: קוּמָ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה אַל־יָעֹ֣ז אֱנ֑וֹשׁ יִשָּׁפְט֥וּ ג֝וֹיִ֗ם עַל־פָּנֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Strike fear into them, O LORD; let the nations know they are only men. .
verses.text_he: שִׁ֘יתָ֤ה יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ מוֹרָ֗ה לָ֫הֶ֥ם יֵדְע֥וּ גוֹיִ֑ם אֱנ֖וֹשׁ הֵ֣מָּה סֶּֽלָה׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Why, O LORD, do You stand aloof, heedless in times of trouble?
verses.text_he: לָמָ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה תַּעֲמֹ֣ד בְּרָח֑וֹק תַּ֝עְלִ֗ים לְעִתּ֥וֹת בַּצָּרָֽה׃

verses.text_en: The wicked in his arrogance hounds the lowly— may they be caught in the schemes they devise!
verses.text_he: בְּגַאֲוַ֣ת רָ֭שָׁע יִדְלַ֣ק עָנִ֑י יִתָּפְשׂ֓וּ׀ בִּמְזִמּ֖וֹת ז֣וּ חָשָֽׁבוּ׃

verses.text_en: The wicked crows about his unbridled lusts; the grasping man reviles and scorns the LORD.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־הִלֵּ֣ל רָ֭שָׁע עַל־תַּאֲוַ֣ת נַפְשׁ֑וֹ וּבֹצֵ֥עַ בֵּ֝רֵ֗ךְ נִ֘אֵ֥ץ׀יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: The wicked, arrogant as he is, in all his scheming [thinks], “He does not call to account; God does not care.”
verses.text_he: רָשָׁ֗ע כְּגֹ֣בַהּ אַ֭פּוֹ בַּל־יִדְרֹ֑שׁ אֵ֥ין אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים כׇּל־מְזִמּוֹתָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: His ways prosper at all times; Your judgments are far beyond him; he snorts at all his foes.
verses.text_he: יָ֘חִ֤ילוּ דְרָכָ֨ו׀ בְּכׇל־עֵ֗ת מָר֣וֹם מִ֭שְׁפָּטֶיךָ מִנֶּגְדּ֑וֹ כׇּל־צ֝וֹרְרָ֗יו יָפִ֥יחַ בָּהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: He thinks, “I shall not be shaken, through all time never be in trouble.”
verses.text_he: אָמַ֣ר בְּ֭לִבּוֹ בַּל־אֶמּ֑וֹט לְדֹ֥ר וָ֝דֹ֗ר אֲשֶׁ֣ר לֹֽא־בְרָֽע׃

verses.text_en: His mouth is full of oaths, deceit, and fraud; mischief and evil are under his tongue.
verses.text_he: אָלָ֤ה׀ פִּ֣יהוּ מָ֭לֵא וּמִרְמ֣וֹת וָתֹ֑ךְ תַּ֥חַת לְ֝שׁוֹנ֗וֹ עָמָ֥ל וָאָֽוֶן׃

verses.text_en: He lurks in outlying places; from a covert he slays the innocent; his eyes spy out the hapless.
verses.text_he: יֵשֵׁ֤ב׀ בְּמַאְרַ֬ב חֲצֵרִ֗ים בַּֽ֭מִּסְתָּרִים יַהֲרֹ֣ג נָקִ֑י עֵ֝ינָ֗יו לְֽחֵלְכָ֥ה יִצְפֹּֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: He waits in a covert like a lion in his lair; waits to seize the lowly; he seizes the lowly as he pulls his net shut;
verses.text_he: יֶאֱרֹ֬ב בַּמִּסְתָּ֨ר׀ כְּאַרְיֵ֬ה בְסֻכֹּ֗ה יֶ֭אֱרֹב לַחֲט֣וֹף עָנִ֑י יַחְטֹ֥ף עָ֝נִ֗י בְּמׇשְׁכ֥וֹ בְרִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: he stoops, he crouches, and the hapless fall prey to his might.
verses.text_he: (ודכה) [יִדְכֶּ֥ה] יָשֹׁ֑חַ וְנָפַ֥ל בַּ֝עֲצוּמָ֗יו (חלכאים) [חֵ֣ל כָּאִֽים]׃

verses.text_en: He thinks, “God is not mindful, He hides His face, He never looks.”
verses.text_he: אָמַ֣ר בְּ֭לִבּוֹ שָׁ֣כַֽח אֵ֑ל הִסְתִּ֥יר פָּ֝נָ֗יו בַּל־רָאָ֥ה לָנֶֽצַח׃

verses.text_en: Rise, O LORD! Strike at him, O God! Do not forget the lowly.
verses.text_he: קוּמָ֤ה יְהֹוָ֗ה אֵ֭ל נְשָׂ֣א יָדֶ֑ךָ אַל־תִּשְׁכַּ֥ח (עניים) [עֲנָוִֽים]׃

verses.text_en: Why should the wicked man scorn God, thinking You do not call to account?
verses.text_he: עַל־מֶ֤ה׀ נִאֵ֖ץ רָשָׁ֥ע׀אֱלֹהִ֑ים אָמַ֥ר בְּ֝לִבּ֗וֹ לֹ֣א תִדְרֹֽשׁ׃

verses.text_en: You do look! You take note of mischief and vexation! To requite is in Your power. To You the hapless can entrust himself; You have ever been the orphan’s help.
verses.text_he: רָאִ֡תָה כִּי־אַתָּ֤ה׀ עָ֘מָ֤ל וָכַ֨עַס׀ תַּבִּיט֮ לָתֵ֢ת בְּיָ֫דֶ֥ךָ עָ֭לֶיךָ יַעֲזֹ֣ב חֵלֵ֑כָה יָ֝ת֗וֹם אַתָּ֤ה׀ הָיִ֬יתָ עוֹזֵֽר׃

verses.text_en: O break the power of the wicked and evil man, so that when You look for his wickedness You will find it no more.
verses.text_he: שְׁ֭בֹר זְר֣וֹעַ רָשָׁ֑ע וָ֝רָ֗ע תִּֽדְרוֹשׁ־רִשְׁע֥וֹ בַל־תִּמְצָֽא׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is king for ever and ever; the nations will perish from His land.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֣ה מֶ֭לֶךְ עוֹלָ֣ם וָעֶ֑ד אָבְד֥וּ ג֝וֹיִ֗ם מֵאַרְצֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: You will listen to the entreaty of the lowly, O LORD, You will make their hearts firm; You will incline Your ear
verses.text_he: תַּאֲוַ֬ת עֲנָוִ֣ים שָׁמַ֣עְתָּ יְהֹוָ֑ה תָּכִ֥ין לִ֝בָּ֗ם תַּקְשִׁ֥יב אׇזְנֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: to champion the orphan and the downtrodden, that men who are of the earth tyrannize no more.
verses.text_he: לִשְׁפֹּ֥ט יָת֗וֹם וָ֫דָ֥ךְ בַּל־יוֹסִ֥יף ע֑וֹד לַעֲרֹ֥ץ אֱ֝נ֗וֹשׁ מִן־הָאָֽרֶץ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. Of David. In the LORD I take refuge; how can you say to me, “Take to the hills like a bird!
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ לְדָ֫וִ֥ד בַּֽיהֹוָ֨ה׀ חָסִ֗יתִי אֵ֭יךְ תֹּאמְר֣וּ לְנַפְשִׁ֑י (נודו) [נ֝֗וּדִי] הַרְכֶ֥ם צִפּֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: For see, the wicked bend the bow, they set their arrow on the string to shoot from the shadows at the upright.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י הִנֵּ֪ה הָרְשָׁעִ֡ים יִדְרְכ֬וּן קֶ֗שֶׁת כּוֹנְנ֣וּ חִצָּ֣ם עַל־יֶ֑תֶר לִיר֥וֹת בְּמוֹ־אֹ֝֗פֶל לְיִשְׁרֵי־לֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: When the foundations are destroyed, what can the righteous man do?”
verses.text_he: כִּ֣י הַ֭שָּׁתוֹת יֵהָרֵס֑וּן צַ֝דִּ֗יק מַה־פָּעָֽל׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is in His holy palace; the LORD—His throne is in heaven; His eyes behold, His gaze searches mankind.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֤ה׀ בְּֽהֵ֘יכַ֤ל קׇדְשׁ֗וֹ יְהֹוָה֮ בַּשָּׁמַ֢יִם כִּ֫סְא֥וֹ עֵינָ֥יו יֶחֱז֑וּ עַפְעַפָּ֥יו יִ֝בְחֲנ֗וּ בְּנֵ֣י אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: The LORD seeks out the righteous man, but loathes the wicked one who loves injustice.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָה֮ צַדִּ֢יק יִ֫בְחָ֥ן וְ֭רָשָׁע וְאֹהֵ֣ב חָמָ֑ס שָֽׂנְאָ֥ה נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃

verses.text_en: He will rain down upon the wicked blazing coals and sulfur; a scorching wind shall be their lot.
verses.text_he: יַמְטֵ֥ר עַל־רְשָׁעִ֗ים פַּ֫חִ֥ים אֵ֣שׁ וְ֭גׇפְרִית וְר֥וּחַ זִלְעָפ֗וֹת מְנָ֣ת כּוֹסָֽם׃

verses.text_en: For the LORD is righteous; He loves righteous deeds; the upright shall behold His face.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־צַדִּ֣יק יְ֭הֹוָה צְדָק֣וֹת אָהֵ֑ב יָ֝שָׁ֗ר יֶחֱז֥וּ פָנֵֽימוֹ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; on the . A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ עַֽל־הַשְּׁמִינִ֗ית מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: Help, O LORD! For the faithful are no more; the loyal have vanished from among men.
verses.text_he: הוֹשִׁ֣יעָה יְ֭הֹוָה כִּֽי־גָמַ֣ר חָסִ֑יד כִּי־פַ֥סּוּ אֱ֝מוּנִ֗ים מִבְּנֵ֥י אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Men speak lies to one another; their speech is smooth; they talk with duplicity.
verses.text_he: שָׁ֤וְא׀ יְֽדַבְּרוּ֮ אִ֤ישׁ אֶת־רֵ֫עֵ֥הוּ שְׂפַ֥ת חֲלָק֑וֹת בְּלֵ֖ב וָלֵ֣ב יְדַבֵּֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: May the LORD cut off all flattering lips, every tongue that speaks arrogance.
verses.text_he: יַכְרֵ֣ת יְ֭הֹוָה כׇּל־שִׂפְתֵ֣י חֲלָק֑וֹת לָ֝שׁ֗וֹן מְדַבֶּ֥רֶת גְּדֹלֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: They say, “By our tongues we shall prevail; with lips such as ours, who can be our master?”
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֤ר אָמְר֨וּ׀ לִלְשֹׁנֵ֣נוּ נַ֭גְבִּיר שְׂפָתֵ֣ינוּ אִתָּ֑נוּ מִ֖י אָד֣וֹן לָֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: “Because of the groans of the plundered poor and needy, I will now act,” says the LORD. “I will give help,” He affirms to him.
verses.text_he: מִשֹּׁ֥ד עֲנִיִּים֮ מֵאֶנְקַ֢ת אֶבְי֫וֹנִ֥ים עַתָּ֣ה אָ֭קוּם יֹאמַ֣ר יְהֹוָ֑ה אָשִׁ֥ית בְּ֝יֵ֗שַׁע יָפִ֥יחַֽ־לֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: The words of the LORD are pure words, silver purged in an earthen crucible, refined sevenfold.
verses.text_he: אִ֥מְר֣וֹת יְהֹוָה֮ אֲמָר֢וֹת טְהֹ֫ר֥וֹת כֶּ֣סֶף צָ֭רוּף בַּעֲלִ֣יל לָאָ֑רֶץ מְ֝זֻקָּ֗ק שִׁבְעָתָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: You, O LORD, will keep them, guarding each from this age evermore.
verses.text_he: אַתָּֽה־יְהֹוָ֥ה תִּשְׁמְרֵ֑ם תִּצְּרֶ֓נּוּ׀ מִן־הַדּ֖וֹר ז֣וּ לְעוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: On every side the wicked roam when baseness is exalted among men.
verses.text_he: סָבִ֗יב רְשָׁעִ֥ים יִתְהַלָּכ֑וּן כְּרֻ֥ם זֻ֝לּ֗וּת לִבְנֵ֥י אָדָֽם׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: How long, O LORD; will You ignore me forever? How long will You hide Your face from me?
verses.text_he: עַד־אָ֣נָה יְ֭הֹוָה תִּשְׁכָּחֵ֣נִי נֶ֑צַח עַד־אָ֓נָה׀ תַּסְתִּ֖יר אֶת־פָּנֶ֣יךָ מִמֶּֽנִּי׃

verses.text_en: How long will I have cares on my mind, grief in my heart all day? How long will my enemy have the upper hand?
verses.text_he: עַד־אָ֨נָה אָשִׁ֪ית עֵצ֡וֹת בְּנַפְשִׁ֗י יָג֣וֹן בִּלְבָבִ֣י יוֹמָ֑ם עַד־אָ֓נָה׀ יָר֖וּם אֹיְבִ֣י עָלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Look at me, answer me, O LORD, my God! Restore the luster to my eyes, lest I sleep the sleep of death;
verses.text_he: הַבִּ֣יטָֽה עֲ֭נֵנִי יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהָ֑י הָאִ֥ירָה עֵ֝ינַ֗י פֶּן־אִישַׁ֥ן הַמָּֽוֶת׃

verses.text_en: lest my enemy say, “I have overcome him,” my foes exult when I totter.
verses.text_he: פֶּן־יֹאמַ֣ר אֹיְבִ֣י יְכׇלְתִּ֑יו צָרַ֥י יָ֝גִ֗ילוּ כִּ֣י אֶמּֽוֹט׃

verses.text_en: But I trust in Your faithfulness, my heart will exult in Your deliverance. I will sing to the LORD, for He has been good to me.
verses.text_he: וַאֲנִ֤י׀ בְּחַסְדְּךָ֣ בָטַחְתִּי֮ יָ֤גֵ֥ל לִבִּ֗י בִּישׁוּעָ֫תֶ֥ךָ אָשִׁ֥ירָה לַֽיהֹוָ֑ה כִּ֖י גָמַ֣ל עָלָֽי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. Of David. The benighted man thinks, “God does not care.” Man’s deeds are corrupt and loathsome; no one does good.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ לְדָ֫וִ֥ד אָ֘מַ֤ר נָבָ֣ל בְּ֭לִבּוֹ אֵ֣ין אֱלֹהִ֑ים הִֽשְׁחִ֗יתוּ הִֽתְעִ֥יבוּ עֲלִילָ֗ה אֵ֣ין עֹֽשֵׂה־טֽוֹב׃

verses.text_en: The LORD looks down from heaven on mankind to find a man of understanding, a man mindful of God.
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה מִשָּׁמַיִם֮ הִשְׁקִ֢יף עַֽל־בְּנֵי־אָ֫דָ֥ם לִ֭רְאוֹת הֲיֵ֣שׁ מַשְׂכִּ֑יל דֹּ֝רֵ֗שׁ אֶת־אֱלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: All have turned bad, altogether foul; there is none who does good, not even one.
verses.text_he: הַכֹּ֥ל סָר֮ יַחְדָּ֢ו נֶ֫אֱלָ֥חוּ אֵ֤ין עֹֽשֵׂה־ט֑וֹב אֵ֝֗ין גַּם־אֶחָֽד׃

verses.text_en: Are they so witless, all those evildoers, who devour my people as they devour food, and do not invoke the LORD?
verses.text_he: הֲלֹ֥א יָדְעוּ֮ כׇּל־פֹּ֢עֲלֵ֫י אָ֥וֶן אֹכְלֵ֣י עַ֭מִּי אָ֣כְלוּ לֶ֑חֶם יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה לֹ֣א קָרָֽאוּ׃

verses.text_en: There they will be seized with fright, for God is present in the circle of the righteous.
verses.text_he: שָׁ֤ם׀ פָּ֣חֲדוּ פָ֑חַד כִּֽי־אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים בְּד֣וֹר צַדִּֽיק׃

verses.text_en: You may set at naught the counsel of the lowly, but the LORD is his refuge.
verses.text_he: עֲצַת־עָנִ֥י תָבִ֑ישׁוּ כִּ֖י יְהֹוָ֣ה מַחְסֵֽהוּ׃

verses.text_en: O that the deliverance of Israel might come from Zion! When the LORD restores the fortunes of His people, Jacob will exult, Israel will rejoice.
verses.text_he: מִ֥י־יִתֵּ֣ן מִצִּיּוֹן֮ יְשׁוּעַ֢ת יִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל בְּשׁ֣וּב יְ֭הֹוָה שְׁב֣וּת עַמּ֑וֹ יָגֵ֥ל יַ֝עֲקֹ֗ב יִשְׂמַ֥ח יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A psalm of David. LORD, who may sojourn in Your tent, who may dwell on Your holy mountain?
verses.text_he: מִזְמ֗וֹר לְדָ֫וִ֥ד יְ֭הֹוָה מִי־יָג֣וּר בְּאׇהֳלֶ֑ךָ מִֽי־יִ֝שְׁכֹּ֗ן בְּהַ֣ר קׇדְשֶֽׁךָ׃

verses.text_en: He who lives without blame, who does what is right, and in his heart acknowledges the truth;
verses.text_he: הוֹלֵ֣ךְ תָּ֭מִים וּפֹעֵ֥ל צֶ֑דֶק וְדֹבֵ֥ר אֱ֝מֶ֗ת בִּלְבָבֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: whose tongue is not given to evil; who has never done harm to his fellow, or borne reproach for [his acts toward] his neighbor;
verses.text_he: לֹֽא־רָגַ֨ל׀ עַל־לְשֹׁנ֗וֹ לֹא־עָשָׂ֣ה לְרֵעֵ֣הוּ רָעָ֑ה וְ֝חֶרְפָּ֗ה לֹא־נָשָׂ֥א עַל־קְרֹבֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: for whom a contemptible man is abhorrent, but who honors those who fear the LORD; who stands by his oath even to his hurt;
verses.text_he: נִבְזֶ֤ה׀ בְּֽעֵ֘ינָ֤יו נִמְאָ֗ס וְאֶת־יִרְאֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֣ה יְכַבֵּ֑ד נִשְׁבַּ֥ע לְ֝הָרַ֗ע וְלֹ֣א יָמִֽר׃

verses.text_en: who has never lent money at interest, or accepted a bribe against the innocent. The man who acts thus shall never be shaken.
verses.text_he: כַּסְפּ֤וֹ׀ לֹא־נָתַ֣ן בְּנֶשֶׁךְ֮ וְשֹׁ֥חַד עַל־נָקִ֗י לֹ֥א־לָ֫קָ֥ח עֹֽשֵׂה־אֵ֑לֶּה לֹ֖א יִמּ֣וֹט לְעוֹלָֽם׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A of David. Protect me, O God, for I seek refuge in You.
verses.text_he: מִכְתָּ֥ם לְדָוִ֑ד שׇֽׁמְרֵ֥נִי אֵ֝֗ל כִּֽי־חָסִ֥יתִי בָֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: I say to the LORD, “You are my Lord, my benefactor; there is none above You.”
verses.text_he: אָמַ֣רְתְּ לַֽ֭יהֹוָה אֲדֹנָ֣י אָ֑תָּה ט֝וֹבָתִ֗י בַּל־עָלֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: As to the holy and mighty ones that are in the land, my whole desire concerning them is that
verses.text_he: לִ֭קְדוֹשִׁים אֲשֶׁר־בָּאָ֣רֶץ הֵ֑מָּה וְ֝אַדִּירֵ֗י כׇּל־חֶפְצִי־בָֽם׃

verses.text_en: those who espouse another [god] may have many sorrows! I will have no part of their bloody libations; their names will not pass my lips.
verses.text_he: יִרְבּ֥וּ עַצְּבוֹתָם֮ אַחֵ֢ר מָ֫הָ֥רוּ בַּל־אַסִּ֣יךְ נִסְכֵּיהֶ֣ם מִדָּ֑ם וּֽבַל־אֶשָּׂ֥א אֶת־שְׁ֝מוֹתָ֗ם עַל־שְׂפָתָֽי׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is my allotted share and portion; You control my fate.
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה מְנָת־חֶלְקִ֥י וְכוֹסִ֑י אַ֝תָּ֗ה תּוֹמִ֥יךְ גּוֹרָלִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Delightful country has fallen to my lot; lovely indeed is my estate.
verses.text_he: חֲבָלִ֣ים נָֽפְלוּ־לִ֭י בַּנְּעִמִ֑ים אַף־נַ֝חֲלָ֗ת שָֽׁפְרָ֥ה עָלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: I bless the LORD who has guided me; my conscience admonishes me at night.
verses.text_he: אֲבָרֵ֗ךְ אֶת־יְ֭הֹוָה אֲשֶׁ֣ר יְעָצָ֑נִי אַף־לֵ֝יל֗וֹת יִסְּר֥וּנִי כִלְיוֹתָֽי׃

verses.text_en: I am ever mindful of the LORD’s presence; He is at my right hand; I shall never be shaken.
verses.text_he: שִׁוִּ֬יתִי יְהֹוָ֣ה לְנֶגְדִּ֣י תָמִ֑יד כִּ֥י מִֽ֝ימִינִ֗י בַּל־אֶמּֽוֹט׃

verses.text_en: So my heart rejoices, my whole being exults, and my body rests secure.
verses.text_he: לָכֵ֤ן׀ שָׂמַ֣ח לִ֭בִּי וַיָּ֣גֶל כְּבוֹדִ֑י אַף־בְּ֝שָׂרִ֗י יִשְׁכֹּ֥ן לָבֶֽטַח׃

verses.text_en: For You will not abandon me to Sheol, or let Your faithful one see the Pit.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י׀ לֹא־תַעֲזֹ֣ב נַפְשִׁ֣י לִשְׁא֑וֹל לֹֽא־תִתֵּ֥ן חֲ֝סִידְךָ֗ לִרְא֥וֹת שָֽׁחַת׃

verses.text_en: You will teach me the path of life. In Your presence is perfect joy; delights are ever in Your right hand.
verses.text_he: תּֽוֹדִיעֵנִי֮ אֹ֤רַח חַ֫יִּ֥ים שֹׂ֣בַע שְׂ֭מָחוֹת אֶת־פָּנֶ֑יךָ נְעִמ֖וֹת בִּימִינְךָ֣ נֶֽצַח׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A prayer of David. Hear, O LORD, what is just; heed my cry, give ear to my prayer, uttered without guile.
verses.text_he: תְּפִלָּ֗ה לְדָ֫וִ֥ד שִׁמְעָ֤ה יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ צֶ֗דֶק הַקְשִׁ֥יבָה רִנָּתִ֗י הַאֲזִ֥ינָה תְפִלָּתִ֑י בְּ֝לֹ֗א שִׂפְתֵ֥י מִרְמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: My vindication will come from You; Your eyes will behold what is right.
verses.text_he: מִ֭לְּפָנֶיךָ מִשְׁפָּטִ֣י יֵצֵ֑א עֵ֝ינֶ֗יךָ תֶּחֱזֶ֥ינָה מֵישָׁרִֽים׃

verses.text_en: You have visited me at night, probed my mind, You have tested me and found nothing amiss; I determined that my mouth should not transgress.
verses.text_he: בָּ֘חַ֤נְתָּ לִבִּ֨י׀ פָּ֘קַ֤דְתָּ לַּ֗יְלָה צְרַפְתַּ֥נִי בַל־תִּמְצָ֑א זַ֝מֹּתִ֗י בַּל־יַעֲבׇר־פִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: As for man’s dealings, in accord with the command of Your lips, I have kept in view the fate of the lawless.
verses.text_he: לִפְעֻלּ֣וֹת אָ֭דָם בִּדְבַ֣ר שְׂפָתֶ֑יךָ אֲנִ֥י שָׁ֝מַ֗רְתִּי אׇרְח֥וֹת פָּרִֽיץ׃

verses.text_en: My feet have held to Your paths; my legs have not given way.
verses.text_he: תָּמֹ֣ךְ אֲ֭שֻׁרַי בְּמַעְגְּלוֹתֶ֑יךָ בַּל־נָמ֥וֹטּוּ פְעָמָֽי׃

verses.text_en: I call on You; You will answer me, God; turn Your ear to me, hear what I say.
verses.text_he: אֲנִֽי־קְרָאתִ֣יךָ כִֽי־תַעֲנֵ֣נִי אֵ֑ל הַֽט־אׇזְנְךָ֥ לִ֝֗י שְׁמַ֣ע אִמְרָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Display Your faithfulness in wondrous deeds, You who deliver with Your right hand those who seek refuge from assailants.
verses.text_he: הַפְלֵ֣ה חֲ֭סָדֶיךָ מוֹשִׁ֣יעַ חוֹסִ֑ים מִ֝מִּתְקוֹמְמִ֗ים בִּֽימִינֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Guard me like the apple of Your eye; hide me in the shadow of Your wings
verses.text_he: שׇׁ֭מְרֵנִי כְּאִישׁ֣וֹן בַּת־עָ֑יִן בְּצֵ֥ל כְּ֝נָפֶ֗יךָ תַּסְתִּירֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: from the wicked who despoil me, my mortal enemies who encircle me.
verses.text_he: מִפְּנֵ֣י רְ֭שָׁעִים ז֣וּ שַׁדּ֑וּנִי אֹיְבַ֥י בְּ֝נֶ֗פֶשׁ יַקִּ֥יפוּ עָלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Their hearts are closed to pity; they mouth arrogance;
verses.text_he: חֶלְבָּ֥מוֹ סָּגְר֑וּ פִּ֝֗ימוֹ דִּבְּר֥וּ בְגֵאֽוּת׃

verses.text_en: now they hem in our feet on every side; they set their eyes roaming over the land.
verses.text_he: אַ֭שֻּׁרֵינוּ עַתָּ֣ה (סבבוני) [סְבָב֑וּנוּ] עֵינֵיהֶ֥ם יָ֝שִׁ֗יתוּ לִנְט֥וֹת בָּאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: He is like a lion eager for prey, a king of beasts lying in wait.
verses.text_he: דִּמְיֹנ֗וֹ כְּ֭אַרְיֵה יִכְס֣וֹף לִטְרֹ֑ף וְ֝כִכְפִ֗יר יֹשֵׁ֥ב בְּמִסְתָּרִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Rise, O LORD! Go forth to meet him. Bring him down; rescue me from the wicked with Your sword,
verses.text_he: קוּמָ֤ה יְהֹוָ֗ה קַדְּמָ֣ה פָ֭נָיו הַכְרִיעֵ֑הוּ פַּלְּטָ֥ה נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י מֵרָשָׁ֥ע חַרְבֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: from men, O LORD, with Your hand, from men whose share in life is fleeting. But as to Your treasured ones, fill their bellies. Their sons too shall be satisfied, and have something to leave over for their young.
verses.text_he: מִ֥מְתִֽים־יָדְךָ֨׀ יְהֹוָ֡ה מִֽמְתִ֬ים מֵחֶ֗לֶד חֶלְקָ֥ם בַּֽחַיִּים֮ (וצפינך) [וּֽצְפוּנְךָ֮] תְּמַלֵּ֢א בִ֫טְנָ֥ם יִשְׂבְּע֥וּ בָנִ֑ים וְהִנִּ֥יחוּ יִ֝תְרָ֗ם לְעוֹלְלֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: Then I, justified, will behold Your face; awake, I am filled with the vision of You.
verses.text_he: אֲנִ֗י בְּ֭צֶדֶק אֶחֱזֶ֣ה פָנֶ֑יךָ אֶשְׂבְּעָ֥ה בְ֝הָקִ֗יץ תְּמוּנָתֶֽךָ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. Of David, the servant of the LORD, who addressed the words of this song to the LORD after the LORD had saved him from the hands of all his enemies and from the clutches of Saul.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֤חַ׀ לְעֶ֥בֶד יְהֹוָ֗ה לְדָ֫וִ֥ד אֲשֶׁ֤ר דִּבֶּ֨ר׀ לַיהֹוָ֗ה אֶת־דִּ֭בְרֵי הַשִּׁירָ֣ה הַזֹּ֑את בְּי֤וֹם הִֽצִּיל־יְהֹוָ֘ה־אוֹת֥וֹ מִכַּ֥ף כׇּל־אֹ֝יְבָ֗יו וּמִיַּ֥ד שָׁאֽוּל׃

verses.text_en: He said: I adore you, O LORD, my strength,
verses.text_he: וַיֹּאמַ֡ר אֶרְחׇמְךָ֖ יְהֹוָ֣ה חִזְקִֽי׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, my crag, my fortress, my rescuer, my God, my rock in whom I seek refuge, my shield, my mighty champion, my haven.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֤ה׀ סַ֥לְעִ֥י וּמְצוּדָתִ֗י וּמְפַ֫לְטִ֥י אֵלִ֣י צ֭וּרִי אֶֽחֱסֶה־בּ֑וֹ מָֽגִנִּ֥י וְקֶֽרֶן־יִ֝שְׁעִ֗י מִשְׂגַּבִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: All praise! I called on the LORD and was delivered from my enemies.
verses.text_he: מְ֭הֻלָּל אֶקְרָ֣א יְהֹוָ֑ה וּמִן־אֹ֝יְבַ֗י אִוָּשֵֽׁעַ׃

verses.text_en: Ropes of Death encompassed me; torrents of Belial terrified me;
verses.text_he: אֲפָפ֥וּנִי חֶבְלֵי־מָ֑וֶת וְֽנַחֲלֵ֖י בְלִיַּ֣עַל יְבַֽעֲתֽוּנִי׃

verses.text_en: ropes of Sheol encircled me; snares of Death confronted me.
verses.text_he: חֶבְלֵ֣י שְׁא֣וֹל סְבָב֑וּנִי קִ֝דְּמ֗וּנִי מ֣וֹקְשֵׁי מָֽוֶת׃

verses.text_en: In my distress I called on the LORD, cried out to my God; in His temple He heard my voice; my cry to Him reached His ears.
verses.text_he: בַּצַּר־לִ֤י׀ אֶ֥קְרָ֣א יְהֹוָה֮ וְאֶל־אֱלֹהַ֢י אֲשַׁ֫וֵּ֥עַ יִשְׁמַ֣ע מֵהֵיכָל֣וֹ קוֹלִ֑י וְ֝שַׁוְעָתִ֗י לְפָנָ֤יו׀ תָּב֬וֹא בְאׇזְנָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: Then the earth rocked and quaked; the foundations of the mountains shook, rocked by His indignation;
verses.text_he: וַתִּגְעַ֬שׁ וַתִּרְעַ֨שׁ׀ הָאָ֗רֶץ וּמוֹסְדֵ֣י הָרִ֣ים יִרְגָּ֑זוּ וַ֝יִּתְגָּֽעֲשׁ֗וּ כִּי־חָ֥רָה לֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: smoke went up from His nostrils, from His mouth came devouring fire; live coals blazed forth from Him.
verses.text_he: עָ֘לָ֤ה עָשָׁ֨ן׀ בְּאַפּ֗וֹ וְאֵשׁ־מִפִּ֥יו תֹּאכֵ֑ל גֶּ֝חָלִ֗ים בָּעֲר֥וּ מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃

verses.text_en: He bent the sky and came down, thick cloud beneath His feet.
verses.text_he: וַיֵּ֣ט שָׁ֭מַיִם וַיֵּרַ֑ד וַ֝עֲרָפֶ֗ל תַּ֣חַת רַגְלָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: He mounted a cherub and flew, gliding on the wings of the wind.
verses.text_he: וַיִּרְכַּ֣ב עַל־כְּ֭רוּב וַיָּעֹ֑ף וַ֝יֵּ֗דֶא עַל־כַּנְפֵי־רֽוּחַ׃

verses.text_en: He made darkness His screen; dark thunderheads, dense clouds of the sky were His pavilion round about Him.
verses.text_he: יָ֤שֶׁת־חֹ֨שֶׁךְ׀ סִתְר֗וֹ סְבִֽיבוֹתָ֥יו סֻכָּת֑וֹ חֶשְׁכַת־מַ֝֗יִם עָבֵ֥י שְׁחָקִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Out of the brilliance before Him, hail and fiery coals pierced His clouds.
verses.text_he: מִנֹּ֗גַהּ נֶ֫גְדּ֥וֹ עָבָ֥יו עָבְר֑וּ בָּ֝רָ֗ד וְגַֽחֲלֵי־אֵֽשׁ׃

verses.text_en: Then the LORD thundered from heaven, the Most High gave forth His voice— hail and fiery coals.
verses.text_he: וַיַּרְעֵ֬ם בַּשָּׁמַ֨יִם׀ יְֽהֹוָ֗ה וְ֭עֶלְיוֹן יִתֵּ֣ן קֹל֑וֹ בָּ֝רָ֗ד וְגַֽחֲלֵי־אֵֽשׁ׃

verses.text_en: He let fly His shafts and scattered them; He discharged lightning and routed them.
verses.text_he: וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח חִ֭צָּיו וַיְפִיצֵ֑ם וּבְרָקִ֥ים רָ֝֗ב וַיְהֻמֵּֽם׃

verses.text_en: The ocean bed was exposed; the foundations of the world were laid bare by Your mighty roaring, O LORD, at the blast of the breath of Your nostrils.
verses.text_he: וַיֵּ֤רָא֨וּ׀ אֲפִ֥יקֵי מַ֗יִם וַֽיִּגָּלוּ֮ מוֹסְד֢וֹת תֵּ֫בֵ֥ל מִגַּעֲרָ֣תְךָ֣ יְהֹוָ֑ה מִ֝נִּשְׁמַ֗ת ר֣וּחַ אַפֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: He reached down from on high, He took me; He drew me out of the mighty waters;
verses.text_he: יִשְׁלַ֣ח מִ֭מָּרוֹם יִקָּחֵ֑נִי יַֽ֝מְשֵׁ֗נִי מִמַּ֥יִם רַבִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: He saved me from my fierce enemy, from foes too strong for me.
verses.text_he: יַצִּילֵ֗נִי מֵאֹיְבִ֥י עָ֑ז וּ֝מִשֹּׂנְאַ֗י כִּֽי־אָמְצ֥וּ מִמֶּֽנִּי׃

verses.text_en: They confronted me on the day of my calamity, but the LORD was my support.
verses.text_he: יְקַדְּמ֥וּנִי בְיוֹם־אֵידִ֑י וַֽיְהִי־יְהֹוָ֖ה לְמִשְׁעָ֣ן לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: He brought me out to freedom; He rescued me because He was pleased with me.
verses.text_he: וַיּוֹצִיאֵ֥נִי לַמֶּרְחָ֑ב יְ֝חַלְּצֵ֗נִי כִּ֘י־חָ֥פֵֽץ־בִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: The LORD rewarded me according to my merit; He requited the cleanness of my hands;
verses.text_he: יִגְמְלֵ֣נִי יְהֹוָ֣ה כְּצִדְקִ֑י כְּבֹ֥ר יָ֝דַ֗י יָשִׁ֥יב לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: for I have kept to the ways of the LORD, and have not been guilty before my God;
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־שָׁ֭מַרְתִּי דַּרְכֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה וְלֹֽא־רָ֝שַׁ֗עְתִּי מֵאֱלֹהָֽי׃

verses.text_en: for I am mindful of all His rules; I have not disregarded His laws.
verses.text_he: כִּ֣י כׇל־מִשְׁפָּטָ֣יו לְנֶגְדִּ֑י וְ֝חֻקֹּתָ֗יו לֹא־אָסִ֥יר מֶֽנִּי׃

verses.text_en: I have been blameless toward Him, and have guarded myself against sinning;
verses.text_he: וָאֱהִ֣י תָמִ֣ים עִמּ֑וֹ וָ֝אֶשְׁתַּמֵּ֗ר מֵעֲוֺנִֽי׃

verses.text_en: and the LORD has requited me according to my merit, the cleanness of my hands in His sight.
verses.text_he: וַיָּֽשֶׁב־יְהֹוָ֣ה לִ֣י כְצִדְקִ֑י כְּבֹ֥ר יָ֝דַ֗י לְנֶ֣גֶד עֵינָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: With the loyal, You deal loyally; with the blameless man, blamelessly.
verses.text_he: עִם־חָסִ֥יד תִּתְחַסָּ֑ד עִם־גְּבַ֥ר תָּ֝מִ֗ים תִּתַּמָּֽם׃

verses.text_en: With the pure, You act purely, and with the perverse, You are wily.
verses.text_he: עִם־נָבָ֥ר תִּתְבָּרָ֑ר וְעִם־עִ֝קֵּ֗שׁ תִּתְפַּתָּֽל׃

verses.text_en: It is You who deliver lowly folk, but haughty eyes You humble.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־אַ֭תָּה עַם־עָנִ֣י תוֹשִׁ֑יעַ וְעֵינַ֖יִם רָמ֣וֹת תַּשְׁפִּֽיל׃

verses.text_en: It is You who light my lamp; the LORD, my God, lights up my darkness.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־אַ֭תָּה תָּאִ֣יר נֵרִ֑י יְהֹוָ֥ה אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י יַגִּ֥יהַּ חׇשְׁכִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: With You, I can rush a barrier; with my God I can scale a wall;
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־בְ֭ךָ אָרֻ֣ץ גְּד֑וּד וּ֝בֵֽאלֹהַ֗י אֲדַלֶּג־שֽׁוּר׃

verses.text_en: the way of God is perfect; the word of the LORD is pure; He is a shield to all who seek refuge in Him.
verses.text_he: הָאֵל֮ תָּמִ֢ים דַּ֫רְכּ֥וֹ אִמְרַֽת־יְהֹוָ֥ה צְרוּפָ֑ה מָגֵ֥ן ה֝֗וּא לְכֹ֤ל׀ הַחֹסִ֬ים בּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Truly, who is a god except the LORD, who is a rock but our God?—
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י מִ֣י אֱ֭לוֹהַּ מִבַּלְעֲדֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה וּמִ֥י צ֝֗וּר זוּלָתִ֥י אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: the God who girded me with might, who made my way perfect;
verses.text_he: הָ֭אֵל הַמְאַזְּרֵ֣נִי חָ֑יִל וַיִּתֵּ֖ן תָּמִ֣ים דַּרְכִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: who made my legs like a deer’s, and let me stand firm on the heights;
verses.text_he: מְשַׁוֶּ֣ה רַ֭גְלַי כָּאַיָּל֑וֹת וְעַ֥ל בָּ֝מֹתַ֗י יַעֲמִידֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: who trained my hands for battle; my arms can bend a bow of bronze.
verses.text_he: מְלַמֵּ֣ד יָ֭דַי לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה וְֽנִחֲתָ֥ה קֶֽשֶׁת־נְ֝חוּשָׁ֗ה זְרוֹעֹתָֽי׃

verses.text_en: You have given me the shield of Your protection; Your right hand has sustained me, Your care has made me great.
verses.text_he: וַתִּתֶּן־לִי֮ מָגֵ֢ן יִ֫שְׁעֶ֥ךָ וִֽימִינְךָ֥ תִסְעָדֵ֑נִי וְֽעַנְוַתְךָ֥ תַרְבֵּֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: You have let me stride on freely; my feet have not slipped.
verses.text_he: תַּרְחִ֣יב צַעֲדִ֣י תַחְתָּ֑י וְלֹ֥א מָ֝עֲד֗וּ קַרְסֻלָּֽי׃

verses.text_en: I pursued my enemies and overtook them; I did not turn back till I destroyed them.
verses.text_he: אֶרְדּ֣וֹף א֭וֹיְבַי וְאַשִּׂיגֵ֑ם וְלֹֽא־אָ֝שׁ֗וּב עַד־כַּלּוֹתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: I struck them down, and they could rise no more; they lay fallen at my feet.
verses.text_he: אֶ֭מְחָצֵם וְלֹא־יֻ֣כְלוּ ק֑וּם יִ֝פְּל֗וּ תַּ֣חַת רַגְלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: You have girded me with strength for battle, brought my adversaries low before me,
verses.text_he: וַתְּאַזְּרֵ֣נִי חַ֭יִל לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה תַּכְרִ֖יעַ קָמַ֣י תַּחְתָּֽי׃

verses.text_en: made my enemies turn tail before me; I wiped out my foes.
verses.text_he: וְֽאֹיְבַ֗י נָתַ֣תָּה לִּ֣י עֹ֑רֶף וּ֝מְשַׂנְאַ֗י אַצְמִיתֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: They cried out, but there was none to deliver; [cried] to the LORD, but He did not answer them.
verses.text_he: יְשַׁוְּע֥וּ וְאֵין־מוֹשִׁ֑יעַ עַל־יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה וְלֹ֣א עָנָֽם׃

verses.text_en: I ground them fine as windswept dust; I trod them flat as dirt of the streets.
verses.text_he: וְֽאֶשְׁחָקֵ֗ם כְּעָפָ֥ר עַל־פְּנֵי־ר֑וּחַ כְּטִ֖יט חוּצ֣וֹת אֲרִיקֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: You have rescued me from the strife of people; You have set me at the head of nations; peoples I knew not must serve me.
verses.text_he: תְּפַלְּטֵנִי֮ מֵרִ֢יבֵ֫י עָ֥ם תְּ֭שִׂימֵנִי לְרֹ֣אשׁ גּוֹיִ֑ם עַ֖ם לֹא־יָדַ֣עְתִּי יַֽעַבְדֽוּנִי׃

verses.text_en: At the mere report of me they are submissive; foreign peoples cower before me;
verses.text_he: לְשֵׁ֣מַֽע אֹ֭זֶן יִשָּׁ֣מְעוּ לִ֑י בְּנֵֽי־נֵ֝כָ֗ר יְכַחֲשׁוּ־לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: foreign peoples lose courage, and come trembling out of their strongholds.
verses.text_he: בְּנֵי־נֵכָ֥ר יִבֹּ֑לוּ וְ֝יַחְרְג֗וּ מִֽמִּסְגְּרֽוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: The LORD lives! Blessed is my rock! Exalted be God, my deliverer,
verses.text_he: חַי־יְ֭הֹוָה וּבָר֣וּךְ צוּרִ֑י וְ֝יָר֗וּם אֱלוֹהֵ֥י יִשְׁעִֽי׃

verses.text_en: the God who has vindicated me and made peoples subject to me,
verses.text_he: הָאֵ֗ל הַנּוֹתֵ֣ן נְקָמ֣וֹת לִ֑י וַיַּדְבֵּ֖ר עַמִּ֣ים תַּחְתָּֽי׃

verses.text_en: who rescued me from my enemies, who raised me clear of my adversaries, saved me from lawless men.
verses.text_he: מְפַלְּטִ֗י מֵאֹ֫יְבָ֥י אַ֣ף מִן־קָ֭מַי תְּרוֹמְמֵ֑נִי מֵאִ֥ישׁ חָ֝מָ֗ס תַּצִּילֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: For this I sing Your praise among the nations, LORD, and hymn Your name:
verses.text_he: עַל־כֵּ֤ן׀ אוֹדְךָ֖ בַגּוֹיִ֥ם׀יְהֹוָ֑ה וּלְשִׁמְךָ֥ אֲזַמֵּֽרָה׃

verses.text_en: He accords great victories to His king, keeps faith with His anointed, with David and his offspring forever.
verses.text_he: מַגְדִּל֮ יְשׁוּע֢וֹת מַ֫לְכּ֥וֹ וְעֹ֤שֶׂה חֶ֨סֶד׀ לִמְשִׁיח֗וֹ לְדָוִ֥ד וּלְזַרְע֗וֹ עַד־עוֹלָֽם׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: The heavens declare the glory of God, the sky proclaims His handiwork.
verses.text_he: הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם מְֽסַפְּרִ֥ים כְּבֽוֹד־אֵ֑ל וּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה יָ֝דָ֗יו מַגִּ֥יד הָרָקִֽיעַ׃

verses.text_en: Day to day makes utterance, night to night speaks out.
verses.text_he: י֣וֹם לְ֭יוֹם יַבִּ֣יעַֽ אֹ֑מֶר וְלַ֥יְלָה לְּ֝לַ֗יְלָה יְחַוֶּה־דָּֽעַת׃

verses.text_en: There is no utterance, there are no words, whose sound goes unheard.
verses.text_he: אֵֽין־אֹ֭מֶר וְאֵ֣ין דְּבָרִ֑ים בְּ֝לִ֗י נִשְׁמָ֥ע קוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Their voice carries throughout the earth, their words to the end of the world. He placed in them a tent for the sun,
verses.text_he: בְּכׇל־הָאָ֨רֶץ׀ יָ֘צָ֤א קַוָּ֗ם וּבִקְצֵ֣ה תֵ֭בֵל מִלֵּיהֶ֑ם לַ֝שֶּׁ֗מֶשׁ שָֽׂם־אֹ֥הֶל בָּהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: who is like a groom coming forth from the chamber, like a hero, eager to run his course.
verses.text_he: וְה֗וּא כְּ֭חָתָן יֹצֵ֣א מֵחֻפָּת֑וֹ יָשִׂ֥ישׂ כְּ֝גִבּ֗וֹר לָר֥וּץ אֹֽרַח׃

verses.text_en: His rising-place is at one end of heaven, and his circuit reaches the other; nothing escapes his heat.
verses.text_he: מִקְצֵ֤ה הַשָּׁמַ֨יִם׀ מֽוֹצָא֗וֹ וּתְקוּפָת֥וֹ עַל־קְצוֹתָ֑ם וְאֵ֥ין נִ֝סְתָּ֗ר מֵחַמָּתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: The teaching of the LORD is perfect, renewing life; the decrees of the LORD are enduring, making the simple wise;
verses.text_he: תּ֘וֹרַ֤ת יְהֹוָ֣ה תְּ֭מִימָה מְשִׁ֣יבַת נָ֑פֶשׁ עֵד֥וּת יְהֹוָ֥ה נֶ֝אֱמָנָ֗ה מַחְכִּ֥ימַת פֶּֽתִי׃

verses.text_en: The precepts of the LORD are just, rejoicing the heart; the instruction of the LORD is lucid, making the eyes light up.
verses.text_he: פִּקּ֘וּדֵ֤י יְהֹוָ֣ה יְ֭שָׁרִים מְשַׂמְּחֵי־לֵ֑ב מִצְוַ֥ת יְהֹוָ֥ה בָּ֝רָ֗ה מְאִירַ֥ת עֵינָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: The fear of the LORD is pure, abiding forever; the judgments of the LORD are true, righteous altogether,
verses.text_he: יִרְאַ֤ת יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ טְהוֹרָה֮ עוֹמֶ֢דֶת לָ֫עַ֥ד מִֽשְׁפְּטֵי־יְהֹוָ֥ה אֱמֶ֑ת צָֽדְק֥וּ יַחְדָּֽו׃

verses.text_en: more desirable than gold, than much fine gold; sweeter than honey, than drippings of the comb.
verses.text_he: הַֽנֶּחֱמָדִ֗ים מִ֭זָּהָב וּמִפַּ֣ז רָ֑ב וּמְתוּקִ֥ים מִ֝דְּבַ֗שׁ וְנֹ֣פֶת צוּפִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Your servant pays them heed; in obeying them there is much reward.
verses.text_he: גַּֽם־עַ֭בְדְּךָ נִזְהָ֣ר בָּהֶ֑ם בְּ֝שׇׁמְרָ֗ם עֵ֣קֶב רָֽב׃

verses.text_en: Who can be aware of errors? Clear me of unperceived guilt,
verses.text_he: שְׁגִיא֥וֹת מִֽי־יָבִ֑ין מִֽנִּסְתָּר֥וֹת נַקֵּֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: and from willful sins keep Your servant; let them not dominate me; then shall I be blameless and clear of grave offense.
verses.text_he: גַּ֤ם מִזֵּדִ֨ים׀ חֲשֹׂ֬ךְ עַבְדֶּ֗ךָ אַֽל־יִמְשְׁלוּ־בִ֣י אָ֣ז אֵיתָ֑ם וְ֝נִקֵּ֗יתִי מִפֶּ֥שַֽׁע רָֽב׃

verses.text_en: May the words of my mouth and the prayer of my heart be acceptable to You, O LORD, my rock and my redeemer.
verses.text_he: יִ֥הְיֽוּ־לְרָצ֨וֹן׀ אִמְרֵי־פִ֡י וְהֶגְי֣וֹן לִבִּ֣י לְפָנֶ֑יךָ יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה צוּרִ֥י וְגֹאֲלִֽי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: May the LORD answer you in time of trouble, the name of Jacob’s God keep you safe.
verses.text_he: יַֽעַנְךָ֣ יְ֭הֹוָה בְּי֣וֹם צָרָ֑ה יְ֝שַׂגֶּבְךָ֗ שֵׁ֤ם׀ אֱלֹהֵ֬י יַעֲקֹֽב׃

verses.text_en: May He send you help from the sanctuary, and sustain you from Zion.
verses.text_he: יִשְׁלַֽח־עֶזְרְךָ֥ מִקֹּ֑דֶשׁ וּ֝מִצִּיּ֗וֹן יִסְעָדֶֽךָּ׃

verses.text_en: May He receive the tokens of all your meal offerings, and approve your burnt offerings. .
verses.text_he: יִזְכֹּ֥ר כׇּל־מִנְחֹתֶ֑ךָ וְעוֹלָתְךָ֖ יְדַשְּׁנֶ֣ה סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: May He grant you your desire, and fulfill your every plan.
verses.text_he: יִֽתֶּן־לְךָ֥ כִלְבָבֶ֑ךָ וְֽכׇל־עֲצָתְךָ֥ יְמַלֵּֽא׃

verses.text_en: May we shout for joy in your victory, arrayed by standards in the name of our God. May the LORD fulfill your every wish.
verses.text_he: נְרַנְּנָ֤ה׀ בִּ֘ישׁ֤וּעָתֶ֗ךָ וּבְשֵֽׁם־אֱלֹהֵ֥ינוּ נִדְגֹּ֑ל יְמַלֵּ֥א יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה כׇּל־מִשְׁאֲלוֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Now I know that the LORD will give victory to His anointed, will answer him from His heavenly sanctuary with the mighty victories of His right arm.
verses.text_he: עַתָּ֤ה יָדַ֗עְתִּי כִּ֤י הוֹשִׁ֥יעַ׀יְהֹוָ֗ה מְשִׁ֫יח֥וֹ יַ֭עֲנֵהוּ מִשְּׁמֵ֣י קׇדְשׁ֑וֹ בִּ֝גְבֻר֗וֹת יֵ֣שַׁע יְמִינֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: They [call] on chariots, they [call] on horses, but we call on the name of the LORD our God.
verses.text_he: אֵ֣לֶּה בָ֭רֶכֶב וְאֵ֣לֶּה בַסּוּסִ֑ים וַאֲנַ֓חְנוּ׀ בְּשֵׁם־יְהֹוָ֖ה אֱלֹהֵ֣ינוּ נַזְכִּֽיר׃

verses.text_en: They collapse and lie fallen, but we rally and gather strength.
verses.text_he: הֵ֭מָּה כָּרְע֣וּ וְנָפָ֑לוּ וַאֲנַ֥חְנוּ קַּ֝֗מְנוּ וַנִּתְעוֹדָֽד׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, grant victory! May the King answer us when we call.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֥ה הוֹשִׁ֑יעָה הַ֝מֶּ֗לֶךְ יַעֲנֵ֥נוּ בְיוֹם־קׇרְאֵֽנוּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, the king rejoices in Your strength; how greatly he exults in Your victory!
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה בְּעׇזְּךָ֥ יִשְׂמַח־מֶ֑לֶךְ וּ֝בִישׁ֥וּעָתְךָ֗ מַה־[יָּ֥גֶל] (יגיל) מְאֹֽד׃

verses.text_en: You have granted him the desire of his heart, have not denied the request of his lips. .
verses.text_he: תַּאֲוַ֣ת לִ֭בּוֹ נָתַ֣תָּה לּ֑וֹ וַאֲרֶ֥שֶׁת שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו בַּל־מָנַ֥עְתָּ סֶּֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: You have proffered him blessings of good things, have set upon his head a crown of fine gold.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־תְ֭קַדְּמֶנּוּ בִּרְכ֣וֹת ט֑וֹב תָּשִׁ֥ית לְ֝רֹאשׁ֗וֹ עֲטֶ֣רֶת פָּֽז׃

verses.text_en: He asked You for life; You granted it; a long life, everlasting.
verses.text_he: חַיִּ֤ים׀ שָׁאַ֣ל מִ֭מְּךָ נָתַ֣תָּה לּ֑וֹ אֹ֥רֶךְ יָ֝מִ֗ים עוֹלָ֥ם וָעֶֽד׃

verses.text_en: Great is his glory through Your victory; You have endowed him with splendor and majesty.
verses.text_he: גָּד֣וֹל כְּ֭בוֹדוֹ בִּישׁוּעָתֶ֑ךָ ה֥וֹד וְ֝הָדָ֗ר תְּשַׁוֶּ֥ה עָלָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: You have made him blessed forever, gladdened him with the joy of Your presence.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־תְשִׁיתֵ֣הוּ בְרָכ֣וֹת לָעַ֑ד תְּחַדֵּ֥הוּ בְ֝שִׂמְחָ֗ה אֶת־פָּנֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: For the king trusts in the LORD; Through the faithfulness of the Most High he will not be shaken.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־הַ֭מֶּלֶךְ בֹּטֵ֣חַ בַּיהֹוָ֑ה וּבְחֶ֥סֶד עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן בַּל־יִמּֽוֹט׃

verses.text_en: Your hand is equal to all Your enemies; Your right hand overpowers Your foes.
verses.text_he: תִּמְצָ֣א יָ֭דְךָ לְכׇל־אֹיְבֶ֑יךָ יְ֝מִֽינְךָ֗ תִּמְצָ֥א שֹׂנְאֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: You set them ablaze like a furnace when You show Your presence. The LORD in anger destroys them; fire consumes them.
verses.text_he: תְּשִׁיתֵ֤מוֹ׀ כְּתַנּ֥וּר אֵשׁ֮ לְעֵ֢ת פָּ֫נֶ֥יךָ יְ֭הֹוָה בְּאַפּ֣וֹ יְבַלְּעֵ֑ם וְֽתֹאכְלֵ֥ם אֵֽשׁ׃

verses.text_en: You wipe their offspring from the earth, their issue from among men.
verses.text_he: פִּ֭רְיָמוֹ מֵאֶ֣רֶץ תְּאַבֵּ֑ד וְ֝זַרְעָ֗ם מִבְּנֵ֥י אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: For they schemed against You; they laid plans, but could not succeed.
verses.text_he: כִּי־נָט֣וּ עָלֶ֣יךָ רָעָ֑ה חָֽשְׁב֥וּ מְ֝זִמָּ֗ה בַּל־יוּכָֽלוּ׃

verses.text_en: For You make them turn back by Your bows aimed at their face.
verses.text_he: כִּ֭י תְּשִׁיתֵ֣מוֹ שֶׁ֑כֶם בְּ֝מֵֽיתָרֶ֗יךָ תְּכוֹנֵ֥ן עַל־פְּנֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: Be exalted, O LORD, through Your strength; we will sing and chant the praises of Your mighty deeds.
verses.text_he: ר֣וּמָה יְהֹוָ֣ה בְּעֻזֶּ֑ךָ נָשִׁ֥ירָה וּֽ֝נְזַמְּרָ֗ה גְּבוּרָתֶֽךָ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; on . A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ עַל־אַיֶּ֥לֶת הַשַּׁ֗חַר מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: My God, my God, why have You abandoned me; why so far from delivering me and from my anguished roaring?
verses.text_he: אֵלִ֣י אֵ֭לִי לָמָ֣ה עֲזַבְתָּ֑נִי רָח֥וֹק מִֽ֝ישׁוּעָתִ֗י דִּבְרֵ֥י שַׁאֲגָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: My God, I cry by day—You answer not; by night, and have no respite.
verses.text_he: אֱֽלֹהַ֗י אֶקְרָ֣א י֭וֹמָם וְלֹ֣א תַעֲנֶ֑ה וְ֝לַ֗יְלָה וְֽלֹא־דֻֽמִיָּ֥ה לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: But You are the Holy One, enthroned, the Praise of Israel.
verses.text_he: וְאַתָּ֥ה קָד֑וֹשׁ י֝וֹשֵׁ֗ב תְּהִלּ֥וֹת יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: In You our fathers trusted; they trusted, and You rescued them.
verses.text_he: בְּ֭ךָ בָּטְח֣וּ אֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ בָּ֝טְח֗וּ וַֽתְּפַלְּטֵֽמוֹ׃

verses.text_en: To You they cried out and they escaped; in You they trusted and were not disappointed.
verses.text_he: אֵלֶ֣יךָ זָעֲק֣וּ וְנִמְלָ֑טוּ בְּךָ֖ בָטְח֣וּ וְלֹא־בֽוֹשׁוּ׃

verses.text_en: But I am a worm, less than human; scorned by men, despised by people.
verses.text_he: וְאָנֹכִ֣י תוֹלַ֣עַת וְלֹא־אִ֑ישׁ חֶרְפַּ֥ת אָ֝דָ֗ם וּבְז֥וּי עָֽם׃

verses.text_en: All who see me mock me; they curl their lips, they shake their heads.
verses.text_he: כׇּל־רֹ֭אַי יַלְעִ֣גוּ לִ֑י יַפְטִ֥ירוּ בְ֝שָׂפָ֗ה יָנִ֥יעוּ רֹֽאשׁ׃

verses.text_en: “Let him commit himself to the LORD; let Him rescue him, let Him save him, for He is pleased with him.”
verses.text_he: גֹּ֣ל אֶל־יְהֹוָ֣ה יְפַלְּטֵ֑הוּ יַ֝צִּילֵ֗הוּ כִּ֘י־חָ֥פֵֽץ־בּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: You drew me from the womb, made me secure at my mother’s breast.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־אַתָּ֣ה גֹחִ֣י מִבָּ֑טֶן מַ֝בְטִיחִ֗י עַל־שְׁדֵ֥י אִמִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: I became Your charge at birth; from my mother’s womb You have been my God.
verses.text_he: עָ֭לֶיךָ הׇשְׁלַ֣כְתִּי מֵרָ֑חֶם מִבֶּ֥טֶן אִ֝מִּ֗י אֵ֣לִי אָֽתָּה׃

verses.text_en: Do not be far from me, for trouble is near, and there is none to help.
verses.text_he: אַל־תִּרְחַ֣ק מִ֭מֶּנִּי כִּי־צָרָ֣ה קְרוֹבָ֑ה כִּי־אֵ֥ין עוֹזֵֽר׃

verses.text_en: Many bulls surround me, mighty ones of Bashan encircle me.
verses.text_he: סְ֭בָבוּנִי פָּרִ֣ים רַבִּ֑ים אַבִּירֵ֖י בָשָׁ֣ן כִּתְּרֽוּנִי׃

verses.text_en: They open their mouths at me like tearing, roaring lions.
verses.text_he: פָּצ֣וּ עָלַ֣י פִּיהֶ֑ם אַ֝רְיֵ֗ה טֹרֵ֥ף וְשֹׁאֵֽג׃

verses.text_en: My life ebbs away: all my bones are disjointed; my heart is like wax, melting within me;
verses.text_he: כַּמַּ֥יִם נִשְׁפַּכְתִּי֮ וְהִתְפָּֽרְד֗וּ כׇּֽל־עַצְמ֫וֹתָ֥י הָיָ֣ה לִ֭בִּי כַּדּוֹנָ֑ג נָ֝מֵ֗ס בְּת֣וֹךְ מֵעָֽי׃

verses.text_en: my vigor dries up like a shard; my tongue cleaves to my palate; You commit me to the dust of death.
verses.text_he: יָ֘בֵ֤שׁ כַּחֶ֨רֶשׂ׀ כֹּחִ֗י וּ֭לְשׁוֹנִי מֻדְבָּ֣ק מַלְקוֹחָ֑י וְֽלַעֲפַר־מָ֥וֶת תִּשְׁפְּתֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Dogs surround me; a pack of evil ones closes in on me, like lions [they maul] my hands and feet.
verses.text_he: כִּ֥י סְבָב֗וּנִי כְּלָ֫בִ֥ים עֲדַ֣ת מְ֭רֵעִים הִקִּיפ֑וּנִי כָּ֝אֲרִ֗י יָדַ֥י וְרַגְלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: I take the count of all my bones while they look on and gloat.
verses.text_he: אֲסַפֵּ֥ר כׇּל־עַצְמוֹתָ֑י הֵ֥מָּה יַ֝בִּ֗יטוּ יִרְאוּ־בִֽי׃

verses.text_en: They divide my clothes among themselves, casting lots for my garments.
verses.text_he: יְחַלְּק֣וּ בְגָדַ֣י לָהֶ֑ם וְעַל־לְ֝בוּשִׁ֗י יַפִּ֥ילוּ גוֹרָֽל׃

verses.text_en: But You, O LORD, be not far off; my strength, hasten to my aid.
verses.text_he: וְאַתָּ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה אַל־תִּרְחָ֑ק אֱ֝יָלוּתִ֗י לְעֶזְרָ֥תִי חֽוּשָׁה׃

verses.text_en: Save my life from the sword, my precious life from the clutches of a dog.
verses.text_he: הַצִּ֣ילָה מֵחֶ֣רֶב נַפְשִׁ֑י מִיַּד־כֶּ֝֗לֶב יְחִידָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Deliver me from a lion’s mouth; from the horns of wild oxen rescue me.
verses.text_he: ה֭וֹשִׁיעֵנִי מִפִּ֣י אַרְיֵ֑ה וּמִקַּרְנֵ֖י רֵמִ֣ים עֲנִיתָֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Then will I proclaim Your fame to my brethren, praise You in the congregation.
verses.text_he: אֲסַפְּרָ֣ה שִׁמְךָ֣ לְאֶחָ֑י בְּת֖וֹךְ קָהָ֣ל אֲהַלְלֶֽךָּ׃

verses.text_en: You who fear the LORD, praise Him! All you offspring of Jacob, honor Him! Be in dread of Him, all you offspring of Israel!
verses.text_he: יִרְאֵ֤י יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ הַֽלְל֗וּהוּ כׇּל־זֶ֣רַע יַעֲקֹ֣ב כַּבְּד֑וּהוּ וְג֥וּרוּ מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ כׇּל־זֶ֥רַע יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: For He did not scorn, He did not spurn the plea of the lowly; He did not hide His face from him; when he cried out to Him, He listened.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י לֹֽא־בָזָ֨ה וְלֹ֪א שִׁקַּ֡ץ עֱנ֬וּת עָנִ֗י וְלֹא־הִסְתִּ֣יר פָּנָ֣יו מִמֶּ֑נּוּ וּֽבְשַׁוְּע֖וֹ אֵלָ֣יו שָׁמֵֽעַ׃

verses.text_en: Because of You I offer praise in the great congregation; I pay my vows in the presence of His worshipers.
verses.text_he: מֵ֥אִתְּךָ֗ תְּֽהִלָּ֫תִ֥י בְּקָהָ֥ל רָ֑ב נְדָרַ֥י אֲ֝שַׁלֵּ֗ם נֶ֣גֶד יְרֵאָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: Let the lowly eat and be satisfied; let all who seek the LORD praise Him. Always be of good cheer!
verses.text_he: יֹאכְל֬וּ עֲנָוִ֨ים׀ וְיִשְׂבָּ֗עוּ יְהַֽלְל֣וּ יְ֭הֹוָה דֹּ֣רְשָׁ֑יו יְחִ֖י לְבַבְכֶ֣ם לָעַֽד׃

verses.text_en: Let all the ends of the earth pay heed and turn to the LORD, and the peoples of all nations prostrate themselves before You;
verses.text_he: יִזְכְּר֤וּ׀ וְיָשֻׁ֣בוּ אֶל־יְ֭הֹוָה כׇּל־אַפְסֵי־אָ֑רֶץ וְיִֽשְׁתַּחֲו֥וּ לְ֝פָנֶ֗יךָ כׇּֽל־מִשְׁפְּח֥וֹת גּוֹיִֽם׃

verses.text_en: for kingship is the LORD’s and He rules the nations.
verses.text_he: כִּ֣י לַ֭יהֹוָה הַמְּלוּכָ֑ה וּ֝מֹשֵׁ֗ל בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃

verses.text_en: All those in full vigor shall eat and prostrate themselves; all those at death’s door, whose spirits flag, shall bend the knee before Him.
verses.text_he: אָכְל֬וּ וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֨וּ׀ כׇּֽל־דִּשְׁנֵי־אֶ֗רֶץ לְפָנָ֣יו יִ֭כְרְעוּ כׇּל־יוֹרְדֵ֣י עָפָ֑ר וְ֝נַפְשׁ֗וֹ לֹ֣א חִיָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: Offspring shall serve Him; the Lord’s fame shall be proclaimed to the generation
verses.text_he: זֶ֥רַע יַֽעַבְדֶ֑נּוּ יְסֻפַּ֖ר לַֽאדֹנָ֣י לַדּֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: to come; they shall tell of His beneficence to people yet to be born, for He has acted.
verses.text_he: יָ֭בֹאוּ וְיַגִּ֣ידוּ צִדְקָת֑וֹ לְעַ֥ם נ֝וֹלָ֗ד כִּ֣י עָשָֽׂה׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A psalm of David. The LORD is my shepherd; I lack nothing.
verses.text_he: מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִ֑ד יְהֹוָ֥ה רֹ֝עִ֗י לֹ֣א אֶחְסָֽר׃

verses.text_en: He makes me lie down in green pastures; He leads me to water in places of repose;
verses.text_he: בִּנְא֣וֹת דֶּ֭שֶׁא יַרְבִּיצֵ֑נִי עַל־מֵ֖י מְנֻח֣וֹת יְנַהֲלֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: He renews my life; He guides me in right paths as befits His name.
verses.text_he: נַפְשִׁ֥י יְשׁוֹבֵ֑ב יַֽנְחֵ֥נִי בְמַעְגְּלֵי־צֶ֝֗דֶק לְמַ֣עַן שְׁמֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Though I walk through a valley of deepest darkness, I fear no harm, for You are with me; Your rod and Your staff—they comfort me.
verses.text_he: גַּ֤ם כִּֽי־אֵלֵ֨ךְ בְּגֵ֪יא צַלְמָ֡וֶת לֹא־אִ֘ירָ֤א רָ֗ע כִּי־אַתָּ֥ה עִמָּדִ֑י שִׁבְטְךָ֥ וּ֝מִשְׁעַנְתֶּ֗ךָ הֵ֣מָּה יְנַֽחֲמֻֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: You spread a table for me in full view of my enemies; You anoint my head with oil; my drink is abundant.
verses.text_he: תַּעֲרֹ֬ךְ לְפָנַ֨י׀ שֻׁלְחָ֗ן נֶ֥גֶד צֹרְרָ֑י דִּשַּׁ֥נְתָּ בַשֶּׁ֥מֶן רֹ֝אשִׁ֗י כּוֹסִ֥י רְוָיָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Only goodness and steadfast love shall pursue me all the days of my life, and I shall dwell in the house of the LORD for many long years.
verses.text_he: אַ֤ךְ׀ ט֤וֹב וָחֶ֣סֶד יִ֭רְדְּפוּנִי כׇּל־יְמֵ֣י חַיָּ֑י וְשַׁבְתִּ֥י בְּבֵית־יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה לְאֹ֣רֶךְ יָמִֽים׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Of David. A psalm. The earth is the LORD’s and all that it holds, the world and its inhabitants.
verses.text_he: לְדָוִ֗ד מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר לַֽ֭יהֹוָה הָאָ֣רֶץ וּמְלוֹאָ֑הּ תֵּ֝בֵ֗ל וְיֹ֣שְׁבֵי בָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: For He founded it upon the ocean, set it on the nether-streams.
verses.text_he: כִּי־ה֭וּא עַל־יַמִּ֣ים יְסָדָ֑הּ וְעַל־נְ֝הָר֗וֹת יְכוֹנְנֶֽהָ׃

verses.text_en: Who may ascend the mountain of the LORD? Who may stand in His holy place?—
verses.text_he: מִֽי־יַעֲלֶ֥ה בְהַר־יְהֹוָ֑ה וּמִי־יָ֝ק֗וּם בִּמְק֥וֹם קׇדְשֽׁוֹ׃

verses.text_en: He who has clean hands and a pure heart, who has not taken a false oath by My life or sworn deceitfully.
verses.text_he: נְקִ֥י כַפַּ֗יִם וּֽבַר־לֵ֫בָ֥ב אֲשֶׁ֤ר׀ לֹא־נָשָׂ֣א לַשָּׁ֣וְא נַפְשִׁ֑י וְלֹ֖א נִשְׁבַּ֣ע לְמִרְמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: He shall carry away a blessing from the LORD, a just reward from God, his deliverer.
verses.text_he: יִשָּׂ֣א בְ֭רָכָה מֵאֵ֣ת יְהֹוָ֑ה וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה מֵאֱלֹהֵ֥י יִשְׁעֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Such is the circle of those who turn to Him, Jacob, who seek Your presence. .
verses.text_he: זֶ֭ה דּ֣וֹר דֹּרְשָׁ֑ו מְבַקְשֵׁ֨י פָנֶ֖יךָ יַעֲקֹ֣ב סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: O gates, lift up your heads! Up high, you everlasting doors, so the King of glory may come in!
verses.text_he: שְׂא֤וּ שְׁעָרִ֨ים׀ רָֽאשֵׁיכֶ֗ם וְֽ֭הִנָּשְׂאוּ פִּתְחֵ֣י עוֹלָ֑ם וְ֝יָב֗וֹא מֶ֣לֶךְ הַכָּבֽוֹד׃

verses.text_en: Who is the King of glory?— the LORD, mighty and valiant, the LORD, valiant in battle.
verses.text_he: מִ֥י זֶה֮ מֶ֤לֶךְ הַכָּ֫ב֥וֹד יְ֭הֹוָה עִזּ֣וּז וְגִבּ֑וֹר יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה גִּבּ֥וֹר מִלְחָמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: O gates, lift up your heads! Lift them up, you everlasting doors, so the King of glory may come in!
verses.text_he: שְׂא֤וּ שְׁעָרִ֨ים׀ רָֽאשֵׁיכֶ֗ם וּ֭שְׂאוּ פִּתְחֵ֣י עוֹלָ֑ם וְ֝יָבֹ֗א מֶ֣לֶךְ הַכָּבֽוֹד׃

verses.text_en: Who is the King of glory?— the LORD of hosts, He is the King of glory! .
verses.text_he: מִ֤י־ה֣וּא זֶה֮ מֶ֤לֶךְ הַכָּ֫ב֥וֹד יְהֹוָ֥ה צְבָא֑וֹת ה֤וּא מֶ֖לֶךְ הַכָּב֣וֹד סֶֽלָה׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Of David. O LORD, I set my hope on You;
verses.text_he: לְדָוִ֡ד אֵלֶ֥יךָ יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה נַפְשִׁ֥י אֶשָּֽׂא׃

verses.text_en: my God, in You I trust; may I not be disappointed, may my enemies not exult over me.
verses.text_he: אֱֽלֹהַ֗י בְּךָ֣ בָ֭טַחְתִּי אַל־אֵב֑וֹשָׁה אַל־יַעַלְצ֖וּ אוֹיְבַ֣י לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: O let none who look to You be disappointed; let the faithless be disappointed, empty-handed.
verses.text_he: גַּ֣ם כׇּל־קֹ֭וֶיךָ לֹ֣א יֵבֹ֑שׁוּ יֵ֝בֹ֗שׁוּ הַבּוֹגְדִ֥ים רֵיקָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Let me know Your paths, O LORD; teach me Your ways;
verses.text_he: דְּרָכֶ֣יךָ יְ֭הֹוָה הוֹדִיעֵ֑נִי אֹ֖רְחוֹתֶ֣יךָ לַמְּדֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: guide me in Your true way and teach me, for You are God, my deliverer; it is You I look to at all times.
verses.text_he: הַדְרִ֘יכֵ֤נִי בַאֲמִתֶּ֨ךָ׀ וְֽלַמְּדֵ֗נִי כִּֽי־אַ֭תָּה אֱלֹהֵ֣י יִשְׁעִ֑י אוֹתְךָ֥ קִ֝וִּ֗יתִי כׇּל־הַיּֽוֹם׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, be mindful of Your compassion and Your faithfulness; they are old as time.
verses.text_he: זְכֹר־רַחֲמֶ֣יךָ יְ֭הֹוָה וַחֲסָדֶ֑יךָ כִּ֖י מֵעוֹלָ֣ם הֵֽמָּה׃

verses.text_en: Be not mindful of my youthful sins and transgressions; in keeping with Your faithfulness consider what is in my favor, as befits Your goodness, O LORD.
verses.text_he: חַטֹּ֤אות נְעוּרַ֨י׀ וּפְשָׁעַ֗י אַל־תִּ֫זְכֹּ֥ר כְּחַסְדְּךָ֥ זְכׇר־לִי־אַ֑תָּה לְמַ֖עַן טוּבְךָ֣ יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Good and upright is the LORD; therefore He shows sinners the way.
verses.text_he: טוֹב־וְיָשָׁ֥ר יְהֹוָ֑ה עַל־כֵּ֤ן יוֹרֶ֖ה חַטָּאִ֣ים בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃

verses.text_en: He guides the lowly in the right path, and teaches the lowly His way.
verses.text_he: יַדְרֵ֣ךְ עֲ֭נָוִים בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט וִילַמֵּ֖ד עֲנָוִ֣ים דַּרְכּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: All the LORD’s paths are steadfast love for those who keep the decrees of His covenant.
verses.text_he: כׇּל־אׇרְח֣וֹת יְ֭הֹוָה חֶ֣סֶד וֶאֱמֶ֑ת לְנֹצְרֵ֥י בְ֝רִית֗וֹ וְעֵדֹתָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: As befits Your name, O LORD, pardon my iniquity though it be great.
verses.text_he: לְמַֽעַן־שִׁמְךָ֥ יְהֹוָ֑ה וְֽסָלַחְתָּ֥ לַ֝עֲוֺנִ֗י כִּ֣י רַב־הֽוּא׃

verses.text_en: Whoever fears the LORD, he shall be shown what path to choose.
verses.text_he: מִי־זֶ֣ה הָ֭אִישׁ יְרֵ֣א יְהֹוָ֑ה י֝וֹרֶ֗נּוּ בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ יִבְחָֽר׃

verses.text_en: He shall live a happy life, and his children shall inherit the land.
verses.text_he: נַ֭פְשׁוֹ בְּט֣וֹב תָּלִ֑ין וְ֝זַרְע֗וֹ יִ֣ירַשׁ אָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: The counsel of the LORD is for those who fear Him; to them He makes known His covenant.
verses.text_he: ס֣וֹד יְ֭הֹוָה לִירֵאָ֑יו וּ֝בְרִית֗וֹ לְהוֹדִיעָֽם׃

verses.text_en: My eyes are ever toward the LORD, for He will loose my feet from the net.
verses.text_he: עֵינַ֣י תָּ֭מִיד אֶל־יְהֹוָ֑ה כִּ֤י הֽוּא־יוֹצִ֖יא מֵרֶ֣שֶׁת רַגְלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Turn to me, have mercy on me, for I am alone and afflicted.
verses.text_he: פְּנֵֽה־אֵלַ֥י וְחׇנֵּ֑נִי כִּֽי־יָחִ֖יד וְעָנִ֣י אָֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: My deep distress increases; deliver me from my straits.
verses.text_he: צָר֣וֹת לְבָבִ֣י הִרְחִ֑יבוּ מִ֝מְּצוּקוֹתַ֗י הוֹצִיאֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Look at my affliction and suffering, and forgive all my sins.
verses.text_he: רְאֵ֣ה עׇ֭נְיִי וַעֲמָלִ֑י וְ֝שָׂ֗א לְכׇל־חַטֹּאותָֽי׃

verses.text_en: See how numerous my enemies are, and how unjustly they hate me!
verses.text_he: רְאֵֽה־אֹיְבַ֥י כִּי־רָ֑בּוּ וְשִׂנְאַ֖ת חָמָ֣ס שְׂנֵאֽוּנִי׃

verses.text_en: Protect me and save me; let me not be disappointed, for I have sought refuge in You.
verses.text_he: שׇׁמְרָ֣ה נַ֭פְשִׁי וְהַצִּילֵ֑נִי אַל־אֵ֝ב֗וֹשׁ כִּֽי־חָסִ֥יתִי בָֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: May integrity and uprightness watch over me, for I look to You.
verses.text_he: תֹּם־וָיֹ֥שֶׁר יִצְּר֑וּנִי כִּ֝֗י קִוִּיתִֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: O God, redeem Israel from all its distress.
verses.text_he: פְּדֵ֣ה אֱ֭לֹהִים אֶת־יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל מִ֝כֹּ֗ל צָרוֹתָֽיו׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Of David. Vindicate me, O LORD, for I have walked without blame; I have trusted in the LORD; I have not faltered.
verses.text_he: לְדָוִ֨ד׀ שׇׁפְטֵ֤נִי יְהֹוָ֗ה כִּֽי־אֲ֭נִי בְּתֻמִּ֣י הָלַ֑כְתִּי וּבַיהֹוָ֥ה בָּ֝טַ֗חְתִּי לֹ֣א אֶמְעָֽד׃

verses.text_en: Probe me, O LORD, and try me, test my heart and mind;
verses.text_he: בְּחָנֵ֣נִי יְהֹוָ֣ה וְנַסֵּ֑נִי (צרופה) [צׇרְפָ֖ה] כִלְיוֹתַ֣י וְלִבִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: for my eyes are on Your steadfast love; I have set my course by it.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־חַ֭סְדְּךָ לְנֶ֣גֶד עֵינָ֑י וְ֝הִתְהַלַּ֗כְתִּי בַּאֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: I do not consort with scoundrels, or mix with hypocrites;
verses.text_he: לֹֽא־יָ֭שַׁבְתִּי עִם־מְתֵי־שָׁ֑וְא וְעִ֥ם נַ֝עֲלָמִ֗ים לֹ֣א אָבֽוֹא׃

verses.text_en: I detest the company of evil men, and do not consort with the wicked;
verses.text_he: שָׂ֭נֵאתִי קְהַ֣ל מְרֵעִ֑ים וְעִם־רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים לֹ֣א אֵשֵֽׁב׃

verses.text_en: I wash my hands in innocence, and walk around Your altar, O LORD,
verses.text_he: אֶרְחַ֣ץ בְּנִקָּי֣וֹן כַּפָּ֑י וַאֲסֹבְבָ֖ה אֶת־מִזְבַּחֲךָ֣ יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: raising my voice in thanksgiving, and telling all Your wonders.
verses.text_he: לַ֭שְׁמִעַ בְּק֣וֹל תּוֹדָ֑ה וּ֝לְסַפֵּ֗ר כׇּל־נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, I love Your temple abode, the dwelling-place of Your glory.
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה אָ֭הַבְתִּי מְע֣וֹן בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ וּ֝מְק֗וֹם מִשְׁכַּ֥ן כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Do not sweep me away with sinners, or [snuff out] my life with murderers,
verses.text_he: אַל־תֶּאֱסֹ֣ף עִם־חַטָּאִ֣ים נַפְשִׁ֑י וְעִם־אַנְשֵׁ֖י דָמִ֣ים חַיָּֽי׃

verses.text_en: who have schemes at their fingertips, and hands full of bribes.
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁר־בִּידֵיהֶ֥ם זִמָּ֑ה וִ֝ימִינָ֗ם מָ֣לְאָה שֹּֽׁחַד׃

verses.text_en: But I walk without blame; redeem me, have mercy on me!
verses.text_he: וַ֭אֲנִי בְּתֻמִּ֥י אֵלֵ֗ךְ פְּדֵ֣נִי וְחׇנֵּֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: My feet are on level ground. In assemblies I will bless the LORD.
verses.text_he: רַ֭גְלִי עָמְדָ֣ה בְמִישׁ֑וֹר בְּ֝מַקְהֵלִ֗ים אֲבָרֵ֥ךְ יְהֹוָֽה׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Of David. The LORD is my light and my help; whom should I fear? The LORD is the stronghold of my life, whom should I dread?
verses.text_he: לְדָוִ֨ד׀ יְהֹוָ֤ה׀ אוֹרִ֣י וְ֭יִשְׁעִי מִמִּ֣י אִירָ֑א יְהֹוָ֥ה מָעוֹז־חַ֝יַּ֗י מִמִּ֥י אֶפְחָֽד׃

verses.text_en: When evil men assail me to devour my flesh— it is they, my foes and my enemies, who stumble and fall.
verses.text_he: בִּקְרֹ֤ב עָלַ֨י׀ מְרֵעִים֮ לֶאֱכֹ֢ל אֶת־בְּשָׂ֫רִ֥י צָרַ֣י וְאֹיְבַ֣י לִ֑י הֵ֖מָּה כָשְׁל֣וּ וְנָפָֽלוּ׃

verses.text_en: Should an army besiege me, my heart would have no fear; should war beset me, still would I be confident.
verses.text_he: אִם־תַּחֲנֶ֬ה עָלַ֨י׀ מַחֲנֶה֮ לֹא־יִירָ֢א לִ֫בִּ֥י אִם־תָּק֣וּם עָ֭לַי מִלְחָמָ֑ה בְּ֝זֹ֗את אֲנִ֣י בוֹטֵֽחַ׃

verses.text_en: One thing I ask of the LORD, only that do I seek: to live in the house of the LORD all the days of my life, to gaze upon the beauty of the LORD, to frequent His temple.
verses.text_he: אַחַ֤ת׀ שָׁאַ֣לְתִּי מֵאֵת־יְהֹוָה֮ אוֹתָ֢הּ אֲבַ֫קֵּ֥שׁ שִׁבְתִּ֣י בְּבֵית־יְ֭הֹוָה כׇּל־יְמֵ֣י חַיַּ֑י לַחֲז֥וֹת בְּנֹעַם־יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה וּלְבַקֵּ֥ר בְּהֵֽיכָלֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: He will shelter me in His pavilion on an evil day, grant me the protection of His tent, raise me high upon a rock.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י יִצְפְּנֵ֨נִי׀ בְּסֻכֹּה֮ בְּי֢וֹם רָ֫עָ֥ה יַ֭סְתִּרֵנִי בְּסֵ֣תֶר אׇהֳל֑וֹ בְּ֝צ֗וּר יְרוֹמְמֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Now is my head high over my enemies round about; I sacrifice in His tent with shouts of joy, singing and chanting a hymn to the LORD.
verses.text_he: וְעַתָּ֨ה יָר֪וּם רֹאשִׁ֡י עַ֤ל אֹיְבַ֬י סְֽבִיבוֹתַ֗י וְאֶזְבְּחָ֣ה בְ֭אׇהֳלוֹ זִבְחֵ֣י תְרוּעָ֑ה אָשִׁ֥ירָה וַ֝אֲזַמְּרָ֗ה לַֽיהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Hear, O LORD, when I cry aloud; have mercy on me, answer me.
verses.text_he: שְׁמַע־יְהֹוָ֖ה קוֹלִ֥י אֶקְרָ֗א וְחׇנֵּ֥נִי וַעֲנֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: In Your behalf my heart says: “Seek My face!” O LORD, I seek Your face.
verses.text_he: לְךָ֤׀ אָמַ֣ר לִ֭בִּי בַּקְּשׁ֣וּ פָנָ֑י אֶת־פָּנֶ֖יךָ יְהֹוָ֣ה אֲבַקֵּֽשׁ׃

verses.text_en: Do not hide Your face from me; do not thrust aside Your servant in anger; You have ever been my help. Do not forsake me, do not abandon me, O God, my deliverer.
verses.text_he: אַל־תַּסְתֵּ֬ר פָּנֶ֨יךָ׀ מִמֶּנִּי֮ אַ֥ל תַּט־בְּאַ֗ף עַ֫בְדֶּ֥ךָ עֶזְרָתִ֥י הָיִ֑יתָ אַֽל־תִּטְּשֵׁ֥נִי וְאַל־תַּ֝עַזְבֵ֗נִי אֱלֹהֵ֥י יִשְׁעִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Though my father and mother abandon me, the LORD will take me in.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־אָבִ֣י וְאִמִּ֣י עֲזָב֑וּנִי וַֽיהֹוָ֣ה יַאַסְפֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Show me Your way, O LORD, and lead me on a level path because of my watchful foes.
verses.text_he: ה֤וֹרֵ֥נִי יְהֹוָ֗ה דַּ֫רְכֶּ֥ךָ וּ֭נְחֵנִי בְּאֹ֣רַח מִישׁ֑וֹר לְ֝מַ֗עַן שֽׁוֹרְרָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Do not subject me to the will of my foes, for false witnesses and unjust accusers have appeared against me.
verses.text_he: אַֽל־תִּ֭תְּנֵנִי בְּנֶ֣פֶשׁ צָרָ֑י כִּ֥י קָמוּ־בִ֥י עֵדֵי־שֶׁ֝֗קֶר וִיפֵ֥חַ חָמָֽס׃

verses.text_en: Had I not the assurance that I would enjoy the goodness of the LORD in the land of the living…
verses.text_he: לׅׄוּׅׄלֵׅ֗ׄאׅׄ הֶ֭אֱמַנְתִּי לִרְא֥וֹת בְּֽטוּב־יְהֹוָ֗ה בְּאֶ֣רֶץ חַיִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: Look to the LORD; be strong and of good courage! O look to the LORD!
verses.text_he: קַוֵּ֗ה אֶל־יְ֫הֹוָ֥ה חֲ֭זַק וְיַאֲמֵ֣ץ לִבֶּ֑ךָ וְ֝קַוֵּ֗ה אֶל־יְהֹוָֽה׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Of David. O LORD, I call to You; my rock, do not disregard me, for if You hold aloof from me, I shall be like those gone down into the Pit.
verses.text_he: לְדָוִ֡ד אֵ֘לֶ֤יךָ יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ אֶקְרָ֗א צוּרִי֮ אַֽל־תֶּחֱרַ֢שׁ מִ֫מֶּ֥נִּי פֶּן־תֶּחֱשֶׁ֥ה מִמֶּ֑נִּי וְ֝נִמְשַׁ֗לְתִּי עִם־י֥וֹרְדֵי בֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: Listen to my plea for mercy when I cry out to You, when I lift my hands toward Your inner sanctuary.
verses.text_he: שְׁמַ֤ע ק֣וֹל תַּ֭חֲנוּנַי בְּשַׁוְּעִ֣י אֵלֶ֑יךָ בְּנׇשְׂאִ֥י יָ֝דַ֗י אֶל־דְּבִ֥יר קׇדְשֶֽׁךָ׃

verses.text_en: Do not count me with the wicked and evildoers who profess goodwill toward their fellows while malice is in their heart.
verses.text_he: אַל־תִּמְשְׁכֵ֣נִי עִם־רְשָׁעִים֮ וְעִם־פֹּ֢עֲלֵ֫י אָ֥וֶן דֹּבְרֵ֣י שָׁ֭לוֹם עִם־רֵעֵיהֶ֑ם וְ֝רָעָ֗ה בִּלְבָבָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Pay them according to their deeds, their malicious acts; according to their handiwork pay them, give them their deserts.
verses.text_he: תֶּן־לָהֶ֣ם כְּפׇעֳלָם֮ וּכְרֹ֢עַ מַעַלְלֵ֫יהֶ֥ם כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה יְ֭דֵיהֶם תֵּ֣ן לָהֶ֑ם הָשֵׁ֖ב גְּמוּלָ֣ם לָהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: For they do not consider the LORD’s deeds, the work of His hands. May He tear them down, never to rebuild them!
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י לֹ֪א יָבִ֡ינוּ אֶל־פְּעֻלֹּ֣ת יְ֭הֹוָה וְאֶל־מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה יָדָ֑יו יֶ֝הֶרְסֵ֗ם וְלֹ֣א יִבְנֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: Blessed is the LORD, for He listens to my plea for mercy.
verses.text_he: בָּר֥וּךְ יְהֹוָ֑ה כִּי־שָׁ֝מַ֗ע ק֣וֹל תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is my strength and my shield; my heart trusts in Him. I was helped, and my heart exulted, so I will glorify Him with my song.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֤ה׀ עֻזִּ֥י וּמָגִנִּי֮ בּ֤וֹ בָטַ֥ח לִבִּ֗י וְֽנֶ֫עֱזָ֥רְתִּי וַיַּעֲלֹ֥ז לִבִּ֑י וּֽמִשִּׁירִ֥י אֲהוֹדֶֽנּוּ׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is their strength; He is a stronghold for the deliverance of His anointed.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֥ה עֹֽז־לָ֑מוֹ וּמָ֘ע֤וֹז יְשׁוּע֖וֹת מְשִׁיח֣וֹ הֽוּא׃

verses.text_en: Deliver and bless Your very own people; tend them and sustain them forever.
verses.text_he: הוֹשִׁ֤יעָה׀ אֶת־עַמֶּ֗ךָ וּבָרֵ֥ךְ אֶת־נַחֲלָתֶ֑ךָ וּֽרְעֵ֥ם וְ֝נַשְּׂאֵ֗ם עַד־הָעוֹלָֽם׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A psalm of David. Ascribe to the LORD, O divine beings, ascribe to the LORD glory and strength.
verses.text_he: מִזְמ֗וֹר לְדָ֫וִ֥ד הָב֣וּ לַ֭יהֹוָה בְּנֵ֣י אֵלִ֑ים הָב֥וּ לַ֝יהֹוָ֗ה כָּב֥וֹד וָעֹֽז׃

verses.text_en: Ascribe to the LORD the glory of His name; bow down to the LORD, majestic in holiness.
verses.text_he: הָב֣וּ לַ֭יהֹוָה כְּב֣וֹד שְׁמ֑וֹ הִשְׁתַּחֲו֥וּ לַ֝יהֹוָ֗ה בְּהַדְרַת־קֹֽדֶשׁ׃

verses.text_en: The voice of the LORD is over the waters; the God of glory thunders, the LORD, over the mighty waters.
verses.text_he: ק֥וֹל יְהֹוָ֗ה עַל־הַ֫מָּ֥יִם אֵֽל־הַכָּב֥וֹד הִרְעִ֑ים יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה עַל־מַ֥יִם רַבִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: The voice of the LORD is power; the voice of the LORD is majesty;
verses.text_he: קוֹל־יְהֹוָ֥ה בַּכֹּ֑חַ ק֥וֹל יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה בֶּהָדָֽר׃

verses.text_en: the voice of the LORD breaks cedars; the LORD shatters the cedars of Lebanon.
verses.text_he: ק֣וֹל יְ֭הֹוָה שֹׁבֵ֣ר אֲרָזִ֑ים וַיְשַׁבֵּ֥ר יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה אֶת־אַרְזֵ֥י הַלְּבָנֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: He makes Lebanon skip like a calf, Sirion, like a young wild ox.
verses.text_he: וַיַּרְקִידֵ֥ם כְּמוֹ־עֵ֑גֶל לְבָנ֥וֹן וְ֝שִׂרְיֹ֗ן כְּמ֣וֹ בֶן־רְאֵמִֽים׃

verses.text_en: The voice of the LORD kindles flames of fire;
verses.text_he: קוֹל־יְהֹוָ֥ה חֹצֵ֗ב לַהֲב֥וֹת אֵֽשׁ׃

verses.text_en: the voice of the LORD convulses the wilderness; the LORD convulses the wilderness of Kadesh;
verses.text_he: ק֣וֹל יְ֭הֹוָה יָחִ֣יל מִדְבָּ֑ר יָחִ֥יל יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה מִדְבַּ֥ר קָדֵֽשׁ׃

verses.text_en: the voice of the LORD causes hinds to calve, and strips forests bare; while in His temple all say “Glory!”
verses.text_he: ק֤וֹל יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ יְחוֹלֵ֣ל אַיָּלוֹת֮ וַֽיֶּחֱשֹׂ֢ף יְעָ֫ר֥וֹת וּבְהֵיכָל֑וֹ כֻּ֝לּ֗וֹ אֹמֵ֥ר כָּבֽוֹד׃

verses.text_en: The LORD sat enthroned at the Flood; the LORD sits enthroned, king forever.
verses.text_he: יְ֭הֹוָה לַמַּבּ֣וּל יָשָׁ֑ב וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה מֶ֣לֶךְ לְעוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: May the LORD grant strength to His people; may the LORD bestow on His people wellbeing.
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה עֹ֭ז לְעַמּ֣וֹ יִתֵּ֑ן יְהֹוָ֓ה׀ יְבָרֵ֖ךְ אֶת־עַמּ֣וֹ בַשָּׁלֽוֹם׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A psalm of David. A song for the dedication of the House.
verses.text_he: מִזְמ֡וֹר שִׁיר־חֲנֻכַּ֖ת הַבַּ֣יִת לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: I extol You, O LORD, for You have lifted me up, and not let my enemies rejoice over me.
verses.text_he: אֲרוֹמִמְךָ֣ יְ֭הֹוָה כִּ֣י דִלִּיתָ֑נִי וְלֹֽא־שִׂמַּ֖חְתָּ אֹיְבַ֣י לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, my God, I cried out to You, and You healed me.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֥ה אֱלֹהָ֑י שִׁוַּ֥עְתִּי אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ וַתִּרְפָּאֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, You brought me up from Sheol, preserved me from going down into the Pit.
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה הֶעֱלִ֣יתָ מִן־שְׁא֣וֹל נַפְשִׁ֑י חִ֝יִּיתַ֗נִי (מיורדי) [מִיׇּֽרְדִי־]בֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: O you faithful of the LORD, sing to Him, and praise His holy name.
verses.text_he: זַמְּר֣וּ לַיהֹוָ֣ה חֲסִידָ֑יו וְ֝הוֹד֗וּ לְזֵ֣כֶר קׇדְשֽׁוֹ׃

verses.text_en: For He is angry but a moment, and when He is pleased there is life. One may lie down weeping at nightfall; but at dawn there are shouts of joy.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י רֶ֨גַע׀ בְּאַפּוֹ֮ חַיִּ֢ים בִּרְצ֫וֹנ֥וֹ בָּ֭עֶרֶב יָלִ֥ין בֶּ֗כִי וְלַבֹּ֥קֶר רִנָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: When I was untroubled, I thought, “I shall never be shaken,”
verses.text_he: וַ֭אֲנִי אָמַ֣רְתִּי בְשַׁלְוִ֑י בַּל־אֶמּ֥וֹט לְעוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: for You, O LORD, when You were pleased, made [me] firm as a mighty mountain. When You hid Your face, I was terrified.
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה בִּרְצוֹנְךָ֮ הֶעֱמַ֢דְתָּה לְֽהַרְרִ֫י־עֹ֥ז הִסְתַּ֥רְתָּ פָנֶ֗יךָ הָיִ֥יתִי נִבְהָֽל׃

verses.text_en: I called to You, O LORD; to my Lord I made appeal,
verses.text_he: אֵלֶ֣יךָ יְהֹוָ֣ה אֶקְרָ֑א וְאֶל־אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י אֶתְחַנָּֽן׃

verses.text_en: “What is to be gained from my death, from my descent into the Pit? Can dust praise You? Can it declare Your faithfulness?
verses.text_he: מַה־בֶּ֥צַע בְּדָמִי֮ בְּרִדְתִּ֢י אֶ֫ל־שָׁ֥חַת הֲיוֹדְךָ֥ עָפָ֑ר הֲיַגִּ֥יד אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Hear, O LORD, and have mercy on me; O LORD, be my help!”
verses.text_he: שְׁמַע־יְהֹוָ֥ה וְחׇנֵּ֑נִי יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה הֱֽיֵה־עֹזֵ֥ר לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: You turned my lament into dancing, you undid my sackcloth and girded me with joy,
verses.text_he: הָפַ֣כְתָּ מִסְפְּדִי֮ לְמָח֢וֹל לִ֥֫י פִּתַּ֥חְתָּ שַׂקִּ֑י וַֽתְּאַזְּרֵ֥נִי שִׂמְחָֽה׃
