verses.text_en: that [my] whole being might sing hymns to You endlessly; O LORD my God, I will praise You forever.
verses.text_he: לְמַ֤עַן׀ יְזַמֶּרְךָ֣ כָ֭בוֹד וְלֹ֣א יִדֹּ֑ם יְהֹוָ֥ה אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י לְעוֹלָ֥ם אוֹדֶֽךָּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: I seek refuge in You, O LORD; may I never be disappointed; as You are righteous, rescue me.
verses.text_he: בְּךָֽ־יְהֹוָ֣ה חָ֭סִיתִי אַל־אֵב֣וֹשָׁה לְעוֹלָ֑ם בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֥ פַלְּטֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Incline Your ear to me; be quick to save me; be a rock, a stronghold for me, a citadel, for my deliverance.
verses.text_he: הַטֵּ֤ה אֵלַ֨י׀ אׇזְנְךָ֮ מְהֵרָ֢ה הַצִּ֫ילֵ֥נִי הֱיֵ֤ה לִ֨י׀ לְֽצוּר־מָ֭עוֹז לְבֵ֥ית מְצוּד֗וֹת לְהוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: For You are my rock and my fortress; You lead me and guide me as befits Your name.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־סַלְעִ֣י וּמְצוּדָתִ֣י אָ֑תָּה וּלְמַ֥עַן שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ תַּֽנְחֵ֥נִי וּֽתְנַהֲלֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: You free me from the net laid for me, for You are my stronghold.
verses.text_he: תּוֹצִיאֵ֗נִי מֵרֶ֣שֶׁת ז֭וּ טָ֣מְנוּ לִ֑י כִּי־אַ֝תָּ֗ה מָעוּזִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: Into Your hand I entrust my spirit; You redeem me, O LORD, faithful God.
verses.text_he: בְּיָדְךָ֮ אַפְקִ֢יד ר֫וּחִ֥י פָּדִ֖יתָ אוֹתִ֥י יְהֹוָ֗ה אֵ֣ל אֱמֶֽת׃

verses.text_en: I detest those who rely on empty folly, but I trust in the LORD.
verses.text_he: שָׂנֵ֗אתִי הַשֹּׁמְרִ֥ים הַבְלֵי־שָׁ֑וְא וַ֝אֲנִ֗י אֶל־יְהֹוָ֥ה בָּטָֽחְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: Let me exult and rejoice in Your faithfulness when You notice my affliction, are mindful of my deep distress,
verses.text_he: אָגִ֥ילָה וְאֶשְׂמְחָ֗ה בְּחַ֫סְדֶּ֥ךָ אֲשֶׁ֣ר רָ֭אִיתָ אֶת־עׇנְיִ֑י יָ֝דַ֗עְתָּ בְּצָר֥וֹת נַפְשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: and do not hand me over to my enemy, but grant me relief.
verses.text_he: וְלֹ֣א הִ֭סְגַּרְתַּנִי בְּיַד־אוֹיֵ֑ב הֶעֱמַ֖דְתָּ בַמֶּרְחָ֣ב רַגְלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Have mercy on me, O LORD, for I am in distress; my eyes are wasted by vexation, my substance and body too.
verses.text_he: חׇנֵּ֥נִי יְהֹוָה֮ כִּ֤י צַ֫ר־לִ֥י עָשְׁשָׁ֖ה בְכַ֥עַס עֵינִ֗י נַפְשִׁ֥י וּבִטְנִֽי׃

verses.text_en: My life is spent in sorrow, my years in groaning; my strength fails because of my iniquity, my limbs waste away.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י כָל֪וּ בְיָג֡וֹן חַיַּי֮ וּשְׁנוֹתַ֢י בַּאֲנָ֫חָ֥ה כָּשַׁ֣ל בַּעֲוֺנִ֣י כֹחִ֑י וַעֲצָמַ֥י עָשֵֽׁשׁוּ׃

verses.text_en: Because of all my foes I am the particular butt of my neighbors, a horror to my friends; those who see me on the street avoid me.
verses.text_he: מִכׇּל־צֹרְרַ֨י הָיִ֪יתִי חֶרְפָּ֡ה וְלִ֥שְׁכֵנַ֨י׀ מְאֹד֮ וּפַ֢חַד לִֽמְיֻדָּ֫עָ֥י רֹאַ֥י בַּח֑וּץ נָדְד֥וּ מִמֶּֽנִּי׃

verses.text_en: I am put out of mind like the dead; I am like an object given up for lost.
verses.text_he: נִ֭שְׁכַּחְתִּי כְּמֵ֣ת מִלֵּ֑ב הָ֝יִ֗יתִי כִּכְלִ֥י אֹבֵֽד׃

verses.text_en: I hear the whisperings of many, intrigue on every side, as they scheme together against me, plotting to take my life.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י שָׁמַ֨עְתִּי׀ דִּבַּ֥ת רַבִּים֮ מָג֢וֹר מִסָּ֫בִ֥יב בְּהִוָּסְדָ֣ם יַ֣חַד עָלַ֑י לָקַ֖חַת נַפְשִׁ֣י זָמָֽמוּ׃

verses.text_en: But I trust in You, O LORD; I say, “You are my God!”
verses.text_he: וַאֲנִ֤י׀ עָלֶ֣יךָ בָטַ֣חְתִּי יְהֹוָ֑ה אָ֝מַ֗רְתִּי אֱלֹהַ֥י אָֽתָּה׃

verses.text_en: My fate is in Your hand; save me from the hand of my enemies and pursuers.
verses.text_he: בְּיָדְךָ֥ עִתֹּתָ֑י הַצִּ֘ילֵ֤נִי מִיַּד־א֝וֹיְבַ֗י וּמֵֽרֹדְפָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Show favor to Your servant; as You are faithful, deliver me.
verses.text_he: הָאִ֣ירָה פָ֭נֶיךָ עַל־עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ ה֖וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי בְחַסְדֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, let me not be disappointed when I call You; let the wicked be disappointed; let them be silenced in Sheol;
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה אַל־אֵ֭בוֹשָׁה כִּ֣י קְרָאתִ֑יךָ יֵבֹ֥שׁוּ רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים יִדְּמ֥וּ לִשְׁאֽוֹל׃

verses.text_en: let lying lips be stilled that speak haughtily against the righteous with arrogance and contempt.
verses.text_he: תֵּ֥אָלַ֗מְנָה שִׂפְתֵ֫י־שָׁ֥קֶר הַדֹּבְר֖וֹת עַל־צַדִּ֥יק עָתָ֗ק בְּגַאֲוָ֥ה וָבֽוּז׃

verses.text_en: How abundant is the good that You have in store for those who fear You, that You do in the full view of men for those who take refuge in You.
verses.text_he: מָ֤ה רַֽב־טוּבְךָ֮ אֲשֶׁר־צָפַ֢נְתָּ לִּירֵ֫אֶ֥יךָ פָּ֭עַלְתָּ לַחֹסִ֣ים בָּ֑ךְ נֶ֝֗גֶד בְּנֵ֣י אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: You grant them the protection of Your presence against scheming men; You shelter them in Your pavilion from contentious tongues.
verses.text_he: תַּסְתִּירֵ֤ם׀ בְּסֵ֥תֶר פָּנֶיךָ֮ מֵרֻכְסֵ֫י־אִ֥ישׁ תִּצְפְּנֵ֥ם בְּסֻכָּ֗ה מֵרִ֥יב לְשֹׁנֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: Blessed is the LORD, for He has been wondrously faithful to me, a veritable bastion.
verses.text_he: בָּר֥וּךְ יְהֹוָ֑ה כִּ֥י הִפְלִ֘יא־חַסְדּ֥וֹ לִ֝֗י בְּעִ֣יר מָצֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: Alarmed, I had thought, “I am thrust out of Your sight”; yet You listened to my plea for mercy when I cried out to You.
verses.text_he: וַאֲנִ֤י׀ אָ֘מַ֤רְתִּי בְחׇפְזִ֗י נִגְרַזְתִּי֮ מִנֶּ֢גֶד עֵ֫ינֶ֥יךָ אָכֵ֗ן שָׁ֭מַעְתָּ ק֥וֹל תַּחֲנוּנַ֗י בְּשַׁוְּעִ֥י אֵלֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: So love the LORD, all you faithful; the LORD guards the loyal, and more than requites him who acts arrogantly.
verses.text_he: אֶ֥הֱב֥וּ אֶֽת־יְהֹוָ֗ה כׇּֽל־חֲסִ֫ידָ֥יו אֱ֭מוּנִים נֹצֵ֣ר יְהֹוָ֑ה וּמְשַׁלֵּ֥ם עַל־יֶ֝֗תֶר עֹשֵׂ֥ה גַאֲוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Be strong and of good courage, all you who wait for the LORD.
verses.text_he: חִ֭זְקוּ וְיַאֲמֵ֣ץ לְבַבְכֶ֑ם כׇּל־הַ֝מְיַחֲלִ֗ים לַֽיהֹוָֽה׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Of David. A . Happy is he whose transgression is forgiven, whose sin is covered over.
verses.text_he: לְדָוִ֗ד מַ֫שְׂכִּ֥יל אַשְׁרֵ֥י נְֽשׂוּי־פֶּ֗שַׁע כְּס֣וּי חֲטָאָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Happy the man whom the LORD does not hold guilty, and in whose spirit there is no deceit.
verses.text_he: אַ֥שְֽׁרֵי־אָדָ֗ם לֹ֤א יַחְשֹׁ֬ב יְהֹוָ֣ה ל֣וֹ עָוֺ֑ן וְאֵ֖ין בְּרוּח֣וֹ רְמִיָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: As long as I said nothing, my limbs wasted away from my anguished roaring all day long.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־הֶ֭חֱרַשְׁתִּי בָּל֣וּ עֲצָמָ֑י בְּ֝שַׁאֲגָתִ֗י כׇּל־הַיּֽוֹם׃

verses.text_en: For night and day Your hand lay heavy on me; my vigor waned as in the summer drought. .
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י׀ יוֹמָ֣ם וָלַיְלָה֮ תִּכְבַּ֥ד עָלַ֗י יָ֫דֶ֥ךָ נֶהְפַּ֥ךְ לְשַׁדִּ֑י בְּחַרְבֹ֖נֵי קַ֣יִץ סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Then I acknowledged my sin to You; I did not cover up my guilt; I resolved, “I will confess my transgressions to the LORD,” and You forgave the guilt of my sin. .
verses.text_he: חַטָּאתִ֨י אוֹדִ֪יעֲךָ֡ וַעֲ֘וֺנִ֤י לֹֽא־כִסִּ֗יתִי אָמַ֗רְתִּי אוֹדֶ֤ה עֲלֵ֣י פְ֭שָׁעַי לַיהֹוָ֑ה וְאַתָּ֨ה נָ֘שָׂ֤אתָ עֲוֺ֖ן חַטָּאתִ֣י סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Therefore let every faithful man pray to You upon discovering [his sin], that the rushing mighty waters not overtake him.
verses.text_he: עַל־זֹ֡את יִתְפַּלֵּ֬ל כׇּל־חָסִ֨יד׀ אֵלֶיךָ֮ לְעֵ֢ת מְ֫צֹ֥א רַ֗ק לְ֭שֵׁטֶף מַ֣יִם רַבִּ֑ים אֵ֝לָ֗יו לֹ֣א יַגִּֽיעוּ׃

verses.text_en: You are my shelter; You preserve me from distress; You surround me with the joyous shouts of deliverance. .
verses.text_he: אַתָּ֤ה׀ סֵ֥תֶר לִי֮ מִצַּ֢ר תִּ֫צְּרֵ֥נִי רׇנֵּ֥י פַלֵּ֑ט תְּס֖וֹבְבֵ֣נִי סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Let me enlighten you and show you which way to go; let me offer counsel; my eye is on you.
verses.text_he: אַשְׂכִּֽילְךָ֨׀ וְֽאוֹרְךָ֗ בְּדֶֽרֶךְ־ז֥וּ תֵלֵ֑ךְ אִיעֲצָ֖ה עָלֶ֣יךָ עֵינִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Be not like a senseless horse or mule whose movement must be curbed by bit and bridle; far be it from you!
verses.text_he: אַל־תִּהְי֤וּ׀ כְּס֥וּס כְּפֶרֶד֮ אֵ֤ין הָ֫בִ֥ין בְּמֶתֶג־וָרֶ֣סֶן עֶדְי֣וֹ לִבְל֑וֹם בַּ֝֗ל קְרֹ֣ב אֵלֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Many are the torments of the wicked, but he who trusts in the LORD shall be surrounded with favor.
verses.text_he: רַבִּ֥ים מַכְאוֹבִ֗ים לָ֫רָשָׁ֥ע וְהַבּוֹטֵ֥חַ בַּֽיהֹוָ֑ה חֶ֝֗סֶד יְסוֹבְבֶֽנּוּ׃

verses.text_en: Rejoice in the LORD and exult, O you righteous; shout for joy, all upright men!
verses.text_he: שִׂמְח֬וּ בַיהֹוָ֣ה וְ֭גִילוּ צַדִּיקִ֑ים וְ֝הַרְנִ֗ינוּ כׇּל־יִשְׁרֵי־לֵֽב׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Sing forth, O you righteous, to the LORD; it is fit that the upright acclaim Him.
verses.text_he: רַנְּנ֣וּ צַ֭דִּיקִים בַּֽיהֹוָ֑ה לַ֝יְשָׁרִ֗ים נָאוָ֥ה תְהִלָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: Praise the LORD with the lyre; with the ten-stringed harp sing to Him;
verses.text_he: הוֹד֣וּ לַיהֹוָ֣ה בְּכִנּ֑וֹר בְּנֵ֥בֶל עָ֝שׂ֗וֹר זַמְּרוּ־לֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: sing Him a new song; play sweetly with shouts of joy.
verses.text_he: שִֽׁירוּ־ל֭וֹ שִׁ֣יר חָדָ֑שׁ הֵיטִ֥יבוּ נַ֝גֵּ֗ן בִּתְרוּעָֽה׃

verses.text_en: For the word of the LORD is right; His every deed is faithful.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־יָשָׁ֥ר דְּבַר־יְהֹוָ֑ה וְכׇל־מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗הוּ בֶּאֱמוּנָֽה׃

verses.text_en: He loves what is right and just; the earth is full of the LORD’s faithful care.
verses.text_he: אֹ֭הֵב צְדָקָ֣ה וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט חֶ֥סֶד יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה מָלְאָ֥ה הָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: By the word of the LORD the heavens were made, by the breath of His mouth, all their host.
verses.text_he: בִּדְבַ֣ר יְ֭הֹוָה שָׁמַ֣יִם נַעֲשׂ֑וּ וּבְר֥וּחַ פִּ֝֗יו כׇּל־צְבָאָֽם׃

verses.text_en: He heaps up the ocean waters like a mound, stores the deep in vaults.
verses.text_he: כֹּנֵ֣ס כַּ֭נֵּד מֵ֣י הַיָּ֑ם נֹתֵ֖ן בְּאוֹצָר֣וֹת תְּהוֹמֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: Let all the earth fear the LORD; let all the inhabitants of the world dread Him.
verses.text_he: יִֽירְא֣וּ מֵ֭יְהֹוָה כׇּל־הָאָ֑רֶץ מִמֶּ֥נּוּ יָ֝ג֗וּרוּ כׇּל־יֹשְׁבֵ֥י תֵבֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: For He spoke, and it was; He commanded, and it endured.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י ה֣וּא אָמַ֣ר וַיֶּ֑הִי הֽוּא־צִ֝וָּ֗ה וַֽיַּעֲמֹֽד׃

verses.text_en: The LORD frustrates the plans of nations, brings to naught the designs of peoples.
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה הֵפִ֥יר עֲצַת־גּוֹיִ֑ם הֵ֝נִ֗יא מַחְשְׁב֥וֹת עַמִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: What the LORD plans endures forever, what He designs, for ages on end.
verses.text_he: עֲצַ֣ת יְ֭הֹוָה לְעוֹלָ֣ם תַּעֲמֹ֑ד מַחְשְׁב֥וֹת לִ֝בּ֗וֹ לְדֹ֣ר וָדֹֽר׃

verses.text_en: Happy the nation whose God is the LORD, the people He has chosen to be His own.
verses.text_he: אַשְׁרֵ֣י הַ֭גּוֹי אֲשֶׁר־יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהָ֑יו הָעָ֓ם׀ בָּחַ֖ר לְנַחֲלָ֣ה לֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: The LORD looks down from heaven; He sees all mankind.
verses.text_he: מִ֭שָּׁמַיִם הִבִּ֣יט יְהֹוָ֑ה רָ֝אָ֗ה אֶֽת־כׇּל־בְּנֵ֥י הָאָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: From His dwelling-place He gazes on all the inhabitants of the earth—
verses.text_he: מִֽמְּכוֹן־שִׁבְתּ֥וֹ הִשְׁגִּ֑יחַ אֶ֖ל כׇּל־יֹשְׁבֵ֣י הָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: He who fashions the hearts of them all, who discerns all their doings.
verses.text_he: הַיֹּצֵ֣ר יַ֣חַד לִבָּ֑ם הַ֝מֵּבִ֗ין אֶל־כׇּל־מַעֲשֵׂיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: Kings are not delivered by a large force; warriors are not saved by great strength;
verses.text_he: אֵֽין־הַ֭מֶּלֶךְ נוֹשָׁ֣ע בְּרׇב־חָ֑יִל גִּ֝בּ֗וֹר לֹא־יִנָּצֵ֥ל בְּרׇב־כֹּֽחַ׃

verses.text_en: horses are a false hope for deliverance; for all their great power they provide no escape.
verses.text_he: שֶׁ֣קֶר הַ֭סּוּס לִתְשׁוּעָ֑ה וּבְרֹ֥ב חֵ֝יל֗וֹ לֹ֣א יְמַלֵּֽט׃

verses.text_en: Truly the eye of the LORD is on those who fear Him, who wait for His faithful care
verses.text_he: הִנֵּ֤ה עֵ֣ין יְ֭הֹוָה אֶל־יְרֵאָ֑יו לַֽמְיַחֲלִ֥ים לְחַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: to save them from death, to sustain them in famine.
verses.text_he: לְהַצִּ֣יל מִמָּ֣וֶת נַפְשָׁ֑ם וּ֝לְחַיּוֹתָ֗ם בָּרָעָֽב׃

verses.text_en: We set our hope on the LORD, He is our help and shield;
verses.text_he: נַ֭פְשֵׁנוּ חִכְּתָ֣ה לַֽיהֹוָ֑ה עֶזְרֵ֖נוּ וּמָגִנֵּ֣נוּ הֽוּא׃

verses.text_en: in Him our hearts rejoice, for in His holy name we trust.
verses.text_he: כִּי־ב֭וֹ יִשְׂמַ֣ח לִבֵּ֑נוּ כִּ֤י בְשֵׁ֖ם קׇדְשׁ֣וֹ בָטָֽחְנוּ׃

verses.text_en: May we enjoy, O LORD, Your faithful care, as we have put our hope in You.
verses.text_he: יְהִי־חַסְדְּךָ֣ יְהֹוָ֣ה עָלֵ֑ינוּ כַּ֝אֲשֶׁ֗ר יִחַ֥לְנוּ לָֽךְ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Of David, when he feigned madness in the presence of Abimelech, who turned him out, and he left.
verses.text_he: לְדָוִ֗ד בְּשַׁנּוֹת֣וֹ אֶת־טַ֭עְמוֹ לִפְנֵ֣י אֲבִימֶ֑לֶךְ וַ֝יְגָרְשֵׁ֗הוּ וַיֵּלַֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: I bless the LORD at all times; praise of Him is ever in my mouth.
verses.text_he: אֲבָרְכָ֣ה אֶת־יְהֹוָ֣ה בְּכׇל־עֵ֑ת תָּ֝מִ֗יד תְּֽהִלָּת֥וֹ בְּפִֽי׃

verses.text_en: I glory in the LORD; let the lowly hear it and rejoice.
verses.text_he: בַּ֭יהֹוָה תִּתְהַלֵּ֣ל נַפְשִׁ֑י יִשְׁמְע֖וּ עֲנָוִ֣ים וְיִשְׂמָֽחוּ׃

verses.text_en: Exalt the LORD with me; let us extol His name together.
verses.text_he: גַּדְּל֣וּ לַיהֹוָ֣ה אִתִּ֑י וּנְרוֹמְמָ֖ה שְׁמ֣וֹ יַחְדָּֽו׃

verses.text_en: I turned to the LORD, and He answered me; He saved me from all my terrors.
verses.text_he: דָּרַ֣שְׁתִּי אֶת־יְהֹוָ֣ה וְעָנָ֑נִי וּמִכׇּל־מְ֝גוּרוֹתַ֗י הִצִּילָֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Men look to Him and are radiant; let their faces not be downcast.
verses.text_he: הִבִּ֣יטוּ אֵלָ֣יו וְנָהָ֑רוּ וּ֝פְנֵיהֶ֗ם אַל־יֶחְפָּֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: Here was a lowly man who called, and the LORD listened, and delivered him from all his troubles.
verses.text_he: זֶ֤ה עָנִ֣י קָ֭רָא וַיהֹוָ֣ה שָׁמֵ֑עַ וּמִכׇּל־צָ֝רוֹתָ֗יו הוֹשִׁיעֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: The angel of the LORD camps around those who fear Him and rescues them.
verses.text_he: חֹנֶ֤ה מַלְאַךְ־יְהֹוָ֓ה סָ֘בִ֤יב לִירֵאָ֗יו וַֽיְחַלְּצֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: Taste and see how good the LORD is; happy the man who takes refuge in Him!
verses.text_he: טַעֲמ֣וּ וּ֭רְאוּ כִּֽי־ט֣וֹב יְהֹוָ֑ה אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י הַ֝גֶּ֗בֶר יֶחֱסֶה־בּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Fear the LORD, you His consecrated ones, for those who fear Him lack nothing.
verses.text_he: יְר֣אוּ אֶת־יְהֹוָ֣ה קְדֹשָׁ֑יו כִּי־אֵ֥ין מַ֝חְס֗וֹר לִירֵאָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: Lions have been reduced to starvation, but those who turn to the LORD shall not lack any good.
verses.text_he: כְּ֭פִירִים רָשׁ֣וּ וְרָעֵ֑בוּ וְדֹרְשֵׁ֥י יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה לֹא־יַחְסְר֥וּ כׇל־טֽוֹב׃

verses.text_en: Come, my sons, listen to me; I will teach you what it is to fear the LORD.
verses.text_he: לְֽכוּ־בָ֭נִים שִׁמְעוּ־לִ֑י יִֽרְאַ֥ת יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה אֲלַמֶּדְכֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: Who is the man who is eager for life, who desires years of good fortune?
verses.text_he: מִֽי־הָ֭אִישׁ הֶחָפֵ֣ץ חַיִּ֑ים אֹהֵ֥ב יָ֝מִ֗ים לִרְא֥וֹת טֽוֹב׃

verses.text_en: Guard your tongue from evil, your lips from deceitful speech.
verses.text_he: נְצֹ֣ר לְשׁוֹנְךָ֣ מֵרָ֑ע וּ֝שְׂפָתֶ֗יךָ מִדַּבֵּ֥ר מִרְמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Shun evil and do good, seek amity and pursue it.
verses.text_he: ס֣וּר מֵ֭רָע וַעֲשֵׂה־ט֑וֹב בַּקֵּ֖שׁ שָׁל֣וֹם וְרׇדְפֵֽהוּ׃

verses.text_en: The eyes of the LORD are on the righteous, His ears attentive to their cry.
verses.text_he: עֵינֵ֣י יְ֭הֹוָה אֶל־צַדִּיקִ֑ים וְ֝אׇזְנָ֗יו אֶל־שַׁוְעָתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: The face of the LORD is set against evildoers, to erase their names from the earth.
verses.text_he: פְּנֵ֣י יְ֭הֹוָה בְּעֹ֣שֵׂי רָ֑ע לְהַכְרִ֖ית מֵאֶ֣רֶץ זִכְרָֽם׃

verses.text_en: They cry out, and the LORD hears, and saves them from all their troubles.
verses.text_he: צָ֭עֲקוּ וַיהֹוָ֣ה שָׁמֵ֑עַ וּמִכׇּל־צָ֝רוֹתָ֗ם הִצִּילָֽם׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is close to the brokenhearted; those crushed in spirit He delivers.
verses.text_he: קָר֣וֹב יְ֭הֹוָה לְנִשְׁבְּרֵי־לֵ֑ב וְֽאֶת־דַּכְּאֵי־ר֥וּחַ יוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃

verses.text_en: Though the misfortunes of the righteous be many, the LORD will save him from them all,
verses.text_he: רַ֭בּוֹת רָע֣וֹת צַדִּ֑יק וּ֝מִכֻּלָּ֗ם יַצִּילֶ֥נּוּ יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Keeping all his bones intact, not one of them being broken.
verses.text_he: שֹׁמֵ֥ר כׇּל־עַצְמוֹתָ֑יו אַחַ֥ת מֵ֝הֵ֗נָּה לֹ֣א נִשְׁבָּֽרָה׃

verses.text_en: One misfortune is the deathblow of the wicked; the foes of the righteous shall be ruined.
verses.text_he: תְּמוֹתֵ֣ת רָשָׁ֣ע רָעָ֑ה וְשֹׂנְאֵ֖י צַדִּ֣יק יֶאְשָֽׁמוּ׃

verses.text_en: The LORD redeems the life of His servants; all who take refuge in Him shall not be ruined.
verses.text_he: פֹּדֶ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה נֶ֣פֶשׁ עֲבָדָ֑יו וְלֹ֥א יֶ֝אְשְׁמ֗וּ כׇּֽל־הַחֹסִ֥ים בּֽוֹ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Of David. O LORD, strive with my adversaries, give battle to my foes,
verses.text_he: לְדָוִ֨ד׀ רִיבָ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה אֶת־יְרִיבַ֑י לְ֝חַ֗ם אֶת־לֹחֲמָֽי׃

verses.text_en: take up shield and buckler, and come to my defense;
verses.text_he: הַחֲזֵ֣ק מָגֵ֣ן וְצִנָּ֑ה וְ֝ק֗וּמָה בְּעֶזְרָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: ready the spear and javelin against my pursuers; tell me, “I am your deliverance.”
verses.text_he: וְהָ֘רֵ֤ק חֲנִ֣ית וּ֭סְגֹר לִקְרַ֣את רֹדְפָ֑י אֱמֹ֥ר לְ֝נַפְשִׁ֗י יְֽשֻׁעָתֵ֥ךְ אָֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Let those who seek my life be frustrated and put to shame; let those who plan to harm me fall back in disgrace.
verses.text_he: יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ וְיִכָּלְמוּ֮ מְבַקְשֵׁ֢י נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י יִסֹּ֣גוּ אָח֣וֹר וְיַחְפְּר֑וּ חֹ֝שְׁבֵ֗י רָעָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Let them be as chaff in the wind, the LORD’s angel driving them on.
verses.text_he: יִֽהְי֗וּ כְּמֹ֥ץ לִפְנֵי־ר֑וּחַ וּמַלְאַ֖ךְ יְהֹוָ֣ה דּוֹחֶֽה׃

verses.text_en: Let their path be dark and slippery, with the LORD’s angel in pursuit.
verses.text_he: יְֽהִי־דַרְכָּ֗ם חֹ֥שֶׁךְ וַחֲלַקְלַקֹּ֑ת וּמַלְאַ֥ךְ יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה רֹדְפָֽם׃

verses.text_en: For without cause they hid a net to trap me; without cause they dug a pit for me.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־חִנָּ֣ם טָֽמְנוּ־לִ֭י שַׁ֣חַת רִשְׁתָּ֑ם חִ֝נָּ֗ם חָפְר֥וּ לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: Let disaster overtake them unawares; let the net they hid catch them; let them fall into it when disaster [strikes].
verses.text_he: תְּבוֹאֵ֣הוּ שׁוֹאָה֮ לֹֽא־יֵ֫דָ֥ע וְרִשְׁתּ֣וֹ אֲשֶׁר־טָמַ֣ן תִּלְכְּד֑וֹ בְּ֝שׁוֹאָ֗ה יִפׇּל־בָּֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: Then shall I exult in the LORD, rejoice in His deliverance.
verses.text_he: וְ֭נַפְשִׁי תָּגִ֣יל בַּיהֹוָ֑ה תָּ֝שִׂ֗ישׂ בִּישׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: All my bones shall say, “LORD, who is like You? You save the poor from one stronger than he, the poor and needy from his despoiler.”
verses.text_he: כׇּ֥ל־עַצְמוֹתַ֨י׀ תֹּאמַרְנָה֮ יְהֹוָ֗ה מִ֥י־כָ֫מ֥וֹךָ מַצִּ֣יל עָ֭נִי מֵחָזָ֣ק מִמֶּ֑נּוּ וְעָנִ֥י וְ֝אֶבְי֗וֹן מִגֹּֽזְלֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Malicious witnesses appear who question me about things I do not know.
verses.text_he: יְ֭קוּמוּן עֵדֵ֣י חָמָ֑ס אֲשֶׁ֥ר לֹֽא־יָ֝דַ֗עְתִּי יִשְׁאָלֽוּנִי׃

verses.text_en: They repay me evil for good, [seeking] my bereavement.
verses.text_he: יְשַׁלְּמ֣וּנִי רָ֭עָה תַּ֥חַת טוֹבָ֗ה שְׁכ֣וֹל לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: Yet, when they were ill, my dress was sackcloth, I kept a fast— may what I prayed for happen to me!
verses.text_he: וַאֲנִ֤י׀ בַּחֲלוֹתָ֡ם לְב֬וּשִׁי שָׂ֗ק עִנֵּ֣יתִי בַצּ֣וֹם נַפְשִׁ֑י וּ֝תְפִלָּתִ֗י עַל־חֵיקִ֥י תָשֽׁוּב׃

verses.text_en: I walked about as though it were my friend or my brother; I was bowed with gloom, like one mourning for his mother.
verses.text_he: כְּרֵעַ־כְּאָ֣ח לִ֭י הִתְהַלָּ֑כְתִּי כַּאֲבֶל־אֵ֝֗ם קֹדֵ֥ר שַׁחֽוֹתִי׃

verses.text_en: But when I stumble, they gleefully gather; wretches gather against me, I know not why; they tear at me without end.
verses.text_he: וּבְצַלְעִי֮ שָׂמְח֢וּ וְֽנֶ֫אֱסָ֥פוּ נֶאֶסְפ֬וּ עָלַ֣י נֵ֭כִים וְלֹ֣א יָדַ֑עְתִּי קָרְע֥וּ וְלֹא־דָֽמּוּ׃

verses.text_en: With impious, mocking grimace they gnash their teeth at me.
verses.text_he: בְּ֭חַנְפֵי לַעֲגֵ֣י מָע֑וֹג חָרֹ֖ק עָלַ֣י שִׁנֵּֽימוֹ׃

verses.text_en: O Lord, how long will You look on? Rescue me from their attacks, my precious life, from the lions,
verses.text_he: אֲדֹנָי֮ כַּמָּ֢ה תִ֫רְאֶ֥ה הָשִׁ֣יבָה נַ֭פְשִׁי מִשֹּׁאֵיהֶ֑ם מִ֝כְּפִירִ֗ים יְחִידָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: that I may praise You in a great congregation, acclaim You in a mighty throng.
verses.text_he: א֭וֹדְךָ בְּקָהָ֣ל רָ֑ב בְּעַ֖ם עָצ֣וּם אֲהַלְלֶֽךָּ׃

verses.text_en: Let not my treacherous enemies rejoice over me, or those who hate me without reason wink their eyes.
verses.text_he: אַֽל־יִשְׂמְחוּ־לִ֣י אֹיְבַ֣י שֶׁ֑קֶר שֹׂנְאַ֥י חִ֝נָּ֗ם יִקְרְצוּ־עָֽיִן׃

verses.text_en: For they do not offer amity, but devise fraudulent schemes against harmless folk.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י לֹ֥א שָׁל֗וֹם יְדַ֫בֵּ֥רוּ וְעַ֥ל רִגְעֵי־אֶ֑רֶץ דִּבְרֵ֥י מִ֝רְמ֗וֹת יַחֲשֹׁבֽוּן׃

verses.text_en: They open wide their mouths at me, saying, “Aha, aha, we have seen it!”
verses.text_he: וַיַּרְחִ֥יבוּ עָלַ֗י פִּ֫יהֶ֥ם אָ֭מְרוּ הֶאָ֣ח׀הֶאָ֑ח רָאֲתָ֥ה עֵינֵֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: You have seen it, O LORD; do not hold aloof! O Lord, be not far from me!
verses.text_he: רָאִ֣יתָה יְ֭הֹוָה אַֽל־תֶּחֱרַ֑שׁ אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י אַל־תִּרְחַ֥ק מִמֶּֽנִּי׃

verses.text_en: Wake, rouse Yourself for my cause, for my claim, O my God and my Lord!
verses.text_he: הָעִ֣ירָה וְ֭הָקִיצָה לְמִשְׁפָּטִ֑י אֱלֹהַ֖י וַאדֹנָ֣י לְרִיבִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Take up my cause, O LORD my God, as You are beneficent, and let them not rejoice over me.
verses.text_he: שׇׁפְטֵ֣נִי כְ֭צִדְקְךָ יְהֹוָ֥ה אֱלֹהָ֗י וְאַל־יִשְׂמְחוּ־לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Let them not think, “Aha, just what we wished!” Let them not say, “We have destroyed him!”
verses.text_he: אַל־יֹאמְר֣וּ בְ֭לִבָּם הֶאָ֣ח נַפְשֵׁ֑נוּ אַל־יֹ֝אמְר֗וּ בִּֽלַּעֲנֽוּהוּ׃

verses.text_en: May those who rejoice at my misfortune be frustrated and utterly disgraced; may those who vaunt themselves over me be clad in frustration and shame.
verses.text_he: יֵ֘בֹ֤שׁוּ וְיַחְפְּר֨וּ׀ יַחְדָּו֮ שְׂמֵחֵ֢י רָעָ֫תִ֥י יִֽלְבְּשׁוּ־בֹ֥שֶׁת וּכְלִמָּ֑ה הַֽמַּגְדִּילִ֥ים עָלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: May those who desire my vindication sing forth joyously; may they always say, “Extolled be the LORD who desires the well-being of His servant,”
verses.text_he: יָרֹ֣נּוּ וְיִשְׂמְחוּ֮ חֲפֵצֵ֢י צִ֫דְקִ֥י וְיֹאמְר֣וּ תָ֭מִיד יִגְדַּ֣ל יְהֹוָ֑ה הֶ֝חָפֵ֗ץ שְׁל֣וֹם עַבְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: while my tongue shall recite Your beneficent acts, Your praises all day long.
verses.text_he: וּ֭לְשׁוֹנִי תֶּהְגֶּ֣ה צִדְקֶ֑ךָ כׇּל־הַ֝יּ֗וֹם תְּהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. Of the servant of the LORD, of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ׀לְעֶבֶד־יְהֹוָ֬ה לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: I know what Transgression says to the wicked; he has no sense of the dread of God,
verses.text_he: נְאֻֽם־פֶּ֣שַׁע לָ֭רָשָׁע בְּקֶ֣רֶב לִבִּ֑י אֵֽין־פַּ֥חַד אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים לְנֶ֣גֶד עֵינָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: because its speech is seductive to him till his iniquity be found out and he be hated.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־הֶחֱלִ֣יק אֵלָ֣יו בְּעֵינָ֑יו לִמְצֹ֖א עֲוֺנ֣וֹ לִשְׂנֹֽא׃

verses.text_en: His words are evil and deceitful; he will not consider doing good.
verses.text_he: דִּבְרֵי־פִ֭יו אָ֣וֶן וּמִרְמָ֑ה חָדַ֖ל לְהַשְׂכִּ֣יל לְהֵיטִֽיב׃

verses.text_en: In bed he plots mischief; he is set on a path of no good, he does not reject evil.
verses.text_he: אָ֤וֶן׀ יַחְשֹׁ֗ב עַֽל־מִשְׁכָּ֫ב֥וֹ יִ֭תְיַצֵּב עַל־דֶּ֣רֶךְ לֹא־ט֑וֹב רָ֝֗ע לֹ֣א יִמְאָֽס׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, Your faithfulness reaches to heaven; Your steadfastness to the sky;
verses.text_he: יְ֭הֹוָה בְּהַשָּׁמַ֣יִם חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ אֱ֝מ֥וּנָתְךָ֗ עַד־שְׁחָקִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Your beneficence is like the high mountains; Your justice like the great deep; man and beast You deliver, O LORD.
verses.text_he: צִדְקָתְךָ֨׀ כְּֽהַרְרֵי־אֵ֗ל מִ֭שְׁפָּטֶיךָ תְּה֣וֹם רַבָּ֑ה אָ֤דָֽם־וּבְהֵמָ֖ה תוֹשִׁ֣יעַ יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: How precious is Your faithful care, O God! Mankind shelters in the shadow of Your wings.
verses.text_he: מַה־יָּקָ֥ר חַסְדְּךָ֗ אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים וּבְנֵ֥י אָדָ֑ם בְּצֵ֥ל כְּ֝נָפֶ֗יךָ יֶחֱסָיֽוּן׃

verses.text_en: They feast on the rich fare of Your house; You let them drink at Your refreshing stream.
verses.text_he: יִ֭רְוְיֻן מִדֶּ֣שֶׁן בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ וְנַ֖חַל עֲדָנֶ֣יךָ תַשְׁקֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: With You is the fountain of life; by Your light do we see light.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־עִ֭מְּךָ מְק֣וֹר חַיִּ֑ים בְּ֝אוֹרְךָ֗ נִרְאֶה־אֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: Bestow Your faithful care on those devoted to You, and Your beneficence on upright men.
verses.text_he: מְשֹׁ֣ךְ חַ֭סְדְּךָ לְיֹדְעֶ֑יךָ וְ֝צִדְקָתְךָ֗ לְיִשְׁרֵי־לֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: Let not the foot of the arrogant tread on me, or the hand of the wicked drive me away.
verses.text_he: אַל־תְּ֭בוֹאֵנִי רֶ֣גֶל גַּאֲוָ֑ה וְיַד־רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים אַל־תְּנִדֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: There lie the evildoers, fallen, thrust down, unable to rise.
verses.text_he: שָׁ֣ם נָ֭פְלוּ פֹּ֣עֲלֵי אָ֑וֶן דֹּ֝ח֗וּ וְלֹא־יָ֥כְלוּ קֽוּם׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Of David. Do not be vexed by evil men; do not be incensed by wrongdoers;
verses.text_he: לְדָוִ֨ד׀ אַל־תִּתְחַ֥ר בַּמְּרֵעִ֑ים אַל־תְּ֝קַנֵּ֗א בְּעֹשֵׂ֥י עַוְלָֽה׃

verses.text_en: for they soon wither like grass, like verdure fade away.
verses.text_he: כִּ֣י כֶ֭חָצִיר מְהֵרָ֣ה יִמָּ֑לוּ וּכְיֶ֥רֶק דֶּ֝֗שֶׁא יִבּוֹלֽוּן׃

verses.text_en: Trust in the LORD and do good, abide in the land and remain loyal.
verses.text_he: בְּטַ֣ח בַּ֭יהֹוָה וַעֲשֵׂה־ט֑וֹב שְׁכׇן־אֶ֝֗רֶץ וּרְעֵ֥ה אֱמוּנָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Seek the favor of the LORD, and He will grant you the desires of your heart.
verses.text_he: וְהִתְעַנַּ֥ג עַל־יְהֹוָ֑ה וְיִֽתֶּן־לְ֝ךָ֗ מִשְׁאֲלֹ֥ת לִבֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Leave all to the LORD; trust in Him; He will do it.
verses.text_he: גּ֣וֹל עַל־יְהֹוָ֣ה דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ וּבְטַ֥ח עָ֝לָ֗יו וְה֣וּא יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃

verses.text_en: He will cause your vindication to shine forth like the light, the justice of your case, like the noonday sun.
verses.text_he: וְהוֹצִ֣יא כָא֣וֹר צִדְקֶ֑ךָ וּ֝מִשְׁפָּטֶ֗ךָ כַּֽצׇּהֳרָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: Be patient and wait for the LORD, do not be vexed by the prospering man who carries out his schemes.
verses.text_he: דּ֤וֹם׀ לַיהֹוָה֮ וְהִתְח֢וֹלֵֽ֫ל ל֥וֹ אַל־תִּ֭תְחַר בְּמַצְלִ֣יחַ דַּרְכּ֑וֹ בְּ֝אִ֗ישׁ עֹשֶׂ֥ה מְזִמּֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: Give up anger, abandon fury, do not be vexed; it can only do harm.
verses.text_he: הֶ֣רֶף מֵ֭אַף וַעֲזֹ֣ב חֵמָ֑ה אַל־תִּ֝תְחַ֗ר אַךְ־לְהָרֵֽעַ׃

verses.text_en: For evil men will be cut off, but those who look to the LORD— they shall inherit the land.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־מְ֭רֵעִים יִכָּרֵת֑וּן וְקֹוֵ֥י יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה הֵ֣מָּה יִֽירְשׁוּ־אָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: A little longer and there will be no wicked man; you will look at where he was— he will be gone.
verses.text_he: וְע֣וֹד מְ֭עַט וְאֵ֣ין רָשָׁ֑ע וְהִתְבּוֹנַ֖נְתָּ עַל־מְקוֹמ֣וֹ וְאֵינֶֽנּוּ׃

verses.text_en: But the lowly shall inherit the land, and delight in abundant well-being.
verses.text_he: וַעֲנָוִ֥ים יִֽירְשׁוּ־אָ֑רֶץ וְ֝הִֽתְעַנְּג֗וּ עַל־רֹ֥ב שָׁלֽוֹם׃

verses.text_en: The wicked man schemes against the righteous, and gnashes his teeth at him.
verses.text_he: זֹמֵ֣ם רָ֭שָׁע לַצַּדִּ֑יק וְחֹרֵ֖ק עָלָ֣יו שִׁנָּֽיו׃

verses.text_en: The Lord laughs at him, for He knows that his day will come.
verses.text_he: אֲדֹנָ֥י יִשְׂחַק־ל֑וֹ כִּי־רָ֝אָ֗ה כִּֽי־יָבֹ֥א יוֹמֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: The wicked draw their swords, bend their bows, to bring down the lowly and needy, to slaughter upright men.
verses.text_he: חֶ֤רֶב׀ פָּ֥תְח֣וּ רְשָׁעִים֮ וְדָרְכ֢וּ קַ֫שְׁתָּ֥ם לְ֭הַפִּיל עָנִ֣י וְאֶבְי֑וֹן לִ֝טְב֗וֹחַ יִשְׁרֵי־דָֽרֶךְ׃

verses.text_en: Their swords shall pierce their own hearts, and their bows shall be broken.
verses.text_he: חַ֭רְבָּם תָּב֣וֹא בְלִבָּ֑ם וְ֝קַשְּׁתוֹתָ֗ם תִּשָּׁבַֽרְנָה׃

verses.text_en: Better the little that the righteous man has than the great abundance of the wicked.
verses.text_he: טוֹב־מְ֭עַט לַצַּדִּ֑יק מֵ֝הֲמ֗וֹן רְשָׁעִ֥ים רַבִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: For the arms of the wicked shall be broken, but the LORD is the support of the righteous.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י זְרוֹע֣וֹת רְ֭שָׁעִים תִּשָּׁבַ֑רְנָה וְסוֹמֵ֖ךְ צַדִּיקִ֣ים יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is concerned for the needs of the blameless; their portion lasts forever;
verses.text_he: יוֹדֵ֣עַ יְ֭הֹוָה יְמֵ֣י תְמִימִ֑ם וְ֝נַחֲלָתָ֗ם לְעוֹלָ֥ם תִּהְיֶֽה׃

verses.text_en: they shall not come to grief in bad times; in famine, they shall eat their fill.
verses.text_he: לֹֽא־יֵ֭בֹשׁוּ בְּעֵ֣ת רָעָ֑ה וּבִימֵ֖י רְעָב֣וֹן יִשְׂבָּֽעוּ׃

verses.text_en: But the wicked shall perish, and the enemies of the LORD shall be consumed, like meadow grass consumed in smoke.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י רְשָׁעִ֨ים׀ יֹאבֵ֗דוּ וְאֹיְבֵ֣י יְ֭הֹוָה כִּיקַ֣ר כָּרִ֑ים כָּל֖וּ בֶעָשָׁ֣ן כָּֽלוּ׃

verses.text_en: The wicked man borrows and does not repay; the righteous is generous and keeps giving.
verses.text_he: לֹוֶ֣ה רָ֭שָׁע וְלֹ֣א יְשַׁלֵּ֑ם וְ֝צַדִּ֗יק חוֹנֵ֥ן וְנוֹתֵֽן׃

verses.text_en: Those blessed by Him shall inherit the land, but those cursed by Him shall be cut off.
verses.text_he: כִּ֣י מְ֭בֹרָכָיו יִ֣ירְשׁוּ אָ֑רֶץ וּ֝מְקֻלָּלָ֗יו יִכָּרֵֽתוּ׃

verses.text_en: The steps of a man are made firm by the LORD, when He delights in his way.
verses.text_he: מֵ֭יְהֹוָה מִֽצְעֲדֵי־גֶ֥בֶר כּוֹנָ֗נוּ וְדַרְכּ֥וֹ יֶחְפָּֽץ׃

verses.text_en: Though he stumbles, he does not fall down, for the LORD gives him support.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־יִפֹּ֥ל לֹֽא־יוּטָ֑ל כִּֽי־יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה סוֹמֵ֥ךְ יָדֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: I have been young and am now old, but I have never seen a righteous man abandoned, or his children seeking bread.
verses.text_he: נַ֤עַר׀ הָיִ֗יתִי גַּם־זָ֫קַ֥נְתִּי וְֽלֹא־רָ֭אִיתִי צַדִּ֣יק נֶעֱזָ֑ב וְ֝זַרְע֗וֹ מְבַקֶּשׁ־לָֽחֶם׃

verses.text_en: He is always generous, and lends, and his children are held blessed.
verses.text_he: כׇּל־הַ֭יּוֹם חוֹנֵ֣ן וּמַלְוֶ֑ה וְ֝זַרְע֗וֹ לִבְרָכָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Shun evil and do good, and you shall abide forever.
verses.text_he: ס֣וּר מֵ֭רָע וַעֲשֵׂה־ט֗וֹב וּשְׁכֹ֥ן לְעוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: For the LORD loves what is right, He does not abandon His faithful ones. They are preserved forever, while the children of the wicked will be cut off.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ אֹ֘הֵ֤ב מִשְׁפָּ֗ט וְלֹא־יַעֲזֹ֣ב אֶת־חֲ֭סִידָיו לְעוֹלָ֣ם נִשְׁמָ֑רוּ וְזֶ֖רַע רְשָׁעִ֣ים נִכְרָֽת׃

verses.text_en: The righteous shall inherit the land, and abide forever in it.
verses.text_he: צַדִּיקִ֥ים יִֽירְשׁוּ־אָ֑רֶץ וְיִשְׁכְּנ֖וּ לָעַ֣ד עָלֶֽיהָ׃

verses.text_en: The mouth of the righteous utters wisdom, and his tongue speaks what is right.
verses.text_he: פִּֽי־צַ֭דִּיק יֶהְגֶּ֣ה חׇכְמָ֑ה וּ֝לְשׁוֹנ֗וֹ תְּדַבֵּ֥ר מִשְׁפָּֽט׃

verses.text_en: The teaching of his God is in his heart; his feet do not slip.
verses.text_he: תּוֹרַ֣ת אֱלֹהָ֣יו בְּלִבּ֑וֹ לֹ֖א תִמְעַ֣ד אֲשֻׁרָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: The wicked watches for the righteous, seeking to put him to death;
verses.text_he: צוֹפֶ֣ה רָ֭שָׁע לַצַּדִּ֑יק וּ֝מְבַקֵּ֗שׁ לַהֲמִיתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: the LORD will not abandon him to his power; He will not let him be condemned in judgment.
verses.text_he: יְ֭הֹוָה לֹא־יַעַזְבֶ֣נּוּ בְיָד֑וֹ וְלֹ֥א יַ֝רְשִׁיעֶ֗נּוּ בְּהִשָּׁפְטֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Look to the LORD and keep to His way, and He will raise you high that you may inherit the land; when the wicked are cut off, you shall see it.
verses.text_he: קַוֵּ֤ה אֶל־יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ וּשְׁמֹ֬ר דַּרְכּ֗וֹ וִֽ֭ירוֹמִמְךָ לָרֶ֣שֶׁת אָ֑רֶץ בְּהִכָּרֵ֖ת רְשָׁעִ֣ים תִּרְאֶֽה׃

verses.text_en: I saw a wicked man, powerful, well-rooted like a robust native tree.
verses.text_he: רָ֭אִיתִי רָשָׁ֣ע עָרִ֑יץ וּ֝מִתְעָרֶ֗ה כְּאֶזְרָ֥ח רַעֲנָֽן׃

verses.text_en: Suddenly he vanished and was gone; I sought him, but he was not to be found.
verses.text_he: וַֽ֭יַּעֲבֹר וְהִנֵּ֣ה אֵינֶ֑נּוּ וָ֝אֲבַקְשֵׁ֗הוּ וְלֹ֣א נִמְצָֽא׃

verses.text_en: Mark the blameless, note the upright, for there is a future for the man of integrity.
verses.text_he: שְׁמׇר־תָּ֭ם וּרְאֵ֣ה יָשָׁ֑ר כִּֽי־אַחֲרִ֖ית לְאִ֣ישׁ שָׁלֽוֹם׃

verses.text_en: But transgressors shall be utterly destroyed, the future of the wicked shall be cut off.
verses.text_he: וּֽ֭פֹשְׁעִים נִשְׁמְד֣וּ יַחְדָּ֑ו אַחֲרִ֖ית רְשָׁעִ֣ים נִכְרָֽתָה׃

verses.text_en: The deliverance of the righteous comes from the LORD, their stronghold in time of trouble.
verses.text_he: וּתְשׁוּעַ֣ת צַ֭דִּיקִים מֵיְהֹוָ֑ה מָ֝עוּזָּ֗ם בְּעֵ֣ת צָרָֽה׃

verses.text_en: The LORD helps them and rescues them, rescues them from the wicked and delivers them, for they seek refuge in Him.
verses.text_he: וַ֥יַּעְזְרֵ֥ם יְהֹוָ֗ה וַֽיְפַ֫לְּטֵ֥ם יְפַלְּטֵ֣ם מֵ֭רְשָׁעִים וְיוֹשִׁיעֵ֑ם כִּי־חָ֥סוּ בֽוֹ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A psalm of David. .
verses.text_he: מִזְמ֖וֹר לְדָוִ֣ד לְהַזְכִּֽיר׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, do not punish me in wrath; do not chastise me in fury.
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה אַל־בְּקֶצְפְּךָ֥ תוֹכִיחֵ֑נִי וּֽבַחֲמָתְךָ֥ תְיַסְּרֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: For Your arrows have struck me; Your blows have fallen upon me.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־חִ֭צֶּיךָ נִ֣חֲתוּ בִ֑י וַתִּנְחַ֖ת עָלַ֣י יָדֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: There is no soundness in my flesh because of Your rage, no wholeness in my bones because of my sin.
verses.text_he: אֵין־מְתֹ֣ם בִּ֭בְשָׂרִי מִפְּנֵ֣י זַעְמֶ֑ךָ אֵין־שָׁל֥וֹם בַּ֝עֲצָמַ֗י מִפְּנֵ֥י חַטָּאתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: For my iniquities have overwhelmed me; they are like a heavy burden, more than I can bear.
verses.text_he: כִּ֣י עֲ֭וֺנֹתַי עָבְר֣וּ רֹאשִׁ֑י כְּמַשָּׂ֥א כָ֝בֵ֗ד יִכְבְּד֥וּ מִמֶּֽנִּי׃

verses.text_en: My wounds stink and fester because of my folly.
verses.text_he: הִבְאִ֣ישׁוּ נָ֭מַקּוּ חַבּוּרֹתָ֑י מִ֝פְּנֵ֗י אִוַּלְתִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: I am all bent and bowed; I walk about in gloom all day long.
verses.text_he: נַעֲוֵ֣יתִי שַׁחֹ֣תִי עַד־מְאֹ֑ד כׇּל־הַ֝יּ֗וֹם קֹדֵ֥ר הִלָּֽכְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: For my sinews are full of fever; there is no soundness in my flesh.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־כְ֭סָלַי מָלְא֣וּ נִקְלֶ֑ה וְאֵ֥ין מְ֝תֹ֗ם בִּבְשָׂרִֽי׃

verses.text_en: I am all benumbed and crushed; I roar because of the turmoil in my mind.
verses.text_he: נְפוּג֣וֹתִי וְנִדְכֵּ֣יתִי עַד־מְאֹ֑ד שָׁ֝אַ֗גְתִּי מִֽנַּהֲמַ֥ת לִבִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: O Lord, You are aware of all my entreaties; my groaning is not hidden from You.
verses.text_he: אֲֽדֹנָ֗י נֶגְדְּךָ֥ כׇל־תַּאֲוָתִ֑י וְ֝אַנְחָתִ֗י מִמְּךָ֥ לֹֽא־נִסְתָּֽרָה׃

verses.text_en: My mind reels; my strength fails me; my eyes too have lost their luster.
verses.text_he: לִבִּ֣י סְ֭חַרְחַר עֲזָבַ֣נִי כֹחִ֑י וְֽאוֹר־עֵינַ֥י גַּם־הֵ֝֗ם אֵ֣ין אִתִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: My friends and companions stand back from my affliction; my kinsmen stand far off.
verses.text_he: אֹֽהֲבַ֨י׀ וְרֵעַ֗י מִנֶּ֣גֶד נִגְעִ֣י יַעֲמֹ֑דוּ וּ֝קְרוֹבַ֗י מֵרָחֹ֥ק עָמָֽדוּ׃

verses.text_en: Those who seek my life lay traps; those who wish me harm speak malice; they utter deceit all the time.
verses.text_he: וַיְנַקְשׁ֤וּ׀ מְבַקְשֵׁ֬י נַפְשִׁ֗י וְדֹרְשֵׁ֣י רָ֭עָתִי דִּבְּר֣וּ הַוּ֑וֹת וּ֝מִרְמ֗וֹת כׇּל־הַיּ֥וֹם יֶהְגּֽוּ׃

verses.text_en: But I am like a deaf man, unhearing, like a dumb man who cannot speak up;
verses.text_he: וַאֲנִ֣י כְ֭חֵרֵשׁ לֹ֣א אֶשְׁמָ֑ע וּ֝כְאִלֵּ֗ם לֹ֣א יִפְתַּח־פִּֽיו׃

verses.text_en: I am like one who does not hear, who has no retort on his lips.
verses.text_he: וָאֱהִ֗י כְּ֭אִישׁ אֲשֶׁ֣ר לֹֽא־שֹׁמֵ֑עַ וְאֵ֥ין בְּ֝פִ֗יו תּוֹכָחֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: But I wait for You, O LORD; You will answer, O Lord, my God.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־לְךָ֣ יְהֹוָ֣ה הוֹחָ֑לְתִּי אַתָּ֥ה תַ֝עֲנֶ֗ה אֲדֹנָ֥י אֱלֹהָֽי׃

verses.text_en: For I fear they will rejoice over me; when my foot gives way they will vaunt themselves against me.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־אָ֭מַרְתִּי פֶּן־יִשְׂמְחוּ־לִ֑י בְּמ֥וֹט רַ֝גְלִ֗י עָלַ֥י הִגְדִּֽילוּ׃

verses.text_en: For I am on the verge of collapse; my pain is always with me.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־אֲ֭נִי לְצֶ֣לַע נָכ֑וֹן וּמַכְאוֹבִ֖י נֶגְדִּ֣י תָמִֽיד׃

verses.text_en: I acknowledge my iniquity; I am fearful over my sin;
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־עֲוֺנִ֥י אַגִּ֑יד אֶ֝דְאַ֗ג מֵ֖חַטָּאתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: for my mortal enemies are numerous; my treacherous foes are many.
verses.text_he: וְֽ֭אֹיְבַי חַיִּ֣ים עָצֵ֑מוּ וְרַבּ֖וּ שֹׂנְאַ֣י שָֽׁקֶר׃

verses.text_en: Those who repay evil for good harass me for pursuing good.
verses.text_he: וּמְשַׁלְּמֵ֣י רָ֭עָה תַּ֣חַת טוֹבָ֑ה יִ֝שְׂטְנ֗וּנִי תַּ֣חַת (רדופי) [רׇֽדְפִי־]טֽוֹב׃

verses.text_en: Do not abandon me, O LORD; my God, be not far from me;
verses.text_he: אַל־תַּעַזְבֵ֥נִי יְהֹוָ֑ה אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י אַל־תִּרְחַ֥ק מִמֶּֽנִּי׃

verses.text_en: hasten to my aid, O Lord, my deliverance.
verses.text_he: ח֥וּשָׁה לְעֶזְרָתִ֑י אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י תְּשׁוּעָתִֽי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; for . A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ (לידיתון) [לִֽידוּת֗וּן] מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: I resolved I would watch my step lest I offend by my speech; I would keep my mouth muzzled while the wicked man was in my presence.
verses.text_he: אָמַ֗רְתִּי אֶ֥שְׁמְרָ֣ה דְרָכַי֮ מֵחֲט֢וֹא בִלְשׁ֫וֹנִ֥י אֶשְׁמְרָ֥ה לְפִ֥י מַחְס֑וֹם בְּעֹ֖ד רָשָׁ֣ע לְנֶגְדִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: I was dumb, silent; I was very still while my pain was intense.
verses.text_he: נֶאֱלַ֣מְתִּי ד֭וּמִיָּה הֶחֱשֵׁ֣יתִי מִטּ֑וֹב וּכְאֵבִ֥י נֶעְכָּֽר׃

verses.text_en: My mind was in a rage, my thoughts were all aflame; I spoke out:
verses.text_he: חַם־לִבִּ֨י׀ בְּקִרְבִּ֗י בַּהֲגִיגִ֥י תִבְעַר־אֵ֑שׁ דִּ֝בַּ֗רְתִּי בִּלְשׁוֹנִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Tell me, O LORD, what my term is, what is the measure of my days; I would know how fleeting my life is.
verses.text_he: הוֹדִ֘יעֵ֤נִי יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ קִצִּ֗י וּמִדַּ֣ת יָמַ֣י מַה־הִ֑יא אֵ֝דְעָ֗ה מֶה־חָדֵ֥ל אָֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: You have made my life just handbreadths long; its span is as nothing in Your sight; no man endures any longer than a breath. .
verses.text_he: הִנֵּ֤ה טְפָח֨וֹת׀ נָ֘תַ֤תָּה יָמַ֗י וְחֶלְדִּ֣י כְאַ֣יִן נֶגְדֶּ֑ךָ אַ֥ךְ כׇּֽל־הֶ֥בֶל כׇּל־אָ֝דָ֗ם נִצָּ֥ב סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Man walks about as a mere shadow; mere futility is his hustle and bustle, amassing and not knowing who will gather in.
verses.text_he: אַךְ־בְּצֶ֤לֶם׀ יִֽתְהַלֶּךְ־אִ֗ישׁ אַךְ־הֶ֥בֶל יֶהֱמָי֑וּן יִ֝צְבֹּ֗ר וְֽלֹא־יֵדַ֥ע מִֽי־אֹסְפָֽם׃

verses.text_en: What, then, can I count on, O Lord? In You my hope lies.
verses.text_he: וְעַתָּ֣ה מַה־קִּוִּ֣יתִי אֲדֹנָ֑י תּ֝וֹחַלְתִּ֗י לְךָ֣ הִֽיא׃

verses.text_en: Deliver me from all my transgressions; make me not the butt of the benighted.
verses.text_he: מִכׇּל־פְּשָׁעַ֥י הַצִּילֵ֑נִי חֶרְפַּ֥ת נָ֝בָ֗ל אַל־תְּשִׂימֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: I am dumb, I do not speak up, for it is Your doing.
verses.text_he: נֶ֭אֱלַמְתִּי לֹ֣א אֶפְתַּח־פִּ֑י כִּ֖י אַתָּ֣ה עָשִֽׂיתָ׃

verses.text_en: Take away Your plague from me; I perish from Your blows.
verses.text_he: הָסֵ֣ר מֵעָלַ֣י נִגְעֶ֑ךָ מִתִּגְרַ֥ת יָ֝דְךָ֗ אֲנִ֣י כָלִֽיתִי׃

verses.text_en: You chastise a man in punishment for his sin, consuming like a moth what he treasures. No man is more than a breath. .
verses.text_he: בְּֽתוֹכָ֘ח֤וֹת עַל־עָוֺ֨ן׀ יִסַּ֬רְתָּ אִ֗ישׁ וַתֶּ֣מֶס כָּעָ֣שׁ חֲמוּד֑וֹ אַ֤ךְ הֶ֖בֶל כׇּל־אָדָ֣ם סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Hear my prayer, O LORD; give ear to my cry; do not disregard my tears; for like all my forebears I am an alien, resident with You.
verses.text_he: שִׁ֥מְעָֽה־תְפִלָּתִ֨י׀ יְהֹוָ֡ה וְשַׁוְעָתִ֨י׀ הַאֲזִינָה֮ אֶֽל־דִּמְעָתִ֗י אַֽל־תֶּ֫חֱרַ֥שׁ כִּ֤י גֵ֣ר אָנֹכִ֣י עִמָּ֑ךְ תּ֝וֹשָׁ֗ב כְּכׇל־אֲבוֹתָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Look away from me, that I may recover, before I pass away and am gone.
verses.text_he: הָשַׁ֣ע מִמֶּ֣נִּי וְאַבְלִ֑יגָה בְּטֶ֖רֶם אֵלֵ֣ךְ וְאֵינֶֽנִּי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: לַ֝מְנַצֵּ֗חַ לְדָוִ֥ד מִזְמֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: I put my hope in the LORD; He inclined toward me, and heeded my cry.
verses.text_he: קַוֺּ֣ה קִוִּ֣יתִי יְהֹוָ֑ה וַיֵּ֥ט אֵ֝לַ֗י וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע שַׁוְעָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: He lifted me out of the miry pit, the slimy clay, and set my feet on a rock, steadied my legs.
verses.text_he: וַיַּעֲלֵ֤נִי׀ מִבּ֥וֹר שָׁאוֹן֮ מִטִּ֢יט הַיָּ֫וֵ֥ן וַיָּ֖קֶם עַל־סֶ֥לַע רַגְלַ֗י כּוֹנֵ֥ן אֲשֻׁרָֽי׃

verses.text_en: He put a new song into my mouth, a hymn to our God. May many see it and stand in awe, and trust in the LORD.
verses.text_he: וַיִּתֵּ֬ן בְּפִ֨י׀ שִׁ֥יר חָדָשׁ֮ תְּהִלָּ֢ה לֵאלֹ֫הֵ֥ינוּ יִרְא֣וּ רַבִּ֣ים וְיִירָ֑אוּ וְ֝יִבְטְח֗וּ בַּיהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Happy is the man who makes the LORD his trust, who turns not to the arrogant or to followers of falsehood.
verses.text_he: אַ֥שְֽׁרֵי־הַגֶּ֗בֶר אֲשֶׁר־שָׂ֣ם יְ֭הֹוָה מִבְטַח֑וֹ וְֽלֹא־פָנָ֥ה אֶל־רְ֝הָבִ֗ים וְשָׂטֵ֥י כָזָֽב׃

verses.text_en: You, O LORD my God, have done many things; the wonders You have devised for us cannot be set out before You; I would rehearse the tale of them, but they are more than can be told.
verses.text_he: רַבּ֤וֹת עָשִׂ֨יתָ׀ אַתָּ֤ה׀ יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהַי֮ נִ֥פְלְאֹתֶ֥יךָ וּמַחְשְׁבֹתֶ֗יךָ אֵ֫לֵ֥ינוּ אֵ֤ין׀ עֲרֹ֬ךְ אֵלֶ֗יךָ אַגִּ֥ידָה וַאֲדַבֵּ֑רָה עָ֝צְמ֗וּ מִסַּפֵּֽר׃

verses.text_en: You gave me to understand that You do not desire sacrifice and meal offering; You do not ask for burnt offering and sin offering.
verses.text_he: זֶ֤בַח וּמִנְחָ֨ה׀ לֹֽא־חָפַ֗צְתָּ אׇ֭זְנַיִם כָּרִ֣יתָ לִּ֑י עוֹלָ֥ה וַ֝חֲטָאָ֗ה לֹ֣א שָׁאָֽלְתָּ׃

verses.text_en: Then I said, “See, I will bring a scroll recounting what befell me.”
verses.text_he: אָ֣ז אָ֭מַרְתִּי הִנֵּה־בָ֑אתִי בִּמְגִלַּת־סֵ֝֗פֶר כָּת֥וּב עָלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: To do what pleases You, my God, is my desire; Your teaching is in my inmost parts.
verses.text_he: לַ֥עֲשׂוֹת־רְצוֹנְךָ֣ אֱלֹהַ֣י חָפָ֑צְתִּי וְ֝ת֥וֹרָתְךָ֗ בְּת֣וֹךְ מֵעָֽי׃

verses.text_en: I proclaimed [Your] righteousness in a great congregation; see, I did not withhold my words; O LORD, You must know it.
verses.text_he: בִּשַּׂ֤רְתִּי צֶ֨דֶק׀ בְּקָ֘הָ֤ל רָ֗ב הִנֵּ֣ה שְׂ֭פָתַי לֹ֣א אֶכְלָ֑א יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה אַתָּ֥ה יָדָֽעְתָּ׃

verses.text_en: I did not keep Your beneficence to myself; I declared Your faithful deliverance; I did not fail to speak of Your steadfast love in a great congregation.
verses.text_he: צִדְקָתְךָ֬ לֹֽא־כִסִּ֨יתִי׀ בְּת֬וֹךְ לִבִּ֗י אֱמוּנָתְךָ֣ וּתְשׁוּעָתְךָ֣ אָמָ֑רְתִּי לֹא־כִחַ֥דְתִּי חַסְדְּךָ֥ וַ֝אֲמִתְּךָ֗ לְקָהָ֥ל רָֽב׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, You will not withhold from me Your compassion; Your steadfast love will protect me always.
verses.text_he: אַתָּ֤ה יְהֹוָ֗ה לֹֽא־תִכְלָ֣א רַחֲמֶ֣יךָ מִמֶּ֑נִּי חַסְדְּךָ֥ וַ֝אֲמִתְּךָ֗ תָּמִ֥יד יִצְּרֽוּנִי׃

verses.text_en: For misfortunes without number envelop me; my iniquities have caught up with me; I cannot see; they are more than the hairs of my head; I am at my wits’ end.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י אָפְפֽוּ־עָלַ֨י׀ רָע֡וֹת עַד־אֵ֬ין מִסְפָּ֗ר הִשִּׂיג֣וּנִי עֲ֭וֺנֹתַי וְלֹא־יָכֹ֣לְתִּי לִרְא֑וֹת עָצְמ֥וּ מִשַּׂעֲר֥וֹת רֹ֝אשִׁ֗י וְלִבִּ֥י עֲזָבָֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: O favor me, LORD, and save me; O LORD, hasten to my aid.
verses.text_he: רְצֵ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה לְהַצִּילֵ֑נִי יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה לְעֶזְרָ֥תִי חֽוּשָׁה׃

verses.text_en: Let those who seek to destroy my life be frustrated and disgraced; let those who wish me harm fall back in shame.
verses.text_he: יֵ֘בֹ֤שׁוּ וְיַחְפְּר֨וּ׀ יַחַד֮ מְבַקְשֵׁ֥י נַפְשִׁ֗י לִסְפּ֫וֹתָ֥הּ יִסֹּ֣גוּ אָ֭חוֹר וְיִכָּלְמ֑וּ חֲ֝פֵצֵ֗י רָעָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Let those who say “Aha! Aha!” over me be desolate because of their frustration.
verses.text_he: יָ֭שֹׁמּוּ עַל־עֵ֣קֶב בׇּשְׁתָּ֑ם הָאֹמְרִ֥ים לִ֝֗י הֶ֘אָ֥ח׀הֶאָֽח׃

verses.text_en: But let all who seek You be glad and rejoice in You; let those who are eager for Your deliverance always say, “Extolled be the LORD!”
verses.text_he: יָ֘שִׂ֤ישׂוּ וְיִשְׂמְח֨וּ׀ בְּךָ֗ כׇּֽל־מְבַ֫קְשֶׁ֥יךָ יֹאמְר֣וּ תָ֭מִיד יִגְדַּ֣ל יְהֹוָ֑ה אֹ֝הֲבֵ֗י תְּשׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: But I am poor and needy; may the Lord devise [deliverance] for me. You are my help and my rescuer; my God, do not delay.
verses.text_he: וַאֲנִ֤י׀ עָנִ֣י וְאֶבְיוֹן֮ אֲדֹנָ֢י יַחֲשׇׁ֫ב־לִ֥י עֶזְרָתִ֣י וּמְפַלְטִ֣י אַ֑תָּה אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י אַל־תְּאַחַֽר׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: Happy is he who is thoughtful of the wretched; in bad times may the LORD keep him from harm.
verses.text_he: אַ֭שְׁרֵי מַשְׂכִּ֣יל אֶל־דָּ֑ל בְּי֥וֹם רָ֝עָ֗ה יְֽמַלְּטֵ֥הוּ יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: May the LORD guard him and preserve him; and may he be thought happy in the land. Do not subject him to the will of his enemies.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֤ה׀ יִשְׁמְרֵ֣הוּ וִ֭יחַיֵּהוּ (יאשר) [וְאֻשַּׁ֣ר] בָּאָ֑רֶץ וְאַֽל־תִּ֝תְּנֵ֗הוּ בְּנֶ֣פֶשׁ אֹיְבָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: The LORD will sustain him on his sickbed; You shall wholly transform his bed of suffering.
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה יִ֭סְעָדֶנּוּ עַל־עֶ֣רֶשׂ דְּוָ֑י כׇּל־מִ֝שְׁכָּב֗וֹ הָפַ֥כְתָּ בְחׇלְיֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: I said, “O LORD, have mercy on me, heal me, for I have sinned against You.”
verses.text_he: אֲֽנִי־אָ֭מַרְתִּי יְהֹוָ֣ה חׇנֵּ֑נִי רְפָאָ֥ה נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י כִּי־חָטָ֥אתִי לָֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: My enemies speak evilly of me, “When will he die and his name perish?”
verses.text_he: אוֹיְבַ֗י יֹאמְר֣וּ רַ֣ע לִ֑י מָתַ֥י יָ֝מ֗וּת וְאָבַ֥ד שְׁמֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: If one comes to visit, he speaks falsely; his mind stores up evil thoughts; once outside, he speaks them.
verses.text_he: וְאִם־בָּ֤א לִרְא֨וֹת׀ שָׁ֤וְא יְדַבֵּ֗ר לִבּ֗וֹ יִקְבׇּץ־אָ֥וֶן ל֑וֹ יֵצֵ֖א לַח֣וּץ יְדַבֵּֽר׃

verses.text_en: All my enemies whisper together against me, imagining the worst for me.
verses.text_he: יַ֗חַד עָלַ֣י יִ֭תְלַחֲשׁוּ כׇּל־שֹׂנְאָ֑י עָלַ֓י׀ יַחְשְׁב֖וּ רָעָ֣ה לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: “Something baneful has settled in him; he’ll not rise from his bed again.”
verses.text_he: דְּֽבַר־בְּ֭לִיַּעַל יָצ֣וּק בּ֑וֹ וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר שָׁ֝כַ֗ב לֹא־יוֹסִ֥יף לָקֽוּם׃

verses.text_en: My ally in whom I trusted, even he who shares my bread, has been utterly false to me.
verses.text_he: גַּם־אִ֤ישׁ שְׁלוֹמִ֨י׀ אֲשֶׁר־בָּטַ֣חְתִּי ב֭וֹ אוֹכֵ֣ל לַחְמִ֑י הִגְדִּ֖יל עָלַ֣י עָקֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: But You, O LORD, have mercy on me; let me rise again and repay them.
verses.text_he: וְאַתָּ֤ה יְהֹוָ֗ה חׇנֵּ֥נִי וַהֲקִימֵ֑נִי וַאֲשַׁלְּמָ֥ה לָהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: Then shall I know that You are pleased with me: when my enemy cannot shout in triumph over me.
verses.text_he: בְּזֹ֣את יָ֭דַעְתִּי כִּֽי־חָפַ֣צְתָּ בִּ֑י כִּ֤י לֹֽא־יָרִ֖יעַ אֹיְבִ֣י עָלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: You will support me because of my integrity, and let me abide in Your presence forever.
verses.text_he: וַאֲנִ֗י בְּ֭תֻמִּי תָּמַ֣כְתָּ בִּ֑י וַתַּצִּיבֵ֖נִי לְפָנֶ֣יךָ לְעוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Blessed is the LORD, God of Israel, from eternity to eternity. Amen and Amen.
verses.text_he: בָּ֘ר֤וּךְ יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל מֵֽ֭הָעוֹלָם וְעַ֥ד הָעוֹלָ֗ם אָ֘מֵ֥ן׀וְאָמֵֽן׃

verses.text_en: For the leader. A of the Korahites.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ מַשְׂכִּ֥יל לִבְנֵי־קֹֽרַח׃

verses.text_en: Like a hind crying for water, my soul cries for You, O God;
verses.text_he: כְּאַיָּ֗ל תַּעֲרֹ֥ג עַל־אֲפִֽיקֵי־מָ֑יִם כֵּ֤ן נַפְשִׁ֨י תַעֲרֹ֖ג אֵלֶ֣יךָ אֱלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: my soul thirsts for God, the living God; O when will I come to appear before God!
verses.text_he: צָמְאָ֬ה נַפְשִׁ֨י׀ לֵאלֹהִים֮ לְאֵ֢ל חָ֥֫י מָתַ֥י אָב֑וֹא וְ֝אֵרָאֶ֗ה פְּנֵ֣י אֱלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: My tears have been my food day and night; I am ever taunted with, “Where is your God?”
verses.text_he: הָֽיְתָה־לִּ֬י דִמְעָתִ֣י לֶ֭חֶם יוֹמָ֣ם וָלָ֑יְלָה בֶּאֱמֹ֥ר אֵלַ֥י כׇּל־הַ֝יּ֗וֹם אַיֵּ֥ה אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: When I think of this, I pour out my soul: how I walked with the crowd, moved with them, the festive throng, to the House of God with joyous shouts of praise.
verses.text_he: אֵ֤לֶּה אֶזְכְּרָ֨ה׀ וְאֶשְׁפְּכָ֬ה עָלַ֨י׀ נַפְשִׁ֗י כִּ֤י אֶעֱבֹ֨ר׀ בַּסָּךְ֮ אֶדַּדֵּ֗ם עַד־בֵּ֥ית־אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים בְּקוֹל־רִנָּ֥ה וְתוֹדָ֗ה הָמ֥וֹן חוֹגֵֽג׃

verses.text_en: Why so downcast, my soul, why disquieted within me? Have hope in God; I will yet praise Him for His saving presence.
verses.text_he: מַה־תִּשְׁתּ֬וֹחֲחִ֨י׀ נַפְשִׁי֮ וַתֶּהֱמִ֢י עָ֫לָ֥י הוֹחִ֣לִי לֵ֭אלֹהִים כִּי־ע֥וֹד אוֹדֶ֗נּוּ יְשׁוּע֥וֹת פָּנָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: O my God, my soul is downcast; therefore I think of You in this land of Jordan and Hermon, in Mount Mizar,
verses.text_he: אֱֽלֹהַ֗י עָלַי֮ נַפְשִׁ֢י תִשְׁתּ֫וֹחָ֥ח עַל־כֵּ֗ן אֶ֭זְכׇּרְךָ מֵאֶ֣רֶץ יַרְדֵּ֑ן וְ֝חֶרְמוֹנִ֗ים מֵהַ֥ר מִצְעָֽר׃

verses.text_en: where deep calls to deep in the roar of Your cataracts; all Your breakers and billows have swept over me.
verses.text_he: תְּהוֹם־אֶל־תְּה֣וֹם ק֭וֹרֵא לְק֣וֹל צִנּוֹרֶ֑יךָ כׇּֽל־מִשְׁבָּרֶ֥יךָ וְ֝גַלֶּ֗יךָ עָלַ֥י עָבָֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: By day may the LORD vouchsafe His faithful care, so that at night a song to Him may be with me, a prayer to the God of my life.
verses.text_he: יוֹמָ֤ם׀ יְצַוֶּ֬ה יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ חַסְדּ֗וֹ וּ֭בַלַּיְלָה שִׁירֹ֣ה עִמִּ֑י תְּ֝פִלָּ֗ה לְאֵ֣ל חַיָּֽי׃

verses.text_en: I say to God, my rock, “Why have You forgotten me, why must I walk in gloom, oppressed by my enemy?”
verses.text_he: אוֹמְרָ֤ה׀ לְאֵ֥ל סַלְעִי֮ לָמָ֢ה שְׁכַ֫חְתָּ֥נִי לָֽמָּה־קֹדֵ֥ר אֵלֵ֗ךְ בְּלַ֣חַץ אוֹיֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: Crushing my bones, my foes revile me, taunting me always with, “Where is your God?”
verses.text_he: בְּרֶ֤צַח׀ בְּֽעַצְמוֹתַ֗י חֵרְפ֥וּנִי צוֹרְרָ֑י בְּאׇמְרָ֥ם אֵלַ֥י כׇּל־הַ֝יּ֗וֹם אַיֵּ֥ה אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Why so downcast, my soul, why disquieted within me? Have hope in God; I will yet praise Him, my ever-present help, my God.
verses.text_he: מַה־תִּשְׁתּ֬וֹחֲחִ֨י׀ נַפְשִׁי֮ וּֽמַה־תֶּהֱמִ֢י עָ֫לָ֥י הוֹחִ֣ילִי לֵ֭אלֹהִים כִּי־ע֣וֹד אוֹדֶ֑נּוּ יְשׁוּעֹ֥ת פָּ֝נַ֗י וֵאלֹהָֽי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Vindicate me, O God, champion my cause against faithless people; rescue me from the treacherous, dishonest man.
verses.text_he: שׇׁפְטֵ֤נִי אֱלֹהִ֨ים׀ וְרִ֘יבָ֤ה רִיבִ֗י מִגּ֥וֹי לֹֽא־חָסִ֑יד מֵ֤אִישׁ־מִרְמָ֖ה וְעַוְלָ֣ה תְפַלְּטֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: For You are my God, my stronghold; why have You rejected me? Why must I walk in gloom, oppressed by the enemy?
verses.text_he: כִּי־אַתָּ֤ה׀ אֱלֹהֵ֣י מָעוּזִּי֮ לָמָ֢ה זְנַ֫חְתָּ֥נִי לָֽמָּה־קֹדֵ֥ר אֶתְהַלֵּ֗ךְ בְּלַ֣חַץ אוֹיֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: Send forth Your light and Your truth; they will lead me; they will bring me to Your holy mountain, to Your dwelling-place,
verses.text_he: שְׁלַח־אוֹרְךָ֣ וַ֭אֲמִתְּךָ הֵ֣מָּה יַנְח֑וּנִי יְבִיא֥וּנִי אֶל־הַֽר־קׇ֝דְשְׁךָ֗ וְאֶל־מִשְׁכְּנוֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: that I may come to the altar of God, God, my delight, my joy; that I may praise You with the lyre, O God, my God.
verses.text_he: וְאָב֤וֹאָה׀ אֶל־מִזְבַּ֬ח אֱלֹהִ֗ים אֶל־אֵל֮ שִׂמְחַ֢ת גִּ֫ילִ֥י וְאוֹדְךָ֥ בְכִנּ֗וֹר אֱלֹהִ֥ים אֱלֹהָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Why so downcast, my soul, why disquieted within me? Have hope in God; I will yet praise Him, my ever-present help, my God.
verses.text_he: מַה־תִּשְׁתּ֬וֹחֲחִ֨י׀ נַפְשִׁי֮ וּֽמַה־תֶּהֱמִ֢י עָ֫לָ֥י הוֹחִ֣ילִי לֵ֭אלֹהִים כִּי־ע֣וֹד אוֹדֶ֑נּוּ יְשׁוּעֹ֥ת פָּ֝נַ֗י וֵאלֹהָֽי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. Of the Korahites. A .
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ׀לִבְנֵי־קֹ֬רַח מַשְׂכִּֽיל׃

verses.text_en: We have heard, O God, our fathers have told us the deeds You performed in their time, in days of old.
verses.text_he: אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ בְּאׇזְנֵ֬ינוּ שָׁמַ֗עְנוּ אֲבוֹתֵ֥ינוּ סִפְּרוּ־לָ֑נוּ פֹּ֥עַל פָּעַ֥לְתָּ בִ֝ימֵיהֶ֗ם בִּ֣ימֵי קֶֽדֶם׃

verses.text_en: With Your hand You planted them, displacing nations; You brought misfortune on peoples, and drove them out.
verses.text_he: אַתָּ֤ה׀ יָדְךָ֡ גּוֹיִ֣ם ה֭וֹרַשְׁתָּ וַתִּטָּעֵ֑ם תָּרַ֥ע לְ֝אֻמִּ֗ים וַֽתְּשַׁלְּחֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: It was not by their sword that they took the land, their arm did not give them victory, but Your right hand, Your arm, and Your goodwill, for You favored them.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י לֹ֪א בְחַרְבָּ֡ם יָ֥רְשׁוּ אָ֗רֶץ וּזְרוֹעָם֮ לֹא־הוֹשִׁ֢יעָ֫ה לָּ֥מוֹ כִּֽי־יְמִינְךָ֣ וּ֭זְרוֹעֲךָ וְא֥וֹר פָּנֶ֗יךָ כִּ֣י רְצִיתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: You are my king, O God; decree victories for Jacob!
verses.text_he: אַתָּה־ה֣וּא מַלְכִּ֣י אֱלֹהִ֑ים צַ֝וֵּ֗ה יְשׁוּע֥וֹת יַעֲקֹֽב׃

verses.text_en: Through You we gore our foes; by Your name we trample our adversaries;
verses.text_he: בְּ֭ךָ צָרֵ֣ינוּ נְנַגֵּ֑חַ בְּ֝שִׁמְךָ֗ נָב֥וּס קָמֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: I do not trust in my bow; it is not my sword that gives me victory;
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י לֹ֣א בְקַשְׁתִּ֣י אֶבְטָ֑ח וְ֝חַרְבִּ֗י לֹ֣א תוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: You give us victory over our foes; You thwart those who hate us.
verses.text_he: כִּ֣י ה֭וֹשַׁעְתָּנוּ מִצָּרֵ֑ינוּ וּמְשַׂנְאֵ֥ינוּ הֱבִישֽׁוֹתָ׃

verses.text_en: In God we glory at all times, and praise Your name unceasingly. .
verses.text_he: בֵּ֭אלֹהִים הִלַּ֣לְנוּ כׇל־הַיּ֑וֹם וְשִׁמְךָ֓׀ לְעוֹלָ֖ם נוֹדֶ֣ה סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Yet You have rejected and disgraced us; You do not go with our armies.
verses.text_he: אַף־זָ֭נַחְתָּ וַתַּכְלִימֵ֑נוּ וְלֹא־תֵ֝צֵ֗א בְּצִבְאוֹתֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: You make us retreat before our foe; our enemies plunder us at will.
verses.text_he: תְּשִׁיבֵ֣נוּ אָ֭חוֹר מִנִּי־צָ֑ר וּ֝מְשַׂנְאֵ֗ינוּ שָׁ֣סוּ לָֽמוֹ׃

verses.text_en: You let them devour us like sheep; You disperse us among the nations.
verses.text_he: תִּ֭תְּנֵנוּ כְּצֹ֣אן מַאֲכָ֑ל וּ֝בַגּוֹיִ֗ם זֵרִיתָֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: You sell Your people for no fortune, You set no high price on them.
verses.text_he: תִּמְכֹּֽר־עַמְּךָ֥ בְלֹא־ה֑וֹן וְלֹֽא־רִ֝בִּ֗יתָ בִּמְחִירֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: You make us the butt of our neighbors, the scorn and derision of those around us.
verses.text_he: תְּשִׂימֵ֣נוּ חֶ֭רְפָּה לִשְׁכֵנֵ֑ינוּ לַ֥עַג וָ֝קֶ֗לֶס לִסְבִיבוֹתֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: You make us a byword among the nations, a laughingstock among the peoples.
verses.text_he: תְּשִׂימֵ֣נוּ מָ֭שָׁל בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם מְנֽוֹד־רֹ֝֗אשׁ בַּלְאֻמִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: I am always aware of my disgrace; I am wholly covered with shame
verses.text_he: כׇּל־הַ֭יּוֹם כְּלִמָּתִ֣י נֶגְדִּ֑י וּבֹ֖שֶׁת פָּנַ֣י כִּסָּֽתְנִי׃

verses.text_en: at the sound of taunting revilers, in the presence of the vengeful foe.
verses.text_he: מִ֭קּוֹל מְחָרֵ֣ף וּמְגַדֵּ֑ף מִפְּנֵ֥י א֝וֹיֵ֗ב וּמִתְנַקֵּֽם׃

verses.text_en: All this has come upon us, yet we have not forgotten You, or been false to Your covenant.
verses.text_he: כׇּל־זֹ֣את בָּ֭אַתְנוּ וְלֹ֣א שְׁכַחֲנ֑וּךָ וְלֹֽא־שִׁ֝קַּ֗רְנוּ בִּבְרִיתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Our hearts have not gone astray, nor have our feet swerved from Your path,
verses.text_he: לֹא־נָס֣וֹג אָח֣וֹר לִבֵּ֑נוּ וַתֵּ֥ט אֲ֝שֻׁרֵ֗ינוּ מִנִּ֥י אׇרְחֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: though You cast us, crushed, to where the sea monster is, and covered us over with deepest darkness.
verses.text_he: כִּ֣י דִ֭כִּיתָנוּ בִּמְק֣וֹם תַּנִּ֑ים וַתְּכַ֖ס עָלֵ֣ינוּ בְצַלְמָֽוֶת׃

verses.text_en: If we forgot the name of our God and spread forth our hands to a foreign god,
verses.text_he: אִם־שָׁ֭כַחְנוּ שֵׁ֣ם אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ וַנִּפְרֹ֥שׂ כַּ֝פֵּ֗ינוּ לְאֵ֣ל זָֽר׃

verses.text_en: God would surely search it out, for He knows the secrets of the heart.
verses.text_he: הֲלֹ֣א אֱ֭לֹהִים יַחֲקׇר־זֹ֑את כִּי־ה֥וּא יֹ֝דֵ֗עַ תַּעֲלֻמ֥וֹת לֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: It is for Your sake that we are slain all day long, that we are regarded as sheep to be slaughtered.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־עָ֭לֶיךָ הֹרַ֣גְנוּ כׇל־הַיּ֑וֹם נֶ֝חְשַׁ֗בְנוּ כְּצֹ֣אן טִבְחָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Rouse Yourself; why do You sleep, O Lord? Awaken, do not reject us forever!
verses.text_he: ע֤וּרָה׀ לָ֖מָּה תִישַׁ֥ן׀אֲדֹנָ֑י הָ֝קִ֗יצָה אַל־תִּזְנַ֥ח לָנֶֽצַח׃

verses.text_en: Why do You hide Your face, ignoring our affliction and distress?
verses.text_he: לָֽמָּה־פָנֶ֥יךָ תַסְתִּ֑יר תִּשְׁכַּ֖ח עׇנְיֵ֣נוּ וְֽלַחֲצֵֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: We lie prostrate in the dust; our body clings to the ground.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י שָׁ֣חָה לֶעָפָ֣ר נַפְשֵׁ֑נוּ דָּבְקָ֖ה לָאָ֣רֶץ בִּטְנֵֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: Arise and help us, redeem us, as befits Your faithfulness.
verses.text_he: ק֭וּמָֽה עֶזְרָ֣תָה לָּ֑נוּ וּ֝פְדֵ֗נוּ לְמַ֣עַן חַסְדֶּֽךָ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; on . Of the Korahites. A . A love song.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ עַל־שֹׁ֭שַׁנִּים לִבְנֵי־קֹ֑רַח מַ֝שְׂכִּ֗יל שִׁ֣יר יְדִידֹֽת׃

verses.text_en: My heart is astir with gracious words; I speak my poem to a king; my tongue is the pen of an expert scribe.
verses.text_he: רָ֘חַ֤שׁ לִבִּ֨י׀ דָּ֘בָ֤ר ט֗וֹב אֹמֵ֣ר אָ֭נִי מַעֲשַׂ֣י לְמֶ֑לֶךְ לְ֝שׁוֹנִ֗י עֵ֤ט׀ סוֹפֵ֬ר מָהִֽיר׃

verses.text_en: You are fairer than all men; your speech is endowed with grace; rightly has God given you an eternal blessing.
verses.text_he: יׇפְיָפִ֡יתָ מִבְּנֵ֬י אָדָ֗ם ה֣וּצַק חֵ֭ן בְּשִׂפְתוֹתֶ֑יךָ עַל־כֵּ֤ן בֵּרַכְךָ֖ אֱלֹהִ֣ים לְעוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Gird your sword upon your thigh, O hero, in your splendor and glory;
verses.text_he: חֲגֽוֹר־חַרְבְּךָ֣ עַל־יָרֵ֣ךְ גִּבּ֑וֹר ה֝וֹדְךָ֗ וַהֲדָרֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: in your glory, win success; ride on in the cause of truth and meekness and right; and let your right hand lead you to awesome deeds.
verses.text_he: וַהֲדָ֬רְךָ֨׀ צְלַ֬ח רְכַ֗ב עַֽל־דְּבַר־אֱ֭מֶת וְעַנְוָה־צֶ֑דֶק וְתוֹרְךָ֖ נוֹרָא֣וֹת יְמִינֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Your arrows, sharpened, [pierce] the breast of the king’s enemies; peoples fall at your feet.
verses.text_he: חִצֶּ֗יךָ שְׁנ֫וּנִ֥ים עַ֭מִּים תַּחְתֶּ֣יךָ יִפְּל֑וּ בְּ֝לֵ֗ב אוֹיְבֵ֥י הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃

verses.text_en: Your divine throne is everlasting; your royal scepter is a scepter of equity.
verses.text_he: כִּסְאֲךָ֣ אֱ֭לֹהִים עוֹלָ֣ם וָעֶ֑ד שֵׁ֥בֶט מִ֝ישֹׁ֗ר שֵׁ֣בֶט מַלְכוּתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: You love righteousness and hate wickedness; rightly has God, your God, chosen to anoint you with oil of gladness over all your peers.
verses.text_he: אָהַ֣בְתָּ צֶּדֶק֮ וַתִּשְׂנָ֫א־רֶ֥שַׁע עַל־כֵּ֤ן׀ מְשָׁחֲךָ֡ אֱלֹהִ֣ים אֱ֭לֹהֶיךָ שֶׁ֥מֶן שָׂשׂ֗וֹן מֵחֲבֵרֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: All your robes [are fragrant] with myrrh and aloes and cassia; from ivoried palaces lutes entertain you.
verses.text_he: מֹר־וַאֲהָל֣וֹת קְ֭צִיעוֹת כׇּל־בִּגְדֹתֶ֑יךָ מִֽן־הֵ֥יכְלֵי שֵׁ֝֗ן מִנִּ֥י שִׂמְּחֽוּךָ׃

verses.text_en: Royal princesses are your favorites; the consort stands at your right hand, decked in gold of Ophir.
verses.text_he: בְּנ֣וֹת מְ֭לָכִים בְּיִקְּרוֹתֶ֑יךָ נִצְּבָ֥ה שֵׁגַ֥ל לִ֝ימִינְךָ֗ בְּכֶ֣תֶם אוֹפִֽיר׃

verses.text_en: Take heed, lass, and note, incline your ear: forget your people and your father’s house,
verses.text_he: שִׁמְעִי־בַ֣ת וּ֭רְאִי וְהַטִּ֣י אׇזְנֵ֑ךְ וְשִׁכְחִ֥י עַ֝מֵּ֗ךְ וּבֵ֥ית אָבִֽיךְ׃

verses.text_en: and let the king be aroused by your beauty; since he is your lord, bow to him.
verses.text_he: וְיִתְאָ֣ו הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ יׇפְיֵ֑ךְ כִּי־ה֥וּא אֲ֝דֹנַ֗יִךְ וְהִשְׁתַּֽחֲוִי־לֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: O Tyrian lass, the wealthiest people will court your favor with gifts,
verses.text_he: וּבַֽת־צֹ֨ר׀ בְּ֭מִנְחָה פָּנַ֥יִךְ יְחַלּ֗וּ עֲשִׁ֣ירֵי עָֽם׃

verses.text_en: goods of all sorts. The royal princess, her dress embroidered with golden mountings,
verses.text_he: כׇּל־כְּבוּדָּ֣ה בַת־מֶ֣לֶךְ פְּנִ֑ימָה מִֽמִּשְׁבְּצ֖וֹת זָהָ֣ב לְבוּשָֽׁהּ׃

verses.text_en: is led inside to the king; maidens in her train, her companions, are presented to you.
verses.text_he: לִרְקָמוֹת֮ תּוּבַ֢ל לַ֫מֶּ֥לֶךְ בְּתוּל֣וֹת אַ֭חֲרֶיהָ רֵעוֹתֶ֑יהָ מ֖וּבָא֣וֹת לָֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: They are led in with joy and gladness; they enter the palace of the king.
verses.text_he: תּ֭וּבַלְנָה בִּשְׂמָחֹ֣ת וָגִ֑יל תְּ֝בֹאֶ֗ינָה בְּהֵ֣יכַל מֶֽלֶךְ׃

verses.text_en: Your sons will succeed your ancestors; you will appoint them princes throughout the land.
verses.text_he: תַּ֣חַת אֲ֭בֹתֶיךָ יִהְי֣וּ בָנֶ֑יךָ תְּשִׁיתֵ֥מוֹ לְ֝שָׂרִ֗ים בְּכׇל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: I commemorate your fame for all generations, so peoples will praise you forever and ever.
verses.text_he: אַזְכִּ֣ירָה שִׁ֭מְךָ בְּכׇל־דֹּ֣ר וָדֹ֑ר עַל־כֵּ֥ן עַמִּ֥ים יְ֝הוֹד֗וּךָ לְעֹלָ֥ם וָעֶֽד׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. Of the Korahites; on . A song.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ לִבְנֵי־קֹ֑רַח עַֽל־עֲלָמ֥וֹת שִֽׁיר׃

verses.text_en: God is our refuge and stronghold, a help in trouble, very near.
verses.text_he: אֱלֹהִ֣ים לָ֭נוּ מַחֲסֶ֣ה וָעֹ֑ז עֶזְרָ֥ה בְ֝צָר֗וֹת נִמְצָ֥א מְאֹֽד׃

verses.text_en: Therefore we are not afraid though the earth reels, though mountains topple into the sea—
verses.text_he: עַל־כֵּ֣ן לֹֽא־נִ֭ירָא בְּהָמִ֣יר אָ֑רֶץ וּבְמ֥וֹט הָ֝רִ֗ים בְּלֵ֣ב יַמִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: its waters rage and foam; in its swell mountains quake. .
verses.text_he: יֶהֱמ֣וּ יֶחְמְר֣וּ מֵימָ֑יו יִ֥רְעֲשֽׁוּ־הָרִ֖ים בְּגַאֲוָת֣וֹ סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: There is a river whose streams gladden God’s city, the holy dwelling-place of the Most High.
verses.text_he: נָהָ֗ר פְּלָגָ֗יו יְשַׂמְּח֥וּ עִיר־אֱלֹהִ֑ים קְ֝דֹ֗שׁ מִשְׁכְּנֵ֥י עֶלְיֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: God is in its midst, it will not be toppled; by daybreak God will come to its aid.
verses.text_he: אֱלֹהִ֣ים בְּ֭קִרְבָּהּ בַּל־תִּמּ֑וֹט יַעְזְרֶ֥הָ אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים לִפְנ֥וֹת בֹּֽקֶר׃

verses.text_en: Nations rage, kingdoms topple; at the sound of His thunder the earth dissolves.
verses.text_he: הָמ֣וּ ג֭וֹיִם מָ֣טוּ מַמְלָכ֑וֹת נָתַ֥ן בְּ֝קוֹל֗וֹ תָּמ֥וּג אָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: The LORD of hosts is with us; the God of Jacob is our haven. .
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֣ה צְבָא֣וֹת עִמָּ֑נוּ מִשְׂגָּֽב־לָ֨נוּ אֱלֹהֵ֖י יַעֲקֹ֣ב סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Come and see what the LORD has done, how He has wrought desolation on the earth.
verses.text_he: לְֽכוּ־חֲ֭זוּ מִפְעֲל֣וֹת יְהֹוָ֑ה אֲשֶׁר־שָׂ֖ם שַׁמּ֣וֹת בָּאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: He puts a stop to wars throughout the earth, breaking the bow, snapping the spear, consigning wagons to the flames.
verses.text_he: מַשְׁבִּ֥ית מִלְחָמוֹת֮ עַד־קְצֵ֢ה הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ קֶ֣שֶׁת יְ֭שַׁבֵּר וְקִצֵּ֣ץ חֲנִ֑ית עֲ֝גָל֗וֹת יִשְׂרֹ֥ף בָּאֵֽשׁ׃

verses.text_en: “Desist! Realize that I am God! I dominate the nations; I dominate the earth.”
verses.text_he: הַרְפּ֣וּ וּ֭דְעוּ כִּֽי־אָנֹכִ֣י אֱלֹהִ֑ים אָר֥וּם בַּ֝גּוֹיִ֗ם אָר֥וּם בָּאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: The LORD of hosts is with us; the God of Jacob is our haven. .
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֣ה צְבָא֣וֹת עִמָּ֑נוּ מִשְׂגָּֽב־לָ֨נוּ אֱלֹהֵ֖י יַעֲקֹ֣ב סֶֽלָה׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. Of the Korahites. A psalm.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ׀לִבְנֵי־קֹ֬רַח מִזְמֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: All you peoples, clap your hands, raise a joyous shout for God.
verses.text_he: כׇּֽל־הָ֭עַמִּים תִּקְעוּ־כָ֑ף הָרִ֥יעוּ לֵ֝אלֹהִ֗ים בְּק֣וֹל רִנָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: For the LORD Most High is awesome, great king over all the earth;
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־יְהֹוָ֣ה עֶלְי֣וֹן נוֹרָ֑א מֶ֥לֶךְ גָּ֝ד֗וֹל עַל־כׇּל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: He subjects peoples to us, sets nations at our feet.
verses.text_he: יַדְבֵּ֣ר עַמִּ֣ים תַּחְתֵּ֑ינוּ וּ֝לְאֻמִּ֗ים תַּ֣חַת רַגְלֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: He chose our heritage for us, the pride of Jacob whom He loved. .
verses.text_he: יִבְחַר־לָ֥נוּ אֶת־נַחֲלָתֵ֑נוּ אֶ֥ת־גְּא֨וֹן יַעֲקֹ֖ב אֲשֶׁר־אָהֵ֣ב סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: God ascends midst acclamation; the LORD, to the blasts of the horn.
verses.text_he: עָלָ֣ה אֱ֭לֹהִים בִּתְרוּעָ֑ה יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה בְּק֣וֹל שׁוֹפָֽר׃

verses.text_en: Sing, O sing to God; sing, O sing to our king;
verses.text_he: זַמְּר֣וּ אֱלֹהִ֣ים זַמֵּ֑רוּ זַמְּר֖וּ לְמַלְכֵּ֣נוּ זַמֵּֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: for God is king over all the earth; sing a hymn.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י מֶ֖לֶךְ כׇּל־הָאָ֥רֶץ אֱלֹהִ֗ים זַמְּר֥וּ מַשְׂכִּֽיל׃

verses.text_en: God reigns over the nations; God is seated on His holy throne.
verses.text_he: מָלַ֣ךְ אֱ֭לֹהִים עַל־גּוֹיִ֑ם אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים יָשַׁ֤ב׀ עַל־כִּסֵּ֬א קׇדְשֽׁוֹ׃

verses.text_en: The great of the peoples are gathered together, the retinue of Abraham’s God; for the guardians of the earth belong to God; He is greatly exalted.
verses.text_he: נְדִ֘יבֵ֤י עַמִּ֨ים׀ נֶאֱסָ֗פוּ עַם֮ אֱלֹהֵ֢י אַבְרָ֫הָ֥ם כִּ֣י לֵ֭אלֹהִים מָֽגִנֵּי־אֶ֗רֶץ מְאֹ֣ד נַעֲלָֽה׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song. A psalm of the Korahites.
verses.text_he: שִׁ֥יר מִ֝זְמ֗וֹר לִבְנֵי־קֹֽרַח׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is great and much acclaimed in the city of our God, His holy mountain—
verses.text_he: גָּ֘ד֤וֹל יְהֹוָ֣ה וּמְהֻלָּ֣ל מְאֹ֑ד בְּעִ֥יר אֱ֝לֹהֵ֗ינוּ הַר־קׇדְשֽׁוֹ׃

verses.text_en: fair-crested, joy of all the earth, Mount Zion, summit of Zaphon, city of the great king.
verses.text_he: יְפֵ֥ה נוֹף֮ מְשׂ֢וֹשׂ כׇּל־הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ הַר־צִ֭יּוֹן יַרְכְּתֵ֣י צָפ֑וֹן קִ֝רְיַ֗ת מֶ֣לֶךְ רָֽב׃

verses.text_en: Through its citadels, God has made Himself known as a haven.
verses.text_he: אֱלֹהִ֥ים בְּאַרְמְנוֹתֶ֗יהָ נוֹדַ֥ע לְמִשְׂגָּֽב׃

verses.text_en: See, the kings joined forces; they advanced together.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־הִנֵּ֣ה הַ֭מְּלָכִים נ֥וֹעֲד֑וּ עָבְר֥וּ יַחְדָּֽו׃

verses.text_en: At the mere sight of it they were stunned, they were terrified, they panicked;
verses.text_he: הֵ֣מָּה רָ֭אוּ כֵּ֣ן תָּמָ֑הוּ נִבְהֲל֥וּ נֶחְפָּֽזוּ׃

verses.text_en: they were seized there with a trembling, like a woman in the throes of labor,
verses.text_he: רְ֭עָדָה אֲחָזָ֣תַם שָׁ֑ם חִ֝֗יל כַּיּוֹלֵדָֽה׃

verses.text_en: as the Tarshish fleet was wrecked in an easterly gale.
verses.text_he: בְּר֥וּחַ קָדִ֑ים תְּ֝שַׁבֵּ֗ר אֳנִיּ֥וֹת תַּרְשִֽׁישׁ׃

verses.text_en: The likes of what we heard we have now witnessed in the city of the LORD of hosts, in the city of our God— may God preserve it forever! .
verses.text_he: כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר שָׁמַ֨עְנוּ׀ כֵּ֤ן רָאִ֗ינוּ בְּעִיר־יְהֹוָ֣ה צְ֭בָאוֹת בְּעִ֣יר אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ אֱלֹ֘הִ֤ים יְכוֹנְנֶ֖הָ עַד־עוֹלָ֣ם סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: In Your temple, God, we meditate upon Your faithful care.
verses.text_he: דִּמִּ֣ינוּ אֱלֹהִ֣ים חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ בְּ֝קֶ֗רֶב הֵיכָלֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: The praise of You, God, like Your name, reaches to the ends of the earth; Your right hand is filled with beneficence.
verses.text_he: כְּשִׁמְךָ֤ אֱלֹהִ֗ים כֵּ֣ן תְּ֭הִלָּתְךָ עַל־קַצְוֵי־אֶ֑רֶץ צֶ֝֗דֶק מָלְאָ֥ה יְמִינֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Let Mount Zion rejoice! Let the towns of Judah exult, because of Your judgments.
verses.text_he: יִשְׂמַ֤ח׀ הַר־צִיּ֗וֹן תָּ֭גֵלְנָה בְּנ֣וֹת יְהוּדָ֑ה לְ֝מַ֗עַן מִשְׁפָּטֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Walk around Zion, circle it; count its towers,
verses.text_he: סֹ֣בּוּ צִ֭יּוֹן וְהַקִּיפ֑וּהָ סִ֝פְר֗וּ מִגְדָּלֶֽיהָ׃

verses.text_en: take note of its ramparts; go through its citadels, that you may recount it to a future age.
verses.text_he: שִׁ֤יתוּ לִבְּכֶ֨ם׀ לְֽחֵילָ֗הֿ פַּסְּג֥וּ אַרְמְנוֹתֶ֑יהָ לְמַ֥עַן תְּ֝סַפְּר֗וּ לְד֣וֹר אַחֲרֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: For God—He is our God forever; He will lead us evermore.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י זֶ֨ה׀ אֱלֹהִ֣ים אֱ֭לֹהֵינוּ עוֹלָ֣ם וָעֶ֑ד ה֖וּא יְנַהֲגֵ֣נוּ עַל־מֽוּת׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. Of the Korahites. A psalm.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ׀לִבְנֵי־קֹ֬רַח מִזְמֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: Hear this, all you peoples; give ear, all inhabitants of the world,
verses.text_he: שִׁמְעוּ־זֹ֭את כׇּל־הָעַמִּ֑ים הַ֝אֲזִ֗ינוּ כׇּל־יֹ֥שְׁבֵי חָֽלֶד׃

verses.text_en: men of all estates, rich and poor alike.
verses.text_he: גַּם־בְּנֵ֣י אָ֭דָם גַּם־בְּנֵי־אִ֑ישׁ יַ֝֗חַד עָשִׁ֥יר וְאֶבְיֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: My mouth utters wisdom, my speech is full of insight.
verses.text_he: פִּ֭י יְדַבֵּ֣ר חׇכְמ֑וֹת וְהָג֖וּת לִבִּ֣י תְבוּנֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: I will turn my attention to a theme, set forth my lesson to the music of a lyre.
verses.text_he: אַטֶּ֣ה לְמָשָׁ֣ל אׇזְנִ֑י אֶפְתַּ֥ח בְּ֝כִנּ֗וֹר חִידָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: In time of trouble, why should I fear the encompassing evil of those who would supplant me—
verses.text_he: לָ֣מָּה אִ֭ירָא בִּ֣ימֵי רָ֑ע עֲוֺ֖ן עֲקֵבַ֣י יְסוּבֵּֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: men who trust in their riches, who glory in their great wealth?
verses.text_he: הַבֹּטְחִ֥ים עַל־חֵילָ֑ם וּבְרֹ֥ב עׇ֝שְׁרָ֗ם יִתְהַלָּֽלוּ׃

verses.text_en: Ah, it cannot redeem a man, or pay his ransom to God;
verses.text_he: אָ֗ח לֹא־פָדֹ֣ה יִפְדֶּ֣ה אִ֑ישׁ לֹא־יִתֵּ֖ן לֵאלֹהִ֣ים כׇּפְרֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: the price of life is too high; and so one ceases to be, forever.
verses.text_he: וְ֭יֵקַר פִּדְי֥וֹן נַפְשָׁ֗ם וְחָדַ֥ל לְעוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Shall he live eternally, and never see the grave?
verses.text_he: וִיחִי־ע֥וֹד לָנֶ֑צַח לֹ֖א יִרְאֶ֣ה הַשָּֽׁחַת׃

verses.text_en: For one sees that the wise die, that the foolish and ignorant both perish, leaving their wealth to others.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י יִרְאֶ֨ה׀ חֲכָ֘מִ֤ים יָמ֗וּתוּ יַ֤חַד כְּסִ֣יל וָבַ֣עַר יֹאבֵ֑דוּ וְעָזְב֖וּ לַאֲחֵרִ֣ים חֵילָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Their grave is their eternal home, the dwelling-place for all generations of those once famous on earth.
verses.text_he: קִרְבָּ֤ם בָּתֵּ֨ימוֹ׀ לְֽעוֹלָ֗ם מִ֭שְׁכְּנֹתָם לְד֣וֹר וָדֹ֑ר קָרְא֥וּ בִ֝שְׁמוֹתָ֗ם עֲלֵ֣י אֲדָמֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: Man does not abide in honor; he is like the beasts that perish.
verses.text_he: וְאָדָ֣ם בִּ֭יקָר בַּל־יָלִ֑ין נִמְשַׁ֖ל כַּבְּהֵמ֣וֹת נִדְמֽוּ׃

verses.text_en: Such is the fate of those who are self-confident, the end of those pleased with their own talk. .
verses.text_he: זֶ֣ה דַ֭רְכָּם כֵּ֣סֶל לָ֑מוֹ וְאַחֲרֵיהֶ֓ם׀ בְּפִיהֶ֖ם יִרְצ֣וּ סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Sheeplike they head for Sheol, with Death as their shepherd. The upright shall rule over them at daybreak, and their form shall waste away in Sheol till its nobility be gone.
verses.text_he: כַּצֹּ֤אן׀ לִ֥שְׁא֣וֹל שַׁתּוּ֮ מָ֤וֶת יִ֫רְעֵ֥ם וַיִּרְדּ֘וּ־בָ֤ם יְשָׁרִ֨ים׀ לַבֹּ֗קֶר (וצירם) [וְ֭צוּרָם] לְבַלּ֥וֹת שְׁא֗וֹל מִזְּבֻ֥ל לֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: But God will redeem my life from the clutches of Sheol, for He will take me. .
verses.text_he: אַךְ־אֱלֹהִ֗ים יִפְדֶּ֣ה נַ֭פְשִׁי מִֽיַּד־שְׁא֑וֹל כִּ֖י יִקָּחֵ֣נִי סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Do not be afraid when a man becomes rich, when his household goods increase;
verses.text_he: אַל־תִּ֭ירָא כִּֽי־יַעֲשִׁ֣ר אִ֑ישׁ כִּי־יִ֝רְבֶּ֗ה כְּב֣וֹד בֵּיתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: for when he dies he can take none of it along; his goods cannot follow him down.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י לֹ֣א בְ֭מוֹתוֹ יִקַּ֣ח הַכֹּ֑ל לֹֽא־יֵרֵ֖ד אַחֲרָ֣יו כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Though he congratulates himself in his lifetime —“They must admit that you did well by yourself”—
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־נַ֭פְשׁוֹ בְּחַיָּ֣יו יְבָרֵ֑ךְ וְ֝יוֹדֻ֗ךָ כִּי־תֵיטִ֥יב לָֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: yet he must join the company of his ancestors, who will never see daylight again.
verses.text_he: תָּ֭בוֹא עַד־דּ֣וֹר אֲבוֹתָ֑יו עַד־נֵ֝֗צַח לֹ֣א יִרְאוּ־אֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: Man does not understand honor; he is like the beasts that perish.
verses.text_he: אָדָ֣ם בִּ֭יקָר וְלֹ֣א יָבִ֑ין נִמְשַׁ֖ל כַּבְּהֵמ֣וֹת נִדְמֽוּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A psalm of Asaph. God, the LORD God spoke and summoned the world from east to west.
verses.text_he: מִזְמ֗וֹר לְאָ֫סָ֥ף אֵ֤ל׀ אֱֽלֹהִ֡ים יְֽהֹוָ֗ה דִּבֶּ֥ר וַיִּקְרָא־אָ֑רֶץ מִמִּזְרַח־שֶׁ֝֗מֶשׁ עַד־מְבֹאֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: From Zion, perfect in beauty, God appeared
verses.text_he: מִצִּיּ֥וֹן מִכְלַל־יֹ֗פִי אֱלֹהִ֥ים הוֹפִֽיעַ׃

verses.text_en: —let our God come and not fail to act! Devouring fire preceded Him; it stormed around Him fiercely.
verses.text_he: יָ֤בֹ֥א אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ וְֽאַל־יֶ֫חֱרַ֥שׁ אֵשׁ־לְפָנָ֥יו תֹּאכֵ֑ל וּ֝סְבִיבָ֗יו נִשְׂעֲרָ֥ה מְאֹֽד׃

verses.text_en: He summoned the heavens above, and the earth, for the trial of His people.
verses.text_he: יִקְרָ֣א אֶל־הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם מֵעָ֑ל וְאֶל־הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ לָדִ֥ין עַמּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: “Bring in My devotees, who made a covenant with Me over sacrifice!”
verses.text_he: אִסְפוּ־לִ֥י חֲסִידָ֑י כֹּרְתֵ֖י בְרִיתִ֣י עֲלֵי־זָֽבַח׃

verses.text_en: Then the heavens proclaimed His righteousness, for He is a God who judges. .
verses.text_he: וַיַּגִּ֣ידוּ שָׁמַ֣יִם צִדְק֑וֹ כִּֽי־אֱלֹהִ֓ים׀ שֹׁפֵ֖ט ה֣וּא סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: “Pay heed, My people, and I will speak, O Israel, and I will arraign you. I am God, your God.
verses.text_he: שִׁמְעָ֤ה עַמִּ֨י׀ וַאֲדַבֵּ֗רָה יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל וְאָעִ֣ידָה בָּ֑ךְ אֱלֹהִ֖ים אֱלֹהֶ֣יךָ אָנֹֽכִי׃

verses.text_en: I censure you not for your sacrifices, and your burnt offerings, made to Me daily;
verses.text_he: לֹ֣א עַל־זְ֭בָחֶיךָ אוֹכִיחֶ֑ךָ וְעוֹלֹתֶ֖יךָ לְנֶגְדִּ֣י תָמִֽיד׃

verses.text_en: I claim no bull from your estate, no he-goats from your pens.
verses.text_he: לֹא־אֶקַּ֣ח מִבֵּיתְךָ֣ פָ֑ר מִ֝מִּכְלְאֹתֶ֗יךָ עַתּוּדִֽים׃

verses.text_en: For Mine is every animal of the forest, the beasts on a thousand mountains.
verses.text_he: כִּי־לִ֥י כׇל־חַיְתוֹ־יָ֑עַר בְּ֝הֵמ֗וֹת בְּהַרְרֵי־אָֽלֶף׃

verses.text_en: I know every bird of the mountains, the creatures of the field are subject to Me.
verses.text_he: יָ֭דַעְתִּי כׇּל־ע֣וֹף הָרִ֑ים וְזִ֥יז שָׂ֝דַ֗י עִמָּדִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Were I hungry, I would not tell you, for Mine is the world and all it holds.
verses.text_he: אִם־אֶ֭רְעַב לֹא־אֹ֣מַר לָ֑ךְ כִּי־לִ֥י תֵ֝בֵ֗ל וּמְלֹאָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: Do I eat the flesh of bulls, or drink the blood of he-goats?
verses.text_he: הַ֭אוֹכַל בְּשַׂ֣ר אַבִּירִ֑ים וְדַ֖ם עַתּוּדִ֣ים אֶשְׁתֶּֽה׃

verses.text_en: Sacrifice a thank offering to God, and pay your vows to the Most High.
verses.text_he: זְבַ֣ח לֵאלֹהִ֣ים תּוֹדָ֑ה וְשַׁלֵּ֖ם לְעֶלְי֣וֹן נְדָרֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Call upon Me in time of trouble; I will rescue you, and you shall honor Me.”
verses.text_he: וּ֭קְרָאֵנִי בְּי֣וֹם צָרָ֑ה אֲ֝חַלֶּצְךָ֗ וּֽתְכַבְּדֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: And to the wicked, God said: “Who are you to recite My laws, and mouth the terms of My covenant,
verses.text_he: וְלָ֤רָשָׁ֨ע׀ אָ֘מַ֤ר אֱלֹהִ֗ים מַה־לְּ֭ךָ לְסַפֵּ֣ר חֻקָּ֑י וַתִּשָּׂ֖א בְרִיתִ֣י עֲלֵי־פִֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: seeing that you spurn My discipline, and brush My words aside?
verses.text_he: וְ֭אַתָּה שָׂנֵ֣אתָ מוּסָ֑ר וַתַּשְׁלֵ֖ךְ דְּבָרַ֣י אַחֲרֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: When you see a thief, you fall in with him, and throw in your lot with adulterers;
verses.text_he: אִם־רָאִ֣יתָ גַ֭נָּב וַתִּ֣רֶץ עִמּ֑וֹ וְעִ֖ם מְנָאֲפִ֣ים חֶלְקֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: you devote your mouth to evil, and yoke your tongue to deceit;
verses.text_he: פִּ֭יךָ שָׁלַ֣חְתָּ בְרָעָ֑ה וּ֝לְשׁוֹנְךָ֗ תַּצְמִ֥יד מִרְמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: you are busy maligning your brother, defaming the son of your mother.
If I failed to act when you did these things, you would fancy that I was like you; so I censure you and confront you with charges.
verses.text_he: אֵ֤לֶּה עָשִׂ֨יתָ׀ וְֽהֶחֱרַ֗שְׁתִּי דִּמִּ֗יתָ הֱיֽוֹת־אֶהְיֶ֥ה כָמ֑וֹךָ אוֹכִיחֲךָ֖ וְאֶעֶרְכָ֣ה לְעֵינֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Mark this, you who are unmindful of God, lest I tear you apart and no one save you.
verses.text_he: בִּינוּ־נָ֣א זֹ֭את שֹׁכְחֵ֣י אֱל֑וֹהַּ פֶּן־אֶ֝טְרֹ֗ף וְאֵ֣ין מַצִּֽיל׃

verses.text_en: He who sacrifices a thank offering honors Me, and to him who improves his way I will show the salvation of God.”
verses.text_he: זֹבֵ֥חַ תּוֹדָ֗ה יְֽכַ֫בְּדָ֥נְנִי וְשָׂ֥ם דֶּ֑רֶךְ אַ֝רְאֶ֗נּוּ בְּיֵ֣שַׁע אֱלֹהִֽים׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. A psalm of David,
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: when Nathan the prophet came to him after he had come to Bathsheba.
verses.text_he: בְּֽבוֹא־אֵ֭לָיו נָתָ֣ן הַנָּבִ֑יא כַּאֲשֶׁר־בָּ֝֗א אֶל־בַּת־שָֽׁבַע׃

verses.text_en: Have mercy upon me, O God, as befits Your faithfulness; in keeping with Your abundant compassion, blot out my transgressions.
verses.text_he: חׇנֵּ֣נִי אֱלֹהִ֣ים כְּחַסְדֶּ֑ךָ כְּרֹ֥ב רַ֝חֲמֶ֗יךָ מְחֵ֣ה פְשָׁעָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Wash me thoroughly of my iniquity, and purify me of my sin;
verses.text_he: (הרבה) [הֶ֭רֶב] כַּבְּסֵ֣נִי מֵעֲוֺנִ֑י וּֽמֵחַטָּאתִ֥י טַהֲרֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: for I recognize my transgressions, and am ever conscious of my sin.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־פְ֭שָׁעַי אֲנִ֣י אֵדָ֑ע וְחַטָּאתִ֖י נֶגְדִּ֣י תָמִֽיד׃

verses.text_en: Against You alone have I sinned, and done what is evil in Your sight; so You are just in Your sentence, and right in Your judgment.
verses.text_he: לְךָ֤ לְבַדְּךָ֨׀ חָטָאתִי֮ וְהָרַ֥ע בְּעֵינֶ֗יךָ עָ֫שִׂ֥יתִי לְ֭מַעַן תִּצְדַּ֥ק בְּדׇבְרֶ֗ךָ תִּזְכֶּ֥ה בְשׇׁפְטֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Indeed I was born with iniquity; with sin my mother conceived me.
verses.text_he: הֵן־בְּעָו֥וֹן חוֹלָ֑לְתִּי וּ֝בְחֵ֗טְא יֶחֱמַ֥תְנִי אִמִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: Indeed You desire truth about that which is hidden; teach me wisdom about secret things.
verses.text_he: הֵן־אֱ֭מֶת חָפַ֣צְתָּ בַטֻּח֑וֹת וּ֝בְסָתֻ֗ם חׇכְמָ֥ה תוֹדִיעֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Purge me with hyssop till I am pure; wash me till I am whiter than snow.
verses.text_he: תְּחַטְּאֵ֣נִי בְאֵז֣וֹב וְאֶטְהָ֑ר תְּ֝כַבְּסֵ֗נִי וּמִשֶּׁ֥לֶג אַלְבִּֽין׃

verses.text_en: Let me hear tidings of joy and gladness; let the bones You have crushed exult.
verses.text_he: תַּ֭שְׁמִיעֵנִי שָׂשׂ֣וֹן וְשִׂמְחָ֑ה תָּ֝גֵ֗לְנָה עֲצָמ֥וֹת דִּכִּֽיתָ׃

verses.text_en: Hide Your face from my sins; blot out all my iniquities.
verses.text_he: הַסְתֵּ֣ר פָּ֭נֶיךָ מֵחֲטָאָ֑י וְֽכׇל־עֲוֺ֖נֹתַ֣י מְחֵֽה׃

verses.text_en: Fashion a pure heart for me, O God; create in me a steadfast spirit.
verses.text_he: לֵ֣ב טָ֭הוֹר בְּרָא־לִ֣י אֱלֹהִ֑ים וְר֥וּחַ נָ֝כ֗וֹן חַדֵּ֥שׁ בְּקִרְבִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: Do not cast me out of Your presence, or take Your holy spirit away from me.
verses.text_he: אַל־תַּשְׁלִיכֵ֥נִי מִלְּפָנֶ֑יךָ וְר֥וּחַ קׇ֝דְשְׁךָ֗ אַל־תִּקַּ֥ח מִמֶּֽנִּי׃

verses.text_en: Let me again rejoice in Your help; let a vigorous spirit sustain me.
verses.text_he: הָשִׁ֣יבָה לִּ֭י שְׂשׂ֣וֹן יִשְׁעֶ֑ךָ וְר֖וּחַ נְדִיבָ֣ה תִסְמְכֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: I will teach transgressors Your ways, that sinners may return to You.
verses.text_he: אֲלַמְּדָ֣ה פֹשְׁעִ֣ים דְּרָכֶ֑יךָ וְ֝חַטָּאִ֗ים אֵלֶ֥יךָ יָשֽׁוּבוּ׃

verses.text_en: Save me from bloodguilt, O God, God, my deliverer, that I may sing forth Your beneficence.
verses.text_he: הַצִּ֘ילֵ֤נִי מִדָּמִ֨ים׀ אֱֽלֹהִ֗ים אֱלֹהֵ֥י תְשׁוּעָתִ֑י תְּרַנֵּ֥ן לְ֝שׁוֹנִ֗י צִדְקָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: O Lord, open my lips, and let my mouth declare Your praise.
verses.text_he: אֲ֭דֹנָי שְׂפָתַ֣י תִּפְתָּ֑ח וּ֝פִ֗י יַגִּ֥יד תְּהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: You do not want me to bring sacrifices; You do not desire burnt offerings;
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י׀ לֹא־תַחְפֹּ֣ץ זֶ֣בַח וְאֶתֵּ֑נָה ע֝וֹלָ֗ה לֹ֣א תִרְצֶֽה׃

verses.text_en: True sacrifice to God is a contrite spirit; God, You will not despise a contrite and crushed heart.
verses.text_he: זִ֥בְחֵ֣י אֱלֹהִים֮ ר֤וּחַ נִשְׁבָּ֫רָ֥ה לֵב־נִשְׁבָּ֥ר וְנִדְכֶּ֑ה אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים לֹ֣א תִבְזֶֽה׃

verses.text_en: May it please You to make Zion prosper; rebuild the walls of Jerusalem.
verses.text_he: הֵיטִ֣יבָה בִ֭רְצוֹנְךָ אֶת־צִיּ֑וֹן תִּ֝בְנֶ֗ה חוֹמ֥וֹת יְרוּשָׁלָֽ͏ִם׃

verses.text_en: Then You will want sacrifices offered in righteousness, burnt and whole offerings; then bulls will be offered on Your altar.
verses.text_he: אָ֤ז תַּחְפֹּ֣ץ זִבְחֵי־צֶ֭דֶק עוֹלָ֣ה וְכָלִ֑יל אָ֤ז יַעֲל֖וּ עַל־מִזְבַּחֲךָ֣ פָרִֽים׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. A of David,
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ מַשְׂכִּ֥יל לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: when Doeg the Edomite came and informed Saul, telling him, “David came to Ahimelech’s house.”
verses.text_he: בְּב֤וֹא׀ דּוֹאֵ֣ג הָאֲדֹמִי֮ וַיַּגֵּ֢ד לְשָׁ֫א֥וּל וַיֹּ֥אמֶר ל֑וֹ בָּ֥א דָ֝וִ֗ד אֶל־בֵּ֥ית אֲחִימֶֽלֶךְ׃

verses.text_en: Why do you boast of your evil, brave fellow? God’s faithfulness never ceases.
verses.text_he: מַה־תִּתְהַלֵּ֣ל בְּ֭רָעָה הַגִּבּ֑וֹר חֶ֥סֶד אֵ֝֗ל כׇּל־הַיּֽוֹם׃

verses.text_en: Your tongue devises mischief, like a sharpened razor that works treacherously.
verses.text_he: הַ֭וּוֹת תַּחְשֹׁ֣ב לְשׁוֹנֶ֑ךָ כְּתַ֥עַר מְ֝לֻטָּ֗שׁ עֹשֵׂ֥ה רְמִיָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: You prefer evil to good, the lie, to speaking truthfully. .
verses.text_he: אָהַ֣בְתָּ רָּ֣ע מִטּ֑וֹב שֶׁ֓קֶר׀ מִדַּבֵּ֖ר צֶ֣דֶק סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: You love all pernicious words, treacherous speech.
verses.text_he: אָהַ֥בְתָּ כׇֽל־דִּבְרֵי־בָ֗לַע לְשׁ֣וֹן מִרְמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: So God will tear you down for good, will break you and pluck you from your tent, and root you out of the land of the living. .
verses.text_he: גַּם־אֵל֮ יִתׇּצְךָ֢ לָ֫נֶ֥צַח יַחְתְּךָ֣ וְיִסָּחֲךָ֣ מֵאֹ֑הֶל וְשֵׁרֶשְׁךָ֨ מֵאֶ֖רֶץ חַיִּ֣ים סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: The righteous, seeing it, will be awestruck; they will jibe at him, saying,
verses.text_he: וְיִרְא֖וּ צַדִּיקִ֥ים וְיִירָ֗אוּ וְעָלָ֥יו יִשְׂחָֽקוּ׃

verses.text_en: “Here was a fellow who did not make God his refuge, but trusted in his great wealth, relied upon his mischief.”
verses.text_he: הִנֵּ֤ה הַגֶּ֗בֶר לֹ֤א יָשִׂ֥ים אֱלֹהִ֗ים מָ֫עוּזּ֥וֹ וַ֭יִּבְטַח בְּרֹ֣ב עׇשְׁר֑וֹ יָ֝עֹ֗ז בְּהַוָּתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: But I am like a thriving olive tree in God’s house; I trust in the faithfulness of God forever and ever.
verses.text_he: וַאֲנִ֤י׀ כְּזַ֣יִת רַ֭עֲנָן בְּבֵ֣ית אֱלֹהִ֑ים בָּטַ֥חְתִּי בְחֶסֶד־אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים עוֹלָ֥ם וָעֶֽד׃

verses.text_en: I praise You forever, for You have acted; I declare that Your name is good in the presence of Your faithful ones.
verses.text_he: אוֹדְךָ֣ לְ֭עוֹלָם כִּ֣י עָשִׂ֑יתָ וַאֲקַוֶּ֥ה שִׁמְךָ֥ כִי־ט֝֗וֹב נֶ֣גֶד חֲסִידֶֽיךָ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; on . A of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ עַֽל־מָחֲלַ֗ת מַשְׂכִּ֥יל לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: The benighted man thinks, “God does not care.” Man’s wrongdoing is corrupt and loathsome; no one does good.
verses.text_he: אָ֘מַ֤ר נָבָ֣ל בְּ֭לִבּוֹ אֵ֣ין אֱלֹהִ֑ים הִֽ֝שְׁחִ֗יתוּ וְהִֽתְעִ֥יבוּ עָ֝֗וֶל אֵ֣ין עֹֽשֵׂה־טֽוֹב׃

verses.text_en: God looks down from heaven on mankind to find a man of understanding, a man mindful of God.
verses.text_he: אֱֽלֹהִ֗ים מִשָּׁמַיִם֮ הִשְׁקִ֢יף עַֽל־בְּנֵי־אָ֫דָ֥ם לִ֭רְאוֹת הֲיֵ֣שׁ מַשְׂכִּ֑יל דֹּ֝רֵ֗שׁ אֶת־אֱלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Everyone is dross, altogether foul; there is none who does good, not even one.
verses.text_he: כֻּלּ֥וֹ סָג֮ יַחְדָּ֢ו נֶ֫אֱלָ֥חוּ אֵ֤ין עֹֽשֵׂה־ט֑וֹב אֵ֝֗ין גַּם־אֶחָֽד׃

verses.text_en: Are they so witless, those evildoers, who devour my people as they devour food, and do not invoke God?
verses.text_he: הֲלֹ֥א יָדְעוּ֮ פֹּ֤עֲלֵ֫י אָ֥וֶן אֹכְלֵ֣י עַ֭מִּי אָ֣כְלוּ לֶ֑חֶם אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים לֹ֣א קָרָֽאוּ׃
