verses.text_en: There they will be seized with fright —never was there such a fright— for God has scattered the bones of your besiegers; you have put them to shame, for God has rejected them.
verses.text_he: שָׁ֤ם׀ פָּ֥חֲדוּ פַחַד֮ לֹא־הָ֢יָ֫ה פָ֥חַד כִּֽי־אֱלֹהִ֗ים פִּ֭זַּר עַצְמ֣וֹת חֹנָ֑ךְ הֱ֝בִשֹׁ֗תָה כִּֽי־אֱלֹהִ֥ים מְאָסָֽם׃

verses.text_en: O that the deliverance of Israel might come from Zion! When God restores the fortunes of His people, Jacob will exult, Israel will rejoice.
verses.text_he: מִ֥י־יִתֵּ֣ן מִצִּיּוֹן֮ יְשֻׁע֢וֹת יִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל בְּשׁ֣וּב אֱ֭לֹהִים שְׁב֣וּת עַמּ֑וֹ יָגֵ֥ל יַ֝עֲקֹ֗ב יִשְׂמַ֥ח יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; with instrumental music. A of David,
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ בִּנְגִינֹ֗ת מַשְׂכִּ֥יל לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: when the Ziphites came and told Saul, “Know, David is in hiding among us.”
verses.text_he: בְּבֹ֣א הַ֭זִּיפִים וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ לְשָׁא֑וּל הֲלֹ֥א דָ֝וִ֗ד מִסְתַּתֵּ֥ר עִמָּֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: O God, deliver me by Your name; by Your power vindicate me.
verses.text_he: אֱ֭לֹהִים בְּשִׁמְךָ֣ הוֹשִׁיעֵ֑נִי וּבִגְבוּרָתְךָ֥ תְדִינֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: O God, hear my prayer; give ear to the words of my mouth.
verses.text_he: אֱ֭לֹהִים שְׁמַ֣ע תְּפִלָּתִ֑י הַ֝אֲזִ֗ינָה לְאִמְרֵי־פִֽי׃

verses.text_en: For strangers have risen against me, and ruthless men seek my life; they are unmindful of God. .
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י זָרִ֨ים׀ קָ֤מוּ עָלַ֗י וְֽ֭עָרִיצִים בִּקְשׁ֣וּ נַפְשִׁ֑י לֹ֤א שָׂ֨מוּ אֱלֹהִ֖ים לְנֶגְדָּ֣ם סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: See, God is my helper; the Lord is my support.
verses.text_he: הִנֵּ֣ה אֱ֭לֹהִים עֹזֵ֣ר לִ֑י אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י בְּֽסֹמְכֵ֥י נַפְשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: He will repay the evil of my watchful foes; by Your faithfulness, destroy them!
verses.text_he: (ישוב) [יָשִׁ֣יב] הָ֭רַע לְשֹׁרְרָ֑י בַּ֝אֲמִתְּךָ֗ הַצְמִיתֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: Then I will offer You a freewill sacrifice; I will praise Your name, LORD, for it is good,
verses.text_he: בִּנְדָבָ֥ה אֶזְבְּחָה־לָּ֑ךְ א֤וֹדֶה־שִּׁמְךָ֖ יְהֹוָ֣ה כִּי־טֽוֹב׃

verses.text_en: for it has saved me from my foes, and let me gaze triumphant upon my enemies.
verses.text_he: כִּ֣י מִכׇּל־צָ֭רָה הִצִּילָ֑נִי וּ֝בְאֹיְבַ֗י רָאֲתָ֥ה עֵינִֽי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; with instrumental music. A of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ בִּנְגִינֹ֗ת מַשְׂכִּ֥יל לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: Give ear, O God, to my prayer; do not ignore my plea;
verses.text_he: הַאֲזִ֣ינָה אֱ֭לֹהִים תְּפִלָּתִ֑י וְאַל־תִּ֝תְעַלַּ֗ם מִתְּחִנָּתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: pay heed to me and answer me. I am tossed about, complaining and moaning
verses.text_he: הַקְשִׁ֣יבָה לִּ֣י וַעֲנֵ֑נִי אָרִ֖יד בְּשִׂיחִ֣י וְאָהִֽימָה׃

verses.text_en: at the clamor of the enemy, because of the oppression of the wicked; for they bring evil upon me and furiously harass me.
verses.text_he: מִקּ֤וֹל אוֹיֵ֗ב מִ֭פְּנֵי עָקַ֣ת רָשָׁ֑ע כִּֽי־יָמִ֥יטוּ עָלַ֥י אָ֝֗וֶן וּבְאַ֥ף יִשְׂטְמֽוּנִי׃

verses.text_en: My heart is convulsed within me; terrors of death assail me.
verses.text_he: לִ֭בִּי יָחִ֣יל בְּקִרְבִּ֑י וְאֵימ֥וֹת מָ֝֗וֶת נָפְל֥וּ עָלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Fear and trembling invade me; I am clothed with horror.
verses.text_he: יִרְאָ֣ה וָ֭רַעַד יָ֣בֹא בִ֑י וַ֝תְּכַסֵּ֗נִי פַּלָּצֽוּת׃

verses.text_en: I said, “O that I had the wings of a dove! I would fly away and find rest;
verses.text_he: וָאֹמַ֗ר מִֽי־יִתֶּן־לִ֣י אֵ֭בֶר כַּיּוֹנָ֗ה אָע֥וּפָה וְאֶשְׁכֹּֽנָה׃

verses.text_en: surely, I would flee far off; I would lodge in the wilderness;
verses.text_he: הִ֭נֵּה אַרְחִ֣יק נְדֹ֑ד אָלִ֖ין בַּמִּדְבָּ֣ר סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: I would soon find me a refuge from the sweeping wind, from the tempest.”
verses.text_he: אָחִ֣ישָׁה מִפְלָ֣ט לִ֑י מֵר֖וּחַ סֹעָ֣ה מִסָּֽעַר׃

verses.text_en: O Lord, confound their speech, confuse it! For I see lawlessness and strife in the city;
verses.text_he: בַּלַּ֣ע אֲ֭דֹנָי פַּלַּ֣ג לְשׁוֹנָ֑ם כִּֽי־רָאִ֨יתִי חָמָ֖ס וְרִ֣יב בָּעִֽיר׃

verses.text_en: day and night they make their rounds on its walls; evil and mischief are inside it.
verses.text_he: יוֹמָ֤ם וָלַ֗יְלָה יְסוֹבְבֻ֥הָ עַל־חוֹמֹתֶ֑יהָ וְאָ֖וֶן וְעָמָ֣ל בְּקִרְבָּֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: Malice is within it; fraud and deceit never leave its square.
verses.text_he: הַוּ֥וֹת בְּקִרְבָּ֑הּ וְֽלֹא־יָמִ֥ישׁ מֵ֝רְחֹבָ֗הּ תֹּ֣ךְ וּמִרְמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: It is not an enemy who reviles me —I could bear that; it is not my foe who vaunts himself against me —I could hide from him;
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י לֹֽא־אוֹיֵ֥ב יְחָֽרְפֵ֗נִי וְאֶ֫שָּׂ֥א לֹא־מְ֭שַׂנְאִי עָלַ֣י הִגְדִּ֑יל וְאֶסָּתֵ֥ר מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃

verses.text_en: but it is you, my equal, my companion, my friend;
verses.text_he: וְאַתָּ֣ה אֱנ֣וֹשׁ כְּעֶרְכִּ֑י אַ֝לּוּפִ֗י וּמְיֻדָּעִֽי׃

verses.text_en: sweet was our fellowship; we walked together in God’s house.
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֣ר יַ֭חְדָּו נַמְתִּ֣יק ס֑וֹד בְּבֵ֥ית אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים נְהַלֵּ֥ךְ בְּרָֽגֶשׁ׃

verses.text_en: Let Him incite death against them; may they go down alive into Sheol! For where they dwell, there evil is.
verses.text_he: (ישימות) [יַשִּׁ֤י מָ֨וֶת׀] עָלֵ֗ימוֹ יֵרְד֣וּ שְׁא֣וֹל חַיִּ֑ים כִּֽי־רָע֖וֹת בִּמְגוּרָ֣ם בְּקִרְבָּֽם׃

verses.text_en: As for me, I call to God; the LORD will deliver me.
verses.text_he: אֲ֭נִי אֶל־אֱלֹהִ֣ים אֶקְרָ֑א וַ֝יהֹוָ֗ה יוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Evening, morning, and noon, I complain and moan, and He hears my voice.
verses.text_he: עֶ֤רֶב וָבֹ֣קֶר וְ֭צׇהֳרַיִם אָשִׂ֣יחָה וְאֶהֱמֶ֑ה וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע קוֹלִֽי׃

verses.text_en: He redeems me unharmed from the battle against me; it is as though many are on my side.
verses.text_he: פָּ֘דָ֤ה בְשָׁל֣וֹם נַ֭פְשִׁי מִקְּרׇב־לִ֑י כִּֽי־בְ֝רַבִּ֗ים הָי֥וּ עִמָּדִֽי׃

verses.text_en: God who has reigned from the first, who will have no successor, hears and humbles those who have no fear of God. .
verses.text_he: יִשְׁמַ֤ע׀ אֵ֨ל׀ וְֽיַעֲנֵם֮ וְיֹ֤שֵׁ֥ב קֶ֗דֶם סֶ֥֫לָה אֲשֶׁ֤ר אֵ֣ין חֲלִיפ֣וֹת לָ֑מוֹ וְלֹ֖א יָרְא֣וּ אֱלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: He harmed his ally, he broke his pact;
verses.text_he: שָׁלַ֣ח יָ֭דָיו בִּשְׁלֹמָ֗יו חִלֵּ֥ל בְּרִיתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: his talk was smoother than butter, yet his mind was on war; his words were more soothing than oil, yet they were drawn swords.
verses.text_he: חָלְק֤וּ׀ מַחְמָאֹ֣ת פִּיו֮ וּֽקְרָב־לִ֫בּ֥וֹ רַכּ֖וּ דְבָרָ֥יו מִשֶּׁ֗מֶן וְהֵ֣מָּה פְתִחֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: Cast your burden on the LORD and He will sustain you; He will never let the righteous man collapse.
verses.text_he: הַשְׁלֵ֤ךְ עַל־יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ יְהָבְךָ֮ וְה֢וּא יְכַ֫לְכְּלֶ֥ךָ לֹא־יִתֵּ֖ן לְעוֹלָ֥ם מ֗וֹט לַצַּדִּֽיק׃

verses.text_en: For You, O God, will bring them down to the nethermost Pit— those murderous, treacherous men; they shall not live out half their days; but I trust in You.
verses.text_he: וְאַתָּ֤ה אֱלֹהִ֨ים׀ תּוֹרִדֵ֬ם׀לִבְאֵ֬ר שַׁ֗חַת אַנְשֵׁ֤י דָמִ֣ים וּ֭מִרְמָה לֹא־יֶחֱצ֣וּ יְמֵיהֶ֑ם וַ֝אֲנִ֗י אֶבְטַח־בָּֽךְ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; on . Of David. A ; when the Philistines seized him in Gath.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֤חַ׀ עַל־י֬וֹנַת אֵ֣לֶם רְ֭חֹקִים לְדָוִ֣ד מִכְתָּ֑ם בֶּאֱחֹ֨ז אוֹת֖וֹ פְלִשְׁתִּ֣ים בְּגַֽת׃

verses.text_en: Have mercy on me, O God, for men persecute me; all day long my adversary oppresses me.
verses.text_he: חׇנֵּ֣נִי אֱ֭לֹהִים כִּֽי־שְׁאָפַ֣נִי אֱנ֑וֹשׁ כׇּל־הַ֝יּ֗וֹם לֹחֵ֥ם יִלְחָצֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: My watchful foes persecute me all day long; many are my adversaries, O Exalted One.
verses.text_he: שָׁאֲפ֣וּ שׁ֭וֹרְרַי כׇּל־הַיּ֑וֹם כִּֽי־רַבִּ֨ים לֹחֲמִ֖ים לִ֣י מָרֽוֹם׃

verses.text_en: When I am afraid, I trust in You,
verses.text_he: י֥וֹם אִירָ֑א אֲ֝נִ֗י אֵלֶ֥יךָ אֶבְטָֽח׃

verses.text_en: in God, whose word I praise, in God I trust; I am not afraid; what can mortals do to me?
verses.text_he: בֵּאלֹהִים֮ אֲהַלֵּ֢ל דְּבָ֫ר֥וֹ בֵּאלֹהִ֣ים בָּ֭טַחְתִּי לֹ֣א אִירָ֑א מַה־יַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה בָשָׂ֣ר לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: All day long they cause me grief in my affairs, they plan only evil against me.
verses.text_he: כׇּל־הַ֭יּוֹם דְּבָרַ֣י יְעַצֵּ֑בוּ עָלַ֖י כׇּל־מַחְשְׁבֹתָ֣ם לָרָֽע׃

verses.text_en: They plot, they lie in ambush; they watch my every move, hoping for my death.
verses.text_he: יָג֤וּרוּ׀ (יצפינו) [יִצְפּ֗וֹנוּ] הֵ֭מָּה עֲקֵבַ֣י יִשְׁמֹ֑רוּ כַּ֝אֲשֶׁ֗ר קִוּ֥וּ נַפְשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: Cast them out for their evil; subdue peoples in Your anger, O God.
verses.text_he: עַל־אָ֥וֶן פַּלֶּט־לָ֑מוֹ בְּ֝אַ֗ף עַמִּ֤ים׀ הוֹרֵ֬ד אֱלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: You keep count of my wanderings; put my tears into Your flask, into Your record.
verses.text_he: נֹדִי֮ סָפַ֢רְתָּ֫ה אָ֥תָּה שִׂ֣ימָה דִמְעָתִ֣י בְנֹאדֶ֑ךָ הֲ֝לֹ֗א בְּסִפְרָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Then my enemies will retreat when I call on You; this I know, that God is for me.
verses.text_he: אָ֨ז יָ֘שׁ֤וּבוּ אוֹיְבַ֣י אָ֭חוֹר בְּי֣וֹם אֶקְרָ֑א זֶֽה־יָ֝דַ֗עְתִּי כִּֽי־אֱלֹהִ֥ים לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: In God, whose word I praise, in the LORD, whose word I praise,
verses.text_he: בֵּ֭אלֹהִים אֲהַלֵּ֣ל דָּבָ֑ר בַּ֝יהֹוָ֗ה אֲהַלֵּ֥ל דָּבָֽר׃

verses.text_en: in God I trust; I am not afraid; what can man do to me?
verses.text_he: בֵּאלֹהִ֣ים בָּ֭טַחְתִּי לֹּ֣א אִירָ֑א מַה־יַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה אָדָ֣ם לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: I must pay my vows to You, O God; I will render thank offerings to You.
verses.text_he: עָלַ֣י אֱלֹהִ֣ים נְדָרֶ֑יךָ אֲשַׁלֵּ֖ם תּוֹדֹ֣ת לָֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: For You have saved me from death, my foot from stumbling, that I may walk before God in the light of life.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י הִצַּ֪לְתָּ נַפְשִׁ֡י מִמָּוֶת֮ הֲלֹ֥א רַגְלַ֗י מִ֫דֶּ֥חִי לְ֭הִֽתְהַלֵּךְ לִפְנֵ֣י אֱלֹהִ֑ים בְּ֝א֗וֹר הַחַיִּֽים׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; . Of David. A ; when he fled from Saul into a cave.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ אַל־תַּ֭שְׁחֵת לְדָוִ֣ד מִכְתָּ֑ם בְּבׇרְח֥וֹ מִפְּנֵי־שָׁ֝א֗וּל בַּמְּעָרָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Have mercy on me, O God, have mercy on me, for I seek refuge in You, I seek refuge in the shadow of Your wings, until danger passes.
verses.text_he: חׇנֵּ֤נִי אֱלֹהִ֨ים׀ חׇנֵּ֗נִי כִּ֥י בְךָ֮ חָסָ֢יָה נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י וּבְצֵֽל־כְּנָפֶ֥יךָ אֶחְסֶ֑ה עַ֝֗ד יַעֲבֹ֥ר הַוּֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: I call to God Most High, to God who is good to me.
verses.text_he: אֶ֭קְרָא לֵאלֹהִ֣ים עֶלְי֑וֹן לָ֝אֵ֗ל גֹּמֵ֥ר עָלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: He will reach down from heaven and deliver me: God will send down His steadfast love; my persecutor reviles. .
verses.text_he: יִשְׁלַ֤ח מִשָּׁמַ֨יִם׀ וְֽיוֹשִׁיעֵ֗נִי חֵרֵ֣ף שֹׁאֲפִ֣י סֶ֑לָה יִשְׁלַ֥ח אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים חַסְדּ֥וֹ וַאֲמִתּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: As for me, I lie down among man-eating lions whose teeth are spears and arrows, whose tongue is a sharp sword.
verses.text_he: נַפְשִׁ֤י׀ בְּת֥וֹךְ לְבָאִם֮ אֶשְׁכְּבָ֢ה לֹ֫הֲטִ֥ים בְּֽנֵי־אָדָ֗ם שִׁ֭נֵּיהֶם חֲנִ֣ית וְחִצִּ֑ים וּ֝לְשׁוֹנָ֗ם חֶ֣רֶב חַדָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: Exalt Yourself over the heavens, O God, let Your glory be over all the earth!
verses.text_he: ר֣וּמָה עַל־הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם אֱלֹהִ֑ים עַ֖ל כׇּל־הָאָ֣רֶץ כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: They prepared a net for my feet to ensnare me; they dug a pit for me, but they fell into it. .
verses.text_he: רֶ֤שֶׁת׀ הֵכִ֣ינוּ לִפְעָמַי֮ כָּפַ֢ף נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י כָּר֣וּ לְפָנַ֣י שִׁיחָ֑ה נָפְל֖וּ בְתוֹכָ֣הּ סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: My heart is firm, O God; my heart is firm; I will sing, I will chant a hymn.
verses.text_he: נָ֘כ֤וֹן לִבִּ֣י אֱ֭לֹהִים נָכ֣וֹן לִבִּ֑י אָ֝שִׁ֗ירָה וַאֲזַמֵּֽרָה׃

verses.text_en: Awake, O my soul! Awake, O harp and lyre! I will wake the dawn.
verses.text_he: ע֤וּרָה כְבוֹדִ֗י ע֭וּרָֽה הַנֵּ֥בֶל וְכִנּ֗וֹר אָעִ֥ירָה שָּֽׁחַר׃

verses.text_en: I will praise You among the peoples, O Lord; I will sing a hymn to You among the nations;
verses.text_he: אוֹדְךָ֖ בָעַמִּ֥ים׀אֲדֹנָ֑י אֲ֝זַמֶּרְךָ֗ בַּלְאֻמִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: for Your faithfulness is as high as heaven; Your steadfastness reaches to the sky.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־גָדֹ֣ל עַד־שָׁמַ֣יִם חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ וְֽעַד־שְׁחָקִ֥ים אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Exalt Yourself over the heavens, O God, let Your glory be over all the earth!
verses.text_he: ר֣וּמָה עַל־שָׁמַ֣יִם אֱלֹהִ֑ים עַ֖ל כׇּל־הָאָ֣רֶץ כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; . Of David. A .
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ אַל־תַּשְׁחֵ֗ת לְדָוִ֥ד מִכְתָּֽם׃

verses.text_en: O mighty ones, do you really decree what is just? Do you judge mankind with equity?
verses.text_he: הַאֻמְנָ֗ם אֵ֣לֶם צֶ֭דֶק תְּדַבֵּר֑וּן מֵישָׁרִ֥ים תִּ֝שְׁפְּט֗וּ בְּנֵ֣י אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: In your minds you devise wrongdoing in the land; with your hands you deal out lawlessness.
verses.text_he: אַף־בְּלֵב֮ עוֹלֹ֢ת תִּפְעָ֫ל֥וּן בָּאָ֡רֶץ חֲמַ֥ס יְ֝דֵיכֶ֗ם תְּפַלֵּסֽוּן׃

verses.text_en: The wicked are defiant from birth; the liars go astray from the womb.
verses.text_he: זֹ֣רוּ רְשָׁעִ֣ים מֵרָ֑חֶם תָּע֥וּ מִ֝בֶּ֗טֶן דֹּבְרֵ֥י כָזָֽב׃

verses.text_en: Their venom is like that of a snake, a deaf viper that stops its ears
verses.text_he: חֲמַת־לָ֗מוֹ כִּדְמ֥וּת חֲמַת־נָחָ֑שׁ כְּמוֹ־פֶ֥תֶן חֵ֝רֵ֗שׁ יַאְטֵ֥ם אׇזְנֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: so as not to hear the voice of charmers or the expert mutterer of spells.
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֣ר לֹֽא־יִ֭שְׁמַע לְק֣וֹל מְלַחֲשִׁ֑ים חוֹבֵ֖ר חֲבָרִ֣ים מְחֻכָּֽם׃

verses.text_en: O God, smash their teeth in their mouth; shatter the fangs of lions, O LORD;
verses.text_he: אֱֽלֹהִ֗ים הֲרׇס־שִׁנֵּ֥ימֽוֹ בְּפִ֑ימוֹ מַלְתְּע֥וֹת כְּ֝פִירִ֗ים נְתֹ֣ץ׀יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: let them melt, let them vanish like water; let Him aim His arrows that they be cut down;
verses.text_he: יִמָּאֲס֣וּ כְמוֹ־מַ֭יִם יִתְהַלְּכוּ־לָ֑מוֹ יִדְרֹ֥ךְ חִ֝צָּ֗ו כְּמ֣וֹ יִתְמֹלָֽלוּ׃

verses.text_en: like a snail that melts away as it moves; like a woman’s stillbirth, may they never see the sun!
verses.text_he: כְּמ֣וֹ שַׁ֭בְּלוּל תֶּ֣מֶס יַהֲלֹ֑ךְ נֵ֥פֶל אֵ֝֗שֶׁת בַּל־חָ֥זוּ שָֽׁמֶשׁ׃

verses.text_en: Before the thorns grow into a bramble, may He whirl them away alive in fury.
verses.text_he: בְּטֶ֤רֶם׀ יָבִ֣ינוּ סִּירֹתֵכֶ֣ם אָטָ֑ד כְּמוֹ־חַ֥י כְּמוֹ־חָ֝ר֗וֹן יִשְׂעָרֶֽנּוּ׃

verses.text_en: The righteous man will rejoice when he sees revenge; he will bathe his feet in the blood of the wicked.
verses.text_he: יִשְׂמַ֣ח צַ֭דִּיק כִּי־חָזָ֣ה נָקָ֑ם פְּעָמָ֥יו יִ֝רְחַ֗ץ בְּדַ֣ם הָרָשָֽׁע׃

verses.text_en: Men will say, “There is, then, a reward for the righteous; there is, indeed, divine justice on earth.”
verses.text_he: וְיֹאמַ֣ר אָ֭דָם אַךְ־פְּרִ֣י לַצַּדִּ֑יק אַ֥ךְ יֵשׁ־אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים שֹׁפְטִ֥ים בָּאָֽרֶץ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; . Of David. A ; when Saul sent men to watch his house in order to put him to death.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ אַל־תַּשְׁחֵת֮ לְדָוִ֢ד מִ֫כְתָּ֥ם בִּשְׁלֹ֥חַ שָׁא֑וּל וַֽיִּשְׁמְר֥וּ אֶת־הַ֝בַּ֗יִת לַהֲמִיתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Save me from my enemies, O my God; secure me against my assailants.
verses.text_he: הַצִּילֵ֖נִי מֵאֹיְבַ֥י׀אֱלֹהָ֑י מִֽמִּתְקוֹמְמַ֥י תְּשַׂגְּבֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Save me from evildoers; deliver me from murderers.
verses.text_he: הַ֭צִּילֵנִי מִפֹּ֣עֲלֵי אָ֑וֶן וּֽמֵאַנְשֵׁ֥י דָ֝מִ֗ים הוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: For see, they lie in wait for me; fierce men plot against me for no offense of mine, for no transgression, O LORD;
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י הִנֵּ֪ה אָרְב֡וּ לְנַפְשִׁ֗י יָג֣וּרוּ עָלַ֣י עַזִּ֑ים לֹֽא־פִשְׁעִ֖י וְלֹא־חַטָּאתִ֣י יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: for no guilt of mine do they rush to array themselves against me. Look, rouse Yourself on my behalf!
verses.text_he: בְּֽלִי־עָ֭וֺן יְרֻצ֣וּן וְיִכּוֹנָ֑נוּ ע֖וּרָה לִקְרָאתִ֣י וּרְאֵֽה׃

verses.text_en: You, O LORD God of hosts, God of Israel, bestir Yourself to bring all nations to account; have no mercy on any treacherous villain. .
verses.text_he: וְאַתָּ֤ה יְהֹוָֽה־אֱלֹהִ֥ים׀צְבָא֡וֹת אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל הָקִ֗יצָה לִפְקֹ֥ד כׇּֽל־הַגּוֹיִ֑ם אַל־תָּחֹ֨ן כׇּל־בֹּ֖גְדֵי אָ֣וֶן סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: They come each evening growling like dogs, roaming the city.
verses.text_he: יָשׁ֣וּבוּ לָ֭עֶרֶב יֶהֱמ֥וּ כַכָּ֗לֶב וִיס֥וֹבְבוּ עִֽיר׃

verses.text_en: They rave with their mouths, sharp words are on their lips; [they think,] “Who hears?”
verses.text_he: הִנֵּ֤ה׀ יַבִּ֘יע֤וּן בְּפִיהֶ֗ם חֲ֭רָבוֹת בְּשִׂפְתֽוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם כִּי־מִ֥י שֹׁמֵֽעַ׃

verses.text_en: But You, O LORD, laugh at them; You mock all the nations.
verses.text_he: וְאַתָּ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה תִּשְׂחַק־לָ֑מוֹ תִּ֝לְעַ֗ג לְכׇל־גּוֹיִֽם׃

verses.text_en: O my strength, I wait for You; for God is my haven.
verses.text_he: עֻ֭זּוֹ אֵלֶ֣יךָ אֶשְׁמֹ֑רָה כִּֽי־אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים מִשְׂגַּבִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: My faithful God will come to aid me; God will let me gloat over my watchful foes.
verses.text_he: אֱלֹהֵ֣י (חסדו) [חַסְדִּ֣י] יְקַדְּמֵ֑נִי אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים יַרְאֵ֥נִי בְשֹׁרְרָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Do not kill them lest my people be unmindful; with Your power make wanderers of them; bring them low, O our shield, the Lord,
verses.text_he: אַל־תַּהַרְגֵ֤ם׀ פֶּֽן־יִשְׁכְּח֬וּ עַמִּ֗י הֲנִיעֵ֣מוֹ בְ֭חֵילְךָ וְהוֹרִידֵ֑מוֹ מָ֖גִנֵּ֣נוּ אֲדֹנָֽי׃

verses.text_en: because of their sinful mouths, the words on their lips. Let them be trapped by their pride, and by the imprecations and lies they utter.
verses.text_he: חַטַּאת־פִּ֗ימוֹ דְּֽבַר־שְׂפָ֫תֵ֥ימוֹ וְיִלָּכְד֥וּ בִגְאוֹנָ֑ם וּמֵאָלָ֖ה וּמִכַּ֣חַשׁ יְסַפֵּֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: In Your fury put an end to them; put an end to them that they be no more; that it may be known to the ends of the earth that God does rule over Jacob. .
verses.text_he: כַּלֵּ֥ה בְחֵמָה֮ כַּלֵּ֢ה וְֽאֵ֫ינֵ֥מוֹ וְֽיֵדְע֗וּ כִּֽי־אֱ֭לֹהִים מֹשֵׁ֣ל בְּֽיַעֲקֹ֑ב לְאַפְסֵ֖י הָאָ֣רֶץ סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: They come each evening growling like dogs, roaming the city.
verses.text_he: וְיָשֻׁ֣בוּ לָ֭עֶרֶב יֶהֱמ֥וּ כַכָּ֗לֶב וִיס֥וֹבְבוּ עִֽיר׃

verses.text_en: They wander in search of food; and whine if they are not satisfied.
verses.text_he: הֵ֭מָּה (ינועון) [יְנִיע֣וּן] לֶאֱכֹ֑ל אִם־לֹ֥א יִ֝שְׂבְּע֗וּ וַיָּלִֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: But I will sing of Your strength, extol each morning Your faithfulness; for You have been my haven, a refuge in time of trouble.
verses.text_he: וַאֲנִ֤י׀ אָשִׁ֣יר עֻזֶּךָ֮ וַאֲרַנֵּ֥ן לַבֹּ֗קֶר חַ֫סְדֶּ֥ךָ כִּֽי־הָיִ֣יתָ מִשְׂגָּ֣ב לִ֑י וּ֝מָנ֗וֹס בְּי֣וֹם צַר־לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: O my strength, to You I sing hymns; for God is my haven, my faithful God.
verses.text_he: עֻ֭זִּי אֵלֶ֣יךָ אֲזַמֵּ֑רָה כִּֽי־אֱלֹהִ֥ים מִ֝שְׂגַּבִּ֗י אֱלֹהֵ֥י חַסְדִּֽי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; on . A of David (to be taught),
verses.text_he: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ עַל־שׁוּשַׁ֣ן עֵד֑וּת מִכְתָּ֖ם לְדָוִ֣ד לְלַמֵּֽד׃

verses.text_en: when he fought with Aram-Naharaim and Aram-Zobah, and Joab returned and defeated Edom—[an army] of twelve thousand men—in the Valley of Salt.
verses.text_he: בְּהַצּוֹת֨וֹ׀ אֶ֥ת־אֲרַ֣ם נַהֲרַיִם֮ וְאֶת־אֲרַ֢ם צ֫וֹבָ֥ה וַיָּ֤שׇׁב יוֹאָ֗ב וַיַּ֣ךְ אֶת־אֱד֣וֹם בְּגֵיא־מֶ֑לַח שְׁנֵ֖ים עָשָׂ֣ר אָֽלֶף׃

verses.text_en: O God, You have rejected us, You have made a breach in us; You have been angry; restore us!
verses.text_he: אֱ֭לֹהִים זְנַחְתָּ֣נוּ פְרַצְתָּ֑נוּ אָ֝נַ֗פְתָּ תְּשׁ֣וֹבֵֽב לָֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: You have made the land quake; You have torn it open. Mend its fissures, for it is collapsing.
verses.text_he: הִרְעַ֣שְׁתָּה אֶ֣רֶץ פְּצַמְתָּ֑הּ רְפָ֖ה שְׁבָרֶ֣יהָ כִי־מָֽטָה׃

verses.text_en: You have made Your people suffer hardship; You have given us wine that makes us reel.
verses.text_he: הִרְאִ֣יתָ עַמְּךָ֣ קָשָׁ֑ה הִ֝שְׁקִיתָ֗נוּ יַ֣יִן תַּרְעֵלָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Give those who fear You because of Your truth a banner for rallying. .
verses.text_he: נָ֘תַ֤תָּה לִּירֵאֶ֣יךָ נֵּ֭ס לְהִתְנוֹסֵ֑ס מִ֝פְּנֵ֗י קֹ֣שֶׁט סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: That those whom You love might be rescued, deliver with Your right hand and answer me.
verses.text_he: לְ֭מַעַן יֵחָלְצ֣וּן יְדִידֶ֑יךָ הוֹשִׁ֖יעָה יְמִינְךָ֣ (ועננו) [וַעֲנֵֽנִי]׃

verses.text_en: God promised in His sanctuary that I would exultingly divide up Shechem, and measure the Valley of Sukkoth;
verses.text_he: אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ דִּבֶּ֥ר בְּקׇדְשׁ֗וֹ אֶ֫עְלֹ֥זָה אֲחַלְּקָ֥ה שְׁכֶ֑ם וְעֵ֖מֶק סֻכּ֣וֹת אֲמַדֵּֽד׃

verses.text_en: Gilead and Manasseh would be mine, Ephraim my chief stronghold, Judah my scepter;
verses.text_he: לִ֤י גִלְעָ֨ד׀ וְלִ֬י מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה וְ֭אֶפְרַיִם מָע֣וֹז רֹאשִׁ֑י יְ֝הוּדָ֗ה מְחֹֽקְקִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Moab would be my washbasin; on Edom I would cast my shoe; acclaim me, O Philistia!
verses.text_he: מוֹאָ֤ב׀ סִ֬יר רַחְצִ֗י עַל־אֱ֭דוֹם אַשְׁלִ֣יךְ נַעֲלִ֑י עָ֝לַ֗י פְּלֶ֣שֶׁת הִתְרוֹעָֽעִי׃

verses.text_en: Would that I were brought to the bastion! Would that I were led to Edom!
verses.text_he: מִ֣י יֹ֭בִלֵנִי עִ֣יר מָצ֑וֹר מִ֖י נָחַ֣נִי עַד־אֱדֽוֹם׃

verses.text_en: But You have rejected us, O God; God, You do not march with our armies.
verses.text_he: הֲלֹֽא־אַתָּ֣ה אֱלֹהִ֣ים זְנַחְתָּ֑נוּ וְֽלֹא־תֵצֵ֥א אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים בְּצִבְאוֹתֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: Grant us Your aid against the foe, for the help of man is worthless.
verses.text_he: הָֽבָה־לָּ֣נוּ עֶזְרָ֣ת מִצָּ֑ר וְ֝שָׁ֗וְא תְּשׁוּעַ֥ת אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: With God we shall triumph; He will trample our foes.
verses.text_he: בֵּאלֹהִ֥ים נַֽעֲשֶׂה־חָ֑יִל וְ֝ה֗וּא יָב֥וּס צָרֵֽינוּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; with instrumental music. Of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ׀עַֽל־נְגִינַ֬ת לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: Hear my cry, O God, heed my prayer.
verses.text_he: שִׁמְעָ֣ה אֱ֭לֹהִים רִנָּתִ֑י הַ֝קְשִׁ֗יבָה תְּפִלָּתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: From the end of the earth I call to You; when my heart is faint, You lead me to a rock that is high above me.
verses.text_he: מִקְצֵ֤ה הָאָ֨רֶץ׀ אֵלֶ֣יךָ אֶ֭קְרָא בַּעֲטֹ֣ף לִבִּ֑י בְּצוּר־יָר֖וּם מִמֶּ֣נִּי תַנְחֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: For You have been my refuge, a tower of strength against the enemy.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־הָיִ֣יתָ מַחְסֶ֣ה לִ֑י מִגְדַּל־עֹ֝֗ז מִפְּנֵ֥י אוֹיֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: O that I might dwell in Your tent forever, take refuge under Your protecting wings. .
verses.text_he: אָג֣וּרָה בְ֭אׇהׇלְךָ עוֹלָמִ֑ים אֶ֥חֱסֶ֨ה בְסֵ֖תֶר כְּנָפֶ֣יךָ סֶּֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: O God, You have heard my vows; grant the request of those who fear Your name.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־אַתָּ֣ה אֱ֭לֹהִים שָׁמַ֣עְתָּ לִנְדָרָ֑י נָתַ֥תָּ יְ֝רֻשַּׁ֗ת יִרְאֵ֥י שְׁמֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Add days to the days of the king; may his years extend through generations;
verses.text_he: יָמִ֣ים עַל־יְמֵי־מֶ֣לֶךְ תּוֹסִ֑יף שְׁ֝נוֹתָ֗יו כְּמוֹ־דֹ֥ר וָדֹֽר׃

verses.text_en: may he dwell in God’s presence forever; appoint steadfast love to guard him.
verses.text_he: יֵשֵׁ֣ב ע֭וֹלָם לִפְנֵ֣י אֱלֹהִ֑ים חֶ֥סֶד וֶ֝אֱמֶ֗ת מַ֣ן יִנְצְרֻֽהוּ׃

verses.text_en: So I will sing hymns to Your name forever, as I fulfill my vows day after day.
verses.text_he: כֵּ֤ן אֲזַמְּרָ֣ה שִׁמְךָ֣ לָעַ֑ד לְֽשַׁלְּמִ֥י נְ֝דָרַ֗י י֣וֹם׀יֽוֹם׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; on . A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ עַֽל־יְדוּת֗וּן מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: Truly my soul waits quietly for God; my deliverance comes from Him.
verses.text_he: אַ֣ךְ אֶל־אֱ֭לֹהִים דּֽוּמִיָּ֣ה נַפְשִׁ֑י מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ יְשׁוּעָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Truly He is my rock and deliverance, my haven; I shall never be shaken.
verses.text_he: אַךְ־ה֣וּא צ֭וּרִי וִישׁוּעָתִ֑י מִ֝שְׂגַּבִּ֗י לֹא־אֶמּ֥וֹט רַבָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: How long will all of you attack a man, to crush him, as though he were a leaning wall, a tottering fence?
verses.text_he: עַד־אָ֤נָה׀ תְּה֥וֹתְת֣וּ עַל־אִישׁ֮ תְּרָצְּח֢וּ כֻ֫לְּכֶ֥ם כְּקִ֥יר נָט֑וּי גָּ֝דֵ֗ר הַדְּחוּיָֽה׃

verses.text_en: They lay plans to topple him from his rank; they delight in falsehood; they bless with their mouths, while inwardly they curse. .
verses.text_he: אַ֤ךְ מִשְּׂאֵת֨וֹ׀ יָ֥עֲצ֣וּ לְהַדִּיחַ֮ יִרְצ֢וּ כָ֫זָ֥ב בְּפִ֥יו יְבָרֵ֑כוּ וּ֝בְקִרְבָּ֗ם יְקַֽלְלוּ־סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Truly, wait quietly for God, O my soul, for my hope comes from Him.
verses.text_he: אַ֣ךְ לֵ֭אלֹהִים דּ֣וֹמִּי נַפְשִׁ֑י כִּֽי־מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ תִּקְוָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: He is my rock and deliverance, my haven; I shall not be shaken.
verses.text_he: אַךְ־ה֣וּא צ֭וּרִי וִישׁוּעָתִ֑י מִ֝שְׂגַּבִּ֗י לֹ֣א אֶמּֽוֹט׃

verses.text_en: I rely on God, my deliverance and glory, my rock of strength; in God is my refuge.
verses.text_he: עַל־אֱ֭לֹהִים יִשְׁעִ֣י וּכְבוֹדִ֑י צוּר־עֻזִּ֥י מַ֝חְסִ֗י בֵּאלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Trust in Him at all times, O people; pour out your hearts before Him; God is our refuge. .
verses.text_he: בִּטְח֘וּ־ב֤וֹ בְכׇל־עֵ֨ת׀ עָ֗ם שִׁפְכֽוּ־לְפָנָ֥יו לְבַבְכֶ֑ם אֱלֹהִ֖ים מַחֲסֶה־לָּ֣נוּ סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Men are mere breath; mortals, illusion; placed on a scale all together, they weigh even less than a breath.
verses.text_he: אַ֤ךְ׀ הֶ֥בֶל בְּנֵֽי־אָדָם֮ כָּזָ֢ב בְּנֵ֫י־אִ֥ישׁ בְּמֹאזְנַ֥יִם לַעֲל֑וֹת הֵ֝֗מָּה מֵהֶ֥בֶל יָֽחַד׃

verses.text_en: Do not trust in violence, or put false hopes in robbery; if force bears fruit pay it no mind.
verses.text_he: אַל־תִּבְטְח֣וּ בְעֹשֶׁק֮ וּבְגָזֵ֢ל אַל־תֶּ֫הְבָּ֥לוּ חַ֤יִל׀ כִּֽי־יָנ֑וּב אַל־תָּשִׁ֥יתוּ לֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: One thing God has spoken; two things have I heard: that might belongs to God,
verses.text_he: אַחַ֤ת׀ דִּבֶּ֬ר אֱלֹהִ֗ים שְׁתַּֽיִם־ז֥וּ שָׁמָ֑עְתִּי כִּ֥י עֹ֝֗ז לֵֽאלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: and faithfulness is Yours, O Lord, to reward each man according to his deeds.
verses.text_he: וּלְךָֽ־אֲדֹנָ֥י חָ֑סֶד כִּֽי־אַתָּ֨ה תְשַׁלֵּ֖ם לְאִ֣ישׁ כְּֽמַעֲשֵֽׂהוּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A psalm of David, when he was in the Wilderness of Judah.
verses.text_he: מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִ֑ד בִּ֝הְיוֹת֗וֹ בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר יְהוּדָֽה׃

verses.text_en: God, You are my God; I search for You, my soul thirsts for You, my body yearns for You, as a parched and thirsty land that has no water.
verses.text_he: אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ אֵלִ֥י אַתָּ֗ה אֲֽשַׁ֫חֲרֶ֥ךָּ צָמְאָ֬ה לְךָ֨׀ נַפְשִׁ֗י כָּמַ֣הּ לְךָ֣ בְשָׂרִ֑י בְּאֶרֶץ־צִיָּ֖ה וְעָיֵ֣ף בְּלִי־מָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: I shall behold You in the sanctuary, and see Your might and glory,
verses.text_he: כֵּ֭ן בַּקֹּ֣דֶשׁ חֲזִיתִ֑ךָ לִרְא֥וֹת עֻ֝זְּךָ֗ וּכְבוֹדֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Truly Your faithfulness is better than life; my lips declare Your praise.
verses.text_he: כִּי־ט֣וֹב חַ֭סְדְּךָ מֵחַיִּ֗ים שְׂפָתַ֥י יְשַׁבְּחֽוּנְךָ׃

verses.text_en: I bless You all my life; I lift up my hands, invoking Your name.
I am sated as with a rich feast, I sing praises with joyful lips
verses.text_he: כְּמ֤וֹ חֵ֣לֶב וָ֭דֶשֶׁן תִּשְׂבַּ֣ע נַפְשִׁ֑י וְשִׂפְתֵ֥י רְ֝נָנ֗וֹת יְהַלֶּל־פִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: when I call You to mind upon my bed, when I think of You in the watches of the night;
verses.text_he: אִם־זְכַרְתִּ֥יךָ עַל־יְצוּעָ֑י בְּ֝אַשְׁמֻר֗וֹת אֶהְגֶּה־בָּֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: for You are my help, and in the shadow of Your wings I shout for joy.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־הָיִ֣יתָ עֶזְרָ֣תָה לִּ֑י וּבְצֵ֖ל כְּנָפֶ֣יךָ אֲרַנֵּֽן׃

verses.text_en: My soul is attached to You; Your right hand supports me.
verses.text_he: דָּבְקָ֣ה נַפְשִׁ֣י אַחֲרֶ֑יךָ בִּ֝֗י תָּמְכָ֥ה יְמִינֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: May those who seek to destroy my life enter the depths of the earth.
verses.text_he: וְהֵ֗מָּה לְ֭שׁוֹאָה יְבַקְשׁ֣וּ נַפְשִׁ֑י יָ֝בֹ֗אוּ בְּֽתַחְתִּיּ֥וֹת הָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: May they be gutted by the sword; may they be prey to jackals.
verses.text_he: יַגִּירֻ֥הוּ עַל־יְדֵי־חָ֑רֶב מְנָ֖ת שֻׁעָלִ֣ים יִהְיֽוּ׃

verses.text_en: But the king shall rejoice in God; all who swear by Him shall exult, when the mouth of liars is stopped.
verses.text_he: וְהַמֶּלֶךְ֮ יִשְׂמַ֢ח בֵּאלֹ֫הִ֥ים יִ֭תְהַלֵּל כׇּל־הַנִּשְׁבָּ֣ע בּ֑וֹ כִּ֥י יִ֝סָּכֵ֗ר פִּ֣י דוֹבְרֵי־שָֽׁקֶר׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: Hear my voice, O God, when I plead; guard my life from the enemy’s terror.
verses.text_he: שְׁמַע־אֱלֹהִ֣ים קוֹלִ֣י בְשִׂיחִ֑י מִפַּ֥חַד א֝וֹיֵ֗ב תִּצֹּ֥ר חַיָּֽי׃

verses.text_en: Hide me from a band of evil men, from a crowd of evildoers,
verses.text_he: תַּ֭סְתִּירֵנִי מִסּ֣וֹד מְרֵעִ֑ים מֵ֝רִגְשַׁ֗ת פֹּ֣עֲלֵי אָֽוֶן׃

verses.text_en: who whet their tongues like swords; they aim their arrows—cruel words—
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֤ר שָׁנְנ֣וּ כַחֶ֣רֶב לְשׁוֹנָ֑ם דָּרְכ֥וּ חִ֝צָּ֗ם דָּבָ֥ר מָֽר׃

verses.text_en: to shoot from hiding at the blameless man; they shoot him suddenly and without fear.
verses.text_he: לִירֹ֣ת בַּמִּסְתָּרִ֣ים תָּ֑ם פִּתְאֹ֥ם יֹ֝רֻ֗הוּ וְלֹ֣א יִירָֽאוּ׃

verses.text_en: They arm themselves with an evil word; when they speak, it is to conceal traps; they think, “Who will see them?”
verses.text_he: יְחַזְּקוּ־לָ֨מוֹ׀ דָּ֘בָ֤ר רָ֗ע יְֽ֭סַפְּרוּ לִטְמ֣וֹן מוֹקְשִׁ֑ים אָ֝מְר֗וּ מִ֣י יִרְאֶה־לָּֽמוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Let the wrongdoings they have concealed, each one inside him, his secret thoughts, be wholly exposed.
verses.text_he: יַ֥חְפְּֽשׂוּ־עוֹלֹ֗ת תַּ֭מְנוּ חֵ֣פֶשׂ מְחֻפָּ֑שׂ וְקֶ֥רֶב אִ֝֗ישׁ וְלֵ֣ב עָמֹֽק׃

verses.text_en: God shall shoot them with arrows; they shall be struck down suddenly.
verses.text_he: וַיֹּרֵ֗ם אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים חֵ֥ץ פִּתְא֑וֹם הָ֝י֗וּ מַכּוֹתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Their tongue shall be their downfall; all who see them shall recoil in horror;
verses.text_he: וַיַּכְשִׁיל֣וּהוּ עָלֵ֣ימוֹ לְשׁוֹנָ֑ם יִ֝תְנֹדְד֗וּ כׇּל־רֹ֥אֵה בָֽם׃

verses.text_en: all men shall stand in awe; they shall proclaim the work of God and His deed which they perceived.
verses.text_he: וַיִּֽירְא֗וּ כׇּל־אָ֫דָ֥ם וַ֭יַּגִּידוּ פֹּ֥עַל אֱלֹהִ֗ים וּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֥הוּ הִשְׂכִּֽילוּ׃

verses.text_en: The righteous shall rejoice in the LORD, and take refuge in Him; all the upright shall exult.
verses.text_he: יִשְׂמַ֬ח צַדִּ֣יק בַּ֭יהֹוָה וְחָ֣סָה ב֑וֹ וְ֝יִתְהַלְל֗וּ כׇּל־יִשְׁרֵי־לֵֽב׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. A psalm of David. A song.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ מִזְמ֗וֹר לְדָוִ֥ד שִֽׁיר׃

verses.text_en: Praise befits You in Zion, O God; vows are paid to You;
verses.text_he: לְךָ֤ דֻֽמִיָּ֬ה תְהִלָּ֓ה אֱלֹ֘הִ֥ים בְּצִיּ֑וֹן וּ֝לְךָ֗ יְשֻׁלַּם־נֶֽדֶר׃

verses.text_en: all mankind comes to You, You who hear prayer.
verses.text_he: שֹׁמֵ֥עַ תְּפִלָּ֑ה עָ֝דֶ֗יךָ כׇּל־בָּשָׂ֥ר יָבֹֽאוּ׃

verses.text_en: When all manner of sins overwhelm me, it is You who forgive our iniquities.
verses.text_he: דִּבְרֵ֣י עֲ֭וֺנֹת גָּ֣בְרוּ מֶ֑נִּי פְּ֝שָׁעֵ֗ינוּ אַתָּ֥ה תְכַפְּרֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: Happy is the man You choose and bring near to dwell in Your courts; may we be sated with the blessings of Your house, Your holy temple.
verses.text_he: אַשְׁרֵ֤י׀ תִּ֥בְחַ֣ר וּתְקָרֵב֮ יִשְׁכֹּ֢ן חֲצֵ֫רֶ֥יךָ נִ֭שְׂבְּעָה בְּט֣וּב בֵּיתֶ֑ךָ קְ֝דֹ֗שׁ הֵיכָלֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Answer us with victory through awesome deeds, O God, our deliverer, in whom all the ends of the earth and the distant seas put their trust;
verses.text_he: נ֤וֹרָא֨וֹת׀ בְּצֶ֣דֶק תַּ֭עֲנֵנוּ אֱלֹהֵ֣י יִשְׁעֵ֑נוּ מִבְטָ֥ח כׇּל־קַצְוֵי־אֶ֝֗רֶץ וְיָ֣ם רְחֹקִֽים׃

verses.text_en: who by His power fixed the mountains firmly, who is girded with might,
verses.text_he: מֵכִ֣ין הָרִ֣ים בְּכֹח֑וֹ נֶ֝אְזָ֗ר בִּגְבוּרָֽה׃

verses.text_en: who stills the raging seas, the raging waves, and tumultuous peoples.
verses.text_he: מַשְׁבִּ֤יחַ׀ שְׁא֣וֹן יַ֭מִּים שְׁא֥וֹן גַּלֵּיהֶ֗ם וַהֲמ֥וֹן לְאֻמִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: Those who live at the ends of the earth are awed by Your signs; You make the lands of sunrise and sunset shout for joy.
verses.text_he: וַיִּ֤ירְא֨וּ׀ יֹשְׁבֵ֣י קְ֭צָוֺת מֵאוֹתֹתֶ֑יךָ מ֤וֹצָֽאֵי־בֹ֖קֶר וָעֶ֣רֶב תַּרְנִֽין׃

verses.text_en: You take care of the earth and irrigate it; You enrich it greatly, with the channel of God full of water; You provide grain for men; for so do You prepare it.
verses.text_he: פָּ֤קַֽדְתָּ־הָאָ֨רֶץ וַתְּשֹׁ֪קְקֶ֡הָ רַבַּ֬ת תַּעְשְׁרֶ֗נָּה פֶּ֣לֶג אֱ֭לֹהִים מָ֣לֵא מָ֑יִם תָּכִ֥ין דְּ֝גָנָ֗ם כִּי־כֵ֥ן תְּכִינֶֽהָ׃

verses.text_en: Saturating its furrows, leveling its ridges, You soften it with showers, You bless its growth.
verses.text_he: תְּלָמֶ֣יהָ רַ֭וֵּה נַחֵ֣ת גְּדוּדֶ֑הָ בִּרְבִיבִ֥ים תְּ֝מֹגְגֶ֗נָּה צִמְחָ֥הּ תְּבָרֵֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: You crown the year with Your bounty; fatness is distilled in Your paths;
verses.text_he: עִ֭טַּרְתָּ שְׁנַ֣ת טוֹבָתֶ֑ךָ וּ֝מַעְגָּלֶ֗יךָ יִרְעֲפ֥וּן דָּֽשֶׁן׃

verses.text_en: the pasturelands distill it; the hills are girded with joy.
verses.text_he: יִ֭רְעֲפוּ נְא֣וֹת מִדְבָּ֑ר וְ֝גִ֗יל גְּבָע֥וֹת תַּחְגֹּֽרְנָה׃

verses.text_en: The meadows are clothed with flocks, the valleys mantled with grain; they raise a shout, they break into song.
verses.text_he: לָבְשׁ֬וּ כָרִ֨ים׀ הַצֹּ֗אן וַעֲמָקִ֥ים יַֽעַטְפוּ־בָ֑ר יִ֝תְרוֹעֲע֗וּ אַף־יָשִֽׁירוּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. A song. A psalm. Raise a shout for God, all the earth;
verses.text_he: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ שִׁ֣יר מִזְמ֑וֹר הָרִ֥יעוּ לֵ֝אלֹהִ֗ים כׇּל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: sing the glory of His name, make glorious His praise.
verses.text_he: זַמְּר֥וּ כְבֽוֹד־שְׁמ֑וֹ שִׂ֥ימוּ כָ֝ב֗וֹד תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Say to God, “How awesome are Your deeds, Your enemies cower before Your great strength;
verses.text_he: אִמְר֣וּ לֵ֭אלֹהִים מַה־נּוֹרָ֣א מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ בְּרֹ֥ב עֻ֝זְּךָ֗ יְֽכַחֲשׁ֖וּ לְךָ֣ אֹיְבֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: all the earth bows to You, and sings hymns to You; all sing hymns to Your name.” .
verses.text_he: כׇּל־הָאָ֤רֶץ׀ יִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ לְ֭ךָ וִיזַמְּרוּ־לָ֑ךְ יְזַמְּר֖וּ שִׁמְךָ֣ סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Come and see the works of God, who is held in awe by men for His acts.
verses.text_he: לְכ֣וּ וּ֭רְאוּ מִפְעֲל֣וֹת אֱלֹהִ֑ים נוֹרָ֥א עֲ֝לִילָ֗ה עַל־בְּנֵ֥י אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: He turned the sea into dry land; they crossed the river on foot; we therefore rejoice in Him.
verses.text_he: הָ֤פַךְ יָ֨ם׀ לְֽיַבָּשָׁ֗ה בַּ֭נָּהָר יַעַבְר֣וּ בְרָ֑גֶל שָׁ֝֗ם נִשְׂמְחָה־בּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: He rules forever in His might; His eyes scan the nations; let the rebellious not assert themselves. .
verses.text_he: מֹ֘שֵׁ֤ל בִּגְבוּרָת֨וֹ׀ עוֹלָ֗ם עֵ֭ינָיו בַּגּוֹיִ֣ם תִּצְפֶּ֑ינָה הַסּוֹרְרִ֓ים׀ אַל־[יָר֖וּמוּ] (ירימו) לָ֣מוֹ סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: O peoples, bless our God, celebrate His praises;
verses.text_he: בָּרְכ֖וּ עַמִּ֥ים׀אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ וְ֝הַשְׁמִ֗יעוּ ק֣וֹל תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: who has granted us life, and has not let our feet slip.
verses.text_he: הַשָּׂ֣ם נַ֭פְשֵׁנוּ בַּחַיִּ֑ים וְלֹֽא־נָתַ֖ן לַמּ֣וֹט רַגְלֵֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: You have tried us, O God, refining us, as one refines silver.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־בְחַנְתָּ֥נוּ אֱלֹהִ֑ים צְ֝רַפְתָּ֗נוּ כִּצְרׇף־כָּֽסֶף׃

verses.text_en: You have caught us in a net, caught us in trammels.
verses.text_he: הֲבֵאתָ֥נוּ בַמְּצוּדָ֑ה שַׂ֖מְתָּ מוּעָקָ֣ה בְמׇתְנֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: You have let men ride over us; we have endured fire and water, and You have brought us through to prosperity.
verses.text_he: הִרְכַּ֥בְתָּֽ אֱנ֗וֹשׁ לְרֹ֫אשֵׁ֥נוּ בָּֽאנוּ־בָאֵ֥שׁ וּבַמַּ֑יִם וַ֝תּוֹצִיאֵ֗נוּ לָרְוָיָֽה׃

verses.text_en: I enter Your house with burnt offerings, I pay my vows to You,
verses.text_he: אָב֣וֹא בֵיתְךָ֣ בְעוֹל֑וֹת אֲשַׁלֵּ֖ם לְךָ֣ נְדָרָֽי׃

verses.text_en: [vows] that my lips pronounced, that my mouth uttered in my distress.
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁר־פָּצ֥וּ שְׂפָתָ֑י וְדִבֶּר־פִּ֝֗י בַּצַּר־לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: I offer up fatlings to You, with the odor of burning rams; I sacrifice bulls and he-goats. .
verses.text_he: עֹ֘ל֤וֹת מֵיחִ֣ים אַֽעֲלֶה־לָּ֭ךְ עִם־קְטֹ֣רֶת אֵילִ֑ים אֶ֥עֱשֶֽׂה־בָקָ֖ר עִם־עַתּוּדִ֣ים סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Come and hear, all God-fearing men, as I tell what He did for me.
verses.text_he: לְכוּ־שִׁמְע֣וּ וַ֭אֲסַפְּרָה כׇּל־יִרְאֵ֣י אֱלֹהִ֑ים אֲשֶׁ֖ר עָשָׂ֣ה לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: I called aloud to Him, glorification on my tongue.
verses.text_he: אֵלָ֥יו פִּֽי־קָרָ֑אתִי וְ֝רוֹמַ֗ם תַּ֣חַת לְשׁוֹנִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Had I an evil thought in my mind, the Lord would not have listened.
verses.text_he: אָ֭וֶן אִם־רָאִ֣יתִי בְלִבִּ֑י לֹ֖א יִשְׁמַ֣ע׀אֲדֹנָֽי׃

verses.text_en: But God did listen; He paid heed to my prayer.
verses.text_he: אָ֭כֵן שָׁמַ֣ע אֱלֹהִ֑ים הִ֝קְשִׁ֗יב בְּק֣וֹל תְּפִלָּתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Blessed is God who has not turned away my prayer, or His faithful care from me.
verses.text_he: בָּר֥וּךְ אֱלֹהִ֑ים אֲשֶׁ֥ר לֹֽא־הֵסִ֘יר־תְּפִלָּתִ֥י וְ֝חַסְדּ֗וֹ מֵאִתִּֽי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; with instrumental music. A psalm. A song.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ בִּנְגִינֹ֗ת מִזְמ֥וֹר שִֽׁיר׃

verses.text_en: May God be gracious to us and bless us; may He show us favor,
verses.text_he: אֱֽלֹהִ֗ים יְחׇנֵּ֥נוּ וִיבָרְכֵ֑נוּ יָ֤אֵֽר־פָּנָ֖יו אִתָּ֣נוּ סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: that Your way be known on earth, Your deliverance among all nations.
verses.text_he: לָדַ֣עַת בָּאָ֣רֶץ דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ בְּכׇל־גּ֝וֹיִ֗ם יְשׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Peoples will praise You, O God; all peoples will praise You.
verses.text_he: יוֹד֖וּךָ עַמִּ֥ים׀אֱלֹהִ֑ים י֝וֹד֗וּךָ עַמִּ֥ים כֻּלָּֽם׃

verses.text_en: Nations will exult and shout for joy, for You rule the peoples with equity, You guide the nations of the earth. .
verses.text_he: יִ֥שְׂמְח֥וּ וִירַנְּנ֗וּ לְאֻ֫מִּ֥ים כִּֽי־תִשְׁפֹּ֣ט עַמִּ֣ים מִישֹׁ֑ר וּלְאֻמִּ֓ים׀ בָּאָ֖רֶץ תַּנְחֵ֣ם סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: The peoples will praise You, O God; all peoples will praise You.
verses.text_he: יוֹד֖וּךָ עַמִּ֥ים׀אֱלֹהִ֑ים י֝וֹד֗וּךָ עַמִּ֥ים כֻּלָּֽם׃

verses.text_en: May the earth yield its produce; may God, our God, bless us.
verses.text_he: אֶ֭רֶץ נָתְנָ֣ה יְבוּלָ֑הּ יְ֝בָרְכֵ֗נוּ אֱלֹהִ֥ים אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: May God bless us, and be revered to the ends of the earth.
verses.text_he: יְבָרְכֵ֥נוּ אֱלֹהִ֑ים וְיִֽירְא֥וּ א֝וֹת֗וֹ כׇּל־אַפְסֵי־אָֽרֶץ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. Of David. A psalm. A song.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ לְדָוִ֗ד מִזְמ֥וֹר שִֽׁיר׃

verses.text_en: God will arise, His enemies shall be scattered, His foes shall flee before Him.
verses.text_he: יָק֣וּם אֱ֭לֹהִים יָפ֣וּצוּ אוֹיְבָ֑יו וְיָנ֥וּסוּ מְ֝שַׂנְאָ֗יו מִפָּנָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: Disperse them as smoke is dispersed; as wax melts at fire, so the wicked shall perish before God.
verses.text_he: כְּהִנְדֹּ֥ף עָשָׁ֗ן תִּ֫נְדֹּ֥ף כְּהִמֵּ֣ס דּ֭וֹנַג מִפְּנֵי־אֵ֑שׁ יֹאבְד֥וּ רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים מִפְּנֵ֥י אֱלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: But the righteous shall rejoice; they shall exult in the presence of God; they shall be exceedingly joyful.
verses.text_he: וְֽצַדִּיקִ֗ים יִשְׂמְח֣וּ יַ֭עַלְצוּ לִפְנֵ֥י אֱלֹהִ֗ים וְיָשִׂ֥ישׂוּ בְשִׂמְחָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Sing to God, chant hymns to His name; extol Him who rides the clouds; the LORD is His name. Exult in His presence—
verses.text_he: שִׁ֤ירוּ׀ לֵאלֹהִים֮ זַמְּר֢וּ שְׁ֫מ֥וֹ סֹ֡לּוּ לָרֹכֵ֣ב בָּ֭עֲרָבוֹת בְּיָ֥הּ שְׁמ֗וֹ וְעִלְז֥וּ לְפָנָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: the father of orphans, the champion of widows, God, in His holy habitation.
verses.text_he: אֲבִ֣י יְ֭תוֹמִים וְדַיַּ֣ן אַלְמָנ֑וֹת אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים בִּמְע֥וֹן קׇדְשֽׁוֹ׃

verses.text_en: God restores the lonely to their homes, sets free the imprisoned, safe and sound, while the rebellious must live in a parched land.
verses.text_he: אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ מ֘וֹשִׁ֤יב יְחִידִ֨ים׀ בַּ֗יְתָה מוֹצִ֣יא אֲ֭סִירִים בַּכּוֹשָׁר֑וֹת אַ֥ךְ ס֝וֹרְרִ֗ים שָׁכְנ֥וּ צְחִיחָֽה׃

verses.text_en: O God, when You went at the head of Your army, when You marched through the desert,
verses.text_he: אֱֽלֹהִ֗ים בְּ֭צֵאתְךָ לִפְנֵ֣י עַמֶּ֑ךָ בְּצַעְדְּךָ֖ בִישִׁימ֣וֹן סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: the earth trembled, the sky rained because of God, yon Sinai, because of God, the God of Israel.
verses.text_he: אֶ֤רֶץ רָעָ֨שָׁה׀ אַף־שָׁמַ֣יִם נָטְפוּ֮ מִפְּנֵ֢י אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים זֶ֥ה סִינַ֑י מִפְּנֵ֥י אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים אֱלֹהֵ֥י יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: You released a bountiful rain, O God; when Your own land languished, You sustained it.
verses.text_he: גֶּ֣שֶׁם נְ֭דָבוֹת תָּנִ֣יף אֱלֹהִ֑ים נַחֲלָתְךָ֥ וְ֝נִלְאָ֗ה אַתָּ֥ה כוֹנַנְתָּֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: Your tribe dwells there; O God, in Your goodness You provide for the needy.
verses.text_he: חַיָּתְךָ֥ יָשְׁבוּ־בָ֑הּ תָּ֤כִֽין־בְּטוֹבָתְךָ֖ לֶֽעָנִ֣י אֱלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: The Lord gives a command; the women who bring the news are a great host:
verses.text_he: אֲדֹנָ֥י יִתֶּן־אֹ֑מֶר הַֽ֝מְבַשְּׂר֗וֹת צָבָ֥א רָֽב׃

verses.text_en: “The kings and their armies are in headlong flight; housewives are sharing in the spoils;
verses.text_he: מַלְכֵ֣י צְ֭בָאוֹת יִדֹּד֣וּן יִדֹּד֑וּן וּנְוַת־בַּ֝֗יִת תְּחַלֵּ֥ק שָׁלָֽל׃

verses.text_en: even for those of you who lie among the sheepfolds there are wings of a dove sheathed in silver, its pinions in fine gold.”
verses.text_he: אִֽם־תִּשְׁכְּבוּן֮ בֵּ֤ין שְׁפַ֫תָּ֥יִם כַּנְפֵ֣י י֭וֹנָה נֶחְפָּ֣ה בַכֶּ֑סֶף וְ֝אֶבְרוֹתֶ֗יהָ בִּירַקְרַ֥ק חָרֽוּץ׃

verses.text_en: When Shaddai scattered the kings, it seemed like a snowstorm in Zalmon.
verses.text_he: בְּפָ֘רֵ֤שׂ שַׁדַּ֓י מְלָ֘כִ֤ים בָּ֗הּ תַּשְׁלֵ֥ג בְּצַלְמֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: O majestic mountain, Mount Bashan; O jagged mountain, Mount Bashan;
verses.text_he: הַר־אֱ֭לֹהִים הַר־בָּשָׁ֑ן הַ֥ר גַּ֝בְנֻנִּ֗ים הַר־בָּשָֽׁן׃

verses.text_en: why so hostile, O jagged mountains, toward the mountain God desired as His dwelling? The LORD shall abide there forever.
verses.text_he: לָ֤מָּה׀ תְּֽרַצְּדוּן֮ הָרִ֢ים גַּבְנֻ֫נִּ֥ים הָהָ֗ר חָמַ֣ד אֱלֹהִ֣ים לְשִׁבְתּ֑וֹ אַף־יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה יִשְׁכֹּ֥ן לָנֶֽצַח׃

verses.text_en: God’s chariots are myriads upon myriads, thousands upon thousands; the Lord is among them as in Sinai in holiness.
verses.text_he: רֶ֤כֶב אֱלֹהִ֗ים רִבֹּתַ֣יִם אַלְפֵ֣י שִׁנְאָ֑ן אֲדֹנָ֥י בָֿ֝֗ם סִינַ֥י בַּקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃

verses.text_en: You went up to the heights, having taken captives, having received tribute of men, even of those who rebel against the LORD God’s abiding there.
verses.text_he: עָ֘לִ֤יתָ לַמָּר֨וֹם׀ שָׁ֘בִ֤יתָ שֶּׁ֗בִי לָקַ֣חְתָּ מַ֭תָּנוֹת בָּאָדָ֑ם וְאַ֥ף ס֝וֹרְרִ֗ים לִשְׁכֹּ֤ן׀ יָ֬הּ אֱלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Blessed is the Lord. Day by day He supports us, God, our deliverance. .
verses.text_he: בָּ֤ר֣וּךְ אֲדֹנָי֮ י֤וֹם׀ י֥֫וֹם יַעֲמׇס־לָ֗נוּ הָ֘אֵ֤ל יְֽשׁוּעָתֵ֬נוּ סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: God is for us a God of deliverance; GOD the Lord provides an escape from death.
verses.text_he: הָ֤אֵ֣ל׀לָנוּ֮ אֵ֤ל לְֽמ֫וֹשָׁע֥וֹת וְלֵיהֹוִ֥ה אֲדֹנָ֑י לַ֝מָּ֗וֶת תֹּצָאֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: God will smash the heads of His enemies, the hairy crown of him who walks about in his guilt.
verses.text_he: אַךְ־אֱלֹהִ֗ים יִמְחַץ֮ רֹ֤אשׁ אֹ֫יְבָ֥יו קׇדְקֹ֥ד שֵׂעָ֑ר מִ֝תְהַלֵּ֗ךְ בַּאֲשָׁמָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: The Lord said, “I will retrieve from Bashan, I will retrieve from the depths of the sea;
verses.text_he: אָמַ֣ר אֲ֭דֹנָי מִבָּשָׁ֣ן אָשִׁ֑יב אָ֝שִׁ֗יב מִֽמְּצֻל֥וֹת יָֽם׃

verses.text_en: that your feet may wade through blood; that the tongue of your dogs may have its portion of your enemies.”
verses.text_he: לְמַ֤עַן׀ תִּ֥מְחַ֥ץ רַגְלְךָ֗ בְּ֫דָ֥ם לְשׁ֥וֹן כְּלָבֶ֑יךָ מֵאֹיְבִ֥ים מִנֵּֽהוּ׃

verses.text_en: Men see Your processions, O God, the processions of my God, my king, into the sanctuary.
verses.text_he: רָא֣וּ הֲלִיכוֹתֶ֣יךָ אֱלֹהִ֑ים הֲלִ֘יכ֤וֹת אֵלִ֖י מַלְכִּ֣י בַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃

verses.text_en: First come singers, then musicians, amidst maidens playing timbrels.
verses.text_he: קִדְּמ֣וּ שָׁ֭רִים אַחַ֣ר נֹגְנִ֑ים בְּת֥וֹךְ עֲ֝לָמ֗וֹת תּוֹפֵפֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: In assemblies bless God, the LORD, O you who are from the fountain of Israel.
verses.text_he: בְּֽ֭מַקְהֵלוֹת בָּרְכ֣וּ אֱלֹהִ֑ים אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י מִמְּק֥וֹר יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: There is little Benjamin who rules them, the princes of Judah who command them, the princes of Zebulun and Naphtali.
verses.text_he: שָׁ֤ם בִּנְיָמִ֨ן׀ צָעִ֡יר רֹדֵ֗ם שָׂרֵ֣י יְ֭הוּדָה רִגְמָתָ֑ם שָׂרֵ֥י זְ֝בֻל֗וּן שָׂרֵ֥י נַפְתָּלִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Your God has ordained strength for you, the strength, O God, which You displayed for us
verses.text_he: צִוָּ֥ה אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ עֻ֫זֶּ֥ךָ עוּזָּ֥ה אֱלֹהִ֑ים ז֝֗וּ פָּעַ֥לְתָּ לָּֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: from Your temple above Jerusalem. The kings bring You tribute.
verses.text_he: מֵ֭הֵיכָלֶךָ עַל־יְרוּשָׁלָ֑͏ִם לְךָ֤ יוֹבִ֖ילוּ מְלָכִ֣ים שָֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: Blast the beast of the marsh, the herd of bulls among the peoples, the calves, till they come cringing with pieces of silver. Scatter the peoples who delight in wars!
verses.text_he: גְּעַ֨ר חַיַּ֪ת קָנֶ֡ה עֲדַ֤ת אַבִּירִ֨ים׀ בְּעֶגְלֵ֬י עַמִּ֗ים מִתְרַפֵּ֥ס בְּרַצֵּי־כָ֑סֶף בִּזַּ֥ר עַ֝מִּ֗ים קְרָב֥וֹת יֶחְפָּֽצוּ׃

verses.text_en: Tribute-bearers shall come from Egypt; Cush shall hasten its gifts to God.
verses.text_he: יֶאֱתָ֣יוּ חַ֭שְׁמַנִּים מִנִּ֣י מִצְרָ֑יִם כּ֥וּשׁ תָּרִ֥יץ יָ֝דָ֗יו לֵאלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: O kingdoms of the earth, sing to God; chant hymns to the Lord,
verses.text_he: מַמְלְכ֣וֹת הָ֭אָרֶץ שִׁ֣ירוּ לֵאלֹהִ֑ים זַמְּר֖וּ אֲדֹנָ֣י סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: to Him who rides the ancient highest heavens, who thunders forth with His mighty voice.
verses.text_he: לָ֭רֹכֵב בִּשְׁמֵ֣י שְׁמֵי־קֶ֑דֶם הֵ֥ן יִתֵּ֥ן בְּ֝קוֹל֗וֹ ק֣וֹל עֹֽז׃

verses.text_en: Ascribe might to God, whose majesty is over Israel, whose might is in the skies.
verses.text_he: תְּנ֥וּ עֹ֗ז לֵאלֹ֫הִ֥ים עַֽל־יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל גַּאֲוָת֑וֹ וְ֝עֻזּ֗וֹ בַּשְּׁחָקִֽים׃

verses.text_en: You are awesome, O God, in Your holy places; it is the God of Israel who gives might and power to the people. Blessed is God.
verses.text_he: נ֤וֹרָ֥א אֱלֹהִ֗ים מִֽמִּקְדָּ֫שֶׁ֥יךָ אֵ֤ל יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל ה֤וּא נֹתֵ֨ן׀ עֹ֖ז וְתַעֲצֻמ֥וֹת לָעָ֗ם בָּר֥וּךְ אֱלֹהִֽים׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. On . Of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ׀עַֽל־שׁוֹשַׁנִּ֬ים לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: Deliver me, O God, for the waters have reached my neck;
verses.text_he: הוֹשִׁיעֵ֥נִי אֱלֹהִ֑ים כִּ֤י בָ֖אוּ מַ֣יִם עַד־נָֽפֶשׁ׃

verses.text_en: I am sinking into the slimy deep and find no foothold; I have come into the watery depths; the flood sweeps me away.
verses.text_he: טָבַ֤עְתִּי׀ בִּיוֵ֣ן מְ֭צוּלָה וְאֵ֣ין מׇעֳמָ֑ד בָּ֥אתִי בְמַעֲמַקֵּי־מַ֝֗יִם וְשִׁבֹּ֥לֶת שְׁטָפָֽתְנִי׃

verses.text_en: I am weary with calling; my throat is dry; my eyes fail while I wait for God.
verses.text_he: יָגַ֣עְתִּי בְקׇרְאִי֮ נִחַ֢ר גְּר֫וֹנִ֥י כָּל֥וּ עֵינַ֑י מְ֝יַחֵ֗ל לֵאלֹהָֽי׃

verses.text_en: More numerous than the hairs of my head are those who hate me without reason; many are those who would destroy me, my treacherous enemies. Must I restore what I have not stolen?
verses.text_he: רַבּ֤וּ׀ מִשַּׂעֲר֣וֹת רֹאשִׁי֮ שֹׂנְאַ֢י חִ֫נָּ֥ם עָצְמ֣וּ מַ֭צְמִיתַי אֹיְבַ֣י שֶׁ֑קֶר אֲשֶׁ֥ר לֹֽא־גָ֝זַ֗לְתִּי אָ֣ז אָשִֽׁיב׃

verses.text_en: God, You know my folly; my guilty deeds are not hidden from You.
verses.text_he: אֱֽלֹהִ֗ים אַתָּ֣ה יָ֭דַעְתָּ לְאִוַּלְתִּ֑י וְ֝אַשְׁמוֹתַ֗י מִמְּךָ֥ לֹֽא־נִכְחָֽדוּ׃

verses.text_en: Let those who look to You, O Lord, GOD of hosts, not be disappointed on my account; let those who seek You, O God of Israel, not be shamed because of me.
verses.text_he: אַל־יֵ֘בֹ֤שׁוּ בִ֨י׀ קֹוֶיךָ֮ אֲדֹנָ֥י יֱהֹוִ֗ה צְבָ֫א֥וֹת אַל־יִכָּ֣לְמֽוּ בִ֣י מְבַקְשֶׁ֑יךָ אֱ֝לֹהֵ֗י יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: It is for Your sake that I have been reviled, that shame covers my face;
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־עָ֭לֶיךָ נָשָׂ֣אתִי חֶרְפָּ֑ה כִּסְּתָ֖ה כְלִמָּ֣ה פָנָֽי׃

verses.text_en: I am a stranger to my brothers, an alien to my kin.
verses.text_he: מ֭וּזָר הָיִ֣יתִי לְאֶחָ֑י וְ֝נׇכְרִ֗י לִבְנֵ֥י אִמִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: My zeal for Your house has been my undoing; the reproaches of those who revile You have fallen upon me.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־קִנְאַ֣ת בֵּיתְךָ֣ אֲכָלָ֑תְנִי וְחֶרְפּ֥וֹת ח֝וֹרְפֶ֗יךָ נָפְל֥וּ עָלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: When I wept and fasted, I was reviled for it.
verses.text_he: וָאֶבְכֶּ֣ה בַצּ֣וֹם נַפְשִׁ֑י וַתְּהִ֖י לַחֲרָפ֣וֹת לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: I made sackcloth my garment; I became a byword among them.
verses.text_he: וָאֶתְּנָ֣ה לְבוּשִׁ֣י שָׂ֑ק וָאֱהִ֖י לָהֶ֣ם לְמָשָֽׁל׃

verses.text_en: Those who sit in the gate talk about me; I am the taunt of drunkards.
verses.text_he: יָשִׂ֣יחוּ בִ֭י יֹ֣שְׁבֵי שָׁ֑עַר וּ֝נְגִינ֗וֹת שׁוֹתֵ֥י שֵׁכָֽר׃

verses.text_en: As for me, may my prayer come to You, O LORD, at a favorable moment; O God, in Your abundant faithfulness, answer me with Your sure deliverance.
verses.text_he: וַאֲנִ֤י תְפִלָּֽתִי־לְךָ֨׀ יְהֹוָ֡ה עֵ֤ת רָצ֗וֹן אֱלֹהִ֥ים בְּרׇב־חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ עֲ֝נֵ֗נִי בֶּאֱמֶ֥ת יִשְׁעֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Rescue me from the mire; let me not sink; let me be rescued from my enemies, and from the watery depths.
verses.text_he: הַצִּילֵ֣נִי מִ֭טִּיט וְאַל־אֶטְבָּ֑עָה אִנָּצְלָ֥ה מִ֝שֹּׂנְאַ֗י וּמִמַּ֖עֲמַקֵּי־מָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: Let the floodwaters not sweep me away; let the deep not swallow me; let the mouth of the Pit not close over me.
verses.text_he: אַל־תִּשְׁטְפֵ֤נִי׀ שִׁבֹּ֣לֶת מַ֭יִם וְאַל־תִּבְלָעֵ֣נִי מְצוּלָ֑ה וְאַל־תֶּאְטַר־עָלַ֖י בְּאֵ֣ר פִּֽיהָ׃

verses.text_en: Answer me, O LORD, according to Your great steadfastness; in accordance with Your abundant mercy turn to me;
verses.text_he: עֲנֵ֣נִי יְ֭הֹוָה כִּי־ט֣וֹב חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ כְּרֹ֥ב רַ֝חֲמֶ֗יךָ פְּנֵ֣ה אֵלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: do not hide Your face from Your servant, for I am in distress; answer me quickly.
verses.text_he: וְאַל־תַּסְתֵּ֣ר פָּ֭נֶיךָ מֵעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ כִּי־צַר־לִ֝֗י מַהֵ֥ר עֲנֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Come near to me and redeem me; free me from my enemies.
verses.text_he: קׇרְבָ֣ה אֶל־נַפְשִׁ֣י גְאָלָ֑הּ לְמַ֖עַן אֹיְבַ֣י פְּדֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: You know my reproach, my shame, my disgrace; You are aware of all my foes.
verses.text_he: אַתָּ֤ה יָדַ֗עְתָּ חֶרְפָּתִ֣י וּ֭בׇשְׁתִּי וּכְלִמָּתִ֑י נֶ֝גְדְּךָ֗ כׇּל־צוֹרְרָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Reproach breaks my heart, I am in despair; I hope for consolation, but there is none, for comforters, but find none.
verses.text_he: חֶרְפָּ֤ה׀ שָׁ֥בְרָ֥ה לִבִּ֗י וָאָ֫נ֥וּשָׁה וָאֲקַוֶּ֣ה לָנ֣וּד וָאַ֑יִן וְ֝לַמְנַחֲמִ֗ים וְלֹ֣א מָצָֽאתִי׃

verses.text_en: They give me gall for food, vinegar to quench my thirst.
verses.text_he: וַיִּתְּנ֣וּ בְּבָרוּתִ֣י רֹ֑אשׁ וְ֝לִצְמָאִ֗י יַשְׁק֥וּנִי חֹֽמֶץ׃

verses.text_en: May their table be a trap for them, a snare for their allies.
verses.text_he: יְהִי־שֻׁלְחָנָ֣ם לִפְנֵיהֶ֣ם לְפָ֑ח וְלִשְׁלוֹמִ֥ים לְמוֹקֵֽשׁ׃

verses.text_en: May their eyes grow dim so that they cannot see; may their loins collapse continually.
verses.text_he: תֶּחְשַׁ֣כְנָה עֵ֭ינֵיהֶם מֵרְא֑וֹת וּ֝מׇתְנֵיהֶ֗ם תָּמִ֥יד הַמְעַֽד׃

verses.text_en: Pour out Your wrath on them; may Your blazing anger overtake them;
verses.text_he: שְׁפׇךְ־עֲלֵיהֶ֥ם זַעְמֶ֑ךָ וַחֲר֥וֹן אַ֝פְּךָ֗ יַשִּׂיגֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: may their encampments be desolate; may their tents stand empty.
verses.text_he: תְּהִי־טִירָתָ֥ם נְשַׁמָּ֑ה בְּ֝אׇהֳלֵיהֶ֗ם אַל־יְהִ֥י יֹשֵֽׁב׃

verses.text_en: For they persecute those You have struck; they talk about the pain of those You have felled.
verses.text_he: כִּי־אַתָּ֣ה אֲשֶׁר־הִכִּ֣יתָ רָדָ֑פוּ וְאֶל־מַכְא֖וֹב חֲלָלֶ֣יךָ יְסַפֵּֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: Add that to their guilt; let them have no share of Your beneficence;
verses.text_he: תְּֽנָה־עָ֭וֺן עַל־עֲוֺנָ֑ם וְאַל־יָ֝בֹ֗אוּ בְּצִדְקָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: may they be erased from the book of life, and not be inscribed with the righteous.
verses.text_he: יִ֭מָּחֽוּ מִסֵּ֣פֶר חַיִּ֑ים וְעִ֥ם צַ֝דִּיקִ֗ים אַל־יִכָּתֵֽבוּ׃

verses.text_en: But I am lowly and in pain; Your help, O God, keeps me safe.
verses.text_he: וַ֭אֲנִי עָנִ֣י וְכוֹאֵ֑ב יְשׁוּעָתְךָ֖ אֱלֹהִ֣ים תְּשַׂגְּבֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: I will extol God’s name with song, and exalt Him with praise.
verses.text_he: אֲהַלְלָ֣ה שֵׁם־אֱלֹהִ֣ים בְּשִׁ֑יר וַאֲגַדְּלֶ֥נּוּ בְתוֹדָֽה׃

verses.text_en: That will please the LORD more than oxen, than bulls with horns and hooves.
verses.text_he: וְתִיטַ֣ב לַ֭יהֹוָה מִשּׁ֥וֹר פָּ֗ר מַקְרִ֥ן מַפְרִֽיס׃

verses.text_en: The lowly will see and rejoice; you who are mindful of God, take heart!
verses.text_he: רָא֣וּ עֲנָוִ֣ים יִשְׂמָ֑חוּ דֹּרְשֵׁ֥י אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים וִיחִ֥י לְבַבְכֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: For the LORD listens to the needy, and does not spurn His captives.
verses.text_he: כִּי־שֹׁמֵ֣עַ אֶל־אֶבְיוֹנִ֣ים יְהֹוָ֑ה וְאֶת־אֲ֝סִירָ֗יו לֹ֣א בָזָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Heaven and earth shall extol Him, the seas, and all that moves in them.
verses.text_he: יְֽ֭הַלְלוּהוּ שָׁמַ֣יִם וָאָ֑רֶץ יַ֝מִּ֗ים וְֽכׇל־רֹמֵ֥שׂ בָּֽם׃

verses.text_en: For God will deliver Zion and rebuild the cities of Judah; they shall live there and inherit it;
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י אֱלֹהִ֨ים׀ י֘וֹשִׁ֤יעַ צִיּ֗וֹן וְ֭יִבְנֶה עָרֵ֣י יְהוּדָ֑ה וְיָ֥שְׁבוּ שָׁ֝֗ם וִירֵשֽׁוּהָ׃

verses.text_en: the offspring of His servants shall possess it; those who cherish His name shall dwell there.
verses.text_he: וְזֶ֣רַע עֲ֭בָדָיו יִנְחָל֑וּהָ וְאֹהֲבֵ֥י שְׁ֝מ֗וֹ יִשְׁכְּנוּ־בָֽהּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. Of David. .
verses.text_he: לַ֝מְנַצֵּ֗חַ לְדָוִ֥ד לְהַזְכִּֽיר׃

verses.text_en: Hasten, O God, to save me; O LORD, to aid me!
verses.text_he: אֱלֹהִ֥ים לְהַצִּילֵ֑נִי יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה לְעֶזְרָ֥תִי חֽוּשָׁה׃

verses.text_en: Let those who seek my life be frustrated and disgraced; let those who wish me harm, fall back in shame.
verses.text_he: יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ וְיַחְפְּרוּ֮ מְבַקְשֵׁ֢י נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י יִסֹּ֣גוּ אָ֭חוֹר וְיִכָּלְמ֑וּ חֲ֝פֵצֵ֗י רָעָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Let those who say, “Aha! Aha!” turn back because of their frustration.
verses.text_he: יָ֭שׁוּבוּ עַל־עֵ֣קֶב בׇּשְׁתָּ֑ם הָ֝אֹמְרִ֗ים הֶ֘אָ֥ח׀הֶאָֽח׃

verses.text_en: But let all who seek You be glad and rejoice in You; let those who are eager for Your deliverance always say, “Extolled be God!”
verses.text_he: יָ֘שִׂ֤ישׂוּ וְיִשְׂמְח֨וּ׀ בְּךָ֗ כׇּֽל־מְבַ֫קְשֶׁ֥יךָ וְיֹאמְר֣וּ תָ֭מִיד יִגְדַּ֣ל אֱלֹהִ֑ים אֹ֝הֲבֵ֗י יְשׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: But I am poor and needy; O God, hasten to me! You are my help and my rescuer; O LORD, do not delay.
verses.text_he: וַאֲנִ֤י׀ עָנִ֣י וְאֶבְיוֹן֮ אֱלֹהִ֢ים ח֫וּשָׁה־לִּ֥י עֶזְרִ֣י וּמְפַלְטִ֣י אַ֑תָּה יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה אַל־תְּאַחַֽר׃{פ}

verses.text_en: I seek refuge in You, O LORD; may I never be disappointed.
verses.text_he: בְּךָֽ־יְהֹוָ֥ה חָסִ֑יתִי אַל־אֵב֥וֹשָׁה לְעוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: As You are beneficent, save me and rescue me; incline Your ear to me and deliver me.
verses.text_he: בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֗ תַּצִּילֵ֥נִי וּֽתְפַלְּטֵ֑נִי הַטֵּֽה־אֵלַ֥י אׇ֝זְנְךָ֗ וְהוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Be a sheltering rock for me to which I may always repair; decree my deliverance, for You are my rock and my fortress.
verses.text_he: הֱיֵ֤ה לִ֨י׀ לְצ֥וּר מָע֡וֹן לָב֗וֹא תָּמִ֗יד צִוִּ֥יתָ לְהוֹשִׁיעֵ֑נִי כִּֽי־סַלְעִ֖י וּמְצוּדָתִ֣י אָֽתָּה׃

verses.text_en: My God, rescue me from the hand of the wicked, from the grasp of the unjust and the lawless.
verses.text_he: אֱֽלֹהַ֗י פַּ֭לְּטֵנִי מִיַּ֣ד רָשָׁ֑ע מִכַּ֖ף מְעַוֵּ֣ל וְחוֹמֵֽץ׃

verses.text_en: For You are my hope, O Lord GOD, my trust from my youth.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־אַתָּ֥ה תִקְוָתִ֑י אֲדֹנָ֥י יֱ֝הֹוִ֗ה מִבְטַחִ֥י מִנְּעוּרָֽי׃

verses.text_en: While yet unborn, I depended on You; in the womb of my mother, You were my support; I sing Your praises always.
verses.text_he: עָלֶ֤יךָ׀ נִסְמַ֬כְתִּי מִבֶּ֗טֶן מִמְּעֵ֣י אִ֭מִּי אַתָּ֣ה גוֹזִ֑י בְּךָ֖ תְהִלָּתִ֣י תָמִֽיד׃

verses.text_en: I have become an example for many, since You are my mighty refuge.
verses.text_he: כְּ֭מוֹפֵת הָיִ֣יתִי לְרַבִּ֑ים וְ֝אַתָּ֗ה מַֽחֲסִי־עֹֽז׃

verses.text_en: My mouth is full of praise to You, glorifying You all day long.
verses.text_he: יִמָּ֣לֵא פִ֭י תְּהִלָּתֶ֑ךָ כׇּל־הַ֝יּ֗וֹם תִּפְאַרְתֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Do not cast me off in old age; when my strength fails, do not forsake me!
verses.text_he: אַֽל־תַּ֭שְׁלִיכֵנִי לְעֵ֣ת זִקְנָ֑ה כִּכְל֥וֹת כֹּ֝חִ֗י אַֽל־תַּעַזְבֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: For my enemies talk against me; those who wait for me are of one mind,
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־אָמְר֣וּ אוֹיְבַ֣י לִ֑י וְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י נוֹעֲצ֥וּ יַחְדָּֽו׃

verses.text_en: saying, “God has forsaken him; chase him and catch him, for no one will save him!”
verses.text_he: לֵ֭אמֹר אֱלֹהִ֣ים עֲזָב֑וֹ רִֽדְפ֥וּ וְ֝תִפְשׂ֗וּהוּ כִּי־אֵ֥ין מַצִּֽיל׃

verses.text_en: O God, be not far from me; my God, hasten to my aid!
verses.text_he: אֱ֭לֹהִים אַל־תִּרְחַ֣ק מִמֶּ֑נִּי אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י לְעֶזְרָ֥תִי (חישה) [חֽוּשָׁה]׃

verses.text_en: Let my accusers perish in frustration; let those who seek my ruin be clothed in reproach and disgrace!
verses.text_he: יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ יִכְלוּ֮ שֹׂטְנֵ֢י נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י יַעֲט֣וּ חֶ֭רְפָּה וּכְלִמָּ֑ה מְ֝בַקְשֵׁ֗י רָעָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: As for me, I will hope always, and add to the many praises of You.
verses.text_he: וַ֭אֲנִי תָּמִ֣יד אֲיַחֵ֑ל וְ֝הוֹסַפְתִּ֗י עַל־כׇּל־תְּהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: My mouth tells of Your beneficence, of Your deliverance all day long, though I know not how to tell it.
verses.text_he: פִּ֤י׀ יְסַפֵּ֬ר צִדְקָתֶ֗ךָ כׇּל־הַיּ֥וֹם תְּשׁוּעָתֶ֑ךָ כִּ֤י לֹ֖א יָדַ֣עְתִּי סְפֹרֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: I come with praise of Your mighty acts, O Lord GOD; I celebrate Your beneficence, Yours alone.
verses.text_he: אָב֗וֹא בִּ֭גְבֻרוֹת אֲדֹנָ֣י יֱהֹוִ֑ה אַזְכִּ֖יר צִדְקָתְךָ֣ לְבַדֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: You have let me experience it, God, from my youth; until now I have proclaimed Your wondrous deeds,
verses.text_he: אֱֽלֹהִ֗ים לִמַּדְתַּ֥נִי מִנְּעוּרָ֑י וְעַד־הֵ֝֗נָּה אַגִּ֥יד נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: and even in hoary old age do not forsake me, God, until I proclaim Your strength to the next generation, Your mighty acts, to all who are to come,
verses.text_he: וְגַ֤ם עַד־זִקְנָ֨ה׀ וְשֵׂיבָה֮ אֱלֹהִ֢ים אַֽל־תַּ֫עַזְבֵ֥נִי עַד־אַגִּ֣יד זְרוֹעֲךָ֣ לְד֑וֹר לְכׇל־יָ֝ב֗וֹא גְּבוּרָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Your beneficence, high as the heavens, O God, You who have done great things; O God, who is Your peer!
verses.text_he: וְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ אֱלֹהִ֗ים עַד־מָ֫ר֥וֹם אֲשֶׁר־עָשִׂ֥יתָ גְדֹל֑וֹת אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים מִ֣י כָמֽוֹךָ׃

verses.text_en: You who have made me undergo many troubles and misfortunes will revive me again, and raise me up from the depths of the earth.
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֤ר (הראיתנו) [הִרְאִיתַ֨נִי׀] צָר֥וֹת רַבּ֗וֹת וְרָ֫ע֥וֹת תָּשׁ֥וּב (תחינו) [תְּחַיֵּ֑נִי] וּֽמִתְּהֹמ֥וֹת הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ תָּשׁ֥וּב תַּעֲלֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: You will grant me much greatness, You will turn and comfort me.
verses.text_he: תֶּ֤רֶב׀ גְּֽדֻלָּתִ֗י וְתִסֹּ֥ב תְּֽנַחֲמֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Then I will acclaim You to the music of the lyre for Your faithfulness, O my God; I will sing a hymn to You with a harp, O Holy One of Israel.
verses.text_he: גַּם־אֲנִ֤י׀ אוֹדְךָ֣ בִכְלִי־נֶבֶל֮ אֲמִתְּךָ֢ אֱלֹ֫הָ֥י אֲזַמְּרָ֣ה לְךָ֣ בְכִנּ֑וֹר קְ֝ד֗וֹשׁ יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: My lips shall be jubilant, as I sing a hymn to You, my whole being, which You have redeemed.
verses.text_he: תְּרַנֵּ֣נָּה שְׂ֭פָתַי כִּ֣י אֲזַמְּרָה־לָּ֑ךְ וְ֝נַפְשִׁ֗י אֲשֶׁ֣ר פָּדִֽיתָ׃

verses.text_en: All day long my tongue shall recite Your beneficent acts, how those who sought my ruin were frustrated and disgraced.
verses.text_he: גַּם־לְשׁוֹנִ֗י כׇּל־הַ֭יּוֹם תֶּהְגֶּ֣ה צִדְקָתֶ֑ךָ כִּי־בֹ֥שׁוּ כִי־חָ֝פְר֗וּ מְבַקְשֵׁ֥י רָעָתִֽי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Of Solomon. O God, endow the king with Your judgments, the king’s son with Your righteousness;
verses.text_he: לִשְׁלֹמֹ֨ה׀ אֱֽלֹהִ֗ים מִ֭שְׁפָּטֶיךָ לְמֶ֣לֶךְ תֵּ֑ן וְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ לְבֶן־מֶֽלֶךְ׃

verses.text_en: that he may judge Your people rightly, Your lowly ones, justly.
verses.text_he: יָדִ֣ין עַמְּךָ֣ בְצֶ֑דֶק וַעֲנִיֶּ֥יךָ בְמִשְׁפָּֽט׃

verses.text_en: Let the mountains produce well-being for the people, the hills, the reward of justice.
verses.text_he: יִשְׂא֤וּ הָרִ֓ים שָׁ֘ל֥וֹם לָעָ֑ם וּ֝גְבָע֗וֹת בִּצְדָקָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Let him champion the lowly among the people, deliver the needy folk, and crush those who wrong them.
verses.text_he: יִשְׁפֹּ֤ט׀ עֲֽנִיֵּי־עָ֗ם י֭וֹשִׁיעַ לִבְנֵ֣י אֶבְי֑וֹן וִ֖ידַכֵּ֣א עוֹשֵֽׁק׃

verses.text_en: Let them fear You as long as the sun shines, while the moon lasts, generations on end.
verses.text_he: יִירָא֥וּךָ עִם־שָׁ֑מֶשׁ וְלִפְנֵ֥י יָ֝רֵ֗חַ דּ֣וֹר דּוֹרִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Let him be like rain that falls on a mown field, like a downpour of rain on the ground,
verses.text_he: יֵ֭רֵד כְּמָטָ֣ר עַל־גֵּ֑ז כִּ֝רְבִיבִ֗ים זַרְזִ֥יף אָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: that the righteous may flourish in his time, and well-being abound, till the moon is no more.
verses.text_he: יִֽפְרַח־בְּיָמָ֥יו צַדִּ֑יק וְרֹ֥ב שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם עַד־בְּלִ֥י יָרֵֽחַ׃

verses.text_en: Let him rule from sea to sea, from the river to the ends of the earth.
verses.text_he: וְ֭יֵרְדְּ מִיָּ֣ם עַד־יָ֑ם וּ֝מִנָּהָ֗ר עַד־אַפְסֵי־אָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: Let desert-dwellers kneel before him, and his enemies lick the dust.
verses.text_he: לְ֭פָנָיו יִכְרְע֣וּ צִיִּ֑ים וְ֝אֹיְבָ֗יו עָפָ֥ר יְלַחֵֽכוּ׃

verses.text_en: Let kings of Tarshish and the islands pay tribute, kings of Sheba and Seba offer gifts.
verses.text_he: מַלְכֵ֬י תַרְשִׁ֣ישׁ וְ֭אִיִּים מִנְחָ֣ה יָשִׁ֑יבוּ מַלְכֵ֥י שְׁבָ֥א וּ֝סְבָ֗א אֶשְׁכָּ֥ר יַקְרִֽיבוּ׃

verses.text_en: Let all kings bow to him, and all nations serve him.
verses.text_he: וְיִשְׁתַּחֲווּ־ל֥וֹ כׇל־מְלָכִ֑ים כׇּל־גּוֹיִ֥ם יַעַבְדֽוּהוּ׃

verses.text_en: For he saves the needy who cry out, the lowly who have no helper.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־יַ֭צִּיל אֶבְי֣וֹן מְשַׁוֵּ֑עַ וְ֝עָנִ֗י וְֽאֵין־עֹזֵ֥ר לֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: He cares about the poor and the needy; He brings the needy deliverance.
verses.text_he: יָ֭חֹס עַל־דַּ֣ל וְאֶבְי֑וֹן וְנַפְשׁ֖וֹת אֶבְיוֹנִ֣ים יוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃

verses.text_en: He redeems them from fraud and lawlessness; the shedding of their blood weighs heavily upon him.
verses.text_he: מִתּ֣וֹךְ וּ֭מֵחָמָס יִגְאַ֣ל נַפְשָׁ֑ם וְיֵיקַ֖ר דָּמָ֣ם בְּעֵינָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: So let him live, and receive gold of Sheba; let prayers for him be said always, blessings on him invoked at all times.
verses.text_he: וִיחִ֗י וְיִתֶּן־לוֹ֮ מִזְּהַ֢ב שְׁ֫בָ֥א וְיִתְפַּלֵּ֣ל בַּעֲד֣וֹ תָמִ֑יד כׇּל־הַ֝יּ֗וֹם יְבָרְכֶֽנְהוּ׃

verses.text_en: Let abundant grain be in the land, to the tops of the mountains; let his crops thrive like the forest of Lebanon; and let men sprout up in towns like country grass.
verses.text_he: יְהִ֤י פִסַּת־בַּ֨ר׀ בָּאָרֶץ֮ בְּרֹ֢אשׁ הָ֫רִ֥ים יִרְעַ֣שׁ כַּלְּבָנ֣וֹן פִּרְי֑וֹ וְיָצִ֥יצוּ מֵ֝עִ֗יר כְּעֵ֣שֶׂב הָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: May his name be eternal; while the sun lasts, may his name endure; let men invoke his blessedness upon themselves; let all nations count him happy.
verses.text_he: יְהִ֤י שְׁמ֨וֹ׀ לְֽעוֹלָ֗ם לִפְנֵי־שֶׁמֶשׁ֮ (ינין) [יִנּ֢וֹן] שְׁ֫מ֥וֹ וְיִתְבָּ֥רְכוּ ב֑וֹ כׇּל־גּוֹיִ֥ם יְאַשְּׁרֽוּהוּ׃

verses.text_en: Blessed is the LORD God, God of Israel, who alone does wondrous things;
verses.text_he: בָּר֤וּךְ׀ יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱ֭לֹהִים אֱלֹהֵ֣י יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל עֹשֵׂ֖ה נִפְלָא֣וֹת לְבַדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Blessed is His glorious name forever; His glory fills the whole world. Amen and Amen.
verses.text_he: וּבָר֤וּךְ׀ שֵׁ֥ם כְּבוֹד֗וֹ לְע֫וֹלָ֥ם וְיִמָּלֵ֣א כְ֭בוֹדוֹ אֶת־כֹּ֥ל הָאָ֗רֶץ אָ֘מֵ֥ן׀וְאָמֵֽן׃

verses.text_en: End of the prayers of David son of Jesse.
verses.text_he: כׇּלּ֥וּ תְפִלּ֑וֹת דָּ֝וִ֗ד בֶּן־יִשָֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: A psalm of Asaph. God is truly good to Israel, to those whose heart is pure.
verses.text_he: מִזְמ֗וֹר לְאָ֫סָ֥ף אַ֤ךְ ט֖וֹב לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל אֱלֹהִ֗ים לְבָרֵ֥י לֵבָֽב׃

verses.text_en: As for me, my feet had almost strayed, my steps were nearly led off course,
verses.text_he: וַאֲנִ֗י כִּ֭מְעַט (נטוי) [נָטָ֣יוּ] רַגְלָ֑י כְּ֝אַ֗יִן (שפכה) [שֻׁפְּכ֥וּ] אֲשֻׁרָֽי׃

verses.text_en: for I envied the wanton; I saw the wicked at ease.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־קִ֭נֵּאתִי בַּהוֹלְלִ֑ים שְׁל֖וֹם רְשָׁעִ֣ים אֶרְאֶֽה׃

verses.text_en: Death has no pangs for them; their body is healthy.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י אֵ֖ין חַרְצֻבּ֥וֹת לְמוֹתָ֗ם וּבָרִ֥יא אוּלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: They have no part in the travail of men; they are not afflicted like the rest of mankind.
verses.text_he: בַּעֲמַ֣ל אֱנ֣וֹשׁ אֵינֵ֑מוֹ וְעִם־אָ֝דָ֗ם לֹ֣א יְנֻגָּֽעוּ׃

verses.text_en: So pride adorns their necks, lawlessness enwraps them as a mantle.
verses.text_he: לָ֭כֵן עֲנָקַ֣תְמוֹ גַאֲוָ֑ה יַעֲטָף־שִׁ֝֗ית חָמָ֥ס לָֽמוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Fat shuts out their eyes; their fancies are extravagant.
verses.text_he: יָ֭צָא מֵחֵ֣לֶב עֵינֵ֑מוֹ עָ֝בְר֗וּ מַשְׂכִּיּ֥וֹת לֵבָֽב׃

verses.text_en: They scoff and plan evil; from their eminence they plan wrongdoing.
verses.text_he: יָמִ֤יקוּ׀ וִידַבְּר֣וּ בְרָ֣ע עֹ֑שֶׁק מִמָּר֥וֹם יְדַבֵּֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: They set their mouths against heaven, and their tongues range over the earth.
verses.text_he: שַׁתּ֣וּ בַשָּׁמַ֣יִם פִּיהֶ֑ם וּ֝לְשׁוֹנָ֗ם תִּהֲלַ֥ךְ בָּאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: So they pound His people again and again, until they are drained of their very last tear.
verses.text_he: לָכֵ֤ן׀ (ישיב) [יָשׁ֣וּב] עַמּ֣וֹ הֲלֹ֑ם וּמֵ֥י מָ֝לֵ֗א יִמָּ֥צוּ לָֽמוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Then they say, “How could God know? Is there knowledge with the Most High?”
verses.text_he: וְֽאָמְר֗וּ אֵיכָ֥ה יָדַֽע־אֵ֑ל וְיֵ֖שׁ דֵּעָ֣ה בְעֶלְיֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: Such are the wicked; ever tranquil, they amass wealth.
verses.text_he: הִנֵּה־אֵ֥לֶּה רְשָׁעִ֑ים וְשַׁלְוֵ֥י ע֝וֹלָ֗ם הִשְׂגּוּ־חָֽיִל׃

verses.text_en: It was for nothing that I kept my heart pure and washed my hands in innocence,
verses.text_he: אַךְ־רִ֭יק זִכִּ֣יתִי לְבָבִ֑י וָאֶרְחַ֖ץ בְּנִקָּי֣וֹן כַּפָּֽי׃

verses.text_en: seeing that I have been constantly afflicted, that each morning brings new punishments.
verses.text_he: וָאֱהִ֣י נָ֭גוּעַ כׇּל־הַיּ֑וֹם וְ֝תוֹכַחְתִּ֗י לַבְּקָרִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Had I decided to say these things, I should have been false to the circle of Your disciples.
verses.text_he: אִם־אָ֭מַרְתִּי אֲסַפְּרָ֥ה כְמ֑וֹ הִנֵּ֤ה ד֖וֹר בָּנֶ֣יךָ בָגָֽדְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: So I applied myself to understand this, but it seemed a hopeless task
verses.text_he: וָ֭אֲחַשְּׁבָה לָדַ֣עַת זֹ֑את עָמָ֖ל (היא) [ה֣וּא] בְעֵינָֽי׃

verses.text_en: till I entered God’s sanctuary and reflected on their fate.
verses.text_he: עַד־אָ֭בוֹא אֶל־מִקְדְּשֵׁי־אֵ֑ל אָ֝בִ֗ינָה לְאַחֲרִיתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: You surround them with flattery; You make them fall through blandishments.
verses.text_he: אַ֣ךְ בַּ֭חֲלָקוֹת תָּשִׁ֣ית לָ֑מוֹ הִ֝פַּלְתָּ֗ם לְמַשּׁוּאֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: How suddenly are they ruined, wholly swept away by terrors.
verses.text_he: אֵ֤יךְ הָי֣וּ לְשַׁמָּ֣ה כְרָ֑גַע סָ֥פוּ תַ֝֗מּוּ מִן־בַּלָּהֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: When You are aroused You despise their image, as one does a dream after waking, O Lord.
verses.text_he: כַּחֲל֥וֹם מֵהָקִ֑יץ אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י בָּעִ֤יר׀ צַלְמָ֬ם תִּבְזֶֽה׃

verses.text_en: My mind was stripped of its reason, my feelings were numbed.
verses.text_he: כִּ֭י יִתְחַמֵּ֣ץ לְבָבִ֑י וְ֝כִלְיוֹתַ֗י אֶשְׁתּוֹנָֽן׃

verses.text_en: I was a dolt, without knowledge; I was brutish toward You.
verses.text_he: וַאֲנִי־בַ֭עַר וְלֹ֣א אֵדָ֑ע בְּ֝הֵמ֗וֹת הָיִ֥יתִי עִמָּֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: Yet I was always with You, You held my right hand;
verses.text_he: וַאֲנִ֣י תָמִ֣יד עִמָּ֑ךְ אָ֝חַ֗זְתָּ בְּיַד־יְמִינִֽי׃

verses.text_en: You guided me by Your counsel and led me toward honor.
verses.text_he: בַּעֲצָתְךָ֥ תַנְחֵ֑נִי וְ֝אַחַ֗ר כָּב֥וֹד תִּקָּחֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Whom else have I in heaven? And having You, I want no one on earth.
verses.text_he: מִי־לִ֥י בַשָּׁמָ֑יִם וְ֝עִמְּךָ֗ לֹא־חָפַ֥צְתִּי בָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: My body and mind fail; but God is the stay of my mind, my portion forever.
verses.text_he: כָּלָ֥ה שְׁאֵרִ֗י וּלְבָ֫בִ֥י צוּר־לְבָבִ֥י וְחֶלְקִ֗י אֱלֹהִ֥ים לְעוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Those who keep far from You perish; You annihilate all who are untrue to You.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־הִנֵּ֣ה רְחֵקֶ֣יךָ יֹאבֵ֑דוּ הִ֝צְמַ֗תָּה כׇּל־זוֹנֶ֥ה מִמֶּֽךָּ׃

verses.text_en: As for me, nearness to God is good; I have made the Lord GOD my refuge, that I may recount all Your works.
verses.text_he: וַאֲנִ֤י׀ קִ֥רְבַ֥ת אֱלֹהִ֗ים לִ֫י־ט֥וֹב שַׁתִּ֤י׀ בַּאדֹנָ֣י יֱהֹוִ֣ה מַחְסִ֑י לְ֝סַפֵּ֗ר כׇּל־מַלְאֲכוֹתֶֽיךָ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A of Asaph. Why, O God, do You forever reject us, do You fume in anger at the flock that You tend?
verses.text_he: מַשְׂכִּ֗יל לְאָ֫סָ֥ף לָמָ֣ה אֱ֭לֹהִים זָנַ֣חְתָּ לָנֶ֑צַח יֶעְשַׁ֥ן אַ֝פְּךָ֗ בְּצֹ֣אן מַרְעִיתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Remember the community You made Yours long ago, Your very own tribe that You redeemed, Mount Zion, where You dwell.
verses.text_he: זְכֹ֤ר עֲדָתְךָ֨׀ קָ֘נִ֤יתָ קֶּ֗דֶם גָּ֭אַלְתָּ שֵׁ֣בֶט נַחֲלָתֶ֑ךָ הַר־צִ֝יּ֗וֹן זֶ֤ה׀ שָׁכַ֬נְתָּ בּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Bestir Yourself because of the perpetual tumult, all the outrages of the enemy in the sanctuary.
verses.text_he: הָרִ֣ימָה פְ֭עָמֶיךָ לְמַשֻּׁא֣וֹת נֶ֑צַח כׇּל־הֵרַ֖ע אוֹיֵ֣ב בַּקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃

verses.text_en: Your foes roar inside Your meeting-place; they take their signs for true signs.
verses.text_he: שָׁאֲג֣וּ צֹ֭רְרֶיךָ בְּקֶ֣רֶב מוֹעֲדֶ֑ךָ שָׂ֖מוּ אוֹתֹתָ֣ם אֹתֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: It is like men wielding axes against a gnarled tree;
verses.text_he: יִ֭וָּדַע כְּמֵבִ֣יא לְמָ֑עְלָה בִּסְבׇךְ־עֵ֝֗ץ קַרְדֻּמּֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: with hatchet and pike they hacked away at its carved work.
verses.text_he: (ועת) [וְ֭עַתָּה] פִּתּוּחֶ֣יהָ יָּ֑חַד בְּכַשִּׁ֥יל וְ֝כֵילַפּ֗וֹת יַהֲלֹמֽוּן׃

verses.text_en: They made Your sanctuary go up in flames; they brought low in dishonor the dwelling-place of Your presence.
verses.text_he: שִׁלְח֣וּ בָ֭אֵשׁ מִקְדָּשֶׁ֑ךָ לָ֝אָ֗רֶץ חִלְּל֥וּ מִֽשְׁכַּן־שְׁמֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: They resolved, “Let us destroy them altogether!” They burned all God’s tabernacles in the land.
verses.text_he: אָמְר֣וּ בְ֭לִבָּם נִינָ֣ם יָ֑חַד שָׂרְפ֖וּ כׇל־מוֹעֲדֵי־אֵ֣ל בָּאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: No signs appear for us; there is no longer any prophet; no one among us knows for how long.
verses.text_he: אֽוֹתֹתֵ֗ינוּ לֹ֥א־רָ֫אִ֥ינוּ אֵֽין־ע֥וֹד נָבִ֑יא וְלֹֽא־אִ֝תָּ֗נוּ יֹדֵ֥עַ עַד־מָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Till when, O God, will the foe blaspheme, will the enemy forever revile Your name?
verses.text_he: עַד־מָתַ֣י אֱ֭לֹהִים יְחָ֣רֶף צָ֑ר יְנָ֘אֵ֤ץ אוֹיֵ֖ב שִׁמְךָ֣ לָנֶֽצַח׃

verses.text_en: Why do You hold back Your hand, Your right hand? Draw it out of Your bosom!
verses.text_he: לָ֤מָּה תָשִׁ֣יב יָ֭דְךָ וִימִינֶ֑ךָ מִקֶּ֖רֶב (חוקך) [חֵיקְךָ֣] כַלֵּֽה׃

verses.text_en: O God, my King from of old, who brings deliverance throughout the land;
verses.text_he: וֵ֭אלֹהִים מַלְכִּ֣י מִקֶּ֑דֶם פֹּעֵ֥ל יְ֝שׁוּע֗וֹת בְּקֶ֣רֶב הָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: it was You who drove back the sea with Your might, who smashed the heads of the monsters in the waters;
verses.text_he: אַתָּ֤ה פוֹרַ֣רְתָּ בְעׇזְּךָ֣ יָ֑ם שִׁבַּ֥רְתָּ רָאשֵׁ֥י תַ֝נִּינִ֗ים עַל־הַמָּֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: it was You who crushed the heads of Leviathan, who left him as food for the denizens of the desert;
verses.text_he: אַתָּ֣ה רִ֭צַּצְתָּ רָאשֵׁ֣י לִוְיָתָ֑ן תִּתְּנֶ֥נּוּ מַ֝אֲכָ֗ל לְעָ֣ם לְצִיִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: it was You who released springs and torrents, who made mighty rivers run dry;
verses.text_he: אַתָּ֣ה בָ֭קַעְתָּ מַעְיָ֣ן וָנָ֑חַל אַתָּ֥ה ה֝וֹבַ֗שְׁתָּ נַהֲר֥וֹת אֵיתָֽן׃

verses.text_en: the day is Yours, the night also; it was You who set in place the orb of the sun;
verses.text_he: לְךָ֣ י֭וֹם אַף־לְךָ֥ לָ֑יְלָה אַתָּ֥ה הֲ֝כִינ֗וֹתָ מָא֥וֹר וָשָֽׁמֶשׁ׃

verses.text_en: You fixed all the boundaries of the earth; summer and winter—You made them.
verses.text_he: אַתָּ֣ה הִ֭צַּבְתָּ כׇּל־גְּבוּל֣וֹת אָ֑רֶץ קַ֥יִץ וָ֝חֹ֗רֶף אַתָּ֥ה יְצַרְתָּֽם׃

verses.text_en: Be mindful of how the enemy blasphemes the LORD, how base people revile Your name.
verses.text_he: זְכׇר־זֹ֗את א֭וֹיֵב חֵרֵ֣ף׀יְהֹוָ֑ה וְעַ֥ם נָ֝בָ֗ל נִאֲצ֥וּ שְׁמֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Do not deliver Your dove to the wild beast; do not ignore forever the band of Your lowly ones.
verses.text_he: אַל־תִּתֵּ֣ן לְ֭חַיַּת נֶ֣פֶשׁ תּוֹרֶ֑ךָ חַיַּ֥ת עֲ֝נִיֶּ֗יךָ אַל־תִּשְׁכַּ֥ח לָנֶֽצַח׃

verses.text_en: Look to the covenant! For the dark places of the land are full of the haunts of lawlessness.
verses.text_he: הַבֵּ֥ט לַבְּרִ֑ית כִּ֥י מָלְא֥וּ מַחֲשַׁכֵּי־אֶ֝֗רֶץ נְא֣וֹת חָמָֽס׃

verses.text_en: Let not the downtrodden turn away disappointed; let the poor and needy praise Your name.
verses.text_he: אַל־יָשֹׁ֣ב דַּ֣ךְ נִכְלָ֑ם עָנִ֥י וְ֝אֶבְי֗וֹן יְֽהַלְל֥וּ שְׁמֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Rise, O God, champion Your cause; be mindful that You are blasphemed by base men all day long.
verses.text_he: קוּמָ֣ה אֱ֭לֹהִים רִיבָ֣ה רִיבֶ֑ךָ זְכֹ֥ר חֶרְפָּתְךָ֥ מִנִּי־נָ֝בָ֗ל כׇּל־הַיּֽוֹם׃

verses.text_en: Do not ignore the shouts of Your foes, the din of Your adversaries that ascends all the time.
verses.text_he: אַל־תִּ֭שְׁכַּח ק֣וֹל צֹרְרֶ֑יךָ שְׁא֥וֹן קָ֝מֶ֗יךָ עֹלֶ֥ה תָמִֽיד׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; . A psalm of Asaph, a song.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ אַל־תַּשְׁחֵ֑ת מִזְמ֖וֹר לְאָסָ֣ף שִֽׁיר׃

verses.text_en: We praise You, O God; we praise You; Your presence is near; men tell of Your wondrous deeds.
verses.text_he: ה֘וֹדִ֤ינוּ לְּךָ֨׀ אֱֽלֹהִ֗ים ה֭וֹדִינוּ וְקָר֣וֹב שְׁמֶ֑ךָ סִ֝פְּר֗וּ נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: “At the time I choose, I will give judgment equitably.
verses.text_he: כִּ֭י אֶקַּ֣ח מוֹעֵ֑ד אֲ֝נִ֗י מֵישָׁרִ֥ים אֶשְׁפֹּֽט׃

verses.text_en: Earth and all its inhabitants dissolve; it is I who keep its pillars firm. .
verses.text_he: נְֽמֹגִ֗ים אֶ֥רֶץ וְכׇל־יֹשְׁבֶ֑יהָ אָנֹכִ֨י תִכַּ֖נְתִּי עַמּוּדֶ֣יהָ סֶּֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: To wanton men I say, ‘Do not be wanton!’ to the wicked, ‘Do not lift up your horns!’”
verses.text_he: אָמַ֣רְתִּי לַ֭הוֹלְלִים אַל־תָּהֹ֑לּוּ וְ֝לָרְשָׁעִ֗ים אַל־תָּרִ֥ימוּ קָֽרֶן׃

verses.text_en: Do not lift your horns up high in vainglorious bluster.
verses.text_he: אַל־תָּרִ֣ימוּ לַמָּר֣וֹם קַרְנְכֶ֑ם תְּדַבְּר֖וּ בְצַוָּ֣אר עָתָֽק׃

verses.text_en: For what lifts a man comes not from the east or the west or the wilderness;
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י לֹ֣א מִ֭מּוֹצָא וּמִֽמַּעֲרָ֑ב וְ֝לֹ֗א מִמִּדְבַּ֥ר הָרִֽים׃

verses.text_en: for God it is who gives judgment; He brings down one man, He lifts up another.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־אֱלֹהִ֥ים שֹׁפֵ֑ט זֶ֥ה יַ֝שְׁפִּ֗יל וְזֶ֣ה יָרִֽים׃

verses.text_en: There is a cup in the LORD’s hand with foaming wine fully mixed; from this He pours; all the wicked of the earth drink, draining it to the very dregs.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י כ֪וֹס בְּֽיַד־יְהֹוָ֡ה וְיַ֤יִן חָמַ֨ר׀ מָ֥לֵא מֶסֶךְ֮ וַיַּגֵּ֢ר מִ֫זֶּ֥ה אַךְ־שְׁ֭מָרֶיהָ יִמְצ֣וּ יִשְׁתּ֑וּ כֹּ֝֗ל רִשְׁעֵי־אָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: As for me, I will declare forever, I will sing a hymn to the God of Jacob.
verses.text_he: וַ֭אֲנִי אַגִּ֣יד לְעֹלָ֑ם אֲ֝זַמְּרָ֗ה לֵאלֹהֵ֥י יַעֲקֹֽב׃

verses.text_en: “All the horns of the wicked I will cut; but the horns of the righteous shall be lifted up.”
verses.text_he: וְכׇל־קַרְנֵ֣י רְשָׁעִ֣ים אֲגַדֵּ֑עַ תְּ֝רוֹמַ֗מְנָה קַֽרְנ֥וֹת צַדִּֽיק׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; with instrumental music. A psalm of Asaph, a song.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ בִּנְגִינֹ֑ת מִזְמ֖וֹר לְאָסָ֣ף שִֽׁיר׃

verses.text_en: God has made Himself known in Judah, His name is great in Israel;
verses.text_he: נוֹדָ֣ע בִּיהוּדָ֣ה אֱלֹהִ֑ים בְּ֝יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל גָּד֥וֹל שְׁמֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Salem became His abode; Zion, His den.
verses.text_he: וַיְהִ֣י בְשָׁלֵ֣ם סוּכּ֑וֹ וּמְע֖וֹנָת֣וֹ בְצִיּֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: There He broke the fiery arrows of the bow, the shield and the sword of war. .
verses.text_he: שָׁ֭מָּה שִׁבַּ֣ר רִשְׁפֵי־קָ֑שֶׁת מָגֵ֬ן וְחֶ֖רֶב וּמִלְחָמָ֣ה סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: You were resplendent, glorious, on the mountains of prey.
verses.text_he: נָ֭אוֹר אַתָּ֥ה אַדִּ֗יר מֵֽהַרְרֵי־טָֽרֶף׃

verses.text_en: The stout-hearted were despoiled; they were in a stupor; the bravest of men could not lift a hand.
verses.text_he: אֶשְׁתּֽוֹלְל֨וּ׀ אַבִּ֣ירֵי לֵ֭ב נָמ֣וּ שְׁנָתָ֑ם וְלֹֽא־מָצְא֖וּ כׇל־אַנְשֵׁי־חַ֣יִל יְדֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: At Your blast, O God of Jacob, horse and chariot lay stunned.
verses.text_he: מִ֭גַּעֲרָ֣תְךָ אֱלֹהֵ֣י יַעֲקֹ֑ב נִ֝רְדָּ֗ם וְרֶ֣כֶב וָסֽוּס׃

verses.text_en: O You! You are awesome! Who can withstand You when You are enraged?
verses.text_he: אַתָּ֤ה׀ נ֥וֹרָא אַ֗תָּה וּמִֽי־יַעֲמֹ֥ד לְפָנֶ֗יךָ מֵאָ֥ז אַפֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: In heaven You pronounced sentence; the earth was numbed with fright
verses.text_he: מִ֭שָּׁמַיִם הִשְׁמַ֣עְתָּ דִּ֑ין אֶ֖רֶץ יָֽרְאָ֣ה וְשָׁקָֽטָה׃

verses.text_en: as God rose to execute judgment, to deliver all the lowly of the earth. .
verses.text_he: בְּקוּם־לַמִּשְׁפָּ֥ט אֱלֹהִ֑ים לְהוֹשִׁ֖יעַ כׇּל־עַנְוֵי־אֶ֣רֶץ סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: The fiercest of men shall acknowledge You, when You gird on the last bit of fury.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־חֲמַ֣ת אָדָ֣ם תּוֹדֶ֑ךָּ שְׁאֵרִ֖ית חֵמֹ֣ת תַּחְגֹּֽר׃

verses.text_en: Make vows and pay them to the LORD your God; all who are around Him shall bring tribute to the Awesome One.
verses.text_he: נִ֥דְר֣וּ וְשַׁלְּמוּ֮ לַיהֹוָ֢ה אֱֽלֹהֵ֫יכֶ֥ם כׇּל־סְבִיבָ֑יו יֹבִ֥ילוּ שַׁ֝֗י לַמּוֹרָֽא׃

verses.text_en: He curbs the spirit of princes, inspires awe in the kings of the earth.
verses.text_he: יִ֭בְצֹר ר֣וּחַ נְגִידִ֑ים נ֝וֹרָ֗א לְמַלְכֵי־אָֽרֶץ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; on . Of Asaph. A psalm.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ עַֽל־[יְדוּת֗וּן] (ידיתון) לְאָסָ֥ף מִזְמֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: I cry aloud to God; I cry to God that He may give ear to me.
verses.text_he: קוֹלִ֣י אֶל־אֱלֹהִ֣ים וְאֶצְעָ֑קָה קוֹלִ֥י אֶל־אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים וְהַאֲזִ֥ין אֵלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: In my time of distress I turn to the Lord, with my hand [uplifted]; [my eyes] flow all night without respite; I will not be comforted.
verses.text_he: בְּי֥וֹם צָרָתִי֮ אֲדֹנָ֢י דָּ֫רָ֥שְׁתִּי יָדִ֤י׀ לַ֣יְלָה נִ֭גְּרָה וְלֹ֣א תָפ֑וּג מֵאֲנָ֖ה הִנָּחֵ֣ם נַפְשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: I call God to mind, I moan, I complain, my spirit fails. .
verses.text_he: אֶזְכְּרָ֣ה אֱלֹהִ֣ים וְאֶהֱמָ֑יָה אָשִׂ֓יחָה׀ וְתִתְעַטֵּ֖ף רוּחִ֣י סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: You have held my eyelids open; I am overwrought, I cannot speak.
verses.text_he: אָ֭חַזְתָּ שְׁמֻר֣וֹת עֵינָ֑י נִ֝פְעַ֗מְתִּי וְלֹ֣א אֲדַבֵּֽר׃

verses.text_en: My thoughts turn to days of old, to years long past.
verses.text_he: חִשַּׁ֣בְתִּי יָמִ֣ים מִקֶּ֑דֶם שְׁ֝נ֗וֹת עוֹלָמִֽים׃

verses.text_en: I recall at night their jibes at me; I commune with myself; my spirit inquires,
verses.text_he: אֶ֥זְכְּרָ֥ה נְגִינָתִ֗י בַּ֫לָּ֥יְלָה עִם־לְבָבִ֥י אָשִׂ֑יחָה וַיְחַפֵּ֥שׂ רוּחִֽי׃

verses.text_en: “Will the Lord reject forever and never again show favor?
verses.text_he: הַֽ֭לְעוֹלָמִים יִזְנַ֥ח׀אֲדֹנָ֑י וְלֹא־יֹסִ֖יף לִרְצ֣וֹת עֽוֹד׃

verses.text_en: Has His faithfulness disappeared forever? Will His promise be unfulfilled for all time?
verses.text_he: הֶאָפֵ֣ס לָנֶ֣צַח חַסְדּ֑וֹ גָּ֥מַר אֹ֝֗מֶר לְדֹ֣ר וָדֹֽר׃

verses.text_en: Has God forgotten how to pity? Has He in anger stifled His compassion?” .
verses.text_he: הֲשָׁכַ֣ח חַנּ֣וֹת אֵ֑ל אִם־קָפַ֥ץ בְּ֝אַ֗ף רַחֲמָ֥יו סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: And I said, “It is my fault that the right hand of the Most High has changed.”
verses.text_he: וָ֭אֹמַר חַלּ֣וֹתִי הִ֑יא שְׁ֝נ֗וֹת יְמִ֣ין עֶלְיֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: I recall the deeds of the LORD; yes, I recall Your wonders of old;
verses.text_he: (אזכיר) [אֶזְכּ֥וֹר] מַעַלְלֵי־יָ֑הּ כִּֽי־אֶזְכְּרָ֖ה מִקֶּ֣דֶם פִּלְאֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: I recount all Your works; I speak of Your acts.
verses.text_he: וְהָגִ֥יתִי בְכׇל־פׇּעֳלֶ֑ךָ וּֽבַעֲלִ֖ילוֹתֶ֣יךָ אָשִֽׂיחָה׃

verses.text_en: O God, Your ways are holiness; what god is as great as God?
verses.text_he: אֱ֭לֹהִים בַּקֹּ֣דֶשׁ דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ מִי־אֵ֥ל גָּ֝ד֗וֹל כֵּאלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: You are the God who works wonders; You have manifested Your strength among the peoples.
verses.text_he: אַתָּ֣ה הָ֭אֵל עֹ֣שֵׂה פֶ֑לֶא הוֹדַ֖עְתָּ בָעַמִּ֣ים עֻזֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: By Your arm You redeemed Your people, the children of Jacob and Joseph. .
verses.text_he: גָּאַ֣לְתָּ בִּזְר֣וֹעַ עַמֶּ֑ךָ בְּנֵֽי־יַעֲקֹ֖ב וְיוֹסֵ֣ף סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: The waters saw You, O God, the waters saw You and were convulsed; the very deep quaked as well.
verses.text_he: רָ֘א֤וּךָ מַּ֨יִם׀ אֱֽלֹהִ֗ים רָא֣וּךָ מַּ֣יִם יָחִ֑ילוּ אַ֝֗ף יִרְגְּז֥וּ תְהֹמֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: Clouds streamed water; the heavens rumbled; Your arrows flew about;
verses.text_he: זֹ֤רְמוּ מַ֨יִם׀ עָב֗וֹת ק֭וֹל נָתְנ֣וּ שְׁחָקִ֑ים אַף־חֲ֝צָצֶ֗יךָ יִתְהַלָּֽכוּ׃

verses.text_en: Your thunder rumbled like wheels; lightning lit up the world; the earth quaked and trembled.
verses.text_he: ק֤וֹל רַעַמְךָ֨׀ בַּגַּלְגַּ֗ל הֵאִ֣ירוּ בְרָקִ֣ים תֵּבֵ֑ל רָגְזָ֖ה וַתִּרְעַ֣שׁ הָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: Your way was through the sea, Your path, through the mighty waters; Your tracks could not be seen.
verses.text_he: בַּיָּ֤ם דַּרְכֶּ֗ךָ (ושביליך) [וּֽ֭שְׁבִילְךָ] בְּמַ֣יִם רַבִּ֑ים וְ֝עִקְּבוֹתֶ֗יךָ לֹ֣א נֹדָֽעוּ׃

verses.text_en: You led Your people like a flock in the care of Moses and Aaron.
verses.text_he: נָחִ֣יתָ כַצֹּ֣אן עַמֶּ֑ךָ בְּֽיַד־מֹשֶׁ֥ה וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A of Asaph. Give ear, my people, to my teaching, turn your ear to what I say.
verses.text_he: מַשְׂכִּ֗יל לְאָ֫סָ֥ף הַאֲזִ֣ינָה עַ֭מִּי תּוֹרָתִ֑י הַטּ֥וּ אׇ֝זְנְכֶ֗ם לְאִמְרֵי־פִֽי׃

verses.text_en: I will expound a theme, hold forth on the lessons of the past,
verses.text_he: אֶפְתְּחָ֣ה בְמָשָׁ֣ל פִּ֑י אַבִּ֥יעָה חִ֝יד֗וֹת מִנִּי־קֶֽדֶם׃

verses.text_en: things we have heard and known, that our fathers have told us.
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֣ר שָׁ֭מַעְנוּ וַנֵּדָעֵ֑ם וַ֝אֲבוֹתֵ֗ינוּ סִפְּרוּ־לָֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: We will not withhold them from their children, telling the coming generation the praises of the LORD and His might, and the wonders He performed.
verses.text_he: לֹ֤א נְכַחֵ֨ד׀ מִבְּנֵיהֶ֗ם לְד֥וֹר אַחֲר֗וֹן מְֽ֭סַפְּרִים תְּהִלּ֣וֹת יְהֹוָ֑ה וֶעֱזוּז֥וֹ וְ֝נִפְלְאֹתָ֗יו אֲשֶׁ֣ר עָשָֽׂה׃
