verses.text_en: He established a decree in Jacob, ordained a teaching in Israel, charging our fathers to make them known to their children,
verses.text_he: וַיָּ֤קֶם עֵד֨וּת׀ בְּֽיַעֲקֹ֗ב וְתוֹרָה֮ שָׂ֤ם בְּיִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל אֲשֶׁ֣ר צִ֭וָּה אֶת־אֲבוֹתֵ֑ינוּ לְ֝הוֹדִיעָ֗ם לִבְנֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: that a future generation might know —children yet to be born— and in turn tell their children
verses.text_he: לְמַ֤עַן יֵדְע֨וּ׀ דּ֣וֹר אַ֭חֲרוֹן בָּנִ֣ים יִוָּלֵ֑דוּ יָ֝קֻ֗מוּ וִיסַפְּר֥וּ לִבְנֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: that they might put their confidence in God, and not forget God’s great deeds, but observe His commandments,
verses.text_he: וְיָשִׂ֥ימוּ בֵאלֹהִ֗ים כִּ֫סְלָ֥ם וְלֹ֣א יִ֭שְׁכְּחוּ מַ֥עַלְלֵי־אֵ֑ל וּמִצְוֺתָ֥יו יִנְצֹֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: and not be like their fathers, a wayward and defiant generation, a generation whose heart was inconstant, whose spirit was not true to God.
verses.text_he: וְלֹ֤א יִהְי֨וּ׀ כַּאֲבוֹתָ֗ם דּוֹר֮ סוֹרֵ֢ר וּמֹ֫רֶ֥ה דּ֭וֹר לֹא־הֵכִ֣ין לִבּ֑וֹ וְלֹֽא־נֶאֶמְנָ֖ה אֶת־אֵ֣ל רוּחֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Like the Ephraimite bowmen who played false in the day of battle,
verses.text_he: בְּֽנֵי־אֶפְרַ֗יִם נוֹשְׁקֵ֥י רֽוֹמֵי־קָ֑שֶׁת הָ֝פְכ֗וּ בְּי֣וֹם קְרָֽב׃

verses.text_en: they did not keep God’s covenant, they refused to follow His instruction;
verses.text_he: לֹ֣א שָׁ֭מְרוּ בְּרִ֣ית אֱלֹהִ֑ים וּ֝בְתוֹרָת֗וֹ מֵאֲנ֥וּ לָלֶֽכֶת׃

verses.text_en: they forgot His deeds and the wonders that He showed them.
verses.text_he: וַיִּשְׁכְּח֥וּ עֲלִילוֹתָ֑יו וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו אֲשֶׁ֣ר הֶרְאָֽם׃

verses.text_en: He performed marvels in the sight of their fathers, in the land of Egypt, the plain of Zoan.
verses.text_he: נֶ֣גֶד אֲ֭בוֹתָם עָ֣שָׂה פֶ֑לֶא בְּאֶ֖רֶץ מִצְרַ֣יִם שְׂדֵה־צֹֽעַן׃

verses.text_en: He split the sea and took them through it; He made the waters stand like a wall.
verses.text_he: בָּ֣קַע יָ֭ם וַיַּעֲבִירֵ֑ם וַֽיַּצֶּב־מַ֥יִם כְּמוֹ־נֵֽד׃

verses.text_en: He led them with a cloud by day, and throughout the night by the light of fire.
verses.text_he: וַיַּנְחֵ֣ם בֶּעָנָ֣ן יוֹמָ֑ם וְכׇל־הַ֝לַּ֗יְלָה בְּא֣וֹר אֵֽשׁ׃

verses.text_en: He split rocks in the wilderness and gave them drink as if from the great deep.
verses.text_he: יְבַקַּ֣ע צֻ֭רִים בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר וַ֝יַּ֗שְׁקְ כִּתְהֹמ֥וֹת רַבָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: He brought forth streams from a rock and made them flow down like a river.
verses.text_he: וַיּוֹצִ֣א נוֹזְלִ֣ים מִסָּ֑לַע וַיּ֖וֹרֶד כַּנְּהָר֣וֹת מָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: But they went on sinning against Him, defying the Most High in the parched land.
verses.text_he: וַיּוֹסִ֣יפוּ ע֭וֹד לַחֲטֹא־ל֑וֹ לַֽמְר֥וֹת עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן בַּצִּיָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: To test God was in their mind when they demanded food for themselves.
verses.text_he: וַיְנַסּוּ־אֵ֥ל בִּלְבָבָ֑ם לִֽשְׁאׇל־אֹ֥כֶל לְנַפְשָֽׁם׃

verses.text_en: They spoke against God, saying, “Can God spread a feast in the wilderness?
verses.text_he: וַֽיְדַבְּר֗וּ בֵּאלֹ֫הִ֥ים אָ֭מְרוּ הֲי֣וּכַל אֵ֑ל לַעֲרֹ֥ךְ שֻׁ֝לְחָ֗ן בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃

verses.text_en: True, He struck the rock and waters flowed, streams gushed forth; but can He provide bread? Can He supply His people with meat?”
verses.text_he: הֵ֤ן הִכָּה־צ֨וּר׀ וַיָּז֣וּבוּ מַיִם֮ וּנְחָלִ֢ים יִ֫שְׁטֹ֥פוּ הֲגַם־לֶ֭חֶם י֣וּכַל תֵּ֑ת אִם־יָכִ֖ין שְׁאֵ֣ר לְעַמּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: The LORD heard and He raged; fire broke out against Jacob, anger flared up at Israel,
verses.text_he: לָכֵ֤ן׀ שָׁמַ֥ע יְהֹוָ֗ה וַֽיִּתְעַ֫בָּ֥ר וְ֭אֵשׁ נִשְּׂקָ֣ה בְיַעֲקֹ֑ב וְגַם־אַ֝֗ף עָלָ֥ה בְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: because they did not put their trust in God, did not rely on His deliverance.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י לֹ֣א הֶ֭אֱמִינוּ בֵּאלֹהִ֑ים וְלֹ֥א בָ֝טְח֗וּ בִּישׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: So He commanded the skies above, He opened the doors of heaven
verses.text_he: וַיְצַ֣ו שְׁחָקִ֣ים מִמָּ֑עַל וְדַלְתֵ֖י שָׁמַ֣יִם פָּתָֽח׃

verses.text_en: and rained manna upon them for food, giving them heavenly grain.
verses.text_he: וַיַּמְטֵ֬ר עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם מָ֣ן לֶאֱכֹ֑ל וּדְגַן־שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם נָ֣תַן לָֽמוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Each man ate a hero’s meal; He sent them provision in plenty.
verses.text_he: לֶ֣חֶם אַ֭בִּירִים אָ֣כַל אִ֑ישׁ צֵידָ֬ה שָׁלַ֖ח לָהֶ֣ם לָשֹֽׂבַע׃

verses.text_en: He set the east wind moving in heaven, and drove the south wind by His might.
verses.text_he: יַסַּ֣ע קָ֭דִים בַּשָּׁמָ֑יִם וַיְנַהֵ֖ג בְּעֻזּ֣וֹ תֵימָֽן׃

verses.text_en: He rained meat on them like dust, winged birds like the sands of the sea,
verses.text_he: וַיַּמְטֵ֬ר עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם כֶּעָפָ֣ר שְׁאֵ֑ר וּֽכְח֥וֹל יַ֝מִּ֗ים ע֣וֹף כָּנָֽף׃

verses.text_en: making them come down inside His camp, around His dwelling-place.
verses.text_he: וַ֭יַּפֵּל בְּקֶ֣רֶב מַחֲנֵ֑הוּ סָ֝בִ֗יב לְמִשְׁכְּנֹתָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: They ate till they were sated; He gave them what they craved.
verses.text_he: וַיֹּאכְל֣וּ וַיִּשְׂבְּע֣וּ מְאֹ֑ד וְ֝תַאֲוָתָ֗ם יָבִ֥א לָהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: They had not yet wearied of what they craved, the food was still in their mouths
verses.text_he: לֹא־זָ֥רוּ מִתַּאֲוָתָ֑ם ע֝֗וֹד אׇכְלָ֥ם בְּפִיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: when God’s anger flared up at them. He slew their sturdiest, struck down the youth of Israel.
verses.text_he: וְאַ֤ף אֱלֹהִ֨ים׀ עָ֘לָ֤ה בָהֶ֗ם וַֽ֭יַּהֲרֹג בְּמִשְׁמַנֵּיהֶ֑ם וּבַחוּרֵ֖י יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל הִכְרִֽיעַ׃

verses.text_en: Nonetheless, they went on sinning and had no faith in His wonders.
verses.text_he: בְּכׇל־זֹ֥את חָֽטְאוּ־ע֑וֹד וְלֹֽא־הֶ֝אֱמִ֗ינוּ בְּנִפְלְאוֹתָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: He made their days end in futility, their years in sudden death.
verses.text_he: וַיְכַל־בַּהֶ֥בֶל יְמֵיהֶ֑ם וּ֝שְׁנוֹתָ֗ם בַּבֶּהָלָֽה׃

verses.text_en: When He struck them, they turned to Him and sought God once again.
verses.text_he: אִם־הֲרָגָ֥ם וּדְרָשׁ֑וּהוּ וְ֝שָׁ֗בוּ וְשִֽׁחֲרוּ־אֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: They remembered that God was their rock, God Most High, their Redeemer.
verses.text_he: וַֽ֭יִּזְכְּרוּ כִּֽי־אֱלֹהִ֣ים צוּרָ֑ם וְאֵ֥ל עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן גֹּאֲלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Yet they deceived Him with their speech, lied to Him with their words;
verses.text_he: וַיְפַתּ֥וּהוּ בְּפִיהֶ֑ם וּ֝בִלְשׁוֹנָ֗ם יְכַזְּבוּ־לֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: their hearts were inconstant toward Him; they were untrue to His covenant.
verses.text_he: וְ֭לִבָּם לֹא־נָכ֣וֹן עִמּ֑וֹ וְלֹ֥א נֶ֝אֶמְנ֗וּ בִּבְרִיתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: But He, being merciful, forgave iniquity and would not destroy; He restrained His wrath time and again and did not give full vent to His fury;
verses.text_he: וְה֤וּא רַח֨וּם׀ יְכַפֵּ֥ר עָוֺן֮ וְֽלֹא־יַֽ֫שְׁחִ֥ית וְ֭הִרְבָּה לְהָשִׁ֣יב אַפּ֑וֹ וְלֹא־יָ֝עִ֗יר כׇּל־חֲמָתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: for He remembered that they were but flesh, a passing breath that does not return.
verses.text_he: וַ֭יִּזְכֹּר כִּֽי־בָשָׂ֣ר הֵ֑מָּה ר֥וּחַ ה֝וֹלֵ֗ךְ וְלֹ֣א יָשֽׁוּב׃

verses.text_en: How often did they defy Him in the wilderness, did they grieve Him in the wasteland!
verses.text_he: כַּ֭מָּה יַמְר֣וּהוּ בַמִּדְבָּ֑ר יַ֝עֲצִיב֗וּהוּ בִּישִׁימֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: Again and again they tested God, vexed the Holy One of Israel.
verses.text_he: וַיָּשׁ֣וּבוּ וַיְנַסּ֣וּ אֵ֑ל וּקְד֖וֹשׁ יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל הִתְוֽוּ׃

verses.text_en: They did not remember His strength, or the day He redeemed them from the foe;
verses.text_he: לֹא־זָכְר֥וּ אֶת־יָד֑וֹ י֝֗וֹם אֲֽשֶׁר־פָּדָ֥ם מִנִּי־צָֽר׃

verses.text_en: how He displayed His signs in Egypt, His wonders in the plain of Zoan.
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁר־שָׂ֣ם בְּ֭מִצְרַיִם אֹתוֹתָ֑יו וּ֝מוֹפְתָ֗יו בִּשְׂדֵה־צֹֽעַן׃

verses.text_en: He turned their rivers into blood; He made their waters undrinkable.
verses.text_he: וַיַּהֲפֹ֣ךְ לְ֭דָם יְאֹרֵיהֶ֑ם וְ֝נֹזְלֵיהֶ֗ם בַּל־יִשְׁתָּיֽוּן׃

verses.text_en: He inflicted upon them swarms of insects to devour them, frogs to destroy them.
verses.text_he: יְשַׁלַּ֬ח בָּהֶ֣ם עָ֭רֹב וַיֹּאכְלֵ֑ם וּ֝צְפַרְדֵּ֗עַ וַתַּשְׁחִיתֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: He gave their crops over to grubs, their produce to locusts.
verses.text_he: וַיִּתֵּ֣ן לֶחָסִ֣יל יְבוּלָ֑ם וִ֝יגִיעָ֗ם לָאַרְבֶּֽה׃

verses.text_en: He killed their vines with hail, their sycamores with frost.
verses.text_he: יַהֲרֹ֣ג בַּבָּרָ֣ד גַּפְנָ֑ם וְ֝שִׁקְמוֹתָ֗ם בַּחֲנָמַֽל׃

verses.text_en: He gave their beasts over to hail, their cattle to lightning bolts.
verses.text_he: וַיַּסְגֵּ֣ר לַבָּרָ֣ד בְּעִירָ֑ם וּ֝מִקְנֵיהֶ֗ם לָרְשָׁפִֽים׃

verses.text_en: He inflicted His burning anger upon them, wrath, indignation, trouble, a band of deadly messengers.
verses.text_he: יְשַׁלַּח־בָּ֨ם׀ חֲר֬וֹן אַפּ֗וֹ עֶבְרָ֣ה וָזַ֣עַם וְצָרָ֑ה מִ֝שְׁלַ֗חַת מַלְאֲכֵ֥י רָעִֽים׃

verses.text_en: He cleared a path for His anger; He did not stop short of slaying them, but gave them over to pestilence.
verses.text_he: יְפַלֵּ֥ס נָתִ֗יב לְאַ֫פּ֥וֹ לֹא־חָשַׂ֣ךְ מִמָּ֣וֶת נַפְשָׁ֑ם וְ֝חַיָּתָ֗ם לַדֶּ֥בֶר הִסְגִּֽיר׃

verses.text_en: He struck every first-born in Egypt, the first fruits of their vigor in the tents of Ham.
verses.text_he: וַיַּ֣ךְ כׇּל־בְּכ֣וֹר בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם רֵאשִׁ֥ית א֝וֹנִ֗ים בְּאׇהֳלֵי־חָֽם׃

verses.text_en: He set His people moving like sheep, drove them like a flock in the wilderness.
verses.text_he: וַיַּסַּ֣ע כַּצֹּ֣אן עַמּ֑וֹ וַֽיְנַהֲגֵ֥ם כַּ֝עֵ֗דֶר בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃

verses.text_en: He led them in safety; they were unafraid; as for their enemies, the sea covered them.
verses.text_he: וַיַּנְחֵ֣ם לָ֭בֶטַח וְלֹ֣א פָחָ֑דוּ וְאֶת־א֝וֹיְבֵיהֶ֗ם כִּסָּ֥ה הַיָּֽם׃

verses.text_en: He brought them to His holy realm, the mountain His right hand had acquired.
verses.text_he: וַ֭יְבִיאֵם אֶל־גְּב֣וּל קׇדְשׁ֑וֹ הַר־זֶ֝֗ה קָנְתָ֥ה יְמִינֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: He expelled nations before them, settled the tribes of Israel in their tents, allotting them their portion by the line.
verses.text_he: וַיְגָ֤רֶשׁ מִפְּנֵיהֶ֨ם׀ גּוֹיִ֗ם וַֽ֭יַּפִּילֵם בְּחֶ֣בֶל נַחֲלָ֑ה וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֥ן בְּ֝אׇהֳלֵיהֶ֗ם שִׁבְטֵ֥י יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: Yet they defiantly tested God Most High, and did not observe His decrees.
verses.text_he: וַיְנַסּ֣וּ וַ֭יַּמְרוּ אֶת־אֱלֹהִ֣ים עֶלְי֑וֹן וְ֝עֵדוֹתָ֗יו לֹ֣א שָׁמָֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: They fell away, disloyal like their fathers; they played false like a treacherous bow.
verses.text_he: וַיִּסֹּ֣גוּ וַֽ֭יִּבְגְּדוּ כַּאֲבוֹתָ֑ם נֶ֝הְפְּכ֗וּ כְּקֶ֣שֶׁת רְמִיָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: They vexed Him with their high places; they incensed Him with their idols.
verses.text_he: וַיַּכְעִיס֥וּהוּ בְּבָמוֹתָ֑ם וּ֝בִפְסִילֵיהֶ֗ם יַקְנִיאֽוּהוּ׃

verses.text_en: God heard it and was enraged; He utterly rejected Israel.
verses.text_he: שָׁמַ֣ע אֱ֭לֹהִים וַֽיִּתְעַבָּ֑ר וַיִּמְאַ֥ס מְ֝אֹ֗ד בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: He forsook the tabernacle of Shiloh, the tent He had set among men.
He let His might go into captivity, His glory into the hands of the foe.
verses.text_he: וַיִּתֵּ֣ן לַשְּׁבִ֣י עֻזּ֑וֹ וְֽתִפְאַרְתּ֥וֹ בְיַד־צָֽר׃

verses.text_en: He gave His people over to the sword; He was enraged at His very own.
verses.text_he: וַיַּסְגֵּ֣ר לַחֶ֣רֶב עַמּ֑וֹ וּ֝בְנַחֲלָת֗וֹ הִתְעַבָּֽר׃

verses.text_en: Fire consumed their young men, and their maidens remained unwed.
verses.text_he: בַּחוּרָ֥יו אָכְלָה־אֵ֑שׁ וּ֝בְתוּלֹתָ֗יו לֹ֣א הוּלָּֽלוּ׃

verses.text_en: Their priests fell by the sword, and their widows could not weep.
verses.text_he: כֹּ֭הֲנָיו בַּחֶ֣רֶב נָפָ֑לוּ וְ֝אַלְמְנֹתָ֗יו לֹ֣א תִבְכֶּֽינָה׃

verses.text_en: The Lord awoke as from sleep, like a warrior shaking off wine.
verses.text_he: וַיִּקַ֖ץ כְּיָשֵׁ֥ן׀אֲדֹנָ֑י כְּ֝גִבּ֗וֹר מִתְרוֹנֵ֥ן מִיָּֽיִן׃

verses.text_en: He beat back His foes, dealing them lasting disgrace.
verses.text_he: וַיַּךְ־צָרָ֥יו אָח֑וֹר חֶרְפַּ֥ת ע֝וֹלָ֗ם נָ֣תַן לָֽמוֹ׃

verses.text_en: He rejected the clan of Joseph; He did not choose the tribe of Ephraim.
verses.text_he: וַ֭יִּמְאַס בְּאֹ֣הֶל יוֹסֵ֑ף וּֽבְשֵׁ֥בֶט אֶ֝פְרַ֗יִם לֹ֣א בָחָֽר׃

verses.text_en: He did choose the tribe of Judah, Mount Zion, which He loved.
verses.text_he: וַ֭יִּבְחַר אֶת־שֵׁ֣בֶט יְהוּדָ֑ה אֶֽת־הַ֥ר צִ֝יּ֗וֹן אֲשֶׁ֣ר אָהֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: He built His Sanctuary like the heavens, like the earth that He established forever.
verses.text_he: וַיִּ֣בֶן כְּמֽוֹ־רָ֭מִים מִקְדָּשׁ֑וֹ כְּ֝אֶ֗רֶץ יְסָדָ֥הּ לְעוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: He chose David, His servant, and took him from the sheepfolds.
verses.text_he: וַ֭יִּבְחַר בְּדָוִ֣ד עַבְדּ֑וֹ וַ֝יִּקָּחֵ֗הוּ מִֽמִּכְלְאֹ֥ת צֹֽאן׃

verses.text_en: He brought him from minding the nursing ewes to tend His people Jacob, Israel, His very own.
verses.text_he: מֵאַחַ֥ר עָל֗וֹת הֱבִ֫יא֥וֹ לִ֭רְעוֹת בְּיַעֲקֹ֣ב עַמּ֑וֹ וּ֝בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: He tended them with blameless heart; with skillful hands he led them.
verses.text_he: וַ֭יִּרְעֵם כְּתֹ֣ם לְבָב֑וֹ וּבִתְבוּנ֖וֹת כַּפָּ֣יו יַנְחֵֽם׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A psalm of Asaph. O God, heathens have entered Your domain, defiled Your holy temple, and turned Jerusalem into ruins.
verses.text_he: מִזְמ֗וֹר לְאָ֫סָ֥ף אֱֽלֹהִ֡ים בָּ֤אוּ גוֹיִ֨ם׀ בְּֽנַחֲלָתֶ֗ךָ טִ֭מְּאוּ אֶת־הֵיכַ֣ל קׇדְשֶׁ֑ךָ שָׂ֖מוּ אֶת־יְרוּשָׁלַ֣͏ִם לְעִיִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: They have left Your servants’ corpses as food for the fowl of heaven, and the flesh of Your faithful for the wild beasts.
verses.text_he: נָתְנ֡וּ אֶת־נִבְלַ֬ת עֲבָדֶ֗יךָ מַ֭אֲכָל לְע֣וֹף הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם בְּשַׂ֥ר חֲ֝סִידֶ֗יךָ לְחַיְתוֹ־אָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: Their blood was shed like water around Jerusalem, with none to bury them.
verses.text_he: שָׁפְכ֬וּ דָמָ֨ם׀ כַּמַּ֗יִם סְֽבִ֘יב֤וֹת יְֽרוּשָׁלָ֗͏ִם וְאֵ֣ין קוֹבֵֽר׃

verses.text_en: We have become the butt of our neighbors, the scorn and derision of those around us.
verses.text_he: הָיִ֣ינוּ חֶ֭רְפָּה לִשְׁכֵנֵ֑ינוּ לַ֥עַג וָ֝קֶ֗לֶס לִסְבִיבוֹתֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: How long, O LORD, will You be angry forever, will Your indignation blaze like fire?
verses.text_he: עַד־מָ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה תֶּאֱנַ֣ף לָנֶ֑צַח תִּֽבְעַ֥ר כְּמוֹ־אֵ֝֗שׁ קִנְאָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Pour out Your fury on the nations that do not know You, upon the kingdoms that do not invoke Your name,
verses.text_he: שְׁפֹ֤ךְ חֲמָתְךָ֗ אֶֽל־הַגּוֹיִם֮ אֲשֶׁ֢ר לֹא־יְדָ֫ע֥וּךָ וְעַ֥ל מַמְלָכ֑וֹת אֲשֶׁ֥ר בְּ֝שִׁמְךָ֗ לֹ֣א קָרָֽאוּ׃

verses.text_en: for they have devoured Jacob and desolated his home.
verses.text_he: כִּ֭י אָכַ֣ל אֶֽת־יַעֲקֹ֑ב וְֽאֶת־נָוֵ֥הוּ הֵשַֽׁמּוּ׃

verses.text_en: Do not hold our former iniquities against us; let Your compassion come swiftly toward us, for we have sunk very low.
verses.text_he: אַֽל־תִּזְכׇּר־לָנוּ֮ עֲוֺנֹ֢ת רִאשֹׁ֫נִ֥ים מַ֭הֵר יְקַדְּמ֣וּנוּ רַחֲמֶ֑יךָ כִּ֖י דַלּ֣וֹנוּ מְאֹֽד׃

verses.text_en: Help us, O God, our deliverer, for the sake of the glory of Your name. Save us and forgive our sin, for the sake of Your name.
verses.text_he: עׇזְרֵ֤נוּ׀ אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י יִשְׁעֵ֗נוּ עַֽל־דְּבַ֥ר כְּבֽוֹד־שְׁמֶ֑ךָ וְהַצִּילֵ֥נוּ וְכַפֵּ֥ר עַל־חַ֝טֹּאתֵ֗ינוּ לְמַ֣עַן שְׁמֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Let the nations not say, “Where is their God?” Before our eyes let it be known among the nations that You avenge the spilled blood of Your servants.
verses.text_he: לָ֤מָּה׀ יֹאמְר֣וּ הַגּוֹיִם֮ אַיֵּ֢ה אֱֽלֹהֵ֫יהֶ֥ם יִוָּדַ֣ע (בגיים) [בַּגּוֹיִ֣ם] לְעֵינֵ֑ינוּ נִ֝קְמַ֗ת דַּֽם־עֲבָדֶ֥יךָ הַשָּׁפֽוּךְ׃

verses.text_en: Let the groans of the prisoners reach You; reprieve those condemned to death, as befits Your great strength.
verses.text_he: תָּ֤ב֣וֹא לְפָנֶיךָ֮ אֶנְקַ֢ת אָ֫סִ֥יר כְּגֹ֥דֶל זְרוֹעֲךָ֑ ה֝וֹתֵ֗ר בְּנֵ֣י תְמוּתָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Pay back our neighbors sevenfold for the abuse they have flung at You, O Lord.
verses.text_he: וְהָ֘שֵׁ֤ב לִשְׁכֵנֵ֣ינוּ שִׁ֭בְעָתַיִם אֶל־חֵיקָ֑ם חֶרְפָּ֘תָ֤ם אֲשֶׁ֖ר חֵרְפ֣וּךָ אֲדֹנָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Then we, Your people, the flock You shepherd, shall glorify You forever; for all time we shall tell Your praises.
verses.text_he: וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ עַמְּךָ֨׀ וְצֹ֥אן מַרְעִיתֶךָ֮ נ֤וֹדֶ֥ה לְּךָ֗ לְע֫וֹלָ֥ם לְד֥וֹר וָדֹ֑ר נְ֝סַפֵּ֗ר תְּהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; on , . Of Asaph. A psalm.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ אֶל־שֹׁשַׁנִּ֑ים עֵד֖וּת לְאָסָ֣ף מִזְמֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: Give ear, O shepherd of Israel who leads Joseph like a flock! Appear, You who are enthroned on the cherubim,
verses.text_he: רֹ֘עֵ֤ה יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל׀ הַאֲזִ֗ינָה נֹהֵ֣ג כַּצֹּ֣אן יוֹסֵ֑ף יֹשֵׁ֖ב הַכְּרוּבִ֣ים הוֹפִֽיעָה׃

verses.text_en: at the head of Ephraim, Benjamin, and Manasseh! Rouse Your might and come to our help!
verses.text_he: לִפְנֵ֤י אֶפְרַ֨יִם׀ וּבִנְיָ֘מִ֤ן וּמְנַשֶּׁ֗ה עוֹרְרָ֥ה אֶת־גְּבוּרָתֶ֑ךָ וּלְכָ֖ה לִישֻׁעָ֣תָה לָּֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: Restore us, O God; show Your favor that we may be delivered.
verses.text_he: אֱלֹהִ֥ים הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נוּ וְהָאֵ֥ר פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעָה׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, God of hosts, how long will You be wrathful toward the prayers of Your people?
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהִ֣ים צְבָא֑וֹת עַד־מָתַ֥י עָ֝שַׁ֗נְתָּ בִּתְפִלַּ֥ת עַמֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: You have fed them tears as their daily bread, made them drink great measures of tears.
verses.text_he: הֶ֭אֱכַלְתָּם לֶ֣חֶם דִּמְעָ֑ה וַ֝תַּשְׁקֵ֗מוֹ בִּדְמָע֥וֹת שָׁלִֽישׁ׃

verses.text_en: You set us at strife with our neighbors; our enemies mock us at will.
verses.text_he: תְּשִׂימֵ֣נוּ מָ֭דוֹן לִשְׁכֵנֵ֑ינוּ וְ֝אֹיְבֵ֗ינוּ יִלְעֲגוּ־לָֽמוֹ׃

verses.text_en: O God of hosts, restore us; show Your favor that we may be delivered.
verses.text_he: אֱלֹהִ֣ים צְבָא֣וֹת הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נוּ וְהָאֵ֥ר פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעָה׃

verses.text_en: You plucked up a vine from Egypt; You expelled nations and planted it.
verses.text_he: גֶּ֭פֶן מִמִּצְרַ֣יִם תַּסִּ֑יעַ תְּגָרֵ֥שׁ גּ֝וֹיִ֗ם וַתִּטָּעֶֽהָ׃

verses.text_en: You cleared a place for it; it took deep root and filled the land.
verses.text_he: פִּנִּ֥יתָ לְפָנֶ֑יהָ וַתַּשְׁרֵ֥שׁ שׇׁ֝רָשֶׁ֗יהָ וַתְּמַלֵּא־אָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: The mountains were covered by its shade, mighty cedars by its boughs.
verses.text_he: כׇּסּ֣וּ הָרִ֣ים צִלָּ֑הּ וַ֝עֲנָפֶ֗יהָ אַֽרְזֵי־אֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: Its branches reached the sea, its shoots, the river.
verses.text_he: תְּשַׁלַּ֣ח קְצִירֶ֣הָ עַד־יָ֑ם וְאֶל־נָ֝הָ֗ר יוֹנְקוֹתֶֽיהָ׃

verses.text_en: Why did You breach its wall so that every passerby plucks its fruit,
verses.text_he: לָ֭מָּה פָּרַ֣צְתָּ גְדֵרֶ֑יהָ וְ֝אָר֗וּהָ כׇּל־עֹ֥בְרֵי דָֽרֶךְ׃

verses.text_en: wild boars gnaw at it, and creatures of the field feed on it?
verses.text_he: יְכַרְסְמֶ֣נָּֽה חֲזִ֣יר מִיָּ֑ר וְזִ֖יז שָׂדַ֣י יִרְעֶֽנָּה׃

verses.text_en: O God of hosts, turn again, look down from heaven and see; take note of that vine,
verses.text_he: אֱלֹהִ֣ים צְבָאוֹת֮ שֽׁ֫וּב־נָ֥א הַבֵּ֣ט מִשָּׁמַ֣יִם וּרְאֵ֑ה וּ֝פְקֹ֗ד גֶּ֣פֶן זֹֽאת׃

verses.text_en: the stock planted by Your right hand, the stem you have taken as Your own.
verses.text_he: וְ֭כַנָּה אֲשֶׁר־נָטְעָ֣ה יְמִינֶ֑ךָ וְעַל־בֵּ֝֗ן אִמַּ֥צְתָּה לָּֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: For it is burned by fire and cut down, perishing before Your angry blast.
verses.text_he: שְׂרֻפָ֣ה בָאֵ֣שׁ כְּסוּחָ֑ה מִגַּעֲרַ֖ת פָּנֶ֣יךָ יֹאבֵֽדוּ׃

verses.text_en: Grant Your help to the man at Your right hand, the one You have taken as Your own.
verses.text_he: תְּֽהִי־יָ֭דְךָ עַל־אִ֣ישׁ יְמִינֶ֑ךָ עַל־בֶּן־אָ֝דָ֗ם אִמַּ֥צְתָּ לָּֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: We will not turn away from You; preserve our life that we may invoke Your name.
verses.text_he: וְלֹא־נָס֥וֹג מִמֶּ֑ךָּ תְּ֝חַיֵּ֗נוּ וּבְשִׁמְךָ֥ נִקְרָֽא׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, God of hosts, restore us; show Your favor that we may be delivered.
verses.text_he: יְ֘הֹוָ֤ה אֱלֹהִ֣ים צְבָא֣וֹת הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נוּ הָאֵ֥ר פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעָה׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; on the . Of Asaph.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ׀עַֽל־הַגִּתִּ֬ית לְאָסָֽף׃

verses.text_en: Sing joyously to God, our strength; raise a shout for the God of Jacob.
verses.text_he: הַ֭רְנִינוּ לֵאלֹהִ֣ים עוּזֵּ֑נוּ הָ֝רִ֗יעוּ לֵאלֹהֵ֥י יַעֲקֹֽב׃

verses.text_en: Take up the song, sound the timbrel, the melodious lyre and harp.
verses.text_he: שְֽׂאוּ־זִ֭מְרָה וּתְנוּ־תֹ֑ף כִּנּ֖וֹר נָעִ֣ים עִם־נָֽבֶל׃

verses.text_en: Blow the horn on the new moon, on the full moon for our feast day.
verses.text_he: תִּקְע֣וּ בַחֹ֣דֶשׁ שׁוֹפָ֑ר בַּ֝כֵּ֗סֶה לְי֣וֹם חַגֵּֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: For it is a law for Israel, a ruling of the God of Jacob;
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י חֹ֣ק לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל ה֑וּא מִ֝שְׁפָּ֗ט לֵאלֹהֵ֥י יַעֲקֹֽב׃

verses.text_en: He imposed it as a decree upon Joseph when he went forth from the land of Egypt; I heard a language that I knew not.
verses.text_he: עֵד֤וּת׀ בִּיה֘וֹסֵ֤ף שָׂמ֗וֹ בְּ֭צֵאתוֹ עַל־אֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרָ֑יִם שְׂפַ֖ת לֹא־יָדַ֣עְתִּי אֶשְׁמָֽע׃

verses.text_en: I relieved his shoulder of the burden, his hands were freed from the basket.
verses.text_he: הֲסִיר֣וֹתִי מִסֵּ֣בֶל שִׁכְמ֑וֹ כַּ֝פָּ֗יו מִדּ֥וּד תַּעֲבֹֽרְנָה׃

verses.text_en: In distress you called and I rescued you; I answered you from the secret place of thunder I tested you at the waters of Meribah. .
verses.text_he: בַּצָּרָ֥ה קָרָ֗אתָ וָאֲחַ֫לְּצֶ֥ךָּ אֶ֭עֶנְךָ בְּסֵ֣תֶר רַ֑עַם אֶבְחׇנְךָ֨ עַל־מֵ֖י מְרִיבָ֣ה סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Hear, My people, and I will admonish you; Israel, if you would but listen to Me!
verses.text_he: שְׁמַ֣ע עַ֭מִּי וְאָעִ֣ידָה בָּ֑ךְ יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל אִם־תִּֽשְׁמַֽע־לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: You shall have no foreign god, you shall not bow to an alien god.
verses.text_he: לֹא־יִהְיֶ֣ה בְ֭ךָ אֵ֣ל זָ֑ר וְלֹ֥א תִ֝שְׁתַּחֲוֶ֗ה לְאֵ֣ל נֵכָֽר׃

verses.text_en: I the LORD am your God who brought you out of the land of Egypt; open your mouth wide and I will fill it.
verses.text_he: אָֽנֹכִ֨י׀ יְ֘הֹוָ֤ה אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ הַֽ֭מַּעַלְךָ מֵאֶ֣רֶץ מִצְרָ֑יִם הַרְחֶב־פִּ֝֗יךָ וַאֲמַלְאֵֽהוּ׃

verses.text_en: But My people would not listen to Me, Israel would not obey Me.
verses.text_he: וְלֹא־שָׁמַ֣ע עַמִּ֣י לְקוֹלִ֑י וְ֝יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל לֹא־אָ֥בָה לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: So I let them go after their willful heart that they might follow their own devices.
verses.text_he: וָ֭אֲשַׁלְּחֵהוּ בִּשְׁרִיר֣וּת לִבָּ֑ם יֵ֝לְכ֗וּ בְּֽמוֹעֲצ֖וֹתֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: If only My people would listen to Me, if Israel would follow My paths,
verses.text_he: ל֗וּ עַ֭מִּי שֹׁמֵ֣עַֽ לִ֑י יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל בִּדְרָכַ֥י יְהַלֵּֽכוּ׃

verses.text_en: then would I subdue their enemies at once, strike their foes again and again.
verses.text_he: כִּ֭מְעַט אוֹיְבֵיהֶ֣ם אַכְנִ֑יעַ וְעַ֥ל צָ֝רֵיהֶ֗ם אָשִׁ֥יב יָדִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Those who hate the LORD shall cower before Him; their doom shall be eternal.
verses.text_he: מְשַׂנְאֵ֣י יְ֭הֹוָה יְכַחֲשׁוּ־ל֑וֹ וִיהִ֖י עִתָּ֣ם לְעוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: He fed them the finest wheat; I sated you with honey from the rock.
verses.text_he: וַֽ֭יַּאֲכִילֵהוּ מֵחֵ֣לֶב חִטָּ֑ה וּ֝מִצּ֗וּר דְּבַ֣שׁ אַשְׂבִּיעֶֽךָ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A psalm of Asaph. God stands in the divine assembly; among the divine beings He pronounces judgment.
verses.text_he: מִזְמ֗וֹר לְאָ֫סָ֥ף אֱֽלֹהִ֗ים נִצָּ֥ב בַּעֲדַת־אֵ֑ל בְּקֶ֖רֶב אֱלֹהִ֣ים יִשְׁפֹּֽט׃

verses.text_en: How long will you judge perversely, showing favor to the wicked? .
verses.text_he: עַד־מָתַ֥י תִּשְׁפְּטוּ־עָ֑וֶל וּפְנֵ֥י רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים תִּשְׂאוּ־סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Judge the wretched and the orphan, vindicate the lowly and the poor,
verses.text_he: שִׁפְטוּ־דַ֥ל וְיָת֑וֹם עָנִ֖י וָרָ֣שׁ הַצְדִּֽיקוּ׃

verses.text_en: rescue the wretched and the needy; save them from the hand of the wicked.
verses.text_he: פַּלְּטוּ־דַ֥ל וְאֶבְי֑וֹן מִיַּ֖ד רְשָׁעִ֣ים הַצִּֽילוּ׃

verses.text_en: They neither know nor understand, they go about in darkness; all the foundations of the earth totter.
verses.text_he: לֹ֤א יָדְע֨וּ׀ וְלֹ֥א יָבִ֗ינוּ בַּחֲשֵׁכָ֥ה יִתְהַלָּ֑כוּ יִ֝מּ֗וֹטוּ כׇּל־מ֥וֹסְדֵי אָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: I had taken you for divine beings, sons of the Most High, all of you;
verses.text_he: אֲֽנִי־אָ֭מַרְתִּי אֱלֹהִ֣ים אַתֶּ֑ם וּבְנֵ֖י עֶלְי֣וֹן כֻּלְּכֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: but you shall die as men do, fall like any prince.
verses.text_he: אָ֭כֵן כְּאָדָ֣ם תְּמוּת֑וּן וּכְאַחַ֖ד הַשָּׂרִ֣ים תִּפֹּֽלוּ׃

verses.text_en: Arise, O God, judge the earth, for all the nations are Your possession.
verses.text_he: קוּמָ֣ה אֱ֭לֹהִים שׇׁפְטָ֣ה הָאָ֑רֶץ כִּֽי־אַתָּ֥ה תִ֝נְחַ֗ל בְּכׇל־הַגּוֹיִֽם׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song, a psalm of Asaph.
verses.text_he: שִׁ֖יר מִזְמ֣וֹר לְאָסָֽף׃

verses.text_en: O God, do not be silent; do not hold aloof; do not be quiet, O God!
verses.text_he: אֱלֹהִ֥ים אַל־דֳּמִי־לָ֑ךְ אַל־תֶּחֱרַ֖שׁ וְאַל־תִּשְׁקֹ֣ט אֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: For Your enemies rage, Your foes assert themselves.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־הִנֵּ֣ה א֭וֹיְבֶיךָ יֶהֱמָי֑וּן וּ֝מְשַׂנְאֶ֗יךָ נָ֣שְׂאוּ רֹֽאשׁ׃

verses.text_en: They plot craftily against Your people, take counsel against Your treasured ones.
verses.text_he: עַֽל־עַ֭מְּךָ יַעֲרִ֣ימוּ ס֑וֹד וְ֝יִתְיָעֲצ֗וּ עַל־צְפוּנֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: They say, “Let us wipe them out as a nation; Israel’s name will be mentioned no more.”
verses.text_he: אָמְר֗וּ לְ֭כוּ וְנַכְחִידֵ֣ם מִגּ֑וֹי וְלֹֽא־יִזָּכֵ֖ר שֵֽׁם־יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל עֽוֹד׃

verses.text_en: Unanimous in their counsel they have made an alliance against You—
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י נוֹעֲצ֣וּ לֵ֣ב יַחְדָּ֑ו עָ֝לֶ֗יךָ בְּרִ֣ית יִכְרֹֽתוּ׃

verses.text_en: the clans of Edom and the Ishmaelites, Moab and the Hagrites,
verses.text_he: אׇהֳלֵ֣י אֱ֭דוֹם וְיִשְׁמְעֵאלִ֗ים מוֹאָ֥ב וְהַגְרִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Gebal, Ammon, and Amalek, Philistia with the inhabitants of Tyre;
verses.text_he: גְּבָ֣ל וְ֭עַמּוֹן וַעֲמָלֵ֑ק פְּ֝לֶ֗שֶׁת עִם־יֹ֥שְׁבֵי צֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: Assyria too joins forces with them; they give support to the sons of Lot. .
verses.text_he: גַּם־אַ֭שּׁוּר נִלְוָ֣ה עִמָּ֑ם הָ֤יֽוּ־זְר֖וֹעַ לִבְנֵי־ל֣וֹט סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Deal with them as You did with Midian, with Sisera, with Jabin, at the brook Kishon—
verses.text_he: עֲשֵֽׂה־לָהֶ֥ם כְּמִדְיָ֑ן כְּֽסִיסְרָ֥א כְ֝יָבִ֗ין בְּנַ֣חַל קִישֽׁוֹן׃

verses.text_en: who were destroyed at En-dor, who became dung for the field.
verses.text_he: נִשְׁמְד֥וּ בְֽעֵין־דֹּ֑אר הָ֥יוּ דֹ֝֗מֶן לָאֲדָמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Treat their great men like Oreb and Zeeb, all their princes like Zebah and Zalmunna,
verses.text_he: שִׁיתֵ֣מוֹ נְ֭דִיבֵימוֹ כְּעֹרֵ֣ב וְכִזְאֵ֑ב וּֽכְזֶ֥בַח וּ֝כְצַלְמֻנָּ֗ע כׇּל־נְסִיכֵֽימוֹ׃

verses.text_en: who said, “Let us take the meadows of God as our possession.”
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֣ר אָ֭מְרוּ נִ֣ירְשָׁה לָּ֑נוּ אֵ֝֗ת נְא֣וֹת אֱלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: O my God, make them like thistledown, like stubble driven by the wind.
verses.text_he: אֱֽלֹהַ֗י שִׁיתֵ֥מוֹ כַגַּלְגַּ֑ל כְּ֝קַ֗שׁ לִפְנֵי־רֽוּחַ׃

verses.text_en: As a fire burns a forest, as flames scorch the hills,
verses.text_he: כְּאֵ֥שׁ תִּבְעַר־יָ֑עַר וּ֝כְלֶהָבָ֗ה תְּלַהֵ֥ט הָרִֽים׃

verses.text_en: pursue them with Your tempest, terrify them with Your storm.
verses.text_he: כֵּ֭ן תִּרְדְּפֵ֣ם בְּסַעֲרֶ֑ךָ וּבְסוּפָתְךָ֥ תְבַהֲלֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: Cover their faces with shame so that they seek Your name, O LORD.
verses.text_he: מַלֵּ֣א פְנֵיהֶ֣ם קָל֑וֹן וִיבַקְשׁ֖וּ שִׁמְךָ֣ יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: May they be frustrated and terrified, disgraced and doomed forever.
verses.text_he: יֵבֹ֖שׁוּ וְיִבָּהֲל֥וּ עֲדֵי־עַ֗ד וְֽיַחְפְּר֥וּ וְיֹאבֵֽדוּ׃

verses.text_en: May they know that Your name, Yours alone, is the LORD, supreme over all the earth.
verses.text_he: וְֽיֵדְע֗וּ כִּי־אַתָּ֬ה שִׁמְךָ֣ יְהֹוָ֣ה לְבַדֶּ֑ךָ עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן עַל־כׇּל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader; on the . Of the Korahites. A psalm.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ עַֽל־הַגִּתִּ֑ית לִבְנֵי־קֹ֥רַח מִזְמֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: How lovely is Your dwelling-place, O LORD of hosts.
verses.text_he: מַה־יְּדִיד֥וֹת מִשְׁכְּנוֹתֶ֗יךָ יְהֹוָ֥ה צְבָאֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: I long, I yearn for the courts of the LORD; my body and soul shout for joy to the living God.
verses.text_he: נִכְסְפָ֬ה וְגַם־כָּלְתָ֨ה׀ נַפְשִׁי֮ לְחַצְר֢וֹת יְ֫הֹוָ֥ה לִבִּ֥י וּבְשָׂרִ֑י יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ אֶ֣ל אֵֽל־חָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Even the sparrow has found a home, and the swallow a nest for herself in which to set her young, near Your altar, O LORD of hosts, my king and my God.
verses.text_he: גַּם־צִפּ֨וֹר מָ֪צְאָה בַ֡יִת וּדְר֤וֹר׀ קֵ֥ן לָהּ֮ אֲשֶׁר־שָׁ֢תָה אֶפְרֹ֫חֶ֥יהָ אֶֽת־מִ֭זְבְּחוֹתֶיךָ יְהֹוָ֣ה צְבָא֑וֹת מַ֝לְכִּ֗י וֵאלֹהָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Happy are those who dwell in Your house; they forever praise You. .
verses.text_he: אַ֭שְׁרֵי יוֹשְׁבֵ֣י בֵיתֶ֑ךָ ע֝֗וֹד יְֽהַלְל֥וּךָ סֶּֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Happy is the man who finds refuge in You, whose mind is on the [pilgrim] highways.
verses.text_he: אַשְׁרֵ֣י אָ֭דָם עֽוֹז־ל֥וֹ בָ֑ךְ מְ֝סִלּ֗וֹת בִּלְבָבָֽם׃

verses.text_en: They pass through the Valley of Baca, regarding it as a place of springs, as if the early rain had covered it with blessing.
verses.text_he: עֹבְרֵ֤י׀ בְּעֵ֣מֶק הַ֭בָּכָא מַעְיָ֣ן יְשִׁית֑וּהוּ גַּם־בְּ֝רָכ֗וֹת יַעְטֶ֥ה מוֹרֶֽה׃

verses.text_en: They go from rampart to rampart, appearing before God in Zion.
verses.text_he: יֵ֭לְכוּ מֵחַ֣יִל אֶל־חָ֑יִל יֵרָאֶ֖ה אֶל־אֱלֹהִ֣ים בְּצִיּֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, God of hosts, hear my prayer; give ear, O God of Jacob. .
verses.text_he: יְ֘הֹוָ֤ה אֱלֹהִ֣ים צְ֭בָאוֹת שִׁמְעָ֣ה תְפִלָּתִ֑י הַאֲזִ֨ינָה אֱלֹהֵ֖י יַעֲקֹ֣ב סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: O God, behold our shield, look upon the face of Your anointed.
verses.text_he: מָ֭גִנֵּנוּ רְאֵ֣ה אֱלֹהִ֑ים וְ֝הַבֵּ֗ט פְּנֵ֣י מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Better one day in Your courts than a thousand [anywhere else]; I would rather stand at the threshold of God’s house than dwell in the tents of the wicked.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י טֽוֹב־י֥וֹם בַּחֲצֵרֶ֗יךָ מֵ֫אָ֥לֶף בָּחַ֗רְתִּי הִ֭סְתּוֹפֵף בְּבֵ֣ית אֱלֹהַ֑י מִ֝דּ֗וּר בְּאׇהֳלֵי־רֶֽשַׁע׃

verses.text_en: For the LORD God is sun and shield; the LORD bestows grace and glory; He does not withhold His bounty from those who live without blame.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י שֶׁ֨מֶשׁ׀ וּמָגֵן֮ יְהֹוָ֢ה אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים חֵ֣ן וְ֭כָבוֹד יִתֵּ֣ן יְהֹוָ֑ה לֹ֥א יִמְנַע־ט֝֗וֹב לַֽהֹלְכִ֥ים בְּתָמִֽים׃

verses.text_en: O LORD of hosts, happy is the man who trusts in You.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֥ה צְבָא֑וֹת אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י אָ֝דָ֗ם בֹּטֵ֥חַ בָּֽךְ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. Of the Korahites. A psalm.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ׀לִבְנֵי־קֹ֬רַח מִזְמֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, You will favor Your land, restore Jacob’s fortune;
verses.text_he: רָצִ֣יתָ יְהֹוָ֣ה אַרְצֶ֑ךָ שַׁ֝֗בְתָּ (שבות) [שְׁבִ֣ית] יַעֲקֹֽב׃

verses.text_en: You will forgive Your people’s iniquity, pardon all their sins;
verses.text_he: נָ֭שָׂאתָ עֲוֺ֣ן עַמֶּ֑ךָ כִּסִּ֖יתָ כׇל־חַטָּאתָ֣ם סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: You will withdraw all Your anger, turn away from Your rage.
verses.text_he: אָסַ֥פְתָּ כׇל־עֶבְרָתֶ֑ךָ הֱ֝שִׁיב֗וֹתָ מֵחֲר֥וֹן אַפֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Turn again, O God, our helper, revoke Your displeasure with us.
verses.text_he: שׁ֭וּבֵנוּ אֱלֹהֵ֣י יִשְׁעֵ֑נוּ וְהָפֵ֖ר כַּעַסְךָ֣ עִמָּֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: Will You be angry with us forever, prolong Your wrath for all generations?
verses.text_he: הַלְעוֹלָ֥ם תֶּאֱנַף־בָּ֑נוּ תִּמְשֹׁ֥ךְ אַ֝פְּךָ֗ לְדֹ֣ר וָדֹֽר׃

verses.text_en: Surely You will revive us again, so that Your people may rejoice in You.
verses.text_he: הֲֽלֹא־אַ֭תָּה תָּשׁ֣וּב תְּחַיֵּ֑נוּ וְ֝עַמְּךָ֗ יִשְׂמְחוּ־בָֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: Show us, O LORD, Your faithfulness; grant us Your deliverance.
verses.text_he: הַרְאֵ֣נוּ יְהֹוָ֣ה חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ וְ֝יֶשְׁעֲךָ֗ תִּתֶּן־לָֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: Let me hear what God, the LORD, will speak; He will promise well-being to His people, His faithful ones; may they not turn to folly.
verses.text_he: אֶשְׁמְעָ֗ה מַה־יְדַבֵּר֮ הָאֵ֢ל׀יְ֫הֹוָ֥ה כִּ֤י׀ יְדַבֵּ֬ר שָׁל֗וֹם אֶל־עַמּ֥וֹ וְאֶל־חֲסִידָ֑יו וְאַל־יָשׁ֥וּבוּ לְכִסְלָֽה׃

verses.text_en: His help is very near those who fear Him, to make His glory dwell in our land.
verses.text_he: אַ֤ךְ קָר֣וֹב לִירֵאָ֣יו יִשְׁע֑וֹ לִשְׁכֹּ֖ן כָּב֣וֹד בְּאַרְצֵֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: Faithfulness and truth meet; justice and well-being kiss.
verses.text_he: חֶסֶד־וֶאֱמֶ֥ת נִפְגָּ֑שׁוּ צֶ֖דֶק וְשָׁל֣וֹם נָשָֽׁקוּ׃

verses.text_en: Truth springs up from the earth; justice looks down from heaven.
verses.text_he: אֱ֭מֶת מֵאֶ֣רֶץ תִּצְמָ֑ח וְ֝צֶ֗דֶק מִשָּׁמַ֥יִם נִשְׁקָֽף׃

verses.text_en: The LORD also bestows His bounty; our land yields its produce.
verses.text_he: גַּם־יְ֭הֹוָה יִתֵּ֣ן הַטּ֑וֹב וְ֝אַרְצֵ֗נוּ תִּתֵּ֥ן יְבוּלָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: Justice goes before Him as He sets out on His way.
verses.text_he: צֶ֭דֶק לְפָנָ֣יו יְהַלֵּ֑ךְ וְיָשֵׂ֖ם לְדֶ֣רֶךְ פְּעָמָֽיו׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A prayer of David. Incline Your ear, O LORD, answer me, for I am poor and needy.
verses.text_he: תְּפִלָּ֗ה לְדָ֫וִ֥ד הַטֵּֽה־יְהֹוָ֣ה אׇזְנְךָ֣ עֲנֵ֑נִי כִּֽי־עָנִ֖י וְאֶבְי֣וֹן אָֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Preserve my life, for I am steadfast; O You, my God, deliver Your servant who trusts in You.
verses.text_he: שׇׁ֥מְרָ֣ה נַפְשִׁי֮ כִּֽי־חָסִ֢יד אָ֥֫נִי הוֹשַׁ֣ע עַ֭בְדְּךָ אַתָּ֣ה אֱלֹהַ֑י הַבּוֹטֵ֥חַ אֵלֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Have mercy on me, O Lord, for I call to You all day long;
verses.text_he: חׇנֵּ֥נִי אֲדֹנָ֑י כִּ֥י אֵלֶ֥יךָ אֶ֝קְרָ֗א כׇּל־הַיּֽוֹם׃

verses.text_en: bring joy to Your servant’s life, for on You, Lord, I set my hope.
verses.text_he: שַׂ֭מֵּחַ נֶ֣פֶשׁ עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ כִּ֥י אֵלֶ֥יךָ אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י נַפְשִׁ֥י אֶשָּֽׂא׃

verses.text_en: For You, Lord, are good and forgiving, abounding in steadfast love to all who call on You.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־אַתָּ֣ה אֲ֭דֹנָי ט֣וֹב וְסַלָּ֑ח וְרַב־חֶ֝֗סֶד לְכׇל־קֹֽרְאֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Give ear, O LORD, to my prayer; heed my plea for mercy.
verses.text_he: הַאֲזִ֣ינָה יְ֭הֹוָה תְּפִלָּתִ֑י וְ֝הַקְשִׁ֗יבָה בְּק֣וֹל תַּחֲנוּנוֹתָֽי׃

verses.text_en: In my time of trouble I call You, for You will answer me.
verses.text_he: בְּי֣וֹם צָ֭רָתִֽי אֶקְרָאֶ֗ךָּ כִּ֣י תַעֲנֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: There is none like You among the gods, O Lord, and there are no deeds like Yours.
verses.text_he: אֵין־כָּמ֖וֹךָ בָאֱלֹהִ֥ים׀אֲדֹנָ֗י וְאֵ֣ין כְּֽמַעֲשֶֽׂיךָ׃

verses.text_en: All the nations You have made will come to bow down before You, O Lord, and they will pay honor to Your name.
verses.text_he: כׇּל־גּוֹיִ֤ם׀ אֲשֶׁ֥ר עָשִׂ֗יתָ יָב֤וֹאוּ׀ וְיִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ לְפָנֶ֣יךָ אֲדֹנָ֑י וִ֖יכַבְּד֣וּ לִשְׁמֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: For You are great and perform wonders; You alone are God.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־גָד֣וֹל אַ֭תָּה וְעֹשֵׂ֣ה נִפְלָא֑וֹת אַתָּ֖ה אֱלֹהִ֣ים לְבַדֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Teach me Your way, O LORD; I will walk in Your truth; let my heart be undivided in reverence for Your name.
verses.text_he: ה֘וֹרֵ֤נִי יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ דַּרְכֶּ֗ךָ אֲהַלֵּ֥ךְ בַּאֲמִתֶּ֑ךָ יַחֵ֥ד לְ֝בָבִ֗י לְיִרְאָ֥ה שְׁמֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: I will praise You, O Lord, my God, with all my heart and pay honor to Your name forever.
verses.text_he: אוֹדְךָ֤׀ אֲדֹנָ֣י אֱ֭לֹהַי בְּכׇל־לְבָבִ֑י וַאֲכַבְּדָ֖ה שִׁמְךָ֣ לְעוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: For Your steadfast love toward me is great; You have saved me from the depths of Sheol.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־חַ֭סְדְּךָ גָּד֣וֹל עָלָ֑י וְהִצַּ֥לְתָּ נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י מִשְּׁא֥וֹל תַּחְתִּיָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: O God, arrogant men have risen against me; a band of ruthless men seek my life; they are not mindful of You.
verses.text_he: אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ זֵ֘דִ֤ים קָמוּ־עָלַ֗י וַעֲדַ֣ת עָ֭רִיצִים בִּקְשׁ֣וּ נַפְשִׁ֑י וְלֹ֖א שָׂמ֣וּךָ לְנֶגְדָּֽם׃

verses.text_en: But You, O Lord, are a God compassionate and merciful, slow to anger, abounding in steadfast love and faithfulness.
verses.text_he: וְאַתָּ֣ה אֲ֭דֹנָי אֵל־רַח֣וּם וְחַנּ֑וּן אֶ֥רֶךְ אַ֝פַּ֗יִם וְרַב־חֶ֥סֶד וֶאֱמֶֽת׃

verses.text_en: Turn to me and have mercy on me; grant Your strength to Your servant and deliver the son of Your maidservant.
verses.text_he: פְּנֵ֥ה אֵלַ֗י וְחׇ֫נֵּ֥נִי תְּנָֽה־עֻזְּךָ֥ לְעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ וְ֝הוֹשִׁ֗יעָה לְבֶן־אֲמָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Show me a sign of Your favor, that my enemies may see and be frustrated because You, O LORD, have given me aid and comfort.
verses.text_he: עֲשֵֽׂה־עִמִּ֥י א֗וֹת לְט֫וֹבָ֥ה וְיִרְא֣וּ שֹׂנְאַ֣י וְיֵבֹ֑שׁוּ כִּֽי־אַתָּ֥ה יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה עֲזַרְתַּ֥נִי וְנִחַמְתָּֽנִי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Of the Korahites. A psalm. A song.
verses.text_he: לִבְנֵי־קֹ֭רַח מִזְמ֣וֹר שִׁ֑יר יְ֝סוּדָת֗וֹ בְּהַרְרֵי־קֹֽדֶשׁ׃

verses.text_en: The LORD loves the gates of Zion, His foundation on the holy mountains, more than all the dwellings of Jacob.
verses.text_he: אֹהֵ֣ב יְ֭הֹוָה שַׁעֲרֵ֣י צִיּ֑וֹן מִ֝כֹּ֗ל מִשְׁכְּנ֥וֹת יַעֲקֹֽב׃

verses.text_en: Glorious things are spoken of you, O city of God. .
verses.text_he: נִ֭כְבָּדוֹת מְדֻבָּ֣ר בָּ֑ךְ עִ֖יר הָאֱלֹהִ֣ים סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: I mention Rahab and Babylon among those who acknowledge Me; Philistia, and Tyre, and Cush—each was born there.
verses.text_he: אַזְכִּ֤יר׀ רַ֥הַב וּבָבֶ֗ל לְֽיֹ֫דְעָ֥י הִנֵּ֤ה פְלֶ֣שֶׁת וְצֹ֣ר עִם־כּ֑וּשׁ זֶ֝֗ה יֻלַּד־שָֽׁם׃

verses.text_en: Indeed, it shall be said of Zion, “Every man was born there.” He, the Most High, will preserve it.
verses.text_he: וּ֥לְצִיּ֨וֹן׀ יֵאָמַ֗ר אִ֣ישׁ וְ֭אִישׁ יֻלַּד־בָּ֑הּ וְה֖וּא יְכוֹנְנֶ֣הָ עֶלְיֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: The LORD will inscribe in the register of peoples that each was born there. .
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה יִ֭סְפֹּר בִּכְת֣וֹב עַמִּ֑ים זֶ֖ה יֻלַּד־שָׁ֣ם סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Singers and dancers alike [will say]: “All my roots are in You.”
verses.text_he: וְשָׁרִ֥ים כְּחֹלְלִ֑ים כׇּֽל־מַעְיָנַ֥י בָּֽךְ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song. A psalm of the Korahites. For the leader; on maḥalath leannoth. A maskil of Heman the Ezrahite.
verses.text_he: שִׁ֥יר מִזְמ֗וֹר לִבְנֵ֫י־קֹ֥רַח לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ עַל־מָחֲלַ֣ת לְעַנּ֑וֹת מַ֝שְׂכִּ֗יל לְהֵימָ֥ן הָאֶזְרָחִֽי׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, God of my deliverance, when I cry out in the night before You,
verses.text_he: יְ֭הֹוָה אֱלֹהֵ֣י יְשׁוּעָתִ֑י יוֹם־צָעַ֖קְתִּי בַלַּ֣יְלָה נֶגְדֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: let my prayer reach You; incline Your ear to my cry.
verses.text_he: תָּב֣וֹא לְ֭פָנֶיךָ תְּפִלָּתִ֑י הַטֵּ֥ה אׇ֝זְנְךָ֗ לְרִנָּתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: For I am sated with misfortune; I am at the brink of Sheol.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־שָׂבְעָ֣ה בְרָע֣וֹת נַפְשִׁ֑י וְ֝חַיַּ֗י לִשְׁא֥וֹל הִגִּֽיעוּ׃

verses.text_en: I am numbered with those who go down to the Pit; I am a helpless man
verses.text_he: נֶ֭חְשַׁבְתִּי עִם־י֣וֹרְדֵי ב֑וֹר הָ֝יִ֗יתִי כְּגֶ֣בֶר אֵֽין־אֱיָֽל׃

verses.text_en: abandoned among the dead, like bodies lying in the grave of whom You are mindful no more, and who are cut off from Your care.
verses.text_he: בַּמֵּתִ֗ים חׇ֫פְשִׁ֥י כְּמ֤וֹ חֲלָלִ֨ים׀ שֹׁ֥כְבֵי קֶ֗בֶר אֲשֶׁ֤ר לֹ֣א זְכַרְתָּ֣ם ע֑וֹד וְ֝הֵ֗מָּה מִיָּדְךָ֥ נִגְזָֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: You have put me at the bottom of the Pit, in the darkest places, in the depths.
verses.text_he: שַׁ֭תַּנִי בְּב֣וֹר תַּחְתִּיּ֑וֹת בְּ֝מַחֲשַׁכִּ֗ים בִּמְצֹלֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: Your fury lies heavy upon me; You afflict me with all Your breakers. .
verses.text_he: עָ֭לַי סָמְכָ֣ה חֲמָתֶ֑ךָ וְכׇל־מִ֝שְׁבָּרֶ֗יךָ עִנִּ֥יתָ סֶּֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: You make my companions shun me; You make me abhorrent to them; I am shut in and do not go out.
verses.text_he: הִרְחַ֥קְתָּ מְיֻדָּעַ֗י מִ֫מֶּ֥נִּי שַׁתַּ֣נִי תוֹעֵב֣וֹת לָ֑מוֹ כָּ֝לֻ֗א וְלֹ֣א אֵצֵֽא׃

verses.text_en: My eyes pine away from affliction; I call to You, O LORD, each day; I stretch out my hands to You.
verses.text_he: עֵינִ֥י דָאֲבָ֗ה מִנִּ֫י־עֹ֥נִי קְרָאתִ֣יךָ יְהֹוָ֣ה בְּכׇל־י֑וֹם שִׁטַּ֖חְתִּי אֵלֶ֣יךָ כַפָּֽי׃

verses.text_en: Do You work wonders for the dead? Do the shades rise to praise You? .
verses.text_he: הֲלַמֵּתִ֥ים תַּעֲשֶׂה־פֶּ֑לֶא אִם־רְ֝פָאִ֗ים יָק֤וּמוּ׀ יוֹד֬וּךָ סֶּֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Is Your faithful care recounted in the grave, Your constancy in the place of perdition?
verses.text_he: הַיְסֻפַּ֣ר בַּקֶּ֣בֶר חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ אֱ֝מ֥וּנָתְךָ֗ בָּאֲבַדּֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: Are Your wonders made known in the netherworld, Your beneficent deeds in the land of oblivion?
verses.text_he: הֲיִוָּדַ֣ע בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ פִּלְאֶ֑ךָ וְ֝צִדְקָתְךָ֗ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ נְשִׁיָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: As for me, I cry out to You, O LORD; each morning my prayer greets You.
verses.text_he: וַאֲנִ֤י׀ אֵלֶ֣יךָ יְהֹוָ֣ה שִׁוַּ֑עְתִּי וּ֝בַבֹּ֗קֶר תְּֽפִלָּתִ֥י תְקַדְּמֶֽךָּ׃

verses.text_en: Why, O LORD, do You reject me, do You hide Your face from me?
verses.text_he: לָמָ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה תִּזְנַ֣ח נַפְשִׁ֑י תַּסְתִּ֖יר פָּנֶ֣יךָ מִמֶּֽנִּי׃

verses.text_en: From my youth I have been afflicted and near death; I suffer Your terrors wherever I turn.
verses.text_he: עָ֘נִ֤י אֲנִ֣י וְגֹוֵ֣עַ מִנֹּ֑עַר נָשָׂ֖אתִי אֵמֶ֣יךָ אָפֽוּנָה׃

verses.text_en: Your fury overwhelms me; Your terrors destroy me.
verses.text_he: עָ֭לַי עָבְר֣וּ חֲרוֹנֶ֑יךָ בִּ֝עוּתֶ֗יךָ צִמְּתוּתֻֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: They swirl about me like water all day long; they encircle me on every side.
verses.text_he: סַבּ֣וּנִי כַ֭מַּיִם כׇּל־הַיּ֑וֹם הִקִּ֖יפוּ עָלַ֣י יָֽחַד׃

verses.text_en: You have put friend and neighbor far from me and my companions out of my sight.
verses.text_he: הִרְחַ֣קְתָּ מִ֭מֶּנִּי אֹהֵ֣ב וָרֵ֑עַ מְֽיֻדָּעַ֥י מַחְשָֽׁךְ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A of Ethan the Ezrahite.
verses.text_he: מַ֝שְׂכִּ֗יל לְאֵיתָ֥ן הָאֶזְרָחִֽי׃

verses.text_en: I will sing of the LORD’s steadfast love forever; to all generations I will proclaim Your faithfulness with my mouth.
verses.text_he: חַֽסְדֵ֣י יְ֭הֹוָה עוֹלָ֣ם אָשִׁ֑ירָה לְדֹ֥ר וָדֹ֓ר׀ אוֹדִ֖יעַ אֱמוּנָתְךָ֣ בְּפִֽי׃

verses.text_en: I declare, “Your steadfast love is confirmed forever; there in the heavens You establish Your faithfulness.”
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־אָמַ֗רְתִּי ע֭וֹלָם חֶ֣סֶד יִבָּנֶ֑ה שָׁמַ֓יִם׀ תָּכִ֖ן אֱמוּנָתְךָ֣ בָהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: “I have made a covenant with My chosen one; I have sworn to My servant David:
verses.text_he: כָּרַ֣תִּי בְ֭רִית לִבְחִירִ֑י נִ֝שְׁבַּ֗עְתִּי לְדָוִ֥ד עַבְדִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: I will establish your offspring forever, I will confirm your throne for all generations.” .
verses.text_he: עַד־ע֭וֹלָם אָכִ֣ין זַרְעֶ֑ךָ וּבָנִ֨יתִי לְדֹר־וָד֖וֹר כִּסְאֲךָ֣ סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Your wonders, O LORD, are praised by the heavens, Your faithfulness, too, in the assembly of holy beings.
verses.text_he: וְי֘וֹד֤וּ שָׁמַ֣יִם פִּלְאֲךָ֣ יְהֹוָ֑ה אַף־אֱ֝מ֥וּנָתְךָ֗ בִּקְהַ֥ל קְדֹשִֽׁים׃

verses.text_en: For who in the skies can equal the LORD, can compare with the LORD among the divine beings,
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י מִ֣י בַ֭שַּׁחַק יַעֲרֹ֣ךְ לַיהֹוָ֑ה יִדְמֶ֥ה לַ֝יהֹוָ֗ה בִּבְנֵ֥י אֵלִֽים׃

verses.text_en: a God greatly dreaded in the council of holy beings, held in awe by all around Him?
verses.text_he: אֵ֣ל נַ֭עֲרָץ בְּסוֹד־קְדֹשִׁ֣ים רַבָּ֑ה וְ֝נוֹרָ֗א עַל־כׇּל־סְבִיבָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, God of hosts, who is mighty like You, O LORD? Your faithfulness surrounds You;
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֤ה׀ אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י צְבָא֗וֹת מִי־כָמ֖וֹךָֽ חֲסִ֥ין׀יָ֑הּ וֶ֝אֱמ֥וּנָתְךָ֗ סְבִיבוֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: You rule the swelling of the sea; when its waves surge, You still them.
verses.text_he: אַתָּ֣ה מ֭וֹשֵׁל בְּגֵא֣וּת הַיָּ֑ם בְּשׂ֥וֹא גַ֝לָּ֗יו אַתָּ֥ה תְשַׁבְּחֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: You crushed Rahab; he was like a corpse; with Your powerful arm You scattered Your enemies.
verses.text_he: אַתָּ֤ה דִכִּ֣אתָ כֶחָלָ֣ל רָ֑הַב בִּזְר֥וֹעַ עֻ֝זְּךָ֗ פִּזַּ֥רְתָּ אוֹיְבֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: The heaven is Yours, the earth too; the world and all it holds— You established them.
verses.text_he: לְךָ֣ שָׁ֭מַיִם אַף־לְךָ֥ אָ֑רֶץ תֵּבֵ֥ל וּ֝מְלֹאָ֗הּ אַתָּ֥ה יְסַדְתָּֽם׃

verses.text_en: North and south— You created them; Tabor and Hermon sing forth Your name.
verses.text_he: צָפ֣וֹן וְ֭יָמִין אַתָּ֣ה בְרָאתָ֑ם תָּב֥וֹר וְ֝חֶרְמ֗וֹן בְּשִׁמְךָ֥ יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: Yours is an arm endowed with might; Your hand is strong; Your right hand, exalted.
verses.text_he: לְךָ֣ זְ֭רוֹעַ עִם־גְּבוּרָ֑ה תָּעֹ֥ז יָ֝דְךָ֗ תָּר֥וּם יְמִינֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Righteousness and justice are the base of Your throne; steadfast love and faithfulness stand before You.
verses.text_he: צֶ֣דֶק וּ֭מִשְׁפָּט מְכ֣וֹן כִּסְאֶ֑ךָ חֶ֥סֶד וֶ֝אֱמֶ֗ת יְֽקַדְּמ֥וּ פָנֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Happy is the people who know the joyful shout; O LORD, they walk in the light of Your presence.
verses.text_he: אַשְׁרֵ֣י הָ֭עָם יֹדְעֵ֣י תְרוּעָ֑ה יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה בְּֽאוֹר־פָּנֶ֥יךָ יְהַלֵּכֽוּן׃

verses.text_en: They rejoice in Your name all day long; they are exalted through Your righteousness.
verses.text_he: בְּ֭שִׁמְךָ יְגִיל֣וּן כׇּל־הַיּ֑וֹם וּבְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ יָרֽוּמוּ׃

verses.text_en: For You are their strength in which they glory; our horn is exalted through Your favor.
verses.text_he: כִּי־תִפְאֶ֣רֶת עֻזָּ֣מוֹ אָ֑תָּה וּ֝בִרְצוֹנְךָ֗ (תרים) [תָּר֥וּם] קַרְנֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: Truly our shield is of the LORD, our king, of the Holy One of Israel.
verses.text_he: כִּ֣י לַ֭יהֹוָה מָגִנֵּ֑נוּ וְלִקְד֖וֹשׁ יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל מַלְכֵּֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: Then You spoke to Your faithful ones in a vision and said, “I have conferred power upon a warrior; I have exalted one chosen out of the people.
verses.text_he: אָ֤ז דִּבַּ֥רְתָּֽ־בְחָז֡וֹן לַחֲסִידֶ֗יךָ וַתֹּ֗אמֶר שִׁוִּ֣יתִי עֵ֭זֶר עַל־גִּבּ֑וֹר הֲרִימ֖וֹתִי בָח֣וּר מֵעָֽם׃

verses.text_en: I have found David, My servant; anointed him with My sacred oil.
verses.text_he: מָ֭צָאתִי דָּוִ֣ד עַבְדִּ֑י בְּשֶׁ֖מֶן קׇדְשִׁ֣י מְשַׁחְתִּֽיו׃

verses.text_en: My hand shall be constantly with him, and My arm shall strengthen him.
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֣ר יָ֭דִי תִּכּ֣וֹן עִמּ֑וֹ אַף־זְרוֹעִ֥י תְאַמְּצֶֽנּוּ׃

verses.text_en: No enemy shall oppress him, no vile man afflict him.
verses.text_he: לֹא־יַשִּׁ֣יא אוֹיֵ֣ב בּ֑וֹ וּבֶן־עַ֝וְלָ֗ה לֹ֣א יְעַנֶּֽנּוּ׃

verses.text_en: I will crush his adversaries before him; I will strike down those who hate him.
verses.text_he: וְכַתּוֹתִ֣י מִפָּנָ֣יו צָרָ֑יו וּמְשַׂנְאָ֥יו אֶגּֽוֹף׃

verses.text_en: My faithfulness and steadfast love shall be with him; his horn shall be exalted through My name.
verses.text_he: וֶ֥אֱֽמוּנָתִ֣י וְחַסְדִּ֣י עִמּ֑וֹ וּ֝בִשְׁמִ֗י תָּר֥וּם קַרְנֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: I will set his hand upon the sea, his right hand upon the rivers.
verses.text_he: וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י בַיָּ֣ם יָד֑וֹ וּֽבַנְּהָר֥וֹת יְמִינֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: He shall say to Me, ‘You are my father, my God, the rock of my deliverance.’
verses.text_he: ה֣וּא יִ֭קְרָאֵנִי אָ֣בִי אָ֑תָּה אֵ֝לִ֗י וְצ֣וּר יְשׁוּעָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: I will appoint him first-born, highest of the kings of the earth.
verses.text_he: אַף־אָ֭נִי בְּכ֣וֹר אֶתְּנֵ֑הוּ עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן לְמַלְכֵי־אָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: I will maintain My steadfast love for him always; My covenant with him shall endure.
verses.text_he: לְ֭עוֹלָם (אשמור) [אֶשְׁמׇר־]ל֣וֹ חַסְדִּ֑י וּ֝בְרִיתִ֗י נֶאֱמֶ֥נֶת לֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: I will establish his line forever, his throne, as long as the heavens last.
verses.text_he: וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י לָעַ֣ד זַרְע֑וֹ וְ֝כִסְא֗וֹ כִּימֵ֥י שָׁמָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: If his sons forsake My Teaching and do not live by My rules;
verses.text_he: אִם־יַעַזְב֣וּ בָ֭נָיו תּוֹרָתִ֑י וּ֝בְמִשְׁפָּטַ֗י לֹ֣א יֵלֵכֽוּן׃

verses.text_en: if they violate My laws, and do not observe My commands,
verses.text_he: אִם־חֻקֹּתַ֥י יְחַלֵּ֑לוּ וּ֝מִצְוֺתַ֗י לֹ֣א יִשְׁמֹֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: I will punish their transgression with the rod, their iniquity with plagues.
verses.text_he: וּפָקַדְתִּ֣י בְשֵׁ֣בֶט פִּשְׁעָ֑ם וּבִנְגָעִ֥ים עֲוֺנָֽם׃

verses.text_en: But I will not take away My steadfast love from him; I will not betray My faithfulness.
verses.text_he: וְ֭חַסְדִּי לֹא־אָפִ֣יר מֵעִמּ֑וֹ וְלֹֽא־אֲ֝שַׁקֵּ֗ר בֶּאֱמוּנָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: I will not violate My covenant, or change what I have uttered.
verses.text_he: לֹֽא־אֲחַלֵּ֥ל בְּרִיתִ֑י וּמוֹצָ֥א שְׂ֝פָתַ֗י לֹ֣א אֲשַׁנֶּֽה׃

verses.text_en: I have sworn by My holiness, once and for all; I will not be false to David.
verses.text_he: אַ֭חַת נִשְׁבַּ֣עְתִּי בְקׇדְשִׁ֑י אִֽם־לְדָוִ֥ד אֲכַזֵּֽב׃

verses.text_en: His line shall continue forever, his throne, as the sun before Me,
verses.text_he: זַ֭רְעוֹ לְעוֹלָ֣ם יִהְיֶ֑ה וְכִסְא֖וֹ כַשֶּׁ֣מֶשׁ נֶגְדִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: as the moon, established forever, an enduring witness in the sky.” .
verses.text_he: כְּ֭יָרֵחַ יִכּ֣וֹן עוֹלָ֑ם וְעֵ֥ד בַּ֝שַּׁ֗חַק נֶאֱמָ֥ן סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Yet You have rejected, spurned, and become enraged at Your anointed.
verses.text_he: וְאַתָּ֣ה זָ֭נַחְתָּ וַתִּמְאָ֑ס הִ֝תְעַבַּ֗רְתָּ עִם־מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: You have repudiated the covenant with Your servant; You have dragged his dignity in the dust.
verses.text_he: נֵ֭אַרְתָּה בְּרִ֣ית עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ חִלַּ֖לְתָּ לָאָ֣רֶץ נִזְרֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: You have breached all his defenses, shattered his strongholds.
verses.text_he: פָּרַ֥צְתָּ כׇל־גְּדֵרֹתָ֑יו שַׂ֖מְתָּ מִבְצָרָ֣יו מְחִתָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: All who pass by plunder him; he has become the butt of his neighbors.
verses.text_he: שַׁ֭סֻּהוּ כׇּל־עֹ֣בְרֵי דָ֑רֶךְ הָיָ֥ה חֶ֝רְפָּ֗ה לִשְׁכֵנָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: You have exalted the right hand of his adversaries, and made all his enemies rejoice.
verses.text_he: הֲ֭רִימוֹתָ יְמִ֣ין צָרָ֑יו הִ֝שְׂמַ֗חְתָּ כׇּל־אוֹיְבָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: You have turned back the blade of his sword, and have not sustained him in battle.
verses.text_he: אַף־תָּ֭שִׁיב צ֣וּר חַרְבּ֑וֹ וְלֹ֥א הֲ֝קֵימֹת֗וֹ בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: You have brought his splendor to an end and have hurled his throne to the ground.
verses.text_he: הִשְׁבַּ֥תָּ מִטְּהָר֑וֹ וְ֝כִסְא֗וֹ לָאָ֥רֶץ מִגַּֽרְתָּה׃

verses.text_en: You have cut short the days of his youth; You have covered him with shame. .
verses.text_he: הִ֭קְצַרְתָּ יְמֵ֣י עֲלוּמָ֑יו הֶ֥עֱטִ֨יתָ עָלָ֖יו בּוּשָׁ֣ה סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: How long, O LORD; will You forever hide Your face, will Your fury blaze like fire?
verses.text_he: עַד־מָ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה תִּסָּתֵ֣ר לָנֶ֑צַח תִּבְעַ֖ר כְּמוֹ־אֵ֣שׁ חֲמָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: O remember how short my life is; why should You have created every man in vain?
verses.text_he: זְכׇר־אֲנִ֥י מֶה־חָ֑לֶד עַל־מַה־שָּׁ֝֗וְא בָּרָ֥אתָ כׇל־בְּנֵֽי־אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: What man can live and not see death, can save himself from the clutches of Sheol? .
verses.text_he: מִ֤י גֶ֣בֶר יִֽ֭חְיֶה וְלֹ֣א יִרְאֶה־מָּ֑וֶת יְמַלֵּ֨ט נַפְשׁ֖וֹ מִיַּד־שְׁא֣וֹל סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: O Lord, where is Your steadfast love of old which You swore to David in Your faithfulness?
verses.text_he: אַיֵּ֤ה׀ חֲסָדֶ֖יךָ הָרִאשֹׁנִ֥ים׀אֲדֹנָ֑י נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתָּ לְ֝דָוִ֗ד בֶּאֱמוּנָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Remember, O Lord, the abuse flung at Your servants that I have borne in my bosom [from] many peoples,
verses.text_he: זְכֹ֣ר אֲ֭דֹנָי חֶרְפַּ֣ת עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ שְׂאֵתִ֥י בְ֝חֵיקִ֗י כׇּל־רַבִּ֥ים עַמִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: how Your enemies, O LORD, have flung abuse, abuse at Your anointed at every step.
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֤ר חֵרְפ֖וּ אוֹיְבֶ֥יךָ׀יְהֹוָ֑ה אֲשֶׁ֥ר חֵ֝רְפ֗וּ עִקְּב֥וֹת מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Blessed is the LORD forever; Amen and Amen.
verses.text_he: בָּר֖וּךְ יְהֹוָ֥ה לְעוֹלָ֗ם אָ֘מֵ֥ן׀וְאָמֵֽן׃

verses.text_en: A prayer of Moses, the man of God. O Lord, You have been our refuge in every generation.
verses.text_he: תְּפִלָּה֮ לְמֹשֶׁ֢ה אִֽישׁ־הָאֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים אֲֽדֹנָ֗י מָע֣וֹן אַ֭תָּה הָיִ֥יתָ לָּ֗נוּ בְּדֹ֣ר וָדֹֽר׃

verses.text_en: Before the mountains came into being, before You brought forth the earth and the world, from eternity to eternity You are God.
verses.text_he: בְּטֶ֤רֶם׀ הָ֘רִ֤ים יֻלָּ֗דוּ וַתְּח֣וֹלֵֽל אֶ֣רֶץ וְתֵבֵ֑ל וּֽמֵעוֹלָ֥ם עַד־ע֝וֹלָ֗ם אַתָּ֥ה אֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: You return man to dust; You decreed, “Return you mortals!”
verses.text_he: תָּשֵׁ֣ב אֱ֭נוֹשׁ עַד־דַּכָּ֑א וַ֝תֹּ֗אמֶר שׁ֣וּבוּ בְנֵֽי־אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: For in Your sight a thousand years are like yesterday that has passed, like a watch of the night.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י אֶ֪לֶף שָׁנִ֡ים בְּֽעֵינֶ֗יךָ כְּי֣וֹם אֶ֭תְמוֹל כִּ֣י יַעֲבֹ֑ר וְאַשְׁמוּרָ֥ה בַלָּֽיְלָה׃

verses.text_en: You engulf men in sleep; at daybreak they are like grass that renews itself;
verses.text_he: זְ֭רַמְתָּם שֵׁנָ֣ה יִהְי֑וּ בַּ֝בֹּ֗קֶר כֶּחָצִ֥יר יַחֲלֹֽף׃

verses.text_en: at daybreak it flourishes anew; by dusk it withers and dries up.
verses.text_he: בַּ֭בֹּקֶר יָצִ֣יץ וְחָלָ֑ף לָ֝עֶ֗רֶב יְמוֹלֵ֥ל וְיָבֵֽשׁ׃

verses.text_en: So we are consumed by Your anger, terror-struck by Your fury.
verses.text_he: כִּי־כָלִ֥ינוּ בְאַפֶּ֑ךָ וּֽבַחֲמָתְךָ֥ נִבְהָֽלְנוּ׃

verses.text_en: You have set our iniquities before You, our hidden sins in the light of Your face.
verses.text_he: שַׁתָּ֣ עֲוֺנֹתֵ֣ינוּ לְנֶגְדֶּ֑ךָ עֲ֝לֻמֵ֗נוּ לִמְא֥וֹר פָּנֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: All our days pass away in Your wrath; we spend our years like a sigh.
verses.text_he: כִּ֣י כׇל־יָ֭מֵינוּ פָּנ֣וּ בְעֶבְרָתֶ֑ךָ כִּלִּ֖ינוּ שָׁנֵ֣ינוּ כְמוֹ־הֶֽגֶה׃

verses.text_en: The span of our life is seventy years, or, given the strength, eighty years; but the best of them are trouble and sorrow. They pass by speedily, and we are in darkness.
verses.text_he: יְמֵֽי־שְׁנוֹתֵ֨ינוּ בָהֶ֥ם שִׁבְעִ֪ים שָׁנָ֡ה וְאִ֤ם בִּגְבוּרֹ֨ת׀ שְׁמ֘וֹנִ֤ים שָׁנָ֗ה וְ֭רׇהְבָּם עָמָ֣ל וָאָ֑וֶן כִּי־גָ֥ז חִ֝֗ישׁ וַנָּעֻֽפָה׃

verses.text_en: Who can know Your furious anger? Your wrath matches the fear of You.
verses.text_he: מִֽי־י֭וֹדֵעַ עֹ֣ז אַפֶּ֑ךָ וּ֝כְיִרְאָתְךָ֗ עֶבְרָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Teach us to count our days rightly, that we may obtain a wise heart.
verses.text_he: לִמְנ֣וֹת יָ֭מֵינוּ כֵּ֣ן הוֹדַ֑ע וְ֝נָבִ֗א לְבַ֣ב חׇכְמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Turn, O LORD! How long? Show mercy to Your servants.
verses.text_he: שׁוּבָ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה עַד־מָתָ֑י וְ֝הִנָּחֵ֗ם עַל־עֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Satisfy us at daybreak with Your steadfast love that we may sing for joy all our days.
verses.text_he: שַׂבְּעֵ֣נוּ בַבֹּ֣קֶר חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ וּֽנְרַנְּנָ֥ה וְ֝נִשְׂמְחָ֗ה בְּכׇל־יָמֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: Give us joy for as long as You have afflicted us, for the years we have suffered misfortune.
verses.text_he: שַׂ֭מְּחֵנוּ כִּימ֣וֹת עִנִּיתָ֑נוּ שְׁ֝נ֗וֹת רָאִ֥ינוּ רָעָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Let Your deeds be seen by Your servants, Your glory by their children.
verses.text_he: יֵרָאֶ֣ה אֶל־עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ פׇעֳלֶ֑ךָ וַ֝הֲדָרְךָ֗ עַל־בְּנֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: May the favor of the Lord, our God, be upon us; let the work of our hands prosper, O prosper the work of our hands!
verses.text_he: וִיהִ֤י׀ נֹ֤עַם אֲדֹנָ֥י אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ עָ֫לֵ֥ינוּ וּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה יָ֭דֵינוּ כּוֹנְנָ֥ה עָלֵ֑ינוּ וּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה יָ֝דֵ֗ינוּ כּוֹנְנֵֽהוּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: O you who dwell in the shelter of the Most High and abide in the protection of Shaddai—
verses.text_he: יֹ֭שֵׁב בְּסֵ֣תֶר עֶלְי֑וֹן בְּצֵ֥ל שַׁ֝דַּ֗י יִתְלוֹנָֽן׃

verses.text_en: I say of the LORD, my refuge and stronghold, my God in whom I trust,
verses.text_he: אֹמַ֗ר לַ֭יהֹוָה מַחְסִ֣י וּמְצוּדָתִ֑י אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י אֶבְטַח־בּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: that He will save you from the fowler’s trap, from the destructive plague.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י ה֣וּא יַ֭צִּילְךָ מִפַּ֥ח יָק֗וּשׁ מִדֶּ֥בֶר הַוּֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: He will cover you with His pinions; you will find refuge under His wings; His fidelity is an encircling shield.
verses.text_he: בְּאֶבְרָת֨וֹ׀ יָ֣סֶךְ לָ֭ךְ וְתַחַת־כְּנָפָ֣יו תֶּחְסֶ֑ה צִנָּ֖ה וְסֹחֵרָ֣ה אֲמִתּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: You need not fear the terror by night, or the arrow that flies by day,
verses.text_he: לֹֽא־תִ֭ירָא מִפַּ֣חַד לָ֑יְלָה מֵ֝חֵ֗ץ יָע֥וּף יוֹמָֽם׃

verses.text_en: the plague that stalks in the darkness, or the scourge that ravages at noon.
verses.text_he: מִ֭דֶּבֶר בָּאֹ֣פֶל יַהֲלֹ֑ךְ מִ֝קֶּ֗טֶב יָשׁ֥וּד צׇהֳרָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: A thousand may fall at your left side, ten thousand at your right, but it shall not reach you.
verses.text_he: יִפֹּ֤ל מִצִּדְּךָ֨׀ אֶ֗לֶף וּרְבָבָ֥ה מִימִינֶ֑ךָ אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ לֹ֣א יִגָּֽשׁ׃

verses.text_en: You will see it with your eyes, you will witness the punishment of the wicked.
verses.text_he: רַ֭ק בְּעֵינֶ֣יךָ תַבִּ֑יט וְשִׁלֻּמַ֖ת רְשָׁעִ֣ים תִּרְאֶֽה׃

verses.text_en: Because you took the LORD—my refuge, the Most High—as your haven,
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־אַתָּ֣ה יְהֹוָ֣ה מַחְסִ֑י עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן שַׂ֣מְתָּ מְעוֹנֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: no harm will befall you, no disease touch your tent.
verses.text_he: לֹא־תְאֻנֶּ֣ה אֵלֶ֣יךָ רָעָ֑ה וְ֝נֶ֗גַע לֹא־יִקְרַ֥ב בְּאׇהֳלֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: For He will order His angels to guard you wherever you go.
verses.text_he: כִּ֣י מַ֭לְאָכָיו יְצַוֶּה־לָּ֑ךְ לִ֝שְׁמׇרְךָ֗ בְּכׇל־דְּרָכֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: They will carry you in their hands lest you hurt your foot on a stone.
verses.text_he: עַל־כַּפַּ֥יִם יִשָּׂא֑וּנְךָ פֶּן־תִּגֹּ֖ף בָּאֶ֣בֶן רַגְלֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: You will tread on cubs and vipers; you will trample lions and asps.
verses.text_he: עַל־שַׁ֣חַל וָפֶ֣תֶן תִּדְרֹ֑ךְ תִּרְמֹ֖ס כְּפִ֣יר וְתַנִּֽין׃

verses.text_en: “Because he is devoted to Me I will deliver him; I will keep him safe, for he knows My name.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י בִ֣י חָ֭שַׁק וַאֲפַלְּטֵ֑הוּ אֲ֝שַׂגְּבֵ֗הוּ כִּֽי־יָדַ֥ע שְׁמִֽי׃

verses.text_en: When he calls on Me, I will answer him; I will be with him in distress; I will rescue him and make him honored;
verses.text_he: יִקְרָאֵ֨נִי׀ וְֽאֶעֱנֵ֗הוּ עִמּֽוֹ־אָנֹכִ֥י בְצָרָ֑ה אֲ֝חַלְּצֵ֗הוּ וַאֲכַבְּדֵֽהוּ׃

verses.text_en: I will let him live to a ripe old age, and show him My salvation.”
verses.text_he: אֹ֣רֶךְ יָ֭מִים אַשְׂבִּיעֵ֑הוּ וְ֝אַרְאֵ֗הוּ בִּישׁוּעָתִֽי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A psalm. A song; for the sabbath day.
verses.text_he: מִזְמ֥וֹר שִׁ֗יר לְי֣וֹם הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃

verses.text_en: It is good to praise the LORD, to sing hymns to Your name, O Most High,
verses.text_he: ט֗וֹב לְהֹד֥וֹת לַיהֹוָ֑ה וּלְזַמֵּ֖ר לְשִׁמְךָ֣ עֶלְיֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: To proclaim Your steadfast love at daybreak, Your faithfulness each night
verses.text_he: לְהַגִּ֣יד בַּבֹּ֣קֶר חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ וֶ֝אֱמ֥וּנָתְךָ֗ בַּלֵּילֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: With a ten-stringed harp, with voice and lyre together.
verses.text_he: עֲֽלֵי־עָ֭שׂוֹר וַעֲלֵי־נָ֑בֶל עֲלֵ֖י הִגָּי֣וֹן בְּכִנּֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: You have gladdened me by Your deeds, O LORD; I shout for joy at Your handiwork.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י שִׂמַּחְתַּ֣נִי יְהֹוָ֣ה בְּפׇעֳלֶ֑ךָ בְּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖י יָדֶ֣יךָ אֲרַנֵּֽן׃

verses.text_en: How great are Your works, O LORD, how very subtle Your designs!
verses.text_he: מַה־גָּדְל֣וּ מַעֲשֶׂ֣יךָ יְהֹוָ֑ה מְ֝אֹ֗ד עָמְק֥וּ מַחְשְׁבֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: A brutish man cannot know, a fool cannot understand this:
verses.text_he: אִֽישׁ־בַּ֭עַר לֹ֣א יֵדָ֑ע וּ֝כְסִ֗יל לֹא־יָבִ֥ין אֶת־זֹֽאת׃

verses.text_en: though the wicked sprout like grass, though all evildoers blossom, it is only that they may be destroyed forever.
verses.text_he: בִּפְרֹ֤חַ רְשָׁעִ֨ים׀ כְּמ֥וֹ־עֵ֗שֶׂב וַ֭יָּצִיצוּ כׇּל־פֹּ֣עֲלֵי אָ֑וֶן לְהִשָּׁמְדָ֥ם עֲדֵי־עַֽד׃

verses.text_en: But You are exalted, O LORD, for all time.
verses.text_he: וְאַתָּ֥ה מָר֗וֹם לְעֹלָ֥ם יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Surely, Your enemies, O LORD, surely, Your enemies perish; all evildoers are scattered.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י הִנֵּ֪ה אֹיְבֶ֡יךָ יְֽהֹוָ֗ה כִּֽי־הִנֵּ֣ה אֹיְבֶ֣יךָ יֹאבֵ֑דוּ יִ֝תְפָּרְד֗וּ כׇּל־פֹּ֥עֲלֵי אָֽוֶן׃

verses.text_en: You raise my horn high like that of a wild ox; I am soaked in freshening oil.
verses.text_he: וַתָּ֣רֶם כִּרְאֵ֣ים קַרְנִ֑י בַּ֝לֹּתִ֗י בְּשֶׁ֣מֶן רַעֲנָֽן׃

verses.text_en: I shall see the defeat of my watchful foes, hear of the downfall of the wicked who beset me.
verses.text_he: וַתַּבֵּ֥ט עֵינִ֗י בְּשׁ֫וּרָ֥י בַּקָּמִ֖ים עָלַ֥י מְרֵעִ֗ים תִּשְׁמַ֥עְנָה אׇזְנָֽי׃

verses.text_en: The righteous bloom like a date-palm; they thrive like a cedar in Lebanon;
verses.text_he: צַ֭דִּיק כַּתָּמָ֣ר יִפְרָ֑ח כְּאֶ֖רֶז בַּלְּבָנ֣וֹן יִשְׂגֶּֽה׃

verses.text_en: planted in the house of the LORD, they flourish in the courts of our God.
verses.text_he: שְׁ֭תוּלִים בְּבֵ֣ית יְהֹוָ֑ה בְּחַצְר֖וֹת אֱלֹהֵ֣ינוּ יַפְרִֽיחוּ׃

verses.text_en: In old age they still produce fruit; they are full of sap and freshness,
verses.text_he: ע֭וֹד יְנוּב֣וּן בְּשֵׂיבָ֑ה דְּשֵׁנִ֖ים וְֽרַעֲנַנִּ֣ים יִהְיֽוּ׃

verses.text_en: attesting that the LORD is upright, my rock, in whom there is no wrong.
verses.text_he: לְ֭הַגִּיד כִּֽי־יָשָׁ֣ר יְהֹוָ֑ה צ֝וּרִ֗י וְֽלֹא־[עַוְלָ֥תָה] (עלתה) בּֽוֹ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: The LORD is king, He is robed in grandeur; the LORD is robed, He is girded with strength. The world stands firm; it cannot be shaken.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֣ה מָלָךְ֮ גֵּא֢וּת לָ֫בֵ֥שׁ לָבֵ֣שׁ יְ֭הֹוָה עֹ֣ז הִתְאַזָּ֑ר אַף־תִּכּ֥וֹן תֵּ֝בֵ֗ל בַּל־תִּמּֽוֹט׃

verses.text_en: Your throne stands firm from of old; from eternity You have existed.
verses.text_he: נָכ֣וֹן כִּסְאֲךָ֣ מֵאָ֑ז מֵעוֹלָ֣ם אָֽתָּה׃

verses.text_en: The ocean sounds, O LORD, the ocean sounds its thunder, the ocean sounds its pounding.
verses.text_he: נָשְׂא֤וּ נְהָר֨וֹת׀ יְֽהֹוָ֗ה נָשְׂא֣וּ נְהָר֣וֹת קוֹלָ֑ם יִשְׂא֖וּ נְהָר֣וֹת דׇּכְיָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Above the thunder of the mighty waters, more majestic than the breakers of the sea is the LORD, majestic on high.
verses.text_he: מִקֹּל֨וֹת׀ מַ֤יִם רַבִּ֗ים אַדִּירִ֣ים מִשְׁבְּרֵי־יָ֑ם אַדִּ֖יר בַּמָּר֣וֹם יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Your decrees are indeed enduring; holiness befits Your house, O LORD, for all times.
verses.text_he: עֵֽדֹתֶ֨יךָ׀ נֶאֶמְנ֬וּ מְאֹ֗ד לְבֵיתְךָ֥ נַאֲוָה־קֹ֑דֶשׁ יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה לְאֹ֣רֶךְ יָמִֽים׃{פ}

verses.text_en: God of retribution, LORD, God of retribution, appear!
verses.text_he: אֵל־נְקָמ֥וֹת יְהֹוָ֑ה אֵ֖ל נְקָמ֣וֹת הוֹפִֽיעַ׃

verses.text_en: Rise up, judge of the earth, give the arrogant their deserts!
verses.text_he: הִ֭נָּשֵׂא שֹׁפֵ֣ט הָאָ֑רֶץ הָשֵׁ֥ב גְּ֝מ֗וּל עַל־גֵּאִֽים׃

verses.text_en: How long shall the wicked, O LORD, how long shall the wicked exult,
verses.text_he: עַד־מָתַ֖י רְשָׁעִ֥ים׀יְהֹוָ֑ה עַד־מָ֝תַ֗י רְשָׁעִ֥ים יַעֲלֹֽזוּ׃

verses.text_en: shall they utter insolent speech, shall all evildoers vaunt themselves?
verses.text_he: יַבִּ֣יעוּ יְדַבְּר֣וּ עָתָ֑ק יִ֝תְאַמְּר֗וּ כׇּל־פֹּ֥עֲלֵי אָֽוֶן׃

verses.text_en: They crush Your people, O LORD, they afflict Your very own;
verses.text_he: עַמְּךָ֣ יְהֹוָ֣ה יְדַכְּא֑וּ וְֽנַחֲלָתְךָ֥ יְעַנּֽוּ׃

verses.text_en: they kill the widow and the stranger; they murder the fatherless,
verses.text_he: אַלְמָנָ֣ה וְגֵ֣ר יַהֲרֹ֑גוּ וִ֖יתוֹמִ֣ים יְרַצֵּֽחוּ׃

verses.text_en: thinking, “The LORD does not see it, the God of Jacob does not pay heed.”
verses.text_he: וַ֭יֹּ֣אמְרוּ לֹ֣א יִרְאֶה־יָּ֑הּ וְלֹא־יָ֝בִ֗ין אֱלֹהֵ֥י יַעֲקֹֽב׃

verses.text_en: Take heed, you most brutish people; fools, when will you get wisdom?
verses.text_he: בִּ֭ינוּ בֹּעֲרִ֣ים בָּעָ֑ם וּ֝כְסִילִ֗ים מָתַ֥י תַּשְׂכִּֽילוּ׃

verses.text_en: Shall He who implants the ear not hear, He who forms the eye not see?
verses.text_he: הֲנֹ֣טַֽע אֹ֭זֶן הֲלֹ֣א יִשְׁמָ֑ע אִֽם־יֹ֥צֵֽר עַ֝֗יִן הֲלֹ֣א יַבִּֽיט׃

verses.text_en: Shall He who disciplines nations not punish, He who instructs men in knowledge?
verses.text_he: הֲיֹסֵ֣ר גּ֭וֹיִם הֲלֹ֣א יוֹכִ֑יחַ הַֽמְלַמֵּ֖ד אָדָ֣ם דָּֽעַת׃

verses.text_en: The LORD knows the designs of men to be futile.
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה יֹ֭דֵעַ מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת אָדָ֑ם כִּי־הֵ֥מָּה הָֽבֶל׃

verses.text_en: Happy is the man whom You discipline, O LORD, the man You instruct in Your teaching,
verses.text_he: אַשְׁרֵ֤י׀ הַגֶּ֣בֶר אֲשֶׁר־תְּיַסְּרֶ֣נּוּ יָּ֑הּ וּֽמִתּוֹרָתְךָ֥ תְלַמְּדֶֽנּוּ׃

verses.text_en: to give him tranquillity in times of misfortune, until a pit be dug for the wicked.
verses.text_he: לְהַשְׁקִ֣יט ל֭וֹ מִ֣ימֵי רָ֑ע עַ֤ד יִכָּרֶ֖ה לָרָשָׁ֣ע שָֽׁחַת׃

verses.text_en: For the LORD will not forsake His people; He will not abandon His very own.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י׀ לֹא־יִטֹּ֣שׁ יְהֹוָ֣ה עַמּ֑וֹ וְ֝נַחֲלָת֗וֹ לֹ֣א יַעֲזֹֽב׃

verses.text_en: Judgment shall again accord with justice and all the upright shall rally to it.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־עַד־צֶ֭דֶק יָשׁ֣וּב מִשְׁפָּ֑ט וְ֝אַחֲרָ֗יו כׇּל־יִשְׁרֵי־לֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: Who will take my part against evil men? Who will stand up for me against wrongdoers?
verses.text_he: מִֽי־יָק֣וּם לִ֭י עִם־מְרֵעִ֑ים מִי־יִתְיַצֵּ֥ב לִ֝֗י עִם־פֹּ֥עֲלֵי אָֽוֶן׃

verses.text_en: Were not the LORD my help, I should soon dwell in silence.
verses.text_he: לוּלֵ֣י יְ֭הֹוָה עֶזְרָ֣תָה לִּ֑י כִּמְעַ֓ט׀ שָׁכְנָ֖ה דוּמָ֣ה נַפְשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: When I think my foot has given way, Your faithfulness, O LORD, supports me.
verses.text_he: אִם־אָ֭מַרְתִּי מָ֣טָה רַגְלִ֑י חַסְדְּךָ֥ יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה יִסְעָדֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: When I am filled with cares, Your assurance soothes my soul.
verses.text_he: בְּרֹ֣ב שַׂרְעַפַּ֣י בְּקִרְבִּ֑י תַּ֝נְחוּמֶ֗יךָ יְֽשַׁעַשְׁע֥וּ נַפְשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: Shall the seat of injustice be Your partner, that frames mischief by statute?
verses.text_he: הַֽ֭יְחׇבְרְךָ כִּסֵּ֣א הַוּ֑וֹת יֹצֵ֖ר עָמָ֣ל עֲלֵי־חֹֽק׃

verses.text_en: They band together to do away with the righteous; they condemn the innocent to death.
verses.text_he: יָ֭גוֹדּוּ עַל־נֶ֣פֶשׁ צַדִּ֑יק וְדָ֖ם נָקִ֣י יַרְשִֽׁיעוּ׃

verses.text_en: But the LORD is my haven; my God is my sheltering rock.
verses.text_he: וַיְהִ֬י יְהֹוָ֣ה לִ֣י לְמִשְׂגָּ֑ב וֵ֝אלֹהַ֗י לְצ֣וּר מַחְסִֽי׃

verses.text_en: He will make their evil recoil upon them, annihilate them through their own wickedness; the LORD our God will annihilate them.
verses.text_he: וַיָּ֤שֶׁב עֲלֵיהֶ֨ם׀ אֶת־אוֹנָ֗ם וּבְרָעָתָ֥ם יַצְמִיתֵ֑ם יַ֝צְמִיתֵ֗ם יְהֹוָ֥ה אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Come, let us sing joyously to the LORD, raise a shout for our rock and deliverer;
verses.text_he: לְ֭כוּ נְרַנְּנָ֣ה לַיהֹוָ֑ה נָ֝רִ֗יעָה לְצ֣וּר יִשְׁעֵֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: let us come into His presence with praise; let us raise a shout for Him in song!
verses.text_he: נְקַדְּמָ֣ה פָנָ֣יו בְּתוֹדָ֑ה בִּ֝זְמִר֗וֹת נָרִ֥יעַֽ לֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: For the LORD is a great God, the great king of all divine beings.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י אֵ֣ל גָּד֣וֹל יְהֹוָ֑ה וּמֶ֥לֶךְ גָּ֝ד֗וֹל עַל־כׇּל־אֱלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: In His hand are the depths of the earth; the peaks of the mountains are His.
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֣ר בְּ֭יָדוֹ מֶחְקְרֵי־אָ֑רֶץ וְתוֹעֲפֹ֖ת הָרִ֣ים לֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: His is the sea, He made it; and the land, which His hands fashioned.
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁר־ל֣וֹ הַ֭יָּם וְה֣וּא עָשָׂ֑הוּ וְ֝יַבֶּ֗שֶׁת יָדָ֥יו יָצָֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: Come, let us bow down and kneel, bend the knee before the LORD our maker,
verses.text_he: בֹּ֭אוּ נִשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֣ה וְנִכְרָ֑עָה נִ֝בְרְכָ֗ה לִֽפְנֵי־יְהֹוָ֥ה עֹשֵֽׂנוּ׃

verses.text_en: for He is our God, and we are the people He tends, the flock in His care. O, if you would but heed His charge this day:
verses.text_he: כִּ֘י־ה֤וּא אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ עַ֣ם מַ֭רְעִיתוֹ וְצֹ֣אן יָד֑וֹ הַ֝יּ֗וֹם אִֽם־בְּקֹל֥וֹ תִשְׁמָֽעוּ׃

verses.text_en: Do not be stubborn as at Meribah, as on the day of Massah, in the wilderness,
verses.text_he: אַל־תַּקְשׁ֣וּ לְ֭בַבְכֶם כִּמְרִיבָ֑ה כְּי֥וֹם מַ֝סָּ֗ה בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃

verses.text_en: when your fathers put Me to the test, tried Me, though they had seen My deeds.
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֣ר נִ֭סּוּנִי אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם בְּ֝חָנ֗וּנִי גַּם־רָא֥וּ פׇעֳלִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Forty years I was provoked by that generation; I thought, “They are a senseless people; they would not know My ways.”
verses.text_he: אַרְבָּ֘עִ֤ים שָׁנָ֨ה׀ אָ֘ק֤וּט בְּד֗וֹר וָאֹמַ֗ר עַ֤ם תֹּעֵ֣י לֵבָ֣ב הֵ֑ם וְ֝הֵ֗ם לֹא־יָדְע֥וּ דְרָכָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Concerning them I swore in anger, “They shall never come to My resting-place!”
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁר־נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי בְאַפִּ֑י אִם־יְ֝בֹא֗וּן אֶל־מְנוּחָתִֽי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Sing to the LORD a new song, sing to the LORD, all the earth.
verses.text_he: שִׁ֣ירוּ לַ֭יהֹוָה שִׁ֣יר חָדָ֑שׁ שִׁ֥ירוּ לַ֝יהֹוָ֗ה כׇּל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: Sing to the LORD, bless His name, proclaim His victory day after day.
verses.text_he: שִׁ֣ירוּ לַ֭יהֹוָה בָּרְכ֣וּ שְׁמ֑וֹ בַּשְּׂר֥וּ מִיּֽוֹם־לְ֝י֗וֹם יְשׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Tell of His glory among the nations, His wondrous deeds, among all peoples.
verses.text_he: סַפְּר֣וּ בַגּוֹיִ֣ם כְּבוֹד֑וֹ בְּכׇל־הָ֝עַמִּ֗ים נִפְלְאוֹתָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: For the LORD is great and much acclaimed, He is held in awe by all divine beings.
verses.text_he: כִּ֥י־גָ֘ד֤וֹל יְהֹוָ֣ה וּמְהֻלָּ֣ל מְאֹ֑ד נוֹרָ֥א ה֝֗וּא עַל־כׇּל־אֱלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: All the gods of the peoples are mere idols, but the LORD made the heavens.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י׀ כׇּל־אֱלֹהֵ֣י הָעַמִּ֣ים אֱלִילִ֑ים וַ֝יהֹוָ֗ה שָׁמַ֥יִם עָשָֽׂה׃

verses.text_en: Glory and majesty are before Him; strength and splendor are in His temple.
verses.text_he: הוֹד־וְהָדָ֥ר לְפָנָ֑יו עֹ֥ז וְ֝תִפְאֶ֗רֶת בְּמִקְדָּשֽׁוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Ascribe to the LORD, O families of the peoples, ascribe to the LORD glory and strength.
verses.text_he: הָב֣וּ לַ֭יהֹוָה מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת עַמִּ֑ים הָב֥וּ לַ֝יהֹוָ֗ה כָּב֥וֹד וָעֹֽז׃

verses.text_en: Ascribe to the LORD the glory of His name, bring tribute and enter His courts.
verses.text_he: הָב֣וּ לַ֭יהֹוָה כְּב֣וֹד שְׁמ֑וֹ שְׂאֽוּ־מִ֝נְחָ֗ה וּבֹ֥אוּ לְחַצְרוֹתָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: Bow down to the LORD majestic in holiness; tremble in His presence, all the earth!
verses.text_he: הִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ לַ֭יהֹוָה בְּהַדְרַת־קֹ֑דֶשׁ חִ֥ילוּ מִ֝פָּנָ֗יו כׇּל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: Declare among the nations, “The LORD is king!” the world stands firm; it cannot be shaken; He judges the peoples with equity.
verses.text_he: אִמְר֤וּ בַגּוֹיִ֨ם׀ יְ֘הֹוָ֤ה מָלָ֗ךְ אַף־תִּכּ֣וֹן תֵּ֭בֵל בַּל־תִּמּ֑וֹט יָדִ֥ין עַ֝מִּ֗ים בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Let the heavens rejoice and the earth exult; let the sea and all within it thunder,
verses.text_he: יִשְׂמְח֣וּ הַ֭שָּׁמַיִם וְתָגֵ֣ל הָאָ֑רֶץ יִֽרְעַ֥ם הַ֝יָּ֗ם וּמְלֹאֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: the fields and everything in them exult; then shall all the trees of the forest shout for joy
verses.text_he: יַעֲלֹ֣ז שָׂ֭דַי וְכׇל־אֲשֶׁר־בּ֑וֹ אָ֥ז יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ כׇּל־עֲצֵי־יָֽעַר׃

verses.text_en: at the presence of the LORD, for He is coming, for He is coming to rule the earth; He will rule the world justly, and its peoples in faithfulness.
verses.text_he: לִפְנֵ֤י יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ כִּ֬י בָ֗א כִּ֥י בָא֮ לִשְׁפֹּ֢ט הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ יִשְׁפֹּֽט־תֵּבֵ֥ל בְּצֶ֑דֶק וְ֝עַמִּ֗ים בֶּאֱמוּנָתֽוֹ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: The LORD is king! Let the earth exult, the many islands rejoice!
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֣ה מָ֭לָךְ תָּגֵ֣ל הָאָ֑רֶץ יִ֝שְׂמְח֗וּ אִיִּ֥ים רַבִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: Dense clouds are around Him, righteousness and justice are the base of His throne.
verses.text_he: עָנָ֣ן וַעֲרָפֶ֣ל סְבִיבָ֑יו צֶ֥דֶק וּ֝מִשְׁפָּ֗ט מְכ֣וֹן כִּסְאֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Fire is His vanguard, burning His foes on every side.
verses.text_he: אֵ֭שׁ לְפָנָ֣יו תֵּלֵ֑ךְ וּתְלַהֵ֖ט סָבִ֣יב צָרָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: His lightnings light up the world; the earth is convulsed at the sight;
verses.text_he: הֵאִ֣ירוּ בְרָקָ֣יו תֵּבֵ֑ל רָאֲתָ֖ה וַתָּחֵ֣ל הָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: mountains melt like wax at the LORD’s presence, at the presence of the Lord of all the earth.
verses.text_he: הָרִ֗ים כַּדּוֹנַ֗ג נָ֭מַסּוּ מִלִּפְנֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה מִ֝לִּפְנֵ֗י אֲד֣וֹן כׇּל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: The heavens proclaim His righteousness and all peoples see His glory.
verses.text_he: הִגִּ֣ידוּ הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם צִדְק֑וֹ וְרָא֖וּ כׇל־הָעַמִּ֣ים כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: All who worship images, who vaunt their idols, are dismayed; all divine beings bow down to Him.
verses.text_he: יֵבֹ֤שׁוּ׀ כׇּל־עֹ֬בְדֵי פֶ֗סֶל הַמִּֽתְהַלְלִ֥ים בָּאֱלִילִ֑ים הִשְׁתַּחֲווּ־ל֝֗וֹ כׇּל־אֱלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Zion, hearing it, rejoices, the towns of Judah exult, because of Your judgments, O LORD.
verses.text_he: שָׁמְעָ֬ה וַתִּשְׂמַ֨ח׀ צִיּ֗וֹן וַ֭תָּגֵלְנָה בְּנ֣וֹת יְהוּדָ֑ה לְמַ֖עַן מִשְׁפָּטֶ֣יךָ יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: For You, LORD, are supreme over all the earth; You are exalted high above all divine beings.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־אַתָּ֤ה יְהֹוָ֗ה עֶלְי֥וֹן עַל־כׇּל־הָאָ֑רֶץ מְאֹ֥ד נַ֝עֲלֵ֗יתָ עַל־כׇּל־אֱלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: O you who love the LORD, hate evil! He guards the lives of His loyal ones, saving them from the hand of the wicked.
verses.text_he: אֹֽהֲבֵ֥י יְהֹוָ֗ה שִׂנְא֫וּ־רָ֥ע שֹׁ֭מֵר נַפְשׁ֣וֹת חֲסִידָ֑יו מִיַּ֥ד רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים יַצִּילֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: Light is sown for the righteous, radiance for the upright.
verses.text_he: א֭וֹר זָרֻ֣עַ לַצַּדִּ֑יק וּֽלְיִשְׁרֵי־לֵ֥ב שִׂמְחָֽה׃

verses.text_en: O you righteous, rejoice in the LORD and acclaim His holy name!
verses.text_he: שִׂמְח֣וּ צַ֭דִּיקִים בַּיהֹוָ֑ה וְ֝הוֹד֗וּ לְזֵ֣כֶר קׇדְשֽׁוֹ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A psalm. Sing to the LORD a new song, for He has worked wonders; His right hand, His holy arm, has won Him victory.
verses.text_he: מִזְמ֡וֹר שִׁ֤ירוּ לַיהֹוָ֨ה׀ שִׁ֣יר חָ֭דָשׁ כִּֽי־נִפְלָא֣וֹת עָשָׂ֑ה הוֹשִׁיעָה־לּ֥וֹ יְ֝מִינ֗וֹ וּזְר֥וֹעַ קׇדְשֽׁוֹ׃

verses.text_en: The LORD has manifested His victory, has displayed His triumph in the sight of the nations.
verses.text_he: הוֹדִ֣יעַ יְ֭הֹוָה יְשׁוּעָת֑וֹ לְעֵינֵ֥י הַ֝גּוֹיִ֗ם גִּלָּ֥ה צִדְקָתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: He was mindful of His steadfast love and faithfulness toward the house of Israel; all the ends of the earth beheld the victory of our God.
verses.text_he: זָ֘כַ֤ר חַסְדּ֨וֹ׀ וֶ֥אֱֽמוּנָתוֹ֮ לְבֵ֢ית יִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל רָא֥וּ כׇל־אַפְסֵי־אָ֑רֶץ אֵ֝֗ת יְשׁוּעַ֥ת אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: Raise a shout to the LORD, all the earth, break into joyous songs of praise!
verses.text_he: הָרִ֣יעוּ לַ֭יהֹוָה כׇּל־הָאָ֑רֶץ פִּצְח֖וּ וְרַנְּנ֣וּ וְזַמֵּֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: Sing praise to the LORD with the lyre, with the lyre and melodious song.
verses.text_he: זַמְּר֣וּ לַיהֹוָ֣ה בְּכִנּ֑וֹר בְּ֝כִנּ֗וֹר וְק֣וֹל זִמְרָֽה׃

verses.text_en: With trumpets and the blast of the horn raise a shout before the LORD, the King.
verses.text_he: בַּ֭חֲצֹ֣צְרוֹת וְק֣וֹל שׁוֹפָ֑ר הָ֝רִ֗יעוּ לִפְנֵ֤י׀ הַמֶּ֬לֶךְ יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Let the sea and all within it thunder, the world and its inhabitants;
verses.text_he: יִרְעַ֣ם הַ֭יָּם וּמְלֹא֑וֹ תֵּ֝בֵ֗ל וְיֹ֣שְׁבֵי בָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: let the rivers clap their hands, the mountains sing joyously together
verses.text_he: נְהָר֥וֹת יִמְחֲאוּ־כָ֑ף יַ֝֗חַד הָרִ֥ים יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: at the presence of the LORD, for He is coming to rule the earth; He will rule the world justly, and its peoples with equity.
verses.text_he: לִ֥פְֽנֵי־יְהֹוָ֗ה כִּ֥י בָא֮ לִשְׁפֹּ֢ט הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ יִשְׁפֹּֽט־תֵּבֵ֥ל בְּצֶ֑דֶק וְ֝עַמִּ֗ים בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃{פ}

verses.text_en: The LORD, enthroned on cherubim, is king, peoples tremble, the earth quakes.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֣ה מָ֭לָךְ יִרְגְּז֣וּ עַמִּ֑ים יֹשֵׁ֥ב כְּ֝רוּבִ֗ים תָּנ֥וּט הָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is great in Zion, and exalted above all peoples.
verses.text_he: יְ֭הֹוָה בְּצִיּ֣וֹן גָּד֑וֹל וְרָ֥ם ה֝֗וּא עַל־כׇּל־הָעַמִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: They praise Your name as great and awesome; He is holy!
verses.text_he: יוֹד֣וּ שִׁ֭מְךָ גָּד֥וֹל וְנוֹרָ֗א קָד֥וֹשׁ הֽוּא׃

verses.text_en: Mighty king who loves justice, it was You who established equity, You who worked righteous judgment in Jacob.
verses.text_he: וְעֹ֥ז מֶלֶךְ֮ מִשְׁפָּ֢ט אָ֫הֵ֥ב אַ֭תָּה כּוֹנַ֣נְתָּ מֵישָׁרִ֑ים מִשְׁפָּ֥ט וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה בְּיַעֲקֹ֤ב׀ אַתָּ֬ה עָשִֽׂיתָ׃

verses.text_en: Exalt the LORD our God and bow down to His footstool; He is holy!
verses.text_he: רוֹמְמ֡וּ יְ֘הֹוָ֤ה אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ וְֽ֭הִשְׁתַּחֲווּ לַהֲדֹ֥ם רַגְלָ֗יו קָד֥וֹשׁ הֽוּא׃

verses.text_en: Moses and Aaron among His priests, Samuel, among those who call on His name— when they called to the LORD, He answered them.
verses.text_he: מֹ֘שֶׁ֤ה וְאַהֲרֹ֨ן׀ בְּֽכֹהֲנָ֗יו וּ֭שְׁמוּאֵל בְּקֹרְאֵ֣י שְׁמ֑וֹ קֹרִ֥אים אֶל־יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה וְה֣וּא יַעֲנֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: He spoke to them in a pillar of cloud; they obeyed His decrees, the law He gave them.
verses.text_he: בְּעַמּ֣וּד עָ֭נָן יְדַבֵּ֣ר אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם שָׁמְר֥וּ עֵ֝דֹתָ֗יו וְחֹ֣ק נָֽתַן־לָֽמוֹ׃

verses.text_en: O LORD our God, You answered them; You were a forgiving God for them, but You exacted retribution for their misdeeds.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֵינוּ֮ אַתָּ֢ה עֲנִ֫יתָ֥ם אֵ֣ל נֹ֭שֵׂא הָיִ֣יתָ לָהֶ֑ם וְ֝נֹקֵ֗ם עַל־עֲלִילוֹתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Exalt the LORD our God, and bow toward His holy hill, for the LORD our God is holy.
verses.text_he: רוֹמְמ֡וּ יְ֘הֹוָ֤ה אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ וְֽ֭הִשְׁתַּחֲווּ לְהַ֣ר קׇדְשׁ֑וֹ כִּי־קָ֝ד֗וֹשׁ יְהֹוָ֥ה אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A psalm for praise. Raise a shout for the LORD, all the earth;
verses.text_he: מִזְמ֥וֹר לְתוֹדָ֑ה הָרִ֥יעוּ לַ֝יהֹוָ֗ה כׇּל־הָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: worship the LORD in gladness; come into His presence with shouts of joy.
verses.text_he: עִבְד֣וּ אֶת־יְהֹוָ֣ה בְּשִׂמְחָ֑ה בֹּ֥אוּ לְ֝פָנָ֗יו בִּרְנָנָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Acknowledge that the LORD is God; He made us and we are His, His people, the flock He tends.
verses.text_he: דְּע֗וּ כִּֽי־יְהֹוָה֮ ה֤וּא אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים הֽוּא־עָ֭שָׂנוּ (ולא) [וְל֣וֹ] אֲנַ֑חְנוּ עַ֝מּ֗וֹ וְצֹ֣אן מַרְעִיתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Enter His gates with praise, His courts with acclamation. Praise Him! Bless His name!
verses.text_he: בֹּ֤אוּ שְׁעָרָ֨יו׀ בְּתוֹדָ֗ה חֲצֵרֹתָ֥יו בִּתְהִלָּ֑ה הוֹדוּ־ל֝֗וֹ בָּרְכ֥וּ שְׁמֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: For the LORD is good; His steadfast love is eternal; His faithfulness is for all generations.
verses.text_he: כִּי־ט֣וֹב יְ֭הֹוָה לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּ֑וֹ וְעַד־דֹּ֥ר וָ֝דֹ֗ר אֱמוּנָתֽוֹ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Of David. A psalm. I will sing of faithfulness and justice; I will chant a hymn to You, O LORD.
verses.text_he: לְדָוִ֗ד מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר חֶֽסֶד־וּמִשְׁפָּ֥ט אָשִׁ֑ירָה לְךָ֖ יְהֹוָ֣ה אֲזַמֵּֽרָה׃

verses.text_en: I will study the way of the blameless; when shall I attain it? I will live without blame within my house.
verses.text_he: אַשְׂכִּ֤ילָה׀ בְּדֶ֬רֶךְ תָּמִ֗ים מָ֭תַי תָּב֣וֹא אֵלָ֑י אֶתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ בְּתׇם־לְ֝בָבִ֗י בְּקֶ֣רֶב בֵּיתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: I will not set before my eyes anything base; I hate crooked dealing; I will have none of it.
verses.text_he: לֹֽא־אָשִׁ֨ית׀ לְנֶ֥גֶד עֵינַ֗י דְּֽבַר־בְּלִ֫יָּ֥עַל עֲשֹֽׂה־סֵטִ֥ים שָׂנֵ֑אתִי לֹ֖א יִדְבַּ֣ק בִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: Perverse thoughts will be far from me; I will know nothing of evil.
verses.text_he: לֵבָ֣ב עִ֭קֵּשׁ יָס֣וּר מִמֶּ֑נִּי רָ֝֗ע לֹ֣א אֵדָֽע׃

verses.text_en: He who slanders his friend in secret I will destroy; I cannot endure the haughty and proud man.
verses.text_he: (מלושני) [מְלׇשְׁנִ֬י] בַסֵּ֨תֶר׀ רֵעֵהוּ֮ אוֹת֢וֹ אַ֫צְמִ֥ית גְּֽבַהּ־עֵ֭ינַיִם וּרְחַ֣ב לֵבָ֑ב אֹ֝ת֗וֹ לֹ֣א אוּכָֽל׃

verses.text_en: My eyes are on the trusty men of the land, to have them at my side. He who follows the way of the blameless shall be in my service.
verses.text_he: עֵינַ֤י׀ בְּנֶֽאֶמְנֵי־אֶרֶץ֮ לָשֶׁ֢בֶת עִמָּ֫דִ֥י הֹ֭לֵךְ בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ תָּמִ֑ים ה֝֗וּא יְשָׁרְתֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: He who deals deceitfully shall not live in my house; he who speaks untruth shall not stand before my eyes.
verses.text_he: לֹֽא־יֵשֵׁ֨ב׀ בְּקֶ֥רֶב בֵּיתִי֮ עֹשֵׂ֢ה רְמִ֫יָּ֥ה דֹּבֵ֥ר שְׁקָרִ֑ים לֹא־יִ֝כּ֗וֹן לְנֶ֣גֶד עֵינָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Each morning I will destroy all the wicked of the land, to rid the city of the LORD of all evildoers.
verses.text_he: לַבְּקָרִ֗ים אַצְמִ֥ית כׇּל־רִשְׁעֵי־אָ֑רֶץ לְהַכְרִ֥ית מֵעִיר־יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה כׇּל־פֹּ֥עֲלֵי אָֽוֶן׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A prayer of the lowly man when he is faint and pours forth his plea before the LORD.
verses.text_he: תְּ֭פִלָּה לְעָנִ֣י כִֽי־יַעֲטֹ֑ף וְלִפְנֵ֥י יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה יִשְׁפֹּ֥ךְ שִׂיחֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, hear my prayer; let my cry come before You.
verses.text_he: יְ֭הֹוָה שִׁמְעָ֣ה תְפִלָּתִ֑י וְ֝שַׁוְעָתִ֗י אֵלֶ֥יךָ תָבֽוֹא׃

verses.text_en: Do not hide Your face from me in my time of trouble; turn Your ear to me; when I cry, answer me speedily.
verses.text_he: אַל־תַּסְתֵּ֬ר פָּנֶ֨יךָ׀ מִמֶּנִּי֮ בְּי֢וֹם צַ֫ר־לִ֥י הַטֵּֽה־אֵלַ֥י אׇזְנֶ֑ךָ בְּי֥וֹם אֶ֝קְרָ֗א מַהֵ֥ר עֲנֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: For my days have vanished like smoke and my bones are charred like a hearth.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־כָל֣וּ בְעָשָׁ֣ן יָמָ֑י וְ֝עַצְמוֹתַ֗י כְּמוֹקֵ֥ד נִחָֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: My body is stricken and withered like grass; too wasted to eat my food;
verses.text_he: הוּכָּה־כָעֵ֣שֶׂב וַיִּבַ֣שׁ לִבִּ֑י כִּֽי־שָׁ֝כַ֗חְתִּי מֵאֲכֹ֥ל לַחְמִֽי׃

verses.text_en: on account of my vehement groaning my bones show through my skin.
verses.text_he: מִקּ֥וֹל אַנְחָתִ֑י דָּבְקָ֥ה עַ֝צְמִ֗י לִבְשָׂרִֽי׃

verses.text_en: I am like a great owl in the wilderness, an owl among the ruins.
verses.text_he: דָּ֭מִיתִי לִקְאַ֣ת מִדְבָּ֑ר הָ֝יִ֗יתִי כְּכ֣וֹס חֳרָבֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: I lie awake; I am like a lone bird upon a roof.
verses.text_he: שָׁקַ֥דְתִּי וָאֶהְיֶ֑ה כְּ֝צִפּ֗וֹר בּוֹדֵ֥ד עַל־גָּֽג׃

verses.text_en: All day long my enemies revile me; my deriders use my name to curse.
verses.text_he: כׇּל־הַ֭יּוֹם חֵרְפ֣וּנִי אוֹיְבָ֑י מְ֝הוֹלָלַ֗י בִּ֣י נִשְׁבָּֽעוּ׃

verses.text_en: For I have eaten ashes like bread and mixed my drink with tears,
verses.text_he: כִּי־אֵ֭פֶר כַּלֶּ֣חֶם אָכָ֑לְתִּי וְ֝שִׁקֻּוַ֗י בִּבְכִ֥י מָסָֽכְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: because of Your wrath and Your fury; for You have cast me far away.
verses.text_he: מִפְּנֵֽי־זַעַמְךָ֥ וְקִצְפֶּ֑ךָ כִּ֥י נְ֝שָׂאתַ֗נִי וַתַּשְׁלִיכֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: My days are like a lengthening shadow; I wither like grass.
verses.text_he: יָ֭מַי כְּצֵ֣ל נָט֑וּי וַ֝אֲנִ֗י כָּעֵ֥שֶׂב אִיבָֽשׁ׃

verses.text_en: But You, O LORD, are enthroned forever; Your fame endures throughout the ages.
verses.text_he: וְאַתָּ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה לְעוֹלָ֣ם תֵּשֵׁ֑ב וְ֝זִכְרְךָ֗ לְדֹ֣ר וָדֹֽר׃

verses.text_en: You will surely arise and take pity on Zion, for it is time to be gracious to her; the appointed time has come.
verses.text_he: אַתָּ֣ה תָ֭קוּם תְּרַחֵ֣ם צִיּ֑וֹן כִּי־עֵ֥ת לְ֝חֶֽנְנָ֗הּ כִּי־בָ֥א מוֹעֵֽד׃
