verses.text_en: Your servants take delight in its stones, and cherish its dust.
verses.text_he: כִּי־רָצ֣וּ עֲ֭בָדֶיךָ אֶת־אֲבָנֶ֑יהָ וְֽאֶת־עֲפָרָ֥הּ יְחֹנֵֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: The nations will fear the name of the LORD, all the kings of the earth, Your glory.
verses.text_he: וְיִֽירְא֣וּ ג֭וֹיִם אֶת־שֵׁ֣ם יְהֹוָ֑ה וְֽכׇל־מַלְכֵ֥י הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ אֶת־כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: For the LORD has built Zion; He has appeared in all His glory.
verses.text_he: כִּי־בָנָ֣ה יְהֹוָ֣ה צִיּ֑וֹן נִ֝רְאָ֗ה בִּכְבוֹדֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: He has turned to the prayer of the destitute and has not spurned their prayer.
verses.text_he: פָּ֭נָה אֶל־תְּפִלַּ֣ת הָעַרְעָ֑ר וְלֹא־בָ֝זָ֗ה אֶת־תְּפִלָּתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: May this be written down for a coming generation, that people yet to be created may praise the LORD.
verses.text_he: תִּכָּ֣תֶב זֹ֭את לְד֣וֹר אַחֲר֑וֹן וְעַ֥ם נִ֝בְרָ֗א יְהַלֶּל־יָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: For He looks down from His holy height; the LORD beholds the earth from heaven
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־הִ֭שְׁקִיף מִמְּר֣וֹם קׇדְשׁ֑וֹ יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה מִשָּׁמַ֤יִם׀ אֶל־אֶ֬רֶץ הִבִּֽיט׃

verses.text_en: to hear the groans of the prisoner, to release those condemned to death;
verses.text_he: לִ֭שְׁמֹעַ אֶנְקַ֣ת אָסִ֑יר לְ֝פַתֵּ֗חַ בְּנֵ֣י תְמוּתָֽה׃

verses.text_en: that the fame of the LORD may be recounted in Zion, His praises in Jerusalem,
verses.text_he: לְסַפֵּ֣ר בְּ֭צִיּוֹן שֵׁ֣ם יְהֹוָ֑ה וּ֝תְהִלָּת֗וֹ בִּירוּשָׁלָֽ͏ִם׃

verses.text_en: when the nations gather together, the kingdoms, to serve the LORD.
verses.text_he: בְּהִקָּבֵ֣ץ עַמִּ֣ים יַחְדָּ֑ו וּ֝מַמְלָכ֗וֹת לַעֲבֹ֥ד אֶת־יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: He drained my strength in mid-course, He shortened my days.
verses.text_he: עִנָּ֖ה בַדֶּ֥רֶךְ (כחו) [כֹּחִ֗י] קִצַּ֥ר יָמָֽי׃

verses.text_en: I say, “O my God, do not take me away in the midst of my days, You whose years go on for generations on end.
verses.text_he: אֹמַ֗ר אֵלִ֗י אַֽל־תַּ֭עֲלֵנִי בַּחֲצִ֣י יָמָ֑י בְּד֖וֹר דּוֹרִ֣ים שְׁנוֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Of old You established the earth; the heavens are the work of Your hands.
verses.text_he: לְ֭פָנִים הָאָ֣רֶץ יָסַ֑דְתָּ וּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖ה יָדֶ֣יךָ שָׁמָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: They shall perish, but You shall endure; they shall all wear out like a garment; You change them like clothing and they pass away.
verses.text_he: הֵ֤מָּה׀ יֹאבֵדוּ֮ וְאַתָּ֢ה תַ֫עֲמֹ֥ד וְ֭כֻלָּם כַּבֶּ֣גֶד יִבְל֑וּ כַּלְּב֖וּשׁ תַּחֲלִיפֵ֣ם וְֽיַחֲלֹֽפוּ׃

verses.text_en: But You are the same, and Your years never end.
verses.text_he: וְאַתָּה־ה֑וּא וּ֝שְׁנוֹתֶ֗יךָ לֹ֣א יִתָּֽמּוּ׃

verses.text_en: May the children of Your servants dwell securely and their offspring endure in Your presence.”
verses.text_he: בְּנֵֽי־עֲבָדֶ֥יךָ יִשְׁכּ֑וֹנוּ וְ֝זַרְעָ֗ם לְפָנֶ֥יךָ יִכּֽוֹן׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Of David. Bless the LORD, O my soul, all my being, His holy name.
verses.text_he: לְדָוִ֨ד׀ בָּרְכִ֣י נַ֭פְשִׁי אֶת־יְהֹוָ֑ה וְכׇל־קְ֝רָבַ֗י אֶת־שֵׁ֥ם קׇדְשֽׁוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Bless the LORD, O my soul and do not forget all His bounties.
verses.text_he: בָּרְכִ֣י נַ֭פְשִׁי אֶת־יְהֹוָ֑ה וְאַל־תִּ֝שְׁכְּחִ֗י כׇּל־גְּמוּלָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: He forgives all your sins, heals all your diseases.
verses.text_he: הַסֹּלֵ֥חַ לְכׇל־עֲוֺנֵ֑כִי הָ֝רֹפֵ֗א לְכׇל־תַּחֲלוּאָֽיְכִי׃

verses.text_en: He redeems your life from the Pit, surrounds you with steadfast love and mercy.
verses.text_he: הַגּוֹאֵ֣ל מִשַּׁ֣חַת חַיָּ֑יְכִי הַֽ֝מְעַטְּרֵ֗כִי חֶ֣סֶד וְרַחֲמִֽים׃

verses.text_en: He satisfies you with good things in the prime of life, so that your youth is renewed like the eagle’s.
verses.text_he: הַמַּשְׂבִּ֣יעַ בַּטּ֣וֹב עֶדְיֵ֑ךְ תִּתְחַדֵּ֖שׁ כַּנֶּ֣שֶׁר נְעוּרָֽיְכִי׃

verses.text_en: The LORD executes righteous acts and judgments for all who are wronged.
verses.text_he: עֹשֵׂ֣ה צְדָק֣וֹת יְהֹוָ֑ה וּ֝מִשְׁפָּטִ֗ים לְכׇל־עֲשׁוּקִֽים׃

verses.text_en: He made known His ways to Moses, His deeds to the children of Israel.
verses.text_he: יוֹדִ֣יעַ דְּרָכָ֣יו לְמֹשֶׁ֑ה לִבְנֵ֥י יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל עֲלִילוֹתָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is compassionate and gracious, slow to anger, abounding in steadfast love.
verses.text_he: רַח֣וּם וְחַנּ֣וּן יְהֹוָ֑ה אֶ֖רֶךְ אַפַּ֣יִם וְרַב־חָֽסֶד׃

verses.text_en: He will not contend forever, or nurse His anger for all time.
verses.text_he: לֹא־לָנֶ֥צַח יָרִ֑יב וְלֹ֖א לְעוֹלָ֣ם יִטּֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: He has not dealt with us according to our sins, nor has He requited us according to our iniquities.
verses.text_he: לֹ֣א כַ֭חֲטָאֵינוּ עָ֣שָׂה לָ֑נוּ וְלֹ֥א כַ֝עֲוֺנֹתֵ֗ינוּ גָּמַ֥ל עָלֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: For as the heavens are high above the earth, so great is His steadfast love toward those who fear Him.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י כִגְבֹ֣הַּ שָׁ֭מַיִם עַל־הָאָ֑רֶץ גָּבַ֥ר חַ֝סְדּ֗וֹ עַל־יְרֵאָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: As east is far from west, so far has He removed our sins from us.
verses.text_he: כִּרְחֹ֣ק מִ֭זְרָח מִֽמַּעֲרָ֑ב הִֽרְחִ֥יק מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ אֶת־פְּשָׁעֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: As a father has compassion for his children, so the LORD has compassion for those who fear Him.
verses.text_he: כְּרַחֵ֣ם אָ֭ב עַל־בָּנִ֑ים רִחַ֥ם יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה עַל־יְרֵאָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: For He knows how we are formed; He is mindful that we are dust.
verses.text_he: כִּי־ה֭וּא יָדַ֣ע יִצְרֵ֑נוּ זָ֝כ֗וּר כִּי־עָפָ֥ר אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃

verses.text_en: Man, his days are like those of grass; he blooms like a flower of the field;
verses.text_he: אֱ֭נוֹשׁ כֶּחָצִ֣יר יָמָ֑יו כְּצִ֥יץ הַ֝שָּׂדֶ֗ה כֵּ֣ן יָצִֽיץ׃

verses.text_en: a wind passes by and it is no more, its own place no longer knows it.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י ר֣וּחַ עָֽבְרָה־בּ֣וֹ וְאֵינֶ֑נּוּ וְלֹֽא־יַכִּירֶ֖נּוּ ע֣וֹד מְקוֹמֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: But the LORD’s steadfast love is for all eternity toward those who fear Him, and His beneficence is for the children’s children
verses.text_he: וְחֶ֤סֶד יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ מֵעוֹלָ֣ם וְעַד־ע֭וֹלָם עַל־יְרֵאָ֑יו וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ לִבְנֵ֥י בָנִֽים׃

verses.text_en: of those who keep His covenant and remember to observe His precepts.
verses.text_he: לְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י בְרִית֑וֹ וּלְזֹכְרֵ֥י פִ֝קֻּדָ֗יו לַעֲשׂוֹתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: The LORD has established His throne in heaven, and His sovereign rule is over all.
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה בַּ֭שָּׁמַיִם הֵכִ֣ין כִּסְא֑וֹ וּ֝מַלְכוּת֗וֹ בַּכֹּ֥ל מָשָֽׁלָה׃

verses.text_en: Bless the LORD, O His angels, mighty creatures who do His bidding, ever obedient to His bidding;
verses.text_he: בָּרְכ֥וּ יְהֹוָ֗ה מַלְאָ֫כָ֥יו גִּבֹּ֣רֵי כֹ֭חַ עֹשֵׂ֣י דְבָר֑וֹ לִ֝שְׁמֹ֗עַ בְּק֣וֹל דְּבָרֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: bless the LORD, all His hosts, His servants who do His will;
verses.text_he: בָּרְכ֣וּ יְ֭הֹוָה כׇּל־צְבָאָ֑יו מְ֝שָׁרְתָ֗יו עֹשֵׂ֥י רְצוֹנֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: bless the LORD, all His works, through the length and breadth of His realm; bless the LORD, O my soul.
verses.text_he: בָּרְכ֤וּ יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ כׇּֽל־מַעֲשָׂ֗יו בְּכׇל־מְקֹמ֥וֹת מֶמְשַׁלְתּ֑וֹ בָּרְכִ֥י נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י אֶת־יְהֹוָֽה׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Bless the LORD, O my soul; O LORD, my God, You are very great; You are clothed in glory and majesty,
verses.text_he: בָּרְכִ֥י נַפְשִׁ֗י אֶת־יְ֫הֹוָ֥ה יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱ֭לֹהַי גָּדַ֣לְתָּ מְּאֹ֑ד ה֖וֹד וְהָדָ֣ר לָבָֽשְׁתָּ׃

verses.text_en: wrapped in a robe of light; You spread the heavens like a tent cloth.
verses.text_he: עֹֽטֶה־א֭וֹר כַּשַּׂלְמָ֑ה נוֹטֶ֥ה שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם כַּיְרִיעָֽה׃

verses.text_en: He sets the rafters of His lofts in the waters, makes the clouds His chariot, moves on the wings of the wind.
verses.text_he: הַ֥מְקָרֶ֥ה בַמַּ֗יִם עֲֽלִיּ֫וֹתָ֥יו הַשָּׂם־עָבִ֥ים רְכוּב֑וֹ הַֽ֝מְהַלֵּ֗ךְ עַל־כַּנְפֵי־רֽוּחַ׃

verses.text_en: He makes the winds His messengers, fiery flames His servants.
verses.text_he: עֹשֶׂ֣ה מַלְאָכָ֣יו רוּח֑וֹת מְ֝שָׁרְתָ֗יו אֵ֣שׁ לֹהֵֽט׃

verses.text_en: He established the earth on its foundations, so that it shall never totter.
verses.text_he: יָֽסַד־אֶ֭רֶץ עַל־מְכוֹנֶ֑יהָ בַּל־תִּ֝מּ֗וֹט עוֹלָ֥ם וָעֶֽד׃

verses.text_en: You made the deep cover it as a garment; the waters stood above the mountains.
verses.text_he: תְּ֭הוֹם כַּלְּב֣וּשׁ כִּסִּית֑וֹ עַל־הָ֝רִ֗ים יַ֖עַמְדוּ־מָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: They fled at Your blast, rushed away at the sound of Your thunder,
verses.text_he: מִן־גַּעֲרָ֣תְךָ֣ יְנוּס֑וּן מִן־ק֥וֹל רַ֝עַמְךָ֗ יֵחָפֵזֽוּן׃

verses.text_en: —mountains rising, valleys sinking— to the place You established for them.
verses.text_he: יַעֲל֣וּ הָ֭רִים יֵרְד֣וּ בְקָע֑וֹת אֶל־מְ֝ק֗וֹם זֶ֤ה׀ יָסַ֬דְתָּ לָהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: You set bounds they must not pass so that they never again cover the earth.
verses.text_he: גְּֽבוּל־שַׂ֭מְתָּ בַּל־יַעֲבֹר֑וּן בַּל־יְ֝שֻׁב֗וּן לְכַסּ֥וֹת הָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: You make springs gush forth in torrents; they make their way between the hills,
verses.text_he: הַֽמְשַׁלֵּ֣חַ מַ֭עְיָנִים בַּנְּחָלִ֑ים בֵּ֥ין הָ֝רִ֗ים יְהַלֵּכֽוּן׃

verses.text_en: giving drink to all the wild beasts; the wild asses slake their thirst.
verses.text_he: יַ֭שְׁקוּ כׇּל־חַיְת֣וֹ שָׂדָ֑י יִשְׁבְּר֖וּ פְרָאִ֣ים צְמָאָֽם׃

verses.text_en: The birds of the sky dwell beside them and sing among the foliage.
verses.text_he: עֲ֭לֵיהֶם עוֹף־הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם יִשְׁכּ֑וֹן מִבֵּ֥ין עֳ֝פָאיִ֗ם יִתְּנוּ־קֽוֹל׃

verses.text_en: You water the mountains from Your lofts; the earth is sated from the fruit of Your work.
verses.text_he: מַשְׁקֶ֣ה הָ֭רִים מֵעֲלִיּוֹתָ֑יו מִפְּרִ֥י מַ֝עֲשֶׂ֗יךָ תִּשְׂבַּ֥ע הָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: You make the grass grow for the cattle, and herbage for man’s labor that he may get food out of the earth—
verses.text_he: מַצְמִ֤יחַ חָצִ֨יר׀ לַבְּהֵמָ֗ה וְ֭עֵשֶׂב לַעֲבֹדַ֣ת הָאָדָ֑ם לְה֥וֹצִיא לֶ֝֗חֶם מִן־הָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: wine that cheers the hearts of men, oil that makes the face shine, and bread that sustains man’s life.
verses.text_he: וְיַ֤יִן׀ יְשַׂמַּ֬ח לְֽבַב־אֱנ֗וֹשׁ לְהַצְהִ֣יל פָּנִ֣ים מִשָּׁ֑מֶן וְ֝לֶ֗חֶם לְֽבַב־אֱנ֥וֹשׁ יִסְעָֽד׃

verses.text_en: The trees of the LORD drink their fill, the cedars of Lebanon, His own planting,
verses.text_he: יִ֭שְׂבְּעוּ עֲצֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה אַֽרְזֵ֥י לְ֝בָנ֗וֹן אֲשֶׁ֣ר נָטָֽע׃

verses.text_en: where birds make their nests; the stork has her home in the junipers.
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁר־שָׁ֭ם צִפֳּרִ֣ים יְקַנֵּ֑נוּ חֲ֝סִידָ֗ה בְּרוֹשִׁ֥ים בֵּיתָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: The high mountains are for wild goats; the crags are a refuge for rock-badgers.
verses.text_he: הָרִ֣ים הַ֭גְּבֹהִים לַיְּעֵלִ֑ים סְ֝לָעִ֗ים מַחְסֶ֥ה לַֽשְׁפַנִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: He made the moon to mark the seasons; the sun knows when to set.
verses.text_he: עָשָׂ֣ה יָ֭רֵחַ לְמוֹעֲדִ֑ים שֶׁ֝֗מֶשׁ יָדַ֥ע מְבוֹאֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: You bring on darkness and it is night, when all the beasts of the forests stir.
verses.text_he: תָּֽשֶׁת־חֹ֭שֶׁךְ וִ֣יהִי לָ֑יְלָה בּוֹ־תִ֝רְמֹ֗שׂ כׇּל־חַיְתוֹ־יָֽעַר׃

verses.text_en: The lions roar for prey, seeking their food from God.
verses.text_he: הַ֭כְּפִירִים שֹׁאֲגִ֣ים לַטָּ֑רֶף וּלְבַקֵּ֖שׁ מֵאֵ֣ל אׇכְלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: When the sun rises, they come home and couch in their dens.
verses.text_he: תִּזְרַ֣ח הַ֭שֶּׁמֶשׁ יֵאָסֵפ֑וּן וְאֶל־מְ֝עוֹנֹתָ֗ם יִרְבָּצֽוּן׃

verses.text_en: Man then goes out to his work, to his labor until the evening.
verses.text_he: יֵצֵ֣א אָדָ֣ם לְפׇעֳל֑וֹ וְֽלַעֲבֹ֖דָת֣וֹ עֲדֵי־עָֽרֶב׃

verses.text_en: How many are the things You have made, O LORD; You have made them all with wisdom; the earth is full of Your creations.
verses.text_he: מָה־רַבּ֬וּ מַעֲשֶׂ֨יךָ׀ יְֽהֹוָ֗ה כֻּ֭לָּם בְּחׇכְמָ֣ה עָשִׂ֑יתָ מָלְאָ֥ה הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ קִנְיָנֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: There is the sea, vast and wide, with its creatures beyond number, living things, small and great.
verses.text_he: זֶ֤ה׀ הַיָּ֥ם גָּדוֹל֮ וּרְחַ֢ב יָ֫דָ֥יִם שָֽׁם־רֶ֭מֶשׂ וְאֵ֣ין מִסְפָּ֑ר חַיּ֥וֹת קְ֝טַנּ֗וֹת עִם־גְּדֹלֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: There go the ships, and Leviathan that You formed to sport with.
verses.text_he: שָׁ֭ם אֳנִיּ֣וֹת יְהַלֵּכ֑וּן לִ֝וְיָתָ֗ן זֶֽה־יָצַ֥רְתָּ לְשַֽׂחֶק־בּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: All of them look to You to give them their food when it is due.
verses.text_he: כֻּ֭לָּם אֵלֶ֣יךָ יְשַׂבֵּר֑וּן לָתֵ֖ת אׇכְלָ֣ם בְּעִתּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Give it to them, they gather it up; open Your hand, they are well satisfied;
verses.text_he: תִּתֵּ֣ן לָ֭הֶם יִלְקֹט֑וּן תִּפְתַּ֥ח יָ֝דְךָ֗ יִשְׂבְּע֥וּן טֽוֹב׃

verses.text_en: hide Your face, they are terrified; take away their breath, they perish and turn again into dust;
verses.text_he: תַּסְתִּ֥יר פָּנֶיךָ֮ יִֽבָּהֵ֫ל֥וּן תֹּסֵ֣ף ר֭וּחָם יִגְוָע֑וּן וְֽאֶל־עֲפָרָ֥ם יְשׁוּבֽוּן׃

verses.text_en: send back Your breath, they are created, and You renew the face of the earth.
verses.text_he: תְּשַׁלַּ֣ח ר֭וּחֲךָ יִבָּרֵא֑וּן וּ֝תְחַדֵּ֗שׁ פְּנֵ֣י אֲדָמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: May the glory of the LORD endure forever; may the LORD rejoice in His works!
verses.text_he: יְהִ֤י כְב֣וֹד יְהֹוָ֣ה לְעוֹלָ֑ם יִשְׂמַ֖ח יְהֹוָ֣ה בְּמַעֲשָֽׂיו׃

verses.text_en: He looks at the earth and it trembles; He touches the mountains and they smoke.
verses.text_he: הַמַּבִּ֣יט לָ֭אָרֶץ וַתִּרְעָ֑ד יִגַּ֖ע בֶּהָרִ֣ים וְֽיֶעֱשָֽׁנוּ׃

verses.text_en: I will sing to the LORD as long as I live; all my life I will chant hymns to my God.
verses.text_he: אָשִׁ֣ירָה לַיהֹוָ֣ה בְּחַיָּ֑י אֲזַמְּרָ֖ה לֵאלֹהַ֣י בְּעוֹדִֽי׃

verses.text_en: May my prayer be pleasing to Him; I will rejoice in the LORD.
verses.text_he: יֶעֱרַ֣ב עָלָ֣יו שִׂיחִ֑י אָ֝נֹכִ֗י אֶשְׂמַ֥ח בַּיהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: May sinners disappear from the earth, and the wicked be no more. Bless the LORD, O my soul. Hallelujah.
verses.text_he: יִתַּ֤מּוּ חַטָּאִ֨ים׀ מִן־הָאָ֡רֶץ וּרְשָׁעִ֤ים׀ ע֤וֹד אֵינָ֗ם בָּרְכִ֣י נַ֭פְשִׁי אֶת־יְהֹוָ֗ה הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Praise the LORD; call on His name; proclaim His deeds among the peoples.
verses.text_he: הוֹד֣וּ לַ֭יהֹוָה קִרְא֣וּ בִשְׁמ֑וֹ הוֹדִ֥יעוּ בָ֝עַמִּ֗ים עֲלִילוֹתָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: Sing praises to Him; speak of all His wondrous acts.
verses.text_he: שִֽׁירוּ־ל֭וֹ זַמְּרוּ־ל֑וֹ שִׂ֝֗יחוּ בְּכׇל־נִפְלְאוֹתָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: Exult in His holy name; let all who seek the LORD rejoice.
verses.text_he: הִֽ֭תְהַלְלוּ בְּשֵׁ֣ם קׇדְשׁ֑וֹ יִ֝שְׂמַ֗ח לֵ֤ב׀ מְבַקְשֵׁ֬י יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Turn to the LORD, to His might; seek His presence constantly.
verses.text_he: דִּרְשׁ֣וּ יְהֹוָ֣ה וְעֻזּ֑וֹ בַּקְּשׁ֖וּ פָנָ֣יו תָּמִֽיד׃

verses.text_en: Remember the wonders He has done, His portents and the judgments He has pronounced,
verses.text_he: זִכְר֗וּ נִפְלְאוֹתָ֥יו אֲשֶׁר־עָשָׂ֑ה מֹ֝פְתָ֗יו וּמִשְׁפְּטֵי־פִֽיו׃

verses.text_en: O offspring of Abraham, His servant, O descendants of Jacob, His chosen ones.
verses.text_he: זֶ֭רַע אַבְרָהָ֣ם עַבְדּ֑וֹ בְּנֵ֖י יַעֲקֹ֣ב בְּחִירָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: He is the LORD our God; His judgments are throughout the earth.
verses.text_he: ה֭וּא יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ בְּכׇל־הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ מִשְׁפָּטָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: He is ever mindful of His covenant, the promise He gave for a thousand generations,
verses.text_he: זָכַ֣ר לְעוֹלָ֣ם בְּרִית֑וֹ דָּבָ֥ר צִ֝וָּ֗ה לְאֶ֣לֶף דּֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: that He made with Abraham, swore to Isaac,
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֣ר כָּ֭רַת אֶת־אַבְרָהָ֑ם וּשְׁב֖וּעָת֣וֹ לְיִשְׂחָֽק׃

verses.text_en: and confirmed in a decree for Jacob, for Israel, as an eternal covenant,
verses.text_he: וַיַּעֲמִידֶ֣הָ לְיַעֲקֹ֣ב לְחֹ֑ק לְ֝יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל בְּרִ֣ית עוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: saying, “To you I will give the land of Canaan as your allotted heritage.”
verses.text_he: לֵאמֹ֗ר לְךָ֗ אֶתֵּ֥ן אֶת־אֶֽרֶץ־כְּנָ֑עַן חֶ֝֗בֶל נַחֲלַתְכֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: They were then few in number, a mere handful, sojourning there,
verses.text_he: בִּֽ֭הְיוֹתָם מְתֵ֣י מִסְפָּ֑ר כִּ֝מְעַ֗ט וְגָרִ֥ים בָּֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: wandering from nation to nation, from one kingdom to another.
verses.text_he: וַ֭יִּֽתְהַלְּכוּ מִגּ֣וֹי אֶל־גּ֑וֹי מִ֝מַּמְלָכָ֗ה אֶל־עַ֥ם אַחֵֽר׃

verses.text_en: He allowed no one to oppress them; He reproved kings on their account,
verses.text_he: לֹא־הִנִּ֣יחַ אָדָ֣ם לְעׇשְׁקָ֑ם וַיּ֖וֹכַח עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם מְלָכִֽים׃

verses.text_en: “Do not touch My anointed ones; do not harm My prophets.”
verses.text_he: אַֽל־תִּגְּע֥וּ בִמְשִׁיחָ֑י וְ֝לִנְבִיאַ֗י אַל־תָּרֵֽעוּ׃

verses.text_en: He called down a famine on the land, destroyed every staff of bread.
verses.text_he: וַיִּקְרָ֣א רָ֭עָב עַל־הָאָ֑רֶץ כׇּֽל־מַטֵּה־לֶ֥חֶם שָׁבָֽר׃

verses.text_en: He sent ahead of them a man, Joseph, sold into slavery.
verses.text_he: שָׁלַ֣ח לִפְנֵיהֶ֣ם אִ֑ישׁ לְ֝עֶ֗בֶד נִמְכַּ֥ר יוֹסֵֽף׃

verses.text_en: His feet were subjected to fetters; an iron collar was put on his neck.
verses.text_he: עִנּ֣וּ בַכֶּ֣בֶל (רגליו) [רַגְל֑וֹ] בַּ֝רְזֶ֗ל בָּ֣אָה נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Until his prediction came true the decree of the LORD purged him.
verses.text_he: עַד־עֵ֥ת בֹּא־דְבָר֑וֹ אִמְרַ֖ת יְהֹוָ֣ה צְרָפָֽתְהוּ׃

verses.text_en: The king sent to have him freed; the ruler of nations released him.
verses.text_he: שָׁ֣לַח מֶ֭לֶךְ וַיַּתִּירֵ֑הוּ מֹשֵׁ֥ל עַ֝מִּ֗ים וַֽיְפַתְּחֵֽהוּ׃

verses.text_en: He made him the lord of his household, empowered him over all his possessions,
verses.text_he: שָׂמ֣וֹ אָד֣וֹן לְבֵית֑וֹ וּ֝מֹשֵׁ֗ל בְּכׇל־קִנְיָנֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: to discipline his princes at will, to teach his elders wisdom.
verses.text_he: לֶאְסֹ֣ר שָׂרָ֣יו בְּנַפְשׁ֑וֹ וּזְקֵנָ֥יו יְחַכֵּֽם׃

verses.text_en: Then Israel came to Egypt; Jacob sojourned in the land of Ham.
verses.text_he: וַיָּבֹ֣א יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל מִצְרָ֑יִם וְ֝יַעֲקֹ֗ב גָּ֣ר בְּאֶֽרֶץ־חָֽם׃

verses.text_en: He made His people very fruitful, more numerous than their foes.
verses.text_he: וַיֶּ֣פֶר אֶת־עַמּ֣וֹ מְאֹ֑ד וַ֝יַּעֲצִמֵ֗הוּ מִצָּרָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: He changed their heart to hate His people, to plot against His servants.
verses.text_he: הָפַ֣ךְ לִ֭בָּם לִשְׂנֹ֣א עַמּ֑וֹ לְ֝הִתְנַכֵּ֗ל בַּעֲבָדָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: He sent His servant Moses, and Aaron, whom He had chosen.
verses.text_he: שָׁ֭לַח מֹשֶׁ֣ה עַבְדּ֑וֹ אַ֝הֲרֹ֗ן אֲשֶׁ֣ר בָּחַר־בּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: They performed His signs among them, His wonders, against the land of Ham.
verses.text_he: שָֽׂמוּ־בָ֭ם דִּבְרֵ֣י אֹתוֹתָ֑יו וּ֝מֹפְתִ֗ים בְּאֶ֣רֶץ חָֽם׃

verses.text_en: He sent darkness; it was very dark; did they not defy His word?
verses.text_he: שָׁ֣לַֽח חֹ֭שֶׁךְ וַיַּחְשִׁ֑ךְ וְלֹא־מָ֝ר֗וּ אֶת־[דְּבָרֽוֹ] (דבריו)׃

verses.text_en: He turned their waters into blood and killed their fish.
verses.text_he: הָפַ֣ךְ אֶת־מֵימֵיהֶ֣ם לְדָ֑ם וַ֝יָּ֗מֶת אֶת־דְּגָתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Their land teemed with frogs, even the rooms of their king.
verses.text_he: שָׁרַ֣ץ אַרְצָ֣ם צְפַרְדְּעִ֑ים בְּ֝חַדְרֵ֗י מַלְכֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: Swarms of insects came at His command, lice, throughout their country.
verses.text_he: אָ֭מַר וַיָּבֹ֣א עָרֹ֑ב כִּ֝נִּ֗ים בְּכׇל־גְּבוּלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: He gave them hail for rain, and flaming fire in their land.
verses.text_he: נָתַ֣ן גִּשְׁמֵיהֶ֣ם בָּרָ֑ד אֵ֖שׁ לֶהָב֣וֹת בְּאַרְצָֽם׃

verses.text_en: He struck their vines and fig trees, broke down the trees of their country.
verses.text_he: וַיַּ֣ךְ גַּ֭פְנָם וּתְאֵנָתָ֑ם וַ֝יְשַׁבֵּ֗ר עֵ֣ץ גְּבוּלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Locusts came at His command, grasshoppers without number.
verses.text_he: אָ֭מַר וַיָּבֹ֣א אַרְבֶּ֑ה וְ֝יֶ֗לֶק וְאֵ֣ין מִסְפָּֽר׃

verses.text_en: They devoured every green thing in the land; they consumed the produce of the soil.
verses.text_he: וַיֹּ֣אכַל כׇּל־עֵ֣שֶׂב בְּאַרְצָ֑ם וַ֝יֹּ֗אכַל פְּרִ֣י אַדְמָתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: He struck down every first-born in the land, the first fruit of their vigor.
verses.text_he: וַיַּ֣ךְ כׇּל־בְּכ֣וֹר בְּאַרְצָ֑ם רֵ֝אשִׁ֗ית לְכׇל־אוֹנָֽם׃

verses.text_en: He led Israel out with silver and gold; none among their tribes faltered.
verses.text_he: וַֽ֭יּוֹצִיאֵם בְּכֶ֣סֶף וְזָהָ֑ב וְאֵ֖ין בִּשְׁבָטָ֣יו כּוֹשֵֽׁל׃

verses.text_en: Egypt rejoiced when they left, for dread of Israel had fallen upon them.
verses.text_he: שָׂמַ֣ח מִצְרַ֣יִם בְּצֵאתָ֑ם כִּֽי־נָפַ֖ל פַּחְדָּ֣ם עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: He spread a cloud for a cover, and fire to light up the night.
verses.text_he: פָּרַ֣שׂ עָנָ֣ן לְמָסָ֑ךְ וְ֝אֵ֗שׁ לְהָאִ֥יר לָֽיְלָה׃

verses.text_en: They asked and He brought them quail, and satisfied them with food from heaven.
verses.text_he: שָׁ֭אַל וַיָּבֵ֣א שְׂלָ֑ו וְלֶ֥חֶם שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם יַשְׂבִּיעֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: He opened a rock so that water gushed forth; it flowed as a stream in the parched land.
verses.text_he: פָּ֣תַח צ֭וּר וַיָּז֣וּבוּ מָ֑יִם הָ֝לְכ֗וּ בַּצִּיּ֥וֹת נָהָֽר׃

verses.text_en: Mindful of His sacred promise to His servant Abraham,
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־זָ֭כַר אֶת־דְּבַ֣ר קׇדְשׁ֑וֹ אֶֽת־אַבְרָהָ֥ם עַבְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: He led His people out in gladness, His chosen ones with joyous song.
verses.text_he: וַיּוֹצִ֣א עַמּ֣וֹ בְשָׂשׂ֑וֹן בְּ֝רִנָּ֗ה אֶת־בְּחִירָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: He gave them the lands of nations; they inherited the wealth of peoples,
verses.text_he: וַיִּתֵּ֣ן לָ֭הֶם אַרְצ֣וֹת גּוֹיִ֑ם וַעֲמַ֖ל לְאֻמִּ֣ים יִירָֽשׁוּ׃

verses.text_en: that they might keep His laws and observe His teachings. Hallelujah.
verses.text_he: בַּעֲב֤וּר׀ יִשְׁמְר֣וּ חֻ֭קָּיו וְתוֹרֹתָ֥יו יִנְצֹ֗רוּ הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Hallelujah. Praise the LORD for He is good; His steadfast love is eternal.
verses.text_he: הַ֥לְלוּ־יָ֨הּ׀ הוֹד֣וּ לַיהֹוָ֣ה כִּי־ט֑וֹב כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Who can tell the mighty acts of the LORD, proclaim all His praises?
verses.text_he: מִ֗י יְ֭מַלֵּל גְּבוּר֣וֹת יְהֹוָ֑ה יַ֝שְׁמִ֗יעַ כׇּל־תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Happy are those who act justly, who do right at all times.
verses.text_he: אַ֭שְׁרֵי שֹׁמְרֵ֣י מִשְׁפָּ֑ט עֹשֵׂ֖ה צְדָקָ֣ה בְכׇל־עֵֽת׃

verses.text_en: Be mindful of me, O LORD, when You favor Your people; take note of me when You deliver them,
verses.text_he: זׇכְרֵ֣נִי יְ֭הֹוָה בִּרְצ֣וֹן עַמֶּ֑ךָ פׇּ֝קְדֵ֗נִי בִּישׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: that I may enjoy the prosperity of Your chosen ones, share the joy of Your nation, glory in Your very own people.
verses.text_he: לִרְא֤וֹת׀ בְּט֘וֹבַ֤ת בְּחִירֶ֗יךָ לִ֭שְׂמֹחַ בְּשִׂמְחַ֣ת גּוֹיֶ֑ךָ לְ֝הִתְהַלֵּ֗ל עִם־נַחֲלָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: We have sinned like our forefathers; we have gone astray, done evil.
verses.text_he: חָטָ֥אנוּ עִם־אֲבוֹתֵ֗ינוּ הֶעֱוִ֥ינוּ הִרְשָֽׁעְנוּ׃

verses.text_en: Our forefathers in Egypt did not perceive Your wonders; they did not remember Your abundant love, but rebelled at the sea, at the Sea of Reeds.
verses.text_he: אֲב֘וֹתֵ֤ינוּ בְמִצְרַ֨יִם׀ לֹא־הִשְׂכִּ֬ילוּ נִפְלְאוֹתֶ֗יךָ לֹ֣א זָ֭כְרוּ אֶת־רֹ֣ב חֲסָדֶ֑יךָ וַיַּמְר֖וּ עַל־יָ֣ם בְּיַם־סֽוּף׃

verses.text_en: Yet He saved them, as befits His name, to make known His might.
verses.text_he: וַֽ֭יּוֹשִׁיעֵם לְמַ֣עַן שְׁמ֑וֹ לְ֝הוֹדִ֗יעַ אֶת־גְּבוּרָתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: He sent His blast against the Sea of Reeds; it became dry; He led them through the deep as through a wilderness.
verses.text_he: וַיִּגְעַ֣ר בְּיַם־ס֭וּף וַֽיֶּחֱרָ֑ב וַיּוֹלִיכֵ֥ם בַּ֝תְּהֹמ֗וֹת כַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃

verses.text_en: He delivered them from the foe, redeemed them from the enemy.
verses.text_he: וַֽ֭יּוֹשִׁיעֵם מִיַּ֣ד שׂוֹנֵ֑א וַ֝יִּגְאָלֵ֗ם מִיַּ֥ד אוֹיֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: Water covered their adversaries; not one of them was left.
verses.text_he: וַיְכַסּוּ־מַ֥יִם צָרֵיהֶ֑ם אֶחָ֥ד מֵ֝הֶ֗ם לֹ֣א נוֹתָֽר׃

verses.text_en: Then they believed His promise, and sang His praises.
verses.text_he: וַיַּאֲמִ֥ינוּ בִדְבָרָ֑יו יָ֝שִׁ֗ירוּ תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: But they soon forgot His deeds; they would not wait to learn His plan.
verses.text_he: מִ֭הֲרוּ שָׁכְח֣וּ מַעֲשָׂ֑יו לֹא־חִ֝כּ֗וּ לַעֲצָתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: They were seized with craving in the wilderness, and put God to the test in the wasteland.
verses.text_he: וַיִּתְאַוּ֣וּ תַ֭אֲוָה בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר וַיְנַסּוּ־אֵ֝֗ל בִּישִׁימֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: He gave them what they asked for, then made them waste away.
verses.text_he: וַיִּתֵּ֣ן לָ֭הֶם שֶׁאֱלָתָ֑ם וַיְשַׁלַּ֖ח רָז֣וֹן בְּנַפְשָֽׁם׃

verses.text_en: There was envy of Moses in the camp, and of Aaron, the holy one of the LORD.
verses.text_he: וַיְקַנְא֣וּ לְ֭מֹשֶׁה בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה לְ֝אַהֲרֹ֗ן קְד֣וֹשׁ יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: The earth opened up and swallowed Dathan, closed over the party of Abiram.
verses.text_he: תִּפְתַּח־אֶ֭רֶץ וַתִּבְלַ֣ע דָּתָ֑ן וַ֝תְּכַ֗ס עַל־עֲדַ֥ת אֲבִירָֽם׃

verses.text_en: A fire blazed among their party, a flame that consumed the wicked.
verses.text_he: וַתִּבְעַר־אֵ֥שׁ בַּעֲדָתָ֑ם לֶ֝הָבָ֗ה תְּלַהֵ֥ט רְשָׁעִֽים׃

verses.text_en: They made a calf at Horeb and bowed down to a molten image.
verses.text_he: יַעֲשׂוּ־עֵ֥גֶל בְּחֹרֵ֑ב וַ֝יִּשְׁתַּחֲו֗וּ לְמַסֵּכָֽה׃

verses.text_en: They exchanged their glory for the image of a bull that feeds on grass.
verses.text_he: וַיָּמִ֥ירוּ אֶת־כְּבוֹדָ֑ם בְּתַבְנִ֥ית שׁ֝֗וֹר אֹכֵ֥ל עֵֽשֶׂב׃

verses.text_en: They forgot God who saved them, who performed great deeds in Egypt,
verses.text_he: שָׁ֭כְחוּ אֵ֣ל מוֹשִׁיעָ֑ם עֹשֶׂ֖ה גְדֹל֣וֹת בְּמִצְרָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: wondrous deeds in the land of Ham, awesome deeds at the Sea of Reeds.
verses.text_he: נִ֭פְלָאוֹת בְּאֶ֣רֶץ חָ֑ם נ֝וֹרָא֗וֹת עַל־יַם־סֽוּף׃

verses.text_en: He would have destroyed them had not Moses His chosen one confronted Him in the breach to avert His destructive wrath.
verses.text_he: וַיֹּ֗אמֶר לְֽהַשְׁמִ֫ידָ֥ם לוּלֵ֡י מֹ֘שֶׁ֤ה בְחִיר֗וֹ עָמַ֣ד בַּפֶּ֣רֶץ לְפָנָ֑יו לְהָשִׁ֥יב חֲ֝מָת֗וֹ מֵהַשְׁחִֽית׃

verses.text_en: They rejected the desirable land, and put no faith in His promise.
verses.text_he: וַֽ֭יִּמְאֲסוּ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ חֶמְדָּ֑ה לֹא־הֶ֝אֱמִ֗ינוּ לִדְבָרֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: They grumbled in their tents and disobeyed the LORD.
verses.text_he: וַיֵּרָגְנ֥וּ בְאׇהֳלֵיהֶ֑ם לֹ֥א שָׁ֝מְע֗וּ בְּק֣וֹל יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: So He raised His hand in oath to make them fall in the wilderness,
verses.text_he: וַיִּשָּׂ֣א יָד֣וֹ לָהֶ֑ם לְהַפִּ֥יל א֝וֹתָ֗ם בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃

verses.text_en: to disperse their offspring among the nations and scatter them through the lands.
verses.text_he: וּלְהַפִּ֣יל זַ֭רְעָם בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם וּ֝לְזָרוֹתָ֗ם בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: They attached themselves to Baal Peor, ate sacrifices offered to the dead.
verses.text_he: וַ֭יִּצָּ֣מְדוּ לְבַ֣עַל פְּע֑וֹר וַ֝יֹּאכְל֗וּ זִבְחֵ֥י מֵתִֽים׃

verses.text_en: They provoked anger by their deeds, and a plague broke out among them.
verses.text_he: וַ֭יַּכְעִיסוּ בְּמַ֥עַלְלֵיהֶ֑ם וַתִּפְרׇץ־בָּ֝֗ם מַגֵּפָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Phinehas stepped forth and intervened, and the plague ceased.
verses.text_he: וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד פִּֽ֭ינְחָס וַיְפַלֵּ֑ל וַ֝תֵּעָצַ֗ר הַמַּגֵּפָֽה׃

verses.text_en: It was reckoned to his merit for all generations, to eternity.
verses.text_he: וַתֵּחָ֣שֶׁב ל֭וֹ לִצְדָקָ֑ה לְדֹ֥ר וָ֝דֹ֗ר עַד־עוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: They provoked wrath at the waters of Meribah and Moses suffered on their account,
verses.text_he: וַ֭יַּקְצִיפוּ עַל־מֵ֥י מְרִיבָ֑ה וַיֵּ֥רַע לְ֝מֹשֶׁ֗ה בַּעֲבוּרָֽם׃

verses.text_en: because they rebelled against Him and he spoke rashly.
verses.text_he: כִּי־הִמְר֥וּ אֶת־רוּח֑וֹ וַ֝יְבַטֵּ֗א בִּשְׂפָתָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: They did not destroy the nations as the LORD had commanded them,
verses.text_he: לֹֽא־הִ֭שְׁמִידוּ אֶת־הָעַמִּ֑ים אֲשֶׁ֤ר אָמַ֖ר יְהֹוָ֣ה לָהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: but mingled with the nations and learned their ways.
verses.text_he: וַיִּתְעָרְב֥וּ בַגּוֹיִ֑ם וַֽ֝יִּלְמְד֗וּ מַעֲשֵׂיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: They worshiped their idols, which became a snare for them.
verses.text_he: וַיַּעַבְד֥וּ אֶת־עֲצַבֵּיהֶ֑ם וַיִּהְי֖וּ לָהֶ֣ם לְמוֹקֵֽשׁ׃

verses.text_en: Their own sons and daughters they sacrificed to demons.
verses.text_he: וַיִּזְבְּח֣וּ אֶת־בְּ֭נֵיהֶם וְאֶת־בְּנוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם לַשֵּׁדִֽים׃

verses.text_en: They shed innocent blood, the blood of their sons and daughters, whom they sacrificed to the idols of Canaan; so the land was polluted with bloodguilt.
verses.text_he: וַיִּ֥שְׁפְּכ֨וּ דָ֪ם נָקִ֡י דַּם־בְּנֵ֘יהֶ֤ם וּֽבְנוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם אֲשֶׁ֣ר זִ֭בְּחוּ לַעֲצַבֵּ֣י כְנָ֑עַן וַתֶּחֱנַ֥ף הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ בַּדָּמִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Thus they became defiled by their acts, debauched through their deeds.
verses.text_he: וַיִּטְמְא֥וּ בְמַעֲשֵׂיהֶ֑ם וַ֝יִּזְנ֗וּ בְּמַ֥עַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: The LORD was angry with His people and He abhorred His inheritance.
verses.text_he: וַיִּחַר־אַ֣ף יְהֹוָ֣ה בְּעַמּ֑וֹ וַ֝יְתָעֵ֗ב אֶת־נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: He handed them over to the nations; their foes ruled them.
verses.text_he: וַיִּתְּנֵ֥ם בְּיַד־גּוֹיִ֑ם וַֽיִּמְשְׁל֥וּ בָ֝הֶ֗ם שֹׂנְאֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: Their enemies oppressed them and they were subject to their power.
verses.text_he: וַיִּלְחָצ֥וּם אוֹיְבֵיהֶ֑ם וַ֝יִּכָּנְע֗וּ תַּ֣חַת יָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: He saved them time and again, but they were deliberately rebellious, and so they were brought low by their iniquity.
verses.text_he: פְּעָמִ֥ים רַבּ֗וֹת יַצִּ֫ילֵ֥ם וְ֭הֵמָּה יַמְר֣וּ בַעֲצָתָ֑ם וַ֝יָּמֹ֗כּוּ בַּעֲוֺנָֽם׃

verses.text_en: When He saw that they were in distress, when He heard their cry,
verses.text_he: וַ֭יַּרְא בַּצַּ֣ר לָהֶ֑ם בְּ֝שׇׁמְע֗וֹ אֶת־רִנָּתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: He was mindful of His covenant and in His great faithfulness relented.
verses.text_he: וַיִּזְכֹּ֣ר לָהֶ֣ם בְּרִית֑וֹ וַ֝יִּנָּחֵ֗ם כְּרֹ֣ב חֲסָדָֽו׃

verses.text_en: He made all their captors kindly disposed toward them.
verses.text_he: וַיִּתֵּ֣ן אוֹתָ֣ם לְרַחֲמִ֑ים לִ֝פְנֵ֗י כׇּל־שׁוֹבֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: Deliver us, O LORD our God, and gather us from among the nations, to acclaim Your holy name, to glory in Your praise.
verses.text_he: הֽוֹשִׁיעֵ֨נוּ׀ יְ֘הֹוָ֤ה אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ וְקַבְּצֵנוּ֮ מִֽן־הַגּ֫וֹיִ֥ם לְ֭הֹדוֹת לְשֵׁ֣ם קׇדְשֶׁ֑ךָ לְ֝הִשְׁתַּבֵּ֗חַ בִּתְהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Blessed is the LORD, God of Israel, From eternity to eternity. Let all the people say, “Amen.” Hallelujah.
verses.text_he: בָּ֤רֽוּךְ־יְהֹוָ֨ה אֱלֹהֵ֪י יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל מִן־הָ֤עוֹלָ֨ם׀ וְעַ֬ד הָעוֹלָ֗ם וְאָמַ֖ר כׇּל־הָעָ֥ם אָמֵ֗ן הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: “Praise the LORD, for He is good; His steadfast love is eternal!”
verses.text_he: הֹד֣וּ לַיהֹוָ֣ה כִּי־ט֑וֹב כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Thus let the redeemed of the LORD say, those He redeemed from adversity,
verses.text_he: יֹ֭אמְרוּ גְּאוּלֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה אֲשֶׁ֥ר גְּ֝אָלָ֗ם מִיַּד־צָֽר׃

verses.text_en: whom He gathered in from the lands, from east and west, from the north and from the sea.
verses.text_he: וּֽמֵאֲרָצ֗וֹת קִ֫בְּצָ֥ם מִמִּזְרָ֥ח וּמִֽמַּעֲרָ֑ב מִצָּפ֥וֹן וּמִיָּֽם׃

verses.text_en: Some lost their way in the wilderness, in the wasteland; they found no settled place.
verses.text_he: תָּע֣וּ בַ֭מִּדְבָּר בִּישִׁימ֣וֹן דָּ֑רֶךְ עִ֥יר מ֝וֹשָׁ֗ב לֹ֣א מָצָֽאוּ׃

verses.text_en: Hungry and thirsty, their spirit failed.
verses.text_he: רְעֵבִ֥ים גַּם־צְמֵאִ֑ים נַ֝פְשָׁ֗ם בָּהֶ֥ם תִּתְעַטָּֽף׃

verses.text_en: In their adversity they cried to the LORD, and He rescued them from their troubles.
verses.text_he: וַיִּצְעֲק֣וּ אֶל־יְ֭הֹוָה בַּצַּ֣ר לָהֶ֑ם מִ֝מְּצ֥וּקוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם יַצִּילֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: He showed them a direct way to reach a settled place.
verses.text_he: וַֽ֭יַּדְרִיכֵם בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ יְשָׁרָ֑ה לָ֝לֶ֗כֶת אֶל־עִ֥יר מוֹשָֽׁב׃

verses.text_en: Let them praise the LORD for His steadfast love, His wondrous deeds for mankind;
verses.text_he: יוֹד֣וּ לַיהֹוָ֣ה חַסְדּ֑וֹ וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו לִבְנֵ֥י אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: for He has satisfied the thirsty, filled the hungry with all good things.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־הִ֭שְׂבִּיעַ נֶ֣פֶשׁ שֹׁקֵקָ֑ה וְנֶ֥פֶשׁ רְ֝עֵבָ֗ה מִלֵּא־טֽוֹב׃

verses.text_en: Some lived in deepest darkness, bound in cruel irons,
verses.text_he: יֹ֭שְׁבֵי חֹ֣שֶׁךְ וְצַלְמָ֑וֶת אֲסִירֵ֖י עֳנִ֣י וּבַרְזֶֽל׃

verses.text_en: because they defied the word of God, spurned the counsel of the Most High.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־הִמְר֥וּ אִמְרֵי־אֵ֑ל וַעֲצַ֖ת עֶלְי֣וֹן נָאָֽצוּ׃

verses.text_en: He humbled their hearts through suffering; they stumbled with no one to help.
verses.text_he: וַיַּכְנַ֣ע בֶּעָמָ֣ל לִבָּ֑ם כָּ֝שְׁל֗וּ וְאֵ֣ין עֹזֵֽר׃

verses.text_en: In their adversity they cried to the LORD, and He rescued them from their troubles.
verses.text_he: וַיִּזְעֲק֣וּ אֶל־יְ֭הֹוָה בַּצַּ֣ר לָהֶ֑ם מִ֝מְּצֻ֥קוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם יוֹשִׁיעֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: He brought them out of deepest darkness, broke their bonds asunder.
verses.text_he: י֭וֹצִיאֵם מֵחֹ֣שֶׁךְ וְצַלְמָ֑וֶת וּמוֹסְר֖וֹתֵיהֶ֣ם יְנַתֵּֽק׃

verses.text_en: Let them praise the LORD for His steadfast love, His wondrous deeds for mankind;
verses.text_he: יוֹד֣וּ לַיהֹוָ֣ה חַסְדּ֑וֹ וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו לִבְנֵ֥י אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: for He shattered gates of bronze, He broke their iron bars.
verses.text_he: כִּי־שִׁ֭בַּר דַּלְת֣וֹת נְחֹ֑שֶׁת וּבְרִיחֵ֖י בַרְזֶ֣ל גִּדֵּֽעַ׃

verses.text_en: There were fools who suffered for their sinful way, and for their iniquities.
verses.text_he: אֱ֭וִלִים מִדֶּ֣רֶךְ פִּשְׁעָ֑ם וּֽ֝מֵעֲוֺ֥נֹתֵיהֶ֗ם יִתְעַנּֽוּ׃

verses.text_en: All food was loathsome to them; they reached the gates of death.
verses.text_he: כׇּל־אֹ֭כֶל תְּתַעֵ֣ב נַפְשָׁ֑ם וַ֝יַּגִּ֗יעוּ עַד־שַׁ֥עֲרֵי מָֽוֶת׃

verses.text_en: In their adversity they cried to the LORD and He saved them from their troubles.
verses.text_he: וַיִּזְעֲק֣וּ אֶל־יְ֭הֹוָה בַּצַּ֣ר לָהֶ֑ם מִ֝מְּצֻ֥קוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם יוֹשִׁיעֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: He gave an order and healed them; He delivered them from the pits.
verses.text_he: יִשְׁלַ֣ח דְּ֭בָרוֹ וְיִרְפָּאֵ֑ם וִ֝ימַלֵּ֗ט מִשְּׁחִֽיתוֹתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Let them praise the LORD for His steadfast love, His wondrous deeds for mankind.
verses.text_he: יוֹד֣וּ לַיהֹוָ֣ה חַסְדּ֑וֹ וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו לִבְנֵ֥י אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Let them offer thanksgiving sacrifices, and tell His deeds in joyful song.
verses.text_he: וְ֭יִזְבְּחוּ זִבְחֵ֣י תוֹדָ֑ה וִיסַפְּר֖וּ מַעֲשָׂ֣יו בְּרִנָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: Others go down to the sea in ships, ply their trade in the mighty waters;
verses.text_he: ׆יוֹרְדֵ֣י הַ֭יָּם בׇּאֳנִיּ֑וֹת עֹשֵׂ֥י מְ֝לָאכָ֗ה בְּמַ֣יִם רַבִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: they have seen the works of the LORD and His wonders in the deep.
verses.text_he: ׆הֵ֣מָּה רָ֭אוּ מַעֲשֵׂ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו בִּמְצוּלָֽה׃

verses.text_en: By His word He raised a storm wind that made the waves surge.
verses.text_he: ׆וַיֹּ֗אמֶר וַֽ֭יַּעֲמֵד ר֣וּחַ סְעָרָ֑ה וַתְּרוֹמֵ֥ם גַּלָּֽיו׃

verses.text_en: Mounting up to the heaven, plunging down to the depths, disgorging in their misery,
verses.text_he: ׆יַעֲל֣וּ שָׁ֭מַיִם יֵרְד֣וּ תְהוֹמ֑וֹת נַ֝פְשָׁ֗ם בְּרָעָ֥ה תִתְמוֹגָֽג׃

verses.text_en: they reeled and staggered like a drunken man, all their skill to no avail.
verses.text_he: ׆יָח֣וֹגּוּ וְ֭יָנוּעוּ כַּשִּׁכּ֑וֹר וְכׇל־חׇ֝כְמָתָ֗ם תִּתְבַּלָּֽע׃

verses.text_en: In their adversity they cried to the LORD, and He saved them from their troubles.
verses.text_he: ׆וַיִּצְעֲק֣וּ אֶל־יְ֭הֹוָה בַּצַּ֣ר לָהֶ֑ם וּֽ֝מִמְּצ֥וּקֹתֵיהֶ֗ם יוֹצִיאֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: He reduced the storm to a whisper; the waves were stilled.
verses.text_he: יָקֵ֣ם סְ֭עָרָה לִדְמָמָ֑ה וַ֝יֶּחֱשׁ֗וּ גַּלֵּיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: They rejoiced when all was quiet, and He brought them to the port they desired.
verses.text_he: וַיִּשְׂמְח֥וּ כִֽי־יִשְׁתֹּ֑קוּ וַ֝יַּנְחֵ֗ם אֶל־מְח֥וֹז חֶפְצָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Let them praise the LORD for His steadfast love, His wondrous deeds for mankind.
verses.text_he: יוֹד֣וּ לַיהֹוָ֣ה חַסְדּ֑וֹ וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו לִבְנֵ֥י אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Let them exalt Him in the congregation of the people, acclaim Him in the assembly of the elders.
verses.text_he: וִֽ֭ירוֹמְמוּהוּ בִּקְהַל־עָ֑ם וּבְמוֹשַׁ֖ב זְקֵנִ֣ים יְהַלְלֽוּהוּ׃

verses.text_en: He turns the rivers into a wilderness, springs of water into thirsty land,
verses.text_he: יָשֵׂ֣ם נְהָר֣וֹת לְמִדְבָּ֑ר וּמֹצָ֥אֵי מַ֝֗יִם לְצִמָּאֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: fruitful land into a salt marsh, because of the wickedness of its inhabitants.
verses.text_he: אֶ֣רֶץ פְּ֭רִי לִמְלֵחָ֑ה מֵ֝רָעַ֗ת י֣וֹשְׁבֵי בָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: He turns the wilderness into pools, parched land into springs of water.
verses.text_he: יָשֵׂ֣ם מִ֭דְבָּר לַאֲגַם־מַ֑יִם וְאֶ֥רֶץ צִ֝יָּ֗ה לְמֹצָ֥אֵי מָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: There He settles the hungry; they build a place to settle in.
verses.text_he: וַיּ֣וֹשֶׁב שָׁ֣ם רְעֵבִ֑ים וַ֝יְכוֹנְנ֗וּ עִ֣יר מוֹשָֽׁב׃

verses.text_en: They sow fields and plant vineyards that yield a fruitful harvest.
verses.text_he: וַיִּזְרְע֣וּ שָׂ֭דוֹת וַיִּטְּע֣וּ כְרָמִ֑ים וַ֝יַּעֲשׂ֗וּ פְּרִ֣י תְבוּאָֽה׃

verses.text_en: He blesses them and they increase greatly; and He does not let their cattle decrease,
verses.text_he: וַיְבָרְכֵ֣ם וַיִּרְבּ֣וּ מְאֹ֑ד וּ֝בְהֶמְתָּ֗ם לֹ֣א יַמְעִֽיט׃

verses.text_en: after they had been few and crushed by oppression, misery, and sorrow.
verses.text_he: וַיִּמְעֲט֥וּ וַיָּשֹׁ֑חוּ מֵעֹ֖צֶר רָעָ֣ה וְיָגֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: He pours contempt on great men and makes them lose their way in trackless deserts;
verses.text_he: ׆שֹׁפֵ֣ךְ בּ֭וּז עַל־נְדִיבִ֑ים וַ֝יַּתְעֵ֗ם בְּתֹ֣הוּ לֹא־דָֽרֶךְ׃

verses.text_en: but the needy He secures from suffering, and increases their families like flocks.
verses.text_he: וַיְשַׂגֵּ֣ב אֶבְי֣וֹן מֵע֑וֹנִי וַיָּ֥שֶׂם כַּ֝צֹּ֗אן מִשְׁפָּחֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: The upright see it and rejoice; the mouth of all wrongdoers is stopped.
verses.text_he: יִרְא֣וּ יְשָׁרִ֣ים וְיִשְׂמָ֑חוּ וְכׇל־עַ֝וְלָ֗ה קָ֣פְצָה פִּֽיהָ׃

verses.text_en: The wise man will take note of these things; he will consider the steadfast love of the LORD.
verses.text_he: מִי־חָכָ֥ם וְיִשְׁמׇר־אֵ֑לֶּה וְ֝יִתְבּוֹנְנ֗וּ חַֽסְדֵ֥י יְהֹוָֽה׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song. A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: שִׁ֖יר מִזְמ֣וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: My heart is firm, O God; I will sing and chant a hymn with all my soul.
verses.text_he: נָכ֣וֹן לִבִּ֣י אֱלֹהִ֑ים אָשִׁ֥ירָה וַ֝אֲזַמְּרָ֗ה אַף־כְּבוֹדִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Awake, O harp and lyre! I will wake the dawn.
verses.text_he: ע֭וּרָֽה הַנֵּ֥בֶל וְכִנּ֗וֹר אָעִ֥ירָה שָּֽׁחַר׃

verses.text_en: I will praise You among the peoples, O LORD, sing a hymn to You among the nations;
verses.text_he: אוֹדְךָ֖ בָעַמִּ֥ים׀יְהֹוָ֑ה וַ֝אֲזַמֶּרְךָ֗ בַּלְאֻמִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: for Your faithfulness is higher than the heavens; Your steadfastness reaches to the sky.
verses.text_he: כִּי־גָד֣וֹל מֵעַל־שָׁמַ֣יִם חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ וְֽעַד־שְׁחָקִ֥ים אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Exalt Yourself over the heavens, O God; let Your glory be over all the earth!
verses.text_he: ר֣וּמָה עַל־שָׁמַ֣יִם אֱלֹהִ֑ים וְעַ֖ל כׇּל־הָאָ֣רֶץ כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: That those whom You love may be rescued, deliver with Your right hand and answer me.
verses.text_he: לְ֭מַעַן יֵחָלְצ֣וּן יְדִידֶ֑יךָ הוֹשִׁ֖יעָה יְמִֽינְךָ֣ וַעֲנֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: God promised in His sanctuary that I would exultingly divide up Shechem, and measure the Valley of Sukkoth;
verses.text_he: אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ דִּבֶּ֥ר בְּקׇדְשׁ֗וֹ אֶ֫עְלֹ֥זָה אֲחַלְּקָ֥ה שְׁכֶ֑ם וְעֵ֖מֶק סֻכּ֣וֹת אֲמַדֵּֽד׃

verses.text_en: Gilead and Manasseh would be mine, Ephraim my chief stronghold, Judah my scepter;
verses.text_he: לִ֤י גִלְעָ֨ד׀ לִ֤י מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה וְ֭אֶפְרַיִם מָע֣וֹז רֹאשִׁ֑י יְ֝הוּדָ֗ה מְחֹקְקִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Moab would be my washbasin; on Edom I would cast my shoe; I would raise a shout over Philistia.
verses.text_he: מוֹאָ֤ב׀ סִ֬יר רַחְצִ֗י עַל־אֱ֭דוֹם אַשְׁלִ֣יךְ נַעֲלִ֑י עֲלֵי־פְ֝לֶ֗שֶׁת אֶתְרוֹעָֽע׃

verses.text_en: Would that I were brought to the bastion! Would that I were led to Edom!
verses.text_he: מִ֣י יֹ֭בִלֵנִי עִ֣יר מִבְצָ֑ר מִ֖י נָחַ֣נִי עַד־אֱדֽוֹם׃

verses.text_en: But You have rejected us, O God; God, You do not march with our armies.
verses.text_he: הֲלֹֽא־אֱלֹהִ֥ים זְנַחְתָּ֑נוּ וְֽלֹא־תֵצֵ֥א אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים בְּצִבְאֹתֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: Grant us Your aid against the foe, for the help of man is worthless.
verses.text_he: הָבָה־לָּ֣נוּ עֶזְרָ֣ת מִצָּ֑ר וְ֝שָׁ֗וְא תְּשׁוּעַ֥ת אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: With God we shall triumph; He will trample our foes.
verses.text_he: בֵּאלֹהִ֥ים נַֽעֲשֶׂה־חָ֑יִל וְ֝ה֗וּא יָב֥וּס צָרֵֽינוּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. Of David. A psalm. O God of my praise, do not keep aloof,
verses.text_he: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ לְדָוִ֣ד מִזְמ֑וֹר אֱלֹהֵ֥י תְ֝הִלָּתִ֗י אַֽל־תֶּחֱרַֽשׁ׃

verses.text_en: for the wicked and the deceitful open their mouth against me; they speak to me with lying tongue.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י פִ֪י רָשָׁ֡ע וּֽפִי־מִ֭רְמָה עָלַ֣י פָּתָ֑חוּ דִּבְּר֥וּ אִ֝תִּ֗י לְשׁ֣וֹן שָֽׁקֶר׃

verses.text_en: They encircle me with words of hate; they attack me without cause.
verses.text_he: וְדִבְרֵ֣י שִׂנְאָ֣ה סְבָב֑וּנִי וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֥וּנִי חִנָּֽם׃

verses.text_en: They answer my love with accusation and I must stand judgment.
verses.text_he: תַּֽחַת־אַהֲבָתִ֥י יִשְׂטְנ֗וּנִי וַאֲנִ֥י תְפִלָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: They repay me with evil for good, with hatred for my love.
verses.text_he: וַיָּ֘שִׂ֤ימוּ עָלַ֣י רָ֭עָה תַּ֣חַת טוֹבָ֑ה וְ֝שִׂנְאָ֗ה תַּ֣חַת אַהֲבָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Appoint a wicked man over him; may an accuser stand at his right side;
verses.text_he: הַפְקֵ֣ד עָלָ֣יו רָשָׁ֑ע וְ֝שָׂטָ֗ן יַעֲמֹ֥ד עַל־יְמִינֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: may he be tried and convicted; may he be judged and found guilty.
verses.text_he: בְּ֭הִשָּׁ֣פְטוֹ יֵצֵ֣א רָשָׁ֑ע וּ֝תְפִלָּת֗וֹ תִּֽהְיֶ֥ה לַחֲטָאָֽה׃

verses.text_en: May his days be few; may another take over his position.
verses.text_he: יִֽהְיוּ־יָמָ֥יו מְעַטִּ֑ים פְּ֝קֻדָּת֗וֹ יִקַּ֥ח אַחֵֽר׃

verses.text_en: May his children be orphans, his wife a widow.
verses.text_he: יִֽהְיוּ־בָנָ֥יו יְתוֹמִ֑ים וְ֝אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ אַלְמָנָֽה׃

verses.text_en: May his children wander from their hovels, begging in search of [bread].
verses.text_he: וְנ֤וֹעַ יָנ֣וּעוּ בָנָ֣יו וְשִׁאֵ֑לוּ וְ֝דָרְשׁ֗וּ מֵחׇרְבֽוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: May his creditor seize all his possessions; may strangers plunder his wealth.
verses.text_he: יְנַקֵּ֣שׁ נ֭וֹשֶׁה לְכׇל־אֲשֶׁר־ל֑וֹ וְיָבֹ֖זּוּ זָרִ֣ים יְגִיעֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: May no one show him mercy; may none pity his orphans;
verses.text_he: אַל־יְהִי־ל֭וֹ מֹשֵׁ֣ךְ חָ֑סֶד וְֽאַל־יְהִ֥י ח֝וֹנֵ֗ן לִֽיתוֹמָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: may his posterity be cut off; may their names be blotted out in the next generation.
verses.text_he: יְהִי־אַחֲרִית֥וֹ לְהַכְרִ֑ית בְּד֥וֹר אַ֝חֵ֗ר יִמַּ֥ח שְׁמָֽם׃

verses.text_en: May God be ever mindful of his father’s iniquity, and may the sin of his mother not be blotted out.
verses.text_he: יִזָּכֵ֤ר׀ עֲוֺ֣ן אֲ֭בֹתָיו אֶל־יְהֹוָ֑ה וְחַטַּ֥את אִ֝מּ֗וֹ אַל־תִּמָּֽח׃

verses.text_en: May the LORD be aware of them always and cause their names to be cut off from the earth,
verses.text_he: יִהְי֣וּ נֶגֶד־יְהֹוָ֣ה תָּמִ֑יד וְיַכְרֵ֖ת מֵאֶ֣רֶץ זִכְרָֽם׃

verses.text_en: because he was not minded to act kindly, and hounded to death the poor and needy man, one crushed in spirit.
verses.text_he: יַ֗עַן אֲשֶׁ֤ר׀ לֹ֥א זָכַר֮ עֲשׂ֢וֹת חָ֥֫סֶד וַיִּרְדֹּ֡ף אִישׁ־עָנִ֣י וְ֭אֶבְיוֹן וְנִכְאֵ֨ה לֵבָ֬ב לְמוֹתֵֽת׃

verses.text_en: He loved to curse—may a curse come upon him! He would not bless—may blessing be far from him!
verses.text_he: וַיֶּאֱהַ֣ב קְ֭לָלָה וַתְּבוֹאֵ֑הוּ וְֽלֹא־חָפֵ֥ץ בִּ֝בְרָכָ֗ה וַתִּרְחַ֥ק מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃

verses.text_en: May he be clothed in a curse like a garment, may it enter his body like water, his bones like oil.
verses.text_he: וַיִּלְבַּ֥שׁ קְלָלָ֗ה כְּמַ֫דּ֥וֹ וַתָּבֹ֣א כַמַּ֣יִם בְּקִרְבּ֑וֹ וְ֝כַשֶּׁ֗מֶן בְּעַצְמוֹתָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: Let it be like the cloak he wraps around him, like the belt he always wears.
verses.text_he: תְּהִי־ל֭וֹ כְּבֶ֣גֶד יַעְטֶ֑ה וּ֝לְמֵ֗זַח תָּמִ֥יד יַחְגְּרֶֽהָ׃

verses.text_en: May the LORD thus repay my accusers, all those who speak evil against me.
verses.text_he: זֹ֤את פְּעֻלַּ֣ת שֹׂ֭טְנַי מֵאֵ֣ת יְהֹוָ֑ה וְהַדֹּבְרִ֥ים רָ֝֗ע עַל־נַפְשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: Now You, O God, my Lord, act on my behalf as befits Your name. Good and faithful as You are, save me.
verses.text_he: וְאַתָּ֤ה׀ יֱ֘הֹוִ֤ה אֲדֹנָ֗י עֲֽשֵׂה־אִ֭תִּי לְמַ֣עַן שְׁמֶ֑ךָ כִּי־ט֥וֹב חַ֝סְדְּךָ֗ הַצִּילֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: For I am poor and needy, and my heart is pierced within me.
verses.text_he: כִּי־עָנִ֣י וְאֶבְי֣וֹן אָנֹ֑כִי וְ֝לִבִּ֗י חָלַ֥ל בְּקִרְבִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: I fade away like a lengthening shadow; I am shaken off like locusts.
verses.text_he: כְּצֵל־כִּנְטוֹת֥וֹ נֶהֱלָ֑כְתִּי נִ֝נְעַ֗רְתִּי כָּאַרְבֶּֽה׃

verses.text_en: My knees give way from fasting; my flesh is lean, has lost its fat.
verses.text_he: בִּ֭רְכַּי כָּשְׁל֣וּ מִצּ֑וֹם וּ֝בְשָׂרִ֗י כָּחַ֥שׁ מִשָּֽׁמֶן׃

verses.text_en: I am the object of their scorn; when they see me, they shake their head.
verses.text_he: וַאֲנִ֤י׀ הָיִ֣יתִי חֶרְפָּ֣ה לָהֶ֑ם יִ֝רְא֗וּנִי יְנִיע֥וּן רֹאשָֽׁם׃

verses.text_en: Help me, O LORD, my God; save me in accord with Your faithfulness,
verses.text_he: עׇ֭זְרֵנִי יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהָ֑י ה֖וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי כְחַסְדֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: that men may know that it is Your hand, that You, O LORD, have done it.
verses.text_he: וְֽ֭יֵדְעוּ כִּי־יָ֣דְךָ זֹּ֑את אַתָּ֖ה יְהֹוָ֣ה עֲשִׂיתָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: Let them curse, but You bless; let them rise up, but come to grief, while Your servant rejoices.
verses.text_he: יְקַֽלְלוּ־הֵמָּה֮ וְאַתָּ֢ה תְבָ֫רֵ֥ךְ קָ֤מוּ׀ וַיֵּבֹ֗שׁוּ וְֽעַבְדְּךָ֥ יִשְׂמָֽח׃

verses.text_en: My accusers shall be clothed in shame, wrapped in their disgrace as in a robe.
verses.text_he: יִלְבְּשׁ֣וּ שׂוֹטְנַ֣י כְּלִמָּ֑ה וְיַעֲט֖וּ כַמְעִ֣יל בׇּשְׁתָּֽם׃

verses.text_en: My mouth shall sing much praise to the LORD; I will acclaim Him in the midst of a throng,
verses.text_he: א֘וֹדֶ֤ה יְהֹוָ֣ה מְאֹ֣ד בְּפִ֑י וּבְת֖וֹךְ רַבִּ֣ים אֲהַלְלֶֽנּוּ׃

verses.text_en: because He stands at the right hand of the needy, to save him from those who would condemn him.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־יַ֭עֲמֹד לִימִ֣ין אֶבְי֑וֹן לְ֝הוֹשִׁ֗יעַ מִשֹּׁפְטֵ֥י נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Of David. A psalm. The LORD said to my lord, “Sit at My right hand while I make your enemies your footstool.”
verses.text_he: לְדָוִ֗ד מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר נְאֻ֤ם יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ לַֽאדֹנִ֗י שֵׁ֥ב לִֽימִינִ֑י עַד־אָשִׁ֥ית אֹ֝יְבֶ֗יךָ הֲדֹ֣ם לְרַגְלֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: The LORD will stretch forth from Zion your mighty scepter; hold sway over your enemies!
verses.text_he: מַטֵּֽה־עֻזְּךָ֗ יִשְׁלַ֣ח יְ֭הֹוָה מִצִּיּ֑וֹן רְ֝דֵ֗ה בְּקֶ֣רֶב אֹיְבֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Your people come forward willingly on your day of battle. In majestic holiness, from the womb, from the dawn, yours was the dew of youth.
verses.text_he: עַמְּךָ֣ נְדָבֹת֮ בְּי֢וֹם חֵ֫ילֶ֥ךָ בְּֽהַדְרֵי־קֹ֭דֶשׁ מֵרֶ֣חֶם מִשְׁחָ֑ר לְ֝ךָ֗ טַ֣ל יַלְדֻתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: The LORD has sworn and will not relent, “You are a priest forever, a rightful king by My decree.”
verses.text_he: נִשְׁבַּ֤ע יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ וְלֹ֥א יִנָּחֵ֗ם אַתָּֽה־כֹהֵ֥ן לְעוֹלָ֑ם עַל־דִּ֝בְרָתִ֗י מַלְכִּי־צֶֽדֶק׃

verses.text_en: The Lord is at your right hand. He crushes kings in the day of His anger.
verses.text_he: אֲדֹנָ֥י עַל־יְמִֽינְךָ֑ מָחַ֖ץ בְּיוֹם־אַפּ֣וֹ מְלָכִֽים׃

verses.text_en: He works judgment upon the nations, heaping up bodies, crushing heads far and wide.
verses.text_he: יָדִ֣ין בַּ֭גּוֹיִם מָלֵ֣א גְוִיּ֑וֹת מָ֥חַץ רֹ֝֗אשׁ עַל־אֶ֥רֶץ רַבָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: He drinks from the stream on his way; therefore he holds his head high.
verses.text_he: מִ֭נַּחַל בַּדֶּ֣רֶךְ יִשְׁתֶּ֑ה עַל־כֵּ֝֗ן יָרִ֥ים רֹֽאשׁ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Hallelujah. I praise the LORD with all my heart in the assembled congregation of the upright.
verses.text_he: הַ֥לְלוּ־יָ֨הּ׀ אוֹדֶ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה בְּכׇל־לֵבָ֑ב בְּס֖וֹד יְשָׁרִ֣ים וְעֵדָֽה׃

verses.text_en: The works of the LORD are great, within reach of all who desire them.
verses.text_he: גְּ֭דֹלִים מַעֲשֵׂ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה דְּ֝רוּשִׁ֗ים לְכׇל־חֶפְצֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: His deeds are splendid and glorious; His beneficence is everlasting;
verses.text_he: הוֹד־וְהָדָ֥ר פׇּעֳל֑וֹ וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ עֹמֶ֥דֶת לָעַֽד׃

verses.text_en: He has won renown for His wonders. The LORD is gracious and compassionate;
verses.text_he: זֵ֣כֶר עָ֭שָׂה לְנִפְלְאוֹתָ֑יו חַנּ֖וּן וְרַח֣וּם יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: He gives food to those who fear Him; He is ever mindful of His covenant.
verses.text_he: טֶ֭רֶף נָתַ֣ן לִירֵאָ֑יו יִזְכֹּ֖ר לְעוֹלָ֣ם בְּרִיתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: He revealed to His people His powerful works, in giving them the heritage of nations.
verses.text_he: כֹּ֣חַ מַ֭עֲשָׂיו הִגִּ֣יד לְעַמּ֑וֹ לָתֵ֥ת לָ֝הֶ֗ם נַחֲלַ֥ת גּוֹיִֽם׃

verses.text_en: His handiwork is truth and justice; all His precepts are enduring,
verses.text_he: מַעֲשֵׂ֣י יָ֭דָיו אֱמֶ֣ת וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט נֶ֝אֱמָנִ֗ים כׇּל־פִּקּוּדָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: well-founded for all eternity, wrought of truth and equity.
verses.text_he: סְמוּכִ֣ים לָעַ֣ד לְעוֹלָ֑ם עֲ֝שׂוּיִ֗ם בֶּאֱמֶ֥ת וְיָשָֽׁר׃

verses.text_en: He sent redemption to His people; He ordained His covenant for all time; His name is holy and awesome.
verses.text_he: פְּד֤וּת׀ שָׁ֘לַ֤ח לְעַמּ֗וֹ צִוָּֽה־לְעוֹלָ֥ם בְּרִית֑וֹ קָד֖וֹשׁ וְנוֹרָ֣א שְׁמֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: The beginning of wisdom is the fear of the LORD; all who practice it gain sound understanding. Praise of Him is everlasting.
verses.text_he: רֵ֘אשִׁ֤ית חׇכְמָ֨ה׀ יִרְאַ֬ת יְהֹוָ֗ה שֵׂ֣כֶל ט֭וֹב לְכׇל־עֹֽשֵׂיהֶ֑ם תְּ֝הִלָּת֗וֹ עֹמֶ֥דֶת לָעַֽד׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Hallelujah. Happy is the man who fears the LORD, who is ardently devoted to His commandments.
verses.text_he: הַ֥לְלוּ־יָ֨הּ׀ אַשְׁרֵי־אִ֭ישׁ יָרֵ֣א אֶת־יְהֹוָ֑ה בְּ֝מִצְוֺתָ֗יו חָפֵ֥ץ מְאֹֽד׃

verses.text_en: His descendants will be mighty in the land, a blessed generation of upright men.
verses.text_he: גִּבּ֣וֹר בָּ֭אָרֶץ יִהְיֶ֣ה זַרְע֑וֹ דּ֖וֹר יְשָׁרִ֣ים יְבֹרָֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: Wealth and riches are in his house, and his beneficence lasts forever.
verses.text_he: הוֹן־וָעֹ֥שֶׁר בְּבֵית֑וֹ וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ עֹמֶ֥דֶת לָעַֽד׃

verses.text_en: A light shines for the upright in the darkness; he is gracious, compassionate, and beneficent.
verses.text_he: זָ֘רַ֤ח בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ א֭וֹר לַיְשָׁרִ֑ים חַנּ֖וּן וְרַח֣וּם וְצַדִּֽיק׃

verses.text_en: All goes well with the man who lends generously, who conducts his affairs with equity.
verses.text_he: טֽוֹב־אִ֭ישׁ חוֹנֵ֣ן וּמַלְוֶ֑ה יְכַלְכֵּ֖ל דְּבָרָ֣יו בְּמִשְׁפָּֽט׃

verses.text_en: He shall never be shaken; the beneficent man will be remembered forever.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־לְעוֹלָ֥ם לֹֽא־יִמּ֑וֹט לְזֵ֥כֶר ע֝וֹלָ֗ם יִהְיֶ֥ה צַדִּֽיק׃

verses.text_en: He is not afraid of evil tidings; his heart is firm, he trusts in the LORD.
verses.text_he: מִשְּׁמוּעָ֣ה רָ֭עָה לֹ֣א יִירָ֑א נָכ֥וֹן לִ֝בּ֗וֹ בָּטֻ֥חַ בַּיהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: His heart is resolute, he is unafraid; in the end he will see the fall of his foes.
verses.text_he: סָמ֣וּךְ לִ֭בּוֹ לֹ֣א יִירָ֑א עַ֖ד אֲשֶׁר־יִרְאֶ֣ה בְצָרָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: He gives freely to the poor; his beneficence lasts forever; his horn is exalted in honor.
verses.text_he: פִּזַּ֤ר׀ נָ֘תַ֤ן לָאֶבְיוֹנִ֗ים צִ֭דְקָתוֹ עֹמֶ֣דֶת לָעַ֑ד קַ֝רְנ֗וֹ תָּר֥וּם בְּכָבֽוֹד׃

verses.text_en: The wicked man shall see it and be vexed; he shall gnash his teeth; his courage shall fail. The desire of the wicked shall come to nothing.
verses.text_he: רָ֘שָׁ֤ע יִרְאֶ֨ה׀ וְכָעָ֗ס שִׁנָּ֣יו יַחֲרֹ֣ק וְנָמָ֑ס תַּאֲוַ֖ת רְשָׁעִ֣ים תֹּאבֵֽד׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Hallelujah. O servants of the LORD, give praise; praise the name of the LORD.
verses.text_he: הַ֥לְלוּ־יָ֨הּ׀ הַ֭לְלוּ עַבְדֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה הַֽ֝לְל֗וּ אֶת־שֵׁ֥ם יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Let the name of the LORD be blessed now and forever.
verses.text_he: יְהִ֤י שֵׁ֣ם יְהֹוָ֣ה מְבֹרָ֑ךְ מֵ֝עַתָּ֗ה וְעַד־עוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: From east to west the name of the LORD is praised.
verses.text_he: מִמִּזְרַח־שֶׁ֥מֶשׁ עַד־מְבוֹא֑וֹ מְ֝הֻלָּ֗ל שֵׁ֣ם יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is exalted above all nations; His glory is above the heavens.
verses.text_he: רָ֖ם עַל־כׇּל־גּוֹיִ֥ם׀יְהֹוָ֑ה עַ֖ל הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Who is like the LORD our God, who, enthroned on high,
verses.text_he: מִ֭י כַּיהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ הַֽמַּגְבִּיהִ֥י לָשָֽׁבֶת׃

verses.text_en: sees what is below, in heaven and on earth?
verses.text_he: הַֽמַּשְׁפִּילִ֥י לִרְא֑וֹת בַּשָּׁמַ֥יִם וּבָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: He raises the poor from the dust, lifts up the needy from the refuse heap
verses.text_he: מְקִ֥ימִ֣י מֵעָפָ֣ר דָּ֑ל מֵ֝אַשְׁפֹּ֗ת יָרִ֥ים אֶבְיֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: to set them with the great, with the great men of His people.
verses.text_he: לְהוֹשִׁיבִ֥י עִם־נְדִיבִ֑ים עִ֝֗ם נְדִיבֵ֥י עַמּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: He sets the childless woman among her household as a happy mother of children. Hallelujah.
verses.text_he: מֽוֹשִׁיבִ֨י׀ עֲקֶ֬רֶת הַבַּ֗יִת אֵֽם־הַבָּנִ֥ים שְׂמֵחָ֗ה הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: When Israel went forth from Egypt, the house of Jacob from a people of strange speech,
verses.text_he: בְּצֵ֣את יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם בֵּ֥ית יַ֝עֲקֹ֗ב מֵעַ֥ם לֹעֵֽז׃

verses.text_en: Judah became His holy one, Israel, His dominion.
verses.text_he: הָיְתָ֣ה יְהוּדָ֣ה לְקׇדְשׁ֑וֹ יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל מַמְשְׁלוֹתָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: The sea saw them and fled, Jordan ran backward,
verses.text_he: הַיָּ֣ם רָ֭אָה וַיָּנֹ֑ס הַ֝יַּרְדֵּ֗ן יִסֹּ֥ב לְאָחֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: mountains skipped like rams, hills like sheep.
verses.text_he: הֶ֭הָרִים רָקְד֣וּ כְאֵילִ֑ים גְּ֝בָע֗וֹת כִּבְנֵי־צֹֽאן׃

verses.text_en: What alarmed you, O sea, that you fled, Jordan, that you ran backward,
verses.text_he: מַה־לְּךָ֣ הַ֭יָּם כִּ֣י תָנ֑וּס הַ֝יַּרְדֵּ֗ן תִּסֹּ֥ב לְאָחֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: mountains, that you skipped like rams, hills, like sheep?
verses.text_he: הֶ֭הָרִים תִּרְקְד֣וּ כְאֵילִ֑ים גְּ֝בָע֗וֹת כִּבְנֵי־צֹֽאן׃

verses.text_en: Tremble, O earth, at the presence of the Lord, at the presence of the God of Jacob,
verses.text_he: מִלִּפְנֵ֣י אָ֭דוֹן ח֣וּלִי אָ֑רֶץ מִ֝לִּפְנֵ֗י אֱל֣וֹהַּ יַעֲקֹֽב׃

verses.text_en: who turned the rock into a pool of water, the flinty rock into a fountain.
verses.text_he: הַהֹפְכִ֣י הַצּ֣וּר אֲגַם־מָ֑יִם חַ֝לָּמִ֗ישׁ לְמַעְיְנוֹ־מָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: Not to us, O LORD, not to us but to Your name bring glory for the sake of Your love and Your faithfulness.
verses.text_he: לֹ֤א לָ֥נוּ יְהֹוָ֗ה לֹ֫א־לָ֥נוּ כִּֽי־לְ֭שִׁמְךָ תֵּ֣ן כָּב֑וֹד עַל־חַ֝סְדְּךָ֗ עַל־אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Let the nations not say, “Where, now, is their God?”
verses.text_he: לָ֭מָּה יֹאמְר֣וּ הַגּוֹיִ֑ם אַיֵּה־נָ֝֗א אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: when our God is in heaven and all that He wills He accomplishes.
verses.text_he: וֵאלֹהֵ֥ינוּ בַשָּׁמָ֑יִם כֹּ֖ל אֲשֶׁר־חָפֵ֣ץ עָשָֽׂה׃

verses.text_en: Their idols are silver and gold, the work of men’s hands.
verses.text_he: עֲֽ֭צַבֵּיהֶם כֶּ֣סֶף וְזָהָ֑ב מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗ה יְדֵ֣י אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: They have mouths, but cannot speak, eyes, but cannot see;
verses.text_he: פֶּֽה־לָ֭הֶם וְלֹ֣א יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ עֵינַ֥יִם לָ֝הֶ֗ם וְלֹ֣א יִרְאֽוּ׃

verses.text_en: they have ears, but cannot hear, noses, but cannot smell;
verses.text_he: אׇזְנַ֣יִם לָ֭הֶם וְלֹ֣א יִשְׁמָ֑עוּ אַ֥ף לָ֝הֶ֗ם וְלֹ֣א יְרִיחֽוּן׃

verses.text_en: they have hands, but cannot touch, feet, but cannot walk; they can make no sound in their throats.
verses.text_he: יְדֵיהֶ֤ם׀ וְלֹ֬א יְמִישׁ֗וּן רַ֭גְלֵיהֶם וְלֹ֣א יְהַלֵּ֑כוּ לֹא־יֶ֝הְגּ֗וּ בִּגְרוֹנָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Those who fashion them, all who trust in them, shall become like them.
verses.text_he: כְּ֭מוֹהֶם יִהְי֣וּ עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם כֹּ֖ל אֲשֶׁר־בֹּטֵ֣חַ בָּהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: O Israel, trust in the LORD! He is their help and shield.
verses.text_he: יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל בְּטַ֣ח בַּיהֹוָ֑ה עֶזְרָ֖ם וּמָגִנָּ֣ם הֽוּא׃

verses.text_en: O house of Aaron, trust in the LORD! He is their help and shield.
verses.text_he: בֵּ֣ית אַ֭הֲרֹן בִּטְח֣וּ בַיהֹוָ֑ה עֶזְרָ֖ם וּמָגִנָּ֣ם הֽוּא׃

verses.text_en: O you who fear the LORD, trust in the LORD! He is their help and shield.
verses.text_he: יִרְאֵ֣י יְ֭הֹוָה בִּטְח֣וּ בַיהֹוָ֑ה עֶזְרָ֖ם וּמָגִנָּ֣ם הֽוּא׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is mindful of us. He will bless us; He will bless the house of Israel; He will bless the house of Aaron;
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָה֮ זְכָרָ֢נוּ יְבָ֫רֵ֥ךְ יְ֭בָרֵךְ אֶת־בֵּ֣ית יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל יְ֝בָרֵ֗ךְ אֶת־בֵּ֥ית אַהֲרֹֽן׃

verses.text_en: He will bless those who fear the LORD, small and great alike.
verses.text_he: יְ֭בָרֵךְ יִרְאֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה הַ֝קְּטַנִּ֗ים עִם־הַגְּדֹלִֽים׃

verses.text_en: May the LORD increase your numbers, yours and your children’s also.
verses.text_he: יֹסֵ֣ף יְהֹוָ֣ה עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם עֲ֝לֵיכֶ֗ם וְעַל־בְּנֵיכֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: May you be blessed by the LORD, Maker of heaven and earth.
verses.text_he: בְּרוּכִ֣ים אַ֭תֶּם לַיהֹוָ֑ה עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה שָׁמַ֥יִם וָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: The heavens belong to the LORD, but the earth He gave over to man.
verses.text_he: הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם שָׁ֭מַיִם לַיהֹוָ֑ה וְ֝הָאָ֗רֶץ נָתַ֥ן לִבְנֵי־אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: The dead cannot praise the LORD, nor any who go down into silence.
verses.text_he: לֹ֣א הַ֭מֵּתִים יְהַֽלְלוּ־יָ֑הּ וְ֝לֹ֗א כׇּל־יֹרְדֵ֥י דוּמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: But we will bless the LORD now and forever. Hallelujah.
verses.text_he: וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ׀ נְבָ֘רֵ֤ךְ יָ֗הּ מֵעַתָּ֥ה וְעַד־עוֹלָ֗ם הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: I love the LORD for He hears my voice, my pleas;
verses.text_he: אָ֭הַבְתִּי כִּי־יִשְׁמַ֥ע׀יְהֹוָ֑ה אֶת־ק֝וֹלִ֗י תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃

verses.text_en: for He turns His ear to me whenever I call.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־הִטָּ֣ה אׇזְנ֣וֹ לִ֑י וּבְיָמַ֥י אֶקְרָֽא׃

verses.text_en: The bonds of death encompassed me; the torments of Sheol overtook me. I came upon trouble and sorrow
verses.text_he: אֲפָפ֤וּנִי׀ חֶבְלֵי־מָ֗וֶת וּמְצָרֵ֣י שְׁא֣וֹל מְצָא֑וּנִי צָרָ֖ה וְיָג֣וֹן אֶמְצָֽא׃

verses.text_en: and I invoked the name of the LORD, “O LORD, save my life!”
verses.text_he: וּבְשֵֽׁם־יְהֹוָ֥ה אֶקְרָ֑א אָנָּ֥ה יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה מַלְּטָ֥ה נַפְשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is gracious and beneficent; our God is compassionate.
verses.text_he: חַנּ֣וּן יְהֹוָ֣ה וְצַדִּ֑יק וֵ֖אלֹהֵ֣ינוּ מְרַחֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: The LORD protects the simple; I was brought low and He saved me.
verses.text_he: שֹׁמֵ֣ר פְּתָאיִ֣ם יְהֹוָ֑ה דַּ֝לֹּתִ֗י וְלִ֣י יְהוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃

verses.text_en: Be at rest, once again, O my soul, for the LORD has been good to you.
verses.text_he: שׁוּבִ֣י נַ֭פְשִׁי לִמְנוּחָ֑יְכִי כִּֽי־יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה גָּמַ֥ל עָלָֽיְכִי׃

verses.text_en: You have delivered me from death, my eyes from tears, my feet from stumbling.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י חִלַּ֥צְתָּ נַפְשִׁ֗י מִ֫מָּ֥וֶת אֶת־עֵינִ֥י מִן־דִּמְעָ֑ה אֶת־רַגְלִ֥י מִדֶּֽחִי׃

verses.text_en: I shall walk before the LORD in the lands of the living.
verses.text_he: אֶ֭תְהַלֵּךְ לִפְנֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה בְּ֝אַרְצ֗וֹת הַחַיִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: I trust [in the LORD]; out of great suffering I spoke
verses.text_he: הֶ֭אֱמַנְתִּי כִּ֣י אֲדַבֵּ֑ר אֲ֝נִ֗י עָנִ֥יתִי מְאֹֽד׃

verses.text_en: and said rashly, “All men are false.”
verses.text_he: אֲ֭נִי אָמַ֣רְתִּי בְחׇפְזִ֑י כׇּֽל־הָאָדָ֥ם כֹּזֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: How can I repay the LORD for all His bounties to me?
verses.text_he: מָה־אָשִׁ֥יב לַיהֹוָ֑ה כׇּֽל־תַּגְמוּל֥וֹהִי עָלָֽי׃

verses.text_en: I raise the cup of deliverance and invoke the name of the LORD.
verses.text_he: כּוֹס־יְשׁוּע֥וֹת אֶשָּׂ֑א וּבְשֵׁ֖ם יְהֹוָ֣ה אֶקְרָֽא׃

verses.text_en: I will pay my vows to the LORD in the presence of all His people.
verses.text_he: נְ֭דָרַי לַיהֹוָ֣ה אֲשַׁלֵּ֑ם נֶגְדָה־נָּ֝֗א לְכׇל־עַמּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: The death of His faithful ones is grievous in the LORD’s sight.
verses.text_he: יָ֭קָר בְּעֵינֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה הַ֝מָּ֗וְתָה לַחֲסִידָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, I am Your servant, Your servant, the son of Your maidservant; You have undone the cords that bound me.
verses.text_he: אָנָּ֣ה יְהֹוָה֮ כִּי־אֲנִ֢י עַ֫בְדֶּ֥ךָ אֲֽנִי־עַ֭בְדְּךָ בֶּן־אֲמָתֶ֑ךָ פִּ֝תַּ֗חְתָּ לְמֽוֹסֵרָֽי׃

verses.text_en: I will sacrifice a thank offering to You and invoke the name of the LORD.
verses.text_he: לְֽךָ־אֶ֭זְבַּח זֶ֣בַח תּוֹדָ֑ה וּבְשֵׁ֖ם יְהֹוָ֣ה אֶקְרָֽא׃

verses.text_en: I will pay my vows to the LORD in the presence of all His people,
verses.text_he: נְ֭דָרַי לַיהֹוָ֣ה אֲשַׁלֵּ֑ם נֶגְדָה־נָּ֝֗א לְכׇל־עַמּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: in the courts of the house of the LORD, in the midst of Jerusalem. Hallelujah.
verses.text_he: בְּחַצְר֤וֹת׀ בֵּ֤ית יְהֹוָ֗ה בְּֽת֘וֹכֵ֤כִי יְֽרוּשָׁלָ֗͏ִם הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Praise the LORD, all you nations; extol Him, all you peoples,
verses.text_he: הַֽלְל֣וּ אֶת־יְ֭הֹוָה כׇּל־גּוֹיִ֑ם שַׁ֝בְּח֗וּהוּ כׇּל־הָאֻמִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: for great is His steadfast love toward us; the faithfulness of the LORD endures forever. Hallelujah.
verses.text_he: כִּ֥י־גָ֘בַ֤ר עָלֵ֨ינוּ׀ חַסְדּ֗וֹ וֶאֱמֶת־יְהֹוָ֥ה לְעוֹלָ֗ם הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Praise the LORD, for He is good, His steadfast love is eternal.
verses.text_he: הוֹד֣וּ לַיהֹוָ֣ה כִּי־ט֑וֹב כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Let Israel declare, “His steadfast love is eternal.”
verses.text_he: יֹאמַר־נָ֥א יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Let the house of Aaron declare, “His steadfast love is eternal.”
verses.text_he: יֹאמְרוּ־נָ֥א בֵֽית־אַהֲרֹ֑ן כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Let those who fear the LORD declare, “His steadfast love is eternal.”
verses.text_he: יֹאמְרוּ־נָ֭א יִרְאֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: In distress I called on the LORD; the Lord answered me and brought me relief.
verses.text_he: מִֽן־הַ֭מֵּצַר קָרָ֣אתִי יָּ֑הּ עָנָ֖נִי בַמֶּרְחָ֣ב יָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is on my side, I have no fear; what can man do to me?
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֣ה לִ֭י לֹ֣א אִירָ֑א מַה־יַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה לִ֣י אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: With the LORD on my side as my helper, I will see the downfall of my foes.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֣ה לִ֭י בְּעֹזְרָ֑י וַ֝אֲנִ֗י אֶרְאֶ֥ה בְשֹׂנְאָֽי׃

verses.text_en: It is better to take refuge in the LORD than to trust in mortals;
verses.text_he: ט֗וֹב לַחֲס֥וֹת בַּיהֹוָ֑ה מִ֝בְּטֹ֗חַ בָּאָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: it is better to take refuge in the LORD than to trust in the great.
verses.text_he: ט֗וֹב לַחֲס֥וֹת בַּיהֹוָ֑ה מִ֝בְּטֹ֗חַ בִּנְדִיבִֽים׃

verses.text_en: All nations have beset me; by the name of the LORD I will surely cut them down.
verses.text_he: כׇּל־גּוֹיִ֥ם סְבָב֑וּנִי בְּשֵׁ֥ם יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה כִּ֣י אֲמִילַֽם׃

verses.text_en: They beset me, they surround me; by the name of the LORD I will surely cut them down.
verses.text_he: סַבּ֥וּנִי גַם־סְבָב֑וּנִי בְּשֵׁ֥ם יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה כִּ֣י אֲמִילַֽם׃

verses.text_en: They have beset me like bees; they shall be extinguished like burning thorns; by the name of the LORD I will surely cut them down.
verses.text_he: סַבּ֤וּנִי כִדְבוֹרִ֗ים דֹּ֭עֲכוּ כְּאֵ֣שׁ קוֹצִ֑ים בְּשֵׁ֥ם יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה כִּ֣י אֲמִילַֽם׃

verses.text_en: You pressed me hard, I nearly fell; but the LORD helped me.
verses.text_he: דַּחֹ֣ה דְחִיתַ֣נִי לִנְפֹּ֑ל וַ֖יהֹוָ֣ה עֲזָרָֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is my strength and might; He has become my deliverance.
verses.text_he: עׇזִּ֣י וְזִמְרָ֣ת יָ֑הּ וַֽיְהִי־לִ֝֗י לִישׁוּעָֽה׃

verses.text_en: The tents of the victorious resound with joyous shouts of deliverance, “The right hand of the LORD is triumphant!
verses.text_he: ק֤וֹל׀ רִנָּ֬ה וִישׁוּעָ֗ה בְּאׇהֳלֵ֥י צַדִּיקִ֑ים יְמִ֥ין יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה עֹ֣שָׂה חָֽיִל׃

verses.text_en: The right hand of the LORD is exalted! The right hand of the LORD is triumphant!”
verses.text_he: יְמִ֣ין יְ֭הֹוָה רוֹמֵמָ֑ה יְמִ֥ין יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה עֹ֣שָׂה חָֽיִל׃

verses.text_en: I shall not die but live and proclaim the works of the LORD.
verses.text_he: לֹא־אָמ֥וּת כִּֽי־אֶחְיֶ֑ה וַ֝אֲסַפֵּ֗ר מַעֲשֵׂ֥י יָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: The LORD punished me severely, but did not hand me over to death.
verses.text_he: יַסֹּ֣ר יִסְּרַ֣נִּי יָּ֑הּ וְ֝לַמָּ֗וֶת לֹ֣א נְתָנָֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Open the gates of victory for me that I may enter them and praise the LORD.
verses.text_he: פִּתְחוּ־לִ֥י שַׁעֲרֵי־צֶ֑דֶק אָבֹא־בָ֝֗ם אוֹדֶ֥ה יָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: This is the gateway to the LORD— the victorious shall enter through it.
verses.text_he: זֶה־הַשַּׁ֥עַר לַיהֹוָ֑ה צַ֝דִּיקִ֗ים יָבֹ֥אוּ בֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: I praise You, for You have answered me, and have become my deliverance.
verses.text_he: א֭וֹדְךָ כִּ֣י עֲנִיתָ֑נִי וַתְּהִי־לִ֝֗י לִישׁוּעָֽה׃

verses.text_en: The stone that the builders rejected has become the chief cornerstone.
verses.text_he: אֶ֭בֶן מָאֲס֣וּ הַבּוֹנִ֑ים הָ֝יְתָ֗ה לְרֹ֣אשׁ פִּנָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: This is the LORD’s doing; it is marvelous in our sight.
verses.text_he: מֵאֵ֣ת יְ֭הֹוָה הָ֣יְתָה זֹּ֑את הִ֖יא נִפְלָ֣את בְּעֵינֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: This is the day that the LORD has made— let us exult and rejoice on it.
verses.text_he: זֶה־הַ֭יּוֹם עָשָׂ֣ה יְהֹוָ֑ה נָגִ֖ילָה וְנִשְׂמְחָ֣ה בֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, deliver us! O LORD, let us prosper!
verses.text_he: אָנָּ֣א יְ֭הֹוָה הוֹשִׁ֘יעָ֥ה נָּ֑א אָנָּ֥א יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה הַצְלִ֘יחָ֥ה נָּֽא׃

verses.text_en: May he who enters be blessed in the name of the LORD; we bless you from the House of the LORD.
verses.text_he: בָּר֣וּךְ הַ֭בָּא בְּשֵׁ֣ם יְהֹוָ֑ה בֵּ֝רַ֥כְנוּכֶ֗ם מִבֵּ֥ית יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is God; He has given us light; bind the festal offering to the horns of the altar with cords.
verses.text_he: אֵ֤ל׀ יְהֹוָה֮ וַיָּ֢אֶ֫ר לָ֥נוּ אִסְרוּ־חַ֥ג בַּעֲבֹתִ֑ים עַד־קַ֝רְנ֗וֹת הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃

verses.text_en: You are my God and I will praise You; You are my God and I will extol You.
verses.text_he: אֵלִ֣י אַתָּ֣ה וְאוֹדֶ֑ךָּ אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י אֲרוֹמְמֶֽךָּ׃

verses.text_en: Praise the LORD for He is good, His steadfast love is eternal.
verses.text_he: הוֹד֣וּ לַיהֹוָ֣ה כִּי־ט֑וֹב כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Happy are those whose way is blameless, who follow the teaching of the LORD.
verses.text_he: אַשְׁרֵ֥י תְמִֽימֵי־דָ֑רֶךְ הַ֝הֹלְכִ֗ים בְּתוֹרַ֥ת יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Happy are those who observe His decrees, who turn to Him wholeheartedly.
verses.text_he: אַ֭שְׁרֵי נֹצְרֵ֥י עֵדֹתָ֗יו בְּכׇל־לֵ֥ב יִדְרְשֽׁוּהוּ׃

verses.text_en: They have done no wrong, but have followed His ways.
verses.text_he: אַ֭ף לֹא־פָעֲל֣וּ עַוְלָ֑ה בִּדְרָכָ֥יו הָלָֽכוּ׃

verses.text_en: You have commanded that Your precepts be kept diligently.
verses.text_he: אַ֭תָּה צִוִּ֥יתָה פִקֻּדֶ֗יךָ לִשְׁמֹ֥ר מְאֹֽד׃

verses.text_en: Would that my ways were firm in keeping Your laws;
verses.text_he: אַ֭חֲלַי יִכֹּ֥נוּ דְרָכָ֗י לִשְׁמֹ֥ר חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: then I would not be ashamed when I regard all Your commandments.
verses.text_he: אָ֥ז לֹא־אֵב֑וֹשׁ בְּ֝הַבִּיטִ֗י אֶל־כׇּל־מִצְוֺתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: I will praise You with a sincere heart as I learn Your just rules.
verses.text_he: א֭וֹדְךָ בְּיֹ֣שֶׁר לֵבָ֑ב בְּ֝לׇמְדִ֗י מִשְׁפְּטֵ֥י צִדְקֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: I will keep Your laws; do not utterly forsake me.
verses.text_he: אֶת־חֻקֶּ֥יךָ אֶשְׁמֹ֑ר אַֽל־תַּעַזְבֵ֥נִי עַד־מְאֹֽד׃{פ}

verses.text_en: How can a young man keep his way pure?— by holding to Your word.
verses.text_he: בַּמֶּ֣ה יְזַכֶּה־נַּ֭עַר אֶת־אׇרְח֑וֹ לִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר כִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: I have turned to You with all my heart; do not let me stray from Your commandments.
verses.text_he: בְּכׇל־לִבִּ֥י דְרַשְׁתִּ֑יךָ אַל־תַּ֝שְׁגֵּ֗נִי מִמִּצְוֺתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: In my heart I treasure Your promise; therefore I do not sin against You.
verses.text_he: בְּ֭לִבִּי צָפַ֣נְתִּי אִמְרָתֶ֑ךָ לְ֝מַ֗עַן לֹ֣א אֶחֱטָא־לָֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: Blessed are You, O LORD; train me in Your laws.
verses.text_he: בָּר֖וּךְ אַתָּ֥ה יְהֹוָ֗ה לַמְּדֵ֥נִי חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: With my lips I rehearse all the rules You proclaimed.
verses.text_he: בִּשְׂפָתַ֥י סִפַּ֑רְתִּי כֹּ֝֗ל מִשְׁפְּטֵי־פִֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: I rejoice over the way of Your decrees as over all riches.
verses.text_he: בְּדֶ֖רֶךְ עֵדְוֺתֶ֥יךָ שַּׂ֗שְׂתִּי כְּעַ֣ל כׇּל־הֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: I study Your precepts; I regard Your ways;
verses.text_he: בְּפִקּוּדֶ֥יךָ אָשִׂ֑יחָה וְ֝אַבִּ֗יטָה אֹֽרְחֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: I take delight in Your laws; I will not neglect Your word.
Deal kindly with Your servant, that I may live to keep Your word.
verses.text_he: גְּמֹ֖ל עַל־עַבְדְּךָ֥ אֶחְיֶ֗ה וְאֶשְׁמְרָ֥ה דְבָרֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Open my eyes, that I may perceive the wonders of Your teaching.
verses.text_he: גַּל־עֵינַ֥י וְאַבִּ֑יטָה נִ֝פְלָא֗וֹת מִתּוֹרָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: I am only a sojourner in the land; do not hide Your commandments from me.
verses.text_he: גֵּ֣ר אָנֹכִ֣י בָאָ֑רֶץ אַל־תַּסְתֵּ֥ר מִ֝מֶּ֗נִּי מִצְוֺתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: My soul is consumed with longing for Your rules at all times.
verses.text_he: גָּרְסָ֣ה נַפְשִׁ֣י לְתַאֲבָ֑ה אֶֽל־מִשְׁפָּטֶ֥יךָ בְכׇל־עֵֽת׃

verses.text_en: You blast the accursed insolent ones who stray from Your commandments.
verses.text_he: גָּ֭עַרְתָּ זֵדִ֣ים אֲרוּרִ֑ים הַ֝שֹּׁגִ֗ים מִמִּצְוֺתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Take away from me taunt and abuse, because I observe Your decrees.
verses.text_he: גַּ֣ל מֵ֭עָלַי חֶרְפָּ֣ה וָב֑וּז כִּ֖י עֵדֹתֶ֣יךָ נָצָֽרְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: Though princes meet and speak against me, Your servant studies Your laws.
verses.text_he: גַּ֤ם יָשְׁב֣וּ שָׂ֭רִים בִּ֣י נִדְבָּ֑רוּ עַ֝בְדְּךָ֗ יָשִׂ֥יחַ בְּחֻקֶּֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: For Your decrees are my delight, my intimate companions.
verses.text_he: גַּֽם־עֵ֭דֹתֶיךָ שַׁעֲשֻׁעָ֗י אַנְשֵׁ֥י עֲצָתִֽי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: My soul clings to the dust; revive me in accordance with Your word.
verses.text_he: דָּבְקָ֣ה לֶעָפָ֣ר נַפְשִׁ֑י חַ֝יֵּ֗נִי כִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: I have declared my way, and You have answered me; train me in Your laws.
verses.text_he: דְּרָכַ֣י סִ֭פַּרְתִּי וַֽתַּעֲנֵ֗נִי לַמְּדֵ֥נִי חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Make me understand the way of Your precepts, that I may study Your wondrous acts.
verses.text_he: דֶּרֶךְ־פִּקּוּדֶ֥יךָ הֲבִינֵ֑נִי וְ֝אָשִׂ֗יחָה בְּנִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: I am racked with grief; sustain me in accordance with Your word.
verses.text_he: דָּלְפָ֣ה נַ֭פְשִׁי מִתּוּגָ֑ה קַ֝יְּמֵ֗נִי כִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Remove all false ways from me; favor me with Your teaching.
verses.text_he: דֶּֽרֶךְ־שֶׁ֭קֶר הָסֵ֣ר מִמֶּ֑נִּי וְֽתוֹרָתְךָ֥ חׇנֵּֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: I have chosen the way of faithfulness; I have set Your rules before me.
verses.text_he: דֶּֽרֶךְ־אֱמוּנָ֥ה בָחָ֑רְתִּי מִשְׁפָּטֶ֥יךָ שִׁוִּֽיתִי׃

verses.text_en: I cling to Your decrees; O LORD, do not put me to shame.
verses.text_he: דָּבַ֥קְתִּי בְעֵדְוֺתֶ֑יךָ יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה אַל־תְּבִישֵֽׁנִי׃

verses.text_en: I eagerly pursue Your commandments, for You broaden my understanding.
verses.text_he: דֶּֽרֶךְ־מִצְוֺתֶ֥יךָ אָר֑וּץ כִּ֖י תַרְחִ֣יב לִבִּֽי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Teach me, O LORD, the way of Your laws; I will observe them to the utmost.
verses.text_he: הוֹרֵ֣נִי יְ֭הֹוָה דֶּ֥רֶךְ חֻקֶּ֗יךָ וְאֶצְּרֶ֥נָּה עֵֽקֶב׃

verses.text_en: Give me understanding, that I may observe Your teaching and keep it wholeheartedly.
verses.text_he: הֲ֭בִינֵנִי וְאֶצְּרָ֥ה תוֹרָתֶ֗ךָ וְאֶשְׁמְרֶ֥נָּה בְכׇל־לֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: Lead me in the path of Your commandments, for that is my concern.
verses.text_he: הַ֭דְרִיכֵנִי בִּנְתִ֣יב מִצְוֺתֶ֑יךָ כִּי־ב֥וֹ חָפָֽצְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: Turn my heart to Your decrees and not to love of gain.
verses.text_he: הַט־לִ֭בִּי אֶל־עֵדְוֺתֶ֗יךָ וְאַ֣ל אֶל־בָּֽצַע׃

verses.text_en: Avert my eyes from seeing falsehood; by Your ways preserve me.
verses.text_he: הַעֲבֵ֣ר עֵ֭ינַי מֵרְא֣וֹת שָׁ֑וְא בִּדְרָכֶ֥ךָ חַיֵּֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Fulfill Your promise to Your servant, which is for those who worship You.
verses.text_he: הָקֵ֣ם לְ֭עַבְדְּךָ אִמְרָתֶ֑ךָ אֲ֝שֶׁ֗ר לְיִרְאָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Remove the taunt that I dread, for Your rules are good.
verses.text_he: הַעֲבֵ֣ר חֶ֭רְפָּתִי אֲשֶׁ֣ר יָגֹ֑רְתִּי כִּ֖י מִשְׁפָּטֶ֣יךָ טוֹבִֽים׃

verses.text_en: See, I have longed for Your precepts; by Your righteousness preserve me.
verses.text_he: הִ֭נֵּה תָּאַ֣בְתִּי לְפִקֻּדֶ֑יךָ בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֥ חַיֵּֽנִי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: May Your steadfast love reach me, O LORD, Your deliverance, as You have promised.
verses.text_he: וִיבֹאֻ֣נִי חֲסָדֶ֣ךָ יְהֹוָ֑ה תְּ֝שׁ֥וּעָתְךָ֗ כְּאִמְרָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: I shall have an answer for those who taunt me, for I have put my trust in Your word.
verses.text_he: וְאֶעֱנֶ֣ה חֹרְפִ֣י דָבָ֑ר כִּֽי־בָ֝טַ֗חְתִּי בִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Do not utterly take the truth away from my mouth, for I have put my hope in Your rules.
verses.text_he: וְֽאַל־תַּצֵּ֬ל מִפִּ֣י דְבַר־אֱמֶ֣ת עַד־מְאֹ֑ד כִּ֖י לְמִשְׁפָּטֶ֣ךָ יִחָֽלְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: I will always obey Your teaching, forever and ever.
verses.text_he: וְאֶשְׁמְרָ֖ה תוֹרָתְךָ֥ תָמִ֗יד לְעוֹלָ֥ם וָעֶֽד׃

verses.text_en: I will walk about at ease, for I have turned to Your precepts.
verses.text_he: וְאֶתְהַלְּכָ֥ה בָרְחָבָ֑ה כִּ֖י פִקֻּדֶ֣יךָ דָרָֽשְׁתִּי׃

verses.text_en: I will speak of Your decrees, and not be ashamed in the presence of kings.
verses.text_he: וַאֲדַבְּרָ֣ה בְ֭עֵדֹתֶיךָ נֶ֥גֶד מְלָכִ֗ים וְלֹ֣א אֵבֽוֹשׁ׃

verses.text_en: I will delight in Your commandments, which I love.
verses.text_he: וְאֶשְׁתַּעֲשַׁ֥ע בְּמִצְוֺתֶ֗יךָ אֲשֶׁ֣ר אָהָֽבְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: I reach out for Your commandments, which I love; I study Your laws.
verses.text_he: וְאֶשָּֽׂא־כַפַּ֗י אֶֽל־מִ֭צְוֺתֶיךָ אֲשֶׁ֥ר אָהָ֗בְתִּי וְאָשִׂ֥יחָה בְחֻקֶּֽיךָ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Remember Your word to Your servant through which You have given me hope.
verses.text_he: זְכֹר־דָּבָ֥ר לְעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ עַ֝֗ל אֲשֶׁ֣ר יִחַלְתָּֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: This is my comfort in my affliction, that Your promise has preserved me.
verses.text_he: זֹ֣את נֶחָמָתִ֣י בְעׇנְיִ֑י כִּ֖י אִמְרָתְךָ֣ חִיָּֽתְנִי׃

verses.text_en: Though the arrogant have cruelly mocked me, I have not swerved from Your teaching.
verses.text_he: זֵ֭דִים הֱלִיצֻ֣נִי עַד־מְאֹ֑ד מִ֝תּ֥וֹרָתְךָ֗ לֹ֣א נָטִֽיתִי׃

verses.text_en: I remember Your rules of old, O LORD, and find comfort in them.
verses.text_he: זָ֘כַ֤רְתִּי מִשְׁפָּטֶ֖יךָ מֵעוֹלָ֥ם׀יְהֹוָ֗ה וָאֶתְנֶחָֽם׃

verses.text_en: I am seized with rage because of the wicked who forsake Your teaching.
verses.text_he: זַלְעָפָ֣ה אֲ֭חָזַתְנִי מֵרְשָׁעִ֑ים עֹ֝זְבֵ֗י תּוֹרָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Your laws are a source of strength to me wherever I may dwell.
verses.text_he: זְ֭מִרוֹת הָיוּ־לִ֥י חֻקֶּ֗יךָ בְּבֵ֣ית מְגוּרָֽי׃

verses.text_en: I remember Your name at night, O LORD, and obey Your teaching.
verses.text_he: זָ֘כַ֤רְתִּי בַלַּ֣יְלָה שִׁמְךָ֣ יְהֹוָ֑ה וָ֝אֶשְׁמְרָ֗ה תּוֹרָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: This has been my lot, for I have observed Your precepts.
verses.text_he: זֹ֥את הָיְתָה־לִּ֑י כִּ֖י פִקֻּדֶ֣יךָ נָצָֽרְתִּי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: The LORD is my portion; I have resolved to keep Your words.
verses.text_he: חֶלְקִ֖י יְהֹוָ֥ה אָמַ֗רְתִּי לִשְׁמֹ֥ר דְּבָרֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: I have implored You with all my heart; have mercy on me, in accordance with Your promise.
verses.text_he: חִלִּ֣יתִי פָנֶ֣יךָ בְכׇל־לֵ֑ב חׇ֝נֵּ֗נִי כְּאִמְרָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: I have considered my ways, and have turned back to Your decrees.
verses.text_he: חִשַּׁ֥בְתִּי דְרָכָ֑י וָאָשִׁ֥יבָה רַ֝גְלַ֗י אֶל־עֵדֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: I have hurried and not delayed to keep Your commandments.
verses.text_he: חַ֭שְׁתִּי וְלֹ֣א הִתְמַהְמָ֑הְתִּי לִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר מִצְוֺתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Though the bonds of the wicked are coiled round me, I have not neglected Your teaching.
verses.text_he: חֶבְלֵ֣י רְשָׁעִ֣ים עִוְּדֻ֑נִי תּ֥֝וֹרָתְךָ֗ לֹ֣א שָׁכָֽחְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: I arise at midnight to praise You for Your just rules.
verses.text_he: חֲצֽוֹת־לַ֗יְלָה אָ֭קוּם לְהוֹד֣וֹת לָ֑ךְ עַ֝֗ל מִשְׁפְּטֵ֥י צִדְקֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: I am a companion to all who fear You, to those who keep Your precepts.
verses.text_he: חָבֵ֣ר אָ֭נִי לְכׇל־אֲשֶׁ֣ר יְרֵא֑וּךָ וּ֝לְשֹׁמְרֵ֗י פִּקּוּדֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Your steadfast love, O LORD, fills the earth; teach me Your laws.
verses.text_he: חַסְדְּךָ֣ יְ֭הֹוָה מָלְאָ֥ה הָאָ֗רֶץ חֻקֶּ֥יךָ לַמְּדֵֽנִי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: You have treated Your servant well, according to Your word, O LORD.
verses.text_he: ט֭וֹב עָשִׂ֣יתָ עִֽם־עַבְדְּךָ֑ יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה כִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Teach me good sense and knowledge, for I have put my trust in Your commandments.
verses.text_he: ט֤וּב טַ֣עַם וָדַ֣עַת לַמְּדֵ֑נִי כִּ֖י בְמִצְוֺתֶ֣יךָ הֶאֱמָֽנְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: Before I was humbled I went astray, but now I keep Your word.
verses.text_he: טֶ֣רֶם אֶ֭עֱנֶה אֲנִ֣י שֹׁגֵ֑ג וְ֝עַתָּ֗ה אִמְרָתְךָ֥ שָׁמָֽרְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: You are good and beneficent; teach me Your laws.
verses.text_he: טוֹב־אַתָּ֥ה וּמֵטִ֗יב לַמְּדֵ֥נִי חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Though the arrogant have accused me falsely, I observe Your precepts wholeheartedly.
verses.text_he: טָפְל֬וּ עָלַ֣י שֶׁ֣קֶר זֵדִ֑ים אֲ֝נִ֗י בְּכׇל־לֵ֤ב׀ אֶצֹּ֬ר פִּקּוּדֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Their minds are thick like fat; as for me, Your teaching is my delight.
verses.text_he: טָפַ֣שׁ כַּחֵ֣לֶב לִבָּ֑ם אֲ֝נִ֗י תּוֹרָתְךָ֥ שִׁעֲשָֽׁעְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: It was good for me that I was humbled, so that I might learn Your laws.
verses.text_he: טֽוֹב־לִ֥י כִי־עֻנֵּ֑יתִי לְ֝מַ֗עַן אֶלְמַ֥ד חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: I prefer the teaching You proclaimed to thousands of gold and silver pieces.
verses.text_he: טֽוֹב־לִ֥י תוֹרַת־פִּ֑יךָ מֵ֝אַלְפֵ֗י זָהָ֥ב וָכָֽסֶף׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Your hands made me and fashioned me; give me understanding that I may learn Your commandments.
verses.text_he: יָדֶ֣יךָ עָ֭שׂוּנִי וַֽיְכוֹנְנ֑וּנִי הֲ֝בִינֵ֗נִי וְאֶלְמְדָ֥ה מִצְוֺתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Those who fear You will see me and rejoice, for I have put my hope in Your word.
verses.text_he: יְ֭רֵאֶיךָ יִרְא֣וּנִי וְיִשְׂמָ֑חוּ כִּ֖י לִדְבָרְךָ֣ יִחָֽלְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: I know, O LORD, that Your rulings are just; rightly have You humbled me.
verses.text_he: יָדַ֣עְתִּי יְ֭הֹוָה כִּי־צֶ֣דֶק מִשְׁפָּטֶ֑יךָ וֶ֝אֱמוּנָ֗ה עִנִּיתָֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: May Your steadfast love comfort me in accordance with Your promise to Your servant.
verses.text_he: יְהִי־נָ֣א חַסְדְּךָ֣ לְנַחֲמֵ֑נִי כְּאִמְרָתְךָ֥ לְעַבְדֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: May Your mercy reach me, that I might live, for Your teaching is my delight.
verses.text_he: יְבֹא֣וּנִי רַחֲמֶ֣יךָ וְאֶחְיֶ֑ה כִּי־ת֥֝וֹרָתְךָ֗ שַׁעֲשֻׁעָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Let the insolent be dismayed, for they have wronged me without cause; I will study Your precepts.
verses.text_he: יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ זֵ֭דִים כִּי־שֶׁ֣קֶר עִוְּת֑וּנִי אֲ֝נִ֗י אָשִׂ֥יחַ בְּפִקּוּדֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: May those who fear You, those who know Your decrees, turn again to me.
verses.text_he: יָשׁ֣וּבוּ לִ֣י יְרֵאֶ֑יךָ (וידעו) [וְ֝יֹדְעֵ֗י] עֵדֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: May I wholeheartedly follow Your laws so that I do not come to grief.
verses.text_he: יְהִי־לִבִּ֣י תָמִ֣ים בְּחֻקֶּ֑יךָ לְ֝מַ֗עַן לֹ֣א אֵבֽוֹשׁ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: I long for Your deliverance; I hope for Your word.
verses.text_he: כָּלְתָ֣ה לִתְשׁוּעָתְךָ֣ נַפְשִׁ֑י לִדְבָרְךָ֥ יִחָֽלְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: My eyes pine away for Your promise; I say, “When will You comfort me?”
verses.text_he: כָּל֣וּ עֵ֭ינַי לְאִמְרָתֶ֑ךָ לֵ֝אמֹ֗ר מָתַ֥י תְּֽנַחֲמֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Though I have become like a water-skin dried in smoke, I have not neglected Your laws.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־הָ֭יִיתִי כְּנֹ֣אד בְּקִיט֑וֹר חֻ֝קֶּ֗יךָ לֹ֣א שָׁכָֽחְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: How long has Your servant to live? when will You bring my persecutors to judgment?
verses.text_he: כַּמָּ֥ה יְמֵֽי־עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ מָתַ֬י תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה בְרֹדְפַ֣י מִשְׁפָּֽט׃

verses.text_en: The insolent have dug pits for me, flouting Your teaching.
verses.text_he: כָּרוּ־לִ֣י זֵדִ֣ים שִׁיח֑וֹת אֲ֝שֶׁ֗ר לֹ֣א כְתוֹרָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: All Your commandments are enduring; I am persecuted without cause; help me!
verses.text_he: כׇּל־מִצְוֺתֶ֥יךָ אֱמוּנָ֑ה שֶׁ֖קֶר רְדָפ֣וּנִי עׇזְרֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Though they almost wiped me off the earth, I did not abandon Your precepts.
verses.text_he: כִּ֭מְעַט כִּלּ֣וּנִי בָאָ֑רֶץ וַ֝אֲנִ֗י לֹא־עָזַ֥בְתִּי פִקֻּדֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: As befits Your steadfast love, preserve me, so that I may keep the decree You proclaimed.
verses.text_he: כְּחַסְדְּךָ֥ חַיֵּ֑נִי וְ֝אֶשְׁמְרָ֗ה עֵד֥וּת פִּֽיךָ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: The LORD exists forever; Your word stands firm in heaven.
verses.text_he: לְעוֹלָ֥ם יְהֹוָ֑ה דְּ֝בָרְךָ֗ נִצָּ֥ב בַּשָּׁמָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: Your faithfulness is for all generations; You have established the earth, and it stands.
verses.text_he: לְדֹ֣ר וָ֭דֹר אֱמוּנָתֶ֑ךָ כּוֹנַ֥נְתָּֽ אֶ֝֗רֶץ וַֽתַּעֲמֹֽד׃

verses.text_en: They stand this day to [carry out] Your rulings, for all are Your servants.
verses.text_he: לְֽ֭מִשְׁפָּטֶיךָ עָמְד֣וּ הַיּ֑וֹם כִּ֖י הַכֹּ֣ל עֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Were not Your teaching my delight I would have perished in my affliction.
verses.text_he: לוּלֵ֣י ת֭וֹרָתְךָ שַׁעֲשֻׁעָ֑י אָ֝֗ז אָבַ֥דְתִּי בְעׇנְיִֽי׃

verses.text_en: I will never neglect Your precepts, for You have preserved my life through them.
verses.text_he: לְ֭עוֹלָם לֹא־אֶשְׁכַּ֣ח פִּקּוּדֶ֑יךָ כִּ֥י בָ֝֗ם חִיִּיתָֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: I am Yours; save me! For I have turned to Your precepts.
verses.text_he: לְֽךָ־אֲ֭נִי הוֹשִׁיעֵ֑נִי כִּ֖י פִקּוּדֶ֣יךָ דָרָֽשְׁתִּי׃

verses.text_en: The wicked hope to destroy me, but I ponder Your decrees.
verses.text_he: לִ֤י קִוּ֣וּ רְשָׁעִ֣ים לְאַבְּדֵ֑נִי עֵ֝דֹתֶ֗יךָ אֶתְבּוֹנָֽן׃

verses.text_en: I have seen that all things have their limit, but Your commandment is broad beyond measure.
