verses.text_he: לְֽכׇל־תִּ֭כְלָה רָאִ֣יתִי קֵ֑ץ רְחָבָ֖ה מִצְוָתְךָ֣ מְאֹֽד׃{פ}

verses.text_en: O how I love Your teaching! It is my study all day long.
verses.text_he: מָה־אָהַ֥בְתִּי תוֹרָתֶ֑ךָ כׇּל־הַ֝יּ֗וֹם הִ֣יא שִׂיחָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Your commandments make me wiser than my enemies; they always stand by me.
verses.text_he: מֵֽ֭אֹיְבַי תְּחַכְּמֵ֣נִי מִצְוֺתֶ֑ךָ כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם הִיא־לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: I have gained more insight than all my teachers, for Your decrees are my study.
verses.text_he: מִכׇּל־מְלַמְּדַ֥י הִשְׂכַּ֑לְתִּי כִּ֥י עֵ֝דְוֺתֶ֗יךָ שִׂ֣יחָה לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: I have gained more understanding than my elders, for I observe Your precepts.
verses.text_he: מִזְּקֵנִ֥ים אֶתְבּוֹנָ֑ן כִּ֖י פִקּוּדֶ֣יךָ נָצָֽרְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: I have avoided every evil way so that I may keep Your word.
verses.text_he: מִכׇּל־אֹ֣רַח רָ֭ע כָּלִ֣אתִי רַגְלָ֑י לְ֝מַ֗עַן אֶשְׁמֹ֥ר דְּבָרֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: I have not departed from Your rules, for You have instructed me.
verses.text_he: מִמִּשְׁפָּטֶ֥יךָ לֹא־סָ֑רְתִּי כִּי־אַ֝תָּ֗ה הוֹרֵתָֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: How pleasing is Your word to my palate, sweeter than honey.
verses.text_he: מַה־נִּמְלְצ֣וּ לְ֭חִכִּי אִמְרָתֶ֗ךָ מִדְּבַ֥שׁ לְפִֽי׃

verses.text_en: I ponder Your precepts; therefore I hate every false way.
verses.text_he: מִפִּקּוּדֶ֥יךָ אֶתְבּוֹנָ֑ן עַל־כֵּ֝֗ן שָׂנֵ֤אתִי׀ כׇּל־אֹ֬רַח שָֽׁקֶר׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Your word is a lamp to my feet, a light for my path.
verses.text_he: נֵר־לְרַגְלִ֥י דְבָרֶ֑ךָ וְ֝א֗וֹר לִנְתִיבָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: I have firmly sworn to keep Your just rules.
verses.text_he: נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי וָאֲקַיֵּ֑מָה לִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר מִשְׁפְּטֵ֥י צִדְקֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: I am very much afflicted; O LORD, preserve me in accordance with Your word.
verses.text_he: נַעֲנֵ֥יתִי עַד־מְאֹ֑ד יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה חַיֵּ֥נִי כִדְבָרֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Accept, O LORD, my freewill offerings; teach me Your rules.
verses.text_he: נִדְב֣וֹת פִּ֭י רְצֵה־נָ֣א יְהֹוָ֑ה וּֽמִשְׁפָּטֶ֥יךָ לַמְּדֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Though my life is always in danger, I do not neglect Your teaching.
verses.text_he: נַפְשִׁ֣י בְכַפִּ֣י תָמִ֑יד וְ֝ת֥וֹרָתְךָ֗ לֹ֣א שָׁכָֽחְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: Though the wicked have set a trap for me, I have not strayed from Your precepts.
verses.text_he: נָתְנ֬וּ רְשָׁעִ֣ים פַּ֣ח לִ֑י וּ֝מִפִּקּוּדֶ֗יךָ לֹ֣א תָעִֽיתִי׃

verses.text_en: Your decrees are my eternal heritage; they are my heart’s delight.
verses.text_he: נָחַ֣לְתִּי עֵדְוֺתֶ֣יךָ לְעוֹלָ֑ם כִּֽי־שְׂשׂ֖וֹן לִבִּ֣י הֵֽמָּה׃

verses.text_en: I am resolved to follow Your laws to the utmost forever.
verses.text_he: נָטִ֣יתִי לִ֭בִּי לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת חֻקֶּ֗יךָ לְעוֹלָ֥ם עֵֽקֶב׃{פ}

verses.text_en: I hate men of divided heart, but I love Your teaching.
verses.text_he: סֵעֲפִ֥ים שָׂנֵ֑אתִי וְֽתוֹרָתְךָ֥ אָהָֽבְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: You are my protection and my shield; I hope for Your word.
verses.text_he: סִתְרִ֣י וּמָגִנִּ֣י אָ֑תָּה לִדְבָרְךָ֥ יִחָֽלְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: Keep away from me, you evildoers, that I may observe the commandments of my God.
verses.text_he: סוּרוּ־מִמֶּ֥נִּי מְרֵעִ֑ים וְ֝אֶצְּרָ֗ה מִצְוֺ֥ת אֱלֹהָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Support me as You promised, so that I may live; do not thwart my expectation.
verses.text_he: סׇמְכֵ֣נִי כְאִמְרָתְךָ֣ וְאֶחְיֶ֑ה וְאַל־תְּ֝בִישֵׁ֗נִי מִשִּׂבְרִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Sustain me that I may be saved, and I will always muse upon Your laws.
verses.text_he: סְעָדֵ֥נִי וְאִוָּשֵׁ֑עָה וְאֶשְׁעָ֖ה בְחֻקֶּ֣יךָ תָמִֽיד׃

verses.text_en: You reject all who stray from Your laws, for they are false and deceitful.
verses.text_he: סָ֭לִיתָ כׇּל־שׁוֹגִ֣ים מֵחֻקֶּ֑יךָ כִּי־שֶׁ֝֗קֶר תַּרְמִיתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: You do away with the wicked as if they were dross; rightly do I love Your decrees.
verses.text_he: סִגִ֗ים הִשְׁבַּ֥תָּ כׇל־רִשְׁעֵי־אָ֑רֶץ לָ֝כֵ֗ן אָהַ֥בְתִּי עֵדֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: My flesh creeps from fear of You; I am in awe of Your rulings.
verses.text_he: סָמַ֣ר מִפַּחְדְּךָ֣ בְשָׂרִ֑י וּֽמִמִּשְׁפָּטֶ֥יךָ יָרֵֽאתִי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: I have done what is just and right; do not abandon me to those who would wrong me.
verses.text_he: עָ֭שִׂיתִי מִשְׁפָּ֣ט וָצֶ֑דֶק בַּל־תַּ֝נִּיחֵ֗נִי לְעֹשְׁקָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Guarantee Your servant’s well-being; do not let the arrogant wrong me.
verses.text_he: עֲרֹ֣ב עַבְדְּךָ֣ לְט֑וֹב אַֽל־יַעַשְׁקֻ֥נִי זֵדִֽים׃

verses.text_en: My eyes pine away for Your deliverance, for Your promise of victory.
verses.text_he: עֵ֭ינַי כָּל֣וּ לִישׁוּעָתֶ֑ךָ וּלְאִמְרַ֥ת צִדְקֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Deal with Your servant as befits Your steadfast love; teach me Your laws.
verses.text_he: עֲשֵׂ֖ה עִם־עַבְדְּךָ֥ כְחַסְדֶּ֗ךָ וְחֻקֶּ֥יךָ לַמְּדֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: I am Your servant; give me understanding, that I might know Your decrees.
verses.text_he: עַבְדְּךָ־אָ֥נִי הֲבִינֵ֑נִי וְ֝אֵדְעָ֗ה עֵדֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: It is a time to act for the LORD, for they have violated Your teaching.
verses.text_he: עֵ֭ת לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת לַיהֹוָ֑ה הֵ֝פֵ֗רוּ תּוֹרָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Rightly do I love Your commandments more than gold, even fine gold.
verses.text_he: עַל־כֵּ֭ן אָהַ֣בְתִּי מִצְוֺתֶ֑יךָ מִזָּהָ֥ב וּמִפָּֽז׃

verses.text_en: Truly by all [Your] precepts I walk straight; I hate every false way.
verses.text_he: עַל־כֵּ֤ן׀ כׇּל־פִּקּ֣וּדֵי כֹ֣ל יִשָּׁ֑רְתִּי כׇּל־אֹ֖רַח שֶׁ֣קֶר שָׂנֵֽאתִי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Your decrees are wondrous; rightly do I observe them.
verses.text_he: פְּלָא֥וֹת עֵדְוֺתֶ֑יךָ עַל־כֵּ֝֗ן נְצָרָ֥תַם נַפְשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: The words You inscribed give light, and grant understanding to the simple.
verses.text_he: פֵּ֖תַח דְּבָרֶ֥יךָ יָאִ֗יר מֵבִ֥ין פְּתָיִֽים׃

verses.text_en: I open my mouth wide, I pant, longing for Your commandments.
verses.text_he: פִּֽי־פָ֭עַרְתִּי וָאֶשְׁאָ֑פָה כִּ֖י לְמִצְוֺתֶ֣יךָ יָאָֽבְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: Turn to me and be gracious to me, as is Your rule with those who love Your name.
verses.text_he: פְּנֵה־אֵלַ֥י וְחׇנֵּ֑נִי כְּ֝מִשְׁפָּ֗ט לְאֹהֲבֵ֥י שְׁמֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Make my feet firm through Your promise; do not let iniquity dominate me.
verses.text_he: פְּ֭עָמַי הָכֵ֣ן בְּאִמְרָתֶ֑ךָ וְֽאַל־תַּשְׁלֶט־בִּ֥י כׇל־אָֽוֶן׃

verses.text_en: Redeem me from being wronged by man, that I may keep Your precepts.
verses.text_he: פְּ֭דֵנִי מֵעֹ֣שֶׁק אָדָ֑ם וְ֝אֶשְׁמְרָ֗ה פִּקּוּדֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Show favor to Your servant, and teach me Your laws.
verses.text_he: פָּ֭נֶיךָ הָאֵ֣ר בְּעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ וְ֝לַמְּדֵ֗נִי אֶת־חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: My eyes shed streams of water because men do not obey Your teaching.
verses.text_he: פַּלְגֵי־מַ֭יִם יָרְד֣וּ עֵינָ֑י עַ֝֗ל לֹא־שָׁמְר֥וּ תוֹרָתֶֽךָ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: You are righteous, O LORD; Your rulings are just.
verses.text_he: צַדִּ֣יק אַתָּ֣ה יְהֹוָ֑ה וְ֝יָשָׁ֗ר מִשְׁפָּטֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: You have ordained righteous decrees; they are firmly enduring.
verses.text_he: צִ֭וִּיתָ צֶ֣דֶק עֵדֹתֶ֑יךָ וֶאֱמוּנָ֥ה מְאֹֽד׃

verses.text_en: I am consumed with rage over my foes’ neglect of Your words.
verses.text_he: צִמְּתַ֥תְנִי קִנְאָתִ֑י כִּֽי־שָׁכְח֖וּ דְבָרֶ֣יךָ צָרָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Your word is exceedingly pure, and Your servant loves it.
verses.text_he: צְרוּפָ֖ה אִמְרָתְךָ֥ מְאֹ֗ד וְֽעַבְדְּךָ֥ אֲהֵבָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: Though I am belittled and despised, I have not neglected Your precepts.
verses.text_he: צָעִ֣יר אָנֹכִ֣י וְנִבְזֶ֑ה פִּ֝קֻּדֶ֗יךָ לֹ֣א שָׁכָֽחְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: Your righteousness is eternal; Your teaching is true.
verses.text_he: צִדְקָתְךָ֣ צֶ֣דֶק לְעוֹלָ֑ם וְֽתוֹרָתְךָ֥ אֱמֶֽת׃

verses.text_en: Though anguish and distress come upon me, Your commandments are my delight.
verses.text_he: צַר־וּמָצ֥וֹק מְצָא֑וּנִי מִ֝צְוֺתֶ֗יךָ שַׁעֲשֻׁעָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Your righteous decrees are eternal; give me understanding, that I might live.
verses.text_he: צֶ֖דֶק עֵדְוֺתֶ֥יךָ לְעוֹלָ֗ם הֲבִינֵ֥נִי וְאֶחְיֶֽה׃{פ}

verses.text_en: I call with all my heart; answer me, O LORD, that I may observe Your laws.
verses.text_he: קָרָ֣אתִי בְכׇל־לֵ֭ב עֲנֵ֥נִי יְהֹוָ֗ה חֻקֶּ֥יךָ אֶצֹּֽרָה׃

verses.text_en: I call upon You; save me, that I may keep Your decrees.
verses.text_he: קְרָאתִ֥יךָ הוֹשִׁיעֵ֑נִי וְ֝אֶשְׁמְרָ֗ה עֵדֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: I rise before dawn and cry for help; I hope for Your word.
verses.text_he: קִדַּ֣מְתִּי בַ֭נֶּשֶׁף וָאֲשַׁוֵּ֑עָה (לדבריך) [לִדְבָרְךָ֥] יִחָֽלְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: My eyes greet each watch of the night, as I meditate on Your promise.
verses.text_he: קִדְּמ֣וּ עֵ֭ינַי אַשְׁמֻר֑וֹת לָ֝שִׂ֗יחַ בְּאִמְרָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Hear my voice as befits Your steadfast love; O LORD, preserve me, as is Your rule.
verses.text_he: ק֭וֹלִי שִׁמְעָ֣ה כְחַסְדֶּ֑ךָ יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה כְּֽמִשְׁפָּטֶ֥ךָ חַיֵּֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Those who pursue intrigue draw near; they are far from Your teaching.
verses.text_he: קָ֭רְבוּ רֹדְפֵ֣י זִמָּ֑ה מִתּוֹרָתְךָ֥ רָחָֽקוּ׃

verses.text_en: You, O LORD, are near, and all Your commandments are true.
verses.text_he: קָר֣וֹב אַתָּ֣ה יְהֹוָ֑ה וְֽכׇל־מִצְוֺתֶ֥יךָ אֱמֶֽת׃

verses.text_en: I know from Your decrees of old that You have established them forever.
verses.text_he: קֶ֣דֶם יָ֭דַעְתִּי מֵעֵדֹתֶ֑יךָ כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם יְסַדְתָּֽם׃{פ}

verses.text_en: See my affliction and rescue me, for I have not neglected Your teaching.
verses.text_he: רְאֵה־עׇנְיִ֥י וְחַלְּצֵ֑נִי כִּי־ת֥֝וֹרָתְךָ֗ לֹ֣א שָׁכָֽחְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: Champion my cause and redeem me; preserve me according to Your promise.
verses.text_he: רִיבָ֣ה רִ֭יבִי וּגְאָלֵ֑נִי לְאִמְרָתְךָ֥ חַיֵּֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Deliverance is far from the wicked, for they have not turned to Your laws.
verses.text_he: רָח֣וֹק מֵרְשָׁעִ֣ים יְשׁוּעָ֑ה כִּי־חֻ֝קֶּ֗יךָ לֹ֣א דָרָֽשׁוּ׃

verses.text_en: Your mercies are great, O LORD; as is Your rule, preserve me.
verses.text_he: רַחֲמֶ֖יךָ רַבִּ֥ים׀יְהֹוָ֑ה כְּֽמִשְׁפָּטֶ֥יךָ חַיֵּֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Many are my persecutors and foes; I have not swerved from Your decrees.
verses.text_he: רַ֭בִּים רֹדְפַ֣י וְצָרָ֑י מֵ֝עֵדְוֺתֶ֗יךָ לֹ֣א נָטִֽיתִי׃

verses.text_en: I have seen traitors and loathed them, because they did not keep Your word in mind.
verses.text_he: רָאִ֣יתִי בֹ֭גְדִים וָאֶתְקוֹטָ֑טָה אֲשֶׁ֥ר אִ֝מְרָתְךָ֗ לֹ֣א שָׁמָֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: See that I have loved Your precepts; O LORD, preserve me, as befits Your steadfast love.
verses.text_he: רְ֭אֵה כִּי־פִקּוּדֶ֣יךָ אָהָ֑בְתִּי יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה כְּֽחַסְדְּךָ֥ חַיֵּֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: Truth is the essence of Your word; Your just rules are eternal.
verses.text_he: רֹאשׁ־דְּבָרְךָ֥ אֱמֶ֑ת וּ֝לְעוֹלָ֗ם כׇּל־מִשְׁפַּ֥ט צִדְקֶֽךָ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Princes have persecuted me without reason; my heart thrills at Your word.
verses.text_he: שָׂ֭רִים רְדָפ֣וּנִי חִנָּ֑ם (ומדבריך) [וּ֝מִדְּבָרְךָ֗] פָּחַ֥ד לִבִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: I rejoice over Your promise as one who obtains great spoil.
verses.text_he: שָׂ֣שׂ אָ֭נֹכִי עַל־אִמְרָתֶ֑ךָ כְּ֝מוֹצֵ֗א שָׁלָ֥ל רָֽב׃

verses.text_en: I hate and abhor falsehood; I love Your teaching.
verses.text_he: שֶׁ֣קֶר שָׂ֭נֵאתִי וַאֲתַעֵ֑בָה תּוֹרָתְךָ֥ אָהָֽבְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: I praise You seven times each day for Your just rules.
verses.text_he: שֶׁ֣בַע בַּ֭יּוֹם הִלַּלְתִּ֑יךָ עַ֝֗ל מִשְׁפְּטֵ֥י צִדְקֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Those who love Your teaching enjoy well-being; they encounter no adversity.
verses.text_he: שָׁל֣וֹם רָ֭ב לְאֹהֲבֵ֣י תוֹרָתֶ֑ךָ וְאֵֽין־לָ֥מוֹ מִכְשֽׁוֹל׃

verses.text_en: I hope for Your deliverance, O LORD; I observe Your commandments.
verses.text_he: שִׂבַּ֣רְתִּי לִישׁוּעָתְךָ֣ יְהֹוָ֑ה וּֽמִצְוֺתֶ֥יךָ עָשִֽׂיתִי׃

verses.text_en: I obey Your decrees and love them greatly.
verses.text_he: שָֽׁמְרָ֣ה נַ֭פְשִׁי עֵדֹתֶ֑יךָ וָאֹהֲבֵ֥ם מְאֹֽד׃

verses.text_en: I obey Your precepts and decrees; all my ways are before You.
verses.text_he: שָׁמַ֣רְתִּי פִ֭קּוּדֶיךָ וְעֵדֹתֶ֑יךָ כִּ֖י כׇל־דְּרָכַ֣י נֶגְדֶּֽךָ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: May my plea reach You, O LORD; grant me understanding according to Your word.
verses.text_he: תִּקְרַ֤ב רִנָּתִ֣י לְפָנֶ֣יךָ יְהֹוָ֑ה כִּדְבָרְךָ֥ הֲבִינֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: May my petition come before You; save me in accordance with Your promise.
verses.text_he: תָּב֣וֹא תְחִנָּתִ֣י לְפָנֶ֑יךָ כְּ֝אִמְרָתְךָ֗ הַצִּילֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: My lips shall pour forth praise, for You teach me Your laws.
verses.text_he: תַּבַּ֣עְנָה שְׂפָתַ֣י תְּהִלָּ֑ה כִּ֖י תְלַמְּדֵ֣נִי חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: My tongue shall declare Your promise, for all Your commandments are just.
verses.text_he: תַּ֣עַן לְ֭שׁוֹנִי אִמְרָתֶ֑ךָ כִּ֖י כׇל־מִצְוֺתֶ֣יךָ צֶּֽדֶק׃

verses.text_en: Lend Your hand to help me, for I have chosen Your precepts.
verses.text_he: תְּהִי־יָדְךָ֥ לְעׇזְרֵ֑נִי כִּ֖י פִקּוּדֶ֣יךָ בָחָֽרְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: I have longed for Your deliverance, O LORD; Your teaching is my delight.
verses.text_he: תָּאַ֣בְתִּי לִישׁוּעָתְךָ֣ יְהֹוָ֑ה וְ֝ת֥וֹרָתְךָ֗ שַׁעֲשֻׁעָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Let me live, that I may praise You; may Your rules be my help;
verses.text_he: תְּֽחִי־נַ֭פְשִׁי וּֽתְהַלְלֶ֑ךָּ וּֽמִשְׁפָּטֶ֥ךָ יַעְזְרֻֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: I have strayed like a lost sheep; search for Your servant, for I have not neglected Your commandments.
verses.text_he: תָּעִ֗יתִי כְּשֶׂ֣ה אֹ֭בֵד בַּקֵּ֣שׁ עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ כִּ֥י מִ֝צְוֺתֶ֗יךָ לֹ֣א שָׁכָֽחְתִּי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song of ascents. In my distress I called to the LORD and He answered me.
verses.text_he: שִׁ֗יר הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת אֶל־יְ֭הֹוָה בַּצָּרָ֣תָה לִּ֑י קָ֝רָ֗אתִי וַֽיַּעֲנֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, save me from treacherous lips, from a deceitful tongue!
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה הַצִּ֣ילָה נַ֭פְשִׁי מִשְּׂפַת־שֶׁ֑קֶר מִלָּשׁ֥וֹן רְמִיָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: What can you profit, what can you gain, O deceitful tongue?
verses.text_he: מַה־יִּתֵּ֣ן לְ֭ךָ וּמַה־יֹּסִ֥יף לָ֗ךְ לָשׁ֥וֹן רְמִיָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: A warrior’s sharp arrows, with hot coals of broom-wood.
verses.text_he: חִצֵּ֣י גִבּ֣וֹר שְׁנוּנִ֑ים עִ֝֗ם גַּחֲלֵ֥י רְתָמִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Woe is me, that I live with Meshech, that I dwell among the clans of Kedar.
verses.text_he: אֽוֹיָה־לִ֭י כִּי־גַ֣רְתִּי מֶ֑שֶׁךְ שָׁ֝כַ֗נְתִּי עִֽם־אׇהֳלֵ֥י קֵדָֽר׃

verses.text_en: Too long have I dwelt with those who hate peace.
verses.text_he: רַ֭בַּת שָֽׁכְנָה־לָּ֣הּ נַפְשִׁ֑י עִ֝֗ם שׂוֹנֵ֥א שָׁלֽוֹם׃

verses.text_en: I am all peace; but when I speak, they are for war.
verses.text_he: אֲֽנִי־שָׁ֭לוֹם וְכִ֣י אֲדַבֵּ֑ר הֵ֝֗מָּה לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song for ascents. I turn my eyes to the mountains; from where will my help come?
verses.text_he: שִׁ֗יר לַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת אֶשָּׂ֣א עֵ֭ינַי אֶל־הֶהָרִ֑ים מֵ֝אַ֗יִן יָבֹ֥א עֶזְרִֽי׃

verses.text_en: My help comes from the LORD, maker of heaven and earth.
verses.text_he: עֶ֭זְרִי מֵעִ֣ם יְהֹוָ֑ה עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה שָׁמַ֥יִם וָאָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: He will not let your foot give way; your guardian will not slumber;
verses.text_he: אַל־יִתֵּ֣ן לַמּ֣וֹט רַגְלֶ֑ךָ אַל־יָ֝נ֗וּם שֹׁמְרֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: See, the guardian of Israel neither slumbers nor sleeps!
verses.text_he: הִנֵּ֣ה לֹֽא־יָ֭נוּם וְלֹ֣א יִישָׁ֑ן שׁ֝וֹמֵ֗ר יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is your guardian, the LORD is your protection at your right hand.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֥ה שֹׁמְרֶ֑ךָ יְהֹוָ֥ה צִ֝לְּךָ֗ עַל־יַ֥ד יְמִינֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: By day the sun will not strike you, nor the moon by night.
verses.text_he: יוֹמָ֗ם הַשֶּׁ֥מֶשׁ לֹֽא־יַכֶּ֗כָּה וְיָרֵ֥חַ בַּלָּֽיְלָה׃

verses.text_en: The LORD will guard you from all harm; He will guard your life.
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה יִשְׁמׇרְךָ֥ מִכׇּל־רָ֑ע יִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר אֶת־נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃

verses.text_en: The LORD will guard your going and coming now and forever.
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה יִשְׁמׇר־צֵאתְךָ֥ וּבוֹאֶ֑ךָ מֵ֝עַתָּ֗ה וְעַד־עוֹלָֽם׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song of ascents. Of David. I rejoiced when they said to me, “We are going to the House of the LORD.”
verses.text_he: שִׁ֥יר הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת לְדָ֫וִ֥ד שָׂ֭מַחְתִּי בְּאֹמְרִ֣ים לִ֑י בֵּ֖ית יְהֹוָ֣ה נֵלֵֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: Our feet stood inside your gates, O Jerusalem,
verses.text_he: עֹ֭מְדוֹת הָי֣וּ רַגְלֵ֑ינוּ בִּ֝שְׁעָרַ֗יִךְ יְרוּשָׁלָֽ͏ִם׃

verses.text_en: Jerusalem built up, a city knit together,
verses.text_he: יְרוּשָׁלַ֥͏ִם הַבְּנוּיָ֑ה כְּ֝עִ֗יר שֶׁחֻבְּרָה־לָּ֥הּ יַחְדָּֽו׃

verses.text_en: to which tribes would make pilgrimage, the tribes of the LORD, —as was enjoined upon Israel— to praise the name of the LORD.
verses.text_he: שֶׁשָּׁ֨ם עָל֪וּ שְׁבָטִ֡ים שִׁבְטֵי־יָ֭הּ עֵד֣וּת לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל לְ֝הֹד֗וֹת לְשֵׁ֣ם יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: There the thrones of judgment stood, thrones of the house of David.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י שָׁ֨מָּה׀ יָשְׁב֣וּ כִסְא֣וֹת לְמִשְׁפָּ֑ט כִּ֝סְא֗וֹת לְבֵ֣ית דָּוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: Pray for the well-being of Jerusalem; “May those who love you be at peace.
verses.text_he: שַׁ֭אֲלוּ שְׁל֣וֹם יְרוּשָׁלָ֑͏ִם יִ֝שְׁלָ֗יוּ אֹהֲבָֽיִךְ׃

verses.text_en: May there be well-being within your ramparts, peace in your citadels.”
verses.text_he: יְהִי־שָׁל֥וֹם בְּחֵילֵ֑ךְ שַׁ֝לְוָ֗ה בְּאַרְמְנוֹתָֽיִךְ׃

verses.text_en: For the sake of my kin and friends, I pray for your well-being;
verses.text_he: לְ֭מַעַן אַחַ֣י וְרֵעָ֑י אֲדַבְּרָה־נָּ֖א שָׁל֣וֹם בָּֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: for the sake of the house of the LORD our God, I seek your good.
verses.text_he: לְ֭מַעַן בֵּית־יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ אֲבַקְשָׁ֖ה ט֣וֹב לָֽךְ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song of ascents. To You, enthroned in heaven, I turn my eyes.
verses.text_he: שִׁ֗יר הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת אֵ֭לֶיךָ נָשָׂ֣אתִי אֶת־עֵינַ֑י הַ֝יֹּשְׁבִ֗י בַּשָּׁמָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: As the eyes of slaves follow their master’s hand, as the eyes of a slave-girl follow the hand of her mistress, so our eyes are toward the LORD our God, awaiting His favor.
verses.text_he: הִנֵּ֨ה כְעֵינֵ֪י עֲבָדִ֡ים אֶל־יַ֤ד אֲֽדוֹנֵיהֶ֗ם כְּעֵינֵ֣י שִׁפְחָה֮ אֶל־יַ֢ד גְּבִ֫רְתָּ֥הּ כֵּ֣ן עֵ֭ינֵינוּ אֶל־יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ עַ֝֗ד שֶׁיְּחׇנֵּֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: Show us favor, O LORD, show us favor! We have had more than enough of contempt.
verses.text_he: חׇנֵּ֣נוּ יְהֹוָ֣ה חׇנֵּ֑נוּ כִּי־רַ֝֗ב שָׂבַ֥עְנוּ בֽוּז׃

verses.text_en: Long enough have we endured the scorn of the complacent, the contempt of the haughty.
verses.text_he: רַבַּת֮ שָֽׂבְעָה־לָּ֢הּ נַ֫פְשֵׁ֥נוּ הַלַּ֥עַג הַשַּֽׁאֲנַנִּ֑ים הַ֝בּ֗וּז (לגאיונים) [לִגְאֵ֥י יוֹנִֽים]׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song of ascents. Of David. Were it not for the LORD, who was on our side, let Israel now declare,
verses.text_he: שִׁ֥יר הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת לְדָ֫וִ֥ד לוּלֵ֣י יְ֭הֹוָה שֶׁהָ֣יָה לָ֑נוּ יֹאמַר־נָ֝֗א יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: were it not for the LORD, who was on our side when men assailed us,
verses.text_he: לוּלֵ֣י יְ֭הֹוָה שֶׁהָ֣יָה לָ֑נוּ בְּק֖וּם עָלֵ֣ינוּ אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: they would have swallowed us alive in their burning rage against us;
verses.text_he: אֲ֭זַי חַיִּ֣ים בְּלָע֑וּנוּ בַּחֲר֖וֹת אַפָּ֣ם בָּֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: the waters would have carried us off, the torrent would have swept over us;
verses.text_he: אֲ֭זַי הַמַּ֣יִם שְׁטָפ֑וּנוּ נַ֝֗חְלָה עָבַ֥ר עַל־נַפְשֵֽׁנוּ׃

verses.text_en: over us would have swept the seething waters.
verses.text_he: אֲ֭זַי עָבַ֣ר עַל־נַפְשֵׁ֑נוּ הַ֝מַּ֗יִם הַזֵּידוֹנִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Blessed is the LORD, who did not let us be ripped apart by their teeth.
verses.text_he: בָּר֥וּךְ יְהֹוָ֑ה שֶׁלֹּ֥א נְתָנָ֥נוּ טֶ֝֗רֶף לְשִׁנֵּיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: We are like a bird escaped from the fowler’s trap; the trap broke and we escaped.
verses.text_he: נַפְשֵׁ֗נוּ כְּצִפּ֥וֹר נִמְלְטָה֮ מִפַּ֢ח י֫וֹקְשִׁ֥ים הַפַּ֥ח נִשְׁבָּ֗ר וַאֲנַ֥חְנוּ נִמְלָֽטְנוּ׃

verses.text_en: Our help is the name of the LORD, maker of heaven and earth.
verses.text_he: עֶ֭זְרֵנוּ בְּשֵׁ֣ם יְהֹוָ֑ה עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה שָׁמַ֥יִם וָאָֽרֶץ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song of ascents. Those who trust in the LORD are like Mount Zion that cannot be moved, enduring forever.
verses.text_he: שִׁ֗יר הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת הַבֹּטְחִ֥ים בַּיהֹוָ֑ה כְּֽהַר־צִיּ֥וֹן לֹא־יִ֝מּ֗וֹט לְעוֹלָ֥ם יֵשֵֽׁב׃

verses.text_en: Jerusalem, hills enfold it, and the LORD enfolds His people now and forever.
verses.text_he: יְֽרוּשָׁלַ֗͏ִם הָרִים֮ סָבִ֢יב לָ֥֫הּ וַ֭יהֹוָה סָבִ֣יב לְעַמּ֑וֹ מֵ֝עַתָּ֗ה וְעַד־עוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: The scepter of the wicked shall never rest upon the land allotted to the righteous, that the righteous not set their hand to wrongdoing.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י לֹ֪א יָנ֡וּחַ שֵׁ֤בֶט הָרֶ֗שַׁע עַל֮ גּוֹרַ֢ל הַֽצַּדִּ֫יקִ֥ים לְמַ֡עַן לֹא־יִשְׁלְח֖וּ הַצַּדִּיקִ֨ים בְּעַוְלָ֬תָה יְדֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: Do good, O LORD, to the good, to the upright in heart.
verses.text_he: הֵיטִ֣יבָה יְ֭הֹוָה לַטּוֹבִ֑ים וְ֝לִישָׁרִ֗ים בְּלִבּוֹתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: But those who in their crookedness act corruptly, let the LORD make them go the way of evildoers. May it be well with Israel!
verses.text_he: וְהַמַּטִּ֤ים עֲֽקַלְקַלּוֹתָ֗ם יוֹלִיכֵ֣ם יְ֭הֹוָה אֶת־פֹּעֲלֵ֣י הָאָ֑וֶן שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם עַל־יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song of ascents. When the LORD restores the fortunes of Zion —we see it as in a dream—
verses.text_he: שִׁ֗יר הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת בְּשׁ֣וּב יְ֭הֹוָה אֶת־שִׁיבַ֣ת צִיּ֑וֹן הָ֝יִ֗ינוּ כְּחֹלְמִֽים׃

verses.text_en: our mouths shall be filled with laughter, our tongues, with songs of joy. Then shall they say among the nations, “The LORD has done great things for them!”
verses.text_he: אָ֤ז יִמָּלֵ֪א שְׂח֡וֹק פִּינוּ֮ וּלְשׁוֹנֵ֢נוּ רִ֫נָּ֥ה אָ֭ז יֹאמְר֣וּ בַגּוֹיִ֑ם הִגְדִּ֥יל יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת עִם־אֵֽלֶּה׃

verses.text_en: The LORD will do great things for us and we shall rejoice.
verses.text_he: הִגְדִּ֣יל יְ֭הֹוָה לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת עִמָּ֗נוּ הָיִ֥ינוּ שְׂמֵחִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Restore our fortunes, O LORD, like watercourses in the Negeb.
verses.text_he: שׁוּבָ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה אֶת־[שְׁבִיתֵ֑נוּ] (שבותנו) כַּאֲפִיקִ֥ים בַּנֶּֽגֶב׃

verses.text_en: They who sow in tears shall reap with songs of joy.
verses.text_he: הַזֹּרְעִ֥ים בְּדִמְעָ֗ה בְּרִנָּ֥ה יִקְצֹֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: Though he goes along weeping, carrying the seed-bag, he shall come back with songs of joy, carrying his sheaves.
verses.text_he: הָ֘ל֤וֹךְ יֵלֵ֨ךְ׀ וּבָכֹה֮ נֹשֵׂ֢א מֶשֶׁךְ־הַ֫זָּ֥רַע בֹּא־יָבֹ֥א בְרִנָּ֑ה נֹ֝שֵׂ֗א אֲלֻמֹּתָֽיו׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song of ascents. Of Solomon. Unless the LORD builds the house, its builders labor in vain on it; unless the LORD watches over the city, the watchman keeps vigil in vain.
verses.text_he: שִׁ֥יר הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת לִשְׁלֹ֫מֹ֥ה אִם־יְהֹוָ֤ה׀ לֹא־יִבְנֶ֬ה בַ֗יִת שָׁ֤וְא עָמְל֣וּ בוֹנָ֣יו בּ֑וֹ אִם־יְהֹוָ֥ה לֹא־יִשְׁמׇר־עִ֝֗יר שָׁ֤וְא׀ שָׁקַ֬ד שׁוֹמֵֽר׃

verses.text_en: In vain do you rise early and stay up late, you who toil for the bread you eat; He provides as much for His loved ones while they sleep.
verses.text_he: שָׁ֤וְא לָכֶ֨ם מַשְׁכִּ֪ימֵֽי ק֡וּם מְאַחֲרֵי־שֶׁ֗בֶת אֹ֭כְלֵי לֶ֣חֶם הָעֲצָבִ֑ים כֵּ֤ן יִתֵּ֖ן לִידִיד֣וֹ שֵׁנָֽא׃

verses.text_en: Sons are the provision of the LORD; the fruit of the womb, His reward.
verses.text_he: הִנֵּ֤ה נַחֲלַ֣ת יְהֹוָ֣ה בָּנִ֑ים שָׂ֝כָ֗ר פְּרִ֣י הַבָּֽטֶן׃

verses.text_en: Like arrows in the hand of a warrior are sons born to a man in his youth.
verses.text_he: כְּחִצִּ֥ים בְּיַד־גִּבּ֑וֹר כֵּ֝֗ן בְּנֵ֣י הַנְּעוּרִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Happy is the man who fills his quiver with them; they shall not be put to shame when they contend with the enemy in the gate.
verses.text_he: אַשְׁרֵ֤י הַגֶּ֗בֶר אֲשֶׁ֤ר מִלֵּ֥א אֶת־אַשְׁפָּת֗וֹ מֵ֫הֶ֥ם לֹֽא־יֵבֹ֑שׁוּ כִּֽי־יְדַבְּר֖וּ אֶת־אוֹיְבִ֣ים בַּשָּֽׁעַר׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song of ascents. Happy are all who fear the LORD, who follow His ways.
verses.text_he: שִׁ֗יר הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת אַ֭שְׁרֵי כׇּל־יְרֵ֣א יְהֹוָ֑ה הַ֝הֹלֵ֗ךְ בִּדְרָכָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: You shall enjoy the fruit of your labors; you shall be happy and you shall prosper.
verses.text_he: יְגִ֣יעַ כַּ֭פֶּיךָ כִּ֣י תֹאכֵ֑ל אַ֝שְׁרֶ֗יךָ וְט֣וֹב לָֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: Your wife shall be like a fruitful vine within your house; your sons, like olive saplings around your table.
verses.text_he: אֶשְׁתְּךָ֤׀ כְּגֶ֥פֶן פֹּרִיָּה֮ בְּיַרְכְּתֵ֢י בֵ֫יתֶ֥ךָ בָּ֭נֶיךָ כִּשְׁתִלֵ֣י זֵיתִ֑ים סָ֝בִ֗יב לְשֻׁלְחָנֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: So shall the man who fears the LORD be blessed.
verses.text_he: הִנֵּ֣ה כִי־כֵ֭ן יְבֹ֥רַךְ גָּ֗בֶר יְרֵ֣א יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: May the LORD bless you from Zion; may you share the prosperity of Jerusalem all the days of your life,
verses.text_he: יְבָרֶכְךָ֥ יְהֹוָ֗ה מִצִּ֫יּ֥וֹן וּ֭רְאֵה בְּט֣וּב יְרוּשָׁלָ֑͏ִם כֹּ֝֗ל יְמֵ֣י חַיֶּֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: and live to see your children’s children. May all be well with Israel!
verses.text_he: וּרְאֵֽה־בָנִ֥ים לְבָנֶ֑יךָ שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם עַל־יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song of ascents. Since my youth they have often assailed me, let Israel now declare,
verses.text_he: שִׁ֗יר הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת רַ֭בַּת צְרָר֣וּנִי מִנְּעוּרַ֑י יֹאמַר־נָ֝֗א יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: since my youth they have often assailed me, but they have never overcome me.
verses.text_he: רַ֭בַּת צְרָר֣וּנִי מִנְּעוּרָ֑י גַּ֝֗ם לֹא־יָ֥כְלוּ לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Plowmen plowed across my back; they made long furrows.
verses.text_he: עַל־גַּ֭בִּי חָרְשׁ֣וּ חֹרְשִׁ֑ים הֶ֝אֱרִ֗יכוּ (למענותם) [לְמַעֲנִיתָֽם]׃

verses.text_en: The LORD, the righteous one, has snapped the cords of the wicked.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֥ה צַדִּ֑יק קִ֝צֵּ֗ץ עֲב֣וֹת רְשָׁעִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Let all who hate Zion fall back in disgrace.
verses.text_he: יֵ֭בֹשׁוּ וְיִסֹּ֣גוּ אָח֑וֹר כֹּ֝֗ל שֹׂנְאֵ֥י צִיּֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: Let them be like grass on roofs that fades before it can be pulled up,
verses.text_he: יִ֭הְיוּ כַּחֲצִ֣יר גַּגּ֑וֹת שֶׁקַּדְמַ֖ת שָׁלַ֣ף יָבֵֽשׁ׃

verses.text_en: that affords no handful for the reaper, no armful for the gatherer of sheaves,
verses.text_he: שֶׁלֹּ֤א מִלֵּ֖א כַפּ֥וֹ קוֹצֵ֗ר וְחִצְנ֥וֹ מְעַמֵּֽר׃

verses.text_en: no exchange with passersby: “The blessing of the LORD be upon you.” “We bless you by the name of the LORD.”
verses.text_he: וְלֹ֤א אָמְר֨וּ׀ הָעֹבְרִ֗ים בִּרְכַּֽת־יְהֹוָ֥ה אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם בֵּרַ֥כְנוּ אֶ֝תְכֶ֗ם בְּשֵׁ֣ם יְהֹוָֽה׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song of ascents. Out of the depths I call You, O LORD.
verses.text_he: שִׁ֥יר הַֽמַּעֲל֑וֹת מִמַּעֲמַקִּ֖ים קְרָאתִ֣יךָ יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: O Lord, listen to my cry; let Your ears be attentive to my plea for mercy.
verses.text_he: אֲדֹנָי֮ שִׁמְעָ֢ה בְק֫וֹלִ֥י תִּהְיֶ֣ינָה אׇ֭זְנֶיךָ קַשֻּׁב֑וֹת לְ֝ק֗וֹל תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃

verses.text_en: If You keep account of sins, O LORD, Lord, who will survive?
verses.text_he: אִם־עֲוֺנ֥וֹת תִּשְׁמׇר־יָ֑הּ אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י מִ֣י יַעֲמֹֽד׃

verses.text_en: Yours is the power to forgive so that You may be held in awe.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־עִמְּךָ֥ הַסְּלִיחָ֑ה לְ֝מַ֗עַן תִּוָּרֵֽא׃

verses.text_en: I look to the LORD; I look to Him; I await His word.
verses.text_he: קִוִּ֣יתִי יְ֭הֹוָה קִוְּתָ֣ה נַפְשִׁ֑י וְֽלִדְבָר֥וֹ הוֹחָֽלְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: I am more eager for the Lord than watchmen for the morning, watchmen for the morning.
verses.text_he: נַפְשִׁ֥י לַאדֹנָ֑י מִשֹּׁמְרִ֥ים לַ֝בֹּ֗קֶר שֹׁמְרִ֥ים לַבֹּֽקֶר׃

verses.text_en: O Israel, wait for the LORD; for with the LORD is steadfast love and great power to redeem.
verses.text_he: יַחֵ֥ל יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל אֶל־יְ֫הֹוָ֥ה כִּֽי־עִם־יְהֹוָ֥ה הַחֶ֑סֶד וְהַרְבֵּ֖ה עִמּ֣וֹ פְדֽוּת׃

verses.text_en: It is He who will redeem Israel from all their iniquities.
verses.text_he: וְ֭הוּא יִפְדֶּ֣ה אֶת־יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל מִ֝כֹּ֗ל עֲוֺנֹתָֽיו׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song of ascents. Of David. O LORD, my heart is not proud nor my look haughty; I do not aspire to great things or to what is beyond me;
verses.text_he: שִׁ֥יר הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת לְדָ֫וִ֥ד יְהֹוָ֤ה׀ לֹא־גָבַ֣הּ לִ֭בִּי וְלֹא־רָמ֣וּ עֵינַ֑י וְלֹֽא־הִלַּ֓כְתִּי׀ בִּגְדֹל֖וֹת וּבְנִפְלָא֣וֹת מִמֶּֽנִּי׃

verses.text_en: but I have taught myself to be contented like a weaned child with its mother; like a weaned child am I in my mind.
verses.text_he: אִם־לֹ֤א שִׁוִּ֨יתִי׀ וְדוֹמַ֗מְתִּי נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י כְּ֭גָמֻל עֲלֵ֣י אִמּ֑וֹ כַּגָּמֻ֖ל עָלַ֣י נַפְשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: O Israel, wait for the LORD now and forever.
verses.text_he: יַחֵ֣ל יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל אֶל־יְהֹוָ֑ה מֵ֝עַתָּ֗ה וְעַד־עוֹלָֽם׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song of ascents. O LORD, remember in David’s favor his extreme self-denial,
verses.text_he: שִׁ֗יר הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת זְכוֹר־יְהֹוָ֥ה לְדָוִ֑ד אֵ֝֗ת כׇּל־עֻנּוֹתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: how he swore to the LORD, vowed to the Mighty One of Jacob,
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֣ר נִ֭שְׁבַּע לַֽיהֹוָ֑ה נָ֝דַ֗ר לַאֲבִ֥יר יַעֲקֹֽב׃

verses.text_en: “I will not enter my house, nor will I mount my bed,
verses.text_he: אִם־אָ֭בֹא בְּאֹ֣הֶל בֵּיתִ֑י אִם־אֶ֝עֱלֶ֗ה עַל־עֶ֥רֶשׂ יְצוּעָֽי׃

verses.text_en: I will not give sleep to my eyes, or slumber to my eyelids
verses.text_he: אִם־אֶתֵּ֣ן שְׁנַ֣ת לְעֵינָ֑י לְֽעַפְעַפַּ֥י תְּנוּמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: until I find a place for the LORD, an abode for the Mighty One of Jacob.”
verses.text_he: עַד־אֶמְצָ֣א מָ֭קוֹם לַיהֹוָ֑ה מִ֝שְׁכָּנ֗וֹת לַאֲבִ֥יר יַעֲקֹֽב׃

verses.text_en: We heard it was in Ephrath; we came upon it in the region of Jaar.
verses.text_he: הִנֵּֽה־שְׁמַעֲנ֥וּהָ בְאֶפְרָ֑תָה מְ֝צָאנ֗וּהָ בִּשְׂדֵי־יָֽעַר׃

verses.text_en: Let us enter His abode, bow at His footstool.
verses.text_he: נָב֥וֹאָה לְמִשְׁכְּנוֹתָ֑יו נִ֝שְׁתַּחֲוֶ֗ה לַהֲדֹ֥ם רַגְלָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: Advance, O LORD, to Your resting-place, You and Your mighty Ark!
verses.text_he: קוּמָ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה לִמְנוּחָתֶ֑ךָ אַ֝תָּ֗ה וַאֲר֥וֹן עֻזֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Your priests are clothed in triumph; Your loyal ones sing for joy.
verses.text_he: כֹּהֲנֶ֥יךָ יִלְבְּשׁוּ־צֶ֑דֶק וַחֲסִידֶ֥יךָ יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: For the sake of Your servant David do not reject Your anointed one.
verses.text_he: בַּ֭עֲבוּר דָּוִ֣ד עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ אַל־תָּ֝שֵׁ֗ב פְּנֵ֣י מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: The LORD swore to David a firm oath that He will not renounce, “One of your own issue I will set upon your throne.
verses.text_he: נִשְׁבַּֽע־יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ לְדָוִ֡ד אֱמֶת֮ לֹא־יָשׁ֢וּב מִ֫מֶּ֥נָּה מִפְּרִ֥י בִטְנְךָ֑ אָ֝שִׁ֗ית לְכִסֵּא־לָֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: If your sons keep My covenant and My decrees that I teach them, then their sons also, to the end of time, shall sit upon your throne.”
verses.text_he: אִֽם־יִשְׁמְר֬וּ בָנֶ֨יךָ׀ בְּרִיתִי֮ וְעֵדֹתִ֥י ז֗וֹ אֲלַ֫מְּדֵ֥ם גַּם־בְּנֵיהֶ֥ם עֲדֵי־עַ֑ד יֵ֝שְׁב֗וּ לְכִסֵּא־לָֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: For the LORD has chosen Zion; He has desired it for His seat.
verses.text_he: כִּי־בָחַ֣ר יְהֹוָ֣ה בְּצִיּ֑וֹן אִ֝וָּ֗הּ לְמוֹשָׁ֥ב לֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: “This is my resting-place for all time; here I will dwell, for I desire it.
verses.text_he: זֹאת־מְנוּחָתִ֥י עֲדֵי־עַ֑ד פֹּה־אֵ֝שֵׁ֗ב כִּ֣י אִוִּתִֽיהָ׃

verses.text_en: I will amply bless its store of food, give its needy their fill of bread.
verses.text_he: צֵ֭ידָהּ בָּרֵ֣ךְ אֲבָרֵ֑ךְ אֶ֝בְיוֹנֶ֗יהָ אַשְׂבִּ֥יעַֽ לָֽחֶם׃

verses.text_en: I will clothe its priests in victory, its loyal ones shall sing for joy.
verses.text_he: וְֽ֭כֹהֲנֶיהָ אַלְבִּ֣ישׁ יֶ֑שַׁע וַ֝חֲסִידֶ֗יהָ רַנֵּ֥ן יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: There I will make a horn sprout for David; I have prepared a lamp for My anointed one.
verses.text_he: שָׁ֤ם אַצְמִ֣יחַ קֶ֣רֶן לְדָוִ֑ד עָרַ֥כְתִּי נֵ֝֗ר לִמְשִׁיחִֽי׃

verses.text_en: I will clothe his enemies in disgrace, while on him his crown shall sparkle.”
verses.text_he: א֭וֹיְבָיו אַלְבִּ֣ישׁ בֹּ֑שֶׁת וְ֝עָלָ֗יו יָצִ֥יץ נִזְרֽוֹ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song of ascents. Of David. How good and how pleasant it is that brothers dwell together.
verses.text_he: שִׁ֥יר הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת לְדָ֫וִ֥ד הִנֵּ֣ה מַה־טּ֭וֹב וּמַה־נָּעִ֑ים שֶׁ֖בֶת אַחִ֣ים גַּם־יָֽחַד׃

verses.text_en: It is like fine oil on the head running down onto the beard, the beard of Aaron, that comes down over the collar of his robe;
verses.text_he: כַּשֶּׁ֤מֶן הַטּ֨וֹב׀ עַל־הָרֹ֗אשׁ יֹרֵ֗ד עַֽל־הַזָּקָ֥ן זְקַֽן־אַהֲרֹ֑ן שֶׁ֝יֹּרֵ֗ד עַל־פִּ֥י מִדּוֹתָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: like the dew of Hermon that falls upon the mountains of Zion. There the LORD ordained blessing, everlasting life.
verses.text_he: כְּטַל־חֶרְמ֗וֹן שֶׁיֹּרֵד֮ עַל־הַרְרֵ֢י צִ֫יּ֥וֹן כִּ֤י שָׁ֨ם׀ צִוָּ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה אֶת־הַבְּרָכָ֑ה חַ֝יִּ֗ים עַד־הָעוֹלָֽם׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song of ascents. Now bless the LORD, all you servants of the LORD who stand nightly in the house of the LORD.
verses.text_he: שִׁ֗יר הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת הִנֵּ֤ה׀ בָּרְכ֣וּ אֶת־יְ֭הֹוָה כׇּל־עַבְדֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה הָעֹמְדִ֥ים בְּבֵית־יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה בַּלֵּילֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: Lift your hands toward the sanctuary and bless the LORD.
verses.text_he: שְׂאֽוּ־יְדֵכֶ֥ם קֹ֑דֶשׁ וּ֝בָרְכ֗וּ אֶת־יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: May the LORD, maker of heaven and earth, bless you from Zion.
verses.text_he: יְבָרֶכְךָ֣ יְ֭הֹוָה מִצִּיּ֑וֹן עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה שָׁמַ֥יִם וָאָֽרֶץ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Hallelujah. Praise the name of the LORD; give praise, you servants of the LORD
verses.text_he: הַ֥לְלוּ־יָ֨הּ׀ הַֽ֭לְלוּ אֶת־שֵׁ֣ם יְהֹוָ֑ה הַֽ֝לְל֗וּ עַבְדֵ֥י יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: who stand in the house of the LORD, in the courts of the house of our God.
verses.text_he: שֶׁ֣֭עֹמְדִים בְּבֵ֣ית יְהֹוָ֑ה בְּ֝חַצְר֗וֹת בֵּ֣ית אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: Praise the LORD, for the LORD is good; sing hymns to His name, for it is pleasant.
verses.text_he: הַֽלְלוּ־יָ֭הּ כִּֽי־ט֣וֹב יְהֹוָ֑ה זַמְּר֥וּ לִ֝שְׁמ֗וֹ כִּ֣י נָעִֽים׃

verses.text_en: For the LORD has chosen Jacob for Himself, Israel, as His treasured possession.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־יַעֲקֹ֗ב בָּחַ֣ר ל֣וֹ יָ֑הּ יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל לִסְגֻלָּתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: For I know that the LORD is great, that our Lord is greater than all gods.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י אֲנִ֣י יָ֭דַעְתִּי כִּֽי־גָד֣וֹל יְהֹוָ֑ה וַ֝אֲדֹנֵ֗ינוּ מִכׇּל־אֱלֹהִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Whatever the LORD desires He does in heaven and earth, in the seas and all the depths.
verses.text_he: כֹּ֤ל אֲשֶׁר־חָפֵ֥ץ יְהֹוָ֗ה עָ֫שָׂ֥ה בַּשָּׁמַ֥יִם וּבָאָ֑רֶץ בַּ֝יַּמִּ֗ים וְכׇל־תְּהֹמֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: He makes clouds rise from the end of the earth; He makes lightning for the rain; He releases the wind from His vaults.
verses.text_he: מַעֲלֶ֣ה נְשִׂאִים֮ מִקְצֵ֢ה הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ בְּרָקִ֣ים לַמָּטָ֣ר עָשָׂ֑ה מֽוֹצֵא־ר֝֗וּחַ מֵאֽוֹצְרוֹתָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: He struck down the first-born of Egypt, man and beast alike;
verses.text_he: שֶׁ֭הִכָּה בְּכוֹרֵ֣י מִצְרָ֑יִם מֵ֝אָדָ֗ם עַד־בְּהֵמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: He sent signs and portents against Egypt, against Pharaoh and all his servants;
verses.text_he: שָׁלַ֤ח׀ אוֹתֹ֣ת וּ֭מֹפְתִים בְּתוֹכֵ֣כִי מִצְרָ֑יִם בְּ֝פַרְעֹ֗ה וּבְכׇל־עֲבָדָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: He struck down many nations and slew numerous kings—
verses.text_he: שֶׁ֭הִכָּה גּוֹיִ֣ם רַבִּ֑ים וְ֝הָרַ֗ג מְלָכִ֥ים עֲצוּמִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Sihon, king of the Amorites, Og, king of Bashan, and all the royalty of Canaan—
verses.text_he: לְסִיח֤וֹן׀ מֶ֤לֶךְ הָאֱמֹרִ֗י וּ֭לְעוֹג מֶ֣לֶךְ הַבָּשָׁ֑ן וּ֝לְכֹ֗ל מַמְלְכ֥וֹת כְּנָֽעַן׃

verses.text_en: and gave their lands as a heritage, as a heritage to His people Israel.
verses.text_he: וְנָתַ֣ן אַרְצָ֣ם נַחֲלָ֑ה נַ֝חֲלָ֗ה לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל עַמּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, Your name endures forever, Your fame, O LORD, through all generations;
verses.text_he: יְ֭הֹוָה שִׁמְךָ֣ לְעוֹלָ֑ם יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה זִכְרְךָ֥ לְדֹר־וָדֹֽר׃

verses.text_en: for the LORD will champion His people, and obtain satisfaction for His servants.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־יָדִ֣ין יְהֹוָ֣ה עַמּ֑וֹ וְעַל־עֲ֝בָדָ֗יו יִתְנֶחָֽם׃

verses.text_en: The idols of the nations are silver and gold, the work of men’s hands.
verses.text_he: עֲצַבֵּ֣י הַ֭גּוֹיִם כֶּ֣סֶף וְזָהָ֑ב מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗ה יְדֵ֣י אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: They have mouths, but cannot speak; they have eyes, but cannot see;
verses.text_he: פֶּֽה־לָ֭הֶם וְלֹ֣א יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ עֵינַ֥יִם לָ֝הֶ֗ם וְלֹ֣א יִרְאֽוּ׃

verses.text_en: they have ears, but cannot hear, nor is there breath in their mouths.
verses.text_he: אׇזְנַ֣יִם לָ֭הֶם וְלֹ֣א יַאֲזִ֑ינוּ אַ֝֗ף אֵין־יֶשׁ־ר֥וּחַ בְּפִיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: Those who fashion them, all who trust in them, shall become like them.
verses.text_he: כְּ֭מוֹהֶם יִהְי֣וּ עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם כֹּ֖ל אֲשֶׁר־בֹּטֵ֣חַ בָּהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: O house of Israel, bless the LORD; O house of Aaron, bless the LORD;
verses.text_he: בֵּ֣ית יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל בָּרְכ֣וּ אֶת־יְהֹוָ֑ה בֵּ֥ית אַ֝הֲרֹ֗ן בָּרְכ֥וּ אֶת־יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: O house of Levi, bless the LORD; you who fear the LORD, bless the LORD.
verses.text_he: בֵּ֣ית הַ֭לֵּוִי בָּרְכ֣וּ אֶת־יְהֹוָ֑ה יִֽרְאֵ֥י יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה בָּרְכ֥וּ אֶת־יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Blessed is the LORD from Zion, He who dwells in Jerusalem. Hallelujah.
verses.text_he: בָּ֘ר֤וּךְ יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ מִצִּיּ֗וֹן שֹׁ֘כֵ֤ן יְֽרוּשָׁלָ֗͏ִם הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Praise the LORD; for He is good, His steadfast love is eternal.
verses.text_he: הוֹד֣וּ לַיהֹוָ֣ה כִּי־ט֑וֹב כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Praise the God of gods, His steadfast love is eternal.
verses.text_he: ה֭וֹדוּ לֵאלֹהֵ֣י הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Praise the Lord of lords, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: ה֭וֹדוּ לַאֲדֹנֵ֣י הָאֲדֹנִ֑ים כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Who alone works great marvels, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: לְעֹ֘שֵׂ֤ה נִפְלָא֣וֹת גְּדֹל֣וֹת לְבַדּ֑וֹ כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Who made the heavens with wisdom, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: לְעֹשֵׂ֣ה הַ֭שָּׁמַיִם בִּתְבוּנָ֑ה כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Who spread the earth over the water, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: לְרֹקַ֣ע הָ֭אָרֶץ עַל־הַמָּ֑יִם כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Who made the great lights, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: לְ֭עֹשֵׂה אוֹרִ֣ים גְּדֹלִ֑ים כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: the sun to dominate the day, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: אֶת־הַ֭שֶּׁמֶשׁ לְמֶמְשֶׁ֣לֶת בַּיּ֑וֹם כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: the moon and the stars to dominate the night, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: אֶת־הַיָּרֵ֣חַ וְ֭כוֹכָבִים לְמֶמְשְׁל֣וֹת בַּלָּ֑יְלָה כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Who struck Egypt through their first-born, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: לְמַכֵּ֣ה מִ֭צְרַיִם בִּבְכוֹרֵיהֶ֑ם כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: and brought Israel out of their midst, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: וַיּוֹצֵ֣א יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל מִתּוֹכָ֑ם כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: with a strong hand and outstretched arm, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: בְּיָ֣ד חֲ֭זָקָה וּבִזְר֣וֹעַ נְטוּיָ֑ה כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Who split apart the Sea of Reeds, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: לְגֹזֵ֣ר יַם־ס֭וּף לִגְזָרִ֑ים כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: and made Israel pass through it, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: וְהֶעֱבִ֣יר יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל בְּתוֹכ֑וֹ כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Who hurled Pharaoh and his army into the Sea of Reeds, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: וְנִ֘עֵ֤ר פַּרְעֹ֣ה וְחֵיל֣וֹ בְיַם־ס֑וּף כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Who led His people through the wilderness, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: לְמוֹלִ֣יךְ עַ֭מּוֹ בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Who struck down great kings, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: לְ֭מַכֵּה מְלָכִ֣ים גְּדֹלִ֑ים כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: and slew mighty kings— His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: וַֽ֭יַּהֲרֹג מְלָכִ֣ים אַדִּירִ֑ים כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Sihon, king of the Amorites, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: לְ֭סִיחוֹן מֶ֣לֶךְ הָאֱמֹרִ֑י כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Og, king of Bashan— His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: וּ֭לְעוֹג מֶ֣לֶךְ הַבָּשָׁ֑ן כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: and gave their land as a heritage, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: וְנָתַ֣ן אַרְצָ֣ם לְנַחֲלָ֑ה כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: a heritage to His servant Israel, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: נַ֭חֲלָה לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל עַבְדּ֑וֹ כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Who took note of us in our degradation, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: שֶׁ֭בְּשִׁפְלֵנוּ זָ֣כַר לָ֑נוּ כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: and rescued us from our enemies, His steadfast love is eternal;
verses.text_he: וַיִּפְרְקֵ֥נוּ מִצָּרֵ֑ינוּ כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Who gives food to all flesh, His steadfast love is eternal.
verses.text_he: נֹתֵ֣ן לֶ֭חֶם לְכׇל־בָּשָׂ֑ר כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Praise the God of heaven, His steadfast love is eternal.
verses.text_he: ה֭וֹדוּ לְאֵ֣ל הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם כִּ֖י לְעוֹלָ֣ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: By the rivers of Babylon, there we sat, sat and wept, as we thought of Zion.
verses.text_he: עַ֥ל־נַהֲר֨וֹת׀ בָּבֶ֗ל שָׁ֣ם יָ֭שַׁבְנוּ גַּם־בָּכִ֑ינוּ בְּ֝זׇכְרֵ֗נוּ אֶת־צִיּֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: There on the poplars we hung up our lyres,
verses.text_he: עַֽל־עֲרָבִ֥ים בְּתוֹכָ֑הּ תָּ֝לִ֗ינוּ כִּנֹּרוֹתֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: for our captors asked us there for songs, our tormentors, for amusement: “Sing us one of the songs of Zion.”
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י שָׁ֨ם שְֽׁאֵל֪וּנוּ שׁוֹבֵ֡ינוּ דִּבְרֵי־שִׁ֭יר וְתוֹלָלֵ֣ינוּ שִׂמְחָ֑ה שִׁ֥ירוּ לָ֝֗נוּ מִשִּׁ֥יר צִיּֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: How can we sing a song of the LORD on alien soil?
verses.text_he: אֵ֗יךְ נָשִׁ֥יר אֶת־שִׁיר־יְהֹוָ֑ה עַ֝֗ל אַדְמַ֥ת נֵכָֽר׃

verses.text_en: If I forget you, O Jerusalem, let my right hand wither;
verses.text_he: אִֽם־אֶשְׁכָּחֵ֥ךְ יְֽרוּשָׁלָ֗͏ִם תִּשְׁכַּ֥ח יְמִינִֽי׃

verses.text_en: let my tongue stick to my palate if I cease to think of you, if I do not keep Jerusalem in memory even at my happiest hour.
verses.text_he: תִּדְבַּֽק־לְשׁוֹנִ֨י׀ לְחִכִּי֮ אִם־לֹ֢א אֶ֫זְכְּרֵ֥כִי אִם־לֹ֣א אַ֭עֲלֶה אֶת־יְרוּשָׁלַ֑͏ִם עַ֝֗ל רֹ֣אשׁ שִׂמְחָתִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Remember, O LORD, against the Edomites the day of Jerusalem’s fall; how they cried, “Strip her, strip her to her very foundations!”
verses.text_he: זְכֹ֤ר יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ לִבְנֵ֬י אֱד֗וֹם אֵת֮ י֤וֹם יְֽר֫וּשָׁלָ֥͏ִם הָ֭אֹ֣מְרִים עָ֤רוּ׀ עָ֑רוּ עַ֝֗ד הַיְס֥וֹד בָּֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: Fair Babylon, you predator, a blessing on him who repays you in kind what you have inflicted on us;
verses.text_he: בַּת־בָּבֶ֗ל הַשְּׁד֫וּדָ֥ה אַשְׁרֵ֥י שֶׁיְשַׁלֶּם־לָ֑ךְ אֶת־גְּ֝מוּלֵ֗ךְ שֶׁגָּמַ֥לְתְּ לָֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: a blessing on him who seizes your babies and dashes them against the rocks!
verses.text_he: אַשְׁרֵ֤י׀ שֶׁיֹּאחֵ֓ז וְנִפֵּ֬ץ אֶֽת־עֹלָלַ֗יִךְ אֶל־הַסָּֽלַע׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Of David. I praise You with all my heart, sing a hymn to You before the divine beings;
verses.text_he: לְדָוִ֨ד׀ אוֹדְךָ֥ בְכׇל־לִבִּ֑י נֶ֖גֶד אֱלֹהִ֣ים אֲזַמְּרֶֽךָּ׃

verses.text_en: I bow toward Your holy temple and praise Your name for Your steadfast love and faithfulness, because You have exalted Your name, Your word, above all.
verses.text_he: אֶשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֨ה אֶל־הֵיכַ֪ל קׇדְשְׁךָ֡ וְא֘וֹדֶ֤ה אֶת־שְׁמֶ֗ךָ עַל־חַסְדְּךָ֥ וְעַל־אֲמִתֶּ֑ךָ כִּֽי־הִגְדַּ֥לְתָּ עַל־כׇּל־שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ אִמְרָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: When I called, You answered me, You inspired me with courage.
verses.text_he: בְּי֣וֹם קָ֭רָֽאתִי וַֽתַּעֲנֵ֑נִי תַּרְהִבֵ֖נִי בְנַפְשִׁ֣י עֹֽז׃

verses.text_en: All the kings of the earth shall praise You, O LORD, for they have heard the words You spoke.
verses.text_he: יוֹד֣וּךָ יְ֭הֹוָה כׇּל־מַלְכֵי־אָ֑רֶץ כִּ֥י שָׁ֝מְע֗וּ אִמְרֵי־פִֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: They shall sing of the ways of the LORD, “Great is the majesty of the LORD!”
verses.text_he: וְ֭יָשִׁירוּ בְּדַרְכֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה כִּֽי־גָ֝ד֗וֹל כְּב֣וֹד יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: High though the LORD is, He sees the lowly; lofty, He perceives from afar.
verses.text_he: כִּי־רָ֣ם יְ֭הֹוָה וְשָׁפָ֣ל יִרְאֶ֑ה וְ֝גָבֹ֗הַּ מִמֶּרְחָ֥ק יְיֵדָֽע׃

verses.text_en: Though I walk among enemies, You preserve me in the face of my foes; You extend Your hand; with Your right hand You deliver me.
verses.text_he: אִם־אֵלֵ֤ךְ׀ בְּקֶ֥רֶב צָרָ֗ה תְּחַ֫יֵּ֥נִי עַ֤ל אַ֣ף אֹ֭יְבַי תִּשְׁלַ֣ח יָדֶ֑ךָ וְת֖וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי יְמִינֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: The LORD will settle accounts for me. O LORD, Your steadfast love is eternal; do not forsake the work of Your hands.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָה֮ יִגְמֹ֢ר בַּ֫עֲדִ֥י יְ֭הֹוָה חַסְדְּךָ֣ לְעוֹלָ֑ם מַעֲשֵׂ֖י יָדֶ֣יךָ אַל־תֶּֽרֶף׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. Of David. A psalm. O LORD, You have examined me and know me.
verses.text_he: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ לְדָוִ֣ד מִזְמ֑וֹר יְהֹוָ֥ה חֲ֝קַרְתַּ֗נִי וַתֵּדָֽע׃

verses.text_en: When I sit down or stand up You know it; You discern my thoughts from afar.
verses.text_he: אַתָּ֣ה יָ֭דַעְתָּ שִׁבְתִּ֣י וְקוּמִ֑י בַּ֥נְתָּה לְ֝רֵעִ֗י מֵרָחֽוֹק׃

verses.text_en: You observe my walking and reclining, and are familiar with all my ways.
verses.text_he: אׇרְחִ֣י וְרִבְעִ֣י זֵרִ֑יתָ וְֽכׇל־דְּרָכַ֥י הִסְכַּֽנְתָּה׃

verses.text_en: There is not a word on my tongue but that You, O LORD, know it well.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י אֵ֣ין מִ֭לָּה בִּלְשׁוֹנִ֑י הֵ֥ן יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה יָדַ֥עְתָּ כֻלָּֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: You hedge me before and behind; You lay Your hand upon me.
verses.text_he: אָח֣וֹר וָקֶ֣דֶם צַרְתָּ֑נִי וַתָּ֖שֶׁת עָלַ֣י כַּפֶּֽכָה׃

verses.text_en: It is beyond my knowledge; it is a mystery; I cannot fathom it.
verses.text_he: (פלאיה) [פְּלִ֣יאָֽה] דַ֣עַת מִמֶּ֑נִּי נִ֝שְׂגְּבָ֗ה לֹא־א֥וּכַֽל לָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: Where can I escape from Your spirit? Where can I flee from Your presence?
verses.text_he: אָ֭נָֽה אֵלֵ֣ךְ מֵרוּחֶ֑ךָ וְ֝אָ֗נָה מִפָּנֶ֥יךָ אֶבְרָֽח׃

verses.text_en: If I ascend to heaven, You are there; if I descend to Sheol, You are there too.
verses.text_he: אִם־אֶסַּ֣ק שָׁ֭מַיִם שָׁ֣ם אָ֑תָּה וְאַצִּ֖יעָה שְּׁא֣וֹל הִנֶּֽךָּ׃

verses.text_en: If I take wing with the dawn to come to rest on the western horizon,
verses.text_he: אֶשָּׂ֥א כַנְפֵי־שָׁ֑חַר אֶ֝שְׁכְּנָ֗ה בְּאַחֲרִ֥ית יָֽם׃

verses.text_en: even there Your hand will be guiding me, Your right hand will be holding me fast.
verses.text_he: גַּם־שָׁ֭ם יָדְךָ֣ תַנְחֵ֑נִי וְֽתֹאחֲזֵ֥נִי יְמִינֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: If I say, “Surely darkness will conceal me, night will provide me with cover,”
verses.text_he: וָ֭אֹמַר אַךְ־חֹ֣שֶׁךְ יְשׁוּפֵ֑נִי וְ֝לַ֗יְלָה א֣וֹר בַּעֲדֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: darkness is not dark for You; night is as light as day; darkness and light are the same.
verses.text_he: גַּם־חֹשֶׁךְ֮ לֹא־יַחְשִׁ֢יךְ מִ֫מֶּ֥ךָּ וְ֭לַיְלָה כַּיּ֣וֹם יָאִ֑יר כַּ֝חֲשֵׁיכָ֗ה כָּאוֹרָֽה׃

verses.text_en: It was You who created my conscience; You fashioned me in my mother’s womb.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־אַ֭תָּה קָנִ֣יתָ כִלְיֹתָ֑י תְּ֝סֻכֵּ֗נִי בְּבֶ֣טֶן אִמִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: I praise You, for I am awesomely, wondrously made; Your work is wonderful; I know it very well.
verses.text_he: אוֹדְךָ֗ עַ֤ל כִּ֥י נוֹרָא֗וֹת נִ֫פְלֵ֥יתִי נִפְלָאִ֥ים מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ וְ֝נַפְשִׁ֗י יֹדַ֥עַת מְאֹֽד׃

verses.text_en: My frame was not concealed from You when I was shaped in a hidden place, knit together in the recesses of the earth.
verses.text_he: לֹֽא־נִכְחַ֥ד עׇצְמִ֗י מִ֫מֶּ֥ךָּ אֲשֶׁר־עֻשֵּׂ֥יתִי בַסֵּ֑תֶר רֻ֝קַּ֗מְתִּי בְּֽתַחְתִּיּ֥וֹת אָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: Your eyes saw my unformed limbs; they were all recorded in Your book; in due time they were formed, to the very last one of them.
verses.text_he: גׇּלְמִ֤י׀ רָ֘א֤וּ עֵינֶ֗יךָ וְעַֽל־סִפְרְךָ֮ כֻּלָּ֢ם יִכָּ֫תֵ֥בוּ יָמִ֥ים יֻצָּ֑רוּ (ולא) [וְל֖וֹ] אֶחָ֣ד בָּהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: How weighty Your thoughts seem to me, O God, how great their number!
verses.text_he: וְלִ֗י מַה־יָּקְר֣וּ רֵעֶ֣יךָ אֵ֑ל מֶ֥ה עָ֝צְמ֗וּ רָאשֵׁיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: I count them—they exceed the grains of sand; I end—but am still with You.
verses.text_he: אֶ֭סְפְּרֵם מֵח֣וֹל יִרְבּ֑וּן הֱ֝קִיצֹ֗תִי וְעוֹדִ֥י עִמָּֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: O God, if You would only slay the wicked— you murderers, away from me!—
verses.text_he: אִם־תִּקְטֹ֖ל אֱל֥וֹהַּ׀רָשָׁ֑ע וְאַנְשֵׁ֥י דָ֝מִ֗ים ס֣וּרוּ מֶֽנִּי׃

verses.text_en: who invoke You for intrigue, Your enemies who swear by You falsely.
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֣ר יֹ֭מְרוּךָ לִמְזִמָּ֑ה נָשׂ֖וּא לַשָּׁ֣וְא עָרֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, You know I hate those who hate You, and loathe Your adversaries.
verses.text_he: הֲלֽוֹא־מְשַׂנְאֶ֖יךָ יְהֹוָ֥ה׀אֶשְׂנָ֑א וּ֝בִתְקוֹמְמֶ֗יךָ אֶתְקוֹטָֽט׃

verses.text_en: I feel a perfect hatred toward them; I count them my enemies.
verses.text_he: תַּכְלִ֣ית שִׂנְאָ֣ה שְׂנֵאתִ֑ים לְ֝אוֹיְבִ֗ים הָ֣יוּ לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Examine me, O God, and know my mind; probe me and know my thoughts.
verses.text_he: חׇקְרֵ֣נִי אֵ֭ל וְדַ֣ע לְבָבִ֑י בְּ֝חָנֵ֗נִי וְדַ֣ע שַׂרְעַפָּֽי׃

verses.text_en: See if I have vexatious ways, and guide me in ways everlasting.
verses.text_he: וּרְאֵ֗ה אִם־דֶּֽרֶךְ־עֹ֥צֶב בִּ֑י וּ֝נְחֵ֗נִי בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ עוֹלָֽם׃{פ}

verses.text_en: For the leader. A psalm of David.
verses.text_he: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ מִזְמ֥וֹר לְדָוִֽד׃

verses.text_en: Rescue me, O LORD, from evil men; save me from the lawless,
verses.text_he: חַלְּצֵ֣נִי יְ֭הֹוָה מֵאָדָ֣ם רָ֑ע מֵאִ֖ישׁ חֲמָסִ֣ים תִּנְצְרֵֽנִי׃

verses.text_en: whose minds are full of evil schemes, who plot war every day.
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֤ר חָשְׁב֣וּ רָע֣וֹת בְּלֵ֑ב כׇּל־י֝֗וֹם יָג֥וּרוּ מִלְחָמֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: They sharpen their tongues like serpents; spiders’ poison is on their lips. .
verses.text_he: שָׁ֥נְנ֣וּ לְשׁוֹנָם֮ כְּֽמוֹ־נָ֫חָ֥שׁ חֲמַ֥ת עַכְשׁ֑וּב תַּ֖חַת שְׂפָתֵ֣ימוֹ סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, keep me out of the clutches of the wicked; save me from lawless men who scheme to make me fall.
verses.text_he: שׇׁמְרֵ֤נִי יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ מִ֘ידֵ֤י רָשָׁ֗ע מֵאִ֣ישׁ חֲמָסִ֣ים תִּנְצְרֵ֑נִי אֲשֶׁ֥ר חָ֝שְׁב֗וּ לִדְח֥וֹת פְּעָמָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Arrogant men laid traps with ropes for me; they spread out a net along the way; they set snares for me. .
verses.text_he: טָ֥מְנֽוּ־גֵאִ֨ים׀ פַּ֡ח לִ֗י וַחֲבָלִ֗ים פָּ֣רְשׂוּ רֶ֭שֶׁת לְיַד־מַעְגָּ֑ל מֹקְשִׁ֖ים שָׁתוּ־לִ֣י סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: I said to the LORD: You are my God; give ear, O LORD, to my pleas for mercy.
verses.text_he: אָמַ֣רְתִּי לַ֭יהֹוָה אֵ֣לִי אָ֑תָּה הַאֲזִ֥ינָה יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה ק֣וֹל תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃

verses.text_en: O GOD, my Lord, the strength of my deliverance, You protected my head on the day of battle.
verses.text_he: יֱהֹוִ֣ה אֲ֭דֹנָי עֹ֣ז יְשׁוּעָתִ֑י סַכֹּ֥תָה לְ֝רֹאשִׁ֗י בְּי֣וֹם נָֽשֶׁק׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, do not grant the desires of the wicked; do not let their plan succeed, else they be exalted. .
verses.text_he: אַל־תִּתֵּ֣ן יְ֭הֹוָה מַאֲוַיֵּ֣י רָשָׁ֑ע זְמָמ֥וֹ אַל־תָּ֝פֵ֗ק יָר֥וּמוּ סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: May the heads of those who beset me be covered with the mischief of their lips.
verses.text_he: רֹ֥אשׁ מְסִבָּ֑י עֲמַ֖ל שְׂפָתֵ֣ימוֹ (יכסומו) [יְכַסֵּֽימוֹ]׃

verses.text_en: may coals of fire drop down upon them, and they be cast into pits, never to rise again.
verses.text_he: (ימיטו) [יִמּ֥וֹטוּ] עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם גֶּחָ֫לִ֥ים בָּאֵ֥שׁ יַפִּלֵ֑ם בְּ֝מַהֲמֹר֗וֹת בַּל־יָקֽוּמוּ׃

verses.text_en: Let slanderers have no place in the land; let the evil of the lawless man drive him into corrals.
verses.text_he: אִ֥ישׁ לָשׁוֹן֮ בַּל־יִכּ֢וֹן בָּ֫אָ֥רֶץ אִישׁ־חָמָ֥ס רָ֑ע יְ֝צוּדֶ֗נּוּ לְמַדְחֵפֹֽת׃

verses.text_en: I know that the LORD will champion the cause of the poor, the right of the needy.
verses.text_he: (ידעת) [יָדַ֗עְתִּי] כִּֽי־יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה דִּ֣ין עָנִ֑י מִ֝שְׁפַּ֗ט אֶבְיֹנִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Righteous men shall surely praise Your name; the upright shall dwell in Your presence.
verses.text_he: אַ֣ךְ צַ֭דִּיקִים יוֹד֣וּ לִשְׁמֶ֑ךָ יֵשְׁב֥וּ יְ֝שָׁרִ֗ים אֶת־פָּנֶֽיךָ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A psalm of David. I call You, O LORD, hasten to me; give ear to my cry when I call You.
verses.text_he: מִזְמ֗וֹר לְדָ֫וִ֥ד יְהֹוָ֣ה קְ֭רָאתִיךָ ח֣וּשָׁה לִּ֑י הַאֲזִ֥ינָה ק֝וֹלִ֗י בְּקׇרְאִי־לָֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: Take my prayer as an offering of incense, my upraised hands as an evening sacrifice.
verses.text_he: תִּכּ֤וֹן תְּפִלָּתִ֣י קְטֹ֣רֶת לְפָנֶ֑יךָ מַֽשְׂאַ֥ת כַּ֝פַּ֗י מִנְחַת־עָֽרֶב׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, set a guard over my mouth, a watch at the door of my lips;
verses.text_he: שִׁיתָ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה שׇׁמְרָ֣ה לְפִ֑י נִ֝צְּרָ֗ה עַל־דַּ֥ל שְׂפָתָֽי׃

verses.text_en: let my mind not turn to an evil thing, to practice deeds of wickedness with men who are evildoers; let me not feast on their dainties.
verses.text_he: אַל־תַּט־לִבִּ֨י לְדָבָ֪ר׀רָ֡ע לְהִתְע֘וֹלֵ֤ל עֲלִל֨וֹת׀ בְּרֶ֗שַׁע אֶת־אִישִׁ֥ים פֹּעֲלֵי־אָ֑וֶן וּבַל־אֶ֝לְחַ֗ם בְּמַנְעַמֵּיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: Let the righteous man strike me in loyalty, let him reprove me; let my head not refuse such choice oil. My prayers are still against their evil deeds.
verses.text_he: יֶ֥הֶלְמֵֽנִי־צַדִּ֨יק׀ חֶ֡סֶד וְֽיוֹכִיחֵ֗נִי שֶׁ֣מֶן רֹ֭אשׁ אַל־יָנִ֣י רֹאשִׁ֑י כִּי־ע֥וֹד וּ֝תְפִלָּתִ֗י בְּרָעוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: May their judges slip on the rock, but let my words be heard, for they are sweet.
verses.text_he: נִשְׁמְט֣וּ בִֽידֵי־סֶ֭לַע שֹׁפְטֵיהֶ֑ם וְשָׁמְע֥וּ אֲ֝מָרַ֗י כִּ֣י נָעֵֽמוּ׃

verses.text_en: As when the earth is cleft and broken up our bones are scattered at the mouth of Sheol.
verses.text_he: כְּמ֤וֹ פֹלֵ֣חַ וּבֹקֵ֣עַ בָּאָ֑רֶץ נִפְזְר֥וּ עֲ֝צָמֵ֗ינוּ לְפִ֣י שְׁאֽוֹל׃

verses.text_en: My eyes are fixed upon You, O GOD my Lord; I seek refuge in You, do not put me in jeopardy.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י אֵלֶ֨יךָ׀ יֱהֹוִ֣ה אֲדֹנָ֣י עֵינָ֑י בְּכָ֥ה חָ֝סִ֗יתִי אַל־תְּעַ֥ר נַפְשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: Keep me from the trap laid for me, and from the snares of evildoers.
verses.text_he: שׇׁמְרֵ֗נִי מִ֣ידֵי פַ֭ח יָ֣קְשׁוּ לִ֑י וּ֝מֹקְשׁ֗וֹת פֹּ֣עֲלֵי אָֽוֶן׃

verses.text_en: Let the wicked fall into their nets while I alone come through.
verses.text_he: יִפְּל֣וּ בְמַכְמֹרָ֣יו רְשָׁעִ֑ים יַ֥חַד אָ֝נֹכִ֗י עַֽד־אֶעֱבֽוֹר׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A maskil of David, while he was in the cave. A prayer.
verses.text_he: מַשְׂכִּ֥יל לְדָוִ֑ד בִּֽהְיוֹת֖וֹ בַמְּעָרָ֣ה תְפִלָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: I cry aloud to the LORD; I appeal to the LORD loudly for mercy.
verses.text_he: ק֭וֹלִי אֶל־יְהֹוָ֣ה אֶזְעָ֑ק ק֝וֹלִ֗י אֶל־יְהֹוָ֥ה אֶתְחַנָּֽן׃

verses.text_en: I pour out my complaint before Him; I lay my trouble before Him
verses.text_he: אֶשְׁפֹּ֣ךְ לְפָנָ֣יו שִׂיחִ֑י צָ֝רָתִ֗י לְפָנָ֥יו אַגִּֽיד׃

verses.text_en: when my spirit fails within me. You know my course; they have laid a trap in the path I walk.
verses.text_he: בְּהִתְעַטֵּ֬ף עָלַ֨י׀ רוּחִ֗י וְאַתָּה֮ יָדַ֢עְתָּ נְֽתִיבָ֫תִ֥י בְּאֹֽרַח־ז֥וּ אֲהַלֵּ֑ךְ טָמְנ֖וּ פַ֣ח לִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Look at my right and see— I have no friend; there is nowhere I can flee, no one cares about me.
verses.text_he: הַבֵּ֤יט יָמִ֨ין׀ וּרְאֵה֮ וְאֵֽין־לִ֢י מַ֫כִּ֥יר אָבַ֣ד מָנ֣וֹס מִמֶּ֑נִּי אֵ֖ין דּוֹרֵ֣שׁ לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: So I cry to You, O LORD; I say, “You are my refuge, all I have in the land of the living.”
verses.text_he: זָעַ֥קְתִּי אֵלֶ֗יךָ יְ֫הֹוָ֥ה אָ֭מַרְתִּי אַתָּ֣ה מַחְסִ֑י חֶ֝לְקִ֗י בְּאֶ֣רֶץ הַחַיִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: Listen to my cry, for I have been brought very low; save me from my pursuers, for they are too strong for me.
verses.text_he: הַקְשִׁ֤יבָה׀ אֶֽל־רִנָּתִי֮ כִּֽי־דַלּ֢וֹתִ֫י מְאֹ֥ד הַצִּילֵ֥נִי מֵרֹדְפַ֑י כִּ֖י אָמְצ֣וּ מִמֶּֽנִּי׃

verses.text_en: Free me from prison, that I may praise Your name. The righteous shall glory in me for Your gracious dealings with me.
verses.text_he: ה֘וֹצִ֤יאָה מִמַּסְגֵּ֨ר׀ נַפְשִׁי֮ לְהוֹד֢וֹת אֶת־שְׁ֫מֶ֥ךָ בִּ֭י יַכְתִּ֣רוּ צַדִּיקִ֑ים כִּ֖י תִגְמֹ֣ל עָלָֽי׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A psalm of David. O LORD, hear my prayer; give ear to my plea, as You are faithful; answer me, as You are beneficent.
verses.text_he: מִזְמ֗וֹר לְדָ֫וִ֥ד יְהֹוָ֤ה׀ שְׁמַ֬ע תְּפִלָּתִ֗י הַאֲזִ֥ינָה אֶל־תַּחֲנוּנַ֑י בֶּאֱמֻנָתְךָ֥ עֲ֝נֵ֗נִי בְּצִדְקָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Do not enter into judgment with Your servant, for before You no creature is in the right.
verses.text_he: וְאַל־תָּב֣וֹא בְ֭מִשְׁפָּט אֶת־עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ כִּ֤י לֹֽא־יִצְדַּ֖ק לְפָנֶ֣יךָ כׇל־חָֽי׃

verses.text_en: My foe hounded me; he crushed me to the ground; he made me dwell in darkness like those long dead.
verses.text_he: כִּ֥י רָ֘דַ֤ף אוֹיֵ֨ב׀ נַפְשִׁ֗י דִּכָּ֣א לָ֭אָרֶץ חַיָּתִ֑י הוֹשִׁבַ֥נִי בְ֝מַחֲשַׁכִּ֗ים כְּמֵתֵ֥י עוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: My spirit failed within me; my mind was numbed with horror.
verses.text_he: וַתִּתְעַטֵּ֣ף עָלַ֣י רוּחִ֑י בְּ֝תוֹכִ֗י יִשְׁתּוֹמֵ֥ם לִבִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: Then I thought of the days of old; I rehearsed all Your deeds, recounted the work of Your hands.
verses.text_he: זָ֘כַ֤רְתִּי יָמִ֨ים׀ מִקֶּ֗דֶם הָגִ֥יתִי בְכׇל־פׇּעֳלֶ֑ךָ בְּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖ה יָדֶ֣יךָ אֲשׂוֹחֵֽחַ׃

verses.text_en: I stretched out my hands to You, longing for You like thirsty earth. .
verses.text_he: פֵּרַ֣שְׂתִּי יָדַ֣י אֵלֶ֑יךָ נַפְשִׁ֓י׀ כְּאֶרֶץ־עֲיֵפָ֖ה לְךָ֣ סֶֽלָה׃

verses.text_en: Answer me quickly, O LORD; my spirit can endure no more. Do not hide Your face from me, or I shall become like those who descend into the Pit.
verses.text_he: מַ֘הֵ֤ר עֲנֵ֨נִי׀ יְהֹוָה֮ כָּלְתָ֢ה ר֫וּחִ֥י אַל־תַּסְתֵּ֣ר פָּנֶ֣יךָ מִמֶּ֑נִּי וְ֝נִמְשַׁ֗לְתִּי עִם־יֹ֥רְדֵי בֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: Let me learn of Your faithfulness by daybreak, for in You I trust; let me know the road I must take, for on You I have set my hope.
verses.text_he: הַשְׁמִ֘יעֵ֤נִי בַבֹּ֨קֶר׀ חַסְדֶּךָ֮ כִּֽי־בְךָ֢ בָ֫טָ֥חְתִּי הוֹדִיעֵ֗נִי דֶּרֶךְ־ז֥וּ אֵלֵ֑ךְ כִּי־אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ נָשָׂ֥אתִי נַפְשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: Save me from my foes, O LORD; to You I look for cover.
verses.text_he: הַצִּילֵ֖נִי מֵאֹיְבַ֥י׀יְהֹוָ֗ה אֵלֶ֥יךָ כִסִּֽתִי׃

verses.text_en: Teach me to do Your will, for You are my God. Let Your gracious spirit lead me on level ground.
verses.text_he: לַמְּדֵ֤נִי׀ לַ֥עֲשׂ֣וֹת רְצוֹנֶךָ֮ כִּֽי־אַתָּ֢ה אֱל֫וֹהָ֥י רוּחֲךָ֥ טוֹבָ֑ה תַּ֝נְחֵ֗נִי בְּאֶ֣רֶץ מִישֽׁוֹר׃

verses.text_en: For the sake of Your name, O LORD, preserve me; as You are beneficent, free me from distress.
verses.text_he: לְמַעַן־שִׁמְךָ֣ יְהֹוָ֣ה תְּחַיֵּ֑נִי בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֓׀ תּוֹצִ֖יא מִצָּרָ֣ה נַפְשִֽׁי׃

verses.text_en: As You are faithful, put an end to my foes; destroy all my mortal enemies, for I am Your servant.
verses.text_he: וּֽבְחַסְדְּךָ֮ תַּצְמִ֢ית אֹ֫יְבָ֥י וְֽ֭הַאֲבַדְתָּ כׇּל־צֹרְרֵ֣י נַפְשִׁ֑י כִּ֝֗י אֲנִ֣י עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Of David. Blessed is the LORD, my rock, who trains my hands for battle, my fingers for warfare;
verses.text_he: לְדָוִ֨ד׀ בָּ֘ר֤וּךְ יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ צוּרִ֗י הַֽמְלַמֵּ֣ד יָדַ֣י לַקְרָ֑ב אֶ֝צְבְּעוֹתַ֗י לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: my faithful one, my fortress, my haven and my deliverer, my shield, in whom I take shelter, who makes peoples subject to me.
verses.text_he: חַסְדִּ֥י וּמְצוּדָתִי֮ מִשְׂגַּבִּ֢י וּֽמְפַלְטִ֫י־לִ֥י מָ֭גִנִּי וּב֣וֹ חָסִ֑יתִי הָרוֹדֵ֖ד עַמִּ֣י תַחְתָּֽי׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, what is man that You should care about him, mortal man, that You should think of him?
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה מָֽה־אָ֭דָם וַתֵּדָעֵ֑הוּ בֶּן־אֱ֝נ֗וֹשׁ וַֽתְּחַשְּׁבֵֽהוּ׃

verses.text_en: Man is like a breath; his days are like a passing shadow.
verses.text_he: אָ֭דָם לַהֶ֣בֶל דָּמָ֑ה יָ֝מָ֗יו כְּצֵ֣ל עוֹבֵֽר׃

verses.text_en: O LORD, bend Your sky and come down; touch the mountains and they will smoke.
verses.text_he: יְ֭הֹוָה הַט־שָׁמֶ֣יךָ וְתֵרֵ֑ד גַּ֖ע בֶּהָרִ֣ים וְֽיֶעֱשָֽׁנוּ׃

verses.text_en: Make lightning flash and scatter them; shoot Your arrows and rout them.
verses.text_he: בְּר֣וֹק בָּ֭רָק וּתְפִיצֵ֑ם שְׁלַ֥ח חִ֝צֶּ֗יךָ וּתְהֻמֵּֽם׃

verses.text_en: Reach Your hand down from on high; rescue me, save me from the mighty waters, from the hands of foreigners,
verses.text_he: שְׁלַ֥ח יָדֶ֗יךָ מִ֫מָּר֥וֹם פְּצֵ֣נִי וְ֭הַצִּילֵנִי מִמַּ֣יִם רַבִּ֑ים מִ֝יַּ֗ד בְּנֵ֣י נֵכָֽר׃

verses.text_en: whose mouths speak lies, and whose oaths are false.
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֣ר פִּ֭יהֶם דִּבֶּר־שָׁ֑וְא וִ֝ימִינָ֗ם יְמִ֣ין שָֽׁקֶר׃

verses.text_en: O God, I will sing You a new song, sing a hymn to You with a ten-stringed harp,
verses.text_he: אֱֽלֹהִ֗ים שִׁ֣יר חָ֭דָשׁ אָשִׁ֣ירָה לָּ֑ךְ בְּנֵ֥בֶל עָ֝שׂ֗וֹר אֲזַמְּרָה־לָּֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: to You who give victory to kings, who rescue His servant David from the deadly sword.
verses.text_he: הַנּוֹתֵ֥ן תְּשׁוּעָ֗ה לַמְּלָ֫כִ֥ים הַ֭פּוֹצֶה אֶת־דָּוִ֥ד עַבְדּ֗וֹ מֵחֶ֥רֶב רָעָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Rescue me, save me from the hands of foreigners, whose mouths speak lies, and whose oaths are false.
verses.text_he: פְּצֵ֥נִי וְהַצִּילֵנִי֮ מִיַּ֢ד בְּֽנֵי־נֵ֫כָ֥ר אֲשֶׁ֣ר פִּ֭יהֶם דִּבֶּר־שָׁ֑וְא וִ֝ימִינָ֗ם יְמִ֣ין שָֽׁקֶר׃

verses.text_en: For our sons are like saplings, well-tended in their youth; our daughters are like cornerstones trimmed to give shape to a palace.
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֤ר בָּנֵ֨ינוּ׀ כִּנְטִעִים֮ מְגֻדָּלִ֢ים בִּֽנְעוּרֵ֫יהֶ֥ם בְּנוֹתֵ֥ינוּ כְזָוִיֹּ֑ת מְ֝חֻטָּב֗וֹת תַּבְנִ֥ית הֵיכָֽל׃

verses.text_en: Our storehouses are full, supplying produce of all kinds; our flocks number thousands, even myriads, in our fields;
verses.text_he: מְזָוֵ֣ינוּ מְלֵאִים֮ מְפִיקִ֥ים מִזַּ֗ן אֶ֫ל־זַ֥ן צֹאונֵ֣נוּ מַ֭אֲלִיפוֹת מְרֻבָּב֗וֹת בְּחוּצוֹתֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: our cattle are well cared for. There is no breaching and no sortie, and no wailing in our streets.
verses.text_he: אַלּוּפֵ֗ינוּ מְֽסֻבָּ֫לִ֥ים אֵֽין־פֶּ֭רֶץ וְאֵ֣ין יוֹצֵ֑את וְאֵ֥ין צְ֝וָחָ֗ה בִּרְחֹבֹתֵֽינוּ׃

verses.text_en: Happy the people who have it so; happy the people whose God is the LORD.
verses.text_he: אַשְׁרֵ֣י הָ֭עָם שֶׁכָּ֣כָה לּ֑וֹ אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י הָ֝עָ֗ם שֱׁיְהֹוָ֥ה אֱלֹהָֽיו׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A song of praise. Of David. I will extol You, my God and king, and bless Your name forever and ever.
verses.text_he: תְּהִלָּ֗ה לְדָ֫וִ֥ד אֲרוֹמִמְךָ֣ אֱלוֹהַ֣י הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ וַאֲבָרְכָ֥ה שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ לְעוֹלָ֥ם וָעֶֽד׃

verses.text_en: Every day will I bless You and praise Your name forever and ever.
verses.text_he: בְּכׇל־י֥וֹם אֲבָרְכֶ֑ךָּ וַאֲהַלְלָ֥ה שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ לְעוֹלָ֥ם וָעֶֽד׃

verses.text_en: Great is the LORD and much acclaimed; His greatness cannot be fathomed.
verses.text_he: גָּ֘ד֤וֹל יְהֹוָ֣ה וּמְהֻלָּ֣ל מְאֹ֑ד וְ֝לִגְדֻלָּת֗וֹ אֵ֣ין חֵֽקֶר׃

verses.text_en: One generation shall laud Your works to another and declare Your mighty acts.
verses.text_he: דּ֣וֹר לְ֭דוֹר יְשַׁבַּ֣ח מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ וּגְב֖וּרֹתֶ֣יךָ יַגִּֽידוּ׃

verses.text_en: The glorious majesty of Your splendor and Your wondrous acts will I recite.
verses.text_he: הֲ֭דַר כְּב֣וֹד הוֹדֶ֑ךָ וְדִבְרֵ֖י נִפְלְאֹתֶ֣יךָ אָשִֽׂיחָה׃

verses.text_en: Men shall talk of the might of Your awesome deeds, and I will recount Your greatness.
verses.text_he: וֶעֱז֣וּז נֽוֹרְאֹתֶ֣יךָ יֹאמֵ֑רוּ (וגדלותיך) [וּגְדֻלָּתְךָ֥] אֲסַפְּרֶֽנָּה׃

verses.text_en: They shall celebrate Your abundant goodness, and sing joyously of Your beneficence.
verses.text_he: זֵ֣כֶר רַב־טוּבְךָ֣ יַבִּ֑יעוּ וְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is gracious and compassionate, slow to anger and abounding in kindness.
verses.text_he: חַנּ֣וּן וְרַח֣וּם יְהֹוָ֑ה אֶ֥רֶךְ אַ֝פַּ֗יִם וּגְדׇל־חָֽסֶד׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is good to all, and His mercy is upon all His works.
verses.text_he: טוֹב־יְהֹוָ֥ה לַכֹּ֑ל וְ֝רַחֲמָ֗יו עַל־כׇּל־מַעֲשָֽׂיו׃

verses.text_en: All Your works shall praise You, O LORD, and Your faithful ones shall bless You.
verses.text_he: יוֹד֣וּךָ יְ֭הֹוָה כׇּל־מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ וַ֝חֲסִידֶ֗יךָ יְבָרְכֽוּכָה׃

verses.text_en: They shall talk of the majesty of Your kingship, and speak of Your might,
verses.text_he: כְּב֣וֹד מַלְכוּתְךָ֣ יֹאמֵ֑רוּ וּגְבוּרָתְךָ֥ יְדַבֵּֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: to make His mighty acts known among men and the majestic glory of His kingship.
verses.text_he: לְהוֹדִ֤יעַ׀ לִבְנֵ֣י הָ֭אָדָם גְּבוּרֹתָ֑יו וּ֝כְב֗וֹד הֲדַ֣ר מַלְכוּתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Your kingship is an eternal kingship; Your dominion is for all generations.
verses.text_he: מַֽלְכוּתְךָ֗ מַלְכ֥וּת כׇּל־עֹלָמִ֑ים וּ֝מֶֽמְשַׁלְתְּךָ֗ בְּכׇל־דּ֥וֹר וָדֹֽר׃

verses.text_en: The LORD supports all who stumble, and makes all who are bent stand straight.
verses.text_he: סוֹמֵ֣ךְ יְ֭הֹוָה לְכׇל־הַנֹּפְלִ֑ים וְ֝זוֹקֵ֗ף לְכׇל־הַכְּפוּפִֽים׃

verses.text_en: The eyes of all look to You expectantly, and You give them their food when it is due.
verses.text_he: עֵֽינֵי־כֹ֭ל אֵלֶ֣יךָ יְשַׂבֵּ֑רוּ וְאַתָּ֤ה נֽוֹתֵן־לָהֶ֖ם אֶת־אׇכְלָ֣ם בְּעִתּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: You give it openhandedly, feeding every creature to its heart’s content.
verses.text_he: פּוֹתֵ֥חַ אֶת־יָדֶ֑ךָ וּמַשְׂבִּ֖יעַ לְכׇל־חַ֣י רָצֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is beneficent in all His ways and faithful in all His works.
verses.text_he: צַדִּ֣יק יְ֭הֹוָה בְּכׇל־דְּרָכָ֑יו וְ֝חָסִ֗יד בְּכׇל־מַעֲשָֽׂיו׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is near to all who call Him, to all who call Him with sincerity.
verses.text_he: קָר֣וֹב יְ֭הֹוָה לְכׇל־קֹרְאָ֑יו לְכֹ֤ל אֲשֶׁ֖ר יִקְרָאֻ֣הוּ בֶאֱמֶֽת׃

verses.text_en: He fulfills the wishes of those who fear Him; He hears their cry and delivers them.
verses.text_he: רְצוֹן־יְרֵאָ֥יו יַעֲשֶׂ֑ה וְֽאֶת־שַׁוְעָתָ֥ם יִ֝שְׁמַ֗ע וְיוֹשִׁיעֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: The LORD watches over all who love Him, but all the wicked He will destroy.
verses.text_he: שׁוֹמֵ֣ר יְ֭הֹוָה אֶת־כׇּל־אֹהֲבָ֑יו וְאֵ֖ת כׇּל־הָרְשָׁעִ֣ים יַשְׁמִֽיד׃

verses.text_en: My mouth shall utter the praise of the LORD, and all creatures shall bless His holy name forever and ever.
verses.text_he: תְּהִלַּ֥ת יְהֹוָ֗ה יְֽדַבֶּ֫ר־פִּ֥י וִיבָרֵ֣ךְ כׇּל־בָּ֭שָׂר שֵׁ֥ם קׇדְשׁ֗וֹ לְעוֹלָ֥ם וָעֶֽד׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Hallelujah. Praise the LORD, O my soul!
verses.text_he: הַֽלְלוּ־יָ֡הּ הַֽלְלִ֥י נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י אֶת־יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: I will praise the LORD all my life, sing hymns to my God while I exist.
verses.text_he: אֲהַלְלָ֣ה יְהֹוָ֣ה בְּחַיָּ֑י אֲזַמְּרָ֖ה לֵאלֹהַ֣י בְּעוֹדִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Put not your trust in the great, in mortal man who cannot save.
verses.text_he: אַל־תִּבְטְח֥וּ בִנְדִיבִ֑ים בְּבֶן־אָדָ֓ם׀ שֶׁ֤אֵ֖ין ל֥וֹ תְשׁוּעָֽה׃

verses.text_en: His breath departs; he returns to the dust; on that day his plans come to nothing.
verses.text_he: תֵּצֵ֣א ר֭וּחוֹ יָשֻׁ֣ב לְאַדְמָת֑וֹ בַּיּ֥וֹם הַ֝ה֗וּא אָבְד֥וּ עֶשְׁתֹּנֹתָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: Happy is he who has the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in the LORD his God,
verses.text_he: אַשְׁרֵ֗י שֶׁ֤אֵ֣ל יַעֲקֹ֣ב בְּעֶזְר֑וֹ שִׂ֝בְר֗וֹ עַל־יְהֹוָ֥ה אֱלֹהָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: maker of heaven and earth, the sea and all that is in them; who keeps faith forever;
verses.text_he: עֹשֶׂ֤ה׀ שָׁ֘מַ֤יִם וָאָ֗רֶץ אֶת־הַיָּ֥ם וְאֶת־כׇּל־אֲשֶׁר־בָּ֑ם הַשֹּׁמֵ֖ר אֱמֶ֣ת לְעוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: who secures justice for those who are wronged, gives food to the hungry. The LORD sets prisoners free;
verses.text_he: עֹשֶׂ֤ה מִשְׁפָּ֨ט׀ לָעֲשׁוּקִ֗ים נֹתֵ֣ן לֶ֭חֶם לָרְעֵבִ֑ים יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה מַתִּ֥יר אֲסוּרִֽים׃

verses.text_en: The LORD restores sight to the blind; the LORD makes those who are bent stand straight; the LORD loves the righteous;
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֤ה׀ פֹּ֘קֵ֤חַ עִוְרִ֗ים יְ֭הֹוָה זֹקֵ֣ף כְּפוּפִ֑ים יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה אֹהֵ֥ב צַדִּיקִֽים׃

verses.text_en: The LORD watches over the stranger; He gives courage to the orphan and widow, but makes the path of the wicked tortuous.
verses.text_he: יְהֹוָ֤ה׀ שֹׁ֘מֵ֤ר אֶת־גֵּרִ֗ים יָת֣וֹם וְאַלְמָנָ֣ה יְעוֹדֵ֑ד וְדֶ֖רֶךְ רְשָׁעִ֣ים יְעַוֵּֽת׃

verses.text_en: The LORD shall reign forever, your God, O Zion, for all generations. Hallelujah.
verses.text_he: יִמְלֹ֤ךְ יְהֹוָ֨ה׀ לְעוֹלָ֗ם אֱלֹהַ֣יִךְ צִ֭יּוֹן לְדֹ֥ר וָדֹ֗ר הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Hallelujah. It is good to chant hymns to our God; it is pleasant to sing glorious praise.
verses.text_he: הַ֥לְלוּ־יָ֨הּ׀ כִּי־ט֭וֹב זַמְּרָ֣ה אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ כִּי־נָ֝עִ֗ים נָאוָ֥ה תְהִלָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: The LORD rebuilds Jerusalem; He gathers in the exiles of Israel.
verses.text_he: בּוֹנֵ֣ה יְרוּשָׁלַ֣͏ִם יְהֹוָ֑ה נִדְחֵ֖י יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל יְכַנֵּֽס׃

verses.text_en: He heals their broken hearts, and binds up their wounds.
verses.text_he: הָ֭רֹפֵא לִשְׁב֣וּרֵי לֵ֑ב וּ֝מְחַבֵּ֗שׁ לְעַצְּבוֹתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: He reckoned the number of the stars; to each He gave its name.
verses.text_he: מוֹנֶ֣ה מִ֭סְפָּר לַכּוֹכָבִ֑ים לְ֝כֻלָּ֗ם שֵׁמ֥וֹת יִקְרָֽא׃

verses.text_en: Great is our Lord and full of power; His wisdom is beyond reckoning.
verses.text_he: גָּד֣וֹל אֲדוֹנֵ֣ינוּ וְרַב־כֹּ֑חַ לִ֝תְבוּנָת֗וֹ אֵ֣ין מִסְפָּֽר׃

verses.text_en: The LORD gives courage to the lowly, and brings the wicked down to the dust.
verses.text_he: מְעוֹדֵ֣ד עֲנָוִ֣ים יְהֹוָ֑ה מַשְׁפִּ֖יל רְשָׁעִ֣ים עֲדֵי־אָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: Sing to the LORD a song of praise, chant a hymn with a lyre to our God,
verses.text_he: עֱנ֣וּ לַֽיהֹוָ֣ה בְּתוֹדָ֑ה זַמְּר֖וּ לֵאלֹהֵ֣ינוּ בְכִנּֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: who covers the heavens with clouds, provides rain for the earth, makes mountains put forth grass;
verses.text_he: הַֽמְכַסֶּ֬ה שָׁמַ֨יִם׀ בְּעָבִ֗ים הַמֵּכִ֣ין לָאָ֣רֶץ מָטָ֑ר הַמַּצְמִ֖יחַ הָרִ֣ים חָצִֽיר׃

verses.text_en: who gives the beasts their food, to the raven’s brood what they cry for.
verses.text_he: נוֹתֵ֣ן לִבְהֵמָ֣ה לַחְמָ֑הּ לִבְנֵ֥י עֹ֝רֵ֗ב אֲשֶׁ֣ר יִקְרָֽאוּ׃

verses.text_en: He does not prize the strength of horses, nor value the fleetness of men;
verses.text_he: לֹ֤א בִגְבוּרַ֣ת הַסּ֣וּס יֶחְפָּ֑ץ לֹא־בְשׁוֹקֵ֖י הָאִ֣ישׁ יִרְצֶֽה׃

verses.text_en: but the LORD values those who fear Him, those who depend on His faithful care.
verses.text_he: רוֹצֶ֣ה יְ֭הֹוָה אֶת־יְרֵאָ֑יו אֶת־הַֽמְיַחֲלִ֥ים לְחַסְדּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: O Jerusalem, glorify the LORD; praise your God, O Zion!
verses.text_he: שַׁבְּחִ֣י יְ֭רוּשָׁלַ͏ִם אֶת־יְהֹוָ֑ה הַֽלְלִ֖י אֱלֹהַ֣יִךְ צִיּֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: For He made the bars of your gates strong, and blessed your children within you.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־חִ֭זַּק בְּרִיחֵ֣י שְׁעָרָ֑יִךְ בֵּרַ֖ךְ בָּנַ֣יִךְ בְּקִרְבֵּֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: He endows your realm with well-being, and satisfies you with choice wheat.
verses.text_he: הַשָּׂם־גְּבוּלֵ֥ךְ שָׁל֑וֹם חֵ֥לֶב חִ֝טִּ֗ים יַשְׂבִּיעֵֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: He sends forth His word to the earth; His command runs swiftly.
verses.text_he: הַשֹּׁלֵ֣חַ אִמְרָת֣וֹ אָ֑רֶץ עַד־מְ֝הֵרָ֗ה יָר֥וּץ דְּבָרֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: He lays down snow like fleece, scatters frost like ashes.
verses.text_he: הַנֹּתֵ֣ן שֶׁ֣לֶג כַּצָּ֑מֶר כְּ֝פ֗וֹר כָּאֵ֥פֶר יְפַזֵּֽר׃

verses.text_en: He tosses down hail like crumbs— who can endure His icy cold?
verses.text_he: מַשְׁלִ֣יךְ קַֽרְח֣וֹ כְפִתִּ֑ים לִפְנֵ֥י קָ֝רָת֗וֹ מִ֣י יַעֲמֹֽד׃

verses.text_en: He issues a command—it melts them; He breathes—the waters flow.
verses.text_he: יִשְׁלַ֣ח דְּבָר֣וֹ וְיַמְסֵ֑ם יַשֵּׁ֥ב ר֝וּח֗וֹ יִזְּלוּ־מָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: He issued His commands to Jacob, His statutes and rules to Israel.
verses.text_he: מַגִּ֣יד דְּבָרָ֣ו לְיַעֲקֹ֑ב חֻקָּ֥יו וּ֝מִשְׁפָּטָ֗יו לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: He did not do so for any other nation; of such rules they know nothing. Hallelujah.
verses.text_he: לֹ֘א־עָ֤שָׂה כֵ֨ן׀ לְכׇל־גּ֗וֹי וּמִשְׁפָּטִ֥ים בַּל־יְדָע֗וּם הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Hallelujah. Praise the LORD from the heavens; praise Him on high.
verses.text_he: הַ֥לְלוּ־יָ֨הּ׀ הַֽלְל֣וּ אֶת־יְ֭הֹוָה מִן־הַשָּׁמַ֑יִם הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ בַּמְּרוֹמִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Praise Him, all His angels, praise Him, all His hosts.
verses.text_he: הַֽלְל֥וּהוּ כׇל־מַלְאָכָ֑יו הַ֝לְל֗וּהוּ כׇּל־צְבָאָֽו׃

verses.text_en: Praise Him, sun and moon, praise Him, all bright stars.
verses.text_he: הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ שֶׁ֣מֶשׁ וְיָרֵ֑חַ הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ כׇּל־כּ֥וֹכְבֵי אֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: Praise Him, highest heavens, and you waters that are above the heavens.
verses.text_he: הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ שְׁמֵ֣י הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם וְ֝הַמַּ֗יִם אֲשֶׁ֤ר׀ מֵעַ֬ל הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: Let them praise the name of the LORD, for it was He who commanded that they be created.
verses.text_he: יְֽ֭הַלְלוּ אֶת־שֵׁ֣ם יְהֹוָ֑ה כִּ֤י ה֖וּא צִוָּ֣ה וְנִבְרָֽאוּ׃

verses.text_en: He made them endure forever, establishing an order that shall never change.
verses.text_he: וַיַּעֲמִידֵ֣ם לָעַ֣ד לְעוֹלָ֑ם חׇק־נָ֝תַ֗ן וְלֹ֣א יַעֲבֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: Praise the LORD, O you who are on earth, all sea monsters and ocean depths,
verses.text_he: הַֽלְל֣וּ אֶת־יְ֭הֹוָה מִן־הָאָ֑רֶץ תַּ֝נִּינִ֗ים וְכׇל־תְּהֹמֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: fire and hail, snow and smoke, storm wind that executes His command,
verses.text_he: אֵ֣שׁ וּ֭בָרָד שֶׁ֣לֶג וְקִיט֑וֹר ר֥וּחַ סְ֝עָרָ֗ה עֹשָׂ֥ה דְבָרֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: all mountains and hills, all fruit trees and cedars,
verses.text_he: הֶהָרִ֥ים וְכׇל־גְּבָע֑וֹת עֵ֥ץ פְּ֝רִ֗י וְכׇל־אֲרָזִֽים׃

verses.text_en: all wild and tamed beasts, creeping things and winged birds,
verses.text_he: הַחַיָּ֥ה וְכׇל־בְּהֵמָ֑ה רֶ֝֗מֶשׂ וְצִפּ֥וֹר כָּנָֽף׃

verses.text_en: all kings and peoples of the earth, all princes of the earth and its judges,
verses.text_he: מַלְכֵי־אֶ֭רֶץ וְכׇל־לְאֻמִּ֑ים שָׂ֝רִ֗ים וְכׇל־שֹׁ֥פְטֵי אָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: youths and maidens alike, old and young together.
verses.text_he: בַּחוּרִ֥ים וְגַם־בְּתוּל֑וֹת זְ֝קֵנִ֗ים עִם־נְעָרִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Let them praise the name of the LORD, for His name, His alone, is sublime; His splendor covers heaven and earth.
verses.text_he: יְהַלְל֤וּ׀ אֶת־שֵׁ֬ם יְהֹוָ֗ה כִּֽי־נִשְׂגָּ֣ב שְׁמ֣וֹ לְבַדּ֑וֹ ה֝וֹד֗וֹ עַל־אֶ֥רֶץ וְשָׁמָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: He has exalted the horn of His people for the glory of all His faithful ones, Israel, the people close to Him. Hallelujah.
verses.text_he: וַיָּ֤רֶם קֶ֨רֶן׀ לְעַמּ֡וֹ תְּהִלָּ֤ה לְֽכׇל־חֲסִידָ֗יו לִבְנֵ֣י יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל עַ֥ם קְרֹב֗וֹ הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Hallelujah. Sing to the LORD a new song, His praises in the congregation of the faithful.
verses.text_he: הַ֥לְלוּ־יָ֨הּ׀ שִׁ֣ירוּ לַֽ֭יהֹוָה שִׁ֣יר חָדָ֑שׁ תְּ֝הִלָּת֗וֹ בִּקְהַ֥ל חֲסִידִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Let Israel rejoice in its maker; let the children of Zion exult in their king.
verses.text_he: יִשְׂמַ֣ח יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל בְּעֹשָׂ֑יו בְּנֵֽי־צִ֝יּ֗וֹן יָגִ֥ילוּ בְמַלְכָּֽם׃

verses.text_en: Let them praise His name in dance; with timbrel and lyre let them chant His praises.
verses.text_he: יְהַלְל֣וּ שְׁמ֣וֹ בְמָח֑וֹל בְּתֹ֥ף וְ֝כִנּ֗וֹר יְזַמְּרוּ־לֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: For the LORD delights in His people; He adorns the lowly with victory.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־רוֹצֶ֣ה יְהֹוָ֣ה בְּעַמּ֑וֹ יְפָאֵ֥ר עֲ֝נָוִ֗ים בִּישׁוּעָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Let the faithful exult in glory; let them shout for joy upon their couches,
verses.text_he: יַעְלְז֣וּ חֲסִידִ֣ים בְּכָב֑וֹד יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ עַל־מִשְׁכְּבוֹתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: with paeans to God in their throats and two-edged swords in their hands,
verses.text_he: רוֹמְמ֣וֹת אֵ֭ל בִּגְרוֹנָ֑ם וְחֶ֖רֶב פִּיפִיּ֣וֹת בְּיָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: to impose retribution upon the nations, punishment upon the peoples,
verses.text_he: לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת נְ֭קָמָה בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם תּ֝וֹכֵח֗וֹת בַּלְאֻמִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: binding their kings with shackles, their nobles with chains of iron,
verses.text_he: לֶאְסֹ֣ר מַלְכֵיהֶ֣ם בְּזִקִּ֑ים וְ֝נִכְבְּדֵיהֶ֗ם בְּכַבְלֵ֥י בַרְזֶֽל׃

verses.text_en: executing the doom decreed against them. This is the glory of all His faithful. Hallelujah.
verses.text_he: לַעֲשׂ֤וֹת בָּהֶ֨ם׀ מִשְׁפָּ֬ט כָּת֗וּב הָדָ֣ר ה֭וּא לְכׇל־חֲסִידָ֗יו הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Hallelujah. Praise God in His sanctuary; praise Him in the sky, His stronghold.
verses.text_he: הַ֥לְלוּ־יָ֨הּ׀ הַֽלְלוּ־אֵ֥ל בְּקׇדְשׁ֑וֹ הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ בִּרְקִ֥יעַ עֻזּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Praise Him for His mighty acts; praise Him for His exceeding greatness.
verses.text_he: הַלְל֥וּהוּ בִגְבוּרֹתָ֑יו הַ֝לְל֗וּהוּ כְּרֹ֣ב גֻּדְלֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Praise Him with blasts of the horn; praise Him with harp and lyre.
verses.text_he: הַ֭לְלוּהוּ בְּתֵ֣קַע שׁוֹפָ֑ר הַ֝לְל֗וּהוּ בְּנֵ֣בֶל וְכִנּֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: Praise Him with timbrel and dance; praise Him with lute and pipe.
verses.text_he: הַ֭לְלוּהוּ בְּתֹ֣ף וּמָח֑וֹל הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ בְּמִנִּ֥ים וְעֻגָֽב׃

verses.text_en: Praise Him with resounding cymbals; praise Him with loud-clashing cymbals.
verses.text_he: הַלְל֥וּהוּ בְצִלְצְלֵי־שָׁ֑מַע הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ בְּֽצִלְצְלֵ֥י תְרוּעָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Let all that breathes praise the LORD. Hallelujah.
verses.text_he: כֹּ֣ל הַ֭נְּשָׁמָה תְּהַלֵּ֥ל יָ֗הּ הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: The proverbs of Solomon son of David, king of Israel:
verses.text_he: מִ֭שְׁלֵי שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה בֶן־דָּוִ֑ד מֶ֝֗לֶךְ יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: For learning wisdom and discipline; For understanding words of discernment;
verses.text_he: לָדַ֣עַת חׇכְמָ֣ה וּמוּסָ֑ר לְ֝הָבִ֗ין אִמְרֵ֥י בִינָֽה׃

verses.text_en: For acquiring the discipline for success, Righteousness, justice, and equity;
verses.text_he: לָ֭קַחַת מוּסַ֣ר הַשְׂכֵּ֑ל צֶ֥דֶק וּ֝מִשְׁפָּ֗ט וּמֵשָׁרִֽים׃

verses.text_en: For endowing the simple with shrewdness, The young with knowledge and foresight.
verses.text_he: לָתֵ֣ת לִפְתָאיִ֣ם עׇרְמָ֑ה לְ֝נַ֗עַר דַּ֣עַת וּמְזִמָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: —The wise man, hearing them, will gain more wisdom; The discerning man will learn to be adroit;
verses.text_he: יִשְׁמַ֣ע חָ֭כָם וְי֣וֹסֶף לֶ֑קַח וְ֝נָב֗וֹן תַּחְבֻּל֥וֹת יִקְנֶֽה׃

verses.text_en: For understanding proverb and epigram, The words of the wise and their riddles.
verses.text_he: לְהָבִ֣ין מָ֭שָׁל וּמְלִיצָ֑ה דִּבְרֵ֥י חֲ֝כָמִ֗ים וְחִידֹתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of knowledge; Fools despise wisdom and discipline.
verses.text_he: יִרְאַ֣ת יְ֭הֹוָה רֵאשִׁ֣ית דָּ֑עַת חׇכְמָ֥ה וּ֝מוּסָ֗ר אֱוִילִ֥ים בָּֽזוּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: My son, heed the discipline of your father, And do not forsake the instruction of your mother;
verses.text_he: שְׁמַ֣ע בְּ֭נִי מוּסַ֣ר אָבִ֑יךָ וְאַל־תִּ֝טֹּ֗שׁ תּוֹרַ֥ת אִמֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: For they are a graceful wreath upon your head, A necklace about your throat.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י׀ לִוְיַ֤ת חֵ֓ן הֵ֬ם לְרֹאשֶׁ֑ךָ וַ֝עֲנָקִ֗ים לְגַרְגְּרֹתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: My son, if sinners entice you, do not yield;
verses.text_he: בְּנִ֡י אִם־יְפַתּ֥וּךָ חַ֝טָּאִ֗ים אַל־תֹּבֵֽא׃

verses.text_en: If they say, “Come with us, Let us set an ambush to shed blood, Let us lie in wait for the innocent (Without cause!)
verses.text_he: אִם־יֹאמְרוּ֮ לְכָ֢ה אִ֫תָּ֥נוּ נֶאֶרְבָ֥ה לְדָ֑ם נִצְפְּנָ֖ה לְנָקִ֣י חִנָּֽם׃

verses.text_en: Like Sheol, let us swallow them alive; Whole, like those who go down into the Pit.
verses.text_he: נִ֭בְלָעֵם כִּשְׁא֣וֹל חַיִּ֑ים וּ֝תְמִימִ֗ים כְּי֣וֹרְדֵי בֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: We shall obtain every precious treasure; We shall fill our homes with loot.
verses.text_he: כׇּל־ה֣וֹן יָקָ֣ר נִמְצָ֑א נְמַלֵּ֖א בָתֵּ֣ינוּ שָׁלָֽל׃

verses.text_en: Throw in your lot with us; We shall all have a common purse.”
verses.text_he: גּ֭וֹרָ֣לְךָ תַּפִּ֣יל בְּתוֹכֵ֑נוּ כִּ֥יס אֶ֝חָ֗ד יִהְיֶ֥ה לְכֻלָּֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: My son, do not set out with them; Keep your feet from their path.
verses.text_he: בְּנִ֗י אַל־תֵּלֵ֣ךְ בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ אִתָּ֑ם מְנַ֥ע רַ֝גְלְךָ֗ מִנְּתִיבָתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: For their feet run to evil; They hurry to shed blood.
verses.text_he: כִּ֣י רַ֭גְלֵיהֶם לָרַ֣ע יָר֑וּצוּ וִ֝ימַהֲר֗וּ לִשְׁפׇּךְ־דָּֽם׃

verses.text_en: In the eyes of every winged creature The outspread net means nothing.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־חִ֭נָּם מְזֹרָ֣ה הָרָ֑שֶׁת בְּ֝עֵינֵ֗י כׇּל־בַּ֥עַל כָּנָֽף׃

verses.text_en: But they lie in ambush for their own blood; They lie in wait for their own lives.
verses.text_he: וְ֭הֵם לְדָמָ֣ם יֶאֱרֹ֑בוּ יִ֝צְפְּנ֗וּ לְנַפְשֹׁתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Such is the fate of all who pursue unjust gain; It takes the life of its possessor.
verses.text_he: כֵּ֗ן אׇ֭רְחוֹת כׇּל־בֹּ֣צֵֽעַ בָּ֑צַע אֶת־נֶ֖פֶשׁ בְּעָלָ֣יו יִקָּֽח׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Wisdom cries aloud in the streets, Raises her voice in the squares.
verses.text_he: חׇ֭כְמוֹת בַּח֣וּץ תָּרֹ֑נָּה בָּ֝רְחֹב֗וֹת תִּתֵּ֥ן קוֹלָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: At the head of the busy streets she calls; At the entrance of the gates, in the city, she speaks out:
verses.text_he: בְּרֹ֥אשׁ הֹמִיּ֗וֹת תִּ֫קְרָ֥א בְּפִתְחֵ֖י שְׁעָרִ֥ים בָּעִ֗יר אֲמָרֶ֥יהָ תֹאמֵֽר׃

verses.text_en: “How long will you simple ones love simplicity, You scoffers be eager to scoff, You dullards hate knowledge?
verses.text_he: עַד־מָתַ֣י׀פְּתָיִם֮ תְּֽאֵהֲב֫וּ־פֶ֥תִי וְלֵצִ֗ים לָ֭צוֹן חָמְד֣וּ לָהֶ֑ם וּ֝כְסִילִ֗ים יִשְׂנְאוּ־דָֽעַת׃

verses.text_en: You are indifferent to my rebuke; I will now speak my mind to you, And let you know my thoughts.
verses.text_he: תָּשׁ֗וּבוּ לְֽת֫וֹכַחְתִּ֥י הִנֵּ֤ה אַבִּ֣יעָה לָכֶ֣ם רוּחִ֑י אוֹדִ֖יעָה דְבָרַ֣י אֶתְכֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: Since you refused me when I called, And paid no heed when I extended my hand,
verses.text_he: יַ֣עַן קָ֭רָאתִי וַתְּמָאֵ֑נוּ נָטִ֥יתִי יָ֝דִ֗י וְאֵ֣ין מַקְשִֽׁיב׃

verses.text_en: You spurned all my advice, And would not hear my rebuke,
verses.text_he: וַתִּפְרְע֥וּ כׇל־עֲצָתִ֑י וְ֝תוֹכַחְתִּ֗י לֹ֣א אֲבִיתֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: I will laugh at your calamity, And mock when terror comes upon you,
verses.text_he: גַּם־אֲ֭נִי בְּאֵידְכֶ֣ם אֶשְׂחָ֑ק אֶ֝לְעַ֗ג בְּבֹ֣א פַחְדְּכֶֽם׃

verses.text_en: When terror comes like a disaster, And calamity arrives like a whirlwind, When trouble and distress come upon you.
verses.text_he: בְּבֹ֤א (כשאוה) [כְשׁוֹאָ֨ה׀] פַּחְדְּכֶ֗ם וְֽ֭אֵידְכֶם כְּסוּפָ֣ה יֶאֱתֶ֑ה בְּבֹ֥א עֲ֝לֵיכֶ֗ם צָרָ֥ה וְצוּקָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Then they shall call me but I will not answer; They shall seek me but not find me.
