verses.text_he: אָ֣ז יִ֭קְרָאֻנְנִי וְלֹ֣א אֶעֱנֶ֑ה יְ֝שַׁחֲרֻ֗נְנִי וְלֹ֣א יִמְצָאֻֽנְנִי׃

verses.text_en: Because they hated knowledge, And did not choose fear of the LORD;
verses.text_he: תַּ֭חַת כִּֽי־שָׂ֣נְאוּ דָ֑עַת וְיִרְאַ֥ת יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה לֹ֣א בָחָֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: They refused my advice, And disdained all my rebukes,
verses.text_he: לֹא־אָב֥וּ לַעֲצָתִ֑י נָ֝אֲצ֗וּ כׇּל־תּוֹכַחְתִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: They shall eat the fruit of their ways, And have their fill of their own counsels.
verses.text_he: וְֽ֭יֹאכְלוּ מִפְּרִ֣י דַרְכָּ֑ם וּֽמִמֹּעֲצֹ֖תֵיהֶ֣ם יִשְׂבָּֽעוּ׃

verses.text_en: The tranquillity of the simple will kill them, And the complacency of dullards will destroy them.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י מְשׁוּבַ֣ת פְּתָיִ֣ם תַּהַרְגֵ֑ם וְשַׁלְוַ֖ת כְּסִילִ֣ים תְּאַבְּדֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: But he who listens to me will dwell in safety, Untroubled by the terror of misfortune.”
verses.text_he: וְשֹׁמֵ֣עַֽ לִ֭י יִשְׁכׇּן־בֶּ֑טַח וְ֝שַׁאֲנַ֗ן מִפַּ֥חַד רָעָֽה׃{פ}

verses.text_en: My son, if you accept my words And treasure up my commandments;
verses.text_he: בְּ֭נִי אִם־תִּקַּ֣ח אֲמָרָ֑י וּ֝מִצְוֺתַ֗י תִּצְפֹּ֥ן אִתָּֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: If you make your ear attentive to wisdom And your mind open to discernment;
verses.text_he: לְהַקְשִׁ֣יב לַחׇכְמָ֣ה אׇזְנֶ֑ךָ תַּטֶּ֥ה לִ֝בְּךָ֗ לַתְּבוּנָֽה׃

verses.text_en: If you call to understanding And cry aloud to discernment,
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י אִ֣ם לַבִּינָ֣ה תִקְרָ֑א לַ֝תְּבוּנָ֗ה תִּתֵּ֥ן קוֹלֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: If you seek it as you do silver And search for it as for treasures,
verses.text_he: אִם־תְּבַקְשֶׁ֥נָּה כַכָּ֑סֶף וְֽכַמַּטְמוֹנִ֥ים תַּחְפְּשֶֽׂנָּה׃

verses.text_en: Then you will understand the fear of the LORD And attain knowledge of God.
verses.text_he: אָ֗ז תָּ֭בִין יִרְאַ֣ת יְהֹוָ֑ה וְדַ֖עַת אֱלֹהִ֣ים תִּמְצָֽא׃

verses.text_en: For the LORD grants wisdom; Knowledge and discernment are by His decree.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־יְ֭הֹוָה יִתֵּ֣ן חׇכְמָ֑ה מִ֝פִּ֗יו דַּ֣עַת וּתְבוּנָֽה׃

verses.text_en: He reserves ability for the upright And is a shield for those who live blamelessly,
verses.text_he: (וצפן) [יִצְפֹּ֣ן] לַ֭יְשָׁרִים תּוּשִׁיָּ֑ה מָ֝גֵ֗ן לְהֹ֣לְכֵי תֹֽם׃

verses.text_en: Guarding the paths of justice, Protecting the way of those loyal to Him.
verses.text_he: לִ֭נְצֹר אׇרְח֣וֹת מִשְׁפָּ֑ט וְדֶ֖רֶךְ חֲסִידָ֣ו יִשְׁמֹֽר׃

verses.text_en: You will then understand what is right, just, And equitable—every good course.
verses.text_he: אָ֗ז תָּ֭בִין צֶ֣דֶק וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט וּ֝מֵישָׁרִ֗ים כׇּל־מַעְגַּל־טֽוֹב׃

verses.text_en: For wisdom will enter your mind And knowledge will delight you.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־תָב֣וֹא חׇכְמָ֣ה בְלִבֶּ֑ךָ וְ֝דַ֗עַת לְֽנַפְשְׁךָ֥ יִנְעָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Foresight will protect you, And discernment will guard you.
verses.text_he: מְ֭זִמָּה תִּשְׁמֹ֥ר עָלֶ֗יךָ תְּבוּנָ֥ה תִנְצְרֶֽכָּה׃

verses.text_en: It will save you from the way of evil men, From men who speak duplicity,
verses.text_he: לְ֭הַצִּ֣ילְךָ מִדֶּ֣רֶךְ רָ֑ע מֵ֝אִ֗ישׁ מְדַבֵּ֥ר תַּהְפֻּכֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: Who leave the paths of rectitude To follow the ways of darkness,
verses.text_he: הַ֭עֹ֣זְבִים אׇרְח֣וֹת יֹ֑שֶׁר לָ֝לֶ֗כֶת בְּדַרְכֵי־חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃

verses.text_en: Who rejoice in doing evil And exult in the duplicity of evil men,
verses.text_he: הַ֭שְּׂמֵחִים לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת רָ֑ע יָ֝גִ֗ילוּ בְּֽתַהְפֻּכ֥וֹת רָֽע׃

verses.text_en: Men whose paths are crooked And who are devious in their course.
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֣ר אׇרְחֹתֵיהֶ֣ם עִקְּשִׁ֑ים וּ֝נְלוֹזִ֗ים בְּמַעְגְּלוֹתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: It will save you from the forbidden woman, From the alien woman whose talk is smooth,
verses.text_he: לְ֭הַצִּ֣ילְךָ מֵאִשָּׁ֣ה זָרָ֑ה מִ֝נׇּכְרִיָּ֗ה אֲמָרֶ֥יהָ הֶחֱלִֽיקָה׃

verses.text_en: Who forsakes the companion of her youth And disregards the covenant of her God.
verses.text_he: הַ֭עֹזֶבֶת אַלּ֣וּף נְעוּרֶ֑יהָ וְאֶת־בְּרִ֖ית אֱלֹהֶ֣יהָ שָׁכֵֽחָה׃

verses.text_en: Her house sinks down to Death, And her course leads to the shades.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י שָׁ֣חָה אֶל־מָ֣וֶת בֵּיתָ֑הּ וְאֶל־רְ֝פָאִ֗ים מַעְגְּלֹתֶֽיהָ׃

verses.text_en: All who go to her cannot return And find again the paths of life.
verses.text_he: כׇּל־בָּ֭אֶיהָ לֹ֣א יְשׁוּב֑וּן וְלֹֽא־יַ֝שִּׂ֗יגוּ אׇרְח֥וֹת חַיִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: So follow the way of the good And keep to the paths of the just.
verses.text_he: לְמַ֗עַן תֵּ֭לֵךְ בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ טוֹבִ֑ים וְאׇרְח֖וֹת צַדִּיקִ֣ים תִּשְׁמֹֽר׃

verses.text_en: For the upright will inhabit the earth, The blameless will remain in it.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־יְשָׁרִ֥ים יִשְׁכְּנוּ־אָ֑רֶץ וּ֝תְמִימִ֗ים יִוָּ֥תְרוּ בָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: While the wicked will vanish from the land And the treacherous will be rooted out of it.
verses.text_he: וּ֭רְשָׁעִים מֵאֶ֣רֶץ יִכָּרֵ֑תוּ וּ֝בוֹגְדִ֗ים יִסְּח֥וּ מִמֶּֽנָּה׃{פ}

verses.text_en: My son, do not forget my teaching, But let your mind retain my commandments;
verses.text_he: בְּ֭נִי תּוֹרָתִ֣י אַל־תִּשְׁכָּ֑ח וּ֝מִצְוֺתַ֗י יִצֹּ֥ר לִבֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: For they will bestow on you length of days, Years of life and well-being.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י אֹ֣רֶךְ יָ֭מִים וּשְׁנ֣וֹת חַיִּ֑ים וְ֝שָׁל֗וֹם יוֹסִ֥יפוּ לָֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: Let fidelity and steadfastness not leave you; Bind them about your throat, Write them on the tablet of your mind,
verses.text_he: חֶ֥סֶד וֶאֱמֶ֗ת אַֽל־יַ֫עַזְבֻ֥ךָ קׇשְׁרֵ֥ם עַל־גַּרְגְּרוֹתֶ֑יךָ כׇּ֝תְבֵ֗ם עַל־ל֥וּחַ לִבֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: And you will find favor and approbation In the eyes of God and man.
verses.text_he: וּמְצָא־חֵ֥ן וְשֵֽׂכֶל־ט֑וֹב בְּעֵינֵ֖י אֱלֹהִ֣ים וְאָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Trust in the LORD with all your heart, And do not rely on your own understanding.
verses.text_he: בְּטַ֣ח אֶל־יְ֭הֹוָה בְּכׇל־לִבֶּ֑ךָ וְאֶל־בִּ֥֝ינָתְךָ֗ אַל־תִּשָּׁעֵֽן׃

verses.text_en: In all your ways acknowledge Him, And He will make your paths smooth.
verses.text_he: בְּכׇל־דְּרָכֶ֥יךָ דָעֵ֑הוּ וְ֝ה֗וּא יְיַשֵּׁ֥ר אֹֽרְחֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Do not be wise in your own eyes; Fear the LORD and shun evil.
verses.text_he: אַל־תְּהִ֣י חָכָ֣ם בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ יְרָ֥א אֶת־יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה וְס֣וּר מֵרָֽע׃

verses.text_en: It will be a cure for your body, A tonic for your bones.
verses.text_he: רִ֭פְאוּת תְּהִ֣י לְשׇׁרֶּ֑ךָ וְ֝שִׁקּ֗וּי לְעַצְמוֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Honor the LORD with your wealth, With the best of all your income,
verses.text_he: כַּבֵּ֣ד אֶת־יְ֭הֹוָה מֵהוֹנֶ֑ךָ וּ֝מֵרֵאשִׁ֗ית כׇּל־תְּבוּאָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: And your barns will be filled with grain, Your vats will burst with new wine.
verses.text_he: וְיִמָּלְא֣וּ אֲסָמֶ֣יךָ שָׂבָ֑ע וְ֝תִיר֗וֹשׁ יְקָבֶ֥יךָ יִפְרֹֽצוּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Do not reject the discipline of the LORD, my son; Do not abhor His rebuke.
verses.text_he: מוּסַ֣ר יְ֭הֹוָה בְּנִ֣י אַל־תִּמְאָ֑ס וְאַל־תָּ֝קֹ֗ץ בְּתוֹכַחְתּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: For whom the LORD loves, He rebukes, As a father the son whom he favors.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י אֶ֥ת־אֲשֶׁ֣ר יֶאֱהַ֣ב יְהֹוָ֣ה יוֹכִ֑יחַ וּ֝כְאָ֗ב אֶת־בֵּ֥ן יִרְצֶֽה׃

verses.text_en: Happy is the man who finds wisdom, The man who attains understanding.
verses.text_he: אַשְׁרֵ֣י אָ֭דָם מָצָ֣א חׇכְמָ֑ה וְ֝אָדָ֗ם יָפִ֥יק תְּבוּנָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Her value in trade is better than silver, Her yield, greater than gold.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י ט֣וֹב סַ֭חְרָהּ מִסְּחַר־כָּ֑סֶף וּ֝מֵחָר֗וּץ תְּבוּאָתָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: She is more precious than rubies; All of your goods cannot equal her.
verses.text_he: יְקָ֣רָה הִ֭יא (מפניים) [מִפְּנִינִ֑ים] וְכׇל־חֲ֝פָצֶ֗יךָ לֹ֣א יִֽשְׁווּ־בָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: In her right hand is length of days, In her left, riches and honor.
verses.text_he: אֹ֣רֶךְ יָ֭מִים בִּֽימִינָ֑הּ בִּ֝שְׂמֹאולָ֗הּ עֹ֣שֶׁר וְכָבֽוֹד׃

verses.text_en: Her ways are pleasant ways, And all her paths, peaceful.
verses.text_he: דְּרָכֶ֥יהָ דַרְכֵי־נֹ֑עַם וְֽכׇל־נְתִ֖יבוֹתֶ֣יהָ שָׁלֽוֹם׃

verses.text_en: She is a tree of life to those who grasp her, And whoever holds on to her is happy.
verses.text_he: עֵץ־חַיִּ֣ים הִ֭יא לַמַּחֲזִיקִ֣ים בָּ֑הּ וְֽתֹמְכֶ֥יהָ מְאֻשָּֽׁר׃{פ}

verses.text_en: The LORD founded the earth by wisdom; He established the heavens by understanding;
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה בְּחׇכְמָ֥ה יָסַד־אָ֑רֶץ כּוֹנֵ֥ן שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם בִּתְבוּנָֽה׃

verses.text_en: By His knowledge the depths burst apart, And the skies distilled dew.
verses.text_he: בְּ֭דַעְתּוֹ תְּהוֹמ֣וֹת נִבְקָ֑עוּ וּ֝שְׁחָקִ֗ים יִרְעֲפוּ־טָֽל׃

verses.text_en: My son, do not lose sight of them; Hold on to resourcefulness and foresight.
verses.text_he: בְּ֭נִי אַל־יָלֻ֣זוּ מֵעֵינֶ֑יךָ נְצֹ֥ר תֻּ֝שִׁיָּ֗ה וּמְזִמָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: They will give life to your spirit And grace to your throat.
verses.text_he: וְיִֽהְי֣וּ חַיִּ֣ים לְנַפְשֶׁ֑ךָ וְ֝חֵ֗ן לְגַרְגְּרֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Then you will go your way safely And not injure your feet.
verses.text_he: אָ֤ז תֵּלֵ֣ךְ לָבֶ֣טַח דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ וְ֝רַגְלְךָ֗ לֹ֣א תִגּֽוֹף׃

verses.text_en: When you lie down you will be unafraid; You will lie down and your sleep will be sweet.
verses.text_he: אִם־תִּשְׁכַּ֥ב לֹֽא־תִפְחָ֑ד וְ֝שָׁכַבְתָּ֗ וְֽעָרְבָ֥ה שְׁנָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: You will not fear sudden terror Or the disaster that comes upon the wicked,
verses.text_he: אַל־תִּ֭ירָא מִפַּ֣חַד פִּתְאֹ֑ם וּמִשֹּׁאַ֥ת רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים כִּ֣י תָבֹֽא׃

verses.text_en: For the LORD will be your trust; He will keep your feet from being caught.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־יְ֭הֹוָה יִֽהְיֶ֣ה בְכִסְלֶ֑ךָ וְשָׁמַ֖ר רַגְלְךָ֣ מִלָּֽכֶד׃

verses.text_en: Do not withhold good from one who deserves it When you have the power to do it [for him].
verses.text_he: אַל־תִּמְנַע־ט֥וֹב מִבְּעָלָ֑יו בִּֽהְי֨וֹת לְאֵ֖ל (ידיך) [יָדְךָ֣] לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃

verses.text_en: Do not say to your fellow, “Come back again; I’ll give it to you tomorrow,” when you have it with you.
verses.text_he: אַל־תֹּ֘אמַ֤ר (לרעיך) [לְרֵעֲךָ֨׀] לֵ֣ךְ וָ֭שׁוּב וּמָחָ֥ר אֶתֵּ֗ן וְיֵ֣שׁ אִתָּֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: Do not devise harm against your fellow Who lives trustfully with you.
verses.text_he: אַל־תַּחֲרֹ֣שׁ עַל־רֵעֲךָ֣ רָעָ֑ה וְהֽוּא־יוֹשֵׁ֖ב לָבֶ֣טַח אִתָּֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: Do not quarrel with a man for no cause, When he has done you no harm.
verses.text_he: אַל־[תָּרִ֣יב] (תרוב) עִם־אָדָ֣ם חִנָּ֑ם אִם־לֹ֖א גְמָלְךָ֣ רָעָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Do not envy a lawless man, Or choose any of his ways;
verses.text_he: אַל־תְּ֭קַנֵּא בְּאִ֣ישׁ חָמָ֑ס וְאַל־תִּ֝בְחַ֗ר בְּכׇל־דְּרָכָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: For the devious man is an abomination to the LORD, But He is intimate with the straightforward.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י תוֹעֲבַ֣ת יְהֹוָ֣ה נָל֑וֹז וְֽאֶת־יְשָׁרִ֥ים סוֹדֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: The curse of the LORD is on the house of the wicked, But He blesses the abode of the righteous.
verses.text_he: מְאֵרַ֣ת יְ֭הֹוָה בְּבֵ֣ית רָשָׁ֑ע וּנְוֵ֖ה צַדִּיקִ֣ים יְבָרֵֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: At scoffers He scoffs, But to the lowly He shows grace.
verses.text_he: אִם־לַלֵּצִ֥ים הֽוּא־יָלִ֑יץ (ולעניים) [וְ֝לַעֲנָוִ֗ים] יִתֶּן־חֵֽן׃

verses.text_en: The wise shall obtain honor, But dullards get disgrace as their portion.
verses.text_he: כָּ֭בוֹד חֲכָמִ֣ים יִנְחָ֑לוּ וּ֝כְסִילִ֗ים מֵרִ֥ים קָלֽוֹן׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Sons, heed the discipline of a father; Listen and learn discernment,
verses.text_he: שִׁמְע֣וּ בָ֭נִים מ֣וּסַר אָ֑ב וְ֝הַקְשִׁ֗יבוּ לָדַ֥עַת בִּינָֽה׃

verses.text_en: For I give you good instruction; Do not forsake my teaching.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י לֶ֣קַח ט֭וֹב נָתַ֣תִּי לָכֶ֑ם תּ֝וֹרָתִ֗י אַֽל־תַּעֲזֹֽבוּ׃

verses.text_en: Once I was a son to my father, The tender darling of my mother.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־בֵ֭ן הָיִ֣יתִי לְאָבִ֑י רַ֥ךְ וְ֝יָחִ֗יד לִפְנֵ֥י אִמִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: He instructed me and said to me, “Let your mind hold on to my words; Keep my commandments and you will live.
verses.text_he: וַיֹּרֵ֗נִי וַיֹּ֥אמֶר לִ֗י יִֽתְמׇךְ־דְּבָרַ֥י לִבֶּ֑ךָ שְׁמֹ֖ר מִצְוֺתַ֣י וֶחְיֵֽה׃

verses.text_en: Acquire wisdom, acquire discernment; Do not forget and do not swerve from my words.
verses.text_he: קְנֵ֣ה חׇ֭כְמָה קְנֵ֣ה בִינָ֑ה אַל־תִּשְׁכַּ֥ח וְאַל־תֵּ֝֗ט מֵאִמְרֵי־פִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Do not forsake her and she will guard you; Love her and she will protect you.
verses.text_he: אַל־תַּעַזְבֶ֥הָ וְתִשְׁמְרֶ֑ךָּ אֱהָבֶ֥הָ וְתִצְּרֶֽךָּ׃

verses.text_en: The beginning of wisdom is—acquire wisdom; With all your acquisitions, acquire discernment.
verses.text_he: רֵאשִׁ֣ית חׇ֭כְמָה קְנֵ֣ה חׇכְמָ֑ה וּבְכׇל־קִ֝נְיָנְךָ֗ קְנֵ֣ה בִינָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Hug her to you and she will exalt you; She will bring you honor if you embrace her.
verses.text_he: סַלְסְלֶ֥הָ וּֽתְרוֹמְמֶ֑ךָּ תְּ֝כַבֵּ֗דְךָ כִּ֣י תְחַבְּקֶֽנָּה׃

verses.text_en: She will adorn your head with a graceful wreath; Crown you with a glorious diadem.”
verses.text_he: תִּתֵּ֣ן לְ֭רֹאשְׁךָ לִוְיַת־חֵ֑ן עֲטֶ֖רֶת תִּפְאֶ֣רֶת תְּמַגְּנֶֽךָּ׃

verses.text_en: My son, heed and take in my words, And you will have many years of life.
verses.text_he: שְׁמַ֣ע בְּ֭נִי וְקַ֣ח אֲמָרָ֑י וְיִרְבּ֥וּ לְ֝ךָ֗ שְׁנ֣וֹת חַיִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: I instruct you in the way of wisdom; I guide you in straight courses.
verses.text_he: בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ חׇ֭כְמָה הֹרֵיתִ֑יךָ הִ֝דְרַכְתִּ֗יךָ בְּמַעְגְּלֵי־יֹֽשֶׁר׃

verses.text_en: You will walk without breaking stride; When you run, you will not stumble.
verses.text_he: בְּֽ֭לֶכְתְּךָ לֹא־יֵצַ֣ר צַעֲדֶ֑ךָ וְאִם־תָּ֝ר֗וּץ לֹ֣א תִכָּשֵֽׁל׃

verses.text_en: Hold fast to discipline; do not let go; Keep it; it is your life.
verses.text_he: הַחֲזֵ֣ק בַּמּוּסָ֣ר אַל־תֶּ֑רֶף נִ֝צְּרֶ֗הָ כִּי־הִ֥יא חַיֶּֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Do not enter on the path of the wicked; Do not walk on the way of evil men.
verses.text_he: בְּאֹ֣רַח רְ֭שָׁעִים אַל־תָּבֹ֑א וְאַל־תְּ֝אַשֵּׁ֗ר בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ רָעִֽים׃

verses.text_en: Avoid it; do not pass through it; Turn away from it; pass it by.
verses.text_he: פְּרָעֵ֥הוּ אַל־תַּעֲבׇר־בּ֑וֹ שְׂטֵ֖ה מֵעָלָ֣יו וַעֲבֹֽר׃

verses.text_en: For they cannot sleep unless they have done evil; Unless they make someone fall they are robbed of sleep.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י לֹ֣א יִֽ֭שְׁנוּ אִם־לֹ֣א יָרֵ֑עוּ וְֽנִגְזְלָ֥ה שְׁ֝נָתָ֗ם אִם־לֹ֥א (יכשולו) [יַכְשִֽׁילוּ]׃

verses.text_en: They eat the bread of wickedness And drink the wine of lawlessness.
verses.text_he: כִּ֣י לָ֭חֲמוּ לֶ֣חֶם רֶ֑שַׁע וְיֵ֖ין חֲמָסִ֣ים יִשְׁתּֽוּ׃

verses.text_en: The path of the righteous is like radiant sunlight, Ever brightening until noon.
verses.text_he: וְאֹ֣רַח צַ֭דִּיקִים כְּא֣וֹר נֹ֑גַהּ הוֹלֵ֥ךְ וָ֝א֗וֹר עַד־נְכ֥וֹן הַיּֽוֹם׃

verses.text_en: The way of the wicked is all darkness; They do not know what will make them stumble.
verses.text_he: דֶּ֣רֶךְ רְ֭שָׁעִים כָּאֲפֵלָ֑ה לֹ֥א יָ֝דְע֗וּ בַּמֶּ֥ה יִכָּשֵֽׁלוּ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: My son, listen to my speech; Incline your ear to my words.
verses.text_he: בְּ֭נִי לִדְבָרַ֣י הַקְשִׁ֑יבָה לַ֝אֲמָרַ֗י הַט־אׇזְנֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Do not lose sight of them; Keep them in your mind.
verses.text_he: אַל־יַלִּ֥יזוּ מֵעֵינֶ֑יךָ שׇׁ֝מְרֵ֗ם בְּת֣וֹךְ לְבָבֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: They are life to him who finds them, Healing for his whole body.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־חַיִּ֣ים הֵ֭ם לְמֹצְאֵיהֶ֑ם וּֽלְכׇל־בְּשָׂר֥וֹ מַרְפֵּֽא׃

verses.text_en: More than all that you guard, guard your mind, For it is the source of life.
verses.text_he: מִֽכׇּל־מִ֭שְׁמָר נְצֹ֣ר לִבֶּ֑ךָ כִּֽי־מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ תּוֹצְא֥וֹת חַיִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: Put crooked speech away from you; Keep devious talk far from you.
verses.text_he: הָסֵ֣ר מִ֭מְּךָ עִקְּשׁ֣וּת פֶּ֑ה וּלְז֥וּת שְׂ֝פָתַ֗יִם הַרְחֵ֥ק מִמֶּֽךָּ׃

verses.text_en: Let your eyes look forward, Your gaze be straight ahead.
verses.text_he: עֵ֭ינֶיךָ לְנֹ֣כַח יַבִּ֑יטוּ וְ֝עַפְעַפֶּ֗יךָ יַיְשִׁ֥רוּ נֶגְדֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Survey the course you take, And all your ways will prosper.
verses.text_he: פַּ֭לֵּס מַעְגַּ֣ל רַגְלֶ֑ךָ וְֽכׇל־דְּרָכֶ֥יךָ יִכֹּֽנוּ׃

verses.text_en: Do not swerve to the right or the left; Keep your feet from evil.
verses.text_he: אַֽל־תֵּט־יָמִ֥ין וּשְׂמֹ֑אול הָסֵ֖ר רַגְלְךָ֣ מֵרָֽע׃{פ}

verses.text_en: My son, listen to my wisdom; Incline your ear to my insight,
verses.text_he: בְּ֭נִי לְחׇכְמָתִ֣י הַקְשִׁ֑יבָה לִ֝תְבוּנָתִ֗י הַט־אׇזְנֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: That you may have foresight, While your lips hold fast to knowledge.
verses.text_he: לִשְׁמֹ֥ר מְזִמּ֑וֹת וְ֝דַ֗עַת שְׂפָתֶ֥יךָ יִנְצֹֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: For the lips of a forbidden woman drip honey; Her mouth is smoother than oil;
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י נֹ֣פֶת תִּ֭טֹּפְנָה שִׂפְתֵ֣י זָרָ֑ה וְחָלָ֖ק מִשֶּׁ֣מֶן חִכָּֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: But in the end she is as bitter as wormwood, Sharp as a two-edged sword.
verses.text_he: וְֽ֭אַחֲרִיתָהּ מָרָ֣ה כַֽלַּעֲנָ֑ה חַ֝דָּ֗ה כְּחֶ֣רֶב פִּיּֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: Her feet go down to Death; Her steps take hold of Sheol.
verses.text_he: רַ֭גְלֶיהָ יֹרְד֣וֹת מָ֑וֶת שְׁ֝א֗וֹל צְעָדֶ֥יהָ יִתְמֹֽכוּ׃

verses.text_en: She does not chart a path of life; Her course meanders for lack of knowledge.
verses.text_he: אֹ֣רַח חַ֭יִּים פֶּן־תְּפַלֵּ֑ס נָע֥וּ מַ֝עְגְּלֹתֶ֗יהָ לֹ֣א תֵדָֽע׃{פ}

verses.text_en: So now, sons, pay heed to me, And do not swerve from the words of my mouth.
verses.text_he: וְעַתָּ֣ה בָ֭נִים שִׁמְעוּ־לִ֑י וְאַל־תָּ֝ס֗וּרוּ מֵאִמְרֵי־פִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Keep yourself far away from her; Do not come near the doorway of her house
verses.text_he: הַרְחֵ֣ק מֵעָלֶ֣יהָ דַרְכֶּ֑ךָ וְאַל־תִּ֝קְרַ֗ב אֶל־פֶּ֥תַח בֵּיתָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: Lest you give up your vigor to others, Your years to a ruthless one;
verses.text_he: פֶּן־תִּתֵּ֣ן לַאֲחֵרִ֣ים הוֹדֶ֑ךָ וּ֝שְׁנֹתֶ֗יךָ לְאַכְזָרִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Lest strangers eat their fill of your strength, And your toil be for the house of another;
verses.text_he: פֶּֽן־יִשְׂבְּע֣וּ זָרִ֣ים כֹּחֶ֑ךָ וַ֝עֲצָבֶ֗יךָ בְּבֵ֣ית נׇכְרִֽי׃

verses.text_en: And in the end you roar, When your flesh and body are consumed,
verses.text_he: וְנָהַמְתָּ֥ בְאַחֲרִיתֶ֑ךָ בִּכְל֥וֹת בְּ֝שָׂרְךָ֗ וּשְׁאֵרֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: And say, “O how I hated discipline, And heartily spurned rebuke.
verses.text_he: וְֽאָמַרְתָּ֗ אֵ֭יךְ שָׂנֵ֣אתִי מוּסָ֑ר וְ֝תוֹכַ֗חַת נָאַ֥ץ לִבִּֽי׃

verses.text_en: I did not pay heed to my teachers, Or incline my ear to my instructors.
verses.text_he: וְֽלֹא־שָׁ֭מַעְתִּי בְּק֣וֹל מוֹרָ֑י וְ֝לִֽמְלַמְּדַ֗י לֹא־הִטִּ֥יתִי אׇזְנִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Soon I was in dire trouble Amidst the assembled congregation.”
verses.text_he: כִּ֭מְעַט הָיִ֣יתִי בְכׇל־רָ֑ע בְּת֖וֹךְ קָהָ֣ל וְעֵדָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Drink water from your own cistern, Running water from your own well.
verses.text_he: שְׁתֵה־מַ֥יִם מִבּוֹרֶ֑ךָ וְ֝נֹזְלִ֗ים מִתּ֥וֹךְ בְּאֵרֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Your springs will gush forth In streams in the public squares.
verses.text_he: יָפ֣וּצוּ מַעְיְנֹתֶ֣יךָ ח֑וּצָה בָּ֝רְחֹב֗וֹת פַּלְגֵי־מָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: They will be yours alone, Others having no part with you.
verses.text_he: יִֽהְיוּ־לְךָ֥ לְבַדֶּ֑ךָ וְאֵ֖ין לְזָרִ֣ים אִתָּֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: Let your fountain be blessed; Find joy in the wife of your youth—
verses.text_he: יְהִֽי־מְקוֹרְךָ֥ בָר֑וּךְ וּ֝שְׂמַ֗ח מֵאֵ֥שֶׁת נְעוּרֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: A loving doe, a graceful mountain goat. Let her breasts satisfy you at all times; Be infatuated with love of her always.
verses.text_he: אַיֶּ֥לֶת אֲהָבִ֗ים וְֽיַ֫עֲלַת־חֵ֥ן דַּ֭דֶּיהָ יְרַוֻּ֣ךָ בְכׇל־עֵ֑ת בְּ֝אַהֲבָתָ֗הּ תִּשְׁגֶּ֥ה תָמִֽיד׃

verses.text_en: Why be infatuated, my son, with a forbidden woman? Why clasp the bosom of an alien woman?
verses.text_he: וְלָ֤מָּה תִשְׁגֶּ֣ה בְנִ֣י בְזָרָ֑ה וּ֝תְחַבֵּ֗ק חֵ֣ק נׇכְרִיָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: For a man’s ways are before the eyes of God; He surveys his entire course.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י נֹ֨כַח׀ עֵינֵ֣י יְ֭הֹוָה דַּרְכֵי־אִ֑ישׁ וְֽכׇל־מַעְגְּלֹתָ֥יו מְפַלֵּֽס׃

verses.text_en: The wicked man will be trapped in his iniquities; He will be caught up in the ropes of his sin.
verses.text_he: עֲֽווֹנֹתָ֗יו יִלְכְּדֻנ֥וֹ אֶת־הָרָשָׁ֑ע וּבְחַבְלֵ֥י חַ֝טָּאת֗וֹ יִתָּמֵֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: He will die for lack of discipline, Infatuated by his great folly.
verses.text_he: ה֗וּא יָ֭מוּת בְּאֵ֣ין מוּסָ֑ר וּבְרֹ֖ב אִוַּלְתּ֣וֹ יִשְׁגֶּֽה׃{פ}

verses.text_en: My son, if you have stood surety for your fellow, Given your hand for another,
verses.text_he: בְּ֭נִי אִם־עָרַ֣בְתָּ לְרֵעֶ֑ךָ תָּקַ֖עְתָּ לַזָּ֣ר כַּפֶּֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: You have been trapped by the words of your mouth, Snared by the words of your mouth.
verses.text_he: נוֹקַ֥שְׁתָּ בְאִמְרֵי־פִ֑יךָ נִ֝לְכַּ֗דְתָּ בְּאִמְרֵי־פִֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Do this, then, my son, to extricate yourself, For you have come into the power of your fellow: Go grovel—and badger your fellow;
verses.text_he: עֲשֵׂ֨ה זֹ֥את אֵפ֪וֹא׀בְּנִ֡י וְֽהִנָּצֵ֗ל כִּ֘י־בָ֤אתָ בְכַף־רֵעֶ֑ךָ לֵ֥ךְ הִ֝תְרַפֵּ֗ס וּרְהַ֥ב רֵעֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Give your eyes no sleep, Your pupils no slumber.
verses.text_he: אַל־תִּתֵּ֣ן שֵׁנָ֣ה לְעֵינֶ֑יךָ וּ֝תְנוּמָ֗ה לְעַפְעַפֶּֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Save yourself like a deer out of the hand [of a hunter], Like a bird out of the hand of a fowler.
verses.text_he: הִ֭נָּצֵל כִּצְבִ֣י מִיָּ֑ד וּ֝כְצִפּ֗וֹר מִיַּ֥ד יָקֽוּשׁ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Lazybones, go to the ant; Study its ways and learn.
verses.text_he: לֵֽךְ־אֶל־נְמָלָ֥ה עָצֵ֑ל רְאֵ֖ה דְרָכֶ֣יהָ וַחֲכָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Without leaders, officers, or rulers,
verses.text_he: אֲשֶׁ֖ר אֵֽין־לָ֥הּ קָצִ֗ין שֹׁטֵ֥ר וּמֹשֵֽׁל׃

verses.text_en: It lays up its stores during the summer, Gathers in its food at the harvest.
verses.text_he: תָּכִ֣ין בַּקַּ֣יִץ לַחְמָ֑הּ אָגְרָ֥ה בַ֝קָּצִ֗יר מַאֲכָלָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: How long will you lie there, lazybones; When will you wake from your sleep?
verses.text_he: עַד־מָתַ֖י עָצֵ֥ל׀תִּשְׁכָּ֑ב מָ֝תַ֗י תָּק֥וּם מִשְּׁנָתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: A bit more sleep, a bit more slumber, A bit more hugging yourself in bed,
verses.text_he: מְעַ֣ט שֵׁ֭נוֹת מְעַ֣ט תְּנוּמ֑וֹת מְעַ֓ט׀ חִבֻּ֖ק יָדַ֣יִם לִשְׁכָּֽב׃

verses.text_en: And poverty will come calling upon you, And want, like a man with a shield.
verses.text_he: וּבָֽא־כִמְהַלֵּ֥ךְ רֵאשֶׁ֑ךָ וּ֝מַחְסֹרְךָ֗ כְּאִ֣ישׁ מָגֵֽן׃{פ}

verses.text_en: A scoundrel, an evil man Lives by crooked speech,
verses.text_he: אָדָ֣ם בְּ֭לִיַּעַל אִ֣ישׁ אָ֑וֶן ה֝וֹלֵ֗ךְ עִקְּשׁ֥וּת פֶּֽה׃

verses.text_en: Winking his eyes, Shuffling his feet, Pointing his finger.
verses.text_he: קֹרֵ֣ץ בְּ֭עֵינָו מֹלֵ֣ל בְּרַגְלָ֑ו מֹ֝רֶ֗ה בְּאֶצְבְּעֹתָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: Duplicity is in his heart; He plots evil all the time; He incites quarrels.
verses.text_he: תַּ֥הְפֻּכ֨וֹת׀ בְּלִבּ֗וֹ חֹרֵ֣שׁ רָ֣ע בְּכׇל־עֵ֑ת (מדנים) [מִדְיָנִ֥ים] יְשַׁלֵּֽחַ׃

verses.text_en: Therefore calamity will come upon him without warning; Suddenly he will be broken beyond repair.
verses.text_he: עַל־כֵּ֗ן פִּ֭תְאֹם יָב֣וֹא אֵיד֑וֹ פֶּ֥תַע יִ֝שָּׁבֵ֗ר וְאֵ֣ין מַרְפֵּֽא׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Six things the LORD hates; Seven are an abomination to Him:
verses.text_he: שֶׁשׁ־הֵ֭נָּה שָׂנֵ֣א יְהֹוָ֑ה וְ֝שֶׁ֗בַע (תועבות) [תּוֹעֲבַ֥ת] נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃

verses.text_en: A haughty bearing, A lying tongue, Hands that shed innocent blood,
verses.text_he: עֵינַ֣יִם רָ֭מוֹת לְשׁ֣וֹן שָׁ֑קֶר וְ֝יָדַ֗יִם שֹׁפְכ֥וֹת דָּם־נָקִֽי׃

verses.text_en: A mind that hatches evil plots, Feet quick to run to evil,
verses.text_he: לֵ֗ב חֹ֭רֵשׁ מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת אָ֑וֶן רַגְלַ֥יִם מְ֝מַהֲר֗וֹת לָר֥וּץ לָרָעָֽה׃

verses.text_en: A false witness testifying lies, And one who incites brothers to quarrel.
verses.text_he: יָפִ֣יחַ כְּ֭זָבִים עֵ֣ד שָׁ֑קֶר וּמְשַׁלֵּ֥חַ מְ֝דָנִ֗ים בֵּ֣ין אַחִֽים׃{פ}

verses.text_en: My son, keep your father’s commandment; Do not forsake your mother’s teaching.
verses.text_he: נְצֹ֣ר בְּ֭נִי מִצְוַ֣ת אָבִ֑יךָ וְאַל־תִּ֝טֹּ֗שׁ תּוֹרַ֥ת אִמֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Tie them over your heart always; Bind them around your throat.
verses.text_he: קׇשְׁרֵ֣ם עַל־לִבְּךָ֣ תָמִ֑יד עׇ֝נְדֵ֗ם עַל־גַּרְגְּרֹתֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: When you walk it will lead you; When you lie down it will watch over you; And when you are awake it will talk with you.
verses.text_he: בְּהִתְהַלֶּכְךָ֨׀ תַּנְחֶ֬ה אֹתָ֗ךְ בְּֽ֭שׇׁכְבְּךָ תִּשְׁמֹ֣ר עָלֶ֑יךָ וַ֝הֲקִיצ֗וֹתָ הִ֣יא תְשִׂיחֶֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: For the commandment is a lamp, The teaching is a light, And the way to life is the rebuke that disciplines.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י נֵ֣ר מִ֭צְוָה וְת֣וֹרָה א֑וֹר וְדֶ֥רֶךְ חַ֝יִּ֗ים תּוֹכְח֥וֹת מוּסָֽר׃

verses.text_en: It will keep you from an evil woman, From the smooth tongue of a forbidden woman.
verses.text_he: לִ֭שְׁמׇרְךָ מֵאֵ֣שֶׁת רָ֑ע מֵ֝חֶלְקַ֗ת לָשׁ֥וֹן נׇכְרִיָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: Do not lust for her beauty Or let her captivate you with her eyes.
verses.text_he: אַל־תַּחְמֹ֣ד יׇ֭פְיָהּ בִּלְבָבֶ֑ךָ וְאַל־תִּ֝קָּחֲךָ֗ בְּעַפְעַפֶּֽיהָ׃

verses.text_en: The last loaf of bread will go for a harlot; A married woman will snare a person of honor.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י בְעַד־אִשָּׁ֥ה זוֹנָ֗ה עַֽד־כִּכַּ֫ר־לָ֥חֶם וְאֵ֥שֶׁת אִ֑ישׁ נֶ֖פֶשׁ יְקָרָ֣ה תָצֽוּד׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Can a man rake embers into his bosom Without burning his clothes?
verses.text_he: הֲיַחְתֶּ֤ה אִ֓ישׁ אֵ֬שׁ בְּחֵיק֑וֹ וּ֝בְגָדָ֗יו לֹ֣א תִשָּׂרַֽפְנָה׃

verses.text_en: Can a man walk on live coals Without scorching his feet?
verses.text_he: אִם־יְהַלֵּ֣ךְ אִ֭ישׁ עַל־הַגֶּחָלִ֑ים וְ֝רַגְלָ֗יו לֹ֣א תִכָּוֶֽינָה׃

verses.text_en: It is the same with one who sleeps with his fellow’s wife; None who touches her will go unpunished.
verses.text_he: כֵּ֗ן הַ֭בָּא אֶל־אֵ֣שֶׁת רֵעֵ֑הוּ לֹ֥א יִ֝נָּקֶ֗ה כׇּֽל־הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ בָּֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: A thief is not held in contempt For stealing to appease his hunger;
verses.text_he: לֹא־יָב֣וּזוּ לַ֭גַּנָּב כִּ֣י יִגְנ֑וֹב לְמַלֵּ֥א נַ֝פְשׁ֗וֹ כִּ֣י יִרְעָֽב׃

verses.text_en: Yet if caught he must pay sevenfold; He must give up all he owns.
verses.text_he: וְ֭נִמְצָא יְשַׁלֵּ֣ם שִׁבְעָתָ֑יִם אֶת־כׇּל־ה֖וֹן בֵּית֣וֹ יִתֵּֽן׃

verses.text_en: He who commits adultery is devoid of sense; Only one who would destroy himself does such a thing.
verses.text_he: נֹאֵ֣ף אִשָּׁ֣ה חֲסַר־לֵ֑ב מַֽשְׁחִ֥ית נַ֝פְשׁ֗וֹ ה֣וּא יַעֲשֶֽׂנָּה׃

verses.text_en: He will meet with disease and disgrace; His reproach will never be expunged.
verses.text_he: נֶגַע־וְקָל֥וֹן יִמְצָ֑א וְ֝חֶרְפָּת֗וֹ לֹ֣א תִמָּחֶֽה׃

verses.text_en: The fury of the husband will be passionate; He will show no pity on his day of vengeance.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־קִנְאָ֥ה חֲמַת־גָּ֑בֶר וְלֹא־יַ֝חְמ֗וֹל בְּי֣וֹם נָקָֽם׃

verses.text_en: He will not have regard for any ransom; He will refuse your bribe, however great.
verses.text_he: לֹֽא־יִ֭שָּׂא פְּנֵ֣י כׇל־כֹּ֑פֶר וְלֹא־יֹ֝אבֶ֗ה כִּ֣י תַרְבֶּה־שֹּֽׁחַד׃{פ}

verses.text_en: My son, heed my words; And store up my commandments with you.
verses.text_he: בְּ֭נִי שְׁמֹ֣ר אֲמָרָ֑י וּ֝מִצְוֺתַ֗י תִּצְפֹּ֥ן אִתָּֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: Keep my commandments and live, My teaching, as the apple of your eye.
verses.text_he: שְׁמֹ֣ר מִצְוֺתַ֣י וֶחְיֵ֑ה וְ֝תוֹרָתִ֗י כְּאִישׁ֥וֹן עֵינֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: Bind them on your fingers; Write them on the tablet of your mind.
verses.text_he: קׇשְׁרֵ֥ם עַל־אֶצְבְּעֹתֶ֑יךָ כׇּ֝תְבֵ֗ם עַל־ל֥וּחַ לִבֶּֽךָ׃

verses.text_en: Say to Wisdom, “You are my sister,” And call Understanding a kinswoman.
verses.text_he: אֱמֹ֣ר לַ֭חׇכְמָה אֲחֹ֣תִי אָ֑תְּ וּ֝מֹדָ֗ע לַבִּינָ֥ה תִקְרָֽא׃

verses.text_en: She will guard you from a forbidden woman; From an alien woman whose talk is smooth.
verses.text_he: לִ֭שְׁמׇרְךָ מֵאִשָּׁ֣ה זָרָ֑ה מִ֝נׇּכְרִיָּ֗ה אֲמָרֶ֥יהָ הֶחֱלִֽיקָה׃

verses.text_en: From the window of my house, Through my lattice, I looked out
verses.text_he: כִּ֭י בְּחַלּ֣וֹן בֵּיתִ֑י בְּעַ֖ד אֶשְׁנַבִּ֣י נִשְׁקָֽפְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: And saw among the simple, Noticed among the youths, A lad devoid of sense.
verses.text_he: וָאֵ֤רֶא בַפְּתָאיִ֗ם אָ֘בִ֤ינָה בַבָּנִ֗ים נַ֣עַר חֲסַר־לֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: He was crossing the street near her corner, Walking toward her house
verses.text_he: עֹבֵ֣ר בַּ֭שּׁוּק אֵ֣צֶל פִּנָּ֑הּ וְדֶ֖רֶךְ בֵּיתָ֣הּ יִצְעָֽד׃

verses.text_en: In the dusk of evening, In the dark hours of night.
verses.text_he: בְּנֶֽשֶׁף־בְּעֶ֥רֶב י֑וֹם בְּאִישׁ֥וֹן לַ֝֗יְלָה וַאֲפֵלָֽה׃

verses.text_en: A woman comes toward him Dressed like a harlot, with set purpose.
verses.text_he: וְהִנֵּ֣ה אִ֭שָּׁה לִקְרָאת֑וֹ שִׁ֥ית ז֝וֹנָ֗ה וּנְצֻ֥רַת לֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: She is bustling and restive; She is never at home.
verses.text_he: הֹמִיָּ֣ה הִ֣יא וְסֹרָ֑רֶת בְּ֝בֵיתָ֗הּ לֹא־יִשְׁכְּנ֥וּ רַגְלֶֽיהָ׃

verses.text_en: Now in the street, now in the square, She lurks at every corner.
verses.text_he: פַּ֤עַם׀ בַּח֗וּץ פַּ֥עַם בָּרְחֹב֑וֹת וְאֵ֖צֶל כׇּל־פִּנָּ֣ה תֶאֱרֹֽב׃

verses.text_en: She lays hold of him and kisses him; Brazenly she says to him,
verses.text_he: וְהֶחֱזִ֣יקָה בּ֭וֹ וְנָ֣שְׁקָה לּ֑וֹ הֵעֵ֥זָה פָ֝נֶ֗יהָ וַתֹּ֣אמַר לֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: “I had to make a sacrifice of well-being; Today I fulfilled my vows.
verses.text_he: זִבְחֵ֣י שְׁלָמִ֣ים עָלָ֑י הַ֝יּ֗וֹם שִׁלַּ֥מְתִּי נְדָרָֽי׃

verses.text_en: Therefore I have come out to you, Seeking you, and have found you.
verses.text_he: עַל־כֵּ֭ן יָצָ֣אתִי לִקְרָאתֶ֑ךָ לְשַׁחֵ֥ר פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ וָאֶמְצָאֶֽךָּ׃

verses.text_en: I have decked my couch with covers Of dyed Egyptian linen;
verses.text_he: מַ֭רְבַדִּים רָבַ֣דְתִּי עַרְשִׂ֑י חֲ֝טֻב֗וֹת אֵט֥וּן מִצְרָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: I have sprinkled my bed With myrrh, aloes, and cinnamon.
verses.text_he: נַ֥פְתִּי מִשְׁכָּבִ֑י מֹ֥ר אֲ֝הָלִ֗ים וְקִנָּמֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: Let us drink our fill of love till morning; Let us delight in amorous embrace.
verses.text_he: לְכָ֤ה נִרְוֶ֣ה דֹ֭דִים עַד־הַבֹּ֑קֶר נִ֝תְעַלְּסָ֗ה בׇּאֳהָבִֽים׃

verses.text_en: For the man of the house is away; He is off on a distant journey.
verses.text_he: כִּ֤י אֵ֣ין הָאִ֣ישׁ בְּבֵית֑וֹ הָ֝לַ֗ךְ בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ מֵרָחֽוֹק׃

verses.text_en: He took his bag of money with him And will return only at mid-month.”
verses.text_he: צְֽרוֹר־הַ֭כֶּסֶף לָקַ֣ח בְּיָד֑וֹ לְי֥וֹם הַ֝כֵּ֗סֶא יָבֹ֥א בֵיתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: She sways him with her eloquence, Turns him aside with her smooth talk.
verses.text_he: הִ֭טַּתּוּ בְּרֹ֣ב לִקְחָ֑הּ בְּחֵ֥לֶק שְׂ֝פָתֶ֗יהָ תַּדִּיחֶֽנּוּ׃

verses.text_en: Thoughtlessly he follows her, Like an ox going to the slaughter, Like a fool to the stocks for punishment—
verses.text_he: ה֤וֹלֵ֥ךְ אַחֲרֶ֗יהָ פִּ֫תְאֹ֥ם כְּ֭שׁוֹר אֶל־טֶ֣בַח יָבֹ֑א וּ֝כְעֶ֗כֶס אֶל־מוּסַ֥ר אֱוִֽיל׃

verses.text_en: Until the arrow pierces his liver. He is like a bird rushing into a trap, Not knowing his life is at stake.
verses.text_he: עַ֤ד יְפַלַּ֪ח חֵ֡ץ כְּֽבֵד֗וֹ כְּמַהֵ֣ר צִפּ֣וֹר אֶל־פָּ֑ח וְלֹא־יָ֝דַ֗ע כִּֽי־בְנַפְשׁ֥וֹ הֽוּא׃

verses.text_en: Now, sons, listen to me; Pay attention to my words;
verses.text_he: וְעַתָּ֣ה בָ֭נִים שִׁמְעוּ־לִ֑י וְ֝הַקְשִׁ֗יבוּ לְאִמְרֵי־פִֽי׃

verses.text_en: Let your mind not wander down her ways; Do not stray onto her paths.
verses.text_he: אַל־יֵ֣שְׂטְ אֶל־דְּרָכֶ֣יהָ לִבֶּ֑ךָ אַל־תֵּ֝֗תַע בִּנְתִיבוֹתֶֽיהָ׃

verses.text_en: For many are those she has struck dead, And numerous are her victims.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־רַבִּ֣ים חֲלָלִ֣ים הִפִּ֑ילָה וַ֝עֲצֻמִ֗ים כׇּל־הֲרֻגֶֽיהָ׃

verses.text_en: Her house is a highway to Sheol Leading down to Death’s inner chambers.
verses.text_he: דַּרְכֵ֣י שְׁא֣וֹל בֵּיתָ֑הּ יֹ֝רְד֗וֹת אֶל־חַדְרֵי־מָֽוֶת׃{פ}

verses.text_en: It is Wisdom calling, Understanding raising her voice.
verses.text_he: הֲלֹֽא־חׇכְמָ֥ה תִקְרָ֑א וּ֝תְבוּנָ֗ה תִּתֵּ֥ן קוֹלָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: She takes her stand at the topmost heights, By the wayside, at the crossroads,
verses.text_he: בְּרֹאשׁ־מְרֹמִ֥ים עֲלֵי־דָ֑רֶךְ בֵּ֖ית נְתִיב֣וֹת נִצָּֽבָה׃

verses.text_en: Near the gates at the city entrance; At the entryways, she shouts,
verses.text_he: לְיַד־שְׁעָרִ֥ים לְפִי־קָ֑רֶת מְב֖וֹא פְתָחִ֣ים תָּרֹֽנָּה׃

verses.text_en: “O men, I call to you; My cry is to all mankind.
verses.text_he: אֲלֵיכֶ֣ם אִישִׁ֣ים אֶקְרָ֑א וְ֝קוֹלִ֗י אֶל־בְּנֵ֥י אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: O simple ones, learn shrewdness; O dullards, instruct your minds.
verses.text_he: הָבִ֣ינוּ פְתָאיִ֣ם עׇרְמָ֑ה וּ֝כְסִילִ֗ים הָבִ֥ינוּ לֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: Listen, for I speak noble things; Uprightness comes from my lips;
verses.text_he: שִׁ֭מְעוּ כִּֽי־נְגִידִ֣ים אֲדַבֵּ֑ר וּמִפְתַּ֥ח שְׂ֝פָתַ֗י מֵישָׁרִֽים׃

verses.text_en: My mouth utters truth; Wickedness is abhorrent to my lips.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־אֱ֭מֶת יֶהְגֶּ֣ה חִכִּ֑י וְתוֹעֲבַ֖ת שְׂפָתַ֣י רֶֽשַׁע׃

verses.text_en: All my words are just, None of them perverse or crooked;
verses.text_he: בְּצֶ֥דֶק כׇּל־אִמְרֵי־פִ֑י אֵ֥ין בָּ֝הֶ֗ם נִפְתָּ֥ל וְעִקֵּֽשׁ׃

verses.text_en: All are straightforward to the intelligent man, And right to those who have attained knowledge.
verses.text_he: כֻּלָּ֣ם נְ֭כֹחִים לַמֵּבִ֑ין וִ֝ישָׁרִ֗ים לְמֹ֣צְאֵי דָֽעַת׃

verses.text_en: Accept my discipline rather than silver, Knowledge rather than choice gold.
verses.text_he: קְחֽוּ־מוּסָרִ֥י וְאַל־כָּ֑סֶף וְ֝דַ֗עַת מֵחָר֥וּץ נִבְחָֽר׃

verses.text_en: For wisdom is better than rubies; No goods can equal her.
verses.text_he: כִּֽי־טוֹבָ֣ה חׇ֭כְמָה מִפְּנִינִ֑ים וְכׇל־חֲ֝פָצִ֗ים לֹ֣א יִֽשְׁווּ־בָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: “I, Wisdom, live with Prudence; I attain knowledge and foresight.
verses.text_he: אֲֽנִי־חׇ֭כְמָה שָׁכַ֣נְתִּי עׇרְמָ֑ה וְדַ֖עַת מְזִמּ֣וֹת אֶמְצָֽא׃

verses.text_en: To fear the LORD is to hate evil; I hate pride, arrogance, the evil way, And duplicity in speech.
verses.text_he: יִ֥רְאַ֣ת יְהֹוָה֮ שְֽׂנֹ֫את־רָ֥ע גֵּ֘אָ֤ה וְגָא֨וֹן׀ וְדֶ֣רֶךְ רָ֭ע וּפִ֨י תַהְפֻּכ֬וֹת שָׂנֵֽאתִי׃

verses.text_en: Mine are counsel and resourcefulness; I am understanding; courage is mine.
verses.text_he: לִֽי־עֵ֭צָה וְתוּשִׁיָּ֑ה אֲנִ֥י בִ֝ינָ֗ה לִ֣י גְבוּרָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Through me kings reign And rulers decree just laws;
verses.text_he: בִּ֭י מְלָכִ֣ים יִמְלֹ֑כוּ וְ֝רֹזְנִ֗ים יְחֹ֣קְקוּ צֶֽדֶק׃

verses.text_en: Through me princes rule, Great men and all the righteous judges.
verses.text_he: בִּ֭י שָׂרִ֣ים יָשֹׂ֑רוּ וּ֝נְדִיבִ֗ים כׇּל־שֹׁ֥פְטֵי צֶֽדֶק׃

verses.text_en: Those who love me I love, And those who seek me will find me.
verses.text_he: אֲ֭נִי (אהביה) [אֹהֲבַ֣י] אֵהָ֑ב וּ֝מְשַׁחֲרַ֗י יִמְצָאֻֽנְנִי׃

verses.text_en: Riches and honor belong to me, Enduring wealth and success.
verses.text_he: עֹֽשֶׁר־וְכָב֥וֹד אִתִּ֑י ה֥וֹן עָ֝תֵ֗ק וּצְדָקָֽה׃

verses.text_en: My fruit is better than gold, fine gold, And my produce better than choice silver.
verses.text_he: ט֣וֹב פִּ֭רְיִי מֵחָר֣וּץ וּמִפָּ֑ז וּ֝תְבוּאָתִ֗י מִכֶּ֥סֶף נִבְחָֽר׃

verses.text_en: I walk on the way of righteousness, On the paths of justice.
verses.text_he: בְּאֹֽרַח־צְדָקָ֥ה אֲהַלֵּ֑ךְ בְּ֝ת֗וֹךְ נְתִיב֥וֹת מִשְׁפָּֽט׃

verses.text_en: I endow those who love me with substance; I will fill their treasuries.
verses.text_he: לְהַנְחִ֖יל אֹהֲבַ֥י׀יֵ֑שׁ וְאֹצְרֹ֖תֵיהֶ֣ם אֲמַלֵּֽא׃

verses.text_en: “The LORD created me at the beginning of His course As the first of His works of old.
verses.text_he: יְֽהֹוָ֗ה קָ֭נָנִי רֵאשִׁ֣ית דַּרְכּ֑וֹ קֶ֖דֶם מִפְעָלָ֣יו מֵאָֽז׃

verses.text_en: In the distant past I was fashioned, At the beginning, at the origin of earth.
verses.text_he: מֵ֭עוֹלָם נִסַּ֥כְתִּי מֵרֹ֗אשׁ מִקַּדְמֵי־אָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: There was still no deep when I was brought forth, No springs rich in water;
verses.text_he: בְּאֵין־תְּהֹמ֥וֹת חוֹלָ֑לְתִּי בְּאֵ֥ין מַ֝עְיָנ֗וֹת נִכְבַּדֵּי־מָֽיִם׃

verses.text_en: Before [the foundations of] the mountains were sunk, Before the hills I was born.
verses.text_he: בְּטֶ֣רֶם הָרִ֣ים הׇטְבָּ֑עוּ לִפְנֵ֖י גְבָע֣וֹת חוֹלָֽלְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: He had not yet made earth and fields, Or the world’s first clumps of clay.
verses.text_he: עַד־לֹ֣א עָ֭שָׂה אֶ֣רֶץ וְחוּצ֑וֹת וְ֝רֹ֗אשׁ עַפְר֥וֹת תֵּבֵֽל׃

verses.text_en: I was there when He set the heavens into place; When He fixed the horizon upon the deep;
verses.text_he: בַּהֲכִינ֣וֹ שָׁ֭מַיִם שָׁ֣ם אָ֑נִי בְּחֻ֥קוֹ ח֝֗וּג עַל־פְּנֵ֥י תְהֽוֹם׃

verses.text_en: When He made the heavens above firm, And the fountains of the deep gushed forth;
verses.text_he: בְּאַמְּצ֣וֹ שְׁחָקִ֣ים מִמָּ֑עַל בַּ֝עֲז֗וֹז עִינ֥וֹת תְּהֽוֹם׃

verses.text_en: When He assigned the sea its limits, So that its waters never transgress His command; When He fixed the foundations of the earth,
verses.text_he: בְּשׂ֘וּמ֤וֹ לַיָּ֨ם׀ חֻקּ֗וֹ וּ֭מַיִם לֹ֣א יַֽעַבְרוּ־פִ֑יו בְּ֝חוּק֗וֹ מ֣וֹסְדֵי אָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: I was with Him as a confidant, A source of delight every day, Rejoicing before Him at all times,
verses.text_he: וָאֶהְיֶ֥ה אֶצְל֗וֹ אָ֫מ֥וֹן וָאֶהְיֶ֣ה שַׁ֭עֲשׁוּעִים י֤וֹם׀ י֑וֹם מְשַׂחֶ֖קֶת לְפָנָ֣יו בְּכׇל־עֵֽת׃

verses.text_en: Rejoicing in His inhabited world, Finding delight with mankind.
verses.text_he: מְ֭שַׂחֶקֶת בְּתֵבֵ֣ל אַרְצ֑וֹ וְ֝שַׁעֲשֻׁעַ֗י אֶת־בְּנֵ֥י אָדָֽם׃{פ}

verses.text_en: Now, sons, listen to me; Happy are they who keep my ways.
verses.text_he: וְעַתָּ֣ה בָ֭נִים שִׁמְעוּ־לִ֑י וְ֝אַשְׁרֵ֗י דְּרָכַ֥י יִשְׁמֹֽרוּ׃

verses.text_en: Heed discipline and become wise; Do not spurn it.
verses.text_he: שִׁמְע֖וּ מוּסָ֥ר וַחֲכָ֗מוּ וְאַל־תִּפְרָֽעוּ׃

verses.text_en: Happy is the man who listens to me, Coming early to my gates each day, Waiting outside my doors.
verses.text_he: אַ֥שְֽׁרֵי־אָדָם֮ שֹׁמֵ֢עַֽ֫ לִ֥י לִשְׁקֹ֣ד עַל־דַּ֭לְתֹתַי י֤וֹם׀ י֑וֹם לִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר מְזוּזֹ֥ת פְּתָחָֽי׃

verses.text_en: For he who finds me finds life And obtains favor from the LORD.
verses.text_he: כִּ֣י מֹ֭צְאִי (מצאי) [מָצָ֣א] חַיִּ֑ים וַיָּ֥פֶק רָ֝צ֗וֹן מֵיְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: But he who misses me destroys himself; All who hate me love death.”
verses.text_he: וְֽ֭חֹטְאִי חֹמֵ֣ס נַפְשׁ֑וֹ כׇּל־מְ֝שַׂנְאַ֗י אָ֣הֲבוּ מָֽוֶת׃

verses.text_en: Wisdom has built her house, She has hewn her seven pillars.
verses.text_he: חׇ֭כְמוֹת בָּנְתָ֣ה בֵיתָ֑הּ חָצְבָ֖ה עַמּוּדֶ֣יהָ שִׁבְעָֽה׃

verses.text_en: She has prepared the feast, Mixed the wine, And also set the table.
verses.text_he: טָבְחָ֣ה טִ֭בְחָהּ מָסְכָ֣ה יֵינָ֑הּ אַ֝֗ף עָרְכָ֥ה שֻׁלְחָנָֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: She has sent out her maids to announce On the heights of the town,
verses.text_he: שָׁלְחָ֣ה נַעֲרֹתֶ֣יהָ תִקְרָ֑א עַל־גַּ֝פֵּ֗י מְרֹ֣מֵי קָֽרֶת׃

verses.text_en: “Let the simple enter here”; To those devoid of sense she says,
verses.text_he: מִֽי־פֶ֭תִי יָסֻ֣ר הֵ֑נָּה חֲסַר־לֵ֝֗ב אָ֣מְרָה לּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: “Come, eat my food And drink the wine that I have mixed;
verses.text_he: לְ֭כוּ לַחֲמ֣וּ בְֽלַחֲמִ֑י וּ֝שְׁת֗וּ בְּיַ֣יִן מָסָֽכְתִּי׃

verses.text_en: Give up simpleness and live, Walk in the way of understanding.”
verses.text_he: עִזְב֣וּ פְתָאיִ֣ם וִֽחְי֑וּ וְ֝אִשְׁר֗וּ בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ בִּינָֽה׃

verses.text_en: To correct a scoffer, Or rebuke a wicked man for his blemish, Is to call down abuse on oneself.
verses.text_he: יֹ֤סֵ֨ר׀ לֵ֗ץ לֹקֵ֣חַֽ ל֣וֹ קָל֑וֹן וּמוֹכִ֖יחַ לְרָשָׁ֣ע מוּמֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Do not rebuke a scoffer, for he will hate you; Reprove a wise man, and he will love you.
verses.text_he: אַל־תּ֣וֹכַח לֵ֭ץ פֶּן־יִשְׂנָאֶ֑ךָּ הוֹכַ֥ח לְ֝חָכָ֗ם וְיֶאֱהָבֶֽךָּ׃

verses.text_en: Instruct a wise man, and he will grow wiser; Teach a righteous man, and he will gain in learning.
verses.text_he: תֵּ֣ן לְ֭חָכָם וְיֶחְכַּם־ע֑וֹד הוֹדַ֥ע לְ֝צַדִּ֗יק וְי֣וֹסֶף לֶֽקַח׃

verses.text_en: The beginning of wisdom is fear of the LORD, And knowledge of the Holy One is understanding.
verses.text_he: תְּחִלַּ֣ת חׇ֭כְמָה יִרְאַ֣ת יְהֹוָ֑ה וְדַ֖עַת קְדֹשִׁ֣ים בִּינָֽה׃

verses.text_en: For through me your days will increase, And years be added to your life.
verses.text_he: כִּי־בִ֭י יִרְבּ֣וּ יָמֶ֑יךָ וְיוֹסִ֥יפוּ לְּ֝ךָ֗ שְׁנ֣וֹת חַיִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: If you are wise, you are wise for yourself; If you are a scoffer, you bear it alone.
The stupid woman bustles about; She is simple and knows nothing.
verses.text_he: אֵ֣שֶׁת כְּ֭סִילוּת הֹמִיָּ֑ה פְּ֝תַיּ֗וּת וּבַל־יָ֥דְעָה מָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: She sits in the doorway of her house, Or on a chair at the heights of the town,
verses.text_he: וְֽ֭יָשְׁבָה לְפֶ֣תַח בֵּיתָ֑הּ עַל־כִּ֝סֵּ֗א מְרֹ֣מֵי קָֽרֶת׃

verses.text_en: Calling to all the wayfarers Who go about their own affairs,
verses.text_he: לִקְרֹ֥א לְעֹֽבְרֵי־דָ֑רֶךְ הַֽ֝מְיַשְּׁרִ֗ים אֹֽרְחוֹתָֽם׃

verses.text_en: “Let the simple enter here”; And to those devoid of sense she says,
verses.text_he: מִֽי־פֶ֭תִי יָסֻ֣ר הֵ֑נָּה וַחֲסַר־לֵ֝֗ב וְאָ֣מְרָה לּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: “Stolen waters are sweet, And bread eaten furtively is tasty.”
verses.text_he: מַֽיִם־גְּנוּבִ֥ים יִמְתָּ֑קוּ וְלֶ֖חֶם סְתָרִ֣ים יִנְעָֽם׃

verses.text_en: He does not know that the shades are there, That her guests are in the depths of Sheol.
verses.text_he: וְֽלֹא־יָ֭דַע כִּֽי־רְפָאִ֣ים שָׁ֑ם בְּעִמְקֵ֖י שְׁא֣וֹל קְרֻאֶֽיהָ׃{פ}

verses.text_en: The proverbs of Solomon: A wise son brings joy to his father; A dull son is his mother’s sorrow.
verses.text_he: מִשְׁלֵ֗י שְׁלֹ֫מֹ֥ה בֵּ֣ן חָ֭כָם יְשַׂמַּח־אָ֑ב וּבֵ֥ן כְּ֝סִ֗יל תּוּגַ֥ת אִמּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Ill-gotten wealth is of no avail, But righteousness saves from death.
verses.text_he: לֹֽא־י֭וֹעִילוּ אוֹצְר֣וֹת רֶ֑שַׁע וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה תַּצִּ֥יל מִמָּֽוֶת׃

verses.text_en: The LORD will not let the righteous go hungry, But He denies the wicked what they crave.
verses.text_he: לֹא־יַרְעִ֣יב יְ֭הֹוָה נֶ֣פֶשׁ צַדִּ֑יק וְהַוַּ֖ת רְשָׁעִ֣ים יֶהְדֹּֽף׃

verses.text_en: Negligent hands cause poverty, But diligent hands enrich.
verses.text_he: רָ֗אשׁ עֹשֶׂ֥ה כַף־רְמִיָּ֑ה וְיַ֖ד חָרוּצִ֣ים תַּעֲשִֽׁיר׃

verses.text_en: He who lays in stores during the summer is a capable son, But he who sleeps during the harvest is an incompetent.
verses.text_he: אֹגֵ֣ר בַּ֭קַּיִץ בֵּ֣ן מַשְׂכִּ֑יל נִרְדָּ֥ם בַּ֝קָּצִ֗יר בֵּ֣ן מֵבִֽישׁ׃

verses.text_en: Blessings light upon the head of the righteous, But lawlessness covers the mouth of the wicked.
verses.text_he: בְּ֭רָכוֹת לְרֹ֣אשׁ צַדִּ֑יק וּפִ֥י רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים יְכַסֶּ֥ה חָמָֽס׃

verses.text_en: The name of the righteous is invoked in blessing, But the fame of the wicked rots.
verses.text_he: זֵ֣כֶר צַ֭דִּיק לִבְרָכָ֑ה וְשֵׁ֖ם רְשָׁעִ֣ים יִרְקָֽב׃

verses.text_en: He whose heart is wise accepts commands, But he whose speech is foolish comes to grief.
verses.text_he: חֲכַם־לֵ֭ב יִקַּ֣ח מִצְוֺ֑ת וֶאֱוִ֥יל שְׂ֝פָתַ֗יִם יִלָּבֵֽט׃

verses.text_en: He who lives blamelessly lives safely, But he who walks a crooked path will be found out.
verses.text_he: הוֹלֵ֣ךְ בַּ֭תֹּם יֵ֣לֶךְ בֶּ֑טַח וּמְעַקֵּ֥שׁ דְּ֝רָכָ֗יו יִוָּדֵֽעַ׃

verses.text_en: He who winks his eye causes sorrow; He whose speech is foolish comes to grief.
verses.text_he: קֹ֣רֵֽץ עַ֭יִן יִתֵּ֣ן עַצָּ֑בֶת וֶאֱוִ֥יל שְׂ֝פָתַ֗יִם יִלָּבֵֽט׃

verses.text_en: The mouth of the righteous is a fountain of life, But lawlessness covers the mouth of the wicked.
verses.text_he: מְק֣וֹר חַ֭יִּים פִּ֣י צַדִּ֑יק וּפִ֥י רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים יְכַסֶּ֥ה חָמָֽס׃

verses.text_en: Hatred stirs up strife, But love covers up all faults.
verses.text_he: שִׂ֭נְאָה תְּעֹרֵ֣ר מְדָנִ֑ים וְעַ֥ל כׇּל־פְּ֝שָׁעִ֗ים תְּכַסֶּ֥ה אַהֲבָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Wisdom is to be found on the lips of the intelligent, But a rod is ready for the back of the senseless.
verses.text_he: בְּשִׂפְתֵ֣י נָ֭בוֹן תִּמָּצֵ֣א חׇכְמָ֑ה וְ֝שֵׁ֗בֶט לְגֵ֣ו חֲסַר־לֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: The wise store up knowledge; The mouth of the fool is an imminent ruin.
verses.text_he: חֲכָמִ֥ים יִצְפְּנוּ־דָ֑עַת וּפִֽי־אֱ֝וִ֗יל מְחִתָּ֥ה קְרֹבָֽה׃

verses.text_en: The wealth of a rich man is his fortress; The poverty of the poor is his ruin.
verses.text_he: ה֣וֹן עָ֭שִׁיר קִרְיַ֣ת עֻזּ֑וֹ מְחִתַּ֖ת דַּלִּ֣ים רֵישָֽׁם׃

verses.text_en: The labor of the righteous man makes for life; The produce of the wicked man makes for want.
verses.text_he: פְּעֻלַּ֣ת צַדִּ֣יק לְחַיִּ֑ים תְּבוּאַ֖ת רָשָׁ֣ע לְחַטָּֽאת׃

verses.text_en: He who follows discipline shows the way to life, But he who ignores reproof leads astray.
verses.text_he: אֹ֣רַח לְ֭חַיִּים שׁוֹמֵ֣ר מוּסָ֑ר וְעֹזֵ֖ב תּוֹכַ֣חַת מַתְעֶֽה׃

verses.text_en: He who conceals hatred has lying lips, While he who speaks forth slander is a dullard.
verses.text_he: מְכַסֶּ֣ה שִׂ֭נְאָה שִׂפְתֵי־שָׁ֑קֶר וּמוֹצִ֥א דִ֝בָּ֗ה ה֣וּא כְסִֽיל׃

verses.text_en: Where there is much talking, there is no lack of transgressing, But he who curbs his tongue shows sense.
verses.text_he: בְּרֹ֣ב דְּ֭בָרִים לֹ֣א יֶחְדַּל־פָּ֑שַׁע וְחוֹשֵׂ֖ךְ שְׂפָתָ֣יו מַשְׂכִּֽיל׃

verses.text_en: The tongue of a righteous man is choice silver, But the mind of the wicked is of little worth.
verses.text_he: כֶּ֣סֶף נִ֭בְחָר לְשׁ֣וֹן צַדִּ֑יק לֵ֖ב רְשָׁעִ֣ים כִּמְעָֽט׃

verses.text_en: The lips of the righteous sustain many, But fools die for lack of sense.
verses.text_he: שִׂפְתֵ֣י צַ֭דִּיק יִרְע֣וּ רַבִּ֑ים וֶ֝אֱוִילִ֗ים בַּחֲסַר־לֵ֥ב יָמֽוּתוּ׃

verses.text_en: It is the blessing of the LORD that enriches, And no toil can increase it.
verses.text_he: בִּרְכַּ֣ת יְ֭הֹוָה הִ֣יא תַעֲשִׁ֑יר וְלֹֽא־יוֹסִ֖ף עֶ֣צֶב עִמָּֽהּ׃

verses.text_en: As mischief is sport for the dullard, So is wisdom for the man of understanding.
verses.text_he: כִּשְׂח֣וֹק לִ֭כְסִיל עֲשׂ֣וֹת זִמָּ֑ה וְ֝חׇכְמָ֗ה לְאִ֣ישׁ תְּבוּנָֽה׃

verses.text_en: What the wicked man plots overtakes him; What the righteous desire is granted.
verses.text_he: מְגוֹרַ֣ת רָ֭שָׁע הִ֣יא תְבוֹאֶ֑נּוּ וְתַאֲוַ֖ת צַדִּיקִ֣ים יִתֵּֽן׃

verses.text_en: When the storm passes the wicked man is gone, But the righteous is an everlasting foundation.
verses.text_he: כַּעֲב֣וֹר ס֭וּפָה וְאֵ֣ין רָשָׁ֑ע וְ֝צַדִּ֗יק יְס֣וֹד עוֹלָֽם׃

verses.text_en: Like vinegar to the teeth, Like smoke to the eyes, Is a lazy man to those who send him on a mission.
verses.text_he: כַּחֹ֤מֶץ׀ לַשִּׁנַּ֗יִם וְכֶעָשָׁ֥ן לָעֵינָ֑יִם כֵּ֥ן הֶ֝עָצֵ֗ל לְשֹׁלְחָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: The fear of the LORD prolongs life, While the years of the wicked will be shortened.
verses.text_he: יִרְאַ֣ת יְ֭הֹוָה תּוֹסִ֣יף יָמִ֑ים וּשְׁנ֖וֹת רְשָׁעִ֣ים תִּקְצֹֽרְנָה׃

verses.text_en: The righteous can look forward to joy, But the hope of the wicked is doomed.
verses.text_he: תּוֹחֶ֣לֶת צַדִּיקִ֣ים שִׂמְחָ֑ה וְתִקְוַ֖ת רְשָׁעִ֣ים תֹּאבֵֽד׃

verses.text_en: The way of the LORD is a stronghold for the blameless, But a ruin for evildoers.
verses.text_he: מָע֣וֹז לַ֭תֹּם דֶּ֣רֶךְ יְהֹוָ֑ה וּ֝מְחִתָּ֗ה לְפֹ֣עֲלֵי אָֽוֶן׃

verses.text_en: The righteous will never be shaken; The wicked will not inhabit the earth.
verses.text_he: צַ֭דִּיק לְעוֹלָ֣ם בַּל־יִמּ֑וֹט וּ֝רְשָׁעִ֗ים לֹ֣א יִשְׁכְּנוּ־אָֽרֶץ׃

verses.text_en: The mouth of the righteous produces wisdom, But the treacherous tongue shall be cut off.
verses.text_he: פִּֽי־צַ֭דִּיק יָנ֣וּב חׇכְמָ֑ה וּלְשׁ֥וֹן תַּ֝הְפֻּכ֗וֹת תִּכָּרֵֽת׃

verses.text_en: The lips of the righteous know what is pleasing; The mouth of the wicked [knows] duplicity.
verses.text_he: שִׂפְתֵ֣י צַ֭דִּיק יֵדְע֣וּן רָצ֑וֹן וּפִ֥י רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים תַּהְפֻּכֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: False scales are an abomination to the LORD; An honest weight pleases Him.
verses.text_he: מֹאזְנֵ֣י מִ֭רְמָה תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת יְהֹוָ֑ה וְאֶ֖בֶן שְׁלֵמָ֣ה רְצוֹנֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: When arrogance appears, disgrace follows, But wisdom is with those who are unassuming.
verses.text_he: בָּֽא־זָ֭דוֹן וַיָּבֹ֣א קָל֑וֹן וְֽאֶת־צְנוּעִ֥ים חׇכְמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: The integrity of the upright guides them; The deviousness of the treacherous leads them to ruin.
verses.text_he: תֻּמַּ֣ת יְשָׁרִ֣ים תַּנְחֵ֑ם וְסֶ֖לֶף בֹּגְדִ֣ים (ושדם) [יְשׇׁדֵּֽם]׃

verses.text_en: Wealth is of no avail on the day of wrath, But righteousness saves from death.
verses.text_he: לֹא־יוֹעִ֣יל ה֭וֹן בְּי֣וֹם עֶבְרָ֑ה וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה תַּצִּ֥יל מִמָּֽוֶת׃

verses.text_en: The righteousness of the blameless man smooths his way, But the wicked man is felled by his wickedness.
verses.text_he: צִדְקַ֣ת תָּ֭מִים תְּיַשֵּׁ֣ר דַּרְכּ֑וֹ וּ֝בְרִשְׁעָת֗וֹ יִפֹּ֥ל רָשָֽׁע׃

verses.text_en: The righteousness of the upright saves them, But the treacherous are trapped by their malice.
verses.text_he: צִדְקַ֣ת יְ֭שָׁרִים תַּצִּילֵ֑ם וּ֝בְהַוַּ֗ת בֹּגְדִ֥ים יִלָּכֵֽדוּ׃

verses.text_en: At death the hopes of a wicked man are doomed, And the ambition of evil men comes to nothing.
verses.text_he: בְּמ֤וֹת אָדָ֣ם רָ֭שָׁע תֹּאבַ֣ד תִּקְוָ֑ה וְתוֹחֶ֖לֶת אוֹנִ֣ים אָבָֽדָה׃

verses.text_en: The righteous man is rescued from trouble And the wicked man takes his place.
verses.text_he: צַ֭דִּיק מִצָּרָ֣ה נֶחֱלָ֑ץ וַיָּבֹ֖א רָשָׁ֣ע תַּחְתָּֽיו׃

verses.text_en: The impious man destroys his neighbor through speech, But through their knowledge the righteous are rescued.
verses.text_he: בְּפֶ֗ה חָ֭נֵף יַשְׁחִ֣ת רֵעֵ֑הוּ וּ֝בְדַ֗עַת צַדִּיקִ֥ים יֵחָלֵֽצוּ׃

verses.text_en: When the righteous prosper the city exults; When the wicked perish there are shouts of joy.
verses.text_he: בְּט֣וּב צַ֭דִּיקִים תַּעֲלֹ֣ץ קִרְיָ֑ה וּבַאֲבֹ֖ד רְשָׁעִ֣ים רִנָּֽה׃

verses.text_en: A city is built up by the blessing of the upright, But it is torn down by the speech of the wicked.
verses.text_he: בְּבִרְכַּ֣ת יְ֭שָׁרִים תָּר֣וּם קָ֑רֶת וּבְפִ֥י רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים תֵּהָרֵֽס׃

verses.text_en: He who speaks contemptuously of his fellowman is devoid of sense; A prudent man keeps his peace.
verses.text_he: בׇּז־לְרֵעֵ֥הוּ חֲסַר־לֵ֑ב וְאִ֖ישׁ תְּבוּנ֣וֹת יַחֲרִֽישׁ׃

verses.text_en: A base fellow gives away secrets, But a trustworthy soul keeps a confidence.
verses.text_he: הוֹלֵ֣ךְ רָ֭כִיל מְגַלֶּה־סּ֑וֹד וְנֶאֱמַן־ר֝֗וּחַ מְכַסֶּ֥ה דָבָֽר׃

verses.text_en: For want of strategy an army falls, But victory comes with much planning.
verses.text_he: בְּאֵ֣ין תַּ֭חְבֻּלוֹת יִפׇּל־עָ֑ם וּ֝תְשׁוּעָ֗ה בְּרֹ֣ב יוֹעֵֽץ׃

verses.text_en: Harm awaits him who stands surety for another; He who spurns pledging shall be secure.
verses.text_he: רַע־יֵ֭רוֹעַ כִּי־עָ֣רַב זָ֑ר וְשֹׂנֵ֖א תֹקְעִ֣ים בּוֹטֵֽחַ׃

verses.text_en: A graceful woman obtains honor; Ruthless men obtain wealth.
verses.text_he: אֵֽשֶׁת־חֵ֭ן תִּתְמֹ֣ךְ כָּב֑וֹד וְ֝עָרִיצִ֗ים יִתְמְכוּ־עֹֽשֶׁר׃

verses.text_en: A kindly man benefits himself; A cruel man makes trouble for himself.
verses.text_he: גֹּמֵ֣ל נַ֭פְשׁוֹ אִ֣ישׁ חָ֑סֶד וְעֹכֵ֥ר שְׁ֝אֵר֗וֹ אַכְזָרִֽי׃

verses.text_en: The wicked man earns illusory wages, But he who sows righteousness has a true reward.
verses.text_he: רָשָׁ֗ע עֹשֶׂ֥ה פְעֻלַּת־שָׁ֑קֶר וְזֹרֵ֥עַ צְ֝דָקָ֗ה שֶׂ֣כֶר אֱמֶֽת׃

verses.text_en: Righteousness is a prop of life, But to pursue evil leads to death.
verses.text_he: כֵּן־צְדָקָ֥ה לְחַיִּ֑ים וּמְרַדֵּ֖ף רָעָ֣ה לְמוֹתֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Men of crooked mind are an abomination to the LORD, But those whose way is blameless please Him.
verses.text_he: תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת יְ֭הֹוָה עִקְּשֵׁי־לֵ֑ב וּ֝רְצוֹנ֗וֹ תְּמִ֣ימֵי דָֽרֶךְ׃

verses.text_en: Assuredly, the evil man will not escape, But the offspring of the righteous will be safe.
verses.text_he: יָ֣ד לְ֭יָד לֹא־יִנָּ֣קֶה רָּ֑ע וְזֶ֖רַע צַדִּיקִ֣ים נִמְלָֽט׃

verses.text_en: Like a gold ring in the snout of a pig Is a beautiful woman bereft of sense.
verses.text_he: נֶ֣זֶם זָ֭הָב בְּאַ֣ף חֲזִ֑יר אִשָּׁ֥ה יָ֝פָ֗ה וְסָ֣רַת טָֽעַם׃

verses.text_en: What the righteous desire can only be good; What the wicked hope for [stirs] wrath.
verses.text_he: תַּאֲוַ֣ת צַדִּיקִ֣ים אַךְ־ט֑וֹב תִּקְוַ֖ת רְשָׁעִ֣ים עֶבְרָֽה׃

verses.text_en: One man gives generously and ends with more; Another stints on doing the right thing and incurs a loss.
verses.text_he: יֵ֣שׁ מְ֭פַזֵּר וְנוֹסָ֥ף ע֑וֹד וְחֹשֵׂ֥ךְ מִ֝יֹּ֗שֶׁר אַךְ־לְמַחְסֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: A generous person enjoys prosperity; He who satisfies others shall himself be sated.
verses.text_he: נֶֽפֶשׁ־בְּרָכָ֥ה תְדֻשָּׁ֑ן וּ֝מַרְוֶ֗ה גַּם־ה֥וּא יוֹרֶֽא׃

verses.text_en: He who withholds grain earns the curses of the people, But blessings are on the head of the one who dispenses it.
verses.text_he: מֹ֣נֵֽעַ בָּ֭ר יִקְּבֻ֣הוּ לְא֑וֹם וּ֝בְרָכָ֗ה לְרֹ֣אשׁ מַשְׁבִּֽיר׃

verses.text_en: He who earnestly seeks what is good pursues what is pleasing; He who is bent on evil, upon him it shall come.
verses.text_he: שֹׁ֣חֵֽר ט֭וֹב יְבַקֵּ֣שׁ רָצ֑וֹן וְדֹרֵ֖שׁ רָעָ֣ה תְבוֹאֶֽנּוּ׃

verses.text_en: He who trusts in his wealth shall fall, But the righteous shall flourish like foliage.
verses.text_he: בּוֹטֵ֣חַ בְּ֭עׇשְׁרוֹ ה֣וּא יִפּ֑וֹל וְ֝כֶעָלֶ֗ה צַדִּיקִ֥ים יִפְרָֽחוּ׃

verses.text_en: He who makes trouble for his household shall inherit the wind; A fool is a slave to the wise-hearted.
verses.text_he: עֹכֵ֣ר בֵּ֭יתוֹ יִנְחַל־ר֑וּחַ וְעֶ֥בֶד אֱ֝וִ֗יל לַֽחֲכַם־לֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: The fruit of the righteous is a tree of life; A wise man captivates people.
verses.text_he: פְּֽרִי־צַ֭דִּיק עֵ֣ץ חַיִּ֑ים וְלֹקֵ֖חַ נְפָשׁ֣וֹת חָכָֽם׃

verses.text_en: If the righteous on earth get their deserts, How much more the wicked man and the sinner.
verses.text_he: הֵ֣ן צַ֭דִּיק בָּאָ֣רֶץ יְשֻׁלָּ֑ם אַ֝֗ף כִּֽי־רָשָׁ֥ע וְחוֹטֵֽא׃

verses.text_en: He who loves discipline loves knowledge; He who spurns reproof is a brutish man.
verses.text_he: אֹהֵ֣ב מ֭וּסָר אֹ֣הֵֽב דָּ֑עַת וְשׂוֹנֵ֖א תוֹכַ֣חַת בָּֽעַר׃

verses.text_en: A good man earns the favor of the LORD, A man of intrigues, His condemnation.
verses.text_he: ט֗וֹב יָפִ֣יק רָ֭צוֹן מֵיְהֹוָ֑ה וְאִ֖ישׁ מְזִמּ֣וֹת יַרְשִֽׁיעַ׃

verses.text_en: A man cannot be established in wickedness, But the root of the righteous will not be shaken loose.
verses.text_he: לֹא־יִכּ֣וֹן אָדָ֣ם בְּרֶ֑שַׁע וְשֹׁ֥רֶשׁ צַ֝דִּיקִ֗ים בַּל־יִמּֽוֹט׃

verses.text_en: A capable wife is a crown for her husband, But an incompetent one is like rot in his bones.
verses.text_he: אֵֽשֶׁת־חַ֭יִל עֲטֶ֣רֶת בַּעְלָ֑הּ וּכְרָקָ֖ב בְּעַצְמוֹתָ֣יו מְבִישָֽׁה׃

verses.text_en: The purposes of the righteous are justice, The schemes of the wicked are deceit.
verses.text_he: מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת צַדִּיקִ֣ים מִשְׁפָּ֑ט תַּחְבֻּל֖וֹת רְשָׁעִ֣ים מִרְמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: The words of the wicked are a deadly ambush, But the speech of the upright saves them.
verses.text_he: דִּבְרֵ֣י רְשָׁעִ֣ים אֱרׇב־דָּ֑ם וּפִ֥י יְ֝שָׁרִ֗ים יַצִּילֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: Overturn the wicked and they are gone, But the house of the righteous will endure.
verses.text_he: הָפ֣וֹךְ רְשָׁעִ֣ים וְאֵינָ֑ם וּבֵ֖ית צַדִּיקִ֣ים יַעֲמֹֽד׃

verses.text_en: A man is commended according to his intelligence; A twisted mind is held up to contempt.
verses.text_he: לְֽפִי־שִׂ֭כְלוֹ יְהֻלַּל־אִ֑ישׁ וְנַעֲוֵה־לֵ֝֗ב יִהְיֶ֥ה לָבֽוּז׃

verses.text_en: Better to be lightly esteemed and have a servant Than to put on airs and have no food.
verses.text_he: ט֣וֹב נִ֭קְלֶה וְעֶ֣בֶד ל֑וֹ מִ֝מִּתְכַּבֵּ֗ד וַחֲסַר־לָֽחֶם׃

verses.text_en: A righteous man knows the needs of his beast, But the compassion of the wicked is cruelty.
verses.text_he: יוֹדֵ֣עַ צַ֭דִּיק נֶ֣פֶשׁ בְּהֶמְתּ֑וֹ וְֽרַחֲמֵ֥י רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים אַכְזָרִֽי׃

verses.text_en: He who tills his land shall have food in plenty, But he who pursues vanities is devoid of sense.
verses.text_he: עֹבֵ֣ד אַ֭דְמָתוֹ יִֽשְׂבַּֽע־לָ֑חֶם וּמְרַדֵּ֖ף רֵיקִ֣ים חֲסַר־לֵֽב׃

verses.text_en: The wicked covet the catch of evil men; The root of the righteous yields [fruit].
verses.text_he: חָמַ֣ד רָ֭שָׁע מְצ֣וֹד רָעִ֑ים וְשֹׁ֖רֶשׁ צַדִּיקִ֣ים יִתֵּֽן׃

verses.text_en: Sinful speech is a trap for the evil man, But the righteous escapes from trouble.
verses.text_he: בְּפֶ֣שַׁע שְׂ֭פָתַיִם מוֹקֵ֣שׁ רָ֑ע וַיֵּצֵ֖א מִצָּרָ֣ה צַדִּֽיק׃

verses.text_en: A man gets his fill of good from the fruit of his speech; One is repaid in kind for one’s deeds.
verses.text_he: מִפְּרִ֣י פִי־אִ֭ישׁ יִשְׂבַּע־ט֑וֹב וּגְמ֥וּל יְדֵי־אָ֝דָ֗ם (ישוב) [יָשִׁ֥יב] לֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: The way of a fool is right in his own eyes; But the wise man accepts advice.
verses.text_he: דֶּ֣רֶךְ אֱ֭וִיל יָשָׁ֣ר בְּעֵינָ֑יו וְשֹׁמֵ֖עַ לְעֵצָ֣ה חָכָֽם׃

verses.text_en: A fool’s vexation is known at once, But a clever man conceals his humiliation.
verses.text_he: אֱוִ֗יל בַּ֭יּוֹם יִוָּדַ֣ע כַּעְס֑וֹ וְכֹסֶ֖ה קָל֣וֹן עָרֽוּם׃

verses.text_en: He who testifies faithfully tells the truth, But a false witness, deceit.
verses.text_he: יָפִ֣יחַ אֱ֭מוּנָה יַגִּ֣יד צֶ֑דֶק וְעֵ֖ד שְׁקָרִ֣ים מִרְמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: There is blunt talk like sword-thrusts, But the speech of the wise is healing.
verses.text_he: יֵ֣שׁ בּ֭וֹטֶה כְּמַדְקְר֣וֹת חָ֑רֶב וּלְשׁ֖וֹן חֲכָמִ֣ים מַרְפֵּֽא׃

verses.text_en: Truthful speech abides forever, A lying tongue for but a moment.
verses.text_he: שְֽׂפַת־אֱ֭מֶת תִּכּ֣וֹן לָעַ֑ד וְעַד־אַ֝רְגִּ֗יעָה לְשׁ֣וֹן שָֽׁקֶר׃

verses.text_en: Deceit is in the minds of those who plot evil; For those who plan good there is joy.
verses.text_he: מִ֭רְמָה בְּלֶב־חֹ֣רְשֵׁי רָ֑ע וּֽלְיֹעֲצֵ֖י שָׁל֣וֹם שִׂמְחָֽה׃

verses.text_en: No harm befalls the righteous, But the wicked have their fill of misfortune.
verses.text_he: לֹא־יְאֻנֶּ֣ה לַצַּדִּ֣יק כׇּל־אָ֑וֶן וּ֝רְשָׁעִ֗ים מָ֣לְאוּ רָֽע׃

verses.text_en: Lying speech is an abomination to the LORD, But those who act faithfully please Him.
verses.text_he: תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת יְ֭הֹוָה שִׂפְתֵי־שָׁ֑קֶר וְעֹשֵׂ֖י אֱמוּנָ֣ה רְצוֹנֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: A clever man conceals what he knows, But the mind of a dullard cries out folly.
verses.text_he: אָדָ֣ם עָ֭רוּם כֹּ֣סֶה דָּ֑עַת וְלֵ֥ב כְּ֝סִילִ֗ים יִקְרָ֥א אִוֶּֽלֶת׃

verses.text_en: The hand of the diligent wields authority; The negligent are held in subjection.
verses.text_he: יַד־חָרוּצִ֥ים תִּמְשׁ֑וֹל וּ֝רְמִיָּ֗ה תִּהְיֶ֥ה לָמַֽס׃

verses.text_en: If there is anxiety in a man’s mind let him quash it, And turn it into joy with a good word.
verses.text_he: דְּאָגָ֣ה בְלֶב־אִ֣ישׁ יַשְׁחֶ֑נָּה וְדָבָ֖ר ט֣וֹב יְשַׂמְּחֶֽנָּה׃

verses.text_en: A righteous man gives his friend direction, But the way of the wicked leads astray.
verses.text_he: יָתֵ֣ר מֵרֵעֵ֣הוּ צַדִּ֑יק וְדֶ֖רֶךְ רְשָׁעִ֣ים תַּתְעֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: A negligent man never has game to roast; A diligent man has precious wealth.
verses.text_he: לֹא־יַחֲרֹ֣ךְ רְמִיָּ֣ה צֵיד֑וֹ וְהוֹן־אָדָ֖ם יָקָ֣ר חָרֽוּץ׃

verses.text_en: The road of righteousness leads to life; By way of its path there is no death.
verses.text_he: בְּאֹֽרַח־צְדָקָ֥ה חַיִּ֑ים וְדֶ֖רֶךְ נְתִיבָ֣הֿ אַל־מָֽוֶת׃

verses.text_en: A wise son—it is through the discipline of his father; A scoffer—he never heard reproof.
verses.text_he: בֵּ֣ן חָ֭כָם מ֣וּסַר אָ֑ב וְ֝לֵ֗ץ לֹא־שָׁמַ֥ע גְּעָרָֽה׃

verses.text_en: A man enjoys good from the fruit of his speech; But out of the throat of the treacherous comes lawlessness.
verses.text_he: מִפְּרִ֣י פִי־אִ֭ישׁ יֹ֣אכַל ט֑וֹב וְנֶ֖פֶשׁ בֹּגְדִ֣ים חָמָֽס׃

verses.text_en: He who guards his tongue preserves his life; He who opens wide his lips, it is his ruin.
verses.text_he: נֹצֵ֣ר פִּ֭יו שֹׁמֵ֣ר נַפְשׁ֑וֹ פֹּשֵׂ֥ק שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו מְחִתָּה־לֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: A lazy man craves, but has nothing; The diligent shall feast on rich fare.
verses.text_he: מִתְאַוָּ֣ה וָ֭אַיִן נַפְשׁ֣וֹ עָצֵ֑ל וְנֶ֖פֶשׁ חָרֻצִ֣ים תְּדֻשָּֽׁן׃

verses.text_en: A righteous man hates lies; The wicked man is vile and disgraceful.
verses.text_he: דְּבַר־שֶׁ֭קֶר יִשְׂנָ֣א צַדִּ֑יק וְ֝רָשָׁ֗ע יַבְאִ֥ישׁ וְיַחְפִּֽיר׃

verses.text_en: Righteousness protects him whose way is blameless; Wickedness subverts the sinner.
verses.text_he: צְ֭דָקָה תִּצֹּ֣ר תׇּם־דָּ֑רֶךְ וְ֝רִשְׁעָ֗ה תְּסַלֵּ֥ף חַטָּֽאת׃

verses.text_en: One man pretends to be rich and has nothing; Another professes to be poor and has much wealth.
verses.text_he: יֵ֣שׁ מִ֭תְעַשֵּׁר וְאֵ֣ין כֹּ֑ל מִ֝תְרוֹשֵׁ֗שׁ וְה֣וֹן רָֽב׃

verses.text_en: Riches are ransom for a man’s life, The poor never heard a reproof.
verses.text_he: כֹּ֣פֶר נֶפֶשׁ־אִ֣ישׁ עׇשְׁר֑וֹ וְ֝רָ֗שׁ לֹא־שָׁמַ֥ע גְּעָרָֽה׃

verses.text_en: The light of the righteous is radiant; The lamp of the wicked is extinguished.
verses.text_he: אוֹר־צַדִּיקִ֥ים יִשְׂמָ֑ח וְנֵ֖ר רְשָׁעִ֣ים יִדְעָֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: Arrogance yields nothing but strife; Wisdom belongs to those who seek advice.
verses.text_he: רַק־בְּ֭זָדוֹן יִתֵּ֣ן מַצָּ֑ה וְאֶת־נ֖וֹעָצִ֣ים חׇכְמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Wealth may dwindle to less than nothing, But he who gathers little by little increases it.
verses.text_he: ה֭וֹן מֵהֶ֣בֶל יִמְעָ֑ט וְקֹבֵ֖ץ עַל־יָ֣ד יַרְבֶּֽה׃

verses.text_en: Hope deferred sickens the heart, But desire realized is a tree of life.
verses.text_he: תּוֹחֶ֣לֶת מְ֭מֻשָּׁכָה מַחֲלָה־לֵ֑ב וְעֵ֥ץ חַ֝יִּ֗ים תַּאֲוָ֥ה בָאָֽה׃

verses.text_en: He who disdains a precept will be injured thereby; He who respects a command will be rewarded.
verses.text_he: בָּ֣ז לְ֭דָבָר יֵחָ֣בֶל ל֑וֹ וִירֵ֥א מִ֝צְוָ֗ה ה֣וּא יְשֻׁלָּֽם׃

verses.text_en: The instruction of a wise man is a fountain of life, Enabling one to avoid deadly snares.
verses.text_he: תּוֹרַ֣ת חָ֭כָם מְק֣וֹר חַיִּ֑ים לָ֝ס֗וּר מִמֹּ֥קְשֵׁי מָֽוֶת׃

verses.text_en: Good sense wins favor; The way of treacherous men is unchanging.
verses.text_he: שֵֽׂכֶל־ט֭וֹב יִתֶּן־חֵ֑ן וְדֶ֖רֶךְ בֹּגְדִ֣ים אֵיתָֽן׃

verses.text_en: Every clever man acts knowledgeably, But a dullard exposes his stupidity.
verses.text_he: כׇּל־עָ֭רוּם יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה בְדָ֑עַת וּ֝כְסִ֗יל יִפְרֹ֥שׂ אִוֶּֽלֶת׃

verses.text_en: Harm befalls a wicked messenger; A faithful courier brings healing.
verses.text_he: מַלְאָ֣ךְ רָ֭שָׁע יִפֹּ֣ל בְּרָ֑ע וְצִ֖יר אֱמוּנִ֣ים מַרְפֵּֽא׃

verses.text_en: Poverty and humiliation are for him who spurns discipline; But he who takes reproof to heart gets honor.
verses.text_he: רֵ֣ישׁ וְ֭קָלוֹן פּוֹרֵ֣עַ מוּסָ֑ר וְשֹׁמֵ֖ר תּוֹכַ֣חַת יְכֻבָּֽד׃

verses.text_en: Desire realized is sweet to the soul; To turn away from evil is abhorrent to the stupid.
verses.text_he: תַּאֲוָ֣ה נִ֭הְיָה תֶּעֱרַ֣ב לְנָ֑פֶשׁ וְתוֹעֲבַ֥ת כְּ֝סִילִ֗ים ס֣וּר מֵרָֽע׃

verses.text_en: He who keeps company with the wise becomes wise, But he who consorts with dullards comes to grief.
verses.text_he: (הלוך) [הוֹלֵ֣ךְ] אֶת־חֲכָמִ֣ים (וחכם) [יֶחְכָּ֑ם] וְרֹעֶ֖ה כְסִילִ֣ים יֵרֽוֹעַ׃

verses.text_en: Misfortune pursues sinners, But the righteous are well rewarded.
verses.text_he: חַ֭טָּאִים תְּרַדֵּ֣ף רָעָ֑ה וְאֶת־צַ֝דִּיקִ֗ים יְשַׁלֶּם־טֽוֹב׃

verses.text_en: A good man has what to bequeath to his grandchildren, For the wealth of sinners is stored up for the righteous.
verses.text_he: ט֗וֹב יַנְחִ֥יל בְּנֵֽי־בָנִ֑ים וְצָפ֥וּן לַ֝צַּדִּ֗יק חֵ֣יל חוֹטֵֽא׃

verses.text_en: The tillage of the poor yields much food; But substance is swept away for lack of moderation.
verses.text_he: רׇב־אֹ֭כֶל נִ֣יר רָאשִׁ֑ים וְיֵ֥שׁ נִ֝סְפֶּ֗ה בְּלֹ֣א מִשְׁפָּֽט׃

verses.text_en: He who spares the rod hates his son, But he who loves him disciplines him early.
verses.text_he: חוֹשֵׂ֣ךְ שִׁ֭בְטוֹ שׂוֹנֵ֣א בְנ֑וֹ וְ֝אֹהֲב֗וֹ שִׁחֲר֥וֹ מוּסָֽר׃

verses.text_en: The righteous man eats to his heart’s content, But the belly of the wicked is empty.
verses.text_he: צַדִּ֗יק אֹ֭כֵֽל לְשֹׂ֣בַע נַפְשׁ֑וֹ וּבֶ֖טֶן רְשָׁעִ֣ים תֶּחְסָֽר׃

verses.text_en: The wisest of women builds her house, But folly tears it down with its own hands.
verses.text_he: חַכְמ֣וֹת נָ֭שִׁים בָּנְתָ֣ה בֵיתָ֑הּ וְ֝אִוֶּ֗לֶת בְּיָדֶ֥יהָ תֶהֶרְסֶֽנּוּ׃

verses.text_en: He who maintains his integrity fears the LORD; A man of devious ways scorns Him.
verses.text_he: הוֹלֵ֣ךְ בְּ֭יׇשְׁרוֹ יְרֵ֣א יְהֹוָ֑ה וּנְל֖וֹז דְּרָכָ֣יו בּוֹזֵֽהוּ׃

verses.text_en: In the mouth of a fool is a rod of haughtiness, But the lips of the wise protect them.
verses.text_he: בְּֽפִי־אֱ֭וִיל חֹ֣טֶר גַּאֲוָ֑ה וְשִׂפְתֵ֥י חֲ֝כָמִ֗ים תִּשְׁמוּרֵֽם׃

verses.text_en: If there are no oxen the crib is clean, But a rich harvest comes through the strength of the ox.
verses.text_he: בְּאֵ֣ין אֲ֭לָפִים אֵב֣וּס בָּ֑ר וְרׇב־תְּ֝בוּא֗וֹת בְּכֹ֣חַ שֽׁוֹר׃

verses.text_en: An honest witness will not lie; A false witness testifies lies.
verses.text_he: עֵ֣ד אֱ֭מוּנִים לֹ֣א יְכַזֵּ֑ב וְיָפִ֥יחַ כְּ֝זָבִ֗ים עֵ֣ד שָֽׁקֶר׃

verses.text_en: A scoffer seeks wisdom in vain, But knowledge comes easily to the intelligent man.
verses.text_he: בִּקֶּשׁ־לֵ֣ץ חׇכְמָ֣ה וָאָ֑יִן וְדַ֖עַת לְנָב֣וֹן נָקָֽל׃

verses.text_en: Keep your distance from a dullard, For you will not learn wise speech.
verses.text_he: לֵ֣ךְ מִ֭נֶּגֶד לְאִ֣ישׁ כְּסִ֑יל וּבַל־יָ֝דַ֗עְתָּ שִׂפְתֵי־דָֽעַת׃

verses.text_en: It is the wisdom of a clever man to understand his course; But the stupidity of the dullard is delusion.
verses.text_he: חׇכְמַ֣ת עָ֭רוּם הָבִ֣ין דַּרְכּ֑וֹ וְאִוֶּ֖לֶת כְּסִילִ֣ים מִרְמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Reparations mediate between fools, Between the upright, good will.
verses.text_he: אֱ֭וִלִים יָלִ֣יץ אָשָׁ֑ם וּבֵ֖ין יְשָׁרִ֣ים רָצֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: The heart alone knows its bitterness, And no outsider can share in its joy.
verses.text_he: לֵ֗ב י֭וֹדֵעַ מׇרַּ֣ת נַפְשׁ֑וֹ וּ֝בְשִׂמְחָת֗וֹ לֹא־יִתְעָ֥רַב זָֽר׃

verses.text_en: The house of the wicked will be demolished, But the tent of the upright will flourish.
verses.text_he: בֵּ֣ית רְ֭שָׁעִים יִשָּׁמֵ֑ד וְאֹ֖הֶל יְשָׁרִ֣ים יַפְרִֽיחַ׃

verses.text_en: A road may seem right to a man, But in the end it is a road to death.
verses.text_he: יֵ֤שׁ דֶּ֣רֶךְ יָ֭שָׁר לִפְנֵי־אִ֑ישׁ וְ֝אַחֲרִיתָ֗הּ דַּרְכֵי־מָֽוֶת׃

verses.text_en: The heart may ache even in laughter, And joy may end in grief.
verses.text_he: גַּם־בִּשְׂחֹ֥ק יִכְאַב־לֵ֑ב וְאַחֲרִיתָ֖הּ שִׂמְחָ֣ה תוּגָֽה׃

verses.text_en: An unprincipled man reaps the fruits of his ways; A good man, of his deeds.
verses.text_he: מִדְּרָכָ֣יו יִ֭שְׂבַּע ס֣וּג לֵ֑ב וּ֝מֵעָלָ֗יו אִ֣ישׁ טֽוֹב׃

verses.text_en: A simple person believes anything; A clever man ponders his course.
verses.text_he: פֶּ֭תִי יַאֲמִ֣ין לְכׇל־דָּבָ֑ר וְ֝עָר֗וּם יָבִ֥ין לַאֲשֻׁרֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: A wise man is diffident and shuns evil, But a dullard rushes in confidently.
verses.text_he: חָכָ֣ם יָ֭רֵא וְסָ֣ר מֵרָ֑ע וּ֝כְסִ֗יל מִתְעַבֵּ֥ר וּבוֹטֵֽחַ׃

verses.text_en: An impatient man commits folly; A man of intrigues will be hated.
verses.text_he: קְֽצַר־אַ֭פַּיִם יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה אִוֶּ֑לֶת וְאִ֥ישׁ מְ֝זִמּ֗וֹת יִשָּׂנֵֽא׃

verses.text_en: Folly is the lot of the simple, But clever men glory in knowledge.
verses.text_he: נָחֲל֣וּ פְתָאיִ֣ם אִוֶּ֑לֶת וַ֝עֲרוּמִ֗ים יַכְתִּ֥רוּ דָֽעַת׃

verses.text_en: Evil men are brought low before the good, So are the wicked at the gates of the righteous.
verses.text_he: שַׁח֣וּ רָ֭עִים לִפְנֵ֣י טוֹבִ֑ים וּ֝רְשָׁעִ֗ים עַֽל־שַׁעֲרֵ֥י צַדִּֽיק׃

verses.text_en: A pauper is despised even by his peers, But a rich man has many friends.
verses.text_he: גַּם־לְ֭רֵעֵהוּ יִשָּׂ֣נֵא רָ֑שׁ וְאֹהֲבֵ֖י עָשִׁ֣יר רַבִּֽים׃

verses.text_en: He who despises his fellow is wrong; He who shows pity for the lowly is happy.
verses.text_he: בׇּז־לְרֵעֵ֥הוּ חוֹטֵ֑א וּמְחוֹנֵ֖ן (עניים) [עֲנָוִ֣ים] אַשְׁרָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: Surely those who plan evil go astray, While those who plan good earn steadfast love.
verses.text_he: הֲֽלוֹא־יִ֭תְעוּ חֹ֣רְשֵׁי רָ֑ע וְחֶ֥סֶד וֶ֝אֱמֶ֗ת חֹ֣רְשֵׁי טֽוֹב׃

verses.text_en: From all toil there is some gain, But idle chatter is pure loss.
verses.text_he: בְּכׇל־עֶ֭צֶב יִהְיֶ֣ה מוֹתָ֑ר וּדְבַר־שְׂ֝פָתַ֗יִם אַךְ־לְמַחְסֽוֹר׃

verses.text_en: The ornament of the wise is their wealth; The stupidity of dullards is stupidity.
verses.text_he: עֲטֶ֣רֶת חֲכָמִ֣ים עׇשְׁרָ֑ם אִוֶּ֖לֶת כְּסִילִ֣ים אִוֶּֽלֶת׃

verses.text_en: A truthful witness saves lives; He who testifies lies [spreads] deceit.
verses.text_he: מַצִּ֣יל נְ֭פָשׁוֹת עֵ֣ד אֱמֶ֑ת וְיָפִ֖חַ כְּזָבִ֣ים מִרְמָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Fear of the LORD is a stronghold, A refuge for a man’s children.
verses.text_he: בְּיִרְאַ֣ת יְ֭הֹוָה מִבְטַח־עֹ֑ז וּ֝לְבָנָ֗יו יִהְיֶ֥ה מַחְסֶֽה׃

verses.text_en: Fear of the LORD is a fountain of life, Enabling one to avoid deadly snares.
verses.text_he: יִרְאַ֣ת יְ֭הֹוָה מְק֣וֹר חַיִּ֑ים לָ֝ס֗וּר מִמֹּ֥קְשֵׁי מָֽוֶת׃

verses.text_en: A numerous people is the glory of a king; Without a nation a ruler is ruined.
verses.text_he: בְּרׇב־עָ֥ם הַדְרַת־מֶ֑לֶךְ וּבְאֶ֥פֶס לְ֝אֹ֗ם מְחִתַּ֥ת רָזֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: Patience results in much understanding; Impatience gets folly as its portion.
verses.text_he: אֶ֣רֶךְ אַ֭פַּיִם רַב־תְּבוּנָ֑ה וּקְצַר־ר֝֗וּחַ מֵרִ֥ים אִוֶּֽלֶת׃

verses.text_en: A calm disposition gives bodily health; Passion is rot to the bones.
verses.text_he: חַיֵּ֣י בְ֭שָׂרִים לֵ֣ב מַרְפֵּ֑א וּרְקַ֖ב עֲצָמ֣וֹת קִנְאָֽה׃

verses.text_en: He who withholds what is due to the poor affronts his Maker; He who shows pity for the needy honors Him.
verses.text_he: עֹ֣שֵֽׁק דָּ֭ל חֵרֵ֣ף עֹשֵׂ֑הוּ וּ֝מְכַבְּד֗וֹ חֹנֵ֥ן אֶבְיֽוֹן׃

verses.text_en: The wicked man is felled by his own evil; The righteous man finds security in his death.
verses.text_he: בְּֽ֭רָעָתוֹ יִדָּחֶ֣ה רָשָׁ֑ע וְחֹסֶ֖ה בְמוֹת֣וֹ צַדִּֽיק׃

verses.text_en: Wisdom rests quietly in the mind of a prudent man, But among dullards it makes itself known.
verses.text_he: בְּלֵ֣ב נָ֭בוֹן תָּנ֣וּחַ חׇכְמָ֑ה וּבְקֶ֥רֶב כְּ֝סִילִ֗ים תִּוָּדֵֽעַ׃

verses.text_en: Righteousness exalts a nation; Sin is a reproach to any people.
verses.text_he: צְדָקָ֥ה תְרוֹמֵֽם־גּ֑וֹי וְחֶ֖סֶד לְאֻמִּ֣ים חַטָּֽאת׃

verses.text_en: The king favors a capable servant; He rages at an incompetent one.
verses.text_he: רְֽצוֹן־מֶ֭לֶךְ לְעֶ֣בֶד מַשְׂכִּ֑יל וְ֝עֶבְרָת֗וֹ תִּהְיֶ֥ה מֵבִֽישׁ׃

verses.text_en: A gentle response allays wrath; A harsh word provokes anger.
verses.text_he: מַֽעֲנֶה־רַּ֭ךְ יָשִׁ֣יב חֵמָ֑ה וּדְבַר־עֶ֝֗צֶב יַעֲלֶה־אָֽף׃

verses.text_en: The tongue of the wise produces much knowledge, But the mouth of dullards pours out folly.
verses.text_he: לְשׁ֣וֹן חֲ֭כָמִים תֵּיטִ֣יב דָּ֑עַת וּפִ֥י כְ֝סִילִ֗ים יַבִּ֥יעַ אִוֶּֽלֶת׃

verses.text_en: The eyes of the LORD are everywhere, Observing the bad and the good.
verses.text_he: בְּֽכׇל־מָ֭קוֹם עֵינֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֑ה צֹ֝פ֗וֹת רָעִ֥ים וְטוֹבִֽים׃

verses.text_en: A healing tongue is a tree of life, But a devious one makes for a broken spirit.
verses.text_he: מַרְפֵּ֣א לָ֭שׁוֹן עֵ֣ץ חַיִּ֑ים וְסֶ֥לֶף בָּ֝֗הּ שֶׁ֣בֶר בְּרֽוּחַ׃

verses.text_en: A fool spurns the discipline of his father, But one who heeds reproof becomes clever.
verses.text_he: אֱוִ֗יל יִ֭נְאַץ מוּסַ֣ר אָבִ֑יו וְשֹׁמֵ֖ר תּוֹכַ֣חַת יַעְרִֽים׃

verses.text_en: In the house of the righteous there is much treasure, But in the harvest of the wicked there is trouble.
verses.text_he: בֵּ֣ית צַ֭דִּיק חֹ֣סֶן רָ֑ב וּבִתְבוּאַ֖ת רָשָׁ֣ע נֶעְכָּֽרֶת׃

verses.text_en: The lips of the wise disseminate knowledge; Not so the minds of dullards.
verses.text_he: שִׂפְתֵ֣י חֲ֭כָמִים יְזָ֣רוּ דָ֑עַת וְלֵ֖ב כְּסִילִ֣ים לֹא־כֵֽן׃

verses.text_en: The sacrifice of the wicked is an abomination to the LORD, But the prayer of the upright pleases Him.
verses.text_he: זֶ֣בַח רְ֭שָׁעִים תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת יְהֹוָ֑ה וּתְפִלַּ֖ת יְשָׁרִ֣ים רְצוֹנֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: The way of the wicked is an abomination to the LORD, But He loves him who pursues righteousness.
verses.text_he: תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת יְ֭הֹוָה דֶּ֣רֶךְ רָשָׁ֑ע וּמְרַדֵּ֖ף צְדָקָ֣ה יֶאֱהָֽב׃

verses.text_en: Discipline seems bad to him who forsakes the way; He who spurns reproof will die.
verses.text_he: מוּסָ֣ר רָ֭ע לְעֹזֵ֣ב אֹ֑רַח שׂוֹנֵ֖א תוֹכַ֣חַת יָמֽוּת׃

verses.text_en: Sheol and Abaddon lie exposed to the LORD, How much more the minds of men!
verses.text_he: שְׁא֣וֹל וַ֭אֲבַדּוֹן נֶ֣גֶד יְהֹוָ֑ה אַ֝֗ף כִּֽי־לִבּ֥וֹת בְּֽנֵי־אָדָֽם׃

verses.text_en: The scoffer dislikes being reproved; He will not resort to the wise.
verses.text_he: לֹ֣א יֶאֱהַב־לֵ֭ץ הוֹכֵ֣חַֽ ל֑וֹ אֶל־חֲ֝כָמִ֗ים לֹ֣א יֵלֵֽךְ׃

verses.text_en: A joyful heart makes a cheerful face; A sad heart makes a despondent mood.
verses.text_he: לֵ֣ב שָׂ֭מֵחַ יֵיטִ֣ב פָּנִ֑ים וּבְעַצְּבַת־לֵ֝֗ב ר֣וּחַ נְכֵאָֽה׃

verses.text_en: The mind of a prudent man seeks knowledge; The mouth of the dullard pursues folly.
verses.text_he: לֵ֣ב נָ֭בוֹן יְבַקֶּשׁ־דָּ֑עַת (ופני) [וּפִ֥י] כְ֝סִילִ֗ים יִרְעֶ֥ה אִוֶּֽלֶת׃

verses.text_en: All the days of a poor man are wretched, But contentment is a feast without end.
verses.text_he: כׇּל־יְמֵ֣י עָנִ֣י רָעִ֑ים וְטֽוֹב־לֵ֝֗ב מִשְׁתֶּ֥ה תָמִֽיד׃

verses.text_en: Better a little with fear of the LORD Than great wealth with confusion.
verses.text_he: טוֹב־מְ֭עַט בְּיִרְאַ֣ת יְהֹוָ֑ה מֵאוֹצָ֥ר רָ֝֗ב וּמְה֥וּמָה בֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Better a meal of vegetables where there is love Than a fattened ox where there is hate.
verses.text_he: ט֤וֹב אֲרֻחַ֣ת יָ֭רָק וְאַהֲבָה־שָׁ֑ם מִשּׁ֥וֹר אָ֝ב֗וּס וְשִׂנְאָה־בֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: A hot-tempered man provokes a quarrel; A patient man calms strife.
verses.text_he: אִ֣ישׁ חֵ֭מָה יְגָרֶ֣ה מָד֑וֹן וְאֶ֥רֶךְ אַ֝פַּ֗יִם יַשְׁקִ֥יט רִֽיב׃

verses.text_en: The way of a lazy man is like a hedge of thorns, But the path of the upright is paved.
verses.text_he: דֶּ֣רֶךְ עָ֭צֵל כִּמְשֻׂ֣כַת חָ֑דֶק וְאֹ֖רַח יְשָׁרִ֣ים סְלֻלָֽה׃

verses.text_en: A wise son makes his father happy; A fool of a man humiliates his mother.
verses.text_he: בֵּ֣ן חָ֭כָם יְשַׂמַּח־אָ֑ב וּכְסִ֥יל אָ֝דָ֗ם בּוֹזֶ֥ה אִמּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Folly is joy to one devoid of sense; A prudent man walks a straight path.
verses.text_he: אִ֭וֶּלֶת שִׂמְחָ֣ה לַחֲסַר־לֵ֑ב וְאִ֥ישׁ תְּ֝בוּנָ֗ה יְיַשֶּׁר־לָֽכֶת׃

verses.text_en: Plans are foiled for want of counsel, But they succeed through many advisers.
verses.text_he: הָפֵ֣ר מַ֭חֲשָׁבוֹת בְּאֵ֣ין ס֑וֹד וּבְרֹ֖ב יוֹעֲצִ֣ים תָּקֽוּם׃

verses.text_en: A ready response is a joy to a man, And how good is a word rightly timed!
verses.text_he: שִׂמְחָ֣ה לָ֭אִישׁ בְּמַעֲנֵה־פִ֑יו וְדָבָ֖ר בְּעִתּ֣וֹ מַה־טּֽוֹב׃

verses.text_en: For an intelligent man the path of life leads upward, In order to avoid Sheol below.
verses.text_he: אֹ֣רַח חַ֭יִּים לְמַ֣עְלָה לְמַשְׂכִּ֑יל לְמַ֥עַן ס֝֗וּר מִשְּׁא֥וֹל מָֽטָּה׃

verses.text_en: The LORD will tear down the house of the proud, But He will establish the homestead of the widow.
verses.text_he: בֵּ֣ית גֵּ֭אִים יִסַּ֥ח׀יְהֹוָ֑ה וְ֝יַצֵּ֗ב גְּב֣וּל אַלְמָנָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Evil thoughts are an abomination to the LORD, But pleasant words are pure.
verses.text_he: תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת יְ֭הֹוָה מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת רָ֑ע וּ֝טְהֹרִ֗ים אִמְרֵי־נֹֽעַם׃

verses.text_en: He who pursues ill-gotten gain makes trouble for his household; He who spurns gifts will live long.
verses.text_he: עֹכֵ֣ר בֵּ֭יתוֹ בּוֹצֵ֣עַ בָּ֑צַע וְשׂוֹנֵ֖א מַתָּנֹ֣ת יִחְיֶֽה׃

verses.text_en: The heart of the righteous man rehearses his answer, But the mouth of the wicked blurts out evil things.
verses.text_he: לֵ֣ב צַ֭דִּיק יֶהְגֶּ֣ה לַעֲנ֑וֹת וּפִ֥י רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים יַבִּ֥יעַ רָעֽוֹת׃

verses.text_en: The LORD is far from the wicked, But He hears the prayer of the righteous.
verses.text_he: רָח֣וֹק יְ֭הֹוָה מֵרְשָׁעִ֑ים וּתְפִלַּ֖ת צַדִּיקִ֣ים יִשְׁמָֽע׃

verses.text_en: What brightens the eye gladdens the heart; Good news puts fat on the bones.
verses.text_he: מְֽאוֹר־עֵ֭ינַיִם יְשַׂמַּֽח־לֵ֑ב שְׁמוּעָ֥ה ט֝וֹבָ֗ה תְּדַשֶּׁן־עָֽצֶם׃

verses.text_en: He whose ear heeds the discipline of life Lodges among the wise.
verses.text_he: אֹ֗זֶן שֹׁ֭מַעַת תּוֹכַ֣חַת חַיִּ֑ים בְּקֶ֖רֶב חֲכָמִ֣ים תָּלִֽין׃

verses.text_en: He who spurns discipline hates himself; He who heeds reproof gains understanding.
verses.text_he: פּוֹרֵ֣עַ מ֭וּסָר מוֹאֵ֣ס נַפְשׁ֑וֹ וְשׁוֹמֵ֥עַ תּ֝וֹכַ֗חַת ק֣וֹנֶה לֵּֽב׃

verses.text_en: The fear of the LORD is the discipline of wisdom; Humility precedes honor.
verses.text_he: יִרְאַ֣ת יְ֭הֹוָה מוּסַ֣ר חׇכְמָ֑ה וְלִפְנֵ֖י כָב֣וֹד עֲנָוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: A man may arrange his thoughts, But what he says depends on the LORD.
verses.text_he: לְאָדָ֥ם מַעַרְכֵי־לֵ֑ב וּ֝מֵיְהֹוָ֗ה מַעֲנֵ֥ה לָשֽׁוֹן׃

verses.text_en: All the ways of a man seem right to him, But the LORD probes motives.
verses.text_he: כׇּֽל־דַּרְכֵי־אִ֭ישׁ זַ֣ךְ בְּעֵינָ֑יו וְתֹכֵ֖ן רוּח֣וֹת יְהֹוָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Entrust your affairs to the LORD, And your plans will succeed.
verses.text_he: גֹּ֣ל אֶל־יְהֹוָ֣ה מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ וְ֝יִכֹּ֗נוּ מַחְשְׁבֹתֶֽיךָ׃

verses.text_en: The LORD made everything for a purpose, Even the wicked for an evil day.
verses.text_he: כֹּ֤ל פָּעַ֣ל יְ֭הֹוָה לַֽמַּעֲנֵ֑הוּ וְגַם־רָ֝שָׁ֗ע לְי֣וֹם רָעָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Every haughty person is an abomination to the LORD; Assuredly, he will not go unpunished.
verses.text_he: תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת יְ֭הֹוָה כׇּל־גְּבַהּ־לֵ֑ב יָ֥ד לְ֝יָ֗ד לֹ֣א יִנָּקֶֽה׃

verses.text_en: Iniquity is expiated by loyalty and faithfulness, And evil is avoided through fear of the LORD.
verses.text_he: בְּחֶ֣סֶד וֶ֭אֱמֶת יְכֻפַּ֣ר עָוֺ֑ן וּבְיִרְאַ֥ת יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה ס֣וּר מֵרָֽע׃

verses.text_en: When the LORD is pleased with a man’s conduct, He may turn even his enemies into allies.
verses.text_he: בִּרְצ֣וֹת יְ֭הֹוָה דַּרְכֵי־אִ֑ישׁ גַּם־א֝וֹיְבָ֗יו יַשְׁלִ֥ם אִתּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Better a little with righteousness Than a large income with injustice.
verses.text_he: טוֹב־מְ֭עַט בִּצְדָקָ֑ה מֵרֹ֥ב תְּ֝בוּא֗וֹת בְּלֹ֣א מִשְׁפָּֽט׃

verses.text_en: A man may plot out his course, But it is the LORD who directs his steps.
verses.text_he: לֵ֣ב אָ֭דָם יְחַשֵּׁ֣ב דַּרְכּ֑וֹ וַ֝יהֹוָ֗ה יָכִ֥ין צַעֲדֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: There is magic on the lips of the king; He cannot err in judgment.
verses.text_he: קֶ֤סֶם׀ עַֽל־שִׂפְתֵי־מֶ֑לֶךְ בְּ֝מִשְׁפָּ֗ט לֹ֣א יִמְעַל־פִּֽיו׃

verses.text_en: Honest scales and balances are the LORD’s; All the weights in the bag are His work.
verses.text_he: פֶּ֤לֶס׀ וּמֹאזְנֵ֣י מִ֭שְׁפָּט לַיהֹוָ֑ה מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗הוּ כׇּל־אַבְנֵי־כִֽיס׃

verses.text_en: Wicked deeds are an abomination to kings, For the throne is established by righteousness.
verses.text_he: תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת מְ֭לָכִים עֲשׂ֣וֹת רֶ֑שַׁע כִּ֥י בִ֝צְדָקָ֗ה יִכּ֥וֹן כִּסֵּֽא׃

verses.text_en: Truthful speech wins the favor of kings; They love those who speak honestly.
verses.text_he: רְצ֣וֹן מְ֭לָכִים שִׂפְתֵי־צֶ֑דֶק וְדֹבֵ֖ר יְשָׁרִ֣ים יֶאֱהָֽב׃

verses.text_en: The king’s wrath is a messenger of death, But a wise man can appease it.
verses.text_he: חֲמַת־מֶ֥לֶךְ מַלְאֲכֵי־מָ֑וֶת וְאִ֖ישׁ חָכָ֣ם יְכַפְּרֶֽנָּה׃

verses.text_en: The king’s smile means life; His favor is like a rain cloud in spring.
verses.text_he: בְּאוֹר־פְּנֵי־מֶ֥לֶךְ חַיִּ֑ים וּ֝רְצוֹנ֗וֹ כְּעָ֣ב מַלְקֽוֹשׁ׃

verses.text_en: How much better to acquire wisdom than gold; To acquire understanding is preferable to silver.
verses.text_he: קְֽנֹה־חׇכְמָ֗ה מַה־טּ֥וֹב מֵחָר֑וּץ וּקְנ֥וֹת בִּ֝ינָ֗ה נִבְחָ֥ר מִכָּֽסֶף׃

verses.text_en: The highway of the upright avoids evil; He who would preserve his life watches his way.
verses.text_he: מְסִלַּ֣ת יְ֭שָׁרִים ס֣וּר מֵרָ֑ע שֹׁמֵ֥ר נַ֝פְשׁ֗וֹ נֹצֵ֥ר דַּרְכּֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Pride goes before ruin, Arrogance, before failure.
verses.text_he: לִפְנֵי־שֶׁ֥בֶר גָּא֑וֹן וְלִפְנֵ֥י כִ֝שָּׁל֗וֹן גֹּ֣בַהּ רֽוּחַ׃

verses.text_en: Better to be humble and among the lowly Than to share spoils with the proud.
verses.text_he: ט֣וֹב שְׁפַל־ר֭וּחַ אֶת־[עֲנָוִ֑ים] (עניים) מֵחַלֵּ֥ק שָׁ֝לָ֗ל אֶת־גֵּאִֽים׃

verses.text_en: He who is adept in a matter will attain success; Happy is he who trusts in the LORD.
verses.text_he: מַשְׂכִּ֣יל עַל־דָּ֭בָר יִמְצָא־ט֑וֹב וּבוֹטֵ֖חַ בַּיהֹוָ֣ה אַשְׁרָֽיו׃

verses.text_en: The wise-hearted is called discerning; One whose speech is pleasing gains wisdom.
verses.text_he: לַֽחֲכַם־לֵ֭ב יִקָּרֵ֣א נָב֑וֹן וּמֶ֥תֶק שְׂ֝פָתַ֗יִם יֹסִ֥יף לֶֽקַח׃

verses.text_en: Good sense is a fountain of life to those who have it, And folly is the punishment of fools.
verses.text_he: מְק֣וֹר חַ֭יִּים שֵׂ֣כֶל בְּעָלָ֑יו וּמוּסַ֖ר אֱוִלִ֣ים אִוֶּֽלֶת׃

verses.text_en: The mind of the wise man makes his speech effective And increases the wisdom on his lips.
verses.text_he: לֵ֣ב חָ֭כָם יַשְׂכִּ֣יל פִּ֑יהוּ וְעַל־שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו יֹסִ֥יף לֶֽקַח׃

verses.text_en: Pleasant words are like a honeycomb, Sweet to the palate and a cure for the body.
verses.text_he: צוּף־דְּ֭בַשׁ אִמְרֵי־נֹ֑עַם מָת֥וֹק לַ֝נֶּ֗פֶשׁ וּמַרְפֵּ֥א לָעָֽצֶם׃

verses.text_en: A road may seem right to a man, But in the end it is a road to death.
verses.text_he: יֵ֤שׁ דֶּ֣רֶךְ יָ֭שָׁר לִפְנֵי־אִ֑ישׁ וְ֝אַחֲרִיתָ֗הּ דַּרְכֵי־מָֽוֶת׃

verses.text_en: The appetite of a laborer labors for him, Because his hunger forces him on.
verses.text_he: נֶ֣פֶשׁ עָ֭מֵל עָ֣מְלָה לּ֑וֹ כִּֽי־אָכַ֖ף עָלָ֣יו פִּֽיהוּ׃

verses.text_en: A scoundrel plots evil; What is on his lips is like a scorching fire.
verses.text_he: אִ֣ישׁ בְּ֭לִיַּעַל כֹּרֶ֣ה רָעָ֑ה וְעַל־[שְׂ֝פָת֗וֹ] (שפתיו) כְּאֵ֣שׁ צָרָֽבֶת׃

verses.text_en: A shifty man stirs up strife, And a querulous one alienates his friend.
verses.text_he: אִ֣ישׁ תַּ֭הְפֻּכוֹת יְשַׁלַּ֣ח מָד֑וֹן וְ֝נִרְגָּ֗ן מַפְרִ֥יד אַלּֽוּף׃

verses.text_en: A lawless man misleads his friend, Making him take the wrong way.
verses.text_he: אִ֣ישׁ חָ֭מָס יְפַתֶּ֣ה רֵעֵ֑הוּ וְ֝הוֹלִיכ֗וֹ בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ לֹא־טֽוֹב׃

verses.text_en: He closes his eyes while meditating deception; He purses his lips while deciding upon evil.
verses.text_he: עֹצֶ֣ה עֵ֭ינָיו לַחְשֹׁ֣ב תַּהְפֻּכ֑וֹת קֹרֵ֥ץ שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו כִּלָּ֥ה רָעָֽה׃

verses.text_en: Gray hair is a crown of glory; It is attained by the way of righteousness.
verses.text_he: עֲטֶ֣רֶת תִּפְאֶ֣רֶת שֵׂיבָ֑ה בְּדֶ֥רֶךְ צְ֝דָקָ֗ה תִּמָּצֵֽא׃

verses.text_en: Better to be forbearing than mighty, To have self-control than to conquer a city.
verses.text_he: ט֤וֹב אֶ֣רֶךְ אַ֭פַּיִם מִגִּבּ֑וֹר וּמֹשֵׁ֥ל בְּ֝רוּח֗וֹ מִלֹּכֵ֥ד עִֽיר׃

verses.text_en: Lots are cast into the lap; The decision depends on the LORD.
verses.text_he: בַּ֭חֵיק יוּטַ֣ל אֶת־הַגּוֹרָ֑ל וּ֝מֵיְהֹוָ֗ה כׇּל־מִשְׁפָּטֽוֹ׃

verses.text_en: Better a dry crust with peace Than a house full of feasting with strife.
verses.text_he: ט֤וֹב פַּ֣ת חֲ֭רֵבָה וְשַׁלְוָה־בָ֑הּ מִ֝בַּ֗יִת מָלֵ֥א זִבְחֵי־רִֽיב׃

verses.text_en: A capable servant will dominate an incompetent son And share the inheritance with the brothers.
verses.text_he: עֶֽבֶד־מַשְׂכִּ֗יל יִ֭מְשֹׁל בְּבֵ֣ן מֵבִ֑ישׁ וּבְת֥וֹךְ אַ֝חִ֗ים יַחֲלֹ֥ק נַחֲלָֽה׃
